1b1(rgyud): /rgyu gar skad du/skyur+ya a tsa la myah+mAk+Shod+hAn+naHs+yasad+h+ya ta thAg
1b2(rgyud): tasta ta s+yA ba ri mau ta ba la pa rI kra ma skye ba nAsta b+hA'i to nAM me kal+lA/bod skad
1b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal po'i mi g.yo ba
1b4(rgyud): de'i stobs dpag tu med pa rtul phod pa 'dul bar gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i rtog
2a1(rgyud): pA/rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha'o//'di skad du drug
2a2(rgyud): gis thos pa dus gcig ni/bcom ldan 'as rlung la bzhugs te/rin po che'i sna tshogs bkod pa rin po
2a3(rgyud): che'i gzhal yas khang bye ba grangs med pa du mas bkod cing yongasu bskor ba/bsami gyis mi khyab cing grangs
2a4(rgyud): med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams las 'khrungs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i khri ba shams
2a5(rgyud): pa rin po ches smras pa/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rnam pa snang bar byed pa rin po che sna tshogs
2b1(rgyud): kyi lcags ris yongs su bskor cing shin tu yid 'phrog pa/steng du rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa'i rin po che'i bla bres
2b2(rgyud): na mkha'i khams go 'byed par snang bar byed pa bsam+me gyis myi khyab pa'i pad+ma'i rgyul po rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las yang dag
2b3(rgyud): par byung ba/sems can thams cad kyi bosam pa sna tshogs yong su dga' bar byed pa/'od zer chene po phu la du byung ba
2b4(rgyud): gsal bar byed cing mun nag thams cad rab tu dang bar byed pa/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yuM shes la sa 'khrung/
2b5(rgyud): pa'i seng+ge'i khro bsam gyis mi khyab pa bye ba du mas yongasu bauskor ba byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas yongasu bskor bu/lha//
2b6(rgyud): dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po
3a1(rgyud): /la stsogs pa du mas yongs su bskor ba der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas chos ston to//'di lta ste/
3a2(rgyud): 'phags pa sman rus gzigs kyi du byugadang /'jam dpel dang /kun tu bzang po dang /byams pa dang sgrib pa Sh+T+r-imA~Ms
3a3(rgyud): s+yAd rnam pa ru sel ba dang /zhi ba'i bye blos dang /sna tshogs bko ba dang /nr-i mkha' me ga/'o chung dang /namakha'i snying
3a4(rgyud): po dang /shin tu rnam dag drang phyog ni rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yongasu bskor ba/nyan thos bye ba
3a5(rgyud): phrag du ma 'di lta ste/shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal dang /rta thu laM dang /'od srung la stsogs pas yongasu bskor ba/grags
3a6(rgyud): tshen snyan pa chen po brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /khyab 'jug dang /lus ngan po la sogs pas yongs su bskor zhing /
3b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thugs kyis chos ston pa 'di lta ste/gsang sngags kyi tshul la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
3b2(rgyud): gang thos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a de dag dang /nyan thos de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /bsam gyis mi khyab por sems
3b3(rgyud): can gyi khams kyi bsgom pa sna tshogs la dgos pa sna tshogs kyi spyod lam gyis zhugs shing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnams mdzad//bsam gyis mi khyab par
3b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams bsnyen bkur dang /yongs su mnyes par mdzad do//sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul du ma rnams kyang gzigs so//sangs rgyas kyi sprul
3b5(rgyud): pa du ma yang mngon par sprul pa mdzad do//bkod pa chen po yang bskyed par mdzad//mdor ni thabs gang dang gang gis sems can gyi don du gzigs pa de dang de
3b6(rgyud): mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bo com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des 'khor chen po rnams la
3b7(rgyud): gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje bodag gis sna tshogs du ma'i gsung gi 'khor lo
4a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam par phyung snga/tshig dang yi ge du ma bkod pa sems can sna tshogs mgu bar byed pa/phyag rgya dang sngags sna tshogs
4a2(rgyud): kyis rnam par mtshan par gyur pa/'gro ba sna tshogs kyi khyad par brjod pa/sdug bsngal sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa/dbang phyug du ma dang ldan zhing yid
4a3(rgyud): 'phrogs pa'i yi ge gcig dang /brgya stong grangs med po phyed dang /gsum dang /rjes 'jug dang /ring po dang /thung ngu dang /nga ro dang /gsal byed
4a4(rgyud): kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
4a5(rgyud): dang 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang /lho'i gnas la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang /ma'i 'gro ba dang /yi dwags dang /dud 'gro'i 'gro
4a6(rgyud): pa lnga thug par phye zhing bcad pa rnams gang bdag gis sems can rnams la phan pa'i bsam pa bye ba phrag grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis sems can rnams
4a7(rgyud): kyi don du gsung ba yino//de yang gzhi dang me tog gi snying pos brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamos 'dir der bar 'gyur//gsang ba pa'i bdag po bye ba
4b1(rgyud): phrag grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa bdun po de rnams kun gyi rlung nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /phyag na rdo rje dang /'jam dpal
4b2(rgyud): la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag gis thabs sna tshogs kyi cho ga'i sgo bstan to//gsung ba pa'i bdag po de rnams la ni mongag gzhug dang /mngag
4b3(rgyud): gzhug ma dang /pho nya dang /pho nya ma la sogs pa de rnams kyi phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /rtog pa'i cho ga yang rgyas par bstan to//las sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i
4b4(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs kyang bstan te/sgrub thabs sna tshogasnga yang ngag ldan//ras ris tshig rnam par bstan//yang na lus kyi cho ga dbye//gang du stongs chen gas ba'i las
4b5(rgyud): sbyin sreg dag ni bdag gris bstan//lhag mi de bzhin yul gnas gzhan//de nas ma lus me thab dang //de bzhin zhi ba rgyas po dang //dbang du byas dang mngon spyod
4b6(rgyud): denas du kyi khyung nga/ lakho ya na de shrIn sbyin/rgyo gakya malus /na du nimanan me nga//gas
4b7(rgyud): sngags nyid dang //rigs kyi mtshan ma de bzhin sku//ma lus pa yi dbyings dang yod //de lta bu la sogs pa'i las//de dag thams cad bdag gis bstan//
5a1(rgyud): mi g.yo zhes bya'i rtog pa ni//de ni slar yang bdag gis bashrang //dag pa'i sems dpa' blo ldan gyis//sngags pas gang zhig bsgrub bya yi//ba
5a2(rgyud): sdes mi khyab sna tshogs las//gsang sngags kyi ni sgrub thabs zhig/rtog pa 'diru mdor bsdus nas//de yi cho ga yang dag bshed//yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas bste/
5a3(rgyud): cing //bsgrubs pas go 'phang thob par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgras kyi mchog/chos zhes bya ba skyes par 'gyur//sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus par//don
5a4(rgyud): kun tu dag par 'gyur//rtag par rgyun tu rnam rtog med//na mkha' yi ni lam la gnas//gzugs can lus la rten na su//sems can bye brag thugasu chud/
5a5(rgyud): sems can zhi ba gdul dka' dang //bgegs chen dang ni log par 'dren//de rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rtag tu sprul//mtshan
5a6(rgyud): ni mi g.yo tsas bsgrags pa//khro bo 'phags pa stobs po che//dpal ldan gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa//sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi sras//de 'dir rgyal mtshan
5a7(rgyud): rnams dang ni//de bzhin rgyal sras kyi rtag par//phyag 'tshal tshangs pa la sogs dang //lus can thams cad kun tu mchod//sangs rgyas rnams ni byas pa gzo//
5b1(rgyud): de bzhin du ni sangs rgyas sgras//'di kun smon lam yongs rdzogs shing //bsam gyis mi khyab yo shos rdzogs//mi g.yo zhes bya'i sa thob pas//mi g.yo 'di yang da yI mtshan//
5b2(rgyud): bdud rnams kun gyis mi g.yo bas//brten pa'i ye shes dri med bzang //rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul gyi//bshad kyi bu khyod tshur nyon cig/sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis
5b3(rgyud): brlangs//chos kyi dbyings rab gzhol bas//rtag tu tshe dang nad med mchog/dngos grub myur du gsel mdzad pa//rtag tu bgegs rnams sel byed cing //de bzhin
5b4(rgyud): bdud rnams rab tu 'joms//sems can rnams ni bde ba'i phyir//rtog pa 'di ni rab tu bshad//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
5b5(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag 'grin gcig gi ngag gis gsol pa/sems can thams cad kyi don dang bdog cag la thugs brtse ba bskyed de/bcom ldan 'das
5b6(rgyud): bshang du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
5b7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas nas/dpal
6a1(rgyud): kyi 'a'u las byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od bor phyung ste/'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma grangs med pas/yongs bskor ba byas nas gzhi dang snyid po m+b+ha/
6a2(rgyud): tog gis rgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas bzungs te/ji srid brjod po med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi
6a3(rgyud): khams nas/na mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa'i bar du de khyab nas/g.yas phyogs nas bskor te/de bzhin du byang phyogs dang /nub dang /lho dang
6a4(rgyud): shar gyi phyogs dang /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du khebs par bya'o//'jig rten gyi khams de rnams na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de thams
6a5(rgyud): cad kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di smras/shAkya mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas//gzi brjid chen po gang bzhugs pa//chos kyi dbyings pos byung ba yi//rgyal ba'i sras
6a6(rgyud): po thams cad gshegs//de ru dri med dam chos nyon//gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul dge ba//gang thos 'jig rten mgon pos ni//byang chub 'dus ma byas pa
6a7(rgyud): bsnyes//de nas 'od chen po des tshog su bcad pa 'di zos nas slar lage s+t+wa~M/bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal be'u nyid du zhugs par gyur te//de nas byang chub sems dpas
6b1(rgyud): chen po de rnams rang rang gi 'jig rten gyi khams nas khro bo'i mthus/bcom ldan 'a shAkya thub pa ga le ba der lhag so//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan
6b2(rgyud): pa'i 'khor rnams kyi sems rtse gcig par mkhyen nas slar yang rdo rje bsgyings pa bsregs pa'i me lce kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyom par zhugaso//bcom ldan
6b3(rgyud): 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yo so//rab tu g.yo so//kun tu rab tu g.yoso//'gul
6b4(rgyud): rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul/ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg/'khrugs/ra ba tu 'khrugs/kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/'ur 'ur/rab tu 'ur 'ur/
6b5(rgyud): kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/chem chim/rab tu tsham che ma/kun tu rab tu che ma chem/'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung bar gyur to//gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab
6b6(rgyud): pa'i tshe 'phral mthong ngo //snyoms par zhugs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/bdud thams cad rab tu 'dzoms
6b7(rgyud): par byed pa/sems can thams cad kyi bsame pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/chos kyi dbyings grangs med par sems can gyi khams rnam par grol bar byed pa/de bzhin
7a1(rgyud): /sa shabs po thams cad kyi stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyi ting 'dzin rnam par rtog pa med pa'i ye shes kyi me yang dag pa byung ba/byang chub snyoms dpa' rnams//
7a2(rgyud): cad kyi snying po nye bar ston pa/sna tshogs pa'i gsung gi 'khor rab tu bsgrubs pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yab/sems can nyon mongs pa'i mun nag tu lhung ba
7a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa/ngan song dang ngan 'gror lhung ba thams cad kyi ded dpon/sdug bsngal bas nyam thag pa rnams bde bar gyur pa/mdor na sems can
7a4(rgyud): rnams kyi sdug bsngal gang dang gang ldan pa de dang der rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po khro bo chen po'i rgyal po'i snying po 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
7a5(rgyud): bde ba'i phyir ro//na maHsarbA shA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA haM/bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu
7a6(rgyud): gzhi dang snying po me tog gis rgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang /bdud kyi ris kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad mog mog
7a7(rgyud): por byas te/sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed pa'i snang ba mdzad//sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par
7b1(rgyud): byas nas ma lus pa'i srid pa'i bdag pa'i sa gzha rab tu 'gul bar gyur te//gzhan yang 'jog rten du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ong mnar rab tu byung bar gyur te//de nas bcom ldan 'dra/
7b2(rgyud): shAkya thub pas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje/'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchog gi de kho na nyid/steng
7b3(rgyud): nyid 'di las gzhan dag byung //chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid//'di las rgyal ba byung ba mthong //'di ru rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs//srid pa'i khams ni 'di las sprul//
7b4(rgyud): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang //mo byon pa de de bzhin gzhan//thams cad 'di las yang dag byung //nam mkha' lta bu dri ma med//spros pa thams cad rnam par bra la//
7b5(rgyud): ngag gi spyod yul rnam par spangs//rtag par spros pa med pa nyid//nam mkha' lta bur gnas pa yin//tha snyad mngon du byas na sa ni//gis sngags zhesu brjod pa yin//
7b6(rgyud): tha snyad kyang ni rtog pa ste//de nyid du ni brjod pa med//tha snyad la ni brten nasu//skyob pas de nyid gsungs pa yin//sems can med sgyu ma bzhin//yid kyi sgom par
7b7(rgyud): bya ba yin//la lar sgyu mji bzhin du//rang bzhin med par yang 'gyur te//stong nyid de yi rang bzhin du//tha snyed rnams ni rtogs par bya//de ltar gsang sngags man
8a1(rgyud): po 'di//rang bzhin med par mnyam par mdzes//'dod pa'i don rnams rtsol ba yang //thams cad kyang ni rdzogs par byed//de nas byang chub sems dang
8a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /tshangs pa dang /dbang po la sogs pa rnams shin tu ngo mtshar rma du gyur cing snying po rnams
8a3(rgyud): spangs te/de thams cad bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bltas nas/tshig 'di dag mgrin gcig gi ngag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sngon chad ma
8a4(rgyud): thos pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'di bskor ba bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to//bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par
8a5(rgyud): 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nyan thos thams cad dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags/
8a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdud sdig can rnams dang /bgegs kyi gzugs can thams cad kyis 'gom par mi nus lags//bcom ldan 'das 'dren sems can thad
8a7(rgyud): kyi don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu lagaso//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mngon par 'dod pa'i don stong pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
8b1(rgyud): bstan pa dang /sems can rnams kyi srung ma lag so//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni srin pa dang grul du mo la sogs pa thams cad kyis mda' bar mi nus pa lags//de skad
8b2(rgyud): ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
8b3(rgyud): lha la sogs pa'i 'khor de rnams la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/gtsug lag leg so legaso//slar yang gtsug lag nges par legaso//de ltar gtsug lag 'di che
8b4(rgyud): brjod pa mdzes pa de bzhin du yin no//'on kyang gtsug lag gi bstan pa srung bar byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i snying pa'i gzhung 'di bdag gis gauti mug bi mun pas
8b5(rgyud): g.yogs pi sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la ltas nas gsungs te//'di ni nyan par ma nus pa'i//go 'phang rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs//de rnams the tsom phyir bdag
8b6(rgyud): gis//ye shes sgron me yang dag par//byis pa sdug bsngal yang dag khengs//sa bzhi steng ni 'di na gnas//tshul 'di rab tu mi shes pas//khyim bye bcings pa dam
8b7(rgyud): bos bcings//de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdage bo mag na rdo rjes mig gnyis 'bru tshug su bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar te//
9a1(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mthu che lags//bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal ba dI stong ba ga/zi brjid dang mthu ni bdag pa//
9a2(rgyud): mi bzod lagaso//bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po 'di ni gdul dka' 'dul ba lagaso//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa//gsang ba'i
9a3(rgyud): bdag po 'di ni ci skad du smras pa de bzhin//'on kyang gsang ba'i bdag po bdag ni gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i mthus nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bdud ji snyed las rgya'o//
9a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po gang yang bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dod pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams dga' bar byed pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'jig
9a5(rgyud): rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa'i bsam pa tha dad pa rnams la bstan pa de rnams ni 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag gis bston to//gang yang gsang ba'i bdag po byang chub
9a6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po dbang thang thams cad thob pa'i ye shes kyi stobs brtul phod pa bsnyes pa 'di yang snying po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis yin no//gcig tu sems can don
9a7(rgyud): rab brtson//sa bzhi la ni rnam par bzhugs//sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas//sprul pa rnams kyang 'byed par mdzad//mchod cing mnyes par rtag tu ni/
9b1(rgyud): rgyal ba zhing nas yang dag bzhugs//ji srid phyogs rnams gnas kyi bar//rtag par rgyun tu mchod 'gyur ba'i//sangs rgyas kun gyi mnyam pa ru//byang chub ces bya 'di la bzhugs/
9b2(rgyud): rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams ni//skye ba dang ni 'gag pa yin//tha snyad la ni brten nas//gang zhig sgyu ma bzhin du gsungs//sgyu ma stong pa nyid yin ltar//chos rnam
9b3(rgyud): mtshan nyid de bzhin no//'on kyang gsong ba'i bdag po//bdag gis bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drang med kyi bskal ba snyed du sems can sna tshogs kyi lus
9b4(rgyud): d+hiblangs nas sdug bsngal spyad de mgo dang /lag pa dang /rkang pa dang /mig dang yan lag gi mchog dang /chung ma dang /bu dang /bu mo dang /glang po dang /rta dang /shing rta la sogs
9b5(rgyud): pa dang /gzhan yang phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams yongasu gtang ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa rnams/
9b6(rgyud): kyi tshul gyis bsam pa sna tshogs dang /'dod pa sna tshogs pa la sgra dbyangs dang /tshig dang yi ge bstan cing spyod lam sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma'i byad dang /dbyibs kyi khyad par
9b7(rgyud): can gyi bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don byas shing /gang byang chub kyi snying por bdud bzhi bcom pa de thams cad gsang sngags kyis rgyal po 'di'i mthus byaso//'di ni
9'a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams 'phel bar byed pa bdud las kyang rgyal bar byed pa/bstan pa thams cad kyi don yod pa byed pa/bzhan yang sna tshogs ma lus dran/
9'a2(rgyud): 'gags las kyang /rgyal bar byed pa s+t+waM/'di las gnyis pa gzhan yod min//sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi 'gyur sngags//de bas snying khar bzhig nas kyang /
9'a3(rgyud): ltar bde bar rnam par gnas//spong bar byed pa'i bgegs kyang med//blags tshal gzhan yang yod ma yin//rtag tu dgra yi 'jigs pa med//rkun la sogs pa'i 'jig
9'a4(rgyud): pa'ang med//'jigs pa kun las rnam par grol//de yi snying khar gnas bsgoms pas//bdag ni yun rings bsgral ba ru//'khor ba'i ba rgya mtsho 'jigs pa las
9'a5(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i gtso//go 'phangs bdag gis ji ltar 'thob//bdag gis ci yang thab med par//tshul 'di las ni rnam spyad nas//de 'dir mi
9'a6(rgyud): 'gyur thob par bya//sangs rgyas nyid kyis rgyas pa thob//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa che//gsang sngags sgrub thabs brtan par bya//de na sa yid bzhin nar bu
9'a7(rgyud): 'od//sku ni 'di ru thob par 'gyur//gang zhig tshul 'dir gnas pa yi//de rnams kyi ni dngos grub phyir//gang tshe sngags pas mnyam gzhag pas//de bas ma
9'b1(rgyud): rnyirnyos pa'ang 'thob//'dis na mi phyed pa yang 'byed//mi rgyal ba las ma lus rgyal//stobs chen gsang sngags bzlas pa yis//rdzogs sangs go 'phang sbyin par byed//dran dang /
9'b2(rgyud): rtog dang sems pa yi//sngags rig gang du song gyur pa//me ni 'bar ba ji lta bar//sngags pa gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur//gang tshe gsang sngags rgyal po bste//de las/
9'b3(rgyud): 'bras med cing yang med//gsang sngags stobs tshan dran pa ni//las ni 'dod pa byed par 'gyur/sngags kyi mgon po ma lus pa//'di ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur//gang
9'b4(rgyud): tshe gsang sngags 'bras 'dod pas//'dir ni the tshom mi bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang //thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag ji mtshar ba'i snying po ma
9'b5(rgyud): spangs par sgra skad gcig tu gdung pa'i dbyangs kyis gsol pa//e ma 'o sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab//sems can don rnams thugasu chud//rtogs pa med pa'i rang bzhin
9'b6(rgyud): yang //bsam mi khyab pa'i go 'phang shod//gang zhig 'chad par byed pa'i mi//de yis ngan 'gro rnam par bcad//gang gis lag tu chud pa ltar//de yis dngos
9'b7(rgyud): grub lag mthil gnas//'jigs pa med cing nga yir med//dogs pa thams cad rnam par spangs//zad par sa la bzhugs na su//sems can la ni ma bsam byed
10a1(rgyud): gsang sngags rgyal po skyobs pa yi//bdag cag thams cad skyob par byed//'dod pa'i don ni byed 'dod pas//gsungs pa yid kyis sgom par byed//
10a2(rgyud): de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dag tshig 'di brjod nas/de ma thag tu cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te//spyan rgyas shing shAkya'i rigs
10a3(rgyud): dga' ba la gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig gi nus pa medado//de nas na mkhar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ngo mtshar 'di thos nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la steng gi/
10a4(rgyud): na mkhwal sna tshogs pa'i me tog gis snyim pa bkang ste//bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/rtag tu dag cing dri med pa//rtag par rgyun tu rtog/
10a5(rgyud): pa med//rtag tu rtog pa med par bzhugs//dpa' bo chen po phyag 'tshal bstod//khyod kyis chos kun g.yo ba med//thams cad legs sbyar spyod yul bas//
10a6(rgyud): rtag tu g.yo ba med mkhyen pas//spros dang bral la phyag 'tshal bstod//sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas//spyod pa spyad pa gsungs pa ste//dag pa rnams
10a7(rgyud): ni yang dag 'byung //dag pa'i sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod//ji ltar na mkha' bzhin du dag/rdul phran thams cad rnam por spangs//de ltar mgon khyod sku yang
10b1(rgyud): ni//kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs//shel sgong bzhin du shin tu dag/na mkha' lta bur smras pa med//dngos po thams cad rnam dag pas//ye shes rgyal mtsho phyag 'tshal
10b2(rgyud): bstod//na mkha' la ni 'ja' chen ltar//gtso ba khyod ni rtag tu mthong //de ltar dag pa'i sems can gyis//rtag tu gtso bo khyed mthong //ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par
10b3(rgyud): grol//dpa' bo chen po khyod nyid 'khrungs//dbyings kyi snying po yang dag byung //yi ge gcig tu gzi brjid che//sa gzhi thams cad nges pa cu//sems can sdug bsngal kun/
10b4(rgyud): tu gzigs//sdug bsngal 'di ni zad byas nos//tha med go 'phang 'dra bar 'gyur//gsang sngags rnams kyi gtse sngags 'di//chos rnams kyi ni blo 'phel bar//rgya
10b5(rgyud): pa'i sras po thams cad bskyed//gtso bo khyod kyis gsungs pa yis//dngos po thams cad yang dag 'gyur//rgyal ba bdag nyid rgyu med 'khrungs//lngas dang skye bas
10b6(rgyud): rnam par grol//rgyal mochog gtso bor 'khrungs par 'gyur//ye shes me lce rang bzhin med//'du byed thams cad rnam par spong //chos kyi dbyings kyi rong bzhin
10b7(rgyud): gcig/rgyal ba bla med phyag 'tshal bdud//ces pas so//de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pas bsngags kyi tshig gi don//
11a1(rgyud): sa ga/tsam ldan 'das gsung smra g+sasu sgyur zlar//pU d+ma'i ma na snang lags//sgrar sun dmanas r+b+ba//k+Shu rA na
11a2(rgyud): gas/mas na ngan du'i ra//gci 'dzin nanade ltar de ni 'bras su med//snganas pa sani ces nis
11a3(rgyud): ldan 'as kyis byu na'i sa rkyeshin du rdul 'dzi sa nas dka' stsa!//hU~M chu'i semasnani rgyu byas nas//grams kyi dngos gru da /
11a4(rgyud): sa skye //kunan dumams cid 'akyis du med//ji sa pa~M smras nano// shis zlas med//de ltar byung chu ba sems ca ni/
11a5(rgyud): ni las gsang sngags 'bras bu shes//byang chub sems ni bskyed nas//bla na med pa'i ga 'bang 'thob//'di la gnas pa'i chos kun ni//skye dang gnas pas
11a6(rgyud): 'thung na ste//dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus nas//rang bzhin med cing bsam du med//byang chub sems ni nges par thob//gzhan du 'ba'o zhig par 'gyur
11a7(rgyud): bu 'disang ge'i sgra yin te//stong nyid 'dus byis bsgom par byed//srid pa thams cad sgyu ma yin//gang zhig bsam pa'i 'bras bur gnas//mu stegs rnams/
11b1(rgyud): da/ ga gyung klu // sa rlu shA dang //gang sa sanas nga//du sgyul rnams /sa nas/
11b2(rgyud): la thaM /sa gas med/ na//sri pa nam sas//dus pa sus sa nga rlom pa
12a1(rgyud): ba'i don du rab tu brtag/dang du phung po khams med cing //skye mchod rnams ni 'byung ba med//dngos po kun las rnam grol bar//rgyal ba mchog gis
12a2(rgyud): rtag tu gsungs//bang du kun gzhi rnam shes med//bdag med gang zag kyang yod ma ni//sangs rgyas byang chub sa steng sa 'di//gang du thams cad sgyu mar gsungs//ngan
12a3(rgyud): kun mkhyen mnga' bsnyes pa//rnams can don rnams thugasu chud//cho ga bya ba la zhugs phyir//bu la mau lus par bshad do//gang zhig kun gzhi yod pa dang //ga la te
12a4(rgyud): rnam shes kyang yod pa//de yi bdag nyid bdag gi bu//yod do zhes kyang bstan gyur pa//dngus po'i gdon gyis brlams pa yi//byis pas sdug bsngal rnams mthong nas
12a5(rgyud): bdag gis gzhugs par bya phyir bu//cho ga rgyas pa gsungs pa yin//sems can med cing srog kyang med//gang zag med cing byed pa po'ang med//rnam shes med
12a6(rgyud): cing kun gzhi med//gang la bdagra med dbang phyug med//skyes bu med cing khyab pa'ang med//gtso bo med cing rgyu yang med//dngos po kun las rnam grol ba'i//dam
12a7(rgyud): chos dri ma med pa bshad//de nyid mchog gi gtso bo ste//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ga 'phangs sten//rtag par rgyun tu bsgom par bya//byang chub sems ni rnam par
12b1(rgyud): gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam grol bar//dngos po thams cadu rnam par gcad//phung po khams dang skye mchod spangs//thams cad stong nyid sgyu ma ltar//byang chub sems ni bsdus pa nyid//
12b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis//de ltar yid kyi bsgom par bya//phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nye//gang zhig sangs rgyas nyid kyi thugs//bag yod pas na rtag pa sten na/
12b3(rgyud): byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'char//bsnyen par gyur na 'bras bu 'byung //gsang sngags spyod pas gang dag ste//yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i sku//byang chub sems kyis 'thob par 'gyur//
12b4(rgyud): nam mkha' lta bur gos med pa'i//sku ni kun tu 'thab par 'gyur//byang chub sems ni bsgoms pa yis//bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab bshad//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul
12b5(rgyud): kun gyis//'bras bu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
12b6(rgyud): bskor ba byas nas/rdo rje'i skabasu rtol ba blangs te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//ye shes brgya mtsho las byung ba'i//khyod kyi sras po nga mnyes gshin+da/
12b7(rgyud): 'di dag shin tu som nyi ga//bdag gis ji ltar rtog par bgyi//geng yang byams pa la sogs gzhan//sa bcu ma lus pa thams cad //'di la the tsam 'tshal zhing mchis
13a1(rgyud): thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol//gang zhig sems can don ma byas//bsod nams ye shes rnam par spangs//de rnams la ni thugs brtse'i phyir
13a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di gsol 'debs//de ring bdag la ma lus par//sems can phan par brtson pas gsungs//'di yi mthu stobs kyang ni ci//'di yi pha rol gnon
13a3(rgyud): pa ci//mi g.yo zhes bya'i gtso khyod kyis//'dir ni ji ltar yang dag gsungs//'di las gzhan pa'i go 'phang med//'di dag thams cad gsung du gsol//gang gi go 'phang/
13a4(rgyud): de 'grub pa'i//dkyil 'khor yang ni bshad du gsol//gang gis sa stangs 'di thob pa'i//bsam mi khyab pa'i go 'phang gsungs//gsang sngags kyi ni tshad kyang gsungs
13a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yang ni ji ltar lags//mgon po 'di la the tsom za//gang 'dir 'gro ba la phan phyir//sngags kyi dngos grub de bzhin gsungs//de nyid las kyi dbye ba yang //
13a6(rgyud): mngon spyod kyang ni rab tu bshang //zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dag gis//mgon pos ji ltar tshar myur bar//sngags kyi bzlas pa'i 'bras bu mchis//mgon pos zla ba'i mtshan
13a7(rgyud): nyid ni//sa steng 'dir ni ji ltar//me thabs kyi ni cho ga dang //de yang tshe dang sang btor dang //khro bo'i rgyal po dang ldan pa//mgon pos de dag thams cad gsungs//
13b1(rgyud): nyi ma gcig gi nyin byed nas//zla ba brgyad pa'i skad cig tu//dngos grub dag ni yang dag gsungs//dug gi las kyi gso spyang dang //rdzas kyi sbyor ba'i las sna tshogs//mngon par brjod/
13b2(rgyud): pa yang dag 'byung //ma lus pa ni bshad du gsol//gang gis dngos grub thob pa yis//mgon po gzhan ni ma mchis te//gtso bo khyod spangs gzhan medo//byang chub sems//
13b3(rgyud): dpa' dpa' bo rnams//nyan thos rang rgyal rdzu 'phrul che//gang yang 'jig rten par grags pa'i//tshangs sogs rdzu 'phrul char bshad pa//de rnams kyi yang mgon skyabs
13b4(rgyud): ni//gtso bo khyod spangs gzhan ma mchis//de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang //phyag na rdo rje la sogs pas slar yang bcom ldan 'ongs
13b5(rgyud): la gsol ba btab pa//chos kyi rgyal po sngags kyi sgo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//byang chub sems dpa'i spyad spyod pa'i//byang chub sems dpa'i
13b6(rgyud): don gyi phyir//gsang sngags spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs//gang gis bcom ldan nyid kyis gzigs//chos kyi dga' bde thob pa ni//sa gzhi'i steng na rnam par gnas//
13b7(rgyud): gsang sngags mnyes par rab brtson zhing //mthong ba'i chos la bde thob pa'i//sems can sa stangs gnas pa yi//the tsom med par 'byung bar 'gyur//thams cad
14a1(rgyud): dbang phyugs go 'phang thob//'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs//gsang sngags rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che//'jig rten 'di ru 'byung bar 'gyur//sngang //
14a2(rgyud): ba'i srin po thams cad dang //'byung po gdon dang sha za dang //'jig su rung dang drag shul las//sems can rnams la gnod bshad pa//gsang sngags stobs chen dran
14a3(rgyud): pa yis//de dag thams cad 'byung mi 'gyur//sa stengs sems can ma rungs pa//rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan yang bshad//de rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir//rtog
14a4(rgyud): pa 'di ni rab tu gsungs//lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //grul bum dang ni lus sul po//smyo byed rgyu skar thams cad dang //ma rungs bza' sogs pa shad pa dang //
14a5(rgyud): sems can sdig can de rnams la//khro bo 'di ni rab tu gsungs//tshangs sogs gdon gyi cho ga sa kun dang //de bzhin rgyal ba nyan thos dang //sa bcu'i byang chub
14a6(rgyud): dpa' yis//gang zhig bshad par mi nus shing //de dag thams cad thal ba rlogs//gsang sngags bzlas pa rdzu 'phrul tshe//snying la gnas pa yang dgra bsom//
14a7(rgyud): gsang sngags zhes bya mthang da/ka/ zhing //ma lus pa ru thal bar brlags//tshangs pa la sogs dkyil 'khor dang //byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che//dang
14b1(rgyud): de'i gnas bcu bdag po yis//'di ni bzod par mi nus te//khro bo'i rgyal po rol pa ni//sdang ba'i sems can ci nas kyang //ras bal 'da' ba mtshungs par btag/
14b2(rgyud): ming nas bos pa tsam gyis ni//phyogs bcu rnamasu 'byer bar 'gyur//de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis//gsang sngags 'di ru bzlas pa ni//rtag par rgyun tu dran par bya//
14b3(rgyud): gsang sngags dngos grub 'dod pa yis//thams cad du ni 'jigs meng par//sngags gnas sa stengs 'di ru bya//gsang sngags mgon po dran pa dang //chang ba dang ni
14b4(rgyud): rtag tu bzlos//me yi nang du gnas pa na//mche ba gtsigs pa yi ni skus//'byer te rtag tu 'jig pa med//mtho ris them skas lta bur dga'//'jigs shing skrag pas/
14b5(rgyud): 'khrigs pa na//rgyal po chen pos 'jigs pa sel//chom rkun gsab tu chud pa na//seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sku//khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul tsha//de
14b6(rgyud): yis rtag tu dran par byas//rims dang so mig gzer zug dang //rked pa'i rtsibs log lus las byung //rnam pa sna tshogs kun 'byung ba'i//sa stengs lus can
14b7(rgyud): nad rnams ni//gsong sngags dran pa tsam nyid kyis//de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur//khro rgyal bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i//mthu dang stobs ni brtul phod pa'i//
15a1(rgyud): kun mkhyen las gzhanas steng sa na//rtag tu bzod nas su zhig dad//'khor los bsgyud bu'i mthu stobasanA//ji ltar b+hU bAr mi nus pa//
15a2(rgyud): bzhin khro rgyal bsgyings pa yis//brjod par yang ni mi nuso//ji ltar 'khor los basbyar ba yis//yon tAn mi yis bgrangs mi nus//de bzhin khro ba de rgyal po yi//
15a3(rgyud): skyabs ni badz+rod por mi nuso//rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs zhes pa'i//khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad kyang //khro bo'i mngag gzhug po nya dang //bka' nyan po nya rdzu 'phrul che/
15a4(rgyud): de rnams kyi ni khro bo 'dridi//'khor los bsgyur zhes mngon par brjod//khro bo'i rgyal po blo ldan gyi//mthu stobs de lhur bshad pa ni//spangs rgyas kun gyi dbya' gcig
15a5(rgyud): 'di//de'i dpa' bo zhesu bshad//gang gi sungs bden pa'i tshig gyur pas//mi slu ba ni nyid yin no//de phyir 'di ni mi g.yo bas//mi g.yo ba zhes mngon par brjod//
15a6(rgyud): mi g.yo ba yi sa thob pa//bsam gtan rtse gcig blo yi gnas//nyan thos sa la sogs pa yi//bdud rnams kun gyis mi g.yo ba//des na mgon pos mtshan/
15a7(rgyud): gsol to//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo rnams//'di ni don kun 'grub par byed//gang yang 'das pa'i sangs
15b1(rgyud): dang //gang yang de bzhon ma byon pa//mnan po de ltar ba zhugs pa dang //'gro la phan rgyu tshog ni//de dag kun gyis 'dogasungs pa//sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba ngan na//
15b2(rgyud): sems can khams ni thams cad kyi//bstan pa gang yin srung bar mdzad//sangs rgyas kun gyi sbrul po dang //byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen gyis//nang yang
15b3(rgyud): sngags grangs med pa//sems can phran 'dogs zhugs par gsungs//lag na rdo rje blo ldan pa//'di dag thams cad yang dag bshad//mi gang sdig pas sgribs
15b4(rgyud): med kyi//sems can snang ba skyed par byed//mi phyed pa'i zhags par bcings//bla na med pa'i go 'phang 'gyur//khro bo'i rgyal po blo dang ldan//sngags pas ma bsgrubs
15b5(rgyud): par yang 'grub//khro bo'i rgyal po'i byin rlobs kyis//'dod pa ma lus 'grub par 'gyur//de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i de dag ngo mtshar te/dga' zhing mig rgyas pa sa
15b6(rgyud): mgrin gcig dang ngag gcig tu tshig ston pas gsal pa/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni//thabs dang shes rab bsam du med//thugs rjer gyur pa'i thugs kyis
15b7(rgyud): ni/mtshungs med dam tshig bshadadu gsol//gang yang sems can 'jigs pas 'khrigs//sa stengs thams cad 'jigs med cing //gang gis gus chen rang
16a1(rgyud): bzhin gyis//de yis ngan 'gro sbyongs par 'gyur//de nas byang chubab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces//
16a2(rgyud): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po 'dri dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad rgyal po'i dbang phyug gi go 'phang thob par 'gyur ba
16a3(rgyud): bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis 'tshe bar mi nus pa dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed pa//dbang phyug thams cad la yang dag par ldan par byed pa bshad du gsol/
16a4(rgyud): de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes la bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje legaso legaso//lag na rdo rje shin
16a5(rgyud): tu legaso//khyod kyi kho bo la gsol ba gtab pa'i don 'di rigs kyi bu nyon cig/khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gang gis thos pas sa stengasu thams cad ngo mtsha/
16a6(rgyud): zhing mig rgyas te/nus pa med pas bzod par mi nus te/de nas sa steng su 'gyel par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe bdud thams cad sreg pa'i mi
16a7(rgyud): lce yang dag par byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
16b1(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pa/dus gsum kun gyi byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa skyed par byed pa/sems can thams cad kyi don gsol bar byed cing yod pa/de bzhin ga
16b2(rgyud): pa thams cad bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyib po las la drungs pa/sems can thams cad kyis shin tu mthong bar dga' ba/mthong ba'i bgegs rnams rab tu 'joms
16b3(rgyud): pa ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par spyod par byed pa/nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed pa/gdon ma rungs pa thams cad la
16b4(rgyud): gas sbyong mdzad pa/bdud kyi dgro thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa'i sngags bka' stsal pa/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbA shA pa ri pU rakle b+h+yaHsarba thA tsaN+Da mahA
16b5(rgyud): Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM tra Ta hUM mAM/bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang sngags kyi rgyal po bka' stsal ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan po'i 'khor de dge chu shing gi sdong bu dang /nag sra tshal
16b6(rgyud): chen po lta bur beb tshal du khas phub tu 'gyel bar gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa dang /ldeg pa
16b7(rgyud): dang /'gul ba dang /rab tu 'gul ba dang /g.yos pa dang /rab tu g.yos pa dang /che mtshem/rab tu chem che mo shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'/lho phyog sa maH
17a1(rgyud): na byang phyogs dma' bar gyur to//gzhan yang ngo mtshar zhing skad du byung ba mthong ste/nga mtshar che bar gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnamasu sangs rgyas
17a2(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing khams sna tshogaso ba yang mthong ngo //gang yang bzhi dang snying pa me tog gis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bgegs sna tshogs dang /srin po dang /
17a3(rgyud): bdud kyi rigs sna tshogs dang /gzhan yang gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dag thams cad thal bar brlags te/kha cig la srub du ni gnas/'jigs pa'i bskal
17a4(rgyud): pa lta bur ni//dud pa dud skyar kun tu gnas//nyi ma zla ba rdzu 'phrul che//'di yi snang ba'ang mun par 'gyur//mun nas snab ni shin tu 'jigs//glog 'byu yul
17a5(rgyud): na 'jig su rung //phyogs kun du ni 'o dod 'bod//sa bzhi thams cad kun tu 'khrugs//gza' dang sgra skar tshogs kun tu//gang yang lha yi gtso bo gzhan//de dag
17a6(rgyud): thams cad 'jigs sdongs dang //sems med kha sbub du ni 'brel//lha min mi 'am ci dang klu//gnod sbyin srin po lus srul pa//'di rnams lus kyis mi bzod pa
17a7(rgyud): dug gis btab bzhin gnyis yur te//'di dag thams cad gcig tu 'bar//bskal pa'i me las yang dog byung //'di dag thams cad 'bar zhing mched//sang+yas//
17b1(rgyud): zhing ni kun nas kyang //byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che//so bcu gnas kyi dbang phyug rnams//de yang gnyid bro yur bar 'gyur//kha spu du ni sa la 'gyel//khro bo mngag
17b2(rgyud): gzhug dka' nyan pa//pho nya pho mo bran dang bcas//lus 'di'i tshugs ni mi thub par//sems stong kha sbub 'brel bar gyur//gang yang nyan thos se ru dang //'jig rten rdzu 'phrul
17b3(rgyud): chen po gzhan//lcags ni shing tshe thul ba ltar//de yang gnasu 'gyel bar gyur//tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs lha//lha mi ni gnad sbyin rdzu 'phrul che//de dag thams cad thal bar
17b4(rgyud): gyur//sdug bsngal 'khrigs par 'gyur na ni//cung zad slar yang phan tshun du//byer cing 'jigs pas tshig smras te//bu gcig 'don ji ltar 'gyur//sa gzhi 'di dag shin tu
17b5(rgyud): 'jigs//bde gshegs go 'phang ma gtogs pa//zhi ba ci yang ma mthong ngo //bdud dang bgegs kyi gzugs rnams kyang //rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag gnas//lus ni
17b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba lta bu ru//sa stengs na ni shing bzhin gnas//tshangs pa la sogs yul rnams ni//'di dag thams cad 'bar bar mthong //mnar med gyur pa'i lus kyang ni//dud
17b7(rgyud): kha dung sbyar kun tu gnas//sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus pa//'di dag thams cad sreg par byed//snying rje zhugs zhing yang dag ldan//phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad gsol//sa ni
18a1(rgyud): don du ma bsam pas//bcom ldan bkod pa bsgyu ru gsol//byis pa sdug bsngal rten can gyis//'di ni brjod par mi nus//'bru ba'i sems can kun
18a2(rgyud): gyi mngon//thugs rje rnams ni thung bar mdzad//thubaste rje gcig pa'i raM las 'khrungs//sems can sdung bsngal grol mdzad pa'i//'gro ba'i mgon po khyod gcig pu/
18a3(rgyud): gnyen du gyur pa khyod kho na//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las grol ba'i//mnyan pa yang ni khyod gcig pu//nad rnams thams cad gso mdzad pa'i//khyod nyid gcig pu sman par
18a4(rgyud): 'gyur//dam pa'i lam ston pa yang khyod//khyod ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtshar pha//sa stangs nyid na khyod 'ba' zhig/mgon po thugs rje bskyed na ni//sa bzhi thams cad
18a5(rgyud): yang dag 'phel//dpag bsam shing bzhin don gnyer ba'i//yang dag dpa' bo byang chub sems//sa bcu'i gnas kyi dbang phyug rnams//mgon po khyod nyid gcig pus
18a6(rgyud): 'phel//thugs rje pad ma 'angam skyes bzhin//sems ni ngan par 'gyur ba yi//'gro ba'i mgon pos sreg par mdzod//spyi bo med pa lta bur 'gyur//chu shing gi ni sdod
18a7(rgyud): ba bzhin//phye ma leb bzhin skye bo rnams//drag tu 'bod pa'i lung ba thob//bsres kyang zug rngu mi 'byung ste//de bzhin 'dir ni byis pa rnams//'gegs dang log 'dren
18b1(rgyud): thams cad dang //grangs mod bcu'i stobs kyi bdag/gsang sngags rgyal po brjod pa yis//de dag thams cad thal bar brlag/de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis//bcom ldan gyu/
18b2(rgyud): la bdag gsol 'dabs//khyod kyi skyes po bdag mnyas dA shanA~M//bdag gi ni grisan pa'i rig sa//de nus bcom ldan 'das shAkya zlab pa thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs mda'
18b3(rgyud): phyug na rdo rjes sems can la phan pa'i phyir//thub mchog gi gtso bo la//gsol ba btab pa'i tshig 'di ni//shin tu rgya che ba legs//bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe sems can tha
18b4(rgyud): kyi srog 'byung zhing //ye shes 'khrungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//snyoms par zhugs nas rigs pa'i rgyal po 'di sems can thams cad la phan par byed
18b5(rgyud): pa/'dus byas thams cad rab tu 'gyur bar byed pa//'jigs pa thams cad rab tu 'jigs par byed pa//dgra thams cad dang /me chu sel bar byed pa sems can tha~Md kyi/
18b6(rgyud): dpal phun sum tshogs shing skal pa bzangs po thob par byed pa/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /nyan thos dang rang rgyal skyed par byed pa/'jigs pa
18b7(rgyud): thams cad sgeg par byed pa//rnam par 'che ba thams cad 'joms par byed pa/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gzhod pa gsungs pa/na maHsar+b+ba taH
19a1(rgyud): /gA two b+h+yaHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ra ko b+h+yaHsarba thA/oM sarba sau skA ra pa ri skA ra bi shud+d+ha d+harma to ma hA na ya pa ri bA ra swAhA/den pa 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis
19a2(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bde ba thams cad gtod cing /kun na sa rgyal ba dang ldan pa//dbang phyug go 'phang bsnyes pa ni//rang gi
19a3(rgyud): lus la sems bcug pas//ngang tshul bzang por yang dag 'byung //sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi//bcom ldan 'das ni gzigs par 'gyur//rig par gyur pa'i
19a4(rgyud): sems dang ldan//thams cad rang gi srog dang ldan//rdzu 'phrul brtul phod par gyur pa//shin tu ngo mtshar go 'phang 'thob//de ni rgyal mchog spyan sngar gnas//rang
19a5(rgyud): gzhan brtul zhugs bstan 'gyur ba//rig pa 'di yi mthu stobs kyi//rang gi rdzu 'phrul g.yul las rgyal//sa stengs pha rol gnon pa 'byung //thams cad dbang
19a6(rgyud): phyug go 'phang 'i thob//bdud kun gyi ni gtsor gyur pa//sa stengs gyur to cog kun ni//'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bral//ngan 'gro zhes ni gang bshad pa'i//
19a7(rgyud): shin tu sdug bsngal gting gnas te//ngan 'gro thams cad rnam dral nas//bde ba yi ni snod du 'gyur//dmyal ba'i ma zhes bya ba yi//shin tu blta dka' 'jigs
19b1(rgyud): rung //de tshe lhan par gsal bar gyur//stan ka'i zla ba'i cha ltar glanas//gang yang dmyal ba zhes bshad pa//shin tu blangs pa'i mun nupa la khrigs//drag shul mo chen 'bangar/
19b2(rgyud): ba bzhin//de dag thams cad dro bar 'gyur//yi dwags zhes bya'i sdug bsngal gang //shin tu mi 'ad 'jig su rung //rig pa 'di'i yi mthu stobs kyis//'di dag thams
19b3(rgyud): bral bar 'gyur//gang yang 'khor de thams cad ni//sdug bsngal gyis ni sems gdungs pa//bde ba thams cad yang dag btang //phan tshun du ni dga' gtam smra//bgegs
19b4(rgyud): chen log par 'dren pa dang //gzhan yang srog chags gyur pa gzhan//sa stengs 'byung po rang sems gnas//nges par gyur nas 'di rnams ni//gcig la gcig ni
19b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang //tshangs pa la sogs rdzu 'phrul che//rang sems mdzes par rnal mar ni//de rnams thams cad bde ba 'thob//phonya
19b6(rgyud): mngag gzhugs bka' nyan stsol//'byung po gdon dang sha za dang //thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang 'thob//sa gzhi stengs na rnam par gnas//gang yang byang chub sems
19b7(rgyud): dpa' brtan//thams cad dang ni ldan pa yi//rdzu 'phrul chen po 'khor rnams kyis//'phro la phan phyir tshig gsol pa//e ma'i kun mkhyen mtshungs pa med//thabs
20a1(rgyud): shes bsam mo lang //sa stongs/spyod ma gtogs pa la//'byung 'gyur gzhan na sa /yang //man
20a2(rgyud): yAs bde ba'i snod du ni//'dri da/ thams cad gang 'dzin mdzad//thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang du stes//sa yi stengs ni rnam par gnas//
20a3(rgyud): srid pa'i sdug bsngal slar yang med//de ltar shin tu mi bzad 'jigs//thams cad sangs rgyas sngas su 'gyur//sems can kun la phan
20a4(rgyud): dga' bas//sems ni rtse gcig byur pa yis//snyan pa yi ni tshig gis gsol//kun gyi gnyen du gyur pa yis//srings rgyas
20a5(rgyud): nyid las gzhan pa med//sems ni sman par gyur pa'ang //so so nas ni bde bar mdzad//skyes pas yang dag bstan pa ni//
20a6(rgyud): srid mya ngan ma 'das pa//de skyid bar du 'khor bar zhugs//sangs rgyas theg pa tshul gyi mchog/byang chub sems dpa' thams
20a7(rgyud): cad dong //tshangs pa la sogs 'khor rnams ni//thams cad stan las langs gyur te//gtso bo gang ni btsugs pa der //byang chub
20b1(rgyud): soms dpas yongasu bskor//tshangs sobs rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha//lhan cig yang dag par lhags te//zla med po 'phangs gsal ba 'debs//sems can kun la phan bzhed pa//
20b2(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskor bar byas//'jig rten mgon la rab btud nas//'di skad kyi ni tshig gsol te//e ma'o sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/sems can kun la sman par
20b3(rgyud): dgyes//'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yi//thabs ni chungs med bsam mi khyab//gang gis 'di ni gnas par byas//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnam par spyong //'gro la
20b4(rgyud): sman pa khyod mthong na//bde ba yong dag 'byung bar 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs zab bIs/sgra dbyings 'di skad kyi tshig bka'
20b5(rgyud): stsal pa//byang chub snyoms dpa' rdzu 'phrul che//rdzu 'phrul ldan pa khyed mi 'jigs//rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis mchog gis ni//bas mo gyis mi khyab 'di dag gsungs//
20b6(rgyud): de 'dra'i chos ni brtan pa ni//sdug bsngal gang gis slar yang ni//'khor bar de ltar 'ching 'gyur ba//bstan par 'gyur bas 'byung mi 'gyur//rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis
20b7(rgyud): mchog gis ni//theg pa chen po yang dag gsungs//lam ni yang dag sdus nas ni//thams cad sdug bsngal las rab grol//de ni mchog gi de nyi zhi//sangs rgyas
21a1(rgyud): rnams kyi thog par brjod//theg pa dam pa 'di bzung nas//sangs rgyas nges par gdon mi za//'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun dang ni//de bzhin gang
21a2(rgyud): yang ma byon pa//mgon po da ltar bzhugs pa rnams//'gro la phan pa'i tshul nyid las//de dag thams cad yang dgra gzung //sdug bsngal de ba 'thob par 'gyur//
21a3(rgyud): de phyir rnam pa thams cad kyi//'di lta bu yi dam chos bstan//gtso bo 'di ni bsten 'gyur na//sdug bsngal rnams ni sel bar byed//gang yang byang chub sems dpa'
21a4(rgyud): gzhan//tshangs pa la sogs rdzu 'phrul che//sems can phan par zhugs pa yi//spyan sngar snyan pa'i tshig 'di gsol//mgon po khyod kyis ci zhig gsungs//bdag
21a5(rgyud): gi yid kyang rten gzhan med//khyod nyid skyabasu gyur pa las//mchog gzhan zhig ni yo ma yin//kun gyi dbang phyug go 'phangs bsnyes//rang gi rdzu 'phrul snyems/
21a6(rgyud): tshul gyur//'jigs pa kun dang rnam par bral//sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par spangs//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la//rdzu 'phrul chen po gus par ldan
21a7(rgyud): theg pa chen por yang dag gnas//byang chub mdzad pa la sogs 'thad ces pa'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a
21b1(rgyud): /de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas gsol ba btab pa/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po bdag cag la thugs brtse ba bskyed de/sems can thams cad dbang
21b2(rgyud): phyug gi go 'phang thob par byed pa/nad thams cad gso sbyong mdzad pa/dpal thams cad dang ldan pa/dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang /bgogs thams cad 'joms par byed pa/
21b3(rgyud): dgra thams cad dang /nye bar 'tshe ba dang /chom rkun dang /mi rgod dang /rgyal po'i gnod pa dang /seng ge dang /stag la sogs pa dang /rims dang /skran dang /mtshan par rdol
21b4(rgyud): ba dang /sdig sbrul gyi gnod pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa dang /gang gis khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos nyid mthong bas/sems can thams cad kyis dbang phyug gi
21b5(rgyud): go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol//de skad ces gsol bcom ldan 'das//shAkya'i mgon po rdzu 'phrul che//rdo rje byung ba che ba'i bdag/snyan pa'i tshig gis bka' stsal
21b6(rgyud): pa//sa stangs kyi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/bshad par bya phyir bu khyod nyo na//skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang //byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba ni//khyod la yang dag
21b7(rgyud): bshad par bya//phan pa'i sems kyis tshur la nyon//khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ni//'di dag thams cad ma gsungs pa//ngan pas sems ni labrigs pa la//bu khyod kyi ni
22a1(rgyud): skyon mi bya//re shig slob dpon rab tu bshad//bu khyod mnyan par gzhag pas nyon//de ni kun tu rab gnas 'gyur//pad+ma mang cung zad bdag gos bshad//
22a2(rgyud): tshul khrims phun tshogs snying rjer ldan//bzod dang brtson ldan legs par gnas//gtsang zhing cho ga phun sum tshobs//bla ma la yang smod mi byed//bdag nyid ji bzhin
22a3(rgyud): gzhan phan lta//sbyin la dga' zhing ched du brtson//bden pa'i tshig dang yang dag ldan//gtong bod la dga' mnyes pashin pa//lus kun yon tan phun sum tshogs//
22a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyan thos rgyal sras rnams//rtag tu mchod par gyur pa dang //bla ma le gus nga rgyal med//'gro la gcig du phan zhing dag/blo gros zab mo dang yang ldan//
22a5(rgyud): dus dang dus min shes dang ldan//dbang po don gyi cha rig pa//rtag tu sems can phan par dga'//gsang spags mnyes par shin tu brtson//dkyil 'khor 'di ru rab
22a6(rgyud): tu bsngags//rdzu 'phrul chen po lha rnams dang //sangs rgyas nyan thos chos rnams dang //skyob pa byang chub sems dpa'i yang //cha shas rigs nas rtag par
22a7(rgyud): yang //zab mo'i don ni rab tu bstan//ser sna yang ni yod ma yin//khro bo gang yang brtse bar spro//bsdu ba bzhi'i ngang tshul shes//pha rol phyin pa drug des
22b1(rgyud): rgyun/byang chung sems dpa'i go cha dgos//sgyu ma lta bu'i go 'bang gnas//nyan thos rnams kyis rjo nan bshad//bden pa bzhin skom byed pa//stabs pas /
22b2(rgyud): skyengs pa//byeng chub sems pa'i//byung chub sems dpa' gro ldan gyiste//'di ni yid kyis spri ma byed pa//bsam pa'i ye shes byur byed/
22b3(rgyud): theg pa chen po las byung ba//bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam bzhi dang //pha rol phyin nyid drug tu 'dod//bsam mi khyab pa'i 'bras rtsol ba//shes rab can de sgom par byed//
22b4(rgyud): ljang ku dkar dang ser ba dang //mdor na nag por gyur kyang rung //ring dang thung yang mdangs bzang ba//phyag gis dbus mor sleb pa nyid//rtag par rgyun tu zhal ring zhing
22b5(rgyud): mgo bo mnyam par rnam par rgyas//smin mtshams ma chang shangs mtho bu//rkang pa'i long bu cung zad dmar//yon tan thams cad yang dag brgya ni//sdig pa'i rgyum
22b6(rgyud): rnam par sbyong //chos rnams thams cad mchod par bya//de nyid kyang ni ston par byed//dkyil 'khor rnams kyi tshe shes pa//sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs kyang //
22b7(rgyud): rjes gnang dang ni dbang bskur 'thob//gang zhig yang dag ye shes 'gyur//bla ma la gus lha dang ni//sngags dang phyag rgya bsdus dang ldan//gsang sngags rgyal po'i gas
23a1(rgyud): sngags shes//sems can mnyes shing brtsa ba smras//bzlas dang sbyin sreg de nyid shes//zhi dang rgyas pa'i de nyid shes//mngon spyod dang ni dbang
23a2(rgyud): bya shes//sngags dang phyag rgya shin tu sbyong //bla ma yang dag bsten pa ying //ston pa bzhin du sems dpar byed//'byung po thams cad mchod par byed/'jig rten pa
23a3(rgyud): yang de nyid rig/sems can snyoms med phun sum tshogs//spro ba dang ni brtan par gyur//gang gi dbang phyug shes rab sngags//thams cad dbang du byed pa yin//khro/
23a4(rgyud): bopo rnams ni rtag tu bzlas//lha mnyes pa la tshad du byed//tshul khrims dang ldan phun sum tshogs//sku dang gsung las yang dag byung //brtul zhugs kyis ni yang dag
23a5(rgyud): rgyun//rnab par thams cad skyong bar byed//de ltar yon tan mdor bsdus pa'i//mtshan nyid bdag gis bstan pa yin//'di rnams yang dag yongs shes pa//
23a6(rgyud): slob dpon du ni rab tu bsngags//sngags kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga ni//gzhan du ni/'bras med bu//gsang sngags rang gis mi 'grub cing //gzhan la bstan yang grub pa med//
23a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'bras bu bcas pa min//sngags kyi sgrub thabs dag kyang med//bsrung bar bya ba kun kyang min//sbyin sreg lha yang med pa ste//'di ni sbom po med byur
23b1(rgyud): mtshan nyid 'di na rnam par spangs//de bas rnam pa thams cad kyang //slob dpon mtshan nyid sngags pa yin//de bas gsang ba'i ye shes 'di//sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bar da na
23b2(rgyud): gsungs pa rwa ni shes par bya//gzhan du na ni 'bras med 'gyur//slob dpon dang ni slob ma yis//rtag tu bag yod gyur pas kyang //rtag par rgyun tu bsrung bar bya//bdag nyid
23b3(rgyud): srob ni ji bzhin//bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang ni//sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon//de yang sra stengs gtso bo yis//bshad pa yis ni shin tu dkon//de phyir rnam pa thams
23b4(rgyud): cang kyi//yon tan kun gyis yod dag rgyan//slob dpon gyis ni rtag pa ru//gsang sngags yi ge bco lnga bzlas//'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas gyur nas//sbyin sreg yang //
23b5(rgyud): ni brtsam par bya//de ltar byas pa'i sngags shes pas//dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya//gdug pa med cing bgegs kyang med//gzhan yang 'byung tshogs la sogs med
23b6(rgyud): mthu stobs kyi ni bgegs byed pa//go 'phangs 'bras bu yod ma yin//thams cad dbang phyug go 'phongs 'thob//kun kyang bde bas yang dag rgyan//'jigs pa thams cad
23b7(rgyud): rnam par bral//the tsom med par 'gyur ba yin//gzhan du thams cad 'bras bu meng //bgegs kyi grags ni btsal na su//sngags pa'i lus ni 'phrog par byed//cho ga'i
24a1(rgyud): 'bras bu bya ba med//de ltar byas na sngags pa 'ad//dkyil 'khar mchog ni dri bar bya//sangs rgyas gcig shos blo 'phang ni//don thams cad 'gru//
24a2(rgyud): par 'gyur//dbul sa gzhi yong dag bshad//mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyis nyon//dkyil 'khor modzes mchog rmad du byung //'di ni gang du dri ba ni//chu klung mchi
24a3(rgyud): bran yang dag bshad//ri bo me tog 'bras bus brgyan//bskyed mos tshal du'ang bshad pa ste//spu sdug rma byas rnam par brgyan//kun dga' ra ba khang bzang dga'o//
24a4(rgyud): phyugs lhas bres dang bzhi mdo dang //gzhan yang phyi rol ga do zhig tu//gtsug lag khang dang ri sul dang //khang pa brtsegs dang khang pa dang //mtshan rnams gcig
24a5(rgyud): lo ji bzhin du//chu klung kun dga' ra ba dang //de yi khong gseg khyad par du'o//gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o//gang du yid la 'dod par bya//de la sogs pa'i/
24a6(rgyud): gnas rnams las//gang yang rung ba'i gnas gzung ste//lha ni skyon yang drang byas nas//yang dang yang du mchod par bya//yid gnyis kyi ni gshegasu gsol//
24a7(rgyud): phyogs ni rab tu bcings par bya//rang nyid go cha bgos nas gnas//lus la gautsug tor yang dag brgyan//lag tu rdo rje thogs nas ni//lha ni yid kyis byon par bas//
24b1(rgyud): gasman du/sgyu m+sa dan // ga nog//na na da//phyu smra no// dang //
24b2(rgyud): naH// tu ba \u0f7f/ gags ma 'dzug // che da chen pazhin du gyi// ra dge nga pal so//
24b3(rgyud): pa gyis// // p+na smras / na//khyod por n-i ra mdang //nga mi sa
24b4(rgyud): dal// ldan masmi na ma sad // dang mi ga'i grub zabyung / / ni//yid ni hU~M ba byung ba y-i//de dag dang gzhan ni bskung bya
24b5(rgyud): /dmig 'ongs gru 'a /shes na// / me ma sbyi
25a1(rgyud): tu ni//gtsab lnga ni rab tu gsungs//de ru cha gnyisu bgos nas//khru tshang gang ni phyi rol yin//cha gcig yang dag bshad pa ni//dbus chu
25a2(rgyud): yin par rab tu brtag/khru tshad gang du gan sde pa der//dbusu sangs rgyas bstan pa yi//gnyis pa rgyal ba'i sras po ste//mdo ru bsdus nas bstan pa yin//gnyis
25a3(rgyud): pa'i phyi rol gnas pa'i tshe//der yang de bzhin rab tu brtag/khru tshad gang du mdor bsdus na//cha ni thams cad rab tu brtag/sgo bzhi rta babs dang bcas pa//bum//
25a4(rgyud): pa yau ni brgyan gyis brgyan//sa bzhi thams cad 'bar ba ltar//sgo dang mtshamasu rdo rje ste//mtshams rnamasu ni gtso bo ru//bum pa thams cad nges par gnas//
25a5(rgyud): rdo rje rta babs bcings pa dang //zhags pa bcings pas rnam par brgyan//'di dag thams cad kun byas nas//dbusu pad ma 'dab brgyad bcas//de yi snying po me/
25a6(rgyud): par ni//de la bum pa yang dag gnas//bum pa yi ni stong gi snod //pad ma dkar po gnas pa der//de la zhugs pa 'gro ba'i mgon//gtso bo bstan pa'i don mdzad
25a7(rgyud): pa/skyob pa shAkya'i mgon po yi//lhung bzed phyag rgya rtag tu bri//de nas de yis kun tu khyab//dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa byung //'di ltar ser mo bcu drug
25b1(rgyud): ni//skyob pa de yis dkyil 'jor yin//de yis thams cad rab tu bshad//lhag ma snam du g.yas bskor du//rlung gi phyogs la bton nus ni//skyob pa 'jog rten dbang
25b2(rgyud): druphyug bzhugs//pad ma'i steng du rdo rje ni//kha dog dkar po gzi brjid che//byams pa yi ni go cha bgros//byams pa'i bdag nyid las byung ba'i//dbang ldan phyogs son phyag
25b3(rgyud): mtshan ni//de ni spyi blugs phyag rgya ste//ngo mtshar brtul phod bsam mi khyab//kun tu bzang po rtag tu bri//me ru mtshon nas bzhugs pa ni//gtso bo yid bzhin nor bu bsnams//
25b4(rgyud): ye shes rgya mtsho yongasu gang //zab mo'i don rnam par bskams//dbang po phyogs la btsun nas ni//ye shes ut+pa bsnams pa bzhugs//gshin rje'i gran su nyer mchis pa//
25b5(rgyud): kun gyi dgra yi gshed du 'byung //gnas der bzhugs pa'i mgon po ni//rdo rje rtse mo'i rigasu 'byung //bden bral phyogasu brten pas ni//rlung sogs de yi dbus bzhugs//ye/
25b6(rgyud): shes ral gri go cha bgos//khro bo'i rgyal po stobs tshan bzhugs//khro ba grangs med pa yi mgon//kun tu 'khor gyis yongasu bskor//dkyil 'khor yon tan rgya mtsho ni//kun
25b7(rgyud): nas gsal bar gyur pa yin//rlung gi phyogs la rten nas ni//rgyal ba kun bdag las byung bzhugs//thams cad ye shes nye bar mtshon//'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu
26a1(rgyud): rdzogs//chu bdab phyogasu rten nasu//rdo rje phyag rgya shin tu sbyor//pad ma dmar ba'i steng na bzhugs//mdzes pas dus zad lta bung bzhugs//nub//
26a2(rgyud): kyi phyogs la rten nas//gang yang sa bcu'o gnas dbang phyug/de yong ji bzhin pa kon nas bzhag/rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan mas mtshan//de la 'og gi char gnas dang //
26a3(rgyud): steng gi phyogs kyi cha nyid du//bdag nyid chen po skyon bral ba//de dag kun la dpa' bo bzhugs//dbu su gcig pu bzhugs par 'gyur//so sor byang chub la rten nas//shA
26a4(rgyud): ri'i bu ni bdag nyid che//de nas ye shes na mkho' mkhyen//rdzu 'phrul phul ni mchog du gyur//mo'u 'gal ya nyid dang ni//'odra srung bdag nyid chen po ni//rgyal
26a5(rgyud): mchog de nas sa steng su//rta thul dang ni ba lang bdag/drag shul dbang tshan tshangs bu can//b+ha ra dA tsa nyid dang ni//kun dga' bo ni dga' zhes bshad//sgra gcan 'dzin
26a6(rgyud): yang rim ji bzhin//'di ru ji bzhin bkod nas bzhag/lhung bzed chu skyes rnam par brgyan//phyag ni rdo rje sras pa kun//dpung bzang la sogs de bzhin kun//phyag
26a7(rgyud): na rdo rje nye bar ni//de rnams je bzhin bkod nas bzhag/dam chos sras por bshad pa ni//gang yang 'jam dpal yi sogs gzhan//'jam pa'i dbyings dang
26b1(rgyud): bar ni//de dang thams cad bzhag par bya//gang yang khro bo yang dag bshang//phyag na rdo rje'i rigs las byung //lho yi phyogasu dan+d+hanA nasu//'di ni rim pa bzhin du bzhag/rdo rje dgra sta/
26b2(rgyud): yang dag ldan//rdo rje tho ba de bzhin no//shin tu drag shul yang dag bshad//'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od kyis 'khrigs//khro bor yang dag bshad pa ni//rta mgrin shin tu mthong ba/
26b3(rgyud): gnas//khre gnyer can dang yang dag rol//sgrol mar brags pa'ang rnyed par dka'//rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan//brtson pas der yang bri bar bya//sbrul ma khro gnyer can
26b4(rgyud): dag bri//rig ma bcom ldan ma de bzhin//mA me kI dang lcag sgrog bshad//na mkha' sangs rgyas spyan dang ni//rma bya 'od zer can nyid dang //dug sil ri khrid lo ma can//rang
26b5(rgyud): gI phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan//bskal pa chen po de yang bri//byang gi phyogs la rten nas su//shin tu rdzu 'phrul che ba bzhugs//phyag rgya gang tshe gzugs can ma//sku la rgyan
26b6(rgyud): gyis rnam par brgyan//po ny+dza bo mo de bzhin du//mngagra gzhug pho mo shin tu rtsub//rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan//nub kyi phyogasu bri bar bya//sa yi dkyil 'khor zhes
26b7(rgyud): bshad pa//rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las 'khrungs lha//'jig rten skyong ba la sogs bri//sa stongs dam tshigs gnas pa na//lha yi rgyal po lho min tshe//tshangs pa khyab 'ju
27a1(rgyud): dbang phyug na//rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan mar bcas//shAr gyi phyod so la brten nas bri//gang yang drang srong ThA shad pa ni//sna tshogs pashes gnyan//
27a2(rgyud): 'gro skyong dang //ngan spong gshin rje ma dang mtshungs//gzhan yang shin tu mthong ba dka'//rig byed po den pa yang dag ldan//de ni byang gi phyogasu bri//nyi ma zla ba chu bdag dang //
27a3(rgyud): me yong shin tu mthong bar dka'//gnod sbyin dbang po rtag tu ni//lto yi phyogs char bri bar bya//gang yang ma mor yang dag bshad//sa stengs shin tu drag pa ni//rang
27a4(rgyud): gi mchod pa'i phyag dang ldan//de yang nub kyi phyogasu bri//gang yang sring mor bshad pa ni//sna tshogs gzugs can 'phrul mo che//sems can phan pa shin tu bcom/
27a5(rgyud): de yang de'i phyogs brten bzhugs//sher gyi sgro na nag po bzhugs//rdzu 'phrul chenamo sbyang zhing srung //dga' byang byang gi sgo srung zhing //de bzhin lho na ngan spong //nub
27a6(rgyud): sgor yang dag bshad pa ni//bgegs chen rigs lngas yang dag byung //rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar bcas//rdzu 'phrul chen po srung zhing bzhugs//bu gcig/
27a7(rgyud): 'dor na 'di dag ni//shin tu rgyas par bstan pa yin//sangs rgyas kun nor thams cad pa//sa stengs na ni gzhan ma mthong //rtag tu be ga yod par gyur pa/
27b1(rgyud): byadag nyid srog ni de bzhin pa//de ltar mdzes pa'i rang bzhin srung //sangs rgyu sna thams cad kyis ni srung //byis pa so so'i skyo ba la//khyod kyis yod rgyas par mi bya/
27b2(rgyud): rmongs pa de ni rang brlag cing //gzhan yang brlag par byed par 'gyur//bdag gis dam chos bshad pa 'di//sdug bsngal thams cad gal bor byed//de ni rlag par byed pa ni/
27b3(rgyud): mi shes bsgrings pas 'byung bar 'gyur//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i//mchog 'di dad pa med pa dang //sdig can 'jigs shring rtsub pa yaM//drag shu
27b4(rgyud): mched par 'gyur ba la//bus yis cung zad mi sbyin par//khyod la rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs//rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yis//shin tu gsang par/
27b5(rgyud): yang dag gsungs//khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ni//'di dag thams cad bshad mi bya//rtag tu bag yod par gyur pas//rgyal ba'i bstan pa bsrung bar bya//
27b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba la ni//'di ni ston cing skyer ba na//skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang //byang chub sems dpa' bslu bar bgyi//sdug bsngal kun gyi
27b7(rgyud): sngar gyur pa//sdig pa can du nges par 'gro//sdig chen de yi gsang sngags kyi//dngos grub nges par 'byung mi 'gyur//bstan pa'i don ni mdzad pa yas//gtso
28a1(rgyud): bor dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin//dkyil 'khor ma mthang ston byed kyi//mag po rdo rjes 'joms par byed//de yis bsang sngags mi 'grub cing //
28a2(rgyud): rnams rnams kyis brlab par 'gyur//sngags kyi sgrub pa 'bras bu med//de phyir sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i//gsung 'dri bu khyod tshur nyon la//rna thos tsam du'ang mi
28a3(rgyud): sbyin te//dam tshig rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsu ngas//sangs rgyas kyi gsungs dam tshig ni//gang shig shin tu mnga' byed na//'jig rten gsum bzhugs rdzogs
28a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas//dbang phyug bslus par gyur pa yin//de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag ngo mtshar tu gyur nas mig bltas te//shin tu ngo mtshar yid kyis//
28a5(rgyud): 'di skad kyi ni tshig gsol to//e ma'o sangs rgyas bsam du med//thugs rje'i dbang gis bsgyur ba yin//rgyu dang mi rgyu mi shes pa//dam chos 'di ni rab tu gsungs
28a6(rgyud): de rnams kyi ni den 'gro bcad//sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig par mdzad//gang gi lag na gnas pa de//bas mi mi khyab par sangs rgyas gsungs//bgegs da
28a7(rgyud): log pa 'dren pa dang //sdig cin shin tu drag pa dang //sngags pas dkyil 'khor mthong ba yis//de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur//'di kun gang du gnas
28b1(rgyud): pano//dam pa'i chos ni gnas med//sgrib pa 'di dag thams cad dang //de cha 'jigs pa las blol 'gyur//thams cad dbang phyug gi 'phang thab//sems can thams
28b2(rgyud): cad dbang byed pa//the tshom med par rab tu 'gyur//sems can sa 'og glanas pa dang //ji srid gdug pa'i sems can rnams//sa la gnas pa'i bar du ni//de ku
28b3(rgyud): dbang du byas nas ni//mngag gzhug dag ni nyan par gnas//sa gzhi mthil gyi lha la sogs//lha 'am lto 'phye che 'dis ni//bcung zad gang du gnas pa der//
28b4(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po srung bar byed//thams cad bka' bsgro rab tu byed//lha gang gnod sbyin mi yi bdag/sa gzhi steng gi rgyal po 'od re//ci bgyi zhes ni smra bar gnas//bgegs
28b5(rgyud): kyis nye bar 'tshe ba dang //nad kyis sdug bsngal gzir bar byed//rgyal po gdug pas spangs par byed//thams cad 'phrog par byed pa dang //me mo gdug pas 'debs
28b6(rgyud): par byed//seng ge skags dang chu de bzhin//sa gzhi'i snying 'dir mkha' gro me//srin po lto 'bye 'jigs pa dang //yul 'khor du na mu ges g.yogs//nad rnams
28b7(rgyud): kun gyis 'jigs par byed//rims dang glo nang dbugs mi bde//lhog pa dang ni mtshan par rdul//mgo dang mig gzug gzer dang //lto bar zug gzir 'debs pa dang /
29a1(rgyud): nad rnams kun gyis 'debs pa dang //nye bar 'tsho bar kun gyis gdungs//yun du bkren par gyur pa dang //'thab dang 'thab mo cod pa dang //rgyal ba
29a2(rgyud): chom rkun pho nya sogs//tha snyad du ni gyur pa na'ang //srung tshan 'di ni zung gcig par//rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu gsungs//gnod sbyin la sogs lha yi bdag/'byung /
29a3(rgyud): po gnode sbyin mi 'am ci//blang yangs stengs gnas pa yi//dam tshig la ni gnas pa kun//dam tshig dgur ni gsungs pa las//de rnams thams cad mi 'da'o//rje
29a4(rgyud): sangs rkang gnyis mchog gis ni//gsungs pa'i bsam mi khyab pa kun//bsam mi khyab pa'i las gsungs pa//'bras bu 'ang bsam mi khyab pa 'byung //de nas btso
29a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'khor de dag la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/legaso leg so//bdud thams cad 'da' bar mi bya ba'i sems can thams cad kyis bsam pa yongasu rdzogs
29a6(rgyud): par byed pa'i tshig 'di shin tu ngo mtshar to//de na sra bcom ldan shAkya thub/yid ni mgu bar gyur pa yis//snyan pa yi ni tshig gsungs pa//rdo rje'i bdag ni chen po bya
29a7(rgyud): legs dpa' bo ye shes che//slang yang rdo rje 'dzin khyed legs//bsam mi khyab pa'i las sna tshogs//rgyal sras khyed la bshad par bya//rgyal mchog gtso bo sa
29b1(rgyud): gsungs pa yi//bsam mod ye shes brtul phod pa//gad du sa nges pa 'grub pa yi//de dag thams cad bshad par bya//dkyil 'khor du ni 'jug pa dang //mchod pa'i las dang
29b2(rgyud): gtor ma dang //dri dang me tog la sogs dge/bshad kyis bu khyod tshur la nyen//gang gis yang dag bsam mi khyab//bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob//gang gis sangs rgyas rang bzhi/
29b3(rgyud): gnas//phyogs bzhi ru ni khor yug tu//sku ni sna tshogs mnga' ba yin//byang chub sems dpas mdun bdar te//ji snyed na mkha' mthas gtugs pa//de snyed sems kyi spyong
29b4(rgyud): yul yin//mngon sum bzhin du yang dag blta//yon chab dbul la mdun byas te//sangs rgyas thams cad snyan gsan dbab//byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos bcas//
29b5(rgyud): gzhan yang bya ba byas pa dang //'jig rten pa yi tshe ga'i rim//mchod pa'i tshi ga rgyas pa ru//yang dag cho ga shes par bya//ji srid sku yi dkyil 'khor ni//yang ni phyir zhing bltas
29b6(rgyud): nas ni//bsam mi khyab pa'i mchog rtsol la//phyogs bcing ba ni rab tu bya//thugs rje'i thugs can gyur pa dang //bsam mi khyab pa'i 'bras rtsol ba//thams cad sems
29b7(rgyud): kyis bzhugs par ni//'jig rten mgon pos slar yang ni//de ltar sems kyis bsams nas kyang //dri dang me tog dbul bar bya//khyad par du yang gtor ma ni//chog
30a1(rgyud): bzhin du dbul bar bya//byin nas steng gi sangs rgyas rnams//thugs rjor gyur pa'i thugs mnga' ba//bltas nas 'khor ba'i slo bsngal ni//gaN br-i
30a2(rgyud): ru blta bar bya//de nas lag pas me tog dang //bdug pa blangs nas snying khar bzhud//de la gsol ba gdab par bya//thugs rje'i ro gcig du gyur pa//'gro ba phan par mdzad
30a3(rgyud): pa yi//ji snyed rdzogs sangs rgyas bzhugs pa//de snyed bdag gis 'dod pa yis//'bras bu yang dag thob par mdzod//de ltar phyogs rnams thams cad du//rgyal ba'i/
30a4(rgyud): gan su gsol ba gdab//de nas yang dag bsam byas pa'i//rje su rgyal ba'i sras po yang //yon chab la sogs cho ga yi//dri dang me tog sog slar yang //mngon sum
30a5(rgyud): bzhin du skyob pa ni//mnyam gzhag gyur pas mchod par bya//rang gi skur gyur thams cad ni//de bzhin rang gi mtshon char ldan//rang gi cha byad mtshan mar ldan//
30a6(rgyud): 'jigs po med par bsam par bya//'di dag thams cad mchod sbyin phyag/cad pan mgo bor gnas par bshad//bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa//skal ba
30a7(rgyud): chen po bsam par bya//de ltar dkyil 'khor mgon po ni//mchod sbyin bdag nyid bsam par bya//gtso bo bstan la sman mdzad pa//rnam pa kun tu bsam par bya//
30b1(rgyud): nas mkhas pas mar mo dang //mtshad yon zha la gas la shin tu mdzes//dri dang me tog mar mo dang //bdun pa gtor mdo bzhin du//zhal bsad lnga dbul bar bya//rgyun dnga'abru//
30b2(rgyud): de bzhin na//ras kyis mgrin pa bcings pa yi//bum pa bcu drug bzhag par bya//gdugs dang rgyal ma chen bdan dang // daglang ba bzhin pa'i mchog/dril bu'i sgra ni rab
30b3(rgyud): spyan//rol mo rin chen khyad par du//bye ba grangs ni med pa yo//mchog nyid kyang ni dbul bar bya//khyad par du yang snyan pa'i skye//dbyangs glu so dal yid 'brog dang //dung
30b4(rgyud): rol mos khyad par du//dkyil 'khor dge ba mchod par bya//de ltar cho ga bzhin mchod nas//sor me baicu yi thal sbyar te//smon lam rab tu 'phel bya'i phyir//
30b5(rgyud): mchog la sogs rab tu 'dud//de nas de byung slob ma ni//blo ldan dkyil 'khor du bos te//de cha gsum la skyabs 'gro sbyin//dkon mchog gsum la gus par ldan//
30b6(rgyud): byang chub sems ni rnam dpyad pa//ma lus par ni gzung bar bya//rtag tu bla ma la gus shing //blo gros zab mo yang dog ldan//spro chen blo gros phun sum tshogs/
30b7(rgyud): bzlas la dga' zhing tshad du byed//sngags shes tshul khrims phun sum tshogs//gtong la dga' zhing shin tu brtson//dbang po drug ni kun tu ldan//sgyu rtsal cho ga rnam par
31a1(rgyud): mkhas//spro batshe dang sems dpar ldan//byas pa shes shing byas pa bzo//pha dang ma la shin tu gus//dkon mchog gsum la shin tu nges//sangs
31a2(rgyud): rgyas nyan thos chos rnams dang //'jig rten pa rnams mchod par byed//dad pa dang ni thugags rjer ldan//nad mang dbang po ma tshang med//sems can phan par yang dag ldan/
31a3(rgyud): sdig pa'i dgra ni rab tu 'joms//log pa'i lta ba rnam par bral//yang dag lta ba yang dag brtan//ser zhing ljang ku dkar ba dang //nag par gyur kyang mdangs bzang ba//gang
31a4(rgyud): yang lus ni rab tu dngas//mgo bo shin tu rgyas bcas pa//sna ldan smin mtshams bar ma chad//mig dang rdzi ma yang dag ldan//gang yang mnyam pa nyid du rgyas//de
31a5(rgyud): bzhin mgo bo gdugs lta bu//rkeng pa rgyas shing yang dag ldan//rkeng pa shin tu gnas pa dang //de sogs yon tan yang dge ldan//de tshe bla mas brtags nas ni//lnga
31a6(rgyud): 'am brgyad ni gzung bar bya//grangs med yang dag 'dod tshad ni//de nas de la sbyin par bya//gsum la skyabs 'gro sdig pa bshegs//bdag nyid dbul ba de dag la/
31a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub ched du sbyin//byang chub sems ni ma lus pa//blo gros ldan pa'i mi yis gzung //de dag me lus yang dag bya//slar yang dam ches bshad par bya//
31b1(rgyud): bskal pa bye ba grangs med du//dal 'byor shin tu rnyed par dka'//u dum bA ra'i me tob sbyar//brgya lam nA ni ros 'ba' zhig/de bas kyang ni 'jig rten mgon//skyob pa shin tu
31b2(rgyud): rnyed par dka'//gtso bo gsang sngagaso tshul yang ni//sa steng su yang de bzhin no//shin tu sdug bsngal 'jigs pa yang //'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'di ru bu//sa stengs gsang
31b3(rgyud): sngags ma gtogs pa//skyob pa su yang ma mthong ngo //de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis//'khor ba'i skyon ni spong 'dod pas//rgas dang na dang 'jigs pa dang //'chi ba'i 'jigs
31b4(rgyud): pa brtsub bltas nas//lam mchog 'di ni bsten pa na//sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad 'gyur//gdos chad pas bcings mtha' yas dang //gzhan yang sdug bsngal ba yis chogs/
31b5(rgyud): lam mchog 'di ni bstan pa ni//gang du mi 'byung shin tu dkon//nye du mdza' bo sdug bsngal dang //grogs po gnyen dang snag gnyen 'tshams//longs spyod phun tshigs sdug
31b6(rgyud): bsngal dang //nad kyi sdug bsngal gyis gtungs dang //zas kyis 'jigs pa'i sdug bsngal dang //gang yang sa stengs 'khor gnas pas//tshul 'di bsten par gyur pas na
31b7(rgyud): 'byung ba ru ni mi 'gyuraro//bcu dang brgyad dang de nas lnga//gsum la skyabs 'gro 'am dus khrims ni//bslab pa byin te blangs par bya//sangs rgyas bstan pa shin tu dkon//sdom
32a1(rgyud): /pa yang dag blangs nas//lus can rnams kyi sgrog bzhin du//bsdams par gyur pa bsrung bar bya//dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dkon//gsang sngags/
32a2(rgyud): spyod pa las byung ba'i//dang po nyams gcig bstan par bya//yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i sku//zhi ba'i sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob//lam 'di mchog ste dpal dang ldan//bsam
32a3(rgyud): gyos mi khyab 'bras bu rtsol//mi g.yo ba ni bsten gyur nas//bla na med pa'i blo 'phe nge 'gyur//'di ni mchog gi de nyid zhi//sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par spangs//
32a4(rgyud): shin tu gus pa dang ldan pa//theg pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur//de bas khyod kyis thag chen la//slu ba med par gus par gyis//gang gis khyod ni 'gro ba na//de bzhin
32a5(rgyud): gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyung //sems can kun la phan pa'i yid//bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed//khyed ni theg pa gsum 'chang pa//tshul la gnas pa dun
32a6(rgyud): 'byung //zab mo yi ni blo gros ldan//zab mo'i don ni ston byas pa//rgyal ba'i tshul ni ston pa na//de las the tshom med pa 'byung //gdod nas zhi la gnas med pa'i
32a7(rgyud): dam pa'i chos ni de nas bshad//sems can sus thos thams cad kyang //rgyal ba'i sra su skye bar 'gyur//'di na bdag med srog kyang med//dbang phyug kyang med byed
32b1(rgyud): pa'ang med//'jig rten byed pa sems can med//skyes pa med cing ma ning mang //gang zag kyang mad gnas kyang meng//gang du tshor ba byed pa med//gtso bo yod mini khyab pa'ang mang //
32b2(rgyud): phra ba med cing gsal ba'ang med//rgyu 'am gzhan yang med pa ste//rang gi ngo bo rang bzhin mod//bdag gi 'i yi rang bzhin meng //se stangs na ni rtag pa med//thams cad sgyu ma'i
32b3(rgyud): lngas byung ltar//byed po la sogs rnam par sbyangs//'di dag thams nad stong par blta//ye shes go 'phang du ni btartag/bdag dang srog la sogs pa kun//byis pa 'ba'i
32b4(rgyud): zhig gis ni brtags//'di na bdag med sems can med//'dod med 'ba' zhig las byung ba//sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang //dri ba'i grong khyer rmi lam ltar//dngos po thams
32b5(rgyud): stong pa nyid//chu shing lta bur yang dag gnas//gzung du med cing brjed du med//dbu ba tshu bur lta bu re gnas//sgyu ma skye ba skye ba med//na mkhar lta bur stong pa nyid//nam
32b6(rgyud): lta bu dgos pa med//drug par kun tu yang dag gnas//zhi ba'i mchog gi de nyid de//rgyal ba mchag gis rtag tu gsungs//de 'dir ye shes mchog thob pa'o//de ba
32b7(rgyud): gshegs pa 'byung 'gyur//de nas sngags pas gsol 'debs pa'i//slong ma sdig dang bral byed pa//ral dri'i phyag rgyas bsrungs par bya//de yi rje su go cha bag/chag
33a1(rgyud): pas bsrungs 'a bya//slab ma lan phan 'dogs pas//sngags kyis tshim par byed pa yi//yo ba bco lnga sngags pa yis//thams cad du na rab bang /
33a2(rgyud): yang dag sngags kyi gsang gtor bya//gdong ni ras kyis bcings nasu//mgo bo sa la btud par bya//dkon mchog gsum la sems phyogs te//snying rje dang ni ldan pa'i
33a3(rgyud): sems//skyob pa thams cad mngon sum du//gyur par bsams te gzhug par bya//kun kyang dbang phyug go 'phang 'thob//'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs//ji
33a4(rgyud): bzhin 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyang //the tsom med par 'byung bar 'gyur//bla ma la ni yon phul nas//dbang bskur bar ni gsol ba gdab//gus par gyur pa'i rang srog gis//
33a5(rgyud): bla ma la ni 'dud par bya//bla ma la ni dbul ba'i yon//rang gi lus ni snyan mnan nas//bdag nyid dngos po de bul bar bya//gzhan du 'bras bu med par 'gyur//rin chen
33a6(rgyud): glang po rta dang phyugs//gzhan yang yid la gang bzhed pa//slob mi blo bdag gus pa yis//de dag thams cad dbul bar bya//de bzhin na bza' rab tu dbul//bla ma gang
33a7(rgyud): gis mnyes byas shing //bla ma la ni yon phul bas//bsam mi khyab pa'i 'bras bu gsungs//de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis//rgyal ba skyes mchog 'di mchod bya//
33b1(rgyud): rdzobs sangs rgyas de 'dir bshad//sa bcu'i gnas kyi dbang phyug dang //'jig rten skyong ba thams cad bshad//brgya byin la sogs bdud tshogs bzhin//tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag pa dang /
33b2(rgyud): klu mo dul ba'i sras po dang //bza' dang rgyu skar tshogs thams cad//phung po yang ni rdzu 'phrul che//zag pa zad pa bshad pa dang //thams cad de nyid du brjod do//dpal ldan gdul/
33b3(rgyud): dka' 'dul mdzad pa//phyag na rdo rje sa stengs 'di//dpal ldan bstan pa'i don mdzad pa//dam pa'i lam gyis gdams ngag can//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis ji bzhin sku//
33b4(rgyud): yon tan kun gcig yang dag bshad//slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung //skyon ni nam yang ma yin te//yon tan bzung bas dngos grub 'thob//skyon rnams kyis ni dngongs grub
33b5(rgyud): brlag/de yi grib ma 'gom pa ni//mchod rten bshig pa zhesu bshad//bsam mi khyab pa 'bras ster ba//'di ni sangs rgyas lta bur blta//bstan dang g.yo ba yi gas
33b6(rgyud): ba mchog ni thams cad ston byed lnga//khyed kyis slob dpon smod pa dang //rmi lam du yang smad mi bya//gang yang slob dpon smod pa de//bgegs dang log par 'dren pas
33b7(rgyud): 'dzin//sdig can sems can thig ring du//sau steng su ni spang bar bya//mnar med la sogs 'jigs rung bas//dmyal bar yang dag bstan pa dang //slob dpon la ni
34a1(rgyud): smod pa gang //de ru yang dag 'chod par 'gyur//de bas rnam pa thams cad du//sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis//bsam gyis mi khyab 'bras
34a2(rgyud): ster ba/'di ni rmang byung bus pas mchod//dbang bskur cho ga rgyas par ni//bshad par bya yis bu khyod nyon//gang du dbang bskur bar gyur na//'jig rten sangs rgyas
34a3(rgyud): lte bur blta//de ru padad+ma ma 'dab brgyad pa//khru gang ched du brjod pa yin//nang na gnas pa'i rdo rje ni//'od zer gyis ni rnam par brgyan//bum pa brgyad ni yongs rdzogs
34a4(rgyud): par//gtsang ma'i chu yis rab tu bkang //mgrin pa ras yug bzang pos bcings//lo 'dab bzang pos kha rgyan byas//khro bo'i rgyal pos bsngags nas ni//sman/
34a5(rgyud): dang rin chen kun gyis bkang //gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan dang //rol mo'i sgra sogs yid 'phrog pa//ston cing rgya che ba yi tshogs//rab bsngags kun tu mingan
34a6(rgyud): dga' bas//sngags pas de tshe dab de bskur te//skyob pa mngon gsum bzhin du bya//dbang bskur byas ma thag tu ni//dpal ldan byang chub rtogs phyi re sbyin//
34a7(rgyud): de nas bzung ste bu khyod 'di//sa stengs sangs rgyas sras po ni//brtan dang g.yo bas mchod pa ru//byang chub sems dpes gzung bar bya//doni mi
34b1(rgyud): mthong ngar gyur pa sdu//byang chub sems dpar brjod pa yin//bdud dang bdogs dang sbrul dang no//gzhan yang log par 'dron pa yin+da//rgyul sras byang chub sems dpa' na/
34b2(rgyud): dpyir mthong bar mi 'gyuraro//mu bsgrubs pa yang myur du 'brug/bdud rnams thams cad 'joms pas byed//dkyil 'khor 'dir ni dbang bsgyur ba//de ni nges par sang+yas
34b3(rgyud): /'dir ni sdug bsngal 'jigs rung ba'i//sdug bsgril slar yanga'i byed mi 'gyur//thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang 'job//'jigs pa thams cad rnam par song/
34b4(rgyud): yon tan kun gyis dri bzhin brgyan//slob ma la ni smon bya'i phyir//de nas sbyin sreg rab tu brtsam//theg khring dag kyang bya ba ste//de la khar na dang bcas gan sa//de yi
34b5(rgyud): dbus gnas rdo rje ni//zhi bo mchog tu rmad du byung //dri yi thab khrung 'khor yug tu//dris kyang rjes byug par bya//mo yis thab ni khru gang du//de bzhin gshegs byas
34b6(rgyud): yang dag gsungs//mi ni kun tu 'byung ba'i shing //me thab 'di ru me sbar bya//de nas mchod yin zhabs bsol bya//gsung gte ri sa steng su ni brjod//ku sha rtse mo
34b7(rgyud): dgram par bya//slar yang rtsibs bskor bar bya//de ltar 'di dgi thams cad kyi//mir dang sdeng rtsi thug pas mdzes//gang zhig yom shing 'am rnams kyis//rnam par/
35a1(rgyud): mkhas pas sbyin bsreg bya//sems ni snying rje dang ldan pa//thob ma re re brjod nas//dpal ldan sogs blugs bsreg par bya// shu ra/
35a2(rgyud): pa nyid kyang //'di dag thams cad bya sa nas//sems ni snying rje dang ldan pa//rgyal mchog thams cad rab btud nas//de nas smon lam gdab par bya//bcom ldan
35a3(rgyud): bdag gis gang bsags pa'i//bsod nams grangs med gzhal mi leng //des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa//bla med gong 'phang thob par shog/sems can bya ba grangs med
35a4(rgyud): gang //gzhan yang ngan 'gror gyur pa gang //bdag gis bsod nams mthu yis ni//thams cad bde dang ldan gyur cig/gang zhig yi dwags sdug bsngal dang //gang
