35a5(rgyud): yang ngan 'gror gyur pa rnams//bdag gis bsod nams mthu yis ni//de dag thams cad bral 'gyur shog/ji snyed sems can thams cad kyang //sdug bsngal sna tsha
35a6(rgyud): nyid dag dang //de dag thams cad zhe gyur nas//'ga' yang sdug bsngal ma gyur cig/ji snyed sems can nyes spyad las//lus dang ngag dang yid las byung //sems
35a7(rgyud): can thams cad de ma gyur//kun gying bde dang ldan gyur cig/de nas rgyal mchog kun btud nas//dri dang me tog sogs thogs te//steng dang 'og tu bltas gyur pas//
35b1(rgyud): de nas rab tu bsdu pa'i phyir//de nas slar yang brjod par bya//skyob pa thams cad mngon sum du//bdag la slar yang brtse ba'i phyir//bcom ldan sras dang bcas pa yang //rta srid
35b2(rgyud): bdag ni don grub par//bdag nyid chen po slar byon mdzod//de nas gtar ma me tog dang //dri dang bcas pa'i rdul tshon la//sngags pa dngos grub mchog 'dod pas//lag pa
35b3(rgyud): reg par mi bya'o//de nas rang gis byin rlabs te//sa la 'dug nas gos phud pas//'bad par gyur pas bsdus nas ni//chu bo la ni bskur bar bya//de ltar rab tu 'bad pas kyang //
35b4(rgyud): nyi ma gnyis pa shar ba la//de tshe dngos grub kun byed pa'i//phyag rgya shrI rab can gyis bstan//gang zhig bcing sa pa tsam gyis ni//de la lhon nye bar 'gyur//sa stengs shin tu
35b5(rgyud): sdug bsngal gnas//sems can thams cad 'dul byed pa//'jig pa brtan dang g.yo ba yi//'jig rten kun gyis mi mthong //sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs//
35b6(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa yang dag ldan//phyag rgya rtag tu 'grub par ni//the tsom med par 'byung bar 'gyur//ralaM gri yi ni phyag rgya bshad//de nas de yi 'og tu ni//go cha ba shwad
35b7(rgyud): par bya yis nyon//mgo bor yang ni tho bar bcas//spyi bor rdo ba dag dang ldan//bkar btags phyag rgya snying khar ste//phyogs bcings par ni rab tu bya//de bzhin mar me dri phya/
36a1(rgyud): h+ya/gtor ma'i phyag rgya bdug pa yang //me tog zhal zas phyag rgya dang //spyan drangs pa ni nyid dag dang //de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal sras dang //nyan thos dang //
36a2(rgyud): yang po nya sogs//'jig rten pa ni thams cad dang //de bzhin phra srong tshogs rnams dang //sring ma yang dag bshad pa dang //ma mo yang ni 'dun nyid dang //de dag rnams ni ma lus pa//sa
36a3(rgyud): skyengs spyan rgyas par nyon//chem ngam skad cig mi ga yo bar//dran pa'i don du tshur nyin//gang zhig brjod pa nam gyis pa//bgegs dang log par 'dren pa 'joms//mdzubs
36a4(rgyud): mo dang ni gung mo dag/blo dang ldan pas drang por brkyang //srin lag dang ni mthe chung nyid//mthe bo yis ni brtan par mnan//lag pa ga yas pas de ltar bya//ral gri
36a5(rgyud): yang dag ldan bcas te//ral gri shubs su btsugs pa las//slar yang kun nas 'byung bar bya//'bar ba lta bur 'jigs pa ni//phyogs
36a6(rgyud): kun tu ni bskor bar bya//'di ni dpal ldan ral gri 'chang //ye shes ral gri rgyal ba'i sras//gang zhig mi shes las byung ba//ye shes rang bzhin ral gros
36a7(rgyud): gcod/dbyer rnam pa thams cad du//bgegs kyis rgyal po kun 'joms la//rgyun tu nyin dus gsum du//phyag rgya rab tu bcing bar bya//ga don pa'i bu chu dang por bcid/
36b1(rgyud): mdzub mo mtho bo nang du ni//bcug pa bsdig mdzub btsums yin te//bcug pa de ni zhugs par brjod//dpal ldan phyag rgya 'di 'chung ba//zhags pa'i phyag rgya zhe skya grags/
36b2(rgyud): sa bcu gnas kyi dbang phyug rnams//kun nas rab tu 'gugs 'gyur na//gdugs pa'i sems can dmyal ba ltar//gang las ci yi phyir mi lta//gung mo'i sor mo yang dag sbyar
36b3(rgyud): phan tshun du ni rtse sprad//mdzub mo dang ni ming med dag/kun nas lag pa'i nang du bcug/mthe bong de lo la bstan mnan//mthe'u chung drang por bzhag pa ni//rdzogs sangs rkang
36b4(rgyud): gnyis mchog gos ni//'di ni go cha'i phyag rgyar gsungs//ye shes ral bri snying kha dang //yan lag lnga la'ang rnam par dgod//de tshe phyag rgyas go cha ba'o//phyag rgya sems
36b5(rgyud): can sdom pa yin//de ltar rab tu 'bad par bya//slob ma sdig dang bral byed pa//phun sum tshogs kun 'grub bya'i phyir//de tshe dbang bskor sbyin par bya//bzlas pa'i tshe na gzha
36b6(rgyud): rnams//cho ga bzhin du bsrung bar bya//bgegs kyi rnam pa rnams dang ni//gzhan yang dgra po byung ba la//bdag dang gzhan gnyis pa sgrub bya'i phyir//'di ni rtag tu sbyar bar
36b7(rgyud): byed/lag pa phan tshun bzung na su//lag pa gnyis ni brtan por bya//mdzub mo gnyis ni gyen du sbreng //mgo bo'i phyag rgya zhesu bsha //log pa gnyis kyi bya ba ni//so
37a1(rgyud): sal du chur btsong bar bya//gsong ba pa yi log pa yi//g.yon pa'i mtho bdun sa bzung ste//byA yas pa'i mtho du sbyin du snyeng //rdo rje lta bur gzhan pa //
37a2(rgyud): min chen po lbu bru 'bar//log pa rdo rje lta bur gnas//skyugs pa gang la khros gyur pa//lha dang klu mo khor dang ni//gnod sbyin lto 'phye srin po dang //grul bum dang ni lus srul
37a3(rgyud): po//lha min yi dwags mi 'am ci//gang yang gegs ni byed pa gzhan//glang po rta dang shing rta dang //gang yang rgya mtsho snyoms pa dang //gang yang rgyal po gdug pa dang //
37a4(rgyud): 'dir ni bstan la gnang byed pa//gdug pa'i sems can de rnams ni//gdul ba'i phyir dang badrug pa'i phyir//de bzhin dngos grub myur ba'i phyir//phyag rgya chen po rab tu sbyar//
37a5(rgyud): sngags dang lhan cig dgod par bya//bdag nyid las byung lha rnams kyi//dkyil 'khor la ni rab tu gnas//rgyu dang 'bras bu sbyar bar bya//g.yas pa'i phyag rgya khu tshur bcing //
37a6(rgyud): byeng ma gyen du rnam par spring //rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbang phyug gis//'di ni spyi gtsug dag tu gsungs//ldeg pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcad//mdzub mo gung mo sbed nas
37a7(rgyud): naM//de ni g.yon pa rtag tu bcing //'di ni bka' brtags phyag rgyar grags//lag pa gnyis kyi khu chur ni//bcings nas phan tshun btsir bar bya//gcig tu ban//
37b1(rgyud): ra bcug pan//rnga blta bur yang dag bshad//g.yas pa/ nu radam du yang //mkhas pas ste khar bzhag par bya//rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yos//slo
37b2(rgyud): phyag rgya zhesu bshad //gung mo dang ni mdzub mi nyid//mthe bong so sor brkyang nas//gnyis kA'ang 'di ltar gnas byas nas//phyogs bcur yongasu spro bar bya//'dis na
37b3(rgyud): phyogs bcur bcings byas nas//mkhas pas sngags kyis bzlas pa bya//lag pa gnyis ni mthil sbyar nus//grung mo nang du smyung bar bya//rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam
37b4(rgyud): yis//dri yi phyag rgya zhes bshad//lag pa phyi rol bsgril nas ni//man bong gung mo gyen du sbyang /mthe'u chung ni skyong nas bzhig/rgyal dang rgyal sras rnams kyis kyang //
37b5(rgyud): mar ma'i phyug rkyenasuM bshad//sbyar yang lag pa phyir bkrol nas//phyin ci lo skyes gung mo dang //mdzu mi mAthe bong sum bzhin//tshogs pa shin tu gan par bya//
37b6(rgyud): dang lhan cig bcas pa ni//gtor ma'i phyag d+hA zhesu brjing //lag pa'i shubs kyi phyog rgya ni//shubs lta bur ni rab tu mdzes//bdug spyos phyag rgya mdor sngas no//rgyal po
37b7(rgyud): skyes bu mchog gis gsungs//gung mo ming meng sbyar bkug nas//mthe bong steng na rnam par gnas//de ltar g.yon pa yang byas na//me tog phyag rgya zhesu brjod//log pa
38a1(rgyud): 'og tu thal sbyar nas//bud mo dang ni srin lag dang //mdzub mo yang ni bkug nas//mthe'u chung phyi rol nyid du gnas//mthe bong der ni mngon phyogs pa
38a2(rgyud): zhal zas kyis ni phyag rgyar brjod//par+yaM kA shA ni sngags shes pas//lag pa dag ni lhung bzed sbyar//mthe bong dag ni bkug byas nas//blo ldan de yi rtse bar sbyar//gas /
38a3(rgyud): sngags shes pas spyan drangs bya//skyob pa shAkya seng ge yi//dpa' bo chos gos ngur smrig banab so//gtso bo bstan pa'i don mdzad pa//mtha' yas 'jig rten rab 'byam
38a4(rgyud): khams//shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yang //shes rab can gyis rtag bsams na//brnag pa'i 'bras bu thog par 'gyur//lag pa gnyis ni thal sbyar nas//mkhas/
38a5(rgyud): pas mdzub mo bkug na su//rtse mor the bong bzhag pa ni//rgyal sras rtag tu dgug par byed//lag pa pad ma ltar byas nas//sor mo gung mo ming med tsam//'di rnams/
38a6(rgyud): thams cad 'gugs par byed//nyan thos rnams dang sa stengs bzhugs//gang yang pho nya ma sogs bshad//pho nya yang ni rdzu 'phrul che//de rnams phyag rgya bshad pa ni//
38a7(rgyud): sa stengs lcags kyus 'gugs par byed//g.yas pa khu tshur dam por bcing //brtan por rab tu ldan byas te//mdzub mi shes rab can gyis brkyong //tshigs pa gsum
38b1(rgyud): pa brtag par bya//lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa yi//la d+h+r-i ts+tsha ma nAHni bzung gA yis//sa stongs pan ma la sobs//brtan par gyur pas dgun par bya//lag pa
38b2(rgyud): phyi rol dkyi lon su//gung maM gyen du rnam par sbreng //'dzub mo drang por byas nas ni//de dang rab tu spyad par bya//nang gi cha ru dgug nasuM//mthe bong mo mthun pa ru
38b3(rgyud): bzhag/'jig rten pa yi phyag rgya ste//dgug pa ru ni rab tu grags//phyag rgya 'di dag nyid la yang //po yon pa rab tu phral ba yi//g.yas pa drang srong thams cad dang /
38b4(rgyud): dngul zhugs gnas pa dbug pa yin//lag pa g.yon pa drang byas nas//mkhas pas bud mo dgug par bya//'dzub mo sor mo yang bkug nas//dpal ldan phyag
38b5(rgyud): rgyu 'do 'chang ba//sring mo rnams kyi rab tu grags//srang mi dngos grub mdzad pa can//dam par gyur pa spyan drang byas//g.yas pa drang por brkyang nA su//sor mo
38b6(rgyud): su man+ti drang bar brkyang //de ru 'dzub mo dgug pa yi//rtse ma mthe bos reg par bya//phyag rgya 'di yis dIsa~M pA ru//ma mo bdun nyid dgug por byed//rdzogs sa
38b7(rgyud): rkang gnyis dam pa yos//phyag rgya 'di ni ying dag gsungs//rtag tu bad yong por gyur pas//sa gzhi dkyil 'khor bsrung bar bya//phyag rgya 'do na 'chang
39a1(rgyud): dkon//rgyal ba mchog gis rab tu gsungs//phyag rgya 'di de la rten no//bsam gyis mi khyab 'bras bu 'thob//de bas rnam pa thams cad du//
39a2(rgyud): bsam mi khyab pa'i 'bras 'dod cing //dngos grub 'dod par gyur pa yis//sngags pas rtag tu bzung bas na//bgegs dang log par 'dren pa dang //klu dang srin po
39a3(rgyud): gdugs pa kun//gnod sbyin grul bum mi 'am tsi//yi dwags lus srul lto 'phye che//phyag rgya 'di yis bsrungs pa yIs//glags lta'i go skabs mi rnyed//gzhan yang/
39a4(rgyud): bdugs pa'i sems can dang //gang yang nad ni 'jigs rung ba//de dag thams cad mo 'byung ste//phyag rgya 'di yis shin tu bsrungs//'jigs pa thams cad rna/
39a5(rgyud): bral//kun kyang dbang phyug yang dag ldan//de dag thams cad mi 'byung ste//'di ru dgos pa spyad mi bya//sems can 'dug sems yod pa gang //shin tu drag
39a6(rgyud): shul las byed pa//zhi ba'i thugs kyis bde gshegs kyis//gdul ba ru ni mi nus pa//de rnams rab tu gdul ba'i phyir//kho bo 'di ni rnyed par dka'//bde
39a7(rgyud): ngar gshegs pas mdzes par gsungs//bsam mi khyab pa'i 'bras ster ba//sna tshogs bsam mi khyab pa'i las//sa stangs phyag rgya rnyed par 'gyur//
39b1(rgyud): brasam mi khyab par bshad pa ni//de phyir 'di yis bsam mi khyab//dam tshig ye shes pashad pa 'di//brlag pa ru ni 'byung bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas la
39b2(rgyud): ni bslus pas na//gsang sngags 'bras bu kun mi 'byung //byang chub tshogs ni 'grub bya'i phyir//dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bar bya//dam tshig bsrungs pas dngos grub kyi//'dras
39b3(rgyud): bu yang ni 'byung bar 'gyur//rtag tu g.yo ba med 'gyur bas//lus can rnams kyi phyag rgya dgod//bud med pa yang bu rnyed 'gyur//ma grub pa'ang thams cad 'grub//gang tshe
39b4(rgyud): bu mo chags pa yang //lus can 'dod pa mngal du 'chags//de tshe yang dag rab sbyar ba'i//phyag rgya don kun 'grub par byed//dkyil 'khor 'jug par zhes bshad pa//
39b5(rgyud): phyag rgya bshad pa 'di yin//gzhan du lus can m+bu cad kyis//cho ga nyams paso 'bras bu med//dbang phyug sogs rgyal gang su dag/mi yi phyogs dang mtshungs pa
39b6(rgyud): 'thob//'di ni de yi cho ga'i lam//sa stangs na ni gzhan ma med//thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang 'thob//'jig pa thams cad rnam par spangs//phyag rgya 'chang
39b7(rgyud): bar gyur pa yis//sems can thams cad dbang thob 'gyur//cham ngam mtshan nyid sa stengasu//rgyas par bshad kyis chur la nyon//gang zhig bcings pa tsom gyis ni///
40a1(rgyud): bsam mi khyab pa'i go 'phangs 'thob//gang yangs stangs gdugs pa can//lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //lto 'phye srin po ma'am ca//'byung ba/
40a2(rgyud): gdon dang sha za dang //gang yang bgogs gzhan log par 'dren//de rnams 'joms par bya ba'i phyir//tsham dam 'dzin pa bslab pa nyid//gnas gsum du ni gnas
40a3(rgyud): rnams la//mnyam par bzhag par rab sbyar na//de ni brlag par 'gyur ba'am//'chi bar 'gyur bar the tsom med//dam tshig ster ba'i gnas gnas la//spyi bor
40a4(rgyud): me tog thal sbyar te//rgyal ba thams cad mchod byas nas//yang dang yang du phyag kyang bya//de nas mnyam par bzhag gyur pas//sa stengs phyag rgya mching pas
40a5(rgyud): mching //rkang pa ya gcig bteg na su//ma rungs pa yi lta stang dbab//khro dang btsos pas bzhag par bya//rkang pa'i 'og tu lta stang dang bo//lag pa gay+ra
40a6(rgyud): pa bsgrengs par bya//g.yon pa snying khar yang dag bzhag/rkang pa bgrang nas gzhag par bya//sku las hUM yig 'od zer 'bar//brtan dang g.yo ba'i bgegs sam gzhan
40a7(rgyud): 'og tu bsnun par yang dag gnas//rkang pa mnan nas bsnun pa yis//lha dang lha mon g.yo bar byed//sa gsum yang ni g.yo ba dang //shin tu mi bzad sreg
40b1(rgyud): par byed//thams cad sreg par 'gyur ba na//de dang nye ba'i drung du 'khor//bdag rang khro ba lta bu yis//zhags pa'i phyag rgya thogs nas ni//zhags pa'i phyag rgyas bcing bar bya//
40b2(rgyud): phyogs bcu kun na gnas pa yi//zhags pa'i phyag rgyas de bcings te//shin tu gdung bar byed pa'o//ha ha zhes sgrogs rab tu 'phrul//la la thal bar brlag par 'gyur//
40b3(rgyud): bo gshegs che ba'i bdag nyid can//de dag thams cad ston pa'i tshig/skal pa chen po bka' bsgo stsol//bdag cag khyed kyi bka' ltar bgyid//bdag ni yid bzhin ma yin pa//
40b4(rgyud): bka' nga sgro bcag par mi bgyid do//de nas de rnams dam tshig ni//bde bar gshegs pa chen pos gsungs//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun yang //khyod kyis yid la bya bar 'os
40b5(rgyud): bka' ba sgra gyur pa thams cad kyis//khyod kyis bstan pa rnams kyang bsrungs//sngags pa bdag nyid chen po yis//bka' bsgo ba ni bcag mi bya//kun laganod par mi bya ste/
40b6(rgyud): bgegs ni nam yang ma byed cig/sangs rgyas chos dang yid ldan pa'o//bka' bsgo bcag par mo 'byuraro//sngags pa yin bka' bsgo ba//nam yang bcag pa ma yin te//
40b7(rgyud): gal te gso ba dan gnyer na//dam tshig 'di rtag 'bras bu ster//gal te khyod ni bka' bcog na//sngags pas kyang ni hU~M brjod na//rtag tu thal bar rlog par 'gyurar//
41a1(rgyud): /de nod ldan rdo rje 'chapa khra ba tshan ba stabs pa na//rdo rjes mag ma dzaka'//dag pa bzhin du 'gams par byed//de dag thams cad mos nas//'jigs par gyur/
41a2(rgyud): pas tshig smras pa//sngags pas ji ltar bka' stsal pa'i//dka' bsgo bcag par mi babyed //nyid la bkur sti ji bzhin bgyid//srung bar yang ni shin tu bgyid//rtag tu/
41a3(rgyud): dzasu 'brel bar ni//gyur par sngags pa la bgyid do//bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gnas//dam pa'i chos ni srung bar bzung //bstan pa yang ni srung ba ni//ji sri
41a4(rgyud): gnas kyi bar du bgying //de ltar bde gshegs kyis bsgres te//dam tshig la ni nges par sbyar//bdag nyid chen po rdo rje can//bde bar gshegs pa tshim par mdzad/
41a5(rgyud): gal te bgegs kyis bstan pa li//gnod pa ru ni byed gyur dang //gal te sems can rnams la yang //'ga' zhig gnod par byed pa yi//bde gshegs kyu'o sra
41a6(rgyud): gcig pordo rje khyod ni bdag nyid ni//nga yi bka' yis rtag tu ni//khyod kyi mgo bo rdo rjes 'gems//de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //mgu bar gyur pa'i thugs kyi
41a7(rgyud): su//sgra ni stan las bzhengs mdzad de//bde bar gshegs gsungs bka' bsgo ba//thal mo sbyar te dbus mo btsugs//bka'o stsal spyi bor 'dzeg par bgyi//mgon//
41b1(rgyud): bo khyod kyi chos kyi sras//bu ni bdag la bka' bsgo stsol//dus gsum par gnas bka' sgo ba//bdag ni de bzhin skyong bar bgyid//de nas rdo rje rgyal chen bdag/kun mkhyen pa
41b2(rgyud): 'khor spyan snga ru//rnga sgra zab mo yi ni dbyangs//snyan pa'i gsung ni bka' stsal pa//gang yang rdzu 'phrul tshan kun dang //gzhan yang bgegs dang srin po nyon//sngags pa
41b3(rgyud): bdag nyi ngo chen po yi//bka' ni bcag par mi bya'o//gal te bka' ni gcog byed cing //gal te sems can gnod pa dang //sa stangs kyi ni dkyil 'khor du//gal te bstan la
41b4(rgyud): gnod byed na//bdag gis rdo rje 'bar ba yis//sras dang dpung du bcas pa ni//gang yang lha dang lha min gyi//lha'i gzhon pa 'am yang na gnas//bad gshegs bka'
41b5(rgyud): bsgo yang gnas pas//thams cad thal bar rlog par byed//bdag nyid chen po rdor 'byung ba//de nas de ru tshig smras pa//dpa' bo khyod kyis ci bsgo ba//bdag cag
41b6(rgyud): bka' sgo dbang du bgyid//de nas rkang pa g.yon brkyang nas//lag pa phan tshun bcings nas ni//bsngags yod pa yi gnasu bsnun//de nyid kyi ni g.yas kyi ni//'khor
41b7(rgyud): lo'i phyag rgyas bsnun gyur na//thal ba'i rdul du rlog par 'gyur//gal te bgegs ni byed gyur na//sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yis//gal te tshangs sogs gyur//
42a1(rgyud): pa dang //lha yang du ni brlag par 'gyur//lag pa g.yon pa gnasu bzhag/g.yas pa mgo por bzhag nas ni//'byung por gyur pa'i bgegs la/
42a2(rgyud): bsnun//slar yang g.yon pa bsnun nas ni//bskal pa'i me lce ltar byung ste//rdo rje'i thal mos bsnun par bya//sa gzhi phye ma ltar 'gyur ni//gdug pa'i sems can
42a3(rgyud): lta ce smos//khro bo'i so yis mi mchu mnan//mig ni khro gnyer dang ldan pa'i//rdo rje thal mo logs sbyor bas//srid gsum thams cad 'joms par byed//
42a4(rgyud): lus kyi g.yon pa brkyang gyur pas//rdo rje yi ni phyag rgyas bsnun//srid gsum thal bar rlob 'gyur na//ga dug pa'i sems can smos ci dgos//rkang pa mnyam par
42a5(rgyud): gnas nas ni//mdzub me g.yon pa dpral bar sbyar//g.yos pa steng du bteg pa yis//mdzub mo rtse mor rab tu 'bar//bgegs yod pa yi gan su bsnun
42a6(rgyud): zhal ni yi ge hUM gis brgyan//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yau sa bsnun pas//lus ni bskal pa'i me ltar blta//gal te rdo rje'i lus byur kyang //de ni brlag par 'gyur ba
42a7(rgyud): yin//rkang pa ma mnyam bya tshom bzhag/lag pa steng du dbyug pa sbreng //g.yas kyis yongasu bskor nas ni//bgegs kyi gzugs la bsnun par byed//
42b1(rgyud): dgyu pa'i phyag rgya bsdu drung sa//'bar ba lta bar rdzas las byung // med par thal bar s+ho//gangan slob bar 'tsho byor 'gyur//gAyon brgyad pa yi rkang pa gnas/
42b2(rgyud): lag pa g.yos po ma go bor bteg/grwa yin pa'i rkang pa btig nas ni//mi sdug zhal nas hUM brjed pas//ri rgyal lhun po'ang 'gas par byed//rgya mtsho yang ni skam par 'gyur
42b3(rgyud): dpal ldan phyag rgya 'di 'chang pa//'di ni brtul zhugs legs par gnas//gling yang ri sogs bshad pa dang //bgegs dang shin tu mo bzed rnams//de rnams 'joms
42b4(rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir//phyag rgya 'di ni rab tu sbyar//ras bal 'da' ba rlung khyer bzhin//nga dag thams cad thal bar rlo//yi ga hU~M gi sgra dang ldan//thob mag bor btag par bya//
42b5(rgyud): g.yon pa stong khar yang dag gzhag/slar yang g.yas pas bteg byas nas//mkhas pas 'khor lor sgyur ba yis//mnyam par sbyar bas bsnun byas nA//bgrogs
42b6(rgyud): kun brlag pa nyid du ni//mdor bsdus nas ni brjod par bya//phyag rgyu mtshan ma gzhan gyis ni//gang gis pa zlog par mi nus pa//gsu nges pa'i phyi ga rgya 'di yis ni
42b7(rgyud): 'di ni 'jams par btsam med//sa la rkang pa nan nas //rdo rje'i phyag kyi legs par skyed//rdo rjems ni 'ang blta //skyes ning rubadag med kyang //khris pas/
43a1(rgyud): na/ya sas ma mar+g+ha mnan//gdug pa'i sems can rnams la bstan//rdo rje'i byug rgya bsnun pa yis//shin tu mi bzad srog par 'gyur//shon/
43a2(rgyud): mi bzed bsdus nas myi//bka' bsgo'i lam ni gnod par byed//sngags pa yid la ci'i dod pa//de tshe de la sbyin par byed//gzhan du 'gal tshabs can 'gyur
43a3(rgyud): sngags pa'i lus ni brlag par 'gyur//bskal pa'i dang mtshungs gyur pas//hA hA zhes sgrogs rnam rgyun pa//blo ldan nags pa'i phyag rgya yis//kun nas 'gu
43a4(rgyud): par byed pa yin//gal te rdo rje 'dzin rang yang //ral gri'i phyag rgya bsnams nas ni//sngags pa hUM gis bstongs pas kyang //de ni bskams nas brlag par ni//
43a5(rgyud): med par 'gyur ba ru//rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu gsungs//rkang pa mnyam por gzhag nas gnas//mtshan khung dag tu lag pa gzhug/slar yang lag pa dgab par bya
43a6(rgyud): so yis mchu mnan de bzhin no//slar yang g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas//lag pa g.yas pa phyar nas ni//g.yon pa snying khar rnam par dgod//bskal pa'i mni
43a7(rgyud): lta bur byung //bgegs kyi gan su bsnun nas ni//de ma thag tu thal bar rlog/rkang pa khyog por byas nas ni//lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa nyid//brlal
43b1(rgyud): gzung nas bstad par bya//khra bas ya sos ma mthu munan//'og tu sgra stongs dbab par bya//bzhogs rnams thams cad bsdus nas ni//blo dang ldan pas mtshan khung ba
43b2(rgyud): thams cad gdung pa nyid du 'gyur//gang yang klu dang srid pa dang //'jigs pa chen po dgegs dang ni//gang yang skye bo na mi 'che ba//phyag rgya 'dren sbyar ba yos//
43b3(rgyud): de dag thams cad bdag por 'gyur//lhag pa rgyab tu btang nas ni//g.yas kyis rnam par bsgyur bar bya//yang na mi mthun gyi rlom gnas//rdo rje thob brdeg par bya/
43b4(rgyud): baglegs kyi gan sa nya seMng ste//khro bo'i lha stangs dab par bya//gal te sa stengs rdo rje 'dzin/bgegs kyi gzugs la bsnun nas ni/
43b5(rgyud): deni brlag par gyur nas ni//'di ni the tsom med par mchi//g.yon brkyang ba y-i rkang pa yis//sngags pa shar du phyogs gyur pas//zhags pa'i phyag rgya go cha bzang ///
43b6(rgyud): yi 'di dang mtshungs par 'bar//sa bcu'i gnas kyi dbang phyug gis//dadegs rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed//kun nas 'gugs par byas nas ni//ral grwa
43b7(rgyud): rgyas gcod par byed//thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ba ni//shin tu mi bzod tshangs 'debs//de ring bdag cig rnams kyis dran//mal bu dang bu mo rnams//yang /
44a1(rgyud): ni sdug bsngal khyed 'di gzigs//'di ni 'tsho ba nyid du 'gyur//gal te gson par 'dod na ni//bgegs ni rab tu ma byed cig/sngags pa bdag tu/
44a2(rgyud): chen po yi//bka' bsgo bcad par mi bya'o//bgegs kyi lag tu gson par bzhag/slar yang g.yas kyis song ba yis//rkang pas myur du mnan par bya//bdag nyid rir//
44a3(rgyud): tu gyur pas//bsams nas bdag nyid chen po 'di//khams gsum dag ni ma lus par//thams cad mnan pa nyid du 'gyur//gang yang bgegs dang logs 'dren
44a4(rgyud): gzhan//sngags pas hUM sgra sgrogs pa las//der ni slar yang glags mi tshul//gnas pa yang dgra bshad pa 'dri//gsang sngags kun gyi gsang ba yin//gal
44a5(rgyud): te sngags kyi 'bras 'dod no//'di ni gang la'ang mi bshad//rang gi bdag nyid lha yi sku//de ni phyag rgya dkyil 'khor ldan//rang gi mtshan ma sa bon dang //rang
44a6(rgyud): bzhin phyi ru bcos pa ni//rtag par rgyun tu snun par bya//gzhan du na ni 'bras bu med//mdor bsdus nas ni 'di ru bu//bdag gis gsang pa gsungs pa yin//
44a7(rgyud): phyag rgya mtshan mchog ni//'di ni kun tu mi 'chad cig/gang yang sdig can sems can gang //bla ma la smod 'jig su rung //pha dang ma ni mi shes shing //gang ya
44b1(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la smod//'jigs pa'i gzugs can dad pa med//gang yang mtshams meng lnga byed pa//sems dpa' med cing snyom pa dang //spro ba med cing snyoms lnga
44b2(rgyud): ldan//nAser sna'i dri ma'i 'angam 'dir byed//gang yang rtag tu gnas pa ni//sangs rgyas kyis gsungs gsang ba ni//de rnams la ni bshad mi bya//gang yang
44b3(rgyud): gdug pa'i sems can gzhan//rtag tu sdig pa'i las can de//khro ba'i rgyal po ma bzla zhing //dkyil 'khor yang ni bstan mi bya//gsang sngags mi shes phyag rgya med//
44b4(rgyud): gang yang bla ma sun 'byin pa//de rnams 'ga' yang rgyal ba yis//gsungs pa'i nus pa kun mi bshad//gsang pa cung zad gang yod pa//khro bo'i ming can snying po 'di//seMn
44b5(rgyud): rnams la phan 'dod pas//de ni ma lus bdag gis bshad//gsang ba 'di la rten nas ni//gang yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang //'gro ba phan phyir 'byung 'gyur ba'i//
44b6(rgyud): gang yang mgon po ma byon pa//'gro la phan pa'i tshul gyis ni//mgon po da ltar bzhugs pa gang //de kun mgon po bsam du med//ye shes brtul phod mtshungs
44b7(rgyud): pa med//rnam par spyad na bsam du med//rnyog pa med pa'i dam chos ni//zhing du bshad par gyur pa yang //thams cad du ni bdud las rgyal//bzod nas zhi la gnas/
45a1(rgyud): med ga/chos kyi 'khor po 'arkor bar 'gyur//sngas gsang mnyam pa'i ye shes nas//bdag gis gang yang ma bstad pa//sa sbyongs na /
45a2(rgyud): gsang ba ste//ma lus par ni bdag gis gsungs//mgon po grangs med 'das pa dang //gang yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba gzhan//'gro la phan phyir 'dir bzhugs pa'i//
45a3(rgyud): glang yang da ltar byung ba ni//kun tu gsang ba'i ye shes gang //bsam gyis mi khyab 'bras rtsol ba//gsang ba'i ye shes pha rol gnon+do//de dag ma lus bdag
45a4(rgyud): gis gsungs//gang zhig rgyud kun tu gsungs pa//gsang ba mchog gi rmed du byung //de dag ma lus pa ru gsungs//bsam mi khyab pa'i 'bras rtsol ba/
45a5(rgyud): thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang 'a thob//bde ba thams cad yang dag gtad//'jigs pa thams cad rnam bral bar///lus can thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur//
45a6(rgyud): 'di ni myur du dngos grub byed//bsam gyis mi khyab 'bras bu rtsol//sems can thams cad srung ba yi//gsang ba pha rol gnon pa gsungs//de bsngo rnam
45a7(rgyud): pa thams cad du//gsang ba'i gsang ba yang dag byung //rtag tu bag yod par gyur pas//bsrung ba'i don du rgyal bas gsungs//sngags pa bdag nyid chen
45b1(rgyud): yis//mchog tu yid 'ong yang dag bshad//bsang ba'i ye shes brtul phod bya//sngags pa mu bsgrubs pa yang 'grub//gsang ba'i ye shes pha rol gnon//gang la'
45b2(rgyud): bshad par mi bya ste//rdzobs srengs rkang gnyis mchog gis ni//mgon pos bsame gyis mi khyab gsungs//rgyal po med cing gdug pa'ang med//bgegs dang leg par
45b3(rgyud): 'dren pa med//srin po gnod sbyin dbang po med//gdug pa'i gza' dang ma mo med//dus min 'chi dang 'jigs pa med//nad kyis kun tu 'khrug pa med//mkha 'gro ma dang
45b4(rgyud): shi za'ang med//seng ge stang/sogs 'jigs pa'ang med//chu yi 'jigs pa chen po'ang med//rims sogs 'jigs rung ba'ang med//gnon po la sogs kun kyang
45b5(rgyud): meng/de bzhin thog gis 'jig pa med//mi rgod chom rkun la sogs med//gzhan yang de bzhin yams med cing //de ru mu ge'i 'jigs pa med//bdud kyi 'dzegs
45b6(rgyud): pa'ang de bzhin med//yul 'khor gzhan gyis 'jigs pa mong //de la 'go nad 'jigs pa med//lhog pa mtshan par rdol ba med//nad la sogs pa thams cad med
45b7(rgyud): gzhan yang 'jigs par byed pa med//sa gzhi thams cad yod pa yi//sa gzhi stengs 'dir gnas pa yi//'di ni gang gi lag na gnas//gang gi snying khar gnas pa de//
46a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad rnam byal bas//ma yi skyes bu thob par 'gyur//bdag gi dka' bas rab brnalA te//de zhin srog la ltos meng par//
46a2(rgyud): mgon po grangs med rab mnyes pas//go 'phang mchog 'di thob par 'gyur ro//ye shes shin tu rnyed dka' ba'i//yang dag 'di ni bdag gis 'thob//sems can don du
46a3(rgyud): bsam med par//grangs med bzhin du rnam par gnas//da ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid//byang chub snying por yang dag bzhugs//phyag rgya 'di ni bstan pa yis
46a4(rgyud): yang dag pa na bdud las rgyal//srid gsum 'di ni 'jigs pa 'khrigs//sems can sdug bsngal yang dag khengs//'jig rten gsum na 'bad pa yis//bdag gis ma
46a5(rgyud): lus par bsgral to//ma lus sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/sems can don du bstan pa yis//de dag thams cad bdag gis ni//phyag rgya 'di yi mthu yis byas//
46a6(rgyud): mtshungs me ye shes sa thob cing //sa stangs kun mkhyen sa thob lngas//de bas bdag ni kun mkhyen brjod//na mkha'i go 'phang bgrod nas bzhugs//sna tshog
46a7(rgyud): 'jig rten 'gro shes nas//dmyal ba la sogs 'jigs rung ba'i//sdug bsngal gyis gdungs mthong nas ni//thugs rjer ldan pa'i thugs kyi su//gsang sngags
46b1(rgyud): tshul gyis 'bras byung ba//bsam mi khyab pa'i dam chas bshad//ji bzhin gsungs pa'i 'jig rten gsum//yang dag ye shes rnam par bsgyings//gsang sngags chog
46b2(rgyud): rgyas pa ni//de ni 'di ru bdag gis gsungs//de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis//bdag gis dam chos bshad pa 'di//rtag tu bag yod par gyur pas//cho ga rgyas
46b3(rgyud): par bshad par bya//gsang ba'i phyag rgya rab gsungs pa//dam tshig mi shes la mi bshad//sangs rgyas thams cad bslus gyur cing //gsang sngags 'bras bu mi 'byung //
46b4(rgyud): de rnams ngan 'gror ltung ba dang //'bras bu gzhan du 'byung ba med//gal te sems can thams cad ni//dam tshig nyams par gyur na ni//'bad pas bla ma mnyes byas nas//
46b5(rgyud): sa stengs dam tshig gzung bar bya//gsang ba sra stengs bshad pa yad//phyag rgya de nas bcing bar bya//de ltar byas pa'i cho ga shas//sngags dang phyag rgya shin tu sbyar/
46b6(rgyud): bsam mi khyab pa'i sku thab ste//gzhan du na ni 'bras med 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub//thugs rje ngang ni ldan pa'i thugs//rdor byung bdag nyid chen po la//
46b7(rgyud): snyan pa'i tshig gis bka' stsal pa//gsang sngags sems can don sgrub pa//bshad par bya yis tshur la nyen//bsam gyis mi khyab 'bras bu mang //yang ni bde//
47a1(rgyud): /bAr gshegs pas gsungs//bsam gyis mi khyab las sna tshogs//bsam gyis mi khyab 'bras bu gnon//gsang sngags 'chang ba 'di dag ldan//
47a2(rgyud): de phyir 'di yang bsam mi khyab//gang gis rdzogs sangs rgyas bsrungs pa//rdzu 'phrul chen po rgyal gyur pa//srung ba'am 'ga' zhig 'jig rten ni//thams cad chags
47a3(rgyud): bas gzir gyur pa//da ni bshad par bya yis bu//phan par gyur pa'i yid kyis nyon//mthong ba'i chos la 'bras bu ni//gzhan du 'bras bu med par 'gyur//de na/
47a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de'i tshe sems can thams cad bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//snyoms par zhugs nas
47a5(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyis bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa nang na 'gro ba thams cad rnam par grol bar byed pa//tshe dang nang med pa la sogs pa dang /nad thams cad
47a6(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar byed pa/mchog tu sangs rgyas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bka' sprul pa/na maHsarbA sA ba ro pU ra ke
47a7(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga tau b+h+yaH/sarba thA/a tsa la kA Na naT Ta/na Ta Ta/mo Ta Ta mo TaT/maT Ta maT Ta/taT Te taT Ta/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Ta/A bi shwa A bi shA/AHmata ta mA la kaH/
47b1(rgyud): d+ha Na d+ha NaHtra Na tri Nau/khA da khA da/bib+h+r-i mA ra mA ra duSh+To/rak+Sha rak+Sha sa twAM ku ru ku ru/ki ri ki ri/ma hA bi dza ya badz+ra phaT/hUM hU~M hUM/tri ba li ta raM ga/na ra ta ka/haM haM haM haM/a tsa
47b2(rgyud): tsaT phaT phaT yeHhUM a sa me tIkatrAH/mahA ba la sha ti ya/sa mA nA ya/trAM mAM d+h+waM/shud+d+ha tu lo kaHtuSh+TA tu badz+rI ni mr-i stA pra ti hat+ta dam b+h+yaHdz+wa la ya trAT/a sa
47b3(rgyud): ha na maHswA hA//bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i snying po 'di gsung sa ma thag tu stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa
47b4(rgyud): drug tu g.yo sa te/'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul//tshamacham rab tu tsham chem/kun tu rab tu chem tsham/g.yos rab tu g.yos//kun tu rab tu g.yos
47b5(rgyud): ldog rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/kun tu rab tu 'khrugs 'ur 'ur/rab tu 'ur 'ur/kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/shar phyogs mtho na
47b6(rgyud): nub phyogs dme'o/lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'i ste/snang ba chen po'i 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to//gzhan yang ngo mtshar slad du byung ba 'jig rten du mthong ngo //
47b7(rgyud): bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang /gang yang sran po 'jigs pa dang //sha za gdug pa'i sems can dang //gang yang bdud dang 'jig su rung //gnod sbyin//
48a1(rgyud): klu dang mo 'am ci//grul bum dang ni lus srul po//gang yang lha man tshogs dang yang //gang yang gza' dang ma mo dang //ras bal 'dab ma rlung khyer/
48a2(rgyud): bzhin//de dag thams cad thal bar rlo//zab mo yi ni dbyangs kyi sgra//phyogs kun tu ni grags par 'gyur//'jigs pa chen po'i skar mnga' ltung //'jigasu
48a3(rgyud): rung ba'i glog kyang 'a khrugs//sa bzhi thams cad 'bar ba ltar//sa stengs kun na me phung //phyogs kun 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur//sa gzhi dkyil 'khor kun
48a4(rgyud): 'khrugs 'gyur//mun nub 'jigs pa chen po ru//sa gzhi dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas nyan thos lha dang ni//byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul
48a5(rgyud): che/lam grol ba yin yid can+da la//de dag thams cad ngo mtshar gyur//kun mkhyen sman sngar 'dug nas ni//snyan pa yi ni tshig 'di gsol//kun mkhyen/
48a6(rgyud): bkod pa bsdu bar mdzad//sems can sdug bsngal kun tu 'khrugs//sa gzhi snying por gyur pa 'dir/tshul 'di bzod par mi nus//de kun kun mkhyen ban
48a7(rgyud): nas ni//ting 'dzin ni stong 'gyur bas//skyob pa byang chub sems dpa' yis//snyan pa'i tshi gis bka' stsal pa//byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigaso shig/
48b1(rgyud): gang yang 'jigs pas gzir ba'i lha//gzhan yang gdug pa'i sems can ni//'jig rten pa dang rgyu mi rgyu//rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yis//'di ni bsam du med par bshad//
48b2(rgyud): de nas sems can thams cad kyis//bde ba thams cad yang dgra thob//thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang thod//sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par spangs/bsam pa thams cad
48b3(rgyud): rdzogs nas ni//de ma thag tu sa stengs 'gyur//khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po 'di//rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu gsungs//stobs chen 'di ni mi mthong bas///
48b4(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po rang nyid gnas//gnas med pa la sbyar mi bya//gsang sngags gsang ba pha rol gnon//rang nyid de bzhin gshegs pa ste//'di ni khro bo'i gzugs kyis
48b5(rgyud): bzhugs//las rnams sna tshogs yang dag ldan//gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas pas 'grub//mtshams med lnga po byas pa yang //'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur//
48b6(rgyud): tshe sa grangs med cing rgyu skar med//sbyang gnas yang ni med par mdzod//khrus kyi bya ba thams cad med//dri sogs cho ga'i rim pa med//rasau bris med cing gnas yod
48b7(rgyud): /min//dus kyi cho ga'i rim pa med//sdig pa kun dang ldan pas kyang //gang du yang dag gnas sgrub pa//slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ni//thugs rje dang ni ldan pa'i
49a1(rgyud): zhugs//ngo rgyu chu ba'i bdag nyid lta//sman pa'i tshig gis b+haka' sprul pa//gAs+yA sngags rgyal po rdzu 'phrul tshe//zla rgyu snang
49a2(rgyud): ngos grub myur du tshul mdzad de/shad par byu yis du tshur na//yid la 'dod pa'i chog nyid//bsam gyis myi khyab las dang ldan//gsang sngags chen po di
49a3(rgyud): baisgrung seMn//bosam gyis mi khyab 'bras bu stor//rdzogs sangs mchog tu gsang ba ni//basbyin dang g.yo bas mi shes pa//bsgom pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad ni//
49a4(rgyud): rnam pa mchog gis drug tu gsungs//nAmAHsar+b+ba swA pa ri pUr ke b+h+yaHsar+b+ba tA thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hU d+hA ne/a mo g+hA tsat+ta ma hA roShaN+Da s+pho Ta yats+tsha/trA sa ya hU~M/dzaka
49a5(rgyud): byigan du rnga 'di 'do ni//khri'i chen za ma nyi myed//las kun nus po na 'di ni//sngags kyis rgya la brdzu 'phrulatshe//yid 'dod pasam gyis ma khyab pa//ma
49a6(rgyud): bo yi las kyang byed//rgyud rgyal gzhan pa rnams ni//cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa gang //'di nyid kyi ni tshig yis//de yang grangs med bsgrub par bya//khro bo'i
49a7(rgyud): mngag gzhugs bka' nyan po//ngo nya bo mo rdzu 'phrul che//cho ga 'di yi rim pa yi//de yang ji ltar rigs pas sgrub//gang yang 'jig rten pa yi lho//gang yang bya
49b1(rgyud): / nga snrog / slong na sa sbya / na//da na ga/da// na/
50a1(rgyud): g+hu shI tA mAt+taM/da ha dat+ta/sA d+hA ya sA d+hA y+ra/dza ya dz+nyA ya/bi dzA ya bi dza ya ki tI s+yAtwA//mgo ba phyug rgya'i sngags//na maHsarbA sa pa/
50a2(rgyud): b+hU ke b+h+yaHsarba taSh+Tha tib+h+yaHsar+b+bASh+Ta/b+hUr d+ha ra a tsin+du pa 'i ma/oM b+h+yAd+hA thA la yA/rak+Sharak+Shas g+heH/rdo rje'i phyug+sa rgya'i sngags//na par+Na saMd+d+has
50a3(rgyud): pa r-i pU ra kr-i b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga tAM b+h+yaHsarbaSh+Ta/dzAHti/da ma da ma n+tu/bidr-i ma tig swAhA//snying 'i phyag rgya'i sngagaso//ne maHsar+b+bA sA pa ri pU raH
50a4(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga tau b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA/hU~M dau ha da ha/kau tsi rA ya si/A na ya shIg+h+r-i rak+Sha R+Shak+Sha/ban d+hi ban d+ha/duSh+TaM da ma da ma swA hA//phyogs bcings pa'i phyag rgya'i/
50a5(rgyud): sngag so//no maHsar+b+ba sA pa r-i pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba tA thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/oM d+hun d+hA na/ma hA pA shr-I khaMd+ga d+ha ra/sarba sA pa ri pU ra ke sA hA//bka' rtog
50a6(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'i sngag so//na maHsarbA sA pA ri pU ra ke b+h+yAHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thAM/ga ga na gai d+ho b+ha ba mA hA sa ma ye/pa ri pU ra ki swA hA/dri
50a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i sngag so//na maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pU ro ke b+h+yoHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/bi shud d+hi dz+nyA nA rtsi saM b+hi be ga ga nA na taHswIt+ma//mar me'i phyag
50b1(rgyud): gso//na maHsarbA sA pa ro b+hU kod+d+haHsarbatwathAg t+tob+h+yaHsarban+ta/t+tAt+yo shud+d+ha/gr-i kr-it+ta/sar+b+ba swA pa r-it+ta rA s+yAng+ga/gaN+Da ma'i phyag rgya'i sngags/
50b2(rgyud): nomaHsarbA sA pa pUr/b+h+yaHsarba tathAg tid+d+haHsaH/ shud d+ha mahA dz+nyAn si ts+tsho bid+dep+tAd+h+r-im+b+ha/sa ta na we swAhA//bdun pa'i phyag rgya'i starnaMs//na maHsarbA sa p+pa /
50b3(rgyud): pU ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga to b+h+yaHsarbaT+Ta/ga ga~M na bi kAn+d+ha bI mi na me hU~M shud+d+he na~M yai swA hA//mi tog gi phyag rgya'i sngags//ni maHsarbA swa pe ri pU ke/b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga d+haH
50b4(rgyud): seMHd+hAnA trA na/par mo bi prad+d+he/rman pa di Sh+T+rI ke stan/zhem pas hU~M phyag rgya'i sngags//nam sarbAswA pa ri b+hU shwe d+hIHsarba ta~MSh+ThagatrA~Mb+h+yaHsar+b+ba
50b5(rgyud): aHsAd+hANiti/d+yA ta da ma da maHsad+g+ha sAM pa ri pU ra kaSh+T+r-iHswA tAM//dpa' bo chen po spyan drang ba'i sngags//na maHsar+b+bA swa bai rapA~M rA ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsa
50b6(rgyud): bigud+d+ha bi shud+d+ha satwa sa~M b+hA ba~M A na ya an ni ma hAn ya~M swA hU~M//byang chub sems dpa' sbyin drang ba'i sngags//na maHsarbA sI de ri b+hU da ke b+h+yaHsarbata thAg te b+h+yaHsarbaH
50b7(rgyud): baM kro d+ha swA hU~M//ha haM/ta na ha na/da ma da me/ma hA na ye swA hU~M//nyan thos spyan drang ba'i sngags//na maHsar+b+ba sI pe ri pU rikeb+h+yaHsarba te thA gau te b+h+yaHsa NA~M/
51a1(rgyud): oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya/shIg+h+raM/da ha da ta/pan+d+ha pa tsa mad+ha nA ya pa ri d+ha re stAt+ma//pho nya mo la sogs pa spyan drang ba'i sngabs//na maHsar+b+ba sA pa ri pUr/
51a2(rgyud): b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te rgyus na ma tha ma the/A na laM/A na ya/pra be sha ya pra be shu ya/sarba d+hA trUM/sarba daM ShAM/ta ma ta mo mad+hA ya na pa ri ShA hUM swA hA//'jig rten
51a3(rgyud): rnams spyan drangs pa'i sngogaso//na maHsar+b+ba swa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/sat+ya swa t+ya/ma hA sat+ya/de ma dam/ma hAM daM ma/A kaR+Sha ya UH
51a4(rgyud): yeset+ya bA de/ma hA na yA shud d+h+we swA hA//drang srong rnams skyon drang ba'i sngagaso//na maHsarbA sA pa ri pU ra ki b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/dza ya dza ya/bidzaM/
51a5(rgyud): ya bi dza ya/ma hA sa t+ye bA di ni sadz+ra hi t+taM swA hA//sring mo rnams spyan drang ba'i sngagaso//na maHsar+b+bA sA pa ri pUr b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga to b+h+yaHsarba thA/hriHha ha/mtha
51a6(rgyud): maH/da ma da ma/han ha na/ma hA na yai/mar ma ra hA sAhA//na mo rnams spyan drangs pa'i sngags//na maHsar+b+bA swai rI pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba tA thA gratI b+hUHsar+b+bathA/
51a7(rgyud): oM ha na ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/sarba duSh+pa gr-i h+Na ma tha ma tha/b+hany+dza b+hiny+dza/dam da ma/sarba duSh+TAn oM hUM phaT swA hA//thun mong gi ni tshim ngom du//rig 'di 'jig rten gtso ngas
51b1(rgyud): gsungs//phyag rgya rnams ni ma lus dang //sngags ni rgyas par gsungs pa yin//don kun grub par byed pa'i sngags//'di ni myur du grub byed cing //bsam gyis mi khyab 'bras//
51b2(rgyud): rtsol ba//shin tu gsang ba yang dag gsungs//phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig sbyar//dri dang me tog 'drug pa dang //getor ma yang ni ma lus paM//sus kyang gzhom par mi nuso//
51b3(rgyud): bcing ba dang de nas gza'//gzhan yang yid la ci 'dod 'byung //de kun sngags dang bcas pa yi//phyag rgyar sbyar bas 'grub par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni//
51b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje dka' stsal pa//khro bo'i rgyal po rnam par shul//'di ni khyed la rjesu sbyin//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //de bzhin mngon spyod dbang du bya//de bzhin sna tshogs gyur pa/
51b5(rgyud): dang //khyod la rag lus mchog tu 'dod//bsod nams du ma las 'khrungs pa//mtshan dang dbye byad bzang pos 'bar//mtshan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//phyag
51b6(rgyud): brkyang ba ni sngon 'phro bas//bdag gis rdzogs sangs rgyas dbang bskur//bde gshegs las 'khrungs rdo rje can//zab mo dbyangs kyi sgra yis ni//bde bar gshegs pas
51b7(rgyud): kun gsungs pa//khro bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga'i rim//rim pa ji ba nin gsungs pa nyid//khyod nyid gcig tu brtan g.yo ba'i//rnyen pa ni srung bar gnas//dam pa'i chos ni
52a1(rgyud): sprul pa'i sku//sa stengs na no zhi bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar ni//sa sbrengs khyod nyid gcig pu gnas//'das dang ma byon par gyur dang /
52a2(rgyud): 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams//kha lo sgyur ba khyod gcig pu//bla na med pa'i go 'phang 'thob//rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa//slar yang phyag tu bzhag pas kyang //
52a3(rgyud): dbang chen thams cad g.yos nas ni//sa gzhi rnam po drug tu bskyod//du ngag thams cad mngon gyur te//sangs rgyas dam chos bsam med pas//bsam gyis mi khyab go
52a4(rgyud): 'phang 'thob//sa stangs rdo rje sems pa'i bdag/na mkha'o mdzod kyi 'od zer thob//'phags pa chen po rmang byung che//'jig rten yang dag byung gyur te//sa gzhi snying//
52a5(rgyud): po 'di ru yin//de nas bcom ldan rgyal gyur pas//sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la//brtan dang g.yo ba'i gsang ba rnams//snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal
52a6(rgyud): pa/khyad ni bdag gis tshim par byas//bdag nyid chen po rdo rje 'chang //rtag tu bag yod par gyur pas//bdag nyid chen pos de nyid bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das/
52a7(rgyud): zhi ba chos kyi dbyings la mchog du gzhol//chos nyid gcig pu thugs chung nas//kun mkhyen cang mi gsu bar 'gyur//de nas 'khor rnams thams cad kyis//
52b1(rgyud): dmatshar ba yo tshig gsol ba//sangs rgyas cheb bsam ma khyab//'jog rten mgon pas bstan pa nyid//dang nas 'apung stong dag drug kun//rtag pa gcog tham thar byon gyur//bdag/
52b2(rgyud): nyid chen po'i rdo rje can//bde bar gshegs pas gtad par gyur//'khor rnams shin tu dga' ba yis//snyan pa yis ni tshig skyes pa//skal pa chen po mchog tu gyur/
52b3(rgyud): tsib gyi yi ni bka' bsgo stsol//de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //me tog phreng bar gyur pa yis//thugs rjer ldan pa'i shugs kyi suM//'khor rnams la ni bka' stsal pa/
52b4(rgyud): khro rgyal ras ris cho ga ni//rdzu 'phrul chen po de nyin cig/gang zhig sngags kyi sgo nas ni//byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa skyed//sngags kyi sgrub thabs las gsungasde pa'i/
52b5(rgyud): ni de nas thob par 'gyur//sngags pa 'chang bar gyur pa dkon//lus can rnams kyis bzod mi nus//gdug pa log par 'dron pa kun//'jigs pa'i gzugs can srin po rnams
52b6(rgyud): ring po nas ni ring mo mthong //dpa' bo dregs pa bcom pa bzhin//nad rnams thams cad rnam par grol//'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs//thams cad dbang phyug gi
52b7(rgyud): 'phang ni//gang zhig lag pa'i ning du 'jab//rgyu skar med cing gza' sogs med//mam med cing lha yang med//'jigs bdun las rnam grol bar//sa gni'i dkyil 'khor rje/
53a1(rgyud): ru 'gyur//sems can thams cad dbang thub cing //sa stongs sngags shes rgyal po ni//'khor bcas kyis mchod sman par smra//rwas bris mthong
53a2(rgyud): pa shin tu gsang //skra dang bral ba de brtags pa'i//dpa' bos gtsongs pa'i ras blangs te//dri dkar chu yis bkrus nas ni//kun du zla ba lta bur gtsang //ji srid ngur smrig
53a3(rgyud): mdzes pa ru//slar yang byed du gzhug par byas//bdug pa yi ni 'dug par mdzes//thams cad du ni gtsang sbra bya//de nas de ltar byas nas ni//sa gzhi rab tu byug par bya
53a4(rgyud): de la yang ni dri zhim spos//shin tu mdzes por byug par bya//dadugus dang rgyal mtshan bdan dang //rnga dang dril bu sgra snyan mchog/rgyu skar nyi ma bzang po la//rtsa bu'i
53a5(rgyud): sngags ni rab bsngags pa//yid du 'ong ba'i bum pa ni//dri yi chu yis rab bkad nas//sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bzhag/zhal zas gtor mchog bzhin//de ltar
53a6(rgyud): 'di kun byas pa yis//rgya che bar ni byis pa'i char//rol mo'i las ni legs bslabs pas//skal pa chen po de ru bong//de nas gso sbyong sbyin par bya//byang chu
53a7(rgyud): sems ni khyang du'ang //skal ba chen po de mchod bya//gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis//de ni yang dag par mchod nas//de nas shin tu dben pacwo//don seMr+tha//
53b1(rgyud): ldan cig gang ba bya//ras kyi kha nas g.yon par bya//kha nar dang bcas rang por bzhag/blo ldan de dbus bra ba ni//khro Ta shin tA mthang dka' ba//lto ba rgya la shin tu khro//lan
53b2(rgyud): 'gro'i bdag po phyag bzhi pa//zhal ni rnam 'gyur zur gyis gzigs//ljags la rak+ta rnam par 'dzag/mche ba gtsigs shing shin tu 'jigs//sprin spus btibs pa lta bu'i
53b3(rgyud): 'od//spyan dag nyi ma 'char ka 'dra//gsum pa du ba lta bu'o//gar mdzad de sgrogs par byung ba//klu li 'od kyi tshogs rang bzhin//thod pa rlon pa'i phreng ba ni//tshar ba ni lta bu
53b4(rgyud): bltas pa yi//'jigs pa chen po'i dbu la rgyan//g.yon ngos zur phud rnam par 'phyangs//me stug dang bcas me 'od kyis//rdo rje g.yas kyi phyag na'o//'od zer 'bar
53b5(rgyud): lhag pa yi//ral gri gnyis pa na ni bsnams//g.yon pa yis ni zhags pa bsnams//gnyis pa yis ni bsdigs 'dzub mdzad//su la sprul gyi rgyun gyis brgyan//rno
53b6(rgyud): rgyus bu yis skra rags byas//thozod pa rlon pa'i phreng ba yis//mchod phyir thog su smras pa yin//dpa' byon par 'du smrig bsnams//rin chen rdo ba'i sted du ni//g.yas pa/
53b7(rgyud): ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//'og tu bgegs ni bri bar bya//bsregs pas 'bar bar 'gyur ba yi//mogs po ru ni gyur pa'i//rtsa dang rgyu ma rnam par 'byung //khrag 'ja
54a1(rgyud): lta byur gnas pa yin//'og tu blo ldan sgrub pa'o//dbus mo dag na sa la btsugs//spos kyi snod kyis bral ba'i bdag/mchod yon snod ni 'dzir
54a2(rgyud): par brtson//'di ni ras bris rab mchog tu//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab tu gsungs//ras bris 'di yis de ma thig/sngags pa'i ma grub pa yang 'grub//khro bo
54a3(rgyud): rgyal po ngo mtshar ba//thams cad gdungs byed yang dag bri//shes rab chen pos ri mo mkhan//ston mo drangs te yon yang sbyin//pir ni sar pa'i mtshon ma dang //
54a4(rgyud): rdza mkhan snod ni sar pa ste//mtshan ma bye brag byed pa'o//yang na thams cad 'byung ba yin//de ltar thams cad gyur bltas naso//dri yi ras kyi gdab par bya//sa steng
54a5(rgyud): shin tu gsing ba ste/su la'ang bstan par mi bya'o//gang gis khro bo 'di mthong ba//mi shes dran pa 'khrul par 'gyur//skye bo nad kyis 'khrigs nas ni//de
54a6(rgyud): ma thab tu brlag par 'gyur//sngags pa dngos grub 'dod pa yis//rtag tu bag yod par gyur pas//sngags pas rtag tu ras bris 'di//rtag par rgyun
54a7(rgyud): tu bsrung bar bya//sngags kyi slob dpon dag gis bshad//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo rnams//'di rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i//yon tan re ba
54b1(rgyud): tu sgrub par byed//sa stongs dkyil 'khor rtsa ba'i sngags//yon tan gnasu gyur pa yis//de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya//gsang sngags ma lus bsam mi khyab//bsam//
54b2(rgyud): gyis mi khyab 'bras bu 'byung //gsang sngags skye can khro bo 'di//bcom ldan thub pa zhes ni bya//khro bo'i rgyal po blo lhun gyis/gsang sngags 'di ni bklags pas/
54b3(rgyud): 'grub//khro rgyal 'di ni bsam mi khyab//sngags kyang bsam gyis mi khyab 'dong //thams cad bsam med go 'phang 'thob//bklags pas 'grub par gsungs pa
54b4(rgyud): yis//sngags pa bdag gis mi nus//sngags pa blo dang ldan pa ni//gal te mtshams med lnga byas kyang //skye bo de yis bsam pa ni//yong su rdzogs par byed pa
54b5(rgyud): yin//de bas rnam pa thams cad du//sngags 'di 'bras bu bsam med 'byung //rtag tu mngon par sbyang gyur na//sngags pa'i 'bras bu bsam med 'byung //ras
54b6(rgyud): ris gnyis par gyur pa ni//bshad kyis phan pa'i sems kyis nyon//yon tan rgya che bsam mi khyab//rdzo gas sangs rgyas kyis yang dag gsungs//ngur smrig ras ni
54b7(rgyud): blangs na su//dra yi chu yis yongasu dgang //tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med//gso sbyong bsnyung ba la sogs med//ri mo mkhan bzang brtsal na su//mkhas pas/
55a1(rgyud): ri mo bri bar bya//sangs rgyas mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas//ting 'dzin gnas rims bral ba//'khor los bsgyur bar gyur pa'i sku//'od zer sna
55a2(rgyud): tshogs mnyam pa'i 'od//byang chub dpag bsam shing dang ni//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnam par rgyan//log su 'dab chags rgyal po ni//snyim po me tog gis bzhi
55a3(rgyud): bya/g.yas na bzhugs pa'i dpa' bo ni//thub pa chen po 'jig rte ni gtso//sna tshogs pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan//bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar//thal mo sbyar te/
55a4(rgyud): 'dud pa ni//rtag tu bzhugs pa blta bar bya//g.yon gyi drung na bzhugs pa ni//snyems tshul dang bcas zhal bzhad pa//g.yas kyi phyag gis spyi bor ni//rdo rje'
55a5(rgyud): ni rab 'bar bsnams//dpa' bo chen po cod pan can//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//ras bris cha yi mtshan ma ni//bsam pa thams cod rdzogs par byed///
55a6(rgyud): 'og tu khro bo mi g.yo ba//ral gri zhags pas rnam par rgyan//rdo ba dmar po'i gdan stengs na//'od zer tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs//'bar ba'i 'od kyis khor yug
55a7(rgyud): bskor//mchu yis mchu mnan zur mig gzigs//bgegs kun sreg par gyur pa ni//dus zad med 'od lta bur 'byung //sgrub pa po ni dngos song lta//spos
55b1(rgyud): kyis khang bu lag na thogs//dbus mo gnyis ni yang dag btsugs//rgyal ba'i sras la sems song ba//de yi 'og tu khro bo gtso//khams gsum brtan par rnam par
55b2(rgyud): gnon//bka' gnang ba yi lam gyur cing //de bzhin gshegs pa la gzigs pa//rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin dang //sdong bu rgyas la ze bar bcas//'dzin pa'i klu yo
55b3(rgyud): bu mo ni//de bzhin gshegs pa lta bur 'gyur//pad ma dkar po mgon po ni//'jig rten gtso bo thugs rje'i bdag/pad mi dmar po yang dag bshad//bde gtse/
55b4(rgyud): las byung rdo rje can//de ltar 'di bdag kun byas pa'i//ras bris rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che//ras bris 'di ni mthong ba yis//sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs//
55b5(rgyud): rmongs pa'i zhags pa 'jigs pas 'khrig so//ngan song nams ni rgyun chad 'gyur//thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang thob//rgyal ba skyes mchog 'byung bar 'gyur
55b6(rgyud): gza' rnams kun gyis bzung ba dang //nang rnams kun gyis nyen pa dang //'jigs pa kun gyis 'dir za ni rnams//cho ga mthong bas grol bar 'gyur//seMn
55b7(rgyud): kun la brtse bar gyur//sems can thams cad dbang du byed//thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang thob//rtag tu ras bris blta bar bya//rtag tu bag yod
56a1(rgyud): par gyur nas//gtsang zhing tshul khrims rnam par rgyun//ras thos yang dag mchod byas nas//de ma tshan sangs rgyas thob//do nas
56a2(rgyud): 'chang chen bdag/thugs ni rnal 'byor gcig pur bzhugs//sems can bde ba ster ba yis//'dod par gyur pa'i rtog pa gsungs//zhi ba dang na rgyas pa dang //
56a3(rgyud): dbang du bya dang mngon spyod dus//las 'di mdo ru bsdus nas ni//sngags pas sa stengs dkyil 'khor du//ras bris sgrub par 'dod pa ni//rdzu 'phrul che de rtag tu nyon//
56a4(rgyud): dpa' bo gcig gi bdog nyid che//gtso bo bstan pa'i don mdzad pa'i//lus can kun la gsungs pa yis//de yi rtog pa yang dag bshad//mgon po 'phral du las
56a5(rgyud): mdzad pa//rtag tu gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa//rgyal po ngan par bshad pa dang //bstan la gnod pa byed pa can//de rnams brlag par bya ba'i phyir//khro bo 'di
56a6(rgyud): ni rab tu sbyar//gang yang 'di ru gsungs pa gzhan//bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa//gnod sbyin srin po grul bum dang //la sogs mi 'am ci bcas pa//de
56a7(rgyud): rnams go zhom par bya ba'i phyir//khro bo'i rgyal po rab tu sbyar//nad rnams thams cad rnam par grol//pha rol yul 'khor rnam par 'joms//'di na
56b1(rgyud): dmag dpung sgrud gyur //gdag pa'i snyoms can da rnams smra//zlab rgyam par bsdu na//blasam khyab bya'i stobs gnan to//bskyed pa dang na gsong pa nyid//8/
56b2(rgyud): rten gsum pa dag pa'am/tuskye bar byed pa 'o//na tugatu sbya bong bya/na du 'dis kyis mchog sa brje byu na//de nas skyes spyong pa
56b3(rgyud): /sus can 'tsheb 'grus nga s+ho//de ched dkyil 'kho rab tu blanas//rgyug las ni rnam par sbyar//gus pas 'dzin pa'i sngags pa ni/ga tsang ning dung rgya
56b4(rgyud): rnam par brgyanu//tha ma mnyes pa yang dag byed//cho ga 'i rim pA y-i ni phul ba//gaslong sngags gang yang du de bzung nas//b+hag tu sbyin pa yangasu bzung //tha ma la ni rjes ga
56b5(rgyud): ga/sa sbrengs sgrub pa btson par byed//dung khrong dang ni za kye//lam gyi gzhi mdo'am mtshan mA gcig/glang du yod ni nyams dga' ba'o//gnas de nyid du 'a
56b6(rgyud): byad bya//snong ma gcig pa bas pa ma//yang nan pa 'bras sogs bya//dbe na na co med pa'i sar//de bu khrim phrag gcig bzlas smras//'brum tha'i
56b7(rgyud): rdzogs nas ni//a pa marga'i yam shing sogs//mngar gsum dang ni ldan par srid//'bum phrag gcig tu tshang ben//de nas zla ba nyi yin//dus tshogs kyi ni sngon
57a1(rgyud): du bsdang //sgrub thabs 'di ni rtogs pa yis//srung ba'i cho ga tshul bzhin bya//ral gri la sogs mtshon cha gsungs//yang na gang yang rung ba gsungs//
57a2(rgyud): dngar gnas 'di ni rab tu zhugs//sgrub pa po yi gang zag bzhugs//nam phyed sgra ni byung ba na//ras bris mdun du bzhugasu gsol//gsang sngags bzlas te thun bzhag la//
57a3(rgyud): 'di ni nang gi rnam dag gnas//de nas de yi mtshan ma ni//don du ma 'byung bar 'gyur//snyan pa'i rnga yi sgra mang dang //yang na me tig char du dbab//gan su lha yi bu 'das
57a4(rgyud): te/sna tshogs rnga yi sgra dang yang //mi 'am cis na rnam rgyan pa//glu ni sbyin par len par byed//tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs lha//rdzu 'phrul chen po der 'ongs nas//me
57a5(rgyud): tog gi ni char yang 'bebs//gdung cing shin tu bka' stsol zhu//rig pa 'dzin pas me tog ni//char pas sa stengs khebs par phab//sna tshogs rnga yi sgra dag ni//rab tu bde
57a6(rgyud): zhing yid 'phrog pa//sa stengs de ru kun khengs par//glu snyan pa yi sgra yang len//byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i bdag/sa bcu'i gnas kyi dbang phyug rnams//byang
57a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' blo ldan pas//thugs rje can bdag bka' stsol te//dpa' bo chen po bu khyod legs//srid pa'i rgya mtsho rnam par rgal//bu khyod bla med go 'phang ni//rtul
57b1(rgyud): phod pa yi gnas thob pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' mnyam nyid 'gyur//'gro la gcig pu phan par 'gyur//bu khyod sangs rgyas thams cad de//skyon rnams thams cad rnam par
57b2(rgyud): de nas shar gyi phyogs cha ru//grangs med du ma'i tshed gyur pa//lho yi gzhon po'i me tog ldan//slar yang de yi mdun na gnas//rin chen gdu bu'i dra ba ni//phyogs kun tu ni kun
57b3(rgyud): tu gtibs//mu tig gi ni chun 'phyang can//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dran spras//rin chen sna tshogs rang bzhini gdugs//nyi ma lta bur snang bar byed//steng du rin chen bla bras
57b4(rgyud): yas//ri bo'i phyogs dang mnyam par phub//bye ba du ma'i rig 'dzin ni//kun kyang lhab lhub rgyan gyis spras//kun nas yongasu bskor nas ni//de yi mdun du mod la gnas/
57b5(rgyud): sngags pa dngas grub 'dod pa yis//phyag na rdo rje dpal dang ldan//de ni myur bar bzlas par bya//rdzu 'phrul chen po byin gyi bar//bdag nyid chen po der byon nas//mtshan
57b6(rgyud): ma 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur//sa gzhi rnam pa drug tu g.yos//sa gzhi me tog gcal du skems//tsha ba'i bdag nyid sna tshogs dri//sa stangs rab tu zhim por 'gyur//
57b7(rgyud): phyogs bzhi ru na rnga yi sgra//rol mo la sogs bsdus pa 'byung //ha ha zhes sgrogs sgra chen po//sgra ni phyogs bcur thos par 'gyur//der byon bdag nyid chen po la//yid ni//
58a1(rgyud): dad par gyur pa yis//mchod yon zhabs bsil brjod nas dbul//dri dang mai tig rim ji bzhin//de nas myur bar brjod bya ba//legs par 'ongs brjod//
58a2(rgyud): par bya//sdig pa'i dgra yis zin pa na//dpa' ba tshan pa bdag sdug bsngal//mgon khyod bdag la brtse bar mdzod//de nas bdag nyid chen po 'di//phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che//
58a3(rgyud): sngags pa blo dang ldan pa la//snyan pa'i tshig gis bka' stsal pa//dpa' bo chen po bu khyod legs//rnyed par dka' ba khyod kyi mthong //khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che//bu
58a4(rgyud): khyod kyis ni 'di bsgrubs pas//shin tu sdug bsngal lnga long 'khrigs//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las khyod rgal//slar yang skye ba'i 'jigs pa med//'chi ba'i 'jigs pa
58a5(rgyud): 'jigs rung med//rdzogs sangs sems can mnyes bshin pa//bdag nyid chen po rnams mthong ba//phyogs bcu dag ni bzhugs pa'i mgon//rtag tu dam chos gsu
58a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur//de ltar rig nas 'di yi ni//bdag nyid lag pa nas bzung ste//bdag nyid chen po'i bzhon pa ni//bsam med yon tan kun byung ba//skyon de gnas par/
58a7(rgyud): byung nas ni//sngags shes ci tsam 'dod kyi bar//sangs rgyas zhing rnams ston par byed//sems dpa' bsod nams nyer 'tshe bas//de tsam tsham tshim med par
58b1(rgyud): //sa du slo pa'i dag/lcu gnon pa mdzes pa la//do du skrod par da da//dongs nad myur ba//mag ba rdul rna ldar ma//de nas sgyu ya gzhan du
58b2(rgyud): chen bskor nus 'gro//'di ni sangs rgyas ni rnams//reg pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/'khor los bsgyud ba'i mkha' lding yin//bsam g+nis myi khyab yan tan brnyes//bsku
58b3(rgyud): pagrangs med dang 'tsha//nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i 'ong //dpal ldan gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa//blo bzang gis ni kun spyad na//sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med na//mtshad gnas
58b4(rgyud): di ni snang bar byed//bsam med pa yi dmachas nyan//the ldan gang zhig thos gyur pas//sangs rgyas yon tan bsam med 'byung //khro ba'i rgyal ba zla ldan pa'i//dngas glang 'di//
58b5(rgyud): yang dag bstod//gzhan yang gzhan yang tsho rigs par//mtshungs med bsrung bar bya no//ras bris gnyis pa 'di yas no//bsam gyis me khyu ba grangs meng las/
58b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyed kyis mkhyen//shAHzhes bya bas ni gsungs//ni bdod ni rgyas pa dang //dbang dang mngon skyod de bzhin du//ras bris gnyis par nul
59a1(rgyud): bzhin du//ji ltar rigs par bya ba yis//ras thos gnyis pa 'ang ya na//rgyal bas sgrub zabs gang gsungs pa//gal tos stongs sgrub byed na//
59a2(rgyud): 'don nyid du tshigs bsgrubs//sgrub thabs cho ga bsam mi khyab//'di ni bsam mi khyab pas gsungs//'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa//rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis mtsha
59a3(rgyud): gis gsungs//chos grangs med cing rgyu skar med//'di la skye blar gnas pa med//lhag ma lhag ma min yang rung //slar yang 'bad pas bsgrub par bya//'bum phrag
59a4(rgyud): gcig ni bzlas brjod na//mtshams med lnga byas sngags pas kyang //las rnams thams cad kun na su//bdag nyid rgyal ba'i skyes mchog 'gyur//gso spyang la
59a5(rgyud): sogs ngur bas bya//yang na brjod de btab paso//rims sogs nad kyis btab pa dang //gdug po rnams gso byed pa dang //nad rnams kun gyis zin pa dang /gza'agan
59a6(rgyud): gyis ni rab gzir pa//ras bris spyan sngar rab bzhag ste//khro ba'i sngags kyis bsngags pa'i//bum pa chu yos yongs bkang nas//nad kyis btab pa'i mi khrus byA/
59a7(rgyud): mchog tu bde ba sbyin pa na//de rnams rnal mar sos par 'gyur//sa stengs gdon gyis rin pa yi//sbyin sreg dag ni yang dag gsungs//ngur ba mngar gsum thos//
59b1(rgyud): /btags pa//gdon rnams zhi phyir sbyin bsreg bya//srin pa yang na bshad pa dang //mkha 'gro ma dang rdzu 'phrul tshe//sha za dang ni grul bum dang //ma mo rdzu 'phrul che gsungs pa/
59b2(rgyud): gzhan yang gdugs pa byed pa yi//sa stengs sems can 'tshe byed gang //de rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir//khro bo'i rgyal pa rab tu sbyar//nad rnams dang ni don dag la//
59b3(rgyud): sman gyi shing gi yam shing ni//a ru skyu ru la sogs pa//sbyin sreg 'di ni rab tu sbyar//rgyal srid thob par 'dod pa yis//sa gzhi steng na gnas pa gang //de yi cho ga
59b4(rgyud): 'di ni mchog/pad ma'i cho ga sbyin sreg rim//pad mo chu la 'bum phrag gtsog/mngar gsum gyis btags 'dod pa yi//ras bris spyan sngar sbyin bsreg bya/
59b5(rgyud): rgyal po 'dod par gyur pa yis//cho ga yang dag tshul bzhin bya//blon po thob par 'dod na ni//de yi cho ga 'di ni bshad//ku mu da ni 'bum phrag gsum//'bras/
59b6(rgyud): bu 'dod pas sbyin bsreg bya//da ni rgyal po'i blon po nyid//gang zhig 'dod pas 'grub par 'gyur//a pa mArga'i 'bras dag ni//mngar gsum gyis ni btags na su//
59b7(rgyud): sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na//yul gyi bdag po 'am grong khyer 'thob//dri zhim rdzas rnams 'bum phrag bdun//ras bris mdun tu sbyin bsreg bya//de nas
60a1(rgyud): sngags pa'i yid la ni//ci 'dod pa ni 'thob par 'gyur//gal te bung med bu med pas//bu ni don du gnyer byed na//dur ba ti lu dang 'bras sogs
60a2(rgyud): pas//sbyin sreg byas na bu rnying 'gyur//khyon dbang du byed 'dod pas//de yi thigs ma 'bum phrag sdig/bdag po dbang du'i gyur ba yin//bId ma'i ze ba bri yeng ku/
60a3(rgyud): ka li ki bac+doMs bsregs par bya//mi 'khrugs pa yi nar rnyed cing //shin tu yid bcugs 'byung ba yin//so ba'i 'bru yi sbyin sreg gis//yid 'dod mi zad pa ru bshad
60a4(rgyud): 'bras ni sbyin sreg byas pa yis//mi zad pa yi nor yang 'byung //pad ma'i sa bon bil ba'i 'bras//ku mu nga yi 'bras bsregs na//des ni mi zad longs spyod 'thob/
60a5(rgyud): 'bras bu thams cad sbyin bsregs pas//sa gzhi rgyal srid 'thob par 'gyur//tshwa dang nim pa'i sbyin srog gis//dgra bo de ma thag tu 'chi//dpa' bo gcig po mthong
60a6(rgyud): dka' ba'i//ras bris legs par bkrams nasu//de yi spyan sngar rab sbyar bya//bstan pa gnod byed mngon spyod ni//gnod sbyin tshe dang rgyal po che//sa stengs rang
60a7(rgyud): sems bsnyems tshul can//mngon pa'i nga rgyal nga rgyal che//gdug cing gdug pa'i las byed pa//dkon mchog gsum lo gnod byed dang //chad rtag gsang
60b1(rgyud): sngags dam pa spangs//gsang sngags mchod par ma byed cing //drer gus rton pa smod par byas//bzlas pas sun ni 'byin pa ste//de rnams pha rol gnon pas na//las
60b2(rgyud): kyi chag mthong ba yis//de rnams nyid la sbyar bar bya//sdig pa'i yul can chos med pa//'byung po thams cad sreg par byed//de rnams la ni las sbyar na//de ma thag tu
60b3(rgyud): srog 'chad 'gyur//sbrul gyi shubs ni blangs na su//dug dang lhan cig phye mar btab//de nas nim pa'i 'dab blangs la//dgra bo'i ming ni bri bar bya//dben pa'i sa phyogasu
60b4(rgyud): gnas te//dug gis rtag tu bri bar bya//thod pa lnga ni blangs na su//yungs mar gyis byugs dkang nas ni//rnam pa'i shing la blo ldan gyis//tshi ga bzhin me sbar bar bya//
60b5(rgyud): gsum gyis skyed bu byas na su//gcig ni steng du bzhag par bya//bzhi pa yungs kar gyis bkang ba//de yi steng du bzhag par bye//sbrul gyi shubs ni blangs na su//
60b6(rgyud): ming de nang du gzhugs par bya//dum bu re rer btugs na su//thod pa re rer gzhugs par bya//brgya rtsa brgyad ni mngon bsngags nas//ras bris byang du zhal gzigs
60b7(rgyud): te/sngags pa lho ru phyogs par bya//khros pas tsog tsog por 'dug ste//skra grol po yi khro bo nyid//sngags pas 'dug pa tsag por bya//thal bar gyur gyi bar
61a1(rgyud): duni//'di ni nyin phyed na byas na//de ma thag tu srog 'chang 'gyur//'chi ltas kyis ni mngab ma blang //shun pa 'am ni rtsa bar bcas//rang ga
61a2(rgyud): khrag ni nyid dag dang //yungs mar dag ni yang dag ldan//tshwa dang rgya skyegs nyid dang ni//'di dag thams cad cig byas te//dben pa yi ni gnas dag tu//ras bris byang
61a3(rgyud): du zhal bstan te//sngags pa lho yi phyogasu phyogs//me yi thab khrong byas na su//chu ba'i shing gis khyad par du//yam shing yang ni rab tu bya//tsha ba'i shing ni 'bru
61a4(rgyud): zhig gis//de nyid kyis ni sbar bar bya//stobs chen ma yi thab khung du//las kyi tshig mthong ba yis//bsregs blugs bdun du bsregs par bya//de ni khro bo'i
61a5(rgyud): gzugs can te//de ru ye shes me ni sbar//ral gri'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni//mkhas pa sngags kyi bzlas pa bya//khros pas bsregs blugs stong phrag brgyad//ma
61a6(rgyud): yI thab tu dbul bar bya//dang po bu ni 'chi bar 'gyur//gnyis pa la ni gzhon par bcas//gsum pa la ni yul 'khor kun//bzhi pa la ni rang sreg go/bstan par
61a7(rgyud): yi ni las 'di ni//nyi ma gcig gis 'byung bar 'gyur//yang na yul 'khor 'jig pa 'am//sa gzhi'i bdag po 'chi bar 'gyur//rlung nag char pa de bzhin bdud//
61b1(rgyud): me yi tshig par yang 'gyur te//char chen mi bzad pa yi rlung //rdul tshul tshor bar 'byung bar 'gyur//pha rol dmag tshogs khros pas 'tshe//stag dang seng ge'i mche bas
61b2(rgyud): 'debs//phyogs kun nas ni 'byung ba yi//gnod pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur//gdug po'i las ni byas pa yis//nyi ma de la 'byung bar 'gyur//sngags pa dang ba med
61b3(rgyud): pas na//des ni zhi bar ga la 'gyur//tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs dang //'jig rten skyong dang rdzu 'phrul che//'jig rten pa yi lha kun dang //gang yang ma mer bshad
61b4(rgyud): pa gzhan//byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che//sa bcu gnas kyi dbang phyug dang //rdzu 'phrul chen po sangs rgyas dang //sngags pa sa stengs gnas pa dang //de ni
61b5(rgyud): srung bar mi nus te//rgyal po khros par gyur pa yis//de ni srung bar mi nus te//rang gi khrag gis ldan tshwa btags//tsha ba gsum yang khyad par du'o//bdag nyid lha/
61b6(rgyud): phyogasu bltas te//ras bris byang du zhal phyogs la//me yi thib khung byas pa ru//tsher ma can gyi me sbar te//kun nas khros bcas gdug pa yis//de nas dgra
61b7(rgyud): bo'i ming gzung la//tsog tsog por 'dug yang dag sreg/bsregs blug bdun phrag gsum gnyis sam//stong phrag brgyad du mngon sngags nas//gdug pa'i/
62a1(rgyud): las kyis sbyin bsreg bya//dang po la ni bu yin te//gnyis pa lnga ni chung mar bshad//gsum pa la ni bdag nyid 'gro//bzhi pa la ni gzhon pa
62a2(rgyud): dpung //lnga pa la ni rang gi yul//drug pa la ni rigs brgyud gnyen//bdun pa the tsom med par ni//sa gzhi'i steng du thal bar rlog/thun phyed dang ni dbyug gu'am//nyi ma
62a3(rgyud): phyed nas khros pa yis//thags bzangs ris kyang 'chi 'gyur na//skye bo phra mo lta ci smos//gal te bde legs 'gyur 'dod na//rang gi yul 'khor pho brang 'dir//'o
62a4(rgyud): ma'i bsregs blugs stong phrag gis//de ma thag tu rnal mar 'gyur//gsang sngags 'chang bas sa stengasu//rtag tu yul med byed 'dod dam//dgra bo myos par byed pa//
62a5(rgyud): 'am//yang na dbye bar 'dod pa na//mi rus phye ma tshwa dang ni//skye tshe dang ni gnod sbyin khrigs//ras bris spyan sngar bsregs blugs bya//bsregs blugs bdun gsuM
62a6(rgyud): yang na lhag/bsregs blugs las ni zin pa na//the tsom med par myos par 'a gyur//de ni zhi bar 'dod pa na//dur ba'i 'dab ma 'o mas btags//stong phrag cig
62a7(rgyud): tu bsregs blugs byas//gang tshe sngags pa 'dod pa na//de yi tshe ni rnal mar 'gyur//dug nyid dang ni khrag dang ni//rus pa'i phye ma yang dag ldan//nim pa'i sa
62b1(rgyud): bon ldan pa ni//yungs mar gyis btags mnye bar bya//ras bris byang du zhal bltas la//myos byed shing gi me dag la//khros dang ldan pa swa bsrogs blugs ni//nyi shu rtsa/
62b2(rgyud): gcig sbyin bsreg bya//brgya rtsa brgyad ni sngags byas nas//stan la tsog tsog por 'dug cing //bsregs blugs las ni rdzogs pa na//du ba me ni kun tu 'khrigs//bu dang phyu/
62b3(rgyud): dang gnyen bcas pa'i/dgra yi srog ni 'chad par 'gyur//mi yi rus pa'i phye ma blangs//de nas nim pa ldang bar blad//bdag nyid kyi ni khrag gam ni//yungs mar gyis//
62b4(rgyud): ni brtags byas la//ras bris byang du zhal phyogs te//bsregs blugs bdun du sbyin bsreg bya//bu dang phyugs dang nye dur bcas//dgra srog de ma thag tu skam//sems can/
62b5(rgyud): gdug pa'i rgyal po dang /gzhan yang lha la sogs pa dang //ma mo rnams kyis sa stengasu//sngags pa la ni gnod byed pa//de rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir//sbyor ba
62b6(rgyud): 'di ni brtsamA par bya//skye tshe dug gis de bzhin brtag/nim pa'i 'bras bu yang de bzhin//ci rigs sbyin bsreg byas gyur na//de ma thag tu srog 'chang 'gyur//rtse gcig/
62b7(rgyud): pa yi yid kyisu//de nyid tshogs rnams mnyan par gyis//gang gis 'phral bu 'bras bu 'byung //gsong ba'i sbyor ba bshad par bya//nim pa'i 'dab ma dug gis btags
63a1(rgyud): de la khrag gis ming dri bya//chu ba gsum gyi me sbar te//sngags pa rtag tu lho ru phyogs//ras bris byang du phyogs pas bgram//stan la cag cig za
63a2(rgyud): 'dug ste//khros pa'i yid kyis bsreg par bya//bsregs blugs bdun la nyi shu sngags//rigs rgyud phyugs dang gnyen bcas pa'i//dgra bo de yi tshe na 'chi//dbyug gu phye
63a3(rgyud): dam yud tsam gcig/gang du la lar gnas na ni//sngags pa'i dgra bo gnod byed la//sbyor ba 'di ni brtsam byas nas//dgra bo de ma thag tu 'chi//tshig 'di gzhan du ma
63a4(rgyud): yin no//rang gi khrag gis tsha gsum btags//dgra bo yi ni gzugs brnyan bya//blo ldan min pa'i 'dab ma la//ming bris nang du gzhug par bya//sa sbrengs nim po'i shing
63a5(rgyud): yang dag/mkhas pas rnam par blangs nas su//yang dag cho ga shes pa yi//dug gis bsgos te byug par bya//cho ga bzhin du dug byugs le//skad cig de la sbar bar bya//
63a6(rgyud): sngags pa lho ru phyogs pa dang //ras bris rtag tu byed du phyogs//tsog tsog por 'dug rgyud khros pa//'bar zhing mched pa'i mi lte bur//dgra bo yi ni ming smos na//ngo
63a7(rgyud): nyid kyi yang bye bas ni//bsregs thugs gsum du sbyin bsregs na//dgra bo mod lo 'chi bar 'gyur//bu dang rang gi rigs brgyud bcas//chung ma dang bcas bu gnyen
63b1(rgyud): smra da sa na/da// na na// spyong / / pa mnan dus//ma pas na sa
63b2(rgyud): sogs//'dzin pa com med//TI pA dag nyid nr-i hUM mi/na 'ag sde ni blangs naldan//rangahU~M khrag dang drug ldan pa//nim pag+h+nA ni btags nas//de yis
63b3(rgyud): gzugs brnyan byas pa dang //dgral na ma de ni bris pa dag/de ni gartabs nas bsregs blugs ni//brgyad nyid kyis ni bai sreg par bya//bu dang phyugs dang gnyin du bcas/
63b4(rgyud): skyeb ma maud ma ni//zhes te ba spyod byu ba/ byed de sa khya 'dun dang //rmongs pas yang dge sbyong gyur dang //ma mos sbyang bar byed pa dang //gzhin mang+ga
63b5(rgyud): snyan par grags pa yis//brgya byin la sogs lha dbang gis//sngags pas dang bu med pas na//de ni srung bar mi nuso//thugs brtsi ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni//
63b6(rgyud): sngags pa gang tshe dang brla//dung bdo ni bsres pa yis// srims byugs de ni sreg/mye chog tu 'di ba btad bsnun//de nas rnamam dag du 'gyur//blos rlo
63b7(rgyud): bani grangs na na//rje skyegs kyi thebase rnam par gnas//rdus rgyas nyid ga/gle nga m+b+hi yang dag ldan//dben 'dzinan su 'dreg na ni//rim mchen kyi
64a1(rgyud): me sbar te//dngas shes dang nig khros pa dang //sngags shes gtum par gyur pa yis//nyi ma phyed kyis char gnas nas//bsregs blugs
64a2(rgyud): bdun du bsregs pa na//sngags pa dogs med gsang bar gnas//de nas brjod pas sbyin bsreg bya//dang po bsregs drugs sbyar ba yis//dug dang phol mig rnam par rdzun//
64a3(rgyud): gnyis pa la ni nyin bzhi pa//gsum pa la ni rims chen po//bzhi pa la ni lus bskam 'gyur//lnga pa la ni dran pa med//drug pa lhag ma cung zad tsam//bdun pa la ni srog/
64a4(rgyud): 'gro ba'o//sngags pa'i las ni 'grub bya'i phyir//gsang ba 'di ni bshad pa yin//mdor bsdus nas ni bshang bya yis//rdzu 'phrul chen po rtag tu nyon//sngags pa dang ba
64a5(rgyud): med pas na//gzhan du na ni 'tsho mo nus//ji srid sngags pa dang med par//de ni gang las zhi bar 'gyur//ji srid sngags rgyal brnyes pa dang //thugs brtses brlan pa de yi//
64a6(rgyud): tshe//zhi ba ru ni 'gyur ba yin//dug dang nim pa sgog skya dang //dung gi phye ma nyid dang ni//ras bris nye ba'i drung du ni//nyi shu tham pa bsreg par bya//gnyen dang 'khor dang
64a7(rgyud): phyugs bcas pa'i//dgra bo rtsad nas bcad par 'gyur//gsang sngags 'dzin pa ma gtogs pa//de bzhin da tsho su yis nus//tsha ba gsum dang lan tshwa dang //dug dang rang
64b1(rgyud): sbya banas pa dang //lungs ma dad nga ni sgra dang yang //sbrul gyi shungs ny-id drug dadung //rnam pa'i shAm 'bras du rabacas//mi yongs pa'i phyim dang //sbyin+d+hu dang ni drung pyodang /
64b2(rgyud): sgrogagacad dang ni sgrog smrarjid//'di rnams phye mar g+h+r-i sman su//tsher me'i me la mnya ma bzhag pa'i//sngags pas de ni bsregs drug bya//dgra ba mngon myer smo mo nas/
64b3(rgyud): bsregs blugs gcig ni bsregs sbyi na//dgra bo ni mong du brlag//gsum dang bdun dang de nas gcig/dgra bo bsregs blugs byin srog na//rang gi pa chen yul la
64b4(rgyud): bcas//1du byugs rnams bdug par 'gyur//gal te mkhas pas dgra ba ni//spyi bar bya bar 'dod pa yis//yan la ga gzugs bdan byas nas//ldan+do 'bras bur
64b5(rgyud): brnyas pa dang //dngu ra yi bsregs thugs bdud// ma thag tu spyo bar 'gyurab gsum dang med sna //rtan pa nyid du bsgregs gyur na//na chen pas na~M zin gyur nas//
64b6(rgyud): shing bskams bzhin du bskams par 'gyur//dam pa'i yi rlo sbyar ba rjes//dz+nyAn tu bsgregs pa nyid gyur ni//klung de'i rims nitshabs pa ches//de mthag N+DI 'jams
64b7(rgyud): par 'gyur//zhi li 'ama'i sbyin sreg gis//thams cad du ni brjod pa yin//khri la sbyin grangs na //e raN+Da la mar lus btags//dngur yi ma la no//
65a1(rgyud): blugs nyi shud+d+ham du sgeg/khA ta bzhin du phyogs n+tu//dom thag tu dgra po 'khyams//lan tshwa gu da kun na ldan//mr-i nus pa stsor sa//
65a2(rgyud): yungs ka kun tu ldan pa rnams//nom pa'i min me bzod par//dgra ze 'a sregs blugs byas gyur no//de ma thag du thal bar rig/be ldeng ma khros pa lan rmed ldan/
65a3(rgyud): rgya skyegs khro bar bcas pa rnams//bsregs na dgra bo nyams nas nI//de ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur//sge'u gsher gyi khu bar ldan//de bzhin lan tshwa tsha ba gsum//de
65a4(rgyud): gzugs brnyan byas nasu//dur khrod kyi ni 'gal du ma blangs//de nyid la ni mi sbyar to//ming ni gzugs brnyan nang du gzhug/gang du cung zad ni yod pa//rkang pa'i rtse
65a5(rgyud): zug par srin/yul dang yul 'khor bcas pa dang //'di rin po thugs gnyen du bcas//bdag nyid dang ni chung mer bcas//'di de ni mod du zhal bar rjog//mkhas
65a6(rgyud): pas sol ba'i thal ba yis//dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan bris nasu//rkang pas rab tu mnan nasu//kun nas khros pas bzlas pa brtsam//glo zer zug chabs po ches
65a7(rgyud): 'debs shing //zol mig chen po 'byung bar 'gyur//sa gzhi kun tu myos 'gyur bar//de ma thog tu 'gyur ba yin//gsang sngags 'dzin pa ma gtogs pa/
65b1(rgyud): slongs 'a pa ngas drug/ na myam gad dang ///dgas pa ston sgronanaganas//spyong ngan ra 'gyur//dgus pang ga bsas //
65b2(rgyud): spangs pa rab tu blangs na su/mkhas pas khang pa stong par bya//nim pa'i mdob maung dgro yo ming //thams cad drug gis byugs nasu//smrar yang rab tu bsgom par bya//
65b3(rgyud): rnam pa'i mdu ba mer 'brel meng//rang gi khAg gis dris nas//de yi nang du rgyug nas//rgyas pas rab tu bsgrim par bya//cha gyi gsum gyis me spyad hUM//bsregs rgya
65b4(rgyud): s+yA bdu sbyi skyen//sngags pas 'dzin gsum dun na// ni pa pa 'idag smras gas//gas bo byed 'dun//snying rje mos ni sum sna ban
65b5(rgyud): /'dis gas sa tes dus sre ni blugs pargya tshe badren pasregs na//de ma thag tsun par 'gyur//byinang sha de bzhin su
65b6(rgyud): la yin sharnapas /na ma man // ba sregs rgyung no// smyen sa rmugs sam nyid sa//mAn+ta ts+tsha du ba de byung //rgyan
65b7(rgyud): bsgyul dus rnams mdzes parnams//'di ni mams par btungasan //khyim gyi nga dusas da ni//gal te 'ad byed kyi sa'i skyongs kyang //ngom 'a//
66a1(rgyud): /rgyu dgra ba /dugu dang bdag nyid dad no//lan na chubyags pa dang na//'do yos gzugs brnyan byas nas//ngan rdzam zang no rab tu bzhud
66a2(rgyud): nim pa'i shIng la m+me sbyar te//khro bo'i mi nI yang dag mchod/gang du cung zad ci yod pa//bsregs thugs gsum ning sreg par bya//bsregs blugs gcig ni byas pa
66a3(rgyud): yis//bdag nyid bu dang chung ma'o//gnyis kyis rang gi gi nyin tshogs nyid//gsum pas yul 'a khor bzhan dpung bcas//rang byung bas ni bsrungs gyur kyang //
66a4(rgyud): pa nyid du rlog par 'gyur//bdun nyid kyini stobs kyis//rAs ni n+dan pa kun tu byas//bsgrub bya'i ming ni sras nas//de'o /de bzhin ga zugs parnyan b+ha//mge brtag pa
66a5(rgyud): rab mnan te//khros pas ya sos ma me chu mnan//brgyad kyi cha ni bzlas pa ni//nadu ni chen pos 'debs par byed//rims dang brgyal bar 'gyur ba ste//mtshar nga'i nad
66a6(rgyud): dang mtshan par rnam//nad rnams thams cad kun tu ldan//chu srabs ni zin 'gyur zhing //rigs rgyud phyugs dang gnyen du bcas//dgra zo de ma thag tu 'gyur//gas
66a7(rgyud): sngags 'chang ba ma gtogs pa//gzhan ma nus pa sre zhig yod//skra dang rkang pa'i sar gnas paM//dgra ba deni blang bar bya//de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni//dug
66b1(rgyud): dang sko tshe bcas pa rnams//tsher ma'i me la sbyin bsrog bya//dgra bo med du brlag par 'gyur//dgra bo'i rus pa'i phyi ma ni//dug dang rang sbyar yang dag ldan//dgra ba'i gzugs/
66b2(rgyud): ni byas na su//nim pa'i shing ni mer bsreg so na//gso bar mi nus nad kyis ni//skye bo de ma thag tu 'debs//gosang sngags 'chang ba mi gtogs pa//gas nus gzhan
66b3(rgyud): mi su zhig yod//nim pa dug dang tsha ba gsum//da du ra yi 'bras bu rnams//'di rnams gcig tu byas nas ni//gzugs brnyan rab tu bya ba yin//de yi lus po btubs
66b4(rgyud): bsregs na//de ma thag tu srog 'chad 'gyur//khrag dang lan tshwa dug dang ni//de nyid gcig tu byas na su//arga'i shing maM de bzhin du//bsregs blugs gsum ni bsre//
66b5(rgyud): par bya//dbyug gu gcig gam thun phyed ni//de ma thag tu sa stengs 'chi//yungs mar gyis ni btags byas la//ras bris byang du phyogs byas te//ldan tshwa nim pa'i
66b6(rgyud): mdab ma dang //tshwa ba'i mar khu de bzhin du//bsregs blugs lan bdun tsam nyid ni//sngags pas gang du gnas pas sreg/bsregs blugos lan bdun rdzogs pa na//
66b7(rgyud): sa stangs de ma thag tu 'chi//rang gi khrag dang tsha ba gsum//yungs mar dang ni yang dag ldan//tshe ma'i mi la bsregs gyur na//de ma thig tu thal bar rlog/arga
67a1(rgyud): nu hi 'o ma dang //de bzhin du ni phag pa'i brun//dur khrod me la bsregs pa na//de ma thag tu mod la brlag/byi tshor ba yi spu de bzhin//bsred
67a2(rgyud): rlugs lan gsumu bsregs gyur na//'phral du mod la brlag par 'gyur//ni ma pa'i lo ma na la sham//dug dang yungs mar nyid dag ni//lan bdun rab tu bsregs bla//
67a3(rgyud): na//'phral du srog ni 'chad par 'gyur//khA ya rus pa khyi rus dang //ne'u le yi rus pa nyid//phye mar btags nas zhi ba byas//yungs mar yang dag ldan pa ru//
67a4(rgyud): ni ma pa'i shing gi mas/bsregs na//grong dang grong khyer du bcas pa//dgra bo 'phral du brlag par 'gyur//'ug pa'i rus pa stag gi spu//thod pa'i rus pa legs par
67a5(rgyud): sbyar//dgra bo'i sgo ru brus nas sba//de ma thag tu skrod par 'gyur//stag gi rus pa ne'u la'i spu//de bzhin du ni khyi yi spu//tsher ma'i me la bsregs 'gyur na//
67a6(rgyud): de ma thag tu 'byed par 'gyur//sa twa'i me tog na la sham//nim pa'i lo ma de bzhin dug/thams cad gcig tu byas nas ni//brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs par bya/
67a7(rgyud): gang gi ming nas smos na su//blo ldan mi yis bsregs pa ni//sa stengs pa ni ma lus pa//'jig rten du ni 'byed par 'gyur//da du ra yi sa bon dang //de bzhin
67b1(rgyud): nom pa'i 'bras bu dang //dug dang lan cha nyid dag ni//brgya rtsa brgyad du bsrogs nas ni//bu dang phyugs dang nyo dur bcas//the tsom med par thal bar rlog//sbrul dang ne'u le nab
67b2(rgyud): po dang //khra yis rus pa yang dag ldan//rnangs pa yi ni mgo bo rnams//cha ni mnyam por byas na su//rang gi khrag dang btags na su//sdong bu gcig pu bya ba yin//brgya
67b3(rgyud): brgyad ni mngon bsngags nas//dgra bo'i sgo khar spar bar bya//bu dang phyugs dang gnyen du bcas//dgra bo de yi tshe na 'chi//mi yi zhag ni nyid dag dang //thal ba thod par
67b4(rgyud): blangs na su//rgya skyegs khu ba yang dag ldan//sdoms nas ril cig rab tu byas//khwa yi rus pa'i nad du gzhug/dgra bo'i sgo khar bzhag pa nA//bdag nyid grong dang de bzhin
67b5(rgyud): bcas//dgra bo de yi tshe na brlag/da du re yi bdag nyid lnga//blangs nas dug dang tsha ba gsum//bsregs blugs lan gsum bsregs nas ni//de ma thag tu dag 'chi 'gyur//
67b6(rgyud): na'u le'i sha ni yang dag blangs//mkhas pas rab tu skams par bya//dug dang tsha ni yang dag ldan//bsregs blugs ldan gsum bsregs pa na//nAd ni sna tshogs ku ni byu
67b7(rgyud): nas//'phral du sreg ni chad par 'gyur//las 'di rab tu sbyar byos na//de ma thag tu 'grub mar 'gyur//sol ba dang ni lan tshwa nyid//tsha ba gsum ni mnyim par bsgos//
68a1(rgyud): yu snang mar dang ni yang dag ldan//de nas gzugs parnyan byas nas//myo ma yin mas te//ras dris byung du 'gas pa dang //spyugs pa t+ta ru n+ya d+ha/
68a2(rgyud): b+hur cing //khros pas ma ni rab 'bar 'gyur//besregs blugs lan gsum nyid du ni//dpra bo'i gzugs brnyan bsregs par bya//de tsog gis bu ni 'chi bar 'gyur///
68a3(rgyud): pas chung mi phyugs dang gnyen//gsum pas bdag nyid yul 'khor dang //phyugs dang gnyen du bcas pa rnams//du ma thag tu thal bar rlog//sngags pa'i bka'adrin med pa
68a4(rgyud): ni/slar yang zhi ba ga la nus//brgya rtsa brgyad las lhag pa yi//'o ma'i bsregs blugs de nas dbul//de che de ru rang gi ni//'khor phyugs gnyen mdab rnams dang
68a5(rgyud): ni//de bzhin ni zhi bar 'gyur//dadung yo 'bras blangs nas//khongs kun tu bya bar bya//nim pa zhes bya'i lo ma 'di//dgra bo'i ming ni bri bar bye//dug dag khrag ni yang du//
68a6(rgyud): ldan//de yis rtag tu dgro ba blo//tshe bragasum dang lan tshwa nyid//khrag gis gang bar dgang bar bya//de ru ming ni bcug nas//skra yas yongasu bre ba bye//nim pa'i skye
68a7(rgyud): la yungs mar gyis//cung zhig tsam du gtso bar bya//rang gi yul 'khor phyugs kun 'joms//rang gi lha ru gyur pa gang //khams gsum pa yi bdag po yis//the
68b1(rgyud): tsam med par thal bar rlog/gdug pA sem+b+has can lta ci smos//rgyal po rdzu 'phrul non pa yang //rang byung bas ni bsrungs gyur kyang //de dag thams cad brlag par 'gyur//sbyor ba //
68b2(rgyud): la brtan nasu//thugs rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis//bstan pa yin don byed par//sa sbyangs 'dir ni the tsom med//yang dag bsam mi khyab pa 'di//khro bo'i rgyal pos rnam par 'phrul//
68b3(rgyud): rtag tu bag yod par gyur pas//thugs rje ro la gnas pa yis//bsten pa dag ni srung ba'i phyir//dam chos 'di ni ster bar bya//ni mda'i 'bras bu yang dag blangs//de nas cha
68b4(rgyud): gsum gyis dgang //khyad pa nim pa'i mdab ma la//dgra bo'i ming nr-i bris nasu//lU yi bdag nyid yang dag blangs//de tshe tshig bzhin me sbar//yungs mar gyis ni bkang byas te//
68b5(rgyud): thod pa dang ni dug nyid kyang //gang du cung zad gnas nas ni//bcug ste sngags pas gtso bar bya//dgra bo de yi myong du 'chi//yul 'khor phyugs bcas de bzhin no//nye b.ra'
