68b6(rgyud): bathams cad dang //dug dang rlu dang ste gnas nas//mr-i ga dang ni yul 'pho dang //rlung gi tshor drab ba kun tu la khrigs//srin pa 'byung bar tshigs kun gyis//swa stangs su
68b7(rgyud): langs par 'gyur//gsang sngags 'tshang ba ma gtogs pa//cung bde skyob pa med pa min//snying rje'i sems ni bskyed nas//'gro ba gzir ba la bltas te//nyi shu rtsa gaH/
69a1(rgyud): rnam po//dbang phyugs dri dpal par bya//sngags pa'i ba//'dren pabang ba mas//de yam no no da gyur//sngags pad+mo ldan ma mnyos na//dAn/
69a2(rgyud): drani bar ga la 'gyur//sngags kyi dngos grub bya ba'i phyir//yang dag sbyor ba 'di spyad na//bstan pa srung ba'i don phyir dang //gdug pa rnams ni gzhom phyir dang //rgyas
69a3(rgyud): 'am ni gdug pa can//bstan la gnod pa byed pa rnams//de rnams tshor bcad po yi phyir//shin tu 'grub par byed pa yi//yang dag 'di ni rabasbyar na//de ma thag tu brlag
69a4(rgyud): par 'gyur//mi rus drug gi phye ma dang //khyi yi rus pa nyid dag dang //de bzhin spyi cha nang rus dang //yungs mar sprul gyi shubs de bzhin//nim pa yang dag lnga bdag
69a5(rgyud): nyid//rgya skyegs lan tshwa nyid dag ste//'di dag thams cad gcig bsdus nas//cher ma'i ma ni mi bzad pa//bdag nyid khro bo me lta bus//bsregs blugs gsum ni
69a6(rgyud): bsregs par bya//de ru bdud ni 'tshe 'gyur zhing //nad rnams mang pos kun tu 'khrigs//bu phyugs gnyen du bcas pa yi//rgyal po'ang brlag par 'gyur ba yin//rgyal po
69a7(rgyud): gdug pa'i sems ldan pa//sngags pa la ni 'che ba ni//sbyor ba 'di ni rab brtsams na//sngags pa mod du yang dag 'gyur//tsha ba gsum dang lan tshwa dug/skye che ba sregs
69b1(rgyud): nyid dang ni//tshab tshwa ba'i myur dang lung //rgya skyabs khru ba sbrul gyi shugs//'di nams gcig tu byas na su//de yi tshen gzugs brnyan bya//tsha ba yis ni kun tu dgang //cha bar
69b2(rgyud): ma ni yang dag ldan//de nyid la ni ming bris nas//mi bzad me la bsregs gyur na//dgra bo de yi mod la 'chi//gang tshe sngags pa bltos med na//gzhan du drug gi mtshan ma dang //
69b3(rgyud): yang na mi bzang phul mig dang //nad chen pos ni kun tu bkrigs//rims dang brgyal nad 'byung bar 'gyur//mes bsregs char pa chen po 'bab//de nas rdo rje thigs nas kyang //
69b4(rgyud): nad tshan rtag pa'i rims kyi ni//bu dang phyugs dang gnyen du bcas//the tsom med par 'chi 'gyur te//sngags pa zhi ba gnag paso//gang tshe slar yang gnyis na su//thugs rje//
69b5(rgyud): gtad pa'i sems gyur na//nang kun las ni rnam grol bar//sa stengs de ma thag tu 'gyur//gdug pa'i las ni mdor bsdus pa//ngo mtshar can 'di yang dag gsungs//
69b6(rgyud): swa stengs snying po 'di sngags pa'i//myur ba'i las ni yang dag bshad//ting 'dzin yul ni bsam mi khyab//rdzu 'phrul yul yang bsam mi khyab//pha rol gnon pa'ang ba/
69b7(rgyud): mi khyab//rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yis//kun kyang bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs//yon tan 'di ni suM yis nus//yon tan rmad du byung ba ste//ji srid sems
70a1(rgyud): ni spyod gyur pa//de srid las ni bsdus pa yin//byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul tshe//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis kun tu gsungs//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
70a2(rgyud): de bzhin dbang du bya ba'i las//rgyud gzhan las kyang gsungs pa yi//de dag thams cad 'di ru byed//ji srid dri rugasang sngags ni//sa stengs dkyil 'khor de gsungs pa//
70a3(rgyud): de kun rtog pa'i rgyal po ni//rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di bsgrub bya//zhi ba 'o ma dur ba yi//mdab ma bsregs pas sbyin bsreg bya//dkar gsum mngar ram sbyin bsreg gam/
70a4(rgyud): 'bras bu nyid kyang mnyam gzhag pa//gzhan yang 'bro sa bu'i tshul dang ni//yang na 'o ma can gyi shing //so ba 'bru ni de bzhin no//rin chen sna tshogs las byung ba//las
70a5(rgyud): kyi khyad par cho ga ni//zhi bar gang zhig rab bsgrags pa//me thab de bzhin bdag nyid dang //gang zhig gnas ni rab tu grags//zhi ba'i las rnams gsungs pa yi//phyog
70a6(rgyud): ni gang zhig yang dag gsungs//gang zhig yam shing gsungs pa yi//tshad ni gang zhig rab tu grags//gzhan yang gang zhig rab grags pa//de dag thams cad 'di ru bya//
70a7(rgyud): de la zhi'u nyid 'di ni//de dag thams cad 'di ru sbyar//gang zhig dbang gyur bshad pa ni//las ni dbye ba'ang de nas ni//me thab ji bzhin bdag nyid dang //phyogs kyi tshe 'am/
70b1(rgyud): sa// nas sa shul thogs//shAn napags sa//nga nyu don pa da nasas//da nga sngags mas//dad/
70b2(rgyud): //zhes ma / na na de sa smad //na ni ldags smra //
70b3(rgyud): sa kyi nga gsungs pa dang //de nas yadun me ya ga//gzhon yang cung zad cig smra sa pa//drung hU~M/ rnyeng pa sogs shes sa pa//bdag nyid rnye pa lags
70b4(rgyud): 'tsho//de dag thams cad rgyas pa sbyar//'di kun yang dag bshad pa ni//zhe ba'i rgyal po'i rnam 'phru bo yin//sabacu gnas kya dbang phrug dang //phreng yang sus
70b5(rgyud): nus pa// kun med bsrung na//dran pa ni 'i ga basmra /chu brgya ba dag bas pa ga/rdzogs sa sa rgyas btug skye ste//de yi/nas
70b6(rgyud): me//gang ni'i //hUM y-i na sa skyeng pa'i bya//'jigs pa thams cud la rigs 'ang//bzhig stan+dan yang ni 'dzugs par byed//
70b7(rgyud): yang nid ni thams cad 'dod//'jigs pa 'din thams cad dang //sdig pa thams cad kun rgya la khrigs//'di ni drad pa 'ba' zhig gis//de dag tham mo cad med pa/
71a1(rgyud): 'gyur//'jigs pa thams cad 'khrigs pa dang //thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor bltas na//sa stongs yod na mchog tu 'do//byang chub snyomasu dpang
71a2(rgyud): thams cad kyang //ngo mtshor sbyin rgyas pa phyed nas//rdo rje 'dzin pa blo ldan gyis//snyan pA yi ni tshig gis gsol//dpa' bo sems dpa' chen po legs//rdo rje'i rigs
71a3(rgyud): las yang dge 'byung //byas shes khyod ni sangs rgyas kun//rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sras gcig khyod//bdag nyid chen po mi g.yo ba'i//rtog pa 'di ru gsungs pa gang //gang
71a4(rgyud): gi lag tu chud gyur pa//de yi lag na dngos grub gnas//yon tan bsam mi khyab ldan pa'i//bsam gyis mi khyab sgrub pa'i thabs//ngo mtshar du ma dang ldan pa//gsang
71a5(rgyud): sngags 'di ni 'chad pa bo//bdag cag kyang ni de bka' nyan//lha dang lha min bcas pa'i klu//rgyab phyogs rje su 'brang po ni//sngags pa del 'byung bar 'gyur//sems can
71a6(rgyud): thams cad skal bzangasu//mnyes dga' bar ni 'byung bar 'gyur//bgegasu gyur pa thams cad ni//sngags pa'i bka' bsgri byed par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan
71a7(rgyud): 'das kyis bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje kun tu 'bar bar byed pa'i me lce 'byung ba zhes bye ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//bcom ldan 'das
71b1(rgyud): snyoms par zhubs ma thag tu/de nas re shig sangs rgyas zhing 'di nyid 'gul/rab tu 'bul/kun tu rab tu 'bul/g.yos rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yas/lde pa rab tu
71b2(rgyud): ldog kun tu ldeg/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur//kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/tshamatsha ma rab tu tshim tsham/kun tu rab tu chem chem mo//de nas shig sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid
71b3(rgyud): bgegs thams cad dang /log par 'dren pa rnams dang /gang yang kha cig 'di ni gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa gzhan gyi srog 'phrog cig blugs tshol ba'i srin po dang //
71b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i gzugs can log par 'dren pa de rnams rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis sreg cing gnas pa yis/gang yang sangs rgyas chos la ni//gus pa yis ni skyab
71b5(rgyud): song ba pa//gang zhig skye bo de lus la//sdug bsngal ci yang yod me yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/sngar med
71b6(rgyud): pa ya bgegs kyi gzugs//bsgrub bya ba yi cho ga ni//phyag na rdo rje tshur la nyon//mi shes pa yis sems bsgribs pas//rgyud ni mi shes par 'gyur ba//de ni bge/
71b7(rgyud): kyis zil mnan cing //'dir ni sdigs la dad ldan na//sel ba ru ni gyur pa ste//yangs pa yi ni mchog tu gyur//las kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu ni//legs byas nyes byas
72a1(rgyud): de bzhin du//log pa'i rgyal po zil mnan cid //de dag thams cad mnyes par byed//log pa'i kun rtog mang po yis//dmyal bar myur du skye bar 'gyur/
72a2(rgyud): ltas ngan las kyi 'bras bu kun//de nas gse smad yod ma yin//de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis lo gtugs nas bcom ldan
72a3(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsal//bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/bgegs rnams kyi sngan med pa'i gzugs gyur pa//me
72a4(rgyud): 'ongs pa'i byis pa'i sems can rnams shes rab chung bas babregs rnams sngar med pa 'byung ba'i rgyu mi 'tshal bas na de rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/gtso bos bshad du
72a5(rgyud): gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/babrags rnams zhags pas bcings pas ni//sngon gyi las la
72a6(rgyud): ngag las yin//ser sna sems pa'i sbyor ba yis//'dod pa'i dngos po la gnod pas//sems kyi rtog pa'i skyon gyis ni//sngags pa la ni bgrogs skye 'gyur//de
72a7(rgyud): rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir//se mos ni byang chub btad par bya//bgegs rnams thams cad rnam par 'jog/thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba'i zam//gang yang
72b1(rgyud): stsog pa cung chudang//zlog mdu srad pa nal tshad ldan//byung chubasems ma sa sgo//de dag thams cad bad par 'gyur//byang chub sems ni sems chen pa//sems kyinyis pa/
72b2(rgyud): rnam par spang sa/thig ma med pa'i stog pa'i sgod//nAg sa ma rnams mya las sreg par 'byung //sregs pas sems la mkhas pas na//lus rnams thams cad skrag pa
72b3(rgyud): 'gyur//'di ltar byang chub sems 'dzin na//'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur//gang zhig byang chub sems bskyed pa//dogs med dri ma med cing bstan//the tsam
72b4(rgyud): med pa nyid du ni//de yo dngos grub lag na gnas//byang chub sems ni ma bskyed cing //dad dang brtson 'grus rnam par spangs//skyes bu bka' bsgo byed pa ni//'dis ni dngos
72b5(rgyud): grub yod ma yin//phyag na rdo rje byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa dam tshig 'dis spre prA s+t+ra sgrub sen//bgegs rnams gegs byed par mo 'gyur te/de ci'i phyir
72b6(rgyud): na/phyag na rdo rje de ni lho dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os yino//slar brjed cing dgongs te bgegs drang log par 'dren pa dang //gnod sbyin dang sra
72b7(rgyud): po dang //dri ba dang yid pas dang /sha za rnams shin tu rgyang ring po nas sa steng su sngags 'chang ba mthong bas spro ba bskyed de phyag byedado//spyan rnams thams cad rnam par
73a1(rgyud): grol//bsod nams thams cad shin tu bsags//byang rgyab tshogs ni yang dag ldan//tha ma sangs rgyas kun+da dang mnyam//de nas phyag na rdo rjes
73a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na bgegs kyis sngar gyi gzugs rnams sgrub po la sbyor ba po la ji ltar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das
73a3(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal bya//gsang ba'i bdag po gang gi tshe sngags pa bgegs kyis zil gyis mnan pa de'i tshe rims dang tshad pa'i nod dang /bkres skum du gyur cing snyoms las la
73a4(rgyud): dga' la nges pa log ste the tsom za bar 'gyuraro//nad dang 'tshe ba dang bdag nyid kyi lha kha phyir bltas shing lha rnams ni dmigs kyis sel bar byed pa de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag po sngags
73a5(rgyud): pa bgegs kyis zil gyis mnan pa yin par rig par bya'o//gsang ba'i bdag po de'i tshe slob dpon gyis bgegs thams cad bzlogs par byed pa khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo mgon po
73a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bris te/bgegs thams cad bcom nas dbang bskur bar bya'o//de la gsang ba'i bdag po dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin to//khor yug du mi khru bzhi ste/
73a7(rgyud): kha khyer kun nas 'khor yug tu'o//rdo rje bcings pa'i sbyor ba nyid//rdo rje phan tshun bcings sbrel bya//khru brgyad dang ni bzhi dang ldan//bcu dang bcu drug pa nyid dam/
73b1(rgyud): khru glad 'am ni khrug nyis pa//de lhur sbyor ba mdzes par bya//deng+ka sgo gcig pa yin to//rdo rje'i bur ni sbyar bar bya'o//rdo rje'i ba kun tu bskor//dkyil 'khor dam pa bro bar bya//
73b2(rgyud): dedoyod su dpa'i ba ni//pad ma'i stong ni yang dgra bzhugs//de yo sher du sangs rgyas kyi//yum nI nA mkha'i spyan yin no//de y-i ga yon du d+hi byA ba//na mkha'i dri med rdo rje
73b3(rgyud): g.yas kyi phyogs shugs chen po//'phro ba rdo rje phreng ba can//dpa' bo chen po g.yon phyogs//rdo rje phyags can rdo rje can//dpa' bo chen po g.yas ngos//khro chen snyoms
73b4(rgyud): tshul zhes bya ba//'og gi ngosgyu mgon po ni//mi g.yo ba ni stobs chen po//khro bo chen po ral gri'i phyog/khams gsum rnams ni gcod par byed//sgo yi phyog su bri
73b5(rgyud): byug/mthong dka' mngon phyogs de bzhin//de ltar 'di dag kun byas na//kha dog nag dang dmar po ru//khro bo'i gzugs ni gzhag nas//bum pa rnams ni mngon pa
73b6(rgyud): bsngags//khe na bal la lo sogs rgyun//kha nas sa bon gyis bkang ste//mgrin pa gos kyis yang dag bsgyings//me tog rgyun 'byung nye bar smras//rin chen sna
73b7(rgyud): 'bru ste lnga//sman chen po ni yang dag ldan//dri chu yis ni rab tu bkang //lha rnams thams cad dgod par bya//dri dang me tog sogs dge bos//ji ltar rnyed pas mchid
74a1(rgyud): bya//mau da yAM bdag nyid chen po yi//dbang skur ba ni rab tu bya//de ru dkyil 'khor banyis pa ni//dkyil 'khor mngon par phyog+sa/sa de nas//kun nas glu
74a2(rgyud): bzhi pa yin te//khrud do pa'am khru bzhi pa//dbu su pad ma bri bar bya//bar du rdo rje rnams 'phrog/rdo rje'i phreng bas khor yug tu//rdo rje bcing bas bskor bar bya//de yi dkyil
74a3(rgyud): du bzhag nas ni//'dir ni 'bad pas dbang bskur bya//mi g.yo bdag nyid chen po yi//ral gri'i phyag rgya de nas bcing //snying kha nas ni snying khar sbyin//kun nas 'bar
74a4(rgyud): ba'i phreng ba can//bgegs rnams kun las rnam grol nas//rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dngos grub thob//ldog pa thams cad rnam par grol//bgegs ni thams cad rnam par spangs
74a5(rgyud): chos kun yon tan gyis brgyan pa//ji bzhin 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob//de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
74a6(rgyud): bshad du gsol/khro bo'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' bo sgo mdzad pa can mthu stobs chen pos gsang ba'i rtog pa gang gis sgrub pa po rnams la
74a7(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ba/sems can mang po'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba byed par 'gyur ba/bgegs thams cad rnam par spangs pa sngags
74b1(rgyud): kyang 'grub par 'gyur ba de bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol//bdo bar gshogs pa bshad du gas la//bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
74b2(rgyud): bka' stsal to//phyag na rdo rje legs leg so//lag ni rdo rjes slar yang legaso//khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir dang //ma 'ongs pa'i sems
74b3(rgyud): can gyi don gyi phyir khro bo'i rgyal po chen po thams cad du thogs pa med pa//brtul phong po/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjesu gnang ba//las thams cad byed par
74b4(rgyud): nus pa//dngos grub sgrub par byed pa yongasu 'dri bar byed pa legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang nga yis bshad//de la lag na rdo rje slob dpon de bzhin gshegs pa'i
74b5(rgyud): gogi 'phang la gnas pas khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya ste//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhi yis rnam par rgyan//de la bcom ldan dpa' bo che//
74b6(rgyud): sA ni thams cad yang dag ldan//de yi ga yas da g.yon ngo//na mkha' dri med shugs chen po//rdo rje 'dzin pa gnyis brib+ha/'og tu khro za chen po ni/
74b7(rgyud): gal ba ni stobs pa che//phyog na ral gri khur gyis gtsigs//'chi bdag mthar byed mngon sum bzhin//me yi dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa//rlung dang sbyin cig sbyang
75a1(rgyud): /ma khasrA p+na sad+d+ha d+ha sa /b+h+ra mA d+hats+tshadum+b+ha rgyud nas//ma tu shos rnams da rgyas//sngags pas myangon par dbang bsku/
75a2(rgyud): byug rgya de ni bdag nyid kyis//slob dpo ni b+h+yo dang ldan pa yi//b+h+ra ma lanI yon phul nas//sbyin skyede las ni yang dge brnamari 'i skye mor gyur pa dang //
75a3(rgyud): lhas myo gram pa'i mdol mo//me ni gnas pa nyid dag gem//du khrid dang ni gzhi gnas//sku mo'i zas ni bab dang //yang na mdab ma bcos pa nyid//dben
75a4(rgyud): gnasu mi sgribs//'brum phyug ba sam du bzlas brjod pa//sin+na du bsten pa bshad pa yin//mtshan mchog bzhin shes nas//mkhas pas dngos grub sgrub
75a5(rgyud): par byed//ral gri'i cho ga bzhin bya ba//tshig gas med pa sa bcu po//mthe'u chung sor gnyis dang bcas pa//grub pa'i rang bzhin shing las byas//lte bar rnam
75a6(rgyud): pabasna tshogs bri//ba yi rnam lngas bkrus nas//dri dang me tog sogs kyis mchod //sngags pas dkyil 'khor bI sa na su//snga ma de bzhin de bsgrub bya//sngags
75a7(rgyud): pas pad ma'i stan gnas te//ral gri yu ba nas thogs pa//khro bo spo bar ldan pa yi//gsang sngags g.yeng ba med par bzlas//mtshan mo phyed dam yang ne de
75b1(rgyud): nyim shar ba'i dus nyid du//ral gri rab tu 'bar gyur nas//thams cad du ni snang bar byed//rlon pa las ni dzes nas//namA kha' spyod yul dab tu 'gyur//bar gyi skal bar
75b2(rgyud): kun tu gnas//rab da dus na 'tsho bar 'gyur//ge 'dzin rgyal po kuni de ni//rig pa 'dzin pa kun gyis mchod//mi gzhon pA sna chags pa yi chags ni 'a
75b3(rgyud): pa yin//de nas zhags pa sgrub par 'dod na sngar bzhin du 'bum phrag gi sum bzlas nas//de bzhin du gser ram dngul lam zangs kyi ring bzhin gyi zhags pa byas te/
75b4(rgyud): mtshan ma shes nas dkyil 'a khor byis te//bsgrubs na de bzhin du rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyis bskul par gan so//de ltar
75b5(rgyud): ral gri dang /rgyal mtshan dang /nor bu dang /giwa~M wa dang /gdugs dang lcags kyu bsgrubs par gyur na de bzhin du 'grub bo//de nas rgyal po dbang du bya bar 'dadzin
75b6(rgyud): ku sha'i rang bzhin la gzugs pan+d+han+yA d+has nas rkang pa g.yon pas minan la ji smad rgya mi phyi rang nyid 'das nas la khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur pa de srid dro bzlas pa
75b7(rgyud): denas lnga sgrub par 'dod na thang shing go rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan byas la/ji srid du lha 'ongs kyi bar de srid du bzlas pa bya'o//'ongs nas spro ba sgrub par byed sngags po
76a1(rgyud): gang 'dod pa de gnang bar stor//de bzhin du k+Sha sgrub par 'dod pas nAg go sar gyi shing las klu'i gzugs brnyan byas nas sngar gyi bzhin du 'dum
76a2(rgyud): phrag gsum bzlas te//ji srid du klu thams cad dbang du gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o//de bzhin du gnod sbyin sgrub par 'dod par bser las gnod sbyin gyi zugs
76a3(rgyud): byas la sngar bzhin 'bum phrag gsum bzlas te ji srid du gnod sbyin thams cad 'ongs te bka' bsgo sgrub par byed pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//de nas dri za sgrub par 'dod
76a4(rgyud): pas 'od ma'i rang bzhin las dri za'i gzugs brnyan byas la sngar bzhin du 'bum phrag gsum bzlas te ji srid du dri za 'ongs nas smra ba sgrub par 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du
76a5(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o//de bzhin du na mkha' lding sgrub par 'dod pas 'joms pa'i rang bzhin las na mkha' lding byas la sngar bzhin du 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na nam
76a6(rgyud): mkha' lding thams cad bka' stsal pa bzhin bye do//de ltar srin po sgrub par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi sol bas srin po'i gzugs bris la/rkang pa g.yon pas
76a7(rgyud): mnan te ji srid du srin po thams cad smra bar sgrub par byed pa de srid du ba zlas pa bya'o//de ltar skyes pa dang bud med rnam ca kun tu sbyar na de bzhin du sgrub po//de ltar la/
76b1(rgyud): nadu dza ny-i ltar khro ba rgyal po 'di sbyar na do ltar la sothams cad spyod do//thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i mthu chen po khra na' rgyas mtshan po 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes sa
76b2(rgyud): gnang par gyur las thams cad yang dag par ldan pa bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'di la rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga sbyar bar bya'o//byang chub tu sems
76b3(rgyud): ma bskyed pa dang /ma dad pa dang /som nyo za ba rnams spangs nas gnang ba thob par gyur pas rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga sbyar bar bya'o//dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang /bsad pa dang
76b4(rgyud): skems pa rnams la ji lta ji ltar kun tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar don yod pa thogs pa med pa 'di sbyar bar bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan
76b5(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs dang ni//bgegs kyi sngon gyi gzugs brnyan rnams//bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//bsgra
76b6(rgyud): par bya mo'i tshi ga bgegs ni sna tshogs nyon cig/rtag tu sems ni g.yang 'gyur zhing //gsang sngags rnams ni kha phyir blta//bezlas pa bsam gtan dga' ba min//
76b7(rgyud): gnas dang lha yi las rnams dang //sbyin sreg dbang bkur las dang ni//lce rnams kha ni phyi ru blta//sngags pa bgegs la mngon par 'tshe//yi dam med par gyur/
77a1(rgyud): pa dang //yul gzhan gyi ni rnam par rtog/rnam rtog mang po 'byung ba dang //dad pa med cing snyoms lngas tshe//de bzhin yan lag 'bigs par
77a2(rgyud): byed//dus kyis dbang gis rnam par bsgyings//khro bo can ni nyid du byung //the tsom dag ni skye 'gyur zhing //slar yang de yi dngos grub med//de la sogs pa'i
77a3(rgyud): skyon rnams ni//bgegs kyi gzugaso bstan pa yin//rtsod dang brang 'gro klu dang ni//ya mo sa ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang //rims dang tshad nad bgegs kyis
77a4(rgyud): gogau nyen//de bzhin du ni sgrub pa po//gza' yi dkyil 'khor dge ba ru//dbang ni rab tu bskur bar bya//de ltar sbyangs pa'i sngags pa yis//bgegs rnams
77a5(rgyud): thams cad 'jigs med pa ra//slar yang rung gi yi dam lha//sbyin sreg dang bcas bsgom par bya//til rnam so dang ni mur rnams ni//mnyam par bzhag
77a6(rgyud): pas stong phrag sreg/gsang sngags kyis ni tshim bya zhing //sbyin bsreg cho ga bzhin du bya//mngon par 'dod pa sgrub pa'i phyir//slar yang mnyes pa 'artsam
77a7(rgyud): par bya//de nas yang ni rdo rje 'dzin//bcom ldan slar yang bka' stsal pa//bgegs rnams snga na med pa'i gzugs//phan pa'i yid kyis tshur la nyon//dkyil
77b1(rgyud): 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs la yang //cho ga'i las rnams sbyar bar bya//gang tshe ngo mtshar can gyi las//sngags pa mkhas pa yis ni bya//gang gis skyon dang ldan pa yi//bgrog/
77b2(rgyud): dang lo ga par 'dren pa rnams//sems can rnams la bgegs byed pa//mi bzad 'jigs pa 'jigs par byed//gnas sogs cho ga nyams pa dang //de bzhin lha nyid
77b3(rgyud): gzir ba dang //sngags rnams 'gom par byed pa'i don//bdag nyid chen po gzi brjid 'bar//gang du gtor ma'i cho ga las//cho ga bzhin du gyur par bya//gang du mchod
77b4(rgyud): pa byas gyur dang //gang zhig brnyas pa zhi bar 'gyur//rlung char de bzhin sol ba dang //yi ge hUM gi sgra sgrogs shing //gnas gcig lhur ni sgra 'byin dang //glog 'khyug pa yi
77b5(rgyud): sgra dang ni//me yis sreg cing cher 'jigs pa'i//glang chen mi zad sgra skad 'don//bong buM rnga mo spre 'dra ba//shin tu mi bzang ro langs rnams//hA ha'i sgra ni rab tu
77b6(rgyud): sgrigs//'bar ba'i ma yis dkrigs pa'i 'od//rlung gi dkyil 'khri gzugs can rnams//la lar mtshad nas 'bar zhing 'byung //seng ge'i sgra ni sgra chen+da po//sna/
77b7(rgyud): tshogs gzugs can rnam par 'phrul//skrag pa yang ni bskyed par byed//mi g.yo ba ni stobs po che//khro bo'i rgyal por rab tu sbyar//nus pas yang ni 'joms pa/
78a1(rgyud): byed//sngags kyis rmongs par byed 'gyur zhing //mi bzad pa rnams rengs par byed//yi ge ha yi gzugs can dbyibs//me yi tshul ltar rigs
78a2(rgyud): pa ste//brtson chen thams cad dmar po ste//khro dang bcas pa ral gri'i phyag/gdugs pa thams cad bsdigs mdzub pa//g.yon pa'i phyag na zhags pa rnams//
78a3(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i dkyil na bzhugs//bskal pa'i me ni bzhin du gnas//spyi sgra phaT kyi sgra dang bcas//mche ba gtsigs shing zur maug gzigs//gdug pa thaMd
78a4(rgyud): phyogs bcu ru//yi ge hU~M ni khro bo bcu//phyogs kun tu ni brlag par 'gyur//hUM hA rab tu sgrogs par byed//rdo rje'i me yis bsregs pa dang //phan tshun du ni
78a5(rgyud): 'tshe 'gyur zhing //phyogs kun tu ni brlag par 'gyur//bdag nyid rnal 'byor la gnas ni//dpa' bo chen po'i go 'phang 'thob//khro bo'i rgyal po rab tu sbyar//bge
78a6(rgyud): dang log 'dren thams cad la//yi ge hA ni me yi tshul//mngon sum bzhin du 'joms par byed//yi ge hUM gi sgra dang ldan//log par 'dren pa thams cad 'joms
78a7(rgyud): yi ge hUM ni rlung gi tshul//sprin rum gtigs pa mnyam pa'i 'od//sprin gyi yi ge hUM'ur gyis//gdug pa thams cang 'thor bar byed//yi ge ha ni me yi tshul//rab
78b1(rgyud): tu 'bar rdo rje'i phyag/yi ge hUM gi sgra dang ldan//lta stangs thams cad bsdu bar bya//bdag nyid yi ga har byas nas//thams cad dmar zhing khros dang bcas//'jigs pa
78b2(rgyud): sgra can cher 'jigs pa//phyag na zhags pa khros dang bcas//sngags 'chang zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya//bgegs
78b3(rgyud): rnams thams cad bkug nas ni//bcings nas rab tu bsgrag par bya//yang na bgegs rnams thams cad la//shin tu gtum zhing khros pa yis//de rnams kyi ni gzugs
78b4(rgyud): byas te//zhags pa'i phyag rgyas bkug na su//brdeg par bya zhing rtog par bya//bcad pa dang ni bsreg par bya//bgegs rnams thams cad brlag par 'gyur//tshangs pa mdun
78b5(rgyud): naM gnas gyur kyang //de ma thag tu byer nas ni//the tsam med par 'tsho bar 'gyur//yang na babregs rnams thams cad ni//gdul ba slar yang bshad par bya//sA la bgegs//
78b6(rgyud): ni b+his na su//mgo bo rkang pasau mnan cing gzir//nyen nas rab tu'i ngar gyur te//the tsom med par 'chi bar 'gyur//yang na bgegs rnams thams cad ni//tshar bcad
78b7(rgyud): pa ni slar yang bshad//'jim pa yi ni rang bzhin las//de yi gzugs brnyan byas nasu//sngags pas de ni mes gdungs na//'di ni myur du bsregs pas 'dzin//brgya
79a1(rgyud): byin dang mtshungs bgegs kyang ni//de yi mod la myur du 'gro//de bzhin nyid du bgegs gzhan rnams//thun mong du ni yang bshad bya//sdugapa/
79a2(rgyud): pas khrus dang bcas pA yis//de rnams gzugs ni yang dge bya//spyi tshe dang ni drug gis bsku//lan tshwas kyang ni byug par bya//me laM yang ni bsregs pa yi//
79a3(rgyud): de yi mod la myur du 'tshig/yang ni baglegs rnams thams cad ni//phur bus gdab pa slar yang bshad//de yi gzugs brtson byas nas//rdo rje phur bus ga
79a4(rgyud): par bya//btab pas rab tu ni 'gyur zhing //the tsom med par 'chi bar 'gyur//yang na bgegs rnams thams cad kyi//rengs pa yang ni bshad par bya//
79a5(rgyud): yi gzugs bstan byas nasku//lus la ri rab rnam par bsam//cog brgyad dang ni ldan pa yi//rdo rjes yang dag mnan par bya//de nas rab tu zhi 'gyur zhing
79a6(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur ba tho tsam med//lha dang mtshungs pa'i bgegs rnams kyang //myur du mi g.ye brtan par gnas//de nas kun gyis kun thams cad//sgyu ma
79a7(rgyud): las ni khyad par bya//de yi gzugs brnyan byas nasu//sbyin sreg las ni yang dge brtsam//mtshon gyis btub cing bcad na su//rkang pa nas brtsams
79b1(rgyud): sbyin srog rgyu//bcad par gyur pas de ma thag/bdag par 'gyur bar rten ma med//de ltar kun lagan tu no//ma ngas pas las ni bya bstan//kha chog gdug pa'i sems
79b2(rgyud): sa//bgegs rnams thams cad badrug par 'gyur//bdag cing gcod par phred bya mo 'dibs//'jigs shing de bzhin rtogs par byed//sreg dang gang yang tshar gtsang
79b3(rgyud): snuzhan//byu chub sems kyis rgyan pa so//sngags pas de dag thams cad bya//shin tu gdug pa'i sems rnams ni//pha rol srog nI gcod par byed//sems can ma
79b4(rgyud): ninam par 'chi//gang zhig phan pa nyid kyi gzhi//snying rje chen po bskyed na su//sangs rgyas chos ni dzas dran par//sangs rgyas kun gyis ji bzhin brjod//gdug pa'i
79b5(rgyud): ni bya ba yin//de nas dpal ldan rdo rje tshong //ngo mtshur sbyin byergyas pa yis/chos kyi dbang phyug rdzob pa sa//snyan pa'i chog gis bka' stsal pa//A ma hi sangs
79b6(rgyud): tshwas bsam mi khyab//sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyod//sems can mi phan byed pa yi//ji srid ming ni bgags na su//de srid blo ni ngan 'gro yi//phan dang
79b7(rgyud): mi 'an rnam rtog rnams//mnor med sdug bsngal gzhon paru//rab tu zhugs na so 'gro bar 'gyur//de nas phyag na rdo rje sgra ra yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di snyed
80a1(rgyud): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rje su gnang bar gyur pa sngags dang phyag rgya dang sngags
80a2(rgyud): kyi rim par phye ba gang myur ba nyid du phyag rgya'i mtshan mas mtshan pa//lha thams cad dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po rnams lhan cig sbyar bas las thams cad byed par
80a3(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i don yod cing thogs pa med par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
80a4(rgyud): to//leg so lagaso//lag na rdo rje slar yang legaso//de legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang /ngas khyod la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das la legs so
80a5(rgyud): zhes phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di nyon cig ces bka' stsal te/rkang pa mnyam par gzhig pas gnas//phyag
80a6(rgyud): 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar//mthe bo dag ni gnas byas nas//sangs rgyas thams cad gdud par bya//rdo rje bkod pa'i sbyor ba yis//thal mo steng du brkyang bar bya
80a7(rgyud): slar yang mdun du bya ba yin//slar yang thal mo sbyar byas nas//rgyab nyid du ni bzhag par bya//thal mo bkod pa'i sbyor ba yis//slar yang mdun du bya ba yin//
80b1(rgyud): khros pas hUM gI b+hU sgrogs shing //bdud kyi rigs la bsngags par bya//rkang pa bkod pa'i sbyor ba yis//lag pa dag ni gnyi ga yang //gnyis ka'i bsdigs mdzub sbyar
80b2(rgyud): bA yis//bshegs dang log par 'dren pa rnams//gdug pa thams cad kun 'byung ba'o//bsdigs mdzub kyis ni 'byor bar 'gyur//slar yang rkeng pa dgrad nas//
80b3(rgyud): darje'i sa gzhi bzhag par bya//sa ga rimi bdun par du ni//thams cad du ni sbyar bar bya//lag pa sgyur ba'i sbyor ba yis//rkang pA ya gtsigs la gnas//de bzhin
80b4(rgyud): dum bu pa maru//bag gas rnams thams cad 'joms par byed//ma basmr-iHma~M b+ha la rab tu sbyar//dkon mchog gsum gyi ral gyi 'byung //gang zhig bkod pa'i
80b5(rgyud): yi//blad la yongasu bskor bar bya//yi ge hUMg sgra sgrogs shing /ral gri phyag rgya'i tshong bar bya//gnyis pa shubs ky-i tsa ma nas//bstan lnga gnod
80b6(rgyud): pa dang //sngags pa thas ngan sku bor//gang da can gzhan la 'a//gang yang sprul smod par byed //lha dang gsang ba pa dang sprul//man mun po 'jigs
80b7(rgyud): rlung //de rnams thams cad gzhim par bya//gnod pa de me yin gnyis gsum//khros pa sa gal te bzad gisel na//gsang sdigs tshogs ni de mnyes na sa/
81a1(rgyud): ji bzhin 'dod pa'i dngos grub thab//slar yang rdo rje rkang pa yis//rkang pa mnyam par gzhag nas gnas//lag pa phan tshun khu tshur bcings//
81a2(rgyud): mdzub mo sbyar ba'i sbyor ba yis//dpral ba'i steng su bzlog la bzhag/rkang pa bkod de sbyar ba dang //ya sos ma mchu mnan te khros//'brug gi hUM ga sgra sgrogs pa/
81a3(rgyud): bgegs rnams thams cad 'gas par ni//yi gi hUM gis the tsom med//rdo rje'i lto stangs 'bar ba che//gdug pa thams cad rnam par 'joms//thig le zhes
81a4(rgyud): ni bsgrags pa yis//phyag rgya don kun sgrub par byed//sngags pa gang zhig sgrub pa yi//gang dang gang ni rab sbyar ba//de dang de ru don yod par//byed par 'gyur
81a5(rgyud): te the tsom med//rnga rje rkang pa'i sbyor ba yis//rkang pa steng du bdeg par bya//sangs rgyas kun la gus phyag byas//sor mo phan tshun khu tshur bcang //kha yi tshul
81a6(rgyud): du byas nas ni//kha yi thad kar sbyar bar bya//dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thobs dang ni//de bzhin du yang las rnams dang //phyogs kun las ni byung ba yi//spre/
81a7(rgyud): chen yang ni 'dus na su//'brug tshon sgra ni rab tu ldir//der yang glog ni 'khyug pa dang //sku chen po ni ha ha sgrogs//char gyi rgyun ni yang dag 'bab//dus
81b1(rgyud): mtha' lta bur yang dag byung //'di ni kha ru gzhug par bya//mi zad pa yi sku chen gyis//kha yi phyag rgya'ang 'dzin par byed//bzung ba tsam gyis brlag pa rgyu//ma lus pa na
81b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin//de nas khro bo rab 'bar ba//gzi brjid chen po zhal che ba//'di ni bkug nas zlo ba na//bgegs kyi rgyal po thams cad brlag/khro bo mi g.yo ba yi sku//
81b3(rgyud): jidzilta ji ltar rab sbyar na//'jigs pa'i gzugs can bgegs srin po//de lta de ltar brlag par 'gyur//ba yi phyag rgya sbyor ldan pas//sngags pas kun tu sbyar bar bya//
81b4(rgyud): 'di ni don yod thogs pa med//sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu mchod//slar yang rdo rje'i rkang pa sbyar//phyag 'tshal tha la mi spyi bor sbyar//sngon bzhin rkang pa mnyam
81b5(rgyud): byas nas//rkang pa bteganas g.yeng bar bya//lag pa yang ni phan tshun du//g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa na//zhags pa ral gri thogs nas/
81b6(rgyud): rdo rje dor nas yang dag gnas//g.yon pa sa yi cha la bzhag/g.yas pa mtshon chu dang bcas kyang //zhags pas bkug ste bzhag nas ni//ral gris gzugs brnyan
81b7(rgyud): bcing na ni//tshangs pa'am ni brgya byin yang //de ma thag tu myur bar gcod//'di dang dpal ldan zhags pa bsnam so//ral gri'i phyag rgya sbyar ba yis//sngags
82a1(rgyud): pas snar btsam gyis na//gdug pa thams cad bsgrub par bya//thal mo btab ste sgyur nas//'khor mo lta bu rab bsgyur nas//sngags
82a2(rgyud): bsarbAnar snying drangs nas ni//rkang pa sngar bzhin sbyar cir bya//da ge' tshal hUM y-i thal ba sbyar//byi na n+dan sa sar wa chur bcing //gnyis ka'i mdun
82a3(rgyud): sgyur/rdo rje gcig rnam par bya//gdun bathun lagadapa po dang //'jigs par mdzo dag pa po yid//bgags rnams thams cad ba ga
82a4(rgyud): srung ba la sogs rab tu sbya ro//la gA d+hi gnyis ni mnyam byas nas//khu tshur sbyar te bcing bar bya//gung ma ni ma spyad de skyer//mdzub marjerje'i rnam pa
82a5(rgyud): byu//gung mi la sbyar du ni//phyog rgya chen po phyag rgya ste//gdug pa thams cad badrug par byed//de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das
82a6(rgyud): zhebasuM gnyis mgri bas spyan 'tshal nas/barbam+b+ha ldan sal 'du ska cas shes pa te//bam ldan das me r+yata//ba bor gshegs par mtshar/
82a7(rgyud): stod panyid na yang ba'i thegs pa med pa skabs gnon pa'i khri ci'i skyil pa mi thebad pa'i phyag rgya sa ji sbyar sgrub pa pas sbyar bdi lta de ltar dngas grub sbyar bar byung pa/ /
82b1(rgyud): thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i'o khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rtag pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir bdag kyang bshad par 'chal
82b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lag na rdo rje gang de'i dus lnga ba zla bar sems na shod cig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das
82b3(rgyud): kyi gnang ba theng ste/bsam pa thams cad la mnyes pa shin pa'i ral pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog sna
82b4(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas re shig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang ba chen pos snang ba
82b5(rgyud): byas te sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdo rje 'chang gi skus gang bar byas nas phyogs bcur bskor te/slar yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis skul zhugs par gyur/rba
82b6(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po chen po'i sgrub thabs gyur pa rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams nyon cig/lo 'dra ba la sogs pa za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pa bya'o//de nas zhag gsum 'dun
82b7(rgyud): nas ras ris kyi mdun du mchod pa chen po byas te/de'i mdun du nim pa'i yam shing gi me sbar te mar gyis btags pa'i yungs kar dkar po snying po'i sngags kyis steng
83a1(rgyud): drug brgyad sbyin sra b+h+yas te sngun du bskrun pa byas pas+ho//de la lta ba'i rgyal ba chen pa'i sgrub thazlas ni 'di yin to//dkyil 'khyor hrIs nas
83a2(rgyud): ral gri'i bran rgya bcings twa//sbrul krung bcas nas dzaM srid du rig pa 'dzin par gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byar//rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bskal
83a3(rgyud): bar gnas la 'dad pa'i 'chi ba'i dus medi/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du spyod la/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing sem+b+has can thams cad
83a4(rgyud): dan byed de//slar yang 'bum breg gasnam bzlas pa byas na gang 'ad pa'i chos rnams thams cad byed//tshig rnal mar babs//shing sprul bar byed//
83a5(rgyud): na mkha' nas 'dreb chags ltung bar byed//'tshe'u snyoms par byed //rlung gzhan du byed//thA dag zas ben pa'i nub mo 'dug nas bal+lI sa lo lhung bsodakyi
83a6(rgyud): 'khor byas la dri zhim po'i me tig bsil ma bkrams te raswA bris som shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam+bA b+hI s+thAnA sngar se'i dang rigs 'thun po'i mar srang ga
83a7(rgyud): ngas mo'i snod du bcug ste sang ldeng gi me sbar te gdung zhing bzlas pas dngos grub gsum 'byung //de nas ri'i rtse mar gnas bcas te/sa mi za bar bcwa
83b1(rgyud): ba'ajam byas nas gad+har mthong bar 'gyur//phrugs ngas zhi bar 'dod na'ama'o bsreg blugs stong phrag gcig bsdogs pas zhi bar 'gyur//rdza dun pa mngan gsum gyis
83b2(rgyud): btags nas sbyin bsreg 'bum byas na phrugs ngas ches chen po zhi bar 'gyuraro//pad ma rnams zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags te/sbyin sreg 'bum byas na mtsha
83b3(rgyud): gsol ba gsum mthong bar 'gyur ro//rgya mtshor 'gro ba na chu klung gi chu'i nang du zhugs te/'bum phrag gsum bzlas na yul du phyin par 'gyuraro//ji lta ba'i kha dog
83b4(rgyud): gri me tog bsregs na de lta bu'i kha dog gis gos rnyed par 'gyur//saM ba bsregs pas so bad mi zad par 'gyur//nas kyi skyon sreg gis khyim bdag chen por 'gyur
83b5(rgyud): bri yang kus dbang du byed//spros shing gIs la khor g.yog mang bar 'gyuraro//mngar gsum gyis btags pa'i dril ba'i 'bras bus sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal bar
83b6(rgyud): 'gyuraro//ras ris kyi cho ga ji bzhin pa ni 'di yin te 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhal gcig pa dpa' bo gcig pa na bza' ngur smrig banabs pa/zur mig gis gzigs pa'i phyag na
83b7(rgyud): ral gri dang zhags pa bsnabs pa/khra gnyer rim par ldan pa'i zhal 'jig rten gsum 'jigs par mdzad pa ngur smrig panabs pa bri bar bya'o//de nas rgya mtshor sango sbyar
84a1(rgyud): /zas bkram nas lus la gos gtsang mu bgos te/dwags pa myed cing lkug pa slong mo za bas 'bum phrag lA bzla'o//tha ma'i nyin zhag 'dug nas/
84a2(rgyud): tsanA ka'i lam shing gis khri phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na mi g.yo ba mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa yang nye bar spyod la ting 'dzin rnyed nas byang chub sems dpa' ting
84a3(rgyud): 'dzin thob par 'gyur//yang na dur khrod kyis ras la 'phags pa mi g.yo mgon po bris la bdag nyid kyi khrag gis spyan phye ba bri bar bya'o//sgrub pa po shar du phyogs
84a4(rgyud): te phyi nas ras bris kha sprod du dgram ste dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos rlon pa bgos te lkug pas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o//mar de'i tshes brgyad kyi zhog
84a5(rgyud): 'dug ste 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma byin nas rin po che'i steng du khri phrag gcig bzlas pa bya'o//de nas ro de'i lus 'gul bar 'gyur te 'jigs par mi bya
84a6(rgyud): da nas kha'i nang du pad ma kha bye ba'i lte ba mthong bar 'gyur//blangs nas bzung bas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing lha'i gzugs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tu
84a7(rgyud): spyod do//yang na ras bris kyis mdun du zla ba drug tu thun gsum du bzlas shing ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas shing a ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs na yul
84b1(rgyud): bdag por 'gyuraro//rgyal mtshan la stong phrag gcig bsngags nus dmag gri sngon du bzung na pha rol gyi dmug tshogs g.yul nyes par 'gyuraro//dmag chags rengs
84b2(rgyud): bar 'dod pas sku chen po sku mdog ser po zhal bzhi la phyag bzhi pa mdog mi sdug pa mtsha ba gtsigs shing 'jig su rung ba 'bar ba'i phreng ba dkrigs pas pha rol gyi
84b3(rgyud): dpung bzung ba lta bur bsam pa'am/bris nas bstan na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rengs par 'gyur ro//rtsod par 'dod pas khA ta dang 'ug pa'i sgos sbyin bsregs byas na rtsod pa 'byung
84b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur//dgra bo myos par 'dod pas bsregs blugs 'bum phrag sbyin bsreg bya'o//sbyin sreg byas pas mi g.yo ba'i mngag gzhug pas 'gul nas bcings te/lho
84b5(rgyud): phyogasu khyer nas myos shing khrag tu skrag cing skrag par dgra'i lus bltas pas rigs brgyud dang bcas pa brlag par 'gyur ro//mi'i rus pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par
84b6(rgyud): bsngags nas btags na gang gi ming nas smos pa de'i mod du rims kyis btab par 'gyur//nim pa'i 'bras bu dug dang mar khwas btags nas sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma gsum
84b7(rgyud): gyis dgra bo brlag par 'gyuraro//tshwa dang 'jim pas dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas la myos byed kyi tsher mas bcugs te btubs shing bcad pa'i sbyin sreg byas na de ma thag tu brlag
85a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//dgra bo'i ming nas smos shing sal ma ri zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs pas dgra bo dbul por 'gyuraro//dbang du bya bar 'dod na lAn tshwar//
85a2(rgyud): rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan byas te bcad nas sbyin sreg byis na skyes bu chen po nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro//dza ti kha 'bus pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gnod sbyin mo
85a3(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur//'khrul byed kyi mdab mas sbyin sreg byas pas skyo bar 'gyuraro//lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gI lha'i bu mo yang bgugaso//gu gul gyi sbyin sreg gi rgyal po
85a4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro//ras bris gzhan gyi cho ga 'a de yin to/dbusu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub po/de'i g.ya su 'jam dpal rgyan thams cad kyi sa brgyan po/g.yon
85a5(rgyud): du rdo rje 'dzin pa zhal cung zad 'dzum pa phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa bri bar bya'o//de'i spyan sngar 'bum phrag lnga bzlas pas las thams cad byed nus par 'gyur te/pha rol
85a6(rgyud): gyi dmag tshogs la nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcings te khros paso yi ge hUM la sogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sngags bzlas pas dgra bo gdon chen pos
85a7(rgyud): 'dzin pa 'am nges par brlag par 'gyur//dur khrod kyi thal ba las lan 'bum bzlas na sa gang la sbyin pa de bran du 'gyuraro//gi wang la lan bdun bzlas nas thig le
85b1(rgyud): byas pas skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/zhing mi mthong bar 'gyur//bge bas thams cad dang lag par 'dron pa la sogs pa 'bar bar 'grub par 'gyur//bdag nyid la
85b2(rgyud): bkod nas dpag tshad brgya nus kyang tshangs pa dang srin po grol bar byed//sprul nag pos zin pa zla ba drug nas mnan par 'dod na khros pas ral gri'i phyag rgya bris la lto 'phye chen po'i
85b3(rgyud): rigs lhun gyis bskor te de nas ral gri la stong phrag gcig mngon par bsngags nas dbusu de lta bur 'bar ba 'dra bar dgod par bya ste de nad pa la bstan na nges nges 'jug/'a
85b4(rgyud): pa mi g.yo ba spyan cig pa'i snying po thun gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na rtag tu 'brel bar 'gyur//dben pa'i sa phyogasu zan gyi chang bu byin na mchog chen po rtsol bar 'gyur te/
85b5(rgyud): snying po'i phyag rgyo bcings te khros pas yi ge hU~M bzlas na sbyin dral bar byed do//tsher ma skye tshes btags pa'i sbyin bsreg byas na//rlung gi char pa gtum shing ltar 'jog/sgrub pa po
85b6(rgyud): la srung ba chen po byed//mi rnams rkang pa g.yon pa mnan pas bsgrubs na bka' nyon par 'gyur ro//lha dang mi rnams kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas bcad na 'chadang par 'gyuraro//
85b7(rgyud): lha dang mi thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas de lcags kyi phur bus btab na phur bus btab par 'gyuraro//de nas 'ching bar 'dod par gyur na skud pa sar po la mngon par
86a1(rgyud): bsngags te gzugs do dkris nas bcings par 'gyur//bcing por 'dod na lha la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan byas nas steng du spang lad kyis mnan btsir bar
86a2(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas brdeg par 'dod na mi la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan byas te ri 'u srud pus brabs na ngu zhing 'ongs nas bka' ba sgro byed do//gnon par 'dod na lha dang mi thams
86a3(rgyud): cad kyi gzugs brnyan byas te spang leb la sogs pas mnan na gnon par 'gyur//de ltar khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di ji lta ji ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar las gzhan ngo mtsha/
86a4(rgyud): /tsha ba yang stong phrag byed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes khrob 'i rgyal po chen po'i sngags bka' stsal pa//na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
86a5(rgyud): sarba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA a~M tsaN+Da ma~M hA ra Sha Na hUM tA Ta ma hA/tsar+N+Na a tsa la kA Na hU~M hU~M hUM a pra tI ha ta thA ga tA dz+nyA sma ra hUM phaT phaT swA hA//de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang khro bo
86a6(rgyud): chen po thogs pa med pa'i mchog gi snying po rapa'i bo gcig pa bka' stsal pa/nam s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nA/tA thA ga tA na hUM/byang chub song
86a7(rgyud): chen pa phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal ma thag tu/de nas skad cig de la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang ba chen pas snang bar byas nas de la 'jig rten gyi khams thang
86b1(rgyud): kyi gad dang bdud dang bdud chen po 'jig su rung ba'i gzugs can dag dang /klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa do khro bo chen po'i gzi brjid kyis bgrogs par gyur gAng dang gang rang rlung gi
86b2(rgyud): gnas der song ste/bcom ldan 'das bskyab du gsol//bde bar gshegs pa bsregs pa las bsgrub du gsol/da nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rang rang gi zhing rnams
86b3(rgyud): kyi bgegs dang dgegs chen po de dag la 'od skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag khro bo'i rgyal po chen po mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka'
86b4(rgyud): stsal pa mdzad pa/gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa dran par gyis shig/gzhan du khyed rnams kyi mgo ba phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rjes chal ba brgyar 'gems par 'gyur/
86b5(rgyud): gang zhig sgyu ma lta bur sems bskyed cing /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed cig/sems can sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba dran par gyis
86b6(rgyud): shig/rigs kyi bu khro ba'i rgyal po chen po sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba dran par gyis shig/de nas gdug thams cad khro bo'i rgyal po chen po de nyid la skyabs song
86b7(rgyud): ste/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sa'i phyog su nye bar song ste/gang na khro bo'i rgyal po chen po 'di nyid bzhugs pa de srung bar bgyi'o//nye bar dgos pa bskyed do//1ba
87a1(rgyud): 'tsho ba rnams cad kyang gzhom par bdu ma nas das tshig byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs dU du lhag sa nas 'dug so//de nas byang chub sems dab/
87a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes slar yang khro ba'i rgyal ba chen po spyod pa'i cho ga yang spyad pa pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/khro bo'i rgyal po chen po 'di gang lkugs pas mi
87a3(rgyud): bzlog par yal ga dang /rtsa ba dang /'bras bu za bA 'am/chu dang rung za bar gyur pa'i skye bos dben pa'i gan su bzlas pa bya'o//khro ba'i rgyal po don yod cing thogs pa med
87a4(rgyud): ba 'di dkon mchog gsum la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa nga rgyal che ba mngon po'i nga rgyal can gyi gdug pa'i smin pa la sogs pa sbyar bar bya'o//phan pa'i se
87a5(rgyud): kyis byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed par dang bas dkon mchog gsum la dang bar gyur par bsgrub par bya'o//rtog pa gzhan gyi tshogs kyang dman pa'i sems can sdug
87a6(rgyud): bsngal ba rnams ni sbyar bar mi bya'o//dkon mchog gsum la mos shing dad pa la khro bo'i rgyal po chen po sbyar bar bya'o//mtshams med pa lnga byed pas kyang gdon mi
87a7(rgyud): cho ge ji ltar mngon par 'dod po'i dngos grub thob zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso//de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //thugs rje dang ni ldan pa'i thugs//
87b1(rgyud): snyoms can khams ni ma lus pa//'di kun rnam par gzigs na su//'gro ba phan pa mdzad pa can//snyan pa yi ni tshig gis gsol//bcom ldan chos rnams thams cad
87b2(rgyud): kyis//khyod nyid gcig pu dbang phyug gtso//khyod nyid gcig pu kun mkhyen te//thams cad mkhyen pa'i na mkha' can//khyod ni skyob med sems can gyi//skyob pa dpung gnyen
87b3(rgyud): thams cad yin//sems can kun gyi khyod gcig pu//mchog tu mnyes bshin pa yi phra//nyon mongs nad rnams gso mdzad pa//sman pa'i rgyal po khyod gcig pu//
87b4(rgyud): khyod ni sems can thams cad kyis//gtso bo mchog tu gzhol ba yin//bdag la 'dir ni khyod gcig pu//gtso bo bdag la gzhan ma mchis//sems can rnams la
87b5(rgyud): phan 'dod pas//gang zhig bdag nyid khyod la zhu//thugs rje dang ni ldan pa'i thugs//mgon po de ni bdag la gsungs//sems can ji ltar bde bar 'gyur//ji
87b6(rgyud): ltar sdug bsngal brten can du//gang gis 'dir ni gyur pa yin//de rnams bdag la gtso bo sa gsungs//rgyal po mi rgo du chom rkun dang //de bzhin du ni me dang chu//
87b7(rgyud): nad dang mu ge bdud rnams dang //de bzhin dus min 'chi bas 'jigs//char ches pa dang char mi 'bab//rtag tu yams kyi 'tshe ba ste//mgon po 'di ru ji ltar yang //
88a1(rgyud): brgya la mi 'gyur ba zhig yin//dpal gyis mdzes par rgyan pa yi//dbang du bya ba nyid dang ni//sems can thams cad brtse bar ni//thams
88a2(rgyud): cad ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur//ngan dag ngan pa de ji ltar//ji ltar lus po dman par 'gyur//du bo'i mdog can drung hrung po//de nas g.yeng ba nyid dag ni//sngags
88a3(rgyud): pa dag la 'byung mi 'gyur//nye bar 'tshe ba rnam par spangs//'di kun ji ltar brtse ba legs//longs spyod dang yang longs spyod 'phel//nyal ba dang ni 'dug pa dang //'gro
88a4(rgyud): ba'am ni 'dug pa na//sngags pa ji ltar bde ba ru//da ni rtag tu 'gyur ba yin//de la lha ni sngon spyod cing //rjesu 'brel ba ji ltar 'gyur//las kyi dngos grub ji
88a5(rgyud): ltar ni//myur ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin//srin po lto 'phye grul bum dang //yi dwags gcin zin sbrul de bzhin//gzhan yang rtag tu mche bas 'debs//
88a6(rgyud): ji ltar 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'am//de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod kyi//las ni ji ltar myur grub nas//don yod par ni 'gyur ba
88a7(rgyud): lags//'di kun skal pa chen po ni//de ltar yang ni gsung bar rigs//chos kyi dbang phyug thub pa yis//'di skad kyi ni tshig gsan nas//phyag
88b1(rgyud): nardo rjengs chen la//bstan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa//leg so bu gcig dpa' bo che//phyag na rdo rje stob bo che//rdzu 'phrul tshe nyid slar yang logs//dra yi bstan la
88b2(rgyud): khyod nyid de//khyod nyid gcig pu bdag gis sras//rtag tu rdza su 'phel byed pa//nga yi bstan pa srung ba yang //khyod kyi yang dag lag na gnas//rgyal ba'i sras po khyod
88b3(rgyud): gcig pu//gtso bo dbang phyug kha lo bsgyur//khyod nyid gcig pu la rog lag/byang chub thams cad lag mthil gnas//gang zhig khyod kyis zhus pa yis//bu
88b4(rgyud): gcig 'di ni ngo mtshar to//gsang ba mchog gi smad du byung //ma lus pa ni bshad par bya//gang zhig bdag gi snying la gnas//de ni gzhan gyi byin gyis brlabs//
88b5(rgyud): chos rnams kyi ni bsang ba yang //de nas gzhan du mi gsungs pa//dpa' bo khyod la ma lus par//bshad par bya yis tshur la nyon//gang gis dngos grub myur
88b6(rgyud): thob pa'i//gsang ba gang zhig gnas pa yang //mchog gis gzugs can lhan cig tu//sa stengs 'dir ni rnam par gnas//gtsug lag khang ni sna tshogs
88b7(rgyud): mdog/de bzhin sna tshogs gzugs 'chang ba//rdzu 'phrul chen po mthu che ba//de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po 'chang //rgyal ba'i chos rnams yang dag ldan//dkon /
89a1(rgyud): mchog gsum la mchog tu bzhol//'di rnams mchod cid yang mats+tshed lnga//gnod pa byed pa sreg par 'gyur//de ni rgyal ba'i dngon pas byacing
89a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad dbang du byed//'khrigs pas brten par gyur pa dang //mi ni gang zhig sdig byed pa//tshangs spyod dang ni de bzhin gzhan//sa stengs skye bo gang/
89a3(rgyud): cung zad//'di kun 'dir ni rnam par 'tshe//lha rnams kyi yang de bzhin grong //gdug cing rnam par 'gyur ba'i la so//gnod sems bdag nyid rnam par 'tshe//
89a4(rgyud): brtan dang g.yo ba phyag 'tshal nas//'jig rten 'di ni rnam par spangs//sa stengs bstan pa ma gtogs par//de rnams bstan pa cung zad med//gang gis
89a5(rgyud): bde ba myong byed pa//khyod kyis kyang ni mnyan par rigs//sngags pas dang po kun byas nas//rdzogs sangs rgyas ni nyi ma'i 'od//kun mkhyen dbang phyug blo dang ldan/
89a6(rgyud): spros pa thams cad 'di las gzhan//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos//gdod nas zhi ba chen po'i gnas//skyon rnams thams cad rnam par grol//phun sum che
89a7(rgyud): pa thams cad byed//'di ni dkon mchog gsum gtso bo//bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed//gza' rnams gzugs dang mtshan ma dang //cha byad dang ni
89b1(rgyud): dpyongs nyid kyang //btan dang g.yo bas mi shes pa//bshad par bya yis bu khyod nyon//bdag gos ye shes gnas pa 'di//mdzes pa'i tshul chen rmad du byung //sa /
89b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu ni//bu gcig kho bos ma gsungs//gza' rnams kyi ni mchog gis gzugs//mchog tu rmad byung bas ma mi khyab//mchog tu mdzes par gyur pa ste/
89b3(rgyud): khros shing bzhin ma sdug pa yin//mdzes pa'i gzugs can la rten nas//rang nyid mdzes shing phan par gnas//gang tshe gzugs ni bsam mi khyab//mchog tu
89b4(rgyud): mdzes par 'gyur ba ste//de tshe 'di ni bsam mi khyab//drang srong bsam gtan spyod yul min//zhi ba sems can la bya zhing //khros pa nyid ni khros pa nyid//sems
89b5(rgyud): can la 'di zhi ba ru//de yi tshe na kun tu spyod//sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du//dge 'dun mkhas pa mchod byas na//de yi gzugs ni nyer mtshon te//de yi tshe na
89b6(rgyud): mchod par bya//zhi ba zhi pa shes par bya//rgyas pa yang ni rim ji bzhin//mngon spyod zhes bya ba 'di dang //dbang du bya ba'i gzugs mtshan nyid//'di dag thams
89b7(rgyud): cad mdor bsdus na//de ni rgyas par gsungs pa yin//shin tu mnyam par gzha ga mchod pas//zhi ba la sogs 'di yang min//phun sum tshogs pa kun
90a1(rgyud): byed pa'o//drokon mchog gsum no sngon du mchod//yod ni bsdams par gyur pa dang //dbang po lnga ni bsnams pa yis//dri ma dkar chen zhag du
90a2(rgyud): na//lus la bskos nas khrus kyis rgyan//shin tu dben zhing byugs med par//'di ni 'ong bar song nas ni//balci la so gas rtag tu byugs//dri yis nye bar byugs
90a3(rgyud): nas ni//kha dog ser dang dmar ba dang //dkar po 'am de bzhin ljang ku dang //nag po yang dag gsungs pa yin//kha dog yongasu bzung byas nas//mkhas pas ji
90a4(rgyud): ltar rig pa nyid//yid du 'ong ba'i dkyil 'khor bya//sangs rgyas ser po bye ba ste//chos ni dkar po nyid du bya//dge 'dun ljang kur bya ba ste//gsang ba 'di yang yang
90a5(rgyud): dag bsgrags//gza' rnams kha dog dbye ba yis//dkyil 'khor dag ni nye bar mtshon//mkhas pas de yi 'og tu ni//sngags pa'i lus ni rtag tu bya//phyag rgya
90a6(rgyud): 'chang ba'i phyogs bris te//rang gi phyag rgya kha dag mtshan//dkyil 'khor gyi ni chad dag ni//sor mo bcu drug rab tu grags//yang na gang ltar yid dga' ba//
90a7(rgyud): de ltar yang dag btsems par bya//kha dog ji ltar nyer mtshan pa//dri dang me tog la sogs dngul//mnyam par gzhag pas so so ru//'di rnams kyi ni gsang
90b1(rgyud): byag+ha//sems ni rtse gcig gyur pa yis//bde gshegs bdug nyid bsgoms nas//gza' rnams so sor mdun gnas nas//gsang sngags brjod par bya ba yin//
90b2(rgyud): de nas gsang sngags 'di yIs ni//ngasam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed//nA maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba sA bai rIng+ku ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA b+hik+ShI rA swA hA//sarba trA ya
90b3(rgyud): A di t+ya A su bi shud d+haHnyi ma dang /zla ba dang /rnon po dang /mig dmar gyi'o//b+hi bud+d+ha phaka/gza' lhog gi'o//e b+ho gA mya daM yaHphure bu'i'o//oM shub+d+ha d+hi ra ho pa
90b4(rgyud): sangs kyi'o//oM kriSh+Ta brta phuka/spen pa'i'o//oM bi kri ta bak+ta ru tsi swA hA//sgra gcan gyi'o//yang ni gsang sngags re re ni//bdun phrag brgya rtsa bdunadu
90b5(rgyud): bzlas//sna tshogs gzugs can gza' rnams ni//de ltar thams cad mchod par bya//skal bzang skye bar 'gyur ba dang //longs spyod rgya chen stsol bar 'gyur//
90b6(rgyud): rgyal ba'i rgod tshim rkun sogs//srin po lto 'phye grul bum rnams//de rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur te//de yis 'jig pa nam yang min//nad rnams kun las
90b7(rgyud): rnam par grol//sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par spangs//thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang 'thob//the tsom med par 'byung bar 'gyur//gang yang gzir ba
91a1(rgyud): nyid 'gyur ba//gzir ba'i rang bzhin 'byung ba gnas//cho ga bzhin du mchod pa yis//phan pa de la 'byung mi 'gyur//rtag tu bde bas bya
91a2(rgyud): gyur cing //gartser ldan sems can mnyes bshin pa//sems ni dang zhing mnyen pa ste//sems can kun la phan par dga'//dngos grub las ni phan yon te//zhi ba'i
91a3(rgyud): sems ni mnyam par gzhag/de yi phyi rol btsun par brten//kun gyi gtso blo dbang phyug ste//rgyal po rdzu 'phrul chen po dang //gdug pa'i sems can 'dul byed pa
91a4(rgyud): the tsam med par 'byung 'gyur te//rgyal ba bden pa gsung bas gsungs//chur ches pa dang char mi 'bab//mu ge byung dang rtsod par song //dkyil 'khor mchod par gyur pa
91a5(rgyud): na//de la de ni 'byung mi 'gyur//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //gal te las 'di rtsom pa na//dri ni cho ga bzhin gsungs pas//dang por 'dir ni mchod par bya//'di ni sdig/
91a6(rgyud): dang ldan pas kyang //de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur//nad rnams kun las rnam par grol//rtsod pa thams cad rnam par spangs//thams cad rtag tu bde bar ni//
91a7(rgyud): the tsom med par 'byung bar 'gyur//de ltar mchod pa'i cho ga yis//gang tshe bsod nams byas mchod na//lha yi tshogs rnams kun mnyes nas//dngos grub rgyu/
91b1(rgyud): tshan stsol bar 'gyur//gdug pa'i sdig par 'dren phyun+dan//srin po 'jigs pa'i gcugs can rnams//sngags pa bzlas pa brtson pa lnga//don de la 'a mi byed//rtan//
91b2(rgyud): gas dang med cing //longs spyod phun sumatshogs par//de na rtag tu gyur pa ste//tshig bzhin du mchod pa yis//rgyal po yang ni dbang du 'gyur//gang yad gtsu
91b3(rgyud): pa stobs po che//'jigs pa'i gzi' tshogs thams cad dang //mkha' bri ma yang stobs che na mo//de la kun tu phyag 'tshal bar//the tsom med par 'byung bar 'gyur
91b4(rgyud): de ltar rnam pa thams cad kyis//thams cad du ni mchod nas//bde ba nyid du kun tu shes//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnam por spangs//sna tshogs phun sum rtogs pas
91b5(rgyud): de bzhin rtag tu rgyal por bcus//thams cad du ni sman par smra//kun kyang dbang phyug rnam par brgyan//myachog tu sprul pa bzung 'gyur ba//de ni kun tu thecotsam med//
91b6(rgyud): de skad gsungs nos rnal 'byor che//thub pa chos kun dbang phyug ni//cing mi ga sung ba nyid du gyur//de tshe 'khor rnams 'di skad gso pa//dpe'i chen de sems
91b7(rgyud): dpa' legs//thams cad mkhyen pa roms nang bral//sngags kyi nyid don nges pa//thams cad ma lus pa ru gsungs//mngon po sems can shin tu med//
92a1(rgyud): sngar du ni brjod pa'i tshul//gsang sngags rgya mtsho bshad pa las//snying po 'di ni btus nas bsdus//thob pas 'jigs med 'di mngon gyur//
92a2(rgyud): de kun the tsam med pa ru//sa 'og gnas pa kun byas nas//sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol//bded thams cad yang dag ldan//de tshe thams cad 'byung 'gyur zhing //
92a3(rgyud): nad rnams thams cad rnam par spangs//gdug pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs can dang //srin po dang yang mche ba can//gsang ba'i phyag rgya mthong ba yis//de dag thams
92a4(rgyud): badrug par 'gyur//gaba' mched pa rab 'khyim gyi nom par phye ba'o//mig yo mgon bA zhes bya ba//snyoms can rjes srung bar byed//'jam
92a5(rgyud): pa'i dpal gyi dkyil 'khor nyon//de tshe dngos grub mdzes pa kun//rdo rje ral gri sogs de bzhin//phyis nas dkyil 'khor nang du ni/sngags pas tshig bzhin sgyu
92a6(rgyud): la//las kyi chag mthang ba yis//sa gnodag par yang de/bsdu//slob ma rnams la phan 'dod pas//'bad pa sa la bI kun tu bri//kun nas khruH
92a7(rgyud): lnga yin te//khyams kyis so sor rnam par rgyan//rta babs rnam par bcugs pa ni//nub kyi sgo ni bsgom par bya//sgo yi las ni 'jigs med paro//byang bye/
92b1(rgyud): kye ni rab tu bya//gzhan du gang zhig rab byed na//ring por mi thogs nges par brlag/sngar gyi bzhin du cho ga yis//gru bzhi ru ni thig gdab bya//sgo khyud dang ni khyams dang ldan//
92b2(rgyud): snam bus kyang ni yang dag brgyan//de nas sngags pas dbus kyi cher//ral gri phyag rgya gzugs bzo ldan//me ya~M dkyil 'khor dbu su no//rin che ni rdo bar legs par gnas/
92b3(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng ba gzi brjid la drigs//nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang mtshungs//rang gi sa bon sa bon gyis//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsgom bya bri//'di ni byin gyis brlab pa'i
92b4(rgyud): /sngags/na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHsarba bi shwa mu khaM b+h+yaHhe haM haM U dz+nyA pa ri mArga Na A gats+tsha b+ha ga ban shIg+h+raM swA hA//de yi byad du bri ba nI//bum pa rdo rje
92b5(rgyud): mtshan ma can//zhi ba 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs//'jig rten gtso bo de rang bzhin//lho yi phyogasu mgon pa yi//rdo rje'i bde pas bri bar bya//me yi dkyil 'khor dbus
92b6(rgyud): ni/phyag na rdo rjermi ldan gnas//dbang ldan phyogs la brten nas ni//mdzes pa'i gzugs brnyan phyag rgya bri//rin chen rde bar bzhugs shing 'bor//yid bzhin nor bu zhes
92b7(rgyud): bshad//khri rgyal phyeg rgyu brtul po rol//stengasu pad ma bris nas ni//sangs rgyas thams cad de ru bzhugs//me yi phyogs la brtan nas ni//rab tu 'bad pas rdo rje
93a1(rgyud): gr-i/'bar ba'i phreng ba 'jigs rung //pad+ma ma ra ni rab tu bzhugs//blo dang ldan pas 'o shAN+Da no//khro bo'i rgyal po mngag gzhug d+hA//rdo
93a2(rgyud): steng du gnas//rdo rje 'brar bas yongasu bskor//rlung gro dkyil 'khor dbus son par//rtag tu 'bar bas la khrigs pa yi//zhags pa'i phyag rgya de la bri//de nas gen+ti/
93a3(rgyud): pa'i chu pa ni//pho nya ma ni kun nas bI//brtan pa zhes bye'i pho nya mo//byang phyog su ni yang dag gnas//chu yi dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par//mkha' bsod ma ni/
93a4(rgyud): de la bri//lho yi phyogasu rnam 'jigs ma//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs//bgegs rnams kun nas 'jigs par byed//'jigs pa yi ni me ltar
93a5(rgyud): 'bar//'khor lo rdo ba'i steng du bri//de yig pog 'khor dag gi don//rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya//mkha' gsid mA ni snum bu la//gtun shing dang ni thob nyid/
93a6(rgyud): rab tu 'bad pas bri bar bya//slar yang nub phyogasu son par//bcom ldan ma ni 'jigs pa bri//mdzod spu zhes ni bshad pa yi//phyag rgya shar gyi cha la bri//lham
93a7(rgyud): pad dkar steng na bzhugs//rin chen phreng bas rnam par rgyan//de ltar kun nas de la ni//sngags pas phyag rgya dge ba'i tshigs//rang gi sa bon nges sbyar bas//dkyil
93b1(rgyud): 'khor mchog gi rmad du byung //sngags pas 'di kun cho ga bzhin//dri dang me tog sogs dag mchod//de nas phyag na rdo rjes byon gyis brlabs pa'i ngag gsungs pa//lag pa
93b2(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas ni//seng mo gung gi nang nyid du//dpal ldan phyag rgya 'di 'chang ba//pad ma'i mdzod ces mngon par bye shad//skyob pa thams cad mngon sum du//dkyil
93b3(rgyud): /'khor byin gyis brlab par bya//sngags ni 'di'o//na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHhUM hUM baHbaHmaM mi swAh+ma//sngags 'dis phyag rgya dang ldan par spyan drang pa/
93b4(rgyud): dang gshegasu gsol ba la sogs pa dang /cho ga bzhin du bya'o//'di ni 'jom dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po ste//bstan pa srung ba'i phyir dang dam par chos gan
93b5(rgyud): pa dang /sems can rnams srung ba'i phyir du mchog tu gasnga ba'i mi g.yo mgon po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungaso//gang 'dir zhugs nas phyogs na phyag rgya'i ye shes
93b6(rgyud): legs par bslabs na rgyud thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu zhugs pa yin no//'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor 'di su la bshad par mi bya'o//
93b7(rgyud): de ci'i slad du zhe na/dkyil 'khor 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba yin paso//sngags pas gang zhig gzhan du byed//dkyil 'khor cho ga nyams pa yis//slob ma dang
94a1(rgyud): bcas gdon mi zla//tha tsam med par brlab par 'gyur//de nas 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pas mtshams bcing bar bya gzhan du ma/
94a2(rgyud): yin no//slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor bris te zhugs nas tsham dam gyis las rnams la slob ma sbyar bar bya'o//de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur
94a3(rgyud): gyur pa la 'di skad ces gsungaso//'jam dpal nyon cig/stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa'i ras bris kyi cho ga ni rin lhag pa btsal ba'i ras skra la sogs
94a4(rgyud): pa dang bral ba blangs te/khro bo'i rgyal po dpa' bo gcig pa lag pa g.yas pa bteg pa/zhabs g.yas pa steng du bteg pa/zhabs g.yon pa yang byen du sgang
94a5(rgyud): ba du phyag g.yon pa sdig mdzub kyis bsdigs par mdzad pa/zhal rnam par mi sdug pa nang steng du 'bar bar gnas pa/de bzhin gshegs pas sa stengs nas
94a6(rgyud): gnyis kyis dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/me tog rgyal po ni byang du'o//guya su nI bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad/'og tu ni sgrub pa bas/spos kyi
94a7(rgyud): snod kyis lag pa bsgrengs pa khro bo'i rgyal po la blta ba bri'o//'jam dpal mig ye mgon po 'di res bris kyi cho ga sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pas bdag gi
94b1(rgyud): bshad do//'jam dpal mi g.yo mgon po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga gang thabs bla ma yis dngos grub chen po tho sa nyen cig/'dir dang par re shig sngags kyi sgor byang chub sems
94b2(rgyud): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas ri la sogs pa yid dga' ba'i gnas rnamasu gcig pu slongs mo za zhing ras bris 'di'i spyan sngar du bstan pa 'bum phrag gcig bya'o///
94b3(rgyud): /de nas ri rtse'i zom la gnas bcas te/'bum phrag gsum bzlas pa bya'o//de nas nya la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mtshon rangs par bzlas par bya'o//nad par tho
94b4(rgyud): rangs sam nyi ma shar nas mtshan ma rnams 'byung ste nyi ma 'gyur log byed cing mun par yang 'gyur ro//phyogs bzhir hA hA zhes sgrogs pa'i sgra chen po thos par 'gyuraro//
94b5(rgyud): dro ba'i rgyal po'i me togA gi chun 'phyang g.yo bar 'gyur ba dang /sa gzhogayo zhing 'brug gi sgra tshim chem sgrogs pa dang /rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis me tog gi char
94b6(rgyud): 'bebs so//'di yi drung du khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rang 'di lha thams cad dang klu la sogs pas bskor nas byin no//de'i dus dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
94b7(rgyud): de nas yan chab phul te/phyag byas nas gnas par bya'o//de nas khro bo'i rgyal po gsung rab 'gyur te/bu gcig mchog sbyin par bya'o zhes pa dang /rig pa 'dzin pa/
95a1(rgyud): 'am/rgyal po 'am/mI snang ba 'am/gang 'dod pa de spang bar gyur//gal te rlog/'dzin du gyur na brgyad gnyis ma len pa'i ni byang phyug na rang /
95a2(rgyud): dri thags pa/lha'i gnan pa la btsobs pa rig pa 'dzin pa mang pos bskor ba/rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis bkur ste tshon pos phyag byed pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing kham
95a3(rgyud): ming po bskor ba/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/bskal par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//yang na mig sman grub par 'dod na lag pa
95a4(rgyud): rig dang /ut+pal sngon po dang /ru tA rnams gcig tu byas nas zangs kyi snod du bcug ste/zla ba gzas zin pa nA ji srid du 'byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o//
95a5(rgyud): de mig la bskus na 'dod pa'i khamasu mi snang bar 'gyuraro//de nas ral gri sgrung par 'dod na ral gri chag gas med pa thogs te/mar ngo'i brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ras
95a6(rgyud): bris la mchad pa rgya chen pos byas nas srung ba'i ral gri lcug pa gA yas thugs pa la ji srid du 'phro bar 'gyur ba de srid bzlas pa bya'o//'bar ba 'am 'bri bAn
95a7(rgyud): rang gcig pu rig po 'dzin par 'gyuraro//'bar bas ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyuraro//thogs pa med pas pha rol gyi stobs gnon pa gang gi drung du mthong na
95b1(rgyud): mthong d+mo dang 'ardzu par 'gyur//dungs la na ba sgru par dun rman gas pad nas ba cwa drug pa sa ga su kaN+Did sum bya nan ngan dam dngas thugs lamalda
95b2(rgyud): zla ba'i chos gcig nas brtsams te ras bris la mchod pa rgya chen po rgyas mi nyi ma~M re re 'dus brgya'o//de nas nyas mchod ba rgya chen po byas nas mAr me brgya tham pa sa
95b3(rgyud): ku sha'i chun po la nye bar 'dug la rdo rje lag pa gnyis kas bzung nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas nas de brdung bas 'khor dang bcas po rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba
95b4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//de ltar 'khor la dang mdung la sogs pa'i mtshan charnams dang /gos dang mchil lham dang /tshangs skud la sogs pa rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga yang ba
95b5(rgyud): bar bya'o//sngam bzhin du dngos grub gsum 'byung //de nas na sgrub par 'dod na med ldeng gi yam shing rnams na dang mer gyis sngags nas stong phrag brgyad bsreg sa sgra/
95b6(rgyud): b+h+yas ne nar stsol bar 'gyur//rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i 'gram du sadan+d+ha can don gyis sngags pa'i bad ma rnams stong phrag brgyad cu chub la bskur na pad ma'i phung po dang mnyam pazhin
95b7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//lci dbang du bya bar 'dod na a ka ru'i yem shing rnams zho dang sbeng rtsi dang mar gyis btags nas bsregs thugs byis na dbang du 'gyur//gsum 'du
96a1(rgyud): btags pa'i 'bras bsregs na sngags mi zad par 'gyur//gnod sbyin dbang du bya bar 'dod na gsum gyis btags pa'i gu gul gyi ril bus bsregs
96a2(rgyud): thugs bsregs pas dbang du 'gyur//mya ngan med kyi yam shing gis ni gnod sbyin mo dbang du 'gyuraro//rgyal po la yungs kar gyi bsregs blugs byas na rgyal po dbang du/
96a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro//rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi 'gram du song nas pad ma 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpal 'dus nas nor stsol ba 'am yul phyogs gcig pa'i rgyal
96a4(rgyud): sring ster//de nas 'bum phrag gsum byas nas byin nas stengs kyi bdag por 'gyur/'bum phrag lnga byin na 'dzam bu gling gi bdag por 'gyuraro//lha ma yin gyi bu ga'i
96a5(rgyud): sgor ras ris bzhag nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlos na sngags thams cad 'byung ste dogs pa med par zhugs na bcud kyis len la sogs 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de nas de nyid
96a6(rgyud): du gnas na khyab 'jug gi 'khor los 'jigs pa 'byung //yang ngo'i chos gcig nas brtsams ta dzi ti'i me tog stong phrag brgyad du bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi mthe ba
96a7(rgyud): rerig par bya'o//ci srid du zhabs kyi mthe bong las 'od zer byung gi bar du btags na sgrub pa po'i lus de ma thag tu me snang zhing dbu skra lcang lo le khyil bar 'gyur//'khor da
96b1(rgyud): bcas pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thob par 'gyur te bskul par gnaso//sa la pad ma mdab ma brgya pa gcig bris te de'i steng du 'dug nas stong phrag bzlas na sa gzhi gar gnas pad mar gnas
96b2(rgyud): 'khor stong dang ldan pa bskal par gnas//de nas gter blang bar 'ad na gang na gter yad par de ru bum pa skud pa nag pos bkris la tsan dan gyis byugs la chus bkang ste/stong phrag
96b3(rgyud): brgyad du mngon par bsngags nas der bzhag par bya'o//sa de gas nas chu yis sa la gtor la khru gang tsam sa la brkos te blang bar bya'o//de nas seng ge sgrub na grog mkhar gyis
96b4(rgyud): la seng ge byas la gi'u wang gis byugs la dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste/mchod pa chen po byas la ci srid du g.yo ba'i bar du bzlas na seng ger 'gyur te rgyab tu zhon pas ska la ba la byir/
96b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing bdag nyid snga ltas thob nas laM khri phrag gcig tu 'tsho'o//'jam dpal 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa gsungs pa'i tshi ga 'di bsgrubs na de na myur bar 'gyur ro//
96b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khar de dgra thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon par bstod do//rjesu yi rirang nas stan
96b7(rgyud): las langs nas song ngo //'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po chen po mi g.yo ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pas 'dul bar gsungs pa
97a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs s+ho///mi nyag rgyal po'i dka' lung gis rgya gar gyi mkhan po ash+ma rak+Shi ta'i zhal snga nas/bla na
97a2(rgyud): slong d+hirma blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te dge slong yon tan rdo rjes gsol ba btab pa'o///phyis su'ang /chos kyi rgyal po bkra shis rab brtan dpal bzang po'i /
97a3(rgyud): bskul ba bzhin/lots+tsha ba dge slong chos spyong bzang pos rgya'i dpe la legs par btugs te gtan la phab pa dang /slar yang mi'i dbang po chen po bkra shis rab brtan sog po
97a4(rgyud): 'phags kyi zhal snga nas kyi sku rang la/dge slong A nan+da mang+ga lamA b+his/dpal 'khor sde chen gyi gtsug lag khang du/bkra ma la shI la'i gtsub lag pargyad pa la gtugs
97a5(rgyud): nas mi 'cho su mi rung ba rnams legs par bcos ti dge bar bgyis pa'o///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya badz+ra pA Ni a d+hi She ka ma hA tan+t+ra/bod skad du/
97a6(rgyud): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po//bam po dang po/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa/
97a7(rgyud): dus gcig na//bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
97b1(rgyud): / spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rin po che'i rgyal po chen pos shin tu rnam par smras pa'i khang bzang chen po rin po che'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' chen pa'i khang pa na/pad mo'i snying po'i
97b2(rgyud): go'i khri chen po nor bu chen po dbang gi rgyal pos ngasde gnyis rnam par smras pa la bzhugs nas ldum ma ldan nA lhung nga'o//'di lta ste/dper na nyama'i dkyil 'khor ni na mthang ba'i/
97b3(rgyud): na mkha' la lham ma lhan ne lhung nge'o//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang pad ma'i skying pa'i seng ge'i khwa chen po de la l+h+wam me lhan ni lhang nger bzhugs nas/byang chub sems
97b4(rgyud): dpa'i tshogs chen pos kun nas bskor te/sems kyi dab thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyas/sku dang /gra sung dang /thugs ni mnyam par byin gyis
97b5(rgyud): brlabs/g.yo ba dang rlom sems thams cad dang ni bral zhing lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa la 'jug cing 'dri lta ste/lus mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas /
97b6(rgyud): bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang /ngag mnyam pa nyid kyi grwanas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang /de bzhin du yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
97b7(rgyud): kyi chos ston to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge
98a1(rgyud): 'dzin de thob pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de nyid kyi byin gyis
98a2(rgyud): brlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor nas/'di lta ste/lus dang ngag dang yid
98a3(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston pa dag mthong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag me tog gi/
98a4(rgyud): gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa/'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams du ma nges par ston pa 'di ni/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /spyod pa la nan tan byed pa dang /sa
98a5(rgyud): sgrub pa dang /byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa de thams cad ni bcom ldan
98a6(rgyud): 'dis rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi so//mdor na sems can gang la la dag dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
98a7(rgyud): mdzad kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'di lta ste/sbyin pa dang /snyan par smra ba dang /don spyad pa dang /don 'thun pas bsdus pa sha stig ste/
98b1(rgyud): de dag ni rgyu de nyid dang /dmigs pa de nyid kyis dge ba mngon par 'du byed do//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes chen po shin tu rgyas/
98b2(rgyud): pa de thams cad mthong zhing 'jug ste/rnam par blta zhing nye bar sems te dge ba ji tsam mngon par 'du byed pa yang rgyu de nyid deng dmigs pa de nyid kyis//de ltar byang chub sems dpar//
98b3(rgyud): de dag ngo mtshar rma du byung zhing ya mtshan gyis mdun pa'i snying du gyur nas/de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po snyam ste/cang mi smra bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la
98b4(rgyud): rnam par blta zhing nye bar semaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis snying 'dun pa mkhyen nas/byang chub sems dpa' thams
98b5(rgyud): cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor 'od zer stong phrog du ma mgur nas phyung //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad par byas te/nem
98b6(rgyud): mkha'i khams rab 'byams dag dang /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/'khod pa de dag la thams cad mkhyen pa
98b7(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas//bcom ldan rim nad bral ba de//dbang bsgyur rgyal po'i khang pa ni//skyon kun rnam par spangs pa na//snying 'thang chen po seng ge'i khri//dpag tshad sum ba
99a1(rgyud): yod pa la//pad mo'i snying por de bzhugs nas//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor//gnas der thub pa chen po yis//bkod pa chen po gang
99a2(rgyud): sprul pa//de dag shi ni grangs tshad dang //dbyibs dang kha dgra gang yin pa//da ni bskal pa grangs med du//bstan par nus pa ma yin//de ru de la dpa' bo che//rdzogs
99a3(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/yid gnyis som nyi spangs pa yi//dgongs pa gcod pa blta bar gyis zhes bsku 'o//de nas 'od zer de dag gis byang chub sems
99a4(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la bskul nas slar ldog ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis mgur du rang gi gan su zhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang mdzod spu nas
99a5(rgyud): yid bzhin gyi nor bu bkod pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba/'khor 'od zer brgya stong dang ldan pa phyung ste/de yang
99a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la/'dren pa bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la//blta ba dang ni mchod pa bgyi ba dang //sems can
99a7(rgyud): phan par bzhed pas chos brjod phyir//khyed cag thams cad ma shol de ring gshegs//zhes yang dag par ston to//de nas 'od zer de dag yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'a
99b1(rgyud): kyis mdzod su nyi zhug so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' snyoms dpa' chen po de dag 'ad zer des bskul ma thag tu rang rang po bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzog
99b2(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bac+doMs dag bac+doMs rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba'i sla du rgyal po
99b3(rgyud): dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen por mchi ba na/rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khyang pa chen po de ni 'jig rten gyi khams glang zhig na mchis/gang du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dri mngon//
99b4(rgyud): par rjegs par sangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i mi nga ni ci zhes bgyi/de'i byang chub kyi snying po ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags zhes zhus//de skad ces gsol pa dang /de bzhin ga
99b5(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' de dag bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud me tog gi gzhi
99b6(rgyud): snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams du mnges par ston pa yod/'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ri rengs par ston par ro la yang
99b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams sbyor ba nges par ston pa'i bkod pa rab 'byam du ma yod par khong du chud par bya'o//rigs kyi bu dag de la mtshams sbyor ba bkod pa rnams
100a1(rgyud): kyi tshad ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten bye ba phrag brgya dang /ri'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya dang /rgya mtsho bye ba phrag brgya dang /zlang dang nyi ma bye ba phyag brgya dag gang gi khos
100a2(rgyud): su 'dus shing rjesu zhubs pa dri stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamaso//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag gang gi khongasu 'dus shing rjesu
100a3(rgyud): zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byam/gyi mtshams sbyor ba rnams kyi khongasu 'dus shing rjesu zhugs par gcig/me tog gi gzhi'i snying
100a4(rgyud): papo'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byam gyi mtshams sbyor ba bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongasu 'a dus shing rjesu zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i brgyan bkod pa rab 'byam
100a5(rgyud): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig/me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya rnams gang gi/khongasu 'dus shing rjesu zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i
100a6(rgyud): snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'ji ga rten gyi khams kyi rgyud par ma gcig/'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam bar ma bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongasu 'dus shing rjesu
100a7(rgyud): zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bko dpa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa gcig ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
100b1(rgyud): spyad pa spyod pa na yongasu sbyangaso//rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams de na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas gcig po de nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
100b2(rgyud): mdzad do nyid yin te/sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbu gri byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni yong su bskor/lus dang ngag dang /yid kyis las ni shin tu 'das shing na mkha' nyid byang chub kyi snying por/
100b3(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs nas 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma ngan rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po na bzhugaso//rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de ni de 'dra ste/de'i yon nam
100b4(rgyud): spyod pa 'am/smon lam mam/ye shes kyi mtha' ni dod kyis bskul po grangs med par yang rtogs par mi nuso//rigs kyi bu dag nged kyang bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub sems dpa
100b5(rgyud): gyur pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bcu de/dang ni bcom ldan 'das de la byas pa gzo ba/byas pa shes pa dgo/rigs kyi bu dgra bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
100b6(rgyud): mdzad de byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sngon gyi spyod pa dang /smon lam dang /ngag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgyun mi gcod pa nas brtsams te bstan pa gcu bar mdzad pa dang /
100b7(rgyud): theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang /ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba dang /ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i byin gyis brlab/
101a1(rgyud): nas rdo rje'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las brnams te/dgra sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par
101a2(rgyud): gobar mdzad par bzhed nus 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po'i byung //de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen tog gis byang chub
101a3(rgyud): sems dpa' rin chen blo gros la rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di ni byin//na maHsa man+ta mu khaM b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ti thA ga twe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a dza na/rigs kyi bu khyod rin po che rdo rje chen po'i
101a4(rgyud): snying po 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams gnas par gyis shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros kyis snying po 'di blangs te 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/bya
101a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor te/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mchod pa'i phyir byang chub se de'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /rin po che rdo rje chen po//
