101a6(rgyud): la snying po 'dis mchod pa'i sprin chen mngon ma mthong ba mngon par sprul nas/'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang /rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang
101a7(rgyud): gawa ba der song ste phyin nas/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po yang rin po che dang /rdo rje me tog gi sprin chen po sa mngon du/
101b1(rgyud): bkab+ho//de bzhin du bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bdan dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /rgyan dang /rin po che dang /rdo rje'i sprin chen po dag gis
101b2(rgyud): bka'o//bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der yang song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du ma bskor ba byas nas
101b3(rgyud): ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar phyogs nyid du gnas te/rin po che dang rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po dang /rin po che'i rgyal po chen po dang /rdo rje'i dbyug gu dang /pad mo'i snying po'i seng ge 'i dri chen pa
101b4(rgyud): dngag mngon par sprul nas rin po che rdo rje chen po'i yi ge'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs te/rin po che rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs shing 'dug/lho phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
101b5(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la rdo rje chen po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs nas
101b6(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dar/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la phyag bya ba dang /blta ba dang /mchod pa'i phyir song
101b7(rgyud): shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos rdo rje chen po snying po 'di gsung so//na maHsa
102a1(rgyud): man+ta mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba ma hA badz+ra gra ba ri hU~M/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rdo rje mchog gi snying po 'di thob cing /bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas byang
102a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
102a3(rgyud): de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba de dang /rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
102a4(rgyud): song nas/'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i rgyan bkod pa 'di thams cad rin po che rdo rje mchog gi snang ba chen blo snang ba byas rje chen po'i mchog gi me tog dang /bdug pa dang /
102a5(rgyud): spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams dang /rdo rje chen po'i mchog dang /rin po che mchog gi 'od zer gyi snang bla
102a6(rgyud): rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po snang bar bya'o//mchog sbyin po chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi sgras phyogs bcur go bar byaso//go bar byas nas kyang ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du
102a7(rgyud): lho phyogasu gnas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag lhan cig tu rdo rje chen po mchog las byung ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po rnams la 'dug/nub phyogs na bcom
102b1(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
102b2(rgyud): phyug la de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog rdo rje chen po'i pad ma'i mchog gi/snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad//de nas
102b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje chen po'i pad ma mchi gu gi dkyil 'khor thugs
102b4(rgyud): rje'i stobs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so//na maHsa man+ta mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA gr-i te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA kA ru Na ba la badz+ra pad mA gra sa/dwe nas de bzhin gshegs
102b5(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis snying po 'di gsungs nas/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs
102b6(rgyud): kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyun bgrod pa der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshigs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
102b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags baspyan
103a1(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar/
103a2(rgyud): gyur nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas/rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'dra
103a3(rgyud): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas pad+ma chen po rdo rje'i rgyal por
103a4(rgyud): 'dug ste/rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa 'di thams cad dang /'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa thams cad thugs rje chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi stobs
103a5(rgyud): kyis rang gi lus rnam par ri ga byed kyi sprin rnams kyis kun tu bkang nas snang bar byaso//byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
103a6(rgyud): mi 'khrugs pas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la rdo rje chen pos rnam par gnon pa/rdo rje chen po rnam par rol pa/byang chub kyi snying po mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di sbyin par
103a7(rgyud): mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas byang chub kyi snying po chen po mchog 'dzin po'i snying po
103b1(rgyud): 'di gsung so//nA maHsA man+ta mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga to b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ba ra dman rA a gr-I gr-i/'di gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams ma
103b2(rgyud): tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyun bkod po de dang /rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces bta //
103b3(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas/yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdang
103b4(rgyud): te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang /rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen
103b5(rgyud): po ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang phyo gas nyid du gan+da
103b6(rgyud): nas byang chub kyi snying po chen po'i rgyun bkod par byin gyis brlabs te/byang chub kyi snying po mchog gi lus kyi sprin rnams kyis phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gongaso//byang shar gyi phyogs
103b7(rgyud): mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che cod pon
104a1(rgyud): la dkon mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje 'byung gnas rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
104a2(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis dkon mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po 'di gsung so///
104a3(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM oM dza saM/'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang /rgyal po
104a4(rgyud): dbang bsgyur gyi khado ba chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad do la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang //de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i
104a5(rgyud): cod pan to/bcom ldan 'das des gnang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing
104a6(rgyud): mdun du bdar nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang /rgyal po dbang
104a7(rgyud): bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas/
104b1(rgyud): dwe no mchog gsum pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan gyi pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po la 'dug ste/dkon mchog gsum pa'i sku'i sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gro so//shar lho'i
104b2(rgyud): phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dpal zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po la
104b3(rgyud): sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
104b4(rgyud): sprin gyi dpal gyis sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkod pa'i snying po'i snying po 'di gsungaso//na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbe thA ma hA badz+ra me g+ha bi kA Di te bi shwa saM b+ha ba ha/
104b5(rgyud): 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyun bkod pa de dang /rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po der bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la
104b6(rgyud): blta ba dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces bta //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/byang chub sems dpa' bye
104b7(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mos yosu bskur cing mdun du 'dor to/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das go la ba der song nas/bornaMs
105a1(rgyud): la lan bad+ma stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar sgo'i phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas sgron tshon po rdo rje mchog go lus kyi rnam par
105a2(rgyud): rig pa'i sprin rnams kyis pad+ma chen po'i rgyal ba'i sbyin byin gyis brlabs nas mchod pa chen po'i mchog gi sprin rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs shing 'dren
105a3(rgyud): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje chen po'i tog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
105a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje dpa' bo la rdo rje las byung ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i
105a5(rgyud): tog gis rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i snying po 'di gsungaso//na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+rod b+ha be swA hA/'di byin nas btang ngo //byang chub sems
105a6(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje dba' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng du mis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/byang chub
105a7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang /rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa ga
105b1(rgyud): ba dang /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mAdzad pa lta bu dar song nas/bcom ldan 'as la lan brgya stong du mas bskor ba byas nas ji ltar los pa bzhin du b+h+yo nub kyi phyogs mtsham
105b2(rgyud): nyid du gnas nas rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i rkyen rnams kyis 'jig rten b+h+yo khams thams cing rgyas par 'ag sa shing rdo rje'i gzungs kyis rgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma la 'dun/
105b3(rgyud): nub byung gi phyogs mtshams na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs snyan pas byang chub sems dpa' 'brug smra
105b4(rgyud): rgyal po la rdo rje m+b+hi dbyung su bsgrags pa'i snying po sbyin par mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku b+h+ya
105b5(rgyud): shin tu snyan pas rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po 'di gsungs so//na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHser+b+ba ta thA gra tA~M b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hA badz+rA raH nIn+d+ho Sha bikrAn+d+ha swAhA/'di byin nas bta //de nas byung chub
105b6(rgyud): sems dpa'i sems deng 'argyan pa 'brug d+ha'i rgyam pa chen po bcom ldan 'as sa gnang 'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang ba /bya chun sems dpa'i bye ba dag zhe
105b7(rgyud): brgya stong du mas yong su bskor cing mdun du 'dor te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rkyen bkad pa
106a1(rgyud): la dang / nga gyur mo khang pa bral ba dang /ma ldan 'das rnam ra sna mdzud gal du dor sad nas/ji ltar 'o sa pang zhon du na byu
106a2(rgyud): gi phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas te dargyas kyi rig byed mtha' yas nges sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad go bar byed cing rang gi smon lam las nges par byung ba rin pa rgya chen po
106a3(rgyud): pad+mol 'dug/'og gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma rnam par dag pa'i snying pos byung
106a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' pa'i yon lagro la spyod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsung so//na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA hi hi swA hA//'di byin nas btang ngo //
106a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa pad+ma ra yan lag la bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'jig rten gyi khams den sa mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya
106a6(rgyud): du mas yong su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhini sbyong nga'i rgyun ba kod pa ga~M la
106a7(rgyud): ba dang /rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang 'a chen po ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang
106b1(rgyud): mdzad ga la ba der song nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa
106b2(rgyud): sna tshogs dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs shing pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po rdul dang bral po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la 'dug/steng gi phyogs na bcom
106b3(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba la byang chub kyi stobs
106b4(rgyud): kyi snying po sbyin par mdzad//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis byang chub kyi stobs kyi snying po 'di gsungaso//na maHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA baM b+h+ya
106b5(rgyud): ga ra d+harma swA hA//'di byin nas bta //de nas byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal po/bcom ldan 'das des gang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur/byung
106b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du 'dar te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi
106b7(rgyud): tig gi gzhi'i rnying ngo'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang /rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po gau la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
107a1(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du steng gi phyogs
107a2(rgyud): nyid du gnas nas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mtha' yas pa go bar byed pa'i sgos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing chos nyid las byung ba'i pad+ma chen
107a3(rgyud): po la 'dug/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus shing 'khod pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing 'di dag tu sangs
107a4(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa sngon ma mthong ba mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad shin tu lha me/lha ni/lgang ba dang /rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa thams cad
107a5(rgyud): dang bral zhing na mkha' ltar bzod ma nas zhi ba dang /yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ltar bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par mdzad pa yang mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/
107a6(rgyud): sgra skad cig tu tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras//rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o//gdod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa//mgon po rmad byung dam pa 'di//ji ltar sa la snang zhigu/sku
107a7(rgyud): yis drin las mi mdzad la//gsung dang thugs kyis mi mdzad cing //sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ljon//shin tu dag pa'i shel dang 'dra//sku yis sems can thams
107b1(rgyud): cad la//sangs rgyas mdzod pa rnams mdzad la//sku la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste//thub pa de ni 'gyur med mnga'//gsung ni brag cha 'dra bas ste//bstan du med cing gzugs med kyang //lha
107b2(rgyud): yi rnga chen ji bzhin du//'gro ba thams cad tshim par mdzad//thugs ni rlom sems dral ba ste//de la yul ni mnga' ma lags//yul rnams dang ni de bral yang //sems can
107b3(rgyud): rnams kyi yul du gyur//gsung ci de bzhin sems can te//de bzhin sku dang de bzhin thugs//mtshan nyid gcig dang rab ldan zhing //smra ba'i nang na mchog tu snang //skye ba med
107b4(rgyud): las grol ba yi//de bzhin gshegs pa yid min pas//gang dag skye ba med shes pa//de dag 'dren pa rnam par shes//mgon po rtag tu mnyam bzhag cing //lus dang ngag
107b5(rgyud): dang yid bral yang //rtag par lus ngag spyod yul du//thub pa rgyun tu rab+hU snang //byang chub sems dpa' che ba nyid//shin tu dka' bo byed pa dang //sangs rgyas ye shes che 'bar ba//
107b6(rgyud): 'di 'dra yongasu tshol bar byed//de la mig no mi snang zhing //rna ba dang ni snang yang min//lce dang lus dang yid kyang ni//de phyir de yi yul ma yin//gzugs min sgra yang ma yin
107b7(rgyud): te//dri dang ro dang reg ma yin//dbang po ma yin rnam shes min//thams cad du ni rtag tu zhi//yul can dang ni yul de dag/rnam par brtags pas yod ma yin//yul can
108a1(rgyud): yod pa ma yin pas//yul rnams srid pa ma yin//byis pas ji ltar brtags pa bzhin//de ltar gang tshe yod ma yin//de tshe mgon pa yod 'gyur te//
108a2(rgyud): rnam par ma brtags tshul du'o//de ni kun tu thams cad le//bsam pa ji bzhin rdzogs mdzad pa//stong pa yid bzhin nor bu ltar//kun gyi mdun na bzhugs pa yin/
108a3(rgyud): gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i tshul gyis//ti'i 'dzin dbang bskur rnams la ni//blta smra 'phel gtam thams cad kyis//kun tu longs spyod 'os 'gyur//rnam par snang mdzad
108a4(rgyud): mgon mthong nas//de tshe kun gyi ting 'dzin dang //gzungs dang rig pa rnam par thar//bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad thob//gzugs la dbang ni thob 'gyur zhing //sangs
108a5(rgyud): rgyas ye shes tshol byed pa//bdag cag rnams ni thams cad kyang //phyogs bcu dag nas lhags pa yin//yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs//de ni gzugs kyi mchog
108a6(rgyud): yin te//yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas dag par//de ni bdag cag thob par shog/de nas byang chub sems dpa'adre dag gis tshig su bcad pa de dag smras nas/'di lta ste/lus
108a7(rgyud): kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' med pa dang /de bzhin du ngag dang /yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' med pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang /
108b1(rgyud): gsung dang /thugs kyi sa gang yin pa la 'jug/de ci'i phyir zhe na/ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas lus kyi skyon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmyig so//de bzhin du ngo bo nyid yongasasu shes pas
108b2(rgyud): ngag dang /yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mo'i mtha' mi dmigaso//lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o///de nas bcom ldan
108b3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag
108b4(rgyud): kyang mkhyen/rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa dag kyang mkhyen nas/ting 'dzin gang gi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
108b5(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams na/sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/
108b6(rgyud): yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byin gyis rlob pa'i ting 'dzin rnam par snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhug so//bcom
108b7(rgyud): ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad
109a1(rgyud): dang /'jig rten gyi khams mchums sbyor bad pa thams cad dang /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad dang /'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling bzhi pa thams/
109a2(rgyud): cad dang /skyong thams cad dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chos thams cad dang /'jig rten gyi khams gtan la bab pa thams cad dang /me tog
109a3(rgyud): gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsam pa sna tshogs dang /re ba sna tshogs dang /'dod pa sna tshogs dang /
109a4(rgyud): theg pa sna tshogs kyi tshul rnam par gnas pa dang /'gro ba sna tshogs dang /skye gnas sna tshogs dang /ljongs sna tshogs dang /kha dog sna tshogs dang /dbyibs sna tshog
109a5(rgyud): dang /sems can sna tshogs dag la sgra dang /tshig brjod pa rnam par bzhag pa sna tshogs rnams kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen
109a6(rgyud): po'i mtha'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang dag par ston cing /rang gi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyis byin gyis
109a7(rgyud): brlabs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po yang dag par byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa
109b1(rgyud): dang /bstan pa gnas par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi bcod pa'i phyir dus kyi dbang gis skye ba rim gyis gzung bar byin gyis brlarabs te/
109b2(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur po chen po dang /rdo rje chen po'i snying po dang /rdo rje chen po'i 'od 'phro nga rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snang ba dang /theg pa chen po spyod pa dang /gsang sngags rnam par
109b3(rgyud): dag pa'i sgos rdo rje'i 'khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khor du lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba mdzad pa mthong ngo //de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad spros pa thams cad dang brel ba'i
109b4(rgyud): phyir thams cad du spros pa med pa'o//rtog pa thams cad dang bral po'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'o//ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o//gdod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o//
109b5(rgyud): skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa'o//bsam pa'i sa las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o//yul dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o//tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das
109b6(rgyud): pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba mo yin pa te/rnam pa thams cad du sems can thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i sa la byang chub sems dpa' sems drang 'a chen po rnams kyi yid bzhin gyi nor
109b7(rgyud): bu dang 'dra bar bsamo pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pa thams cad rje su 'thun pa/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par sems can thams cad kyi
110a1(rgyud): mdun na 'dug pa/nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang med pa gros dri ma can gyis dkris pa lta bu ni 'di su'i yin/'angadi ci zhig ces sems can rnams kyis mi
110a2(rgyud): shes te ya mtshan ci zhig tu gyur to//gang dag blo bros rnam par dag pa yid gnyis dang /the tshom dang bral ba/sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/
110a3(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags dang spyod pa'i tshul la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
110a4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rgyan gyi snying po'i 'od zer tshon pos snang bar byas pas de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la zhugs pa dag ste/de dag ni gsang sngags kyi spyod
110a5(rgyud): nga'i tshul 'di mnyan pa dang /brlabs pa dang /rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po bri ba dang /dngos grub chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i skal pa yod//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams midzad
110a6(rgyud): 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan gyis gleng bzhi pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling du bdud pham par mdzad nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
110a7(rgyud): rgyas te/dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa nas bzung ste mthar gyis spyad pa spyod cing yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du byin gyis brlangs nas chos bstan to//bac+doMs
110b1(rgyud): dedo yang bstan pa rgyun ma bcad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /byams pa dang /'jam dpal dang /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par stsol
110b2(rgyud): ba dang /na mkha'i snying po dang /so'i snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' ngan song thams cad sbyong ba la sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdus nas/lha dang /klu dang /gnod
110b3(rgyud): sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po la sogs te thams cad kyi mdun du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas/lag na rdo rje
110b4(rgyud): dbang chen po bskur bas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dbang bskur nas de nyid la bstan pa gtad///ldeg na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las
110b5(rgyud): sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub pa'i gtam gyi tshul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o///bam po gnyis pa/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
110b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po dpal yon tan 'byung ba'i gran so na/shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshul stug po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon
110b7(rgyud): spyod pas rnam par rol po'i rgyu 'thun pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i nags tshal chen po mchog na/dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thangs gcig tu bzhu/
111a1(rgyud): te/thams cad kyang zug pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
111a2(rgyud): dang /tshe dang ldan pa pa lang bdag dang /tshe dang ldan pa dbang chen dang /tshe dang ldan pa nyin gung dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po
111a3(rgyud): dang /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo dang /tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang /tshe dang ldan pa sku gcan zin dang /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa dang /tshe dang ldan
111a4(rgyud): pa ka pi la chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang /tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang /tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /tshe dang ldan pa tshe mi can dang /tshe dang ldan
111a5(rgyud): pa gsus po che dang /tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' dang /tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu'i nor dang /tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa bsod snyoms len b+ha ra drA dza dang /
111a6(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa srung spyod dbang po'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa nye sbyor dang /tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu 'od srung dang /tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /
111a7(rgyud): de dag la sogs po dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya dang thabaso gcig/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la 'di lta ste/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /dra ba can
111b1(rgyud): gyi gzhon nur gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che dang /
111b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' lag ni phyag rgya rin po che dang /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson pa chos la gnas dang /byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa dang /
111b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi ldan dang /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bstan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas phan byed dang /byang
111b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzugs dbang phyug dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen thob dang /byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po dang /
111b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzad dang /byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sla'i rgyal po dang /byung
111b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sang seng po'i dbyangs dang /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dri ma med pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros mi bzad pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' spyod
111b7(rgyud): pa'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' bla ma'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' byamos pa dang /byang chub
112a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
112a2(rgyud): snyed dang /bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang thabs gcig ste/de dag thad kyang so dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang /gzungs dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
112a3(rgyud): dang /'phags pa'i lam dang /dbang thob pa dang /sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa dang /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad tshim par
112a4(rgyud): byed pa sngon gyi smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du nges par byung ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang /rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang /dag pa rgyun mi 'chud par dam pa'i
112a5(rgyud): sa su pa shan+ti~M kim+b+hi/ sems pa 'di lta du de dag gis yongasu gan ni mdun gyis bltos nas/com ldan 'das sbyong ba'i ming go
112a6(rgyud): chen po la bzhugs te/lha dang btsas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nos shin tu lha me/lhan ne/lhang nge'o//gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams kyang de nyid du 'dus te 'khod//
112a7(rgyud): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bus kun nas bskor cing de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur te/lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing
112b1(rgyud): mdun gyis bltas te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to//lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim dang /thag dbangs ris dang /zhi mchog dang /ba Ti dang /rnga chen dang /dus kyi 'khor la
112b2(rgyud): can dang /dri ma med dang /tog dang /zla gdong dang /rnam par 'dzums dang /zab mo dang /stobs can dang /sgra can dang /tog dregs dang /rnam par snang ba dang /lha ma yin gyi dang
112b3(rgyud): sna chags phreng btsun dang /de dag la sogs pa dang /lham yin gyi dbang po gzhan stong dang /lham chen gyi dang po de dag thams cad yang gi gnas nis byu ste/ ma yin gyi mchu
112b4(rgyud): chen po dang /lha ma yin gyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /bdug pa dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
112b5(rgyud): bA dar dang /rgyan dang /sol stan dang /dag rdob rnams mngon par sprul nas shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyam mtshan dkod pa'i nags chel sdug pa ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das de
112b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ji ltar sprul pa'i me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /
112b7(rgyud): phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba den dang /rgyan dang /sil snyen dang /pheg rdob pa rnams bcom ldan 'das
113a1(rgyud): gtor to//gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod//klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /klu'i rgyal
113a2(rgyud): po 'od zer rgyas pa dang /klu'i rgyal po klog lce dang /klu'i rgyal po rin po che'i cod pan dang /klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang /klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas
113a3(rgyud): dang /klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu dang /klu'i rgyal po rna rdum dang /klu'i rgyal po pad+ma dang /klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang /klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po dang /klu'i rgyal po dus can dang /klu'i
113a4(rgyud): rgyal po rigs can dang /klu'i rgyal po mgo gcig pa dang /klu'i rgyal po brdzun po dang /klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i sgra dang /klu'i rgyal po stobs ldan dang /de dag la sogs pa klu'i
113a5(rgyud): rgyal po khri rang gi gnas nas byung ste/klu'i mthu chen po dang /klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos tsan dan gor shI Sha'i chu'i sprin mngon par sprul nas/shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan

120a6(rgyud): don gyi mdun 'gro khyod//gsang ba'i bdag po sems can mchog tshur shog/gsad pa'i dam pa sems can snying po tshur//gdul dka' rtag 'dul dbang thob tshur shog shig/

120b1(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa'i sras tshur shog/sems can bzang po stobs pa che//rdo rje lta du chur shoka shog/sangs rgyas sras pa 'jogs med pa//stobs can rnams kyi mchog tshur shog
120b2(rgyud): rtag tu srid pa gsum po yi//snying dga' byed pa tshur shog shig/yang dag lam ni ston byed pa//stobs bcur gnas nga tshur shog shig/sems can dag pa rdzu 'phrul che//kun tu
120b3(rgyud): bzang po tshur shog shig/kun tu mdzes po tshur shog shig/srid gsum dbang phyu tshur shog shig/khyod ni gzugs bzang shin tu rgyan//glang po rna ba khyor tshur shog/sna tsha/

120b5(rgyud): mdul ba tshur shog shig/mi 'jigs thob pa tshur shog shig/'jigs pa 'jigs pa tshur shog shog//sangs rgyas sras pa rdzu 'phrul to//phyi shol ma byed tshur shog shig/

121a1(rgyud): gsungs par bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dis bskul bas/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gan
121a2(rgyud): sbyin gyi tshogs thams cad la smras pa/grogs po dag tshur shog/bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i tshogs
121a3(rgyud): kyos ni bskor/nyan thos brgya stong du mas ni bskor/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha mo yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mau 'am tsa dang /lto 'phye chen po

121a7(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor de la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du shing se la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba der bzhud//

121b2(rgyud): ting 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i med pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du yangs shing

123b1(rgyud): mdzes bran thod nas de dag kyang ya mtshan du gyur du'i rnying gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la zhus pa/brjes

127a3(rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni gdags pa'am/rnam par rig pa mod cing mi dmi
127a4(rgyud): te ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyiraro//de la ni spyod pa yang med/mi spyod pa yang med/bslab pa yang med/bslab pa ma yin pa yang med/'dul ba yang med/'dul ba ma
127a5(rgyud): yin pa yang medo//de la ni lus som/ngag gamo/yid kyi 'jug pa'am ldog pa mi dmigaso//de de bzhin gshegs pa'am/sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/byang chub seMdel
127a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'am/nyan thos zhes bya ba 'am/rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am/chos zhes bya ba'am/dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'am/lha zhes bya ba 'am/klu zhes bya ba'am/
127a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin zhes bya ba 'am/dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tsi dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar ram/yod
127b1(rgyud): sa bya bla 'am/med ces bya ba'am/bskyod nams zhes bya ba 'am/'khor ba zhes bya ba 'am/mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/'arjod ba zhes bya ba 'am/thar pa zhes bya ba med/
127b2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de la ni dus zhes bya ba 'am/tshod ces bya ba 'am/skud cig ces bya ba'am/yud tsom zhes bya ba 'am/thang cig ces bya ba medo//de la ni zla ba zhes bya ba 'am/skar ma
127b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'am/ny-i ma zhes bya ba 'am/me zhes bya ba 'am/rlung zhes bya ba 'am/chu zhes bya ba'am/sa zhes bya ba 'am/mtshan mo zhes bya ba 'am/nyin mi zhes bya ba 'am/dus tshig
127b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'am/lo khyud kor zhes bya ba 'am/zlo ba zhes bya ba med//rigs kyi bu de ltar ni rtog pas brtags pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi bu stod kyi mthar lhung ba ji snyed pa dang /'jig rten lus
127b5(rgyud): 'das pa'i brtags pa'i sgo ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni de la mi 'gyur zhing ming de mi dmig so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos nyid gnyi su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te/de la gnyis mi
127b6(rgyud): 'byung ngo //rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na na mkha' gnyis pa mi skyes pa'i phyir na mkha'i khams ni gnyi su med//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos nyid kyang gnyisu medo pa'o//rigs kyi bu de
127b7(rgyud): ltar na gang chos nyid 'di lta bu la spyod pa/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
128a1(rgyud): chen po rnam su bstan to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/spyod pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o//slob pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o//thob/
128a2(rgyud): pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob pa'o//rlom pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsomo pa'o//'dul ba ma yin pa ni 'dul ba'o//gdag su med pa ni gdags
128a3(rgyud): pa'o//mthong ba med pa ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o//bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o//mi nyan pa ni chos nyan pa'o//khong du chud pa med pa ni khong du chud
128a4(rgyud): pa'o//'gro ba med pa ni 'gro ba'o//gnas med pa ni gnaso//stong pa nyid ma yin pa ni stong pa nyid//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shes pa med pa/mngon par rtogs pa med
128a5(rgyud): pa dang /mngon sum du byed pa med pa'o//rigs kyi bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni spyod pa spyad pa'o//gang du yang
128a6(rgyud): mi chagaso//gang du yang rje su chags pa medo//gang du yang khong khro ba medo//gang du yang zhe sdang ba medo//de mi snang ma rmongs phyin ci ma log par rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa
128a7(rgyud): ste/rnam par mi rtog pa/zhi ba/legs par gnas pa/zla med pa/mi g.yo ba/rab tu me g.yo ba/sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /sems can gyi don bya ba la
128b1(rgyud): yongasu mi skyob/dus gsum yang sgyid lug pa med pa'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na na mkha'i khams na rdul 'am/du ba 'am/sprin gyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/spyad lug
128b2(rgyud): par ma 'gyur//de ci'i phyir zhe na/na mkha'i khams rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu spyad pa yang sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/kun nas
128b3(rgyud): nyon mongs par mi 'gyur//rigs kyi bu de la spyod pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rgyan rdo rje chen po'i tog gi spyod pa rdo rje chen po las
128b4(rgyud): 'byung ba/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nam so sog pa'i chos kyi rnam grangaso gzung bar bya/bklag par bya/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o//de skad ces
128b5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to//bde bar gshegs
128b6(rgyud): pa ngo mtshar to//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na gang dag nyan pa dang /'chang ba dang /
128b7(rgyud): klog pa dang /yid la 'gyed pa dge lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das theg pa
129a1(rgyud): chen po de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa lag so//bcom ldan 'das de dag ni theg pa chen po bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa mngon
129a2(rgyud): par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa ni gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul lo skal pa mchis pa lagaso//bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen
129a3(rgyud): bo bla na med pa 'phral du 'bras bu snang ba bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das cad mi gsung bar bzhugs te/rdo rje chen po 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i
129a4(rgyud): tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/de nas de'i mod la phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams
129a5(rgyud): cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chen po'i sgra sgrogs te/gsung gcig tu rdo rje chen po 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba rdo rje'i 'byung gnas rdo rje sems dpa'i yi
129a6(rgyud): ge brjod cing shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i'o nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/rdo rje chen po pad+ma'i
129a7(rgyud): gdan la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugaso//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam zhes bsnyun gsol te/nyam nga ba nyung ngam/
129b1(rgyud): spyod pa yang ngam/stongs dang ldan nam/'tsho'am bde ba la gnas sam zhes bsnun gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+ya
129b2(rgyud): shAkya thub pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad blod nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'ang gsung so//na maHsar+b+ba mu kha b+h+yaHsar+b+ba tA thA go
129b3(rgyud): te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM badz+ra ka ra kha stu hA/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i gsang sngags gsungs nas/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlab
129b4(rgyud): kyi rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de ya mtshan du che'o snyam du steng 'dun par gyur to//'jom dpal
129b5(rgyud): gzhan nur gyur pa la lta zhing 'khod//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de ya mtshan che snyam du rtse gcig tu gyur par rig nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
129b6(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la rus pa/gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal
129b7(rgyud): nas//rnam par 'dren rnams mi gsung las//bde gshegs sras la rdo rje yis//dbang bskur du ni nges par gda'//gsang sngags spyod pa ye shes che//theg pa chen po
130a1(rgyud): 'phang mchog/der ni thams cad mkhyen nyid dang //don kun grub pa'i spyod pa thob//gsang sngags spyod pa 'byung ba yi//theg pa chen po thams cad mkhyen/
130a2(rgyud): sngon gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyis//nags tshal mchog 'dir rtag tu bshad//sa lo'i rgyal mtshan nyams dga' tshe//spyod pa yang dag bstan pa'i gnas//sngon gyi spyad
130a3(rgyud): las byung gyur pas//gsang sngags shes las 'byung bar bshad//gang dag 'das pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas//de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //mgon pa gang dag da lto byung ///
130a4(rgyud): rnam par 'dren par bzhugs pa rnams//de dag thams cad 'dir gshegs shing //gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi//theg pa chen po dbang bskur 'di//bde gshegs sras
130a5(rgyud): la rab tu stsol//sangs rgyas drang srong chen po pa//kun gyi dbang ni bdag lagaso//'jig rten phan par 'tshal bas na//rdzogs sangs rgyas la gsol ba 'tshal//bstan pa
130a6(rgyud): kun tu srung ba dang //dam chos rtag gnas bgyi slad du//bdag nyid che ba'i spyi gtsug tu//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur stsol//gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi//theg
130a7(rgyud): chen rtogs par khong du chud//sngon gyi smon lam nges 'byung ba//sangs rgyas sras pa gags chen lags//sangs rgyas 'dra 'am ci zhig te//bdor gshegs sras po chags
130b1(rgyud): med pa//byang chub mthar thug dbang po lags//gsang sngags mgon ngos rnam kun tu//thog ma'i spyod ldan nges pa 'di//sangs rgyas 'dra 'am ci zhig te//bder gshegs sras po cha
130b2(rgyud): med pa//byang chub mthar thug dbang po lags//gsang sngags mgon pos rnam kun tu//'khor 'di byin gyis brlabs lags na//gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas//ji srid
130b3(rgyud): mi gsung gyur cing bzhugs//thams cad ngo mtshar 'dzin 'gyur te//bde bar rtog la brtson par gnas//dpa' bo che rnams the tsom dang //de bzhin yid gnyis bsal du gsol//
130b4(rgyud): da ni dus la bab lags na//phyi bshol ma mdzad bshad du gsol//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas bcom
130b5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gsungs pa/'dren pa rnams kyis gang sangs rgyas//chos nyid 'di ni gcig tu mno//
130b6(rgyud): rtag tu mnyam gzhag rnams kyis ni//rab tu bsgrims te de rtog bya//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la sogs pas shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal
130b7(rgyud): stug po kun tu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa gru bzhi sgom pa/sgo bzhi btod pa/rin po che sna bdun gyi phyi ras bskor ba/sgo gang dang /rta babs dang /stegs bus rgyan pa/
131a1(rgyud): steng kun du che'i bla bres pa/rnam che'i dri bu sbyangs pa/na po che sna lnga'i srang bu 'brel bar byin gyis brlangs te dbus rdo rje pA li Sh+T+rI dang /phyogs cha
131a2(rgyud): brgyad du rdo rje chen po'i phreng bas bskor ba dang /rdo rje phyi ras kun tu bskor ba dang /phyi rgyab tu ni rdo rje'i phreng ba dang /rdo rje'i srid bu bres pa dang /rdo rje'i bcing ba'i bcings pa dang /
131a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i phur bu dag btab pa dang /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin can du byin gyis brlabs nas steng gi gtsug tor nas thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
131a4(rgyud): phyung ngo //'od zer de dag phyung nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyi gtsug tu zhugs
131a5(rgyud): so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag zhugs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dga' zhing mgu nas rab tu dga' ste thogs pa med pa'i
131a6(rgyud): stobs zhes bya ba'i snying po smras pa/na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi sh+ma mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA a pa ti ha ta ba la/ma hA badz+ra A dz+nyA ka ra Na/na mostu ti swA hA//de nas thogs pa med
131a7(rgyud): pa'i stobs rdo rje'i snying po smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ting 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam dang /'phags pa'i
131b1(rgyud): bden pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /stong pa nyid chen po'i mtha' las byas pa sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang /yang dag par sdom pa dang /nges pa la sogs pa
131b2(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par bskyed pa'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te/byang chub semos dpa'o kun tu bzang po'i lag tu byin//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kun tu
131b3(rgyud): bzang po'i lag tu rdo rje byin ma thag tu/de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thang
131b4(rgyud): dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /nyan thos thams cad dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha'
131b5(rgyud): lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'bye chen po dang /me dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni lag na rdo rje'o lag na rdo
131b6(rgyud): rje'o zhes brjod///'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/bam po gsum pa//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dam tshig 'di byin gyis brlabs nas yang gsang
131b7(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA gu h+ya badz+ra d+ha ra swA hA//de nas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gdungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams
132a1(rgyud): /rab 'byams thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams caN+Da du gsang ba'i bdag po'o//gsang ba'i bdag po zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu
132a2(rgyud): 'ur cas grags nas 'di lta ste/snying po 'di'i mthu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs
132a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs dang /ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dag mngon sum du zhugaso//yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bstan pa kun tu bsrung ba dang /'gro ba yongasu
132a4(rgyud): skyob pa'i snying po rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra d+ha ra bI ri bi ra bi ki ra bi ki ra swA hA//rdo rje chen
132a5(rgyud): po rgya che ba'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thad du rdo rje chen po rgya che ba las byung ba'i lag na
132a6(rgyud): rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung rnams dang /byang chub sems
132a7(rgyud): dpa' thams cad dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /sems dang po bskyed pa rnams dang /las dang po pa rnams dang /sems can rnams kyi rgyab dang /
132b1(rgyud): mdun dang /mnyal ba'am/gtad kyi log pa 'am/chos ston pa'am/byang chub mngon par rdzogs dang tshang rgyub 'a/sems can gyi don byed pa'am/sprul pa rab tu bye
132b2(rgyud): pa'i bar du tham+bas cad kyi drung na gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston nga'i cho ga shes pa lag na rdo rje cad pan can du kun tu snang //yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi'i phyogs rdo rje cing
132b3(rgyud): bzhes byab bu'i rnying po mchog gisas bya/nAm+b+ha/ N+DaSh+TA shwe d+hIH/sad+d+ham+b+ha /sar+b+bad+d+hi glu ts+tsha na du rje rje 'i sna du 'digs s+ho p+nak+ShaN+DA phyug
132b4(rgyud): btsun sems can mi rungs pa thams cad rdo rje'i btsang bsacings par sna dzi //dri nas de bzhin ga shegs pa de dag gso sa'i rdo rje'am phur gu zhes byi 'i rdo rje snying po gsungs pa/
132b5(rgyud): namAHs+yAr+b+ba ta thA ga twe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsir+b+ba thA dza dza dza dza dzaM swAt+ma//saN+Din gyi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rnardza
132b6(rgyud): 'di rdo rdzongs rten to zhes sgra gcig nis gcig tu ces grwan+d+hes//yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis pa 'og gi rdo rje nas bya ba'i snying ba mchog gsus pa/nAmAH
132b7(rgyud): thAg ti rgyu sa Sh+Ta sa na sa Ti hrIhU~M//po chen ga 'i stong gsus mtheg tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bya sa thams cad //ma'i gag ga
133a1(rgyud): /kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sa 'og gi rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'u ces grag so//yang de bzhin gshegs
133a2(rgyud): pa de dag gis rig sngags 'ching ba thams cad kyi 'gro ba gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khaM b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tsin+ta sar+b+ba b+hIr+yaM tu rag dam pa
133a3(rgyud): darma lab+hA bi dza yaM swA hA/rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam so thams cad dang /rig sngags 'chang
133a4(rgyud): gi gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag nA rdo rje 'di ni rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ud ces grag so///
133a5(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gisi gra rlod sbyin tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsungs pa/na maHsar+b+ba tA thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra yak+Sha ni gr-i ha da ta
133a6(rgyud): swA hA//gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thog tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /gnod sbyin gyi gnas thad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
133a7(rgyud): chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces gragaso//yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis klu'i rdo rje bsgrags pa'i tog rgyal
133b1(rgyud): mtshan zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/nA maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga to b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu kho b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA hA ra ha ra nA ga badz+ra swA hA/de nas klu'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi
133b2(rgyud): khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /klu'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni klu'i rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces
133b3(rgyud): grag so//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs pa/na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ma the ma tha badz+ra gan+d+harba hr-i da ye swAhA//rdo rje
133b4(rgyud): chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /dri za'i gnas thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i
133b5(rgyud): chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni dri za'i rdo rje'o zhes sra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur ces gragaso//yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po na mkha'i lding gi dbang po'i snying po gsung so//
133b6(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA badz+ra bi ta ta d+ha ra ka ra haM ha swA hA/de nas rdo rje chen po na mkha' lding dbang po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab

140a5(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul chen po la smon lam shin tu btab par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje drag po'i snying po
140a6(rgyud): 'di skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang bas thams cad dang ldan pa'i latsho rgyu dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas te dkyil 'khor chen po skyes//de la
140a7(rgyud): dpon na gsang sngags de kho na'i don la mkhas pa/tshul khrims dang ldan pa/rgyu rtsal rnams la mkhas pa/snying rje ba'i rang bzhin can/bzod pa dang ldan pa/sang+yas/
140b1(rgyud): dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la bsam pa nges pa/dus shes pa/g.yer ba/sro shi ba ma yin pa/mdangs che ba/zab mo'i chos la mos pa/bzlab brjod la brtson pa/rtag tu bsam/
140b2(rgyud): gtan byed pa/lag na rdo rje la dga' ba/ming thos sngags pa brtag par ni//mchil ma 'byung zhing spu zing byed//rmi yang lag na rdo rje la//yid kyi the tshom med pa dang //dus shes
140b3(rgyud): de bzhin tshod shes shing //byas bzo de bzhin bden pa skye//slob dpon de lta bus ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i
140b4(rgyud): chu klung du zhugs te gong du smos pa'i snying po de dag re re zhing yang 'bum 'dum bzlas brjod bya'o//de'i 'og tu lag na rdo rje drag po'i snying pos yungs kar dang /dngar gsum bsres pa
140b5(rgyud): dag lan khrir sbyin bskyeg bya'o//de'i 'og tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su 'dug ste/bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bzlas brjod bya'o//drag
140b6(rgyud): po'i snying po chen pos slob mo dag par bya ba dang /bsrung ba'i cho ga bya'o//de'i 'og tu sa brtag par bya ste/rdo dang /bseg ma dang /gyo mo med pa/skye ba po grog skur la sogs
140b7(rgyud): pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sa ni thams cad du yang shis pa'o//der bza' gtum po la ma bab pa/chos grangs ngan pa ma yin bya mi mthun par 'jug pa dang phrad pa spangs pa/nyi ma
141a1(rgyud): dang /byed pa dang /yud tsam dang /rgyu skar dang /gza' bzang por mngon pa lngas brnams na shes par 'gyur//dmar dang ser dang dkar dang gnag/'dran/
141a2(rgyud): ma pa ni lnga pa yin//gang yang rung sna der ni//mkhas pas khyu gang tsam brkos te//sngags pa yi ni brkos pa de//sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya//lhag na rnam pa kun tu mtsha
141a3(rgyud): khang chad ni 'bring du brjod//gang byar ma gyur sa de spad //mkhyes pas der ni brtsam mi bye//dkar po dag ni zhi bar bstan//dmar po dbang gi don du 'dod//ser po rgyas par
141a4(rgyud): shes par bya//nag pi drag shul spyod par shes//der ni mchod yon gtor ma dang //mar me spos dang bdug pa dag/bsgrims te byin nas bsrung bya ste//mnyam par
141a5(rgyud): gzhag nas sa la brjod//de yi nub mos der ni//ku shrI byAting ba'i steng du nyal//gal te sa ni rung gyur na//der ni bsgrims te bri bar bya//sngon gyi sangs rgyus mi mchog gis//
141a6(rgyud): de ni bgegs med yin zhes brjod//gzhan du na ni do mi gyi//bgegs dang bcas pas phung por gyur//de nas sngags pa langs nas ni//de yi nyin mkhas pa yis/
141a7(rgyud): sa ni shin tu yongs sbyangs phyir//sbyin bsreg bye ba 'di bya ste//sbrang rtsi dang ni'o ma dang //mar bsres sbyin bsreg mchog tu 'gyur//zhi ba'i sems kyis sbyin blugs ni//
141b1(rgyud): shun gcig skyon bsreg bya//de nas sngags pas sa brkos la//sa de nyid kyis slar dgang ngo //yang nad kyil 'khor las kyi tshe//sngags pas spos kyis dkrung ngo //logs par 'du//
141b2(rgyud): zhing mnyam 'jom bya//phyogs cha dag deng sgo yi rnams//kun kyang rnam pa thams cad du//rin chen sna lngas rab mdzes bya//bye brag tu ni sa dbus//rin chen sna lnga bzhag par bye//
141b3(rgyud): denas yon tan ldan pa yi//slob ma dag ni gdams te gzung //bzlas brjod sbyin bsreg rnam kun gyis//bsgrims te de dag bsrung bar bya//mchog sbyin rdo rje blo ldan gyi//gsod
141b4(rgyud): sngags 'di ni zlos pa na//skyon dang yon tan rnam dpyad pas//de dag thog mar brtag par bya//yon tan 'di dag ldan pa ni//shin tu brtags nas gzung bar bya//rig dang gtso
141b5(rgyud): ni phun sum tshogs//gsal zhing dul lo brtson pa dang //shes rab ldan brtan byas gzo dong //dkon mchog gsum la gzhol ba dang //gzugs mdzes yan lag yongs rdzogs
141b6(rgyud): dang //gang dag theg chen dga' ba dang //byang chub sems dpa' kun la yang //gang dag rtag tu gus gnas dang //phal gus dang ma la gus//bla ma mchid la rab brtson dang //
141b7(rgyud): gang dag pha rol don spyod la//snying nas rtag tu 'jug pa dang //gang dag dran zhing des pa dang //g.yo sgyu med cing chos brtson dang //lus dang ngag dang yid dag pa//de dag nye bar
142a1(rgyud): rtag gzung bya//gang dag snying nas 'jig rten 'di//'jig rten pha rol yid chos dang //bram ze rgya rigs rje'u rigs dang //dmangs rigs gang dag ches
142a2(rgyud): brtson zhing //sngags kyi theg pa rtogs 'dod pa//de dag bsgrims te gzung bar bya//nyan thos theg pa pa rnams min//zhar ba lag zha za ma dang //rkur po 'on pa mi thung dang /
142a3(rgyud): gang dag sna leb gyur pa dang //de bzhin mi g.yon gnod bag can//'jungs drang byas pa mi gzo dang //mkhas bsnyems sems dang g.yo can dang //sngags kyi theg pa skyed chen
142a4(rgyud): gyi//theg pa la ni ma mos pa//de dag nam yang gzung mi bya//de dag bstan 'dir skal ba med//bstan bcos mi shes mi bzung ste//tho du tho bu 'dzin pa dang //de bzhin bla ma mi
142a5(rgyud): gus pa/smad pa de dag ring du spang //gang dag yan lag ma tshad dang //rlung zhwa dag dang theng po dang //yan lag lhag par gyur pa rnams//mkhas pas bsgrims te yongasu
142a6(rgyud): spang //ji skad smos pa'i slob ma rnams//de tshe cho ga bzhin brtags te//gcig pu yod na'ang de gzung ngo //yang na slob ma bzhi zhig gzung //de nas sbyang ba byed bcug la/
142a7(rgyud): spos dang me tog rnams kyis mchod//dkyil 'khor nang gi sa la ni//ku sha gding ba gting ba la//nges pas slob ma lhan cig tu//der ni rab tu nyal bar bya//slob dpon
142b1(rgyud): yung tsam chun tsam zhing // slo ma rnams lan//b+h+yon rten ma na kyi//chos tu bshad par bya//gsang rdzog su brjod las byung ba ma//stan kun tu brjon parma/
142b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dpa' rnams kyi//rdzu 'phrul la sogs yong su brjod//pha rol rgyal snying rje ga//de dag yud tsam yud tsam brjod//nam gyi bzhi cha lus de'i tshe//ga
142b3(rgyud): sdom bzang min//dkon mchog gsum la gzhos rnams kyis//nu minas pa dang tshogs rab tu//sangs rgyas spyan sngar 'dug nas ni//khyed kyis de dag brjod par gyis//pad+ma
142b4(rgyud): steng du 'dug na mchog/bzung dang mthong ba'ang de bzhin te//rgya mtsho mthong bar dris pa dang //rgyal dang 'thongs po'ang de bzhino//sangs rgyas mthong na snang dga' ste//byang chub
142b5(rgyud): sems dpa' skyob rnams dang //'jig rten rang sangs rgyas rnams dang //nyan thos dag dang gang mkhas pa//de dag mthong na snying dga'o//me yi phung ba grags pa dang //ba gla
142b6(rgyud): kyu mchog glang chen dregs//d+hA ni dkar por gang gyur pa//de dag mthong dang zhon pa dang //ba lang khyu yang shis pa yin//bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang //rgyal po dge bar
142b7(rgyud): glegs pa dang //sdug pa'i gnyen dang grub pa dang //nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang //de dag mthong na shes par 'gyur//rmibs smra zhing gtam zer dang //rang gi mog za gcod pa dang /
143a1(rgyud): sha chen za bar byed pa dang //khrag gis khrus kyang byed pa dang //de bzhin mi gtsang nub pa dang //zho dang 'bras can za ba dang //chang yang 'thung bar byed pa dang //
143a2(rgyud): sgra 'dreg pa ni mchog yin no//so yang ltung bar gyur pa dang //ri dang shing ni n+ya gro dang //de la 'dzegs pa shis par 'gyur//legaso bu zhe 'am blo ldan zhes//sgra ni de skad thos
143a3(rgyud): pa dang //yid du 'ong ba'i bud med dang //nyin mo nyal po byed pa dang //tshangs pa drag po'i nyi ma dang //khyab 'jug dang ni zla ba dang //lus ngan po dang nor sbyin dang //brgya byin
143a4(rgyud): dang ni chu lha dang //de dag mthong ngam smras pa dang //'bol gtam byed na nges par 'grub//gzhan yang de lta'i rmi lam dag/dngos grub 'dod pa rnams kyis gzung //rmi lam
143a5(rgyud): de las bzlog pa dag/'jigs pa med kyis gzung mi bya//sa la rgyug dang 'tshong ba dang //gar byed pa dang glu len dang //dgod dang bong bu rnga mo la//zhon pa shin tu ngan pa yin//
143a6(rgyud): 'bru mar gyis ni lus brkus dang //gcer bu dag dang smyo ba dang //zhar ba theng po rkur po dang //mau sdug rnams dang phrad pa dang //phag rnams dang ni khyi rnams dang //bung bu rnams
143a7(rgyud): kyang de bzhin te//ma he rnga mo ce spyang dag/rmi lam mthong na rtag tu smad//rtse gsum rtse gsum gdangs thogs dang //mig dmar shin tu 'jigs pa dang //gcer bu dag
143b1(rgyud): dang sA le ba dang //dasngags mo byed pa'i 'jigs byed dang //mudrug mnag mi bzang chen po dang //gos skyon gzugs byed mi sdug pa//su yi rmi lam rmis pa no//de la dngos grub yod mi 'gyur//
143b2(rgyud): zung shig rgyob shig tshims shog ce 'am//zo shog ces pa'i mi bzang sgra//drag po'i jigs byed khro thos dang //phud dang ma rnyed thos pa dang //bya rgod bzhad dang bya gar dang //'ug pa
143b3(rgyud): bya rog byi la dang //byi ba sdig pa sre mo sprul//gang yang gzhan dag skye bo gdug/de dag rmi lam mthong gyur tam//reg par gyur na'ang mi dge'o//de nas phyi de nyin par slob dpon
