143b5(rgyud): du bya ba sbyin zhing khyed de ring zas kyi tshad shes par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o//nyi ma nub na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'jigs med kyi sregs blugs dang /yang sreg shing nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin
143b6(rgyud): bsreg bya'o//de nas a shwad tha'i shing ngam/yang na u duM ba ra las//sor brgyad tsam gyis so shing bya//thog ma gcig ni me tog brgyan//rdo rje drag po'i sngags bya ba la/
143b7(rgyud): dag la ni bca' phyir sbyin//shar gyi phyogasu mdun bstan nam//yang na byang phyogs bstan te bzhag/gsang sngags mgon po dran byas la//gar bltas de bzhin shes par bya//
144a1(rgyud): de nas byan slob ma rnams//smyung nga byed du bcugan su//rdo rje mi me zhes bya//srid pa drasum po rmis byed pa//rtag dran bya phyir de dag la//dri ma med
144a2(rgyud): pa'i gzungs byin bya//snying du sdug pa'i dam tshig bad//nyams pa la yang lhag par brjod//sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed//mchog tu bkra shis byed par 'gyur//byang chub
144a3(rgyud): sems dpa bri ldan pa//thams cad kyis ni ma yin te//sdig pa thams cad byung byed pa//de ni kun+d+ha tu rtag dran bya//slob dngon gyis ni thams cad do//rtag tu mnyam pa
144a4(rgyud): gzhag sems kyis//sna lnga'i tshan las byas pa yi//thig sras rab tu bzung blang so la//bsgrinas te sa~M 'di thams cad la//thog ni legs par gdab par bya//kyis 'khor
144a5(rgyud): kyil du 'dug nasu//sdigs pas de bzhin gshegs rnams la//de bzhin rdo rje 'chang ba dang //'khor los bsgyur ba dran byas la//bdag nyid der bsgoms byos nasu//de'i
144a6(rgyud): sngags yid kyis dran byas la//de nas shar phyogs kha bstan te//shar phyogs nyid du thig gda'o//de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis//nub phyogs kha bltas 'dug na su//
144a7(rgyud): nub phyogs nyid du thig gdabo//de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis//byang phyogasuM ni kha bltas la//byang phyogasu ni thig gda'o//de nas kyang ni bsgyur byas la//lho phyogasu ni
144b1(rgyud): kha bltas te//rnam par dbye ba shes pa yin//lho phyogs nyid du thog gdag//de ltar nang logs kyil 'khor ni//cha brgyad yod par rab tu bya//de nas de lta'i tshul gyis ni/
144b2(rgyud): phyogs bzhir yong su bskor byas la//kun tu glu bzhi lham par ni//rab tu bsgrims te thig gdab pa//dbus kyis gnas nas byung na su//me yi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la/
144b3(rgyud): sngags pas sngags kyi cho ga bzhin//shar phyogs ngos kyi thig gdabo//de nas chog shes pa yis//gus par dbang ldan phyogs song la//nub phyogasu ni kha~M bltas te//byang
144b4(rgyud): phyogs ngos kyi thig gdapo//dbang ldan phyogs nas song na su//rlung gi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la//de re ni lho phyogs khe bo ltas te//nub phyogs rjes kyi thig gdag/gnas de
144b5(rgyud): nas ni de byung la//bden bral phyogasu dong na su//me yi phyogs kyi bar du ni//thig skud legs par gdab par bya//kun tu gru bzhi lham par ni//de ltar gnas de byas na su//
144b6(rgyud): de nas phyi rol de bzhin du//cho ga bzhin du che brgyud bya//tshad ni bcu drug khru yin te//slob dpon nyid kyi khru yin//de nas byung la blo ldan gyis//cha gzhan dag ni bya bar bya//phyi
144b7(rgyud): rol sa dang bcas par ni//khru gang nyi shu rtsa lnga'o//der yang snga ma bzhin du ni//cha brgyad nyid du bcad par bya//brgyad pa nas ni bzung na su//sngags pa yis ni thams cad du/
145a1(rgyud): /'khor sa'i thig no gdab par bya//gnas gsum dag tu nges par yang //chang rgyad tsam yang 'cham pa yi//thog ma'i sgo ni gdod par bya//kyi lnga 'khor
145a2(rgyud): rim pa bar ma la//snga ma nyis 'gyur sgor shes bya//rim pa gsum par sum 'gyur dang //sgo gang dag kyang mkhas pas bya//rta babs dag gi tshad rnams ni//dbus kyi cha dang
145a3(rgyud): mnyam par bya//lha yi gtso bo rnams la yang //sgo gang dag ni bya bar bya//rim pa gsum du rnam dbye bas//de ltar dkyil 'khor legs phye la//sngags mgon gnas la
145a4(rgyud): 'dug na su//mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//tshon rdzi 'dir ni bye brag tu//rin chen sna lnga yin par 'dod//sa lu btags pa'i phye yang rung //ji ltar 'byor pas byar
145a5(rgyud): yang rung //gos dkar bgos shing gtsang byas la//dul zhing ze'u ko bcings nasu//bsgrims te byang shar phyogs mtshams nas//tshon rtsi dag ni dgye bar bya//rdo rje khro chung
145a6(rgyud): tshul gyis sam//yang na lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas sam//gnod kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis sam//rig byed 'don pa'i lag paso//thog mar dkar po bgyi bar bya//de yi 'og tu
145a7(rgyud): dmar po dgye//de yi 'og tu ser po sto//de yi 'og tu ljang ku dgye//thams cad dag ni nang rol tu//sngags pas tshon rtsi nag po dgye//cha brgyad dag tu gang bstan pa//
145b1(rgyud): dbus kyi cha yi cha rnams ni//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sto//de dag rdo rje bcing tshul 'dod//gdan ni pad+mar bstan pa ste//mchog tu dkar zhing mdzes pa yin//de yi steng du rdo rje
145b2(rgyud): ga/de banini rdo gtsug tA t+ta//me lce 'bor ba'i snying po //mdar nis don ldan par bya//de la shar phyog suM de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ma tog bzhug par bya'o//
145b3(rgyud): phyugasu de bzhin gshegs pa ma ta~Mg shin d+hu rgyus pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po'o//rlub phyugasu de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang dpag med//byang phyog su de bzhin gshegs pa mo 'khrugs pa'o//
145b4(rgyud): byu shir gyi phyogs mtsham sma de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can//shwar m+b+hi'-i phyogs mtsham su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gdogs// nub kyi phyogasu de bzhin gshegs pa
145b5(rgyud): thams cad ma'o//nub byang gi mtsham de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'dzi//mdor na dbus kyi baid+hi ni//'dab ma brgyad per brjod pa ste//'dab mi da// pu shar phyogs//nub phyogs
145b6(rgyud): ni dmar po nyi/khyod phyog su ni sa ba ste//kye phyagasuni nag pa nyid//'ad m+bu b+hag sa rnams kyin+tiH//rgyal ba rnams kyis 'drin ma gsus//de mi snang po'i da sa du na/
145b7(rgyud): bum pa zla 'od 'dra 'gro//de la steng du rlung chen ste//'di nang tog dang ldan par bri//blag ma 'dra ning drug po ste//dzad ni byar sprin mdag sa//rlu gi spyang du ma byis te/
146a1(rgyud): ni gru gsum gnas pa yin//rtags ni 'bras bu zur gsum pa//'jog pa'i dus kyi mo dang mtshungs//de yi dbus su pad+ma bri//'od ni dus mtha'i mo dang 'dra//
146a2(rgyud): de yi snying po'i dbus ni//'khor los bsgyur ba bri bar bya//de la bcom ldan 'das de ni gzugs sam phyag rgya 'am yi ge tse rigasu gzhag par bya'o//phyag rgya bzhag na rdo rje ste/
146a3(rgyud): bsgrims nas sa bon ldan par bya//de yi phyi rol cha rnams ni//brgyad po dag tu snga ma bzhin//sngags pas cho ga ji bzhin du//lha rnams rnam par dgod par bya//de le shar
146a4(rgyud): phyogasu ni kha lo'i dkyil 'khor du me'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs pa pad+ma sbyin pa'i rdo rje dang bcas pa rdo rje ud pa la'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o//shar lho'i phyogs mtsham
146a5(rgyud): su ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//lho phyogasu ni rdo rje'i
146a6(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas shing rdo rje 'chang thams cad dang /lhan cig tu rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o//lho nub kyi mtsham su ni rdo rje 'khor
146a7(rgyud): lo'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o//nub phyogasu ni
146b1(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du//byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod pa byi'o//nub byang gi mtsham su ni pad+ma rdo rje'i dkyil
146b2(rgyud): 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor dang bcas pa rim pa spyi rings kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//byang phyogasu ni pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub seMd
146b3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang dgod par bri'o//byang shar gyi mtsham sa ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub sems dpa' sa'i stong pa 'khor
146b4(rgyud): dong bcas pa rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod par bya'o//phyogs bzhi na 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'khir dang bcas par rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po nang du chud par byi'o//
146b5(rgyud): de la nyan thos kyi bu'i phyag rgya ni dbyug thaM yi no//'phags skyes pa'i phyag rgya ni be con//mig mi bzang gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o//lus ngan gyi phyag rgya ni zhags pa'o//phyi rol khor
146b6(rgyud): yug chen po'i dkyil 'khong ni gru bzhi lham po sgo bzhi btong po/sgo khong dang /rta babs dang /mu ran shin tu rnam par phye ba khor yug chen pos yongasu bskor ba'o//de'i nang rol
146b7(rgyud): du ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o//de la shar phyogasu ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//de'i byang phyogasu ni
147a1(rgyud): tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//tshangs pa'i byang phyog/su ni dbyangs can 'khor dang bcas pa di wang gi phyag rgyu dang bcas pa dri'o//
147a2(rgyud): de dang nye bar sa'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//de'i byang phyogasu ni dpal chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'am yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang
147a3(rgyud): bcas pa bri'o//dbang ldan gyi phyogasu ni 'byung po'i bdag po dpung ldan 'khor dang bcas pa mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//brgya byin gyi lho phyogs ni nyi ma
147a4(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa shing rta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//me'i phyogasu ni drang srong me'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//lho phyogasu ni
147a5(rgyud): gshin rje 'khor dang bcas gau shin rje'i be con gyi phyag rgya dang btsas pa dri'o//de'i shar phyogasu ni 'chi bdag gi dril bu dri'o//mtshan mo nag mo'i ni rtog/nag po'i ni zhags
147a6(rgyud): pa'o//drag po'i chung ma'i ni mdung rtse gsum pa'o//tshungs pa'i chung ma'i pad+ma'o//khyab 'jug gi chung ma ni 'khor lo'o//gzhon nu ma'i mdung thung ngo //phag gi chung ma'i
147a7(rgyud): ni the ba'o//tsA muN+Di'i ni mi thod//dbang po'i chung ma'i ni rdo rje'o//lus ngan gyi chung ma'i ni dbyug tho'o//gshin rje'i nub phyogasu ni yi dgas rnams 'khor dang bcas pa kha'i
147b1(rgyud): phyag rgya dang bcas pa dri'o//sha za rnams ni dra ba rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//gnon po rnams lcags kyi rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa dri'o//grib gnon rnams ni gdugs
147b2(rgyud): rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa di'o//brjed byed rnams ni lag pa dang la bcar ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//mkha 'gro ma rnams ni lag pa bkan pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//
147b3(rgyud): srin mo rnams ni mche ba rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya 'am lho rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//sha za mo rnams ni rdo rje bab col gyi lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas po bri'o//bden bral gyi
147b4(rgyud): phyogasu ni bden bral 'khor dang bcas pa ral bri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//nub phyogs kyi sgo'i lho phyogasu ni chu lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang /klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i
147b5(rgyud): rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//de nas sgo dang nye bar dbang phyug chen po mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//de dang nye bar dka'
147b6(rgyud): thub bzlog pa rtse gsum gdengs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//sgo'i byang phyogs kyi ngo su tshogs kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//de'i byang phyogasu thag
147b7(rgyud): bzangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas po dbyug to rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//rlung gi phyogasu rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa ba dan gyi phyag rgya dang
148a1(rgyud): bcas pa tha~M//byang phyogs rnam thos ts+tsha nu mchags pa danod spyan gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dbyug te rdo rje can gyi phyag rgyu dang bcas pa bri'o//de
148a2(rgyud): dag gi shur phyogasu khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcos pa 'khor la'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bro'o//de'i 'og tu na mkha' lding 'khor dang bcas pa 'dab mo'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dri'o//
148a3(rgyud): de'i shar phyogasasu ni sna tshogs phreng ba can la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po rnams dang /ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas
148a4(rgyud): pa bri bar bya ste/de la dri za dge gi phyag rgya rnams ni rnga phreng bu dang pheg rnamaso//mi 'am ci'i phyag rgya dag ni sku'i pi wang dang /pi wang la sogs pa bdung ba sbyang ba rnams
148a5(rgyud): de nas lto 'phye chen po rnams dang 'ba'i chu chen po rnams rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//de nas skyo dgu'i 'dag po rig byed 'don pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dri'o//
148a6(rgyud): de dag gi shar phyogasu zla ba 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma dkar pa dong bum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o//nub sgar ni kI li ki la rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri ste drug po'i rdo rje'i
148a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//byang sgor ni sgo srung gnyis bri bar bya ste/de la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu ni dbyug te'i phyag rgya dri'o//klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu ni zhags pa'i//
148b1(rgyud): phyag rgya bri'o//shar d+mor ni khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis bya bar bya ste/de la khams gsum rnam par rgyalnga ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa khri'o//bai con sngon po can ni be con gyi phyag rgya
148b2(rgyud): dang bcas pa bri'o//lho sgor ni thub par dka' tho bo'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bro'o//mngon phyogs na rdo rje'i phyag rgyo dang bcas pa bri'o//'og legasu ni rgya mtsho dang /rgya mtsho'i 'gram
148b3(rgyud): ni sring mo bzhi rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o//de la dum bu ru'i phyag rgya ni dbyug tho'o//rgyal mo'i phyag rgya ni mdung rtse gsum pa'o//rnam par rgyal ma'i phyag rgya ni pad+ma'o//
148b4(rgyud): mo pham ma'i phyag rgya ni 'khor lo/gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o//srin mo bzhi'i lho phyogasu ni smin drug bu 'khor dang bcas pa mdung thung gi phyag rgya dang btsos pa bri'o//
148b5(rgyud): byang phyogasu ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rnams ral gri dang ros la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas po bri'o//'khor thams cad kyi gnas ni thig ler bri'o//de dang de ltar lhag ma
148b6(rgyud): brjed pa thams cad ni thig ler byas te/thams cad kyang rdo rje drag pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o//dkyil 'khor gyi las ci bya ba de thams cad ni rdo rje drag po'i snying pos byin gyis
148b7(rgyud): brlabs te bya'o//lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las dkyil 'khor rnams dgod pa'i cho ga'o//cho ga shes pas de lta bur//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mchog bris te//byin gyis brlabs
149a1(rgyud): pa byas na//rab tu bsgrims te mchod pa bya//de nas bum pa zhabs ma gnag/kha yi chag shel kha can//mgrin pa ring zhing ste chag/nyi shu rtsa lnga blang
149a2(rgyud): bar bya//sa bon rin chen sman gyis bkang //spos kyi chus kyang rab tu bkang //kha rgyan yal gas/khebs byas shing //de bzhin 'bras bus kha bkang la//mgum chings
149a3(rgyud): kyis kyang bcing byas pa//kha dog ci rigs rnam par dgod//sgo bzhi po ni thams cad du//bum pa snga ma ji bzhin du//brgyad nyid du ni gsungs pa ste//dgu pA ni bsang
149a4(rgyud): gtor ba//rdo rje drag pos rnam kun tu//bsgrims te de ni sngags kyis gdab//bcu pa dbus su shes par bya//de ni 'khor los bsgyur la dbul//rta dbas rnams ni mdzes
149a5(rgyud): ba ste//rin chen rnam pa bzhi las byas//yang na yid 'ong shing las bya//tsan dan yang ni gzhan yang rung //dum bu ma yin ma gru gas pa//gas pa med cing 'dzer ba med//
149a6(rgyud): ba run dang sha ma dang //sa la ba'i kr-ing ka ta yang rung //rin chen dril bu rab sbyangs shing //dar dang ras la sogs pas rgyan//khru ni brgyad dam bdun nam drug/me tog
149a7(rgyud): phreng dang ldan par 'dod//steng du rin chen bla re bre//mu tig rgyan phreng rnam par sbyong //dar dang ras kyang sbyang bar bya//kyil 'khor bas ni che ba bya//kha dog sna tshogs
149b1(rgyud): du na/rnams myu ga ste//rlu ma // b+bam+b+ha rdzun b+hU g+h+ra/ g+sas sa nas pa nan //
149b2(rgyud): chen bzhi las byas pa 'am//de maud na sa las byis pa'i 'dzu/mtshad de'i go mig na sni ni rdo/ ldan pas brdeg par bya//sna tshogs skyesu gsus po ni/
149b3(rgyud): guku bum dang na tsan dun dang //s+thi ka la sogs ci yong rung //srog chags yan lag sun mi chung//sna tshogs gdug pa la bya ste//A ga ru da sbyin shing dang //
149b4(rgyud): sher bas gag na ts+tsha dang/ mu tsun do Sh+kaM/ rjes bzlas sna /sku
149b5(rgyud): bal dang dad+ma mjug/n+yem b+hak+Sha dang r+g+ha shing dang //gos dang mam//mya dran ched dang mya snar dang //ta//ra dang phrinag/do dka'i me tog 'dzes pa yin//kar bI gro myu dang//
149b6(rgyud): snum //me tog tu gas la bdu/na sa ni /mdang smra DI NA /chos
149b7(rgyud): bri dang//sbrang rtsi bzhag pa'i chung bang dang //maun baN+DI ba ni//spyan gi nas/ 'dra granas padashir ba d+he/mdang //ni byeng kau ga dz+nyAn//mi ga de na
150a1(rgyud): tse//sha ku la dang par pa ta//'bru yi la thug 'bring bu dang //shun di ba la gri dag dang //g+ha ra ka dang swasti ka/mon sran gre'u gyi zhu te'u dang //rtsa ba dang ni
150a2(rgyud): drungs pa dang //'bras bu sna tshogs dbul bar bya//sran tshod kha dog ldan pa dang //sge'u gsher nges par dbul bar bya//sran chod ril bu che chung dang //be 'ga' na dang saM b+ha
150a3(rgyud): d+hi//bu ram bsres pa'i khu sman dang //rab tu bsgrims te byas pa dang //bu ram sna tshogs bcos pa dang //kun tu rnam pa thams cad dbul//rnam pa sna tshogs zho dag dang //
150a4(rgyud): zho srungs bu ram btab nges dbul//'o ma legs par btsags pa dang //de bzhin btung ba rnams kyang dbul//kha ra'i dbu ba kha ra dang //mar dang bu ram 'bru mar dang //sbrang rtsi
150a5(rgyud): dang ni lan tshwa dang //dge bar grags pa dbul bar bya//btung ba bsgos pa byas pa dang //tam po la dang mal cha dang //snod spyad bzang zhing mdzes pa dang //rnam pa sna tshogs
150a6(rgyud): rtsi sman rnams//rab tu bsgrims te cho ga bzhin//byang chub sems dpa'i skyob la dbul//de nas so so re re la'ang //na bza'o ras zung re re dbul//me long mig sman yid 'od
150a7(rgyud): dang //dung dang de bzhin gi'u wang rnams//byang chub tshogs ni bkang ba'i phyir//mgon po kun la dbul bar bya//skyob pa rnams la thams cadadu//de ltar legs par mchod
150b1(rgyud): byas nas//de nas sngags pas sbyin bsreg bya//snying po cho ga bzhin du bya//srogs thugs nyi shu rtsa gcig no//cho ga bzhin du skyon bsreg bya//thams cad 'grub byed yid 'ong ba//ma
150b2(rgyud): dang 'o ma sbrang rtse'o//yi ge klog pa bzhi dag kyang //phyogs bzhi dag tu bzheg par bya//de la shar phyogs bzhag pa ni//'phagaso pa shes rab pha rol phyin//byang phyogasu ni
150b3(rgyud): mdo bzhag pa//gser 'od dam par dam pas bzhed//nub phyogasu ni bzhag bya ba//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yin//sdong po bkod pa tshul tshon ni//lho phyogs logasu
150b4(rgyud): shes par bya//dkyil 'khor lha rnams ji lta bar//de dag lo yang gus par mchod//dam pa'i chos ni klag pa ni//srung ba rnams kyi dam pa yin//de nas lha rnams thaMd kyang //
150b5(rgyud): de yi tshe na dgyes par 'gyur//gang dag 'jig rten mi srun pa//de dag phyogs phyogs 'gro bar 'gyur//de lta bas ni rnam kun tu//de tshe dam chos bklag par bya//slob ma thod
150b6(rgyud): bos nas//de dag la ni skyabs gsum sbyin//sdig pa mi bya brjod par bya//sdom pa dag kyang 'dzin du gzhug/mkhas pas tshi ga 'di bzhin du//byang chub sems kyang bskyed du
150b7(rgyud): gzhug/rdo rje drag po'i sngags chu yis//de nas kun la gosang gtor bya//de ma tshig yongasu brjod byas la//mkhas pas nang du zhugs na su//gos rnams yongasu brngos byas te//
151a1(rgyud): sngags kyis yongasu gdab par bya//dri tshwa snying rje ldan pa yis//slong ma de dag gdong bkab la//'khor los bsgyur ba'i dam tshig/phyag rgya sngags pas 'ching
151a2(rgyud): bcug ste//lag tu me tog sbyin byas la//de tshe snying khar yi ge bsam//skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni//me tog de dag 'thor du gzhug/blo dang ldan pas slob ma yi//rna
151a3(rgyud): g.yas rdo rje dril bu bzhag/rdo rje rnga zhes bya ba yi//lha mo chen po g.yon paro//me tog rnams ni gar bab pa//lha de de yi yin par 'dod//de ltar slob ma bcug byas nas///
151a4(rgyud): de tshe dam tshig bstan par bya//mkhas pas zhi bar bya ba'i phyir//'di ltar sbyin bsreg rab tu bya//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag ni rdo rje la
151a5(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //dbang dang de bzhin drag shul spyod//sbyin bsreg las ni mdor bsdus pa//sems dpa' chen pos brjod par mdzod//cho ga thad
151a6(rgyud): rgyas pa dang //de bzhin tha dad las kyang gsungs//sems dpa' chen po'i gnas gang du//me yi thab kyi khung bu bgyi//yam sreg shing ces ji lta bur//las ni ci zhig rtsam
151a7(rgyud): par bgyi//khyab bdag thab khung bka' stsol la//bdag gi the tsom bsal du gsol//de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo
151b1(rgyud): rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso//sems dpa' chen po lagaso legs//khyod kyi dri ba gang byas pa//de dag thams cad brjod par bya//g.yeng ba med pa'i yid
151b2(rgyud): kyis nyon//dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus su ni//sbyin bsreg me thab khung bu bya//de tshad gtan la dbab pa ni//khru grang tsam du brjod pa ste//mtho gong tsam zhig brkos na su//
151b3(rgyud): dbus su rdo rje bzhag par bya//kha khyer yang ni der byas te//mkhas pas mdzes pa'i gzugs bya//rtswa brtse mer dkris pa yi//ku sha dag ni der dgra mo//de ltar kun tu legs
151b4(rgyud): par yang //sngags pas shin tu dkrim par bya//ha tsang mi nye mi ring bar//sbyin bsreg me yi thob bya ste//tshul bzhin du ni byas nasu//der ni sbyin bsreg brtsams par bya//
151b5(rgyud): ku sha sbams steng bdag 'dug ste//de bzhin gshegs rnams dran byas nas//de nas me ni 'bar byos la//de la bsang gtor bya ba brtsam//de yi 'og tu me der ni//me
151b6(rgyud): tig gcig gcig bzhag par bya//de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya//rang gi phyag rgyas 'gug par 'gyur//de la me yi phyag rgya ni//lag pa g.yas pa drang brkyang ste//mthe bo
151b7(rgyud): mthe cung ngung du gzugs//sngags 'di dag gi 'gug par bya'o//na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ag+na yau hA byo k+Sha bya ba ha na ya s+yAhA/blo dang ldan pas rang sngags kyi/
152a1(rgyud): de nas dgang drugs sbyin bsre ga bya//de la dgang blugs phul nas ni//slob ma g.yon du bzhag par bya//de dag re re'i phyir yang ni//dbang blugs nyi shu lnga
152a2(rgyud): lha sreg/rnam pa sna tshogs las kyi rnams//'di lta bu dag rab bya ste//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //dbang dang drag shul spyod pa'o//zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg 'o mar bcas//mar dang
152a3(rgyud): 'o ma sbrang rtsi'o//rgyas la zho dang 'bras can dang //gang dag gzhazhon las gsungs pa'o//drag shul spyod pa tsher mar gsungs//dbang byar sdom ji bzhin du//las 'dod 'jigs
152a4(rgyud): pa med rnams kyis//ci rigs par ni sbyin bsreg bya//ji ltar rigs pa so so las//de dag las ni g.yon 'dug//yang na yid la gong 'dod pa//de ni ci bder sbyin par gyis//
152a5(rgyud): de yi tshe na slob dpon la//slob ma rnams kyis yon dbu'o//ma byin na ni dam tshig nyams//dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro//dper na nyi ma zla ba gnyis//'jig rten mig tu
152a6(rgyud): mkhas pas 'dod//de bzhin skye ba 'di la yang //slob dpon do ni mig 'drar 'dod//dper na me yi khams de ni//bud shing thams cad sreg par byed//de bzhin slob dpon
152a7(rgyud): shes par bya//mi shes bud shong sreg par byed//dper na chu yi khams de ni//'jig rten gdung ba thams cad gcod//de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang //gdung ba kun gcod
152b1(rgyud): shes par bya//dper na rlung gi khams de ni//'jig rten thams cad rtag tu sgrub//de bzhin slong dang na slong ma la//dge ba rnam par sgrub par byed//dper na lus can thams cad la//
152b2(rgyud): sa ni rten du grags pa yin//de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang //chos kyi rton du 'dod pa yin//dper na bcom ldan rnam snang mjed//chos kun rtogs par thugasu chud//de bzhin
152b3(rgyud): slob dpon shes par bya//dper na dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //gsang ba thams cad 'thun par 'dzin//de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang //'dir ni sngags kyis gsang ba 'dzin//dkon
152b4(rgyud): mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa rnams//de ni rtag tu brjod par byed//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi//bsngags pa chen po'ang brjod par byed//dper na sangs rgyas mig
152b5(rgyud): 'dra ste//yang dag lam ni ston mdzad pa//de bzhin bsdigs po 'jigs med kyang //theg chen gnas 'di ston pa yin//bdag ltar bsngags pa de bzhin te//slob dpon ji bzhin
152b6(rgyud): rgyal de bzhin//slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung //skyon rnams nams kyang gzung mi bya//yon tan 'dzin na grub par 'gyur//nyes pa rnams ni dngos grub nyams//slob dpon
152b7(rgyud): la ni smad byas nas//'jig rten dag na tshe thung zhing //de bzhin ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur //nya pa la sogs rigasu skye//'di ni nyes kun 'byung gnas te//mkhas pas bla ma
153a1(rgyud): snor mi gdag//chos 'dod rnams kyis slong dpon la//rtag par rgyun tu mnyes par bya//gang na rgyal ba'i sras gnas pa//sa de mchod rten 'dra ba yin/
153a2(rgyud): der ni rgyal sras thams cad dang //bdag kyang snying las chung ngu yin//sbyin sreg las ni dam pa 'di//dang 'gro khyod la brjod pa ni//sems can rnams la phan bzhed pa//mgon
153a3(rgyud): kho rnams kyis sngon chad bshad//sbyin sreg bya ba'i las rnams la//gong gis 'di ltar rnam shes pa//de ni sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin//dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/
153a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las mo'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par phye ba'o////'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/bam po bzhi pa//de nas byang chub
153a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras//sangs rgyas snga mas bsdigs pa yi//dbang bskur dkyil 'khor brjod
153a6(rgyud): bar bya//khru gsum tshad gcig bzhag na su//phyi rol kyil 'khor bri bar bya//de yi tshad ni khru bzhi ste//dkyil 'khor log su mngon phyogs bya//der yang sngags pas
153a7(rgyud): cha snyoms shing //kun tu gru bzhi lham par bya//sngags pas sngags kyi tshul gnas te//me yi phyogasu 'dug byas la//de tshe byang du mngon phyogs te//cho ga bzhin du
153b1(rgyud): theg srung bre//snga ma'i gnas na spangs nas//dbang ldan phyogasu 'jug byas to//rlu phyog/pa spyod yul bar du ni//byang phyogs ngos kyi thig gang gi/rlung gi phyog su 'dug nas ni//lha phyogs/
153b2(rgyud): ngos su mngon bltas te//bden bral phyogs kyi bar du'o//nub kyi gsongs kyi thog gdag//de bzhin rlung gi phyogs spangs te//bden dral phyog su 'dog byas des//de nas shor
153b3(rgyud): phyogs mngon bltas te//sngags pas gsang sngags rjes dran zhing //me yi phyogs kyi bar du ni//lho phyogs ngos kyi thig gang po//tshe go de bzhin thams cad kyang //gru bzhi
153b4(rgyud): lham par rab tu bya//mkhas pas thog ma nyid du ni//nang rim cha brgyad byas nas//'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du ni//mkhas pas rim pa gnyis bya//dbus kyi pad+ma mdor
153b5(rgyud): brjod na//'dab brgyad ze bar bcas pa ste//'dab ma'i bar bar thad dro//rdo rje dag ni bri bar bya//de dag la yang snying po bri//rang gi snying pos bskul nas ni//phyogs skyong brgyad po de
153b6(rgyud): dag kyang //ji bzhin gnas rnam par dgod//de la nang rol grwa rnams//'jig rten skyong ba rnam par dgod//bgegs kun zhi bar bya ba'i phyir//sbyor ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor bzhag/
153b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lha la ji lta bar//der yang mchod pa rab tu bya//ram dang bla re dril bu dong //gdugs dang me tog rnams kyang dbul//mu tog phreng sogs me tog phreng //ci nus ci
154a1(rgyud): khyor da sa d+har bya//del dadu phun phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gongs pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan po'o//rin pa chu sku bzhi'i bum pa rin po che dang /sman
154a2(rgyud): kyis bkang ba rin po che me tog dang /me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang /'od dpag med dang /mi 'khrugs pa dang /kun tu bzang po dang /sgri pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
154a3(rgyud): byams pa dang /sa'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa dag gis spyi bor dbang bskuraro//sngags pa pad+ma dam pa der//rab tu bzhag nas bdag nyid kyis//me tog spos kyis mchod
154a4(rgyud): byis la//mar me mchod yon dbul bar bya//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bden dang //sil skyani sgra rnams phyung ba dang //rol mo'i sgra sil snyan mang gis//yang dag mngon du
154a5(rgyud): dga' byas la//skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du//bsgrims te de ni dbang bskuraro//ji ltar gling bzhi'i dbang phyug po//'khor los bsgyur rgyal dbang bskur ba//de bzhin sngags
154a6(rgyud): pas ngo mtshar dang //bkra shis kun gyis dbang bskur//me tog rnams dang bdug pa dang //spros mchog rnams kyis yang mchod la//lag pa g.yasu rdo rje dang //g.yon du 'khor
154a7(rgyud): lo bzhag na su//slob ma de la 'di skad du//rdoslob dang ni khyod gyur te//de nas rdo rje ldan pa khyed//rdo rje chos ni rab brjod pa//sangs rgyas kun gyis khyed lag tu//ting 'dzin
154b1(rgyud): 'byung ba'o rdo rje byin//de nas 'jig rten tha~Md kyi//lag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul tshe//sdang ba rnams ni char bcad dang //bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa//de dag gdul bar bya ba'i phyir//'dren pa rnams/
154b2(rgyud): kyi rdo rje byin//ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal//bdag par bya phyir dbang bsgyur ba//de bzhin chos rgyal dbang bskur phyir//rdo rje blo ldan dbang bskur brjod//rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag
154b3(rgyud): rgyu yis//de la bsrung bar bya ba ni//slob mo rdo rje chos brjod la//lag pas bslang ba byas nas//dkyil 'khor chen po der khrid la//dam tshig dag ni rnam bsgrags te//byang chub
154b4(rgyud): sems ni btang mi bya//khyod kyis byams dang snying rje dang //lag na 'khor lo gzhar mi gtang //blo dang ldan pas thabs rnams dang //rdo rje bzhag pa khyed kyis ni//nam yang yongasu
154b5(rgyud): btang mi bya//blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang //sangs rgyas dam tshig 'di yin te//ji ltar rang gis lus bsrungs pa//de ltar khyod kyis 'di gsungs shig/de byas sangs rgyas
154b6(rgyud): byas gzo ba//sangs rgyas sras zhes brjod pa yin//gzhan du na ni dam tshig nyams//rdo rje can du khyod mi 'gyur//rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyi//rigs ni byang chub sems yin
154b7(rgyud): te//rtags ni snying rje yin zhes brjod//thabs ni dbang du bstan pa ste//rdo rje bzhag pa go cha bgos//rdo rje mtshon cha thogs pa yin//khyod la lha rnams phyog kyang 'tshal/
155a1(rgyud): khyod la srung ba kun tu byed//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang //rnam pa kun tu srung ba mdzad//lag nA rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i las dbang bskur ba'i rim par//
155a2(rgyud): phye ba rdzog so///de nas 'jam rab dpal ldan pa//ya mtshan gyis ni mig rgyas pas//rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad smras//dpa'o gzi brjid chen po legs/
155a3(rgyud): khyod kyis dkyil 'khor gang bshad pa//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa mchog/gang gis dngos grub thob 'gyur ba//gsang chen bcas pa yang gsungs shig/lha rnams
155a4(rgyud): thams cad so so dang //byang chub sems dpa'i blo ldan gyi//phyag rgya dang ni sngags bcas pa'i//sbyor ba rnams kyis rab sbyar dang //bsam gtan brtan bca' man ngag dang //
155a5(rgyud): rig pa'i chos ni gang yin dong /brtul zhugs dang ni spyod dang rtags//yul dang dus kyi rnam kun dong //zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //de bzhin dag shul spyod pa dang /
155a6(rgyud): 'byung po dag ni dgug pa dang //nor ba'ang rab tu dgug pa dang //gsang sngags spyi yi mtshan nyid dang //bye brag rnams kyang bshad pa mdzod//'jig rten 'di ni 'dor ba su/
155a7(rgyud): gzhan du 'gro ba su zhig gsungs//'di dang gzhan 'dres 'jig rten na//rnyid dka'o rgyal ba rnams gsungs dang //las ni gzhan gyis byas 'gyur lo//'bras bu gzhan
155b1(rgyud): spyod 'gyur ba dang //dkyil 'khor 'di dang sngags rnams kyi//'bras bu bdag la bshad par mdzod//sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'//mi yi lus kyang rnyed par dka'//gas//
155b2(rgyud): sngogs 'byung ba rnyed par dka'//dad pa phun sum tshogs pa dka'i//sangs rgyas kun gyis de ring khyod//phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che//bstan pa 'di yi bya ba la//gsang chen
155b3(rgyud): 'dzin par dgongs pa ste//dkyil 'khor 'di yi bar dag gi/cho ga rgyas par bshad par mdzod//de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
155b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso//'jam dpal legaso leg so//khyod kyis gang dris pa'i tshig de logs par smras pa ste/de'i phyir 'jam dpal
155b5(rgyud): rab tu nyon cig/'jam dpal de la dkyil 'khor gyi gsang chen ni lha gang yin pa de kho bo yino//kho bo gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor yino//lha'i gnas gang yin pa de kho bo'i
155b6(rgyud): gnas/kho bo'i gnas gang yin pa de dkyil 'khoraro//dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ni gsang sngags te/dkyil 'khor med par gsang sngags medo//'jam dpal gzhan yang dkyil
155b7(rgyud): 'khor ni/gzugs yod pa dang gzugs med pa'o//de la gzugs yod pa ni ri mor bri ba'o//gzugs med pa ni bri ba ma yin pa'o//gzhan yang bri bar bya ba ni br-i ru rung ba'o//
156a1(rgyud): mi bri ba ni brir mi rung ba'o//gzhon nu de la bri ba ma yin pa ni las thams cad bya'o//bri ba ni bya ba dang las kyis rgyu tsam du zad de de ni pha rol dad pa skyed pa yin
156a2(rgyud): la/gcig gis ni lha'i gnasu byin gyis brlabs par bya ba ste/don gnyis sgrub pa dang /bya ba dang /rnal 'byor tha dad pa ma yin pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'kho
156a3(rgyud): ro//slob dpon las dang /bya ba dang /dus dang /byed pa dang /nus pa dang /'dzin pa dang /bsam gtan du bya ba dang /man ngag dang /rnal 'byor thams cad dang ldan
156a4(rgyud): pa dag la dbang thob pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o//gzhon nu de la man ngag gang zhe na/'di lta ste/slob dpon dang /slob ma'o//slob dpon ni slob dpon gyi yon tan dang
156a5(rgyud): ldan pa'o//de ni de'i spyod pa'i rje su 'jug cing tshig bzhin du byed la mi slu ba'o//tshad ma de ni mno ngag go/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhan yang tshad ma gang zhe na/gang
156a6(rgyud): mdo sde dang gsang sngags kyi don mi slu ba dang por shes nas de'i ro myang ba dang /don de shin tu chud pas de las mi nyams pa dang /brtan par 'gyur ba de ni chos nyid do zhes tha snyad 'do Da
156a7(rgyud): pa de ni man ngag bshad pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang gsungs pa de de bzhin te/gzhan du mi 'gyur bas lha dang bcas
156b1(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad ma ste de ni mi smra ba'o//de mngon par rtogs pa dang /mngon sum du bya ba dang /'bras bu 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid//gzhan yang chos nyid thob par byed
156b2(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor la sbyor ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rig pa'o//'jam dpal gzhan yang yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i sngags pa ni rgyal ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du bzhed///
156b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni gsang chen 'di//rgyal ba rnams kyis sngon bshad//gzhan du bri ba 'ba' zhig ni//rgyu dang 'bras bu bral ba yin//'jam dpal gzhan yang lha rnam pa gnyis//
156b4(rgyud): te/'bras bu'i ngo bo dang /rnam par smin pa'i ngo ba'o//de la 'bras bu'i ngo bon chos nyid rtogs pa'o//chos nyid thob pa de gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu gang rtogs pa'o//'bras bu grang
156b5(rgyud): yin pa de rnam par smin pa'o//rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ngo bo'o//ngo bo gang yin po de tha snyad du lhung ba'o//tha snyad ltung ba gang yin pa dang /tha snyad kyi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni
156b6(rgyud): btags pa'o//de ni bya ba'o//bye ba gang yin pa de la so//chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni 'bras bu med/mngon par rtogs pa med/mngon sum du bya ba med/rnam par byang ba med
156b7(rgyud): kyang las dang rnam par smin pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'bras bu dang /'thob pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa
157a1(rgyud): dang /rnam par bya ba ston to//gzung ngo //stad//'dogs//rab tu 'jog go/rnam par 'brel to//'chad//tshul bstan pa sna tshogs kyis tha
157a2(rgyud): snyad 'dog go//'jam dpal gzhan yang los dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten
157a3(rgyud): 'di zhes bya ba dang /'jig rten pha rol zhes bya ba dang /skye ba zhes bya ba dang /rga ba zhes bya ba dang /'chi ba zhes bya ba dang /nad ces bya ba dang /rgud pa zhes bya ba dang /
157a4(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba dang /'dus byas zhes bya ba dang /'dus ma byas zhes bya ba dang /'gro ba zhes bya ba dang /'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /rig pa zhes bya ba dang
157a5(rgyud): shes rab ces bya ba dang /rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang /'dod chags zhes bya ba dang /zhe sdang zhes bya ba dang /gti mug ces bya ba dang /'ching ba zhes bya ba dang /thar
157a6(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba dang /bdag ces bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /srid pa zhes bya ba dang /de kho na zhes bya ba dang /yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang /mi slu ba zhes bya ba dang /
157a7(rgyud): mig ces bya ba dang /rna ba zhes bya ba dang /sna zhes bya ba dang /lce zhes bya ba dang /lus zhes bya ba dang /yid ces bya ba dang /gzugs zhes bya ba dang /sgra zhes bya ba
157b1(rgyud): dri zhes bya ba dang /ro zhes bya ba dang /reg ces bya ba dang /sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /chos zhes bya ba dang /dge 'dun zhes bya ba dang /nyan thos zhes bya ba dang /rang sangs rgyas
157b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bras du mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs
157b3(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /phyir mi
157b4(rgyud): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang /dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba dang /'dod tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /bden pa mthong po zhes bya ba dang /
157b5(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhan yang lha zhes bya ba dang /klu zhes bya ba dang /gnod sbyin zhes bya ba dang /dri za zhes bya ba dang /lha ma yin zhes bya ba dang /na mkha' lding zhes bya ba dang /mi
157b6(rgyud): 'am ci zhes bya ba dang /lto 'phye chen po zhes bya ba dang /mi zhes bya ba dang /mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba dang /skyes pa zhes bya ba dang /bud med ces bya ba dang /mo ning zhes bya ba
157b7(rgyud): 'dog so//'jam dpal de ltar na las dang rnam par smin pa med po la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /sems can gyi bsam gautan pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis
158a1(rgyud): 'dogs pa mdzad do//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/gang na mkha' lta bu'i chos de la ji ltar gdags pa 'am/rnam par rig par mdzad/lag na rdo rjes
158a2(rgyud): smras pa/'jam dpal las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa nyid la gdags pa 'am/rnam par rig par mdzad do//'jam dpal las dang rnam par smin pa med pa stong pa nyid
158a3(rgyud): yin la/stong pa nyid de la yang gcig ces bya ba'am/gnyis zhes bya bar 'dogs te/de ltar grangs bstan pa rnams dang /ming gi brdar byas pa rnams kyis 'dogs
158a4(rgyud): pa mdzad pa la ltos/'jam dpal gzhan yang na mkha'i khams las dang rnam par smin pa med pa ma yin na/na mkha' la yang sngon po zhes bya ba dang /ser po zhes bya ba dang /
158a5(rgyud): dmar po zhes bya ba dang /dog ces bya ba dang /yangs zhes bya ba dang /dag ces bya ba dang /ma dag ces bya bar 'dog so//'jam dpal de bzhin du las dang rnam par smin pa
158a6(rgyud): med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyasde bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dogs po mdzad/'dogs pa de yang las dang rnam par smin pa med pas byas
158a7(rgyud): pa yan na byis pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams kyis khong du ma chud par zad/de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba la gzhug pa'i sgo dkyil 'khor 'di rgyal
158b1(rgyud): brnams kyis gsung sa//gsum ni 'dus par gyur pa las//sngags 'byung bar ni 'dir bstan to//phyag rgya'ang de bzhin 'byung bste//gzugs can ma yin bstan du med//rtag tu 'jug rten
158b2(rgyud): gsum rnams//thogs pa med cing tshed pa med//dper na gtsub stan bsten na su//gau tsub shing gtsub pa byas gyur na//me yes rtsol ba byas rgyu las//stobs dang ldan pa'i me 'byung //
158b3(rgyud): de bzhin gsum ni 'dus pa las//gsang sngags dang ni phyag rgya lnga//tshan po dag ni 'byung 'gyur te//byung nas yid la gang bsams pa'i//las rnams byed par gyur pa yin//
158b4(rgyud): 'jam dpal dper na rige sngags 'chang rnams kyis bsams ma theg tu lha'i zas dang /skom dang /rgyan dang /rta dang /glang po che dang /shing rnga dang /bud med dang /khang khyi
158b5(rgyud): dang /gzhal med khang legs pa thams cad 'byung //'jam dpal de bzhin du gsang sngags dang /phyag rgya dang lha 'dus pa las thams cad 'byung //'jam dpal 'di lta ste
158b6(rgyud): dper na/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che skyon thams cad dang bral ba med par ma gyur ni de'i tshe gang bsams pa de thams cad 'byung //'jam dpal de bzhin du sngags kyi tshul yang khong du
158b7(rgyud): chud par bya'o//'jam dang lag gi/rang gi gzugs ya u s+pha sa te/lha'i dargyal la the tsam med pa thob pa de'i chags sngags kyi chos nyid nges/chos nyid ston te/
159a1(rgyud): /de'i tshe des tshig gis de'i rnam pa bstan pa na bya ba nus par 'gyur ro//'jam dpal brten pa'i chos nyid ji ltar las byed nus par 'gyur ba la ltos/'jam dpal
159a2(rgyud): 'di lta ste dper na/rgyal brten nas rgya'i 'bur 'byung bar 'gyur te/rdzus med na yang rgya'i 'bur mi 'byung la/yod kyang bya ba dang las dang bral na rgya'i 'bur mi 'byung ste/'jam
159a3(rgyud): dpal gnyis ka yang phan tshun du bltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyiraro//mis rtsol ba byas pa 'di las ci 'dir rdzas byung ngam/'on te las kyi bya ba de byung ngam/gang yin te/snga phyi
159a4(rgyud): 'gal ba'i phyir brten nas/gsang sngags sam phyag rgya 'byung ba tsam la ma gtogs par 'byung ba medo//'jam dpal sems can rnams kyis nyon mongs pa ji snyed par byang chub
159a5(rgyud): sems dpa' gzhan las rgyal ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed du blta'o//'di la rgyal bar byed pa su yin zhe na/phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang ldan chos kyi dbyings kyis rgyal bar byed//
159a6(rgyud): 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings nyid la rnam pa mang por brtags pa'i phyir te/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di ni gsang sngag so//'di ni
159a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//'di ni lha'o//zhes rnam par gzhag pa mdzad//chos kyi dbyings de ni gzugs can ma yin pa/bstan du med pa/gzung ba ma yin pa/dkrug pa ma yin pa//
159b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas rton cing 'brel par 'byung bar rnam par bzhag pas rnam par bzhago/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir bya ba thams cad byed//'jam dpal gzhan yang ji ltar
159b2(rgyud): gzhan gyis las byas pa la ji ltar gzhan spyod ces gang smra ba de ni 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/lha'i bu dbang phyug rang gi sems la dbang thob pa de 'dod pa bzhin du long spyod sna tshogs///
159b3(rgyud): la yongasu spyod par byed/'di lta ste/lha'i khang khyim dang /gzhal med khang la sogs pa dang /rta dang glang po che dang /shing rta dang /bud med dang /bza' ba dang /bca'i ba la
159b4(rgyud): sogs pa mngon par sprul nas bdag kyang yongasu spyod cing gzhan dag la yang sbyin par byedado//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de nyid kyis sngags de bsgrubs pa'i phyiraro//'jam dpal de bzhin du
159b5(rgyud): gzhan gyis byas pa la gzhan yongasu spyod do//'jom dpal gcig byed pa lo mang po yongasu spyod pa'i rnam grangs yod//dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am zhing pa bzhi no//
159b6(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhan yang 'jig rten 'od 'dor ba ni su/gzhan du 'gro ba ni su zhes smra ba ni 'jom dpal gang gi tshe sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs 'dus byas kyi khams la
159b7(rgyud): gnas pa de'i tshe de 'jig rten 'di yino//gang gi tshe sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs de nyid 'dus ma byas kyi khams la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/de bzhin gshegs pa
160a1(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten 'di 'dor zhing 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'o zhes 'dogs te/'dri ni chos nyid rtogs par
160a2(rgyud): gang zag gi tshig bla dag so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos nyid ni 'dus ma byas kyi khamasu rnam par gnas pa ste/de ni nam du yang 'dus byas kyi dri mas mi goso//'di lta ste dper na rdo
160a3(rgyud): rje ni 'dam rtsub kyi rnyog pa'i dri me'i skon thams cad kyis mi goso//de bzhin du chos nyid de yang 'dus byas kyi skyon thams cad kyis mi goso//'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo 'dus
160a4(rgyud): byas kyi khamasu gtogs pa dag ni nyon mongs pa can gyi rgyud du ltung ba ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa las byung ba'i sems pas srid par skye ba nyon mongs pa can rnam por sgru'o//
160a5(rgyud): de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas te 'du byed kyi tshogs 'di 'gags pa'i tshe lha'o snyam pa'am/mi'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal nyid rgyud de'i rjesu 'brel to//'di lta ste dper na rab tu phyis
160a6(rgyud): pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin blta ba'i mi ni bdag gis bzhin yon tan khyad par can 'di lta bus bzang ngo zhe 'am mi bzang ngo zhes rtog par byed kyis de dang tha dad pa yang ma yin//
160a7(rgyud): tha mi dad pa yang ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang 'khrul pa'i phyir sems la ngar 'dzin pa bskyed//'jam dpal mthong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gsang sngags rnams kyi dug
160b1(rgyud): dang dam sogs pa sos pa'o//ma mthong ba'i dus pa blud nan//slongan su pa dang /rtog pa 'dra ba dang dul ba bsam gtan rtogs pa'i 'bras bu thob pam+b+ha/rjesu dadagra ba dang dpag
160b2(rgyud): bya ba'i rnyog gre ba'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa/med ches pa'i lung gis sbyinapa dang /rnal 'byor dang /rigs pa dang /ldan pa dang rang gis myong ba'i rnam po ni 'bras bur bstan
160b3(rgyud): to/'di ni mi mthong ba'i 'bras bu'o//'jam dpal gzhan yang drag shul spyod pa'i las smras shig tsos gang smras pa ni bya dgos par gyur pa na khro bo nyid brtsam par bya ste/zhi ba
160b4(rgyud): sems dang /snying rje ba dang /byams pa'i rang bzhin dang /rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la blta bas lha'i gzugs dang /rang gi khro bo'i gzugs tha mi dad par sbyor ba dong ldan par
160b5(rgyud): bas me'i yang khro bo'i gzugs lo/gcig shos kyang khro bo'i gzugaso//rang bsgyur ba'i khro bos sngags kyi ngo bos bkug la myur du brang ngam/snying kha 'am/mgo 'am/lto 'am/
160b6(rgyud): rked pa'am/byin pa'am/rkang pa 'am/rgyab tu rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la srog chags thams cad dgod kyang rung /rtse yang rung /chags kyang rung /sdang yang rung /lam du
160b7(rgyud): 'gro yang rung /nyal yang rung /'dug kyang rung /'greng yang rung /chu klung gi pha rol dpag tshad brgyan 'dug kyang rung /lha la sogs pas bsrungs kyang rung /bdag la me sbar bas/
161a1(rgyud): sregs blugs shIny+tsa rtsa gcig sbyin bsreg bya'o//zhi ba la zhi ba/ma zhi ba la ni ma zhi bar gsungaso//de nas lag na rdo rje thogs pa med pa'i ngag gi 'khor lo'i

167a2(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hU daM ba ga pro gA ta/ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA ka ra tri pa thaM/so bi g+h+nAM badz+ra satwA//rdo rje lha'i sngags//na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khaM b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hA badz+ra nA gau

172a6(rgyud): tatethA ga ti b+h+yoHsod+d+ha mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hA badz+rA badz+ri N+Da badz+re mA bA ta~M kau s+yAt+ma/dran mo rdo rje gsod byed kyi sngagaso//na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga twe b+h+yaHsad+d+he mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA me kha la la

172b7(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ga dza kar+Na badz+ra lo tsa na tsaM tsi na lak+Sha swAhA/reg pa'i rgyal po glang po rna ba'i sngagaso//na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khi b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hU tra Ta badz+ra kany+tsi hUM

173a5(rgyud): nas skyes de'i kha nas byung ba dag yid dang yan lag thams cad las byung //de la lag pa gnyis las ni gzhon nu lag bzla so//kha nas ni gzhon nu rdo rje sde'o//rdo rje cod pan las ni
173a6(rgyud): gzhon nu rdo rje cod pan no//spyi gtsug nas ni gzhon nu rdo rje gtsug nas byung //rdo rje me tog rnams las ni gzhon nu rdo rje me tog/rdo rje me tog thod las ni gzhan nu rdo rje me tog thod//
173a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i bring las ni gzhon nu rdo rje brang ngo //rdo rje'i snying las ni gzhon nu rdo rje 'dug/rdo rje dpral ba las ni gzhan nu rdo rje zla ba'o//rdo rje'i smin ma las ni gzhon nu rdo rje smin ma'o//

175b7(rgyud): sad+d+hi su She b+h+ya sad+d+ha 'dru la badz+rad na ma nA bor ti min sa maldan/rdo rjeg sbyin mang rdzogs//do ni pa lagan rje rje ting 'dzin de las 'das te yang nyan
176a1(rgyud): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phya

176a3(rgyud): pa'i dus chen po'i tshe 'byung ba'i nyi ma bdun ltar 'bar ba/rgya mtsho'i gling chen po'i me sgron ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs za ba/'jigs pa'i

176a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chu shing gi tshal rtsa ba bcad pa lta bu dang /rlung drag po chen pos bskyed pa bzhin du 'bul nas/stan thams cad las khas bub tu 'khor lo chen po'i rdo rje'i

176b3(rgyud): chen po'i phyil 'khor lce gnas nas/de che bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid/ gnas pas gnas//de nas da bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mig na

177a5(rgyud): /sata/tras/ / sa pa/a ti ti te pe le ts+tsha//de das 'a ma de bzhin du gyur rims 'i dipa
177b1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu dag rigro pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje mi 'am pa mas rab tu mo su byed 'di dran par gyis shig dang /'di khyed la dran pa dang /bde ba dang /srog thob par byed par 'gyur//lag na rdo rje
177b2(rgyud): rig pa chen po 'di smras ma thag tu/de nas dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rjes 'khor de byin gyis brlangs nas mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa phyag 'tsha'o//bcom ldan 'das mi pham pa mas
177b3(rgyud): rab tu rmongs byed de la phyag 'tshal zhes smras te/skud cig de nyid la 'khor de langs nas kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' lag na
177b4(rgyud): rdo rje dang /'jom dang lo gzhon nur gyur pa la blta zhing tshig 'di skad ces smraso//kye ma ye shes kye ma skyid//kye ma sngogs shes bsam mi khyab//des ni bdage cag thams cad kyang //
177b5(rgyud): mgon dang bsam gtan dga' dang ldan//sems ni tshogs ni ma mchis par//sangs rgyas bstan pa lhor ldan 'gyur//sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni//bdag cag thad mchis
177b6(rgyud): nasu/cho gra'i rgyal po tshul chen 'dir//snying po dag ni dang bu mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang lag na rdo rjes dbang chen
177b7(rgyud): bo bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'du'o//na meHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+bA thA oM/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi snying po'i
178a1(rgyud): mchog lag tu/nga nar pa dang/sa nadun tung chub/da myang na nga na pa 'god pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
178a2(rgyud): sa rin rgyu rnams 'byung /sngags rnams nga/tshad sbyina'i legs pa'i las rnaM gyuchen po de na du chos thams cad kyi gni myur ba/gan
178a3(rgyud): hUM smras po/rdo rjesems dpa /rdorje zhes bya 'o //blangs dang ting nge 'dzin sa//dartul rnam par sti maM pa lags//don pa lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
178a4(rgyud): gyis byang chub sems dpa' lag nan rje la 'di skad ces smras//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi steng brgyal sring thams cad la dbang sbyin par bgyid pa 'ang lan suM gsal/na ma/san+na
178a5(rgyud): tA thA gau te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hA bi d+hAnA ya/mo l-i me li bi hu bi hu snehA//bcom ldan 'das stong pa 'dis bdag lha rnams kyi bdag po bgyid//bcom ldan 'das gang la
178a6(rgyud): zhig rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs par gyur pa der bdug gi snying po sgrub par 'tshal na/des dang por lag na rdo rje'i mdun du len sum 'bum bzlas brjod dgyi'o//
178a7(rgyud): thamar zeng shing gi lam sreg shing mer snang rtsi dang lhan cig rdul ni hrI gyi /batsham ldan 'das bdag gis de thas cing sgrib par bya'o//she
178b1(rgyud): mtho risu skye bar 'gyur ro//rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyas par 'gyur ro//lag na rdo rje la blta zhing zas mi 'chel bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyal srid 'thob ste/dam
178b2(rgyud): tshig nyams pa ni ma gtogs te mi 'grug/de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras//bcom ldan 'das klu'i snying po mchis te/
178b3(rgyud): des na bdag cag thams cad dbang du mchi'o//dngos grub stsal bar bgyi/srung bar dgyi'o//dug bsal bar dpya'o//na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA re re ra
178b4(rgyud): tin+d+ra ga le li ri/put+ta ri/dzaM hi swAhA//snying pa 'di'i sgrub pa lags te/rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam/mtsho chen por zhugs te lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas
178b5(rgyud): klu gang yang rung ba mngon du phyogs par mchis par mthong de ma/mtsho 'khrugs kyang de la 'jigs par ma bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur ro//tha mar seng ldeng gi yaM sreg shing yungs
178b6(rgyud): kar gyi 'bu mar las skyugs pas lan khri bzlas brjod bgyis te de lta na yang 'grub//de 'gro ba 'am mi 'gro ba'i dug rnams kyang bsams pa tsam gyis sel bar 'gyur/sgrub pa po'i
178b7(rgyud): las rnam pa sna tshog gis gzhan yang bsams pa tsam gyis 'gyod par 'gyuraro//de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos kyi bus byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la
179a1(rgyud): 'di skad ces smraso//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ba yang po 'dir grub pa po rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol
179a2(rgyud): bar bgyid pa'i rang gi snying po 'du'o//na maHsar+b+ba te thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA yak+Sha sha rau/kiny+tsi R+Sha ya si/sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/de bi maM bai shra pa Na pri ya swA hA/
179a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di sgrub pa des ring bsrol dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du gcig pu mchis te snying po 'di lan lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
179a4(rgyud): tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod pa dgyis la/mtshan thog thag tu til nag po zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar dang bsres pas lan sum khri sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'tshal ba de stsol bar
179a5(rgyud): 'gyu ro//zos mi 'chal bar lkog tu dben par gnod sbyin mo yid la bgyis te/nyin zhag bdun du lan khri bzlas brjod bgyis ni/gnod sbyin mo stsol bar 'gyuraro//lo
179a6(rgyud): gcig gi bar du nyin re zhing dran par bgyis na gter gtsog stsol bar bgyid//de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag

179b1(rgyud): sI ri sma shi/pa ri pU ra ya na/pra tI dz+nyi mAn+ti ta ke swAhA/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu dran par 'byed pa de'i slad bzhin du bdag rtag tu 'brang bar 'ba'o//
179b2(rgyud): ji ste sgrub par 'tshal na des ri'i rtse mor mtshos la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi zhing yungs kar dang /zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /mar bsres pas lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na

179b6(rgyud): du nyin gcig bzhin me tog gi sregs blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o//de nas nya'i gdugs la ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la mtshan thog thag 'bras kyi 'o thug sbyin sreg bgyis

180a4(rgyud): nya'i gdugs la ci 'byor pas mched pa bgyis la mchin thog thag gu gul shing gi yam sreg sbrang rtsi dang mar la skyugs pa khri sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/gang
180a5(rgyud): 'tshal ba de stsol to//ma grub na yang yul gru bzang po lnga stsol to//de nas chu dbang rmugs byed 'dzin gyis ba com ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/bcom ldan 'das
180a6(rgyud): bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir sgrub pa po rnams kyi don thams cad sgrub pa snying po mchog 'bulo//na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ku ru tsu ru/

180b1(rgyud): na nyi ma 'gyur ba'i tshe ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sa ya bzlas brjod bgyis na/rgyal srid dam/gter chen po stsol to//be'u wa~M la lan cig bsngags te mig la bsdus na gang bltas pa

180b3(rgyud): 'gyur//phyugs chung 'dod na zhag bdun gsum du nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan la sngags lan gcig btab pa'i me tog phog par bor na rnyed par 'gyur ro//rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na

180b6(rgyud): bdag gi snying po 'di sgrub par bgyid pa des srung ba bgyis la bskyed mos tshal gyi phyogs gtsang mar shing mya ngan 'chang gi 'og tu lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//tha mar gzhon nu
180b7(rgyud): la ci 'byor pas mcho de mtshan thog thag a ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs la bzlas brjod bgyis na nam phyed dam nang par de la bdag bstan par bgyi'o//dam pa gang 'tshal pa stsol to//
181a1(rgyud): zan mi zla bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nyid du gnod sbyin mo mchi'o//gang 'tshal ba de stsol to//ji ste mi mchin 'gum par 'gyur//de nas gnod sbyin
181a2(rgyud): gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtsen gyis btud nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'od skad ces smras//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang sgrub pa po gsang sngags sgrub pa la brtson pa rnams
181a3(rgyud): la srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sra ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dor rang gi snying po 'bu'o//na maHsar+b+ba tA thA ga twe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hA ba d+hil pany+tsa mu kha b+hAn+ti
181a4(rgyud): ka h+ni hU~M rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dam tshig thob ste/gosang sngags sgrub par 'tshal na nges
181a5(rgyud): thog ma kho nar bdag gi snying po 'di lan cig brjod par bgyi'o//de la srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /smra ba bgyi ba'i slad bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can bdag de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi'o//
181a6(rgyud): bdag mchi ba'i snga ltas ni sgrub pa po de'i lus la lha'i spros dri zhim po'i nged 'bab par 'gyur/spro ba'i stobs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/bgegs thams cad ma mchis par

181b3(rgyud): 'khor bgyis la/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ro bsams nas lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na grub par 'gyur te gzhan du mi 'gyur ro//de nas thags zangs ris la sogs pa lha

182a1(rgyud): yo byad thams cad kyang stsol bar 'gyi'o//dngul chu dang sman bcud kyis len thams cad kyang stsal bar 'byar//de nas sna tshogs phreng ba can la sogs pa
182a2(rgyud): dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbu mo//

182a4(rgyud): dri ze'i rgyal po zhes bgyi'o//lha'i bde bo'i rnam pa sna tshogs myong ngo //mdor na bgyi ba bgyid pa thams cad nuso//mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas thams cad na mchis//
182a5(rgyud): jidzi ste gang la la zhig sgrub par 'tshal na/des thog mar ri phug tu ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la snying po 'di 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas grub par 'gyuraro//tha mar
182a6(rgyud): duru sgra'i 'bru mar gyi mir me la bus la/a ga ru ri yam sreg shing khro sbyin sreg bgyis na/de nas de'i bsam pa yangasu rdzogs par bgyi'o//go'u waM la sngags kyis

182b3(rgyud): ci'i rgyal po zhes 'gyi'o//sil snyan dang /reg rdob pa dang / ma'i/nici brjod du 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhadas kyi drung du
182b4(rgyud): ma'o//wA d+hA m+bu gan rnams cad du kun gyis kyi du //snang po lung mi brjod/ji m+b+ha glang ma la zhig sgrub par 'tshal na/des gcig pur dgon par blo
182b5(rgyud): mo'i zas 'tshal zhing snying po 'di ldan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod 'byo'o//tha mar ba lang gi lci ba su lA me lhung bar sna lnga dang bsresmai pas dkyil 'khar bsdus la ci 'byor pas mchod de/
182b6(rgyud): gur gum gyi skyegs thugs lan khri sbyin bsreg bgyis na di nas grub par 'gyur te/mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis bkur cing gang 'dod pa de bgyid//de nas rnam

183b1(rgyud): par mi bgyi'o//'di skad du phyag brnyan dag tu gyur cig ces brjed par bgyi'o//de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/de slan chad ci 'chal ba de babyed//de
183b2(rgyud): nas 'jigs rung ba la sogs po srin po'i rgyal po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lag ni rdo rje la 'di skad ces swA s+ho//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir

183b5(rgyud): gang la la zhig 'di sgrub par 'tshal na/des dur khrod du du ba 'thul bar zasu sha 'tshal zhing gos sngon po bgos la lag tu ral gri thogs te/snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o
183b6(rgyud): tha mar 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyi'o//ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyi sa la nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas srin po'i bdag po gang yang rung ba zhig mche bar
183b7(rgyud): 'gyur te/de la 'jigs pa mi bya bar mchod yon stsa lo la bdag la 'dod pa'i gzugs can gyi dngos grub byin cog ces brjod par bgyi'o//des ral gri de drangs nas stsol bar mi
184a1(rgyud): 'gyur te/de nas ltar 'gro ba can du 'gyur/ngo mtshar gyi las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur//de nas drang srong chen po mes byang chub sems dpa'
184a2(rgyud): leg na rdo rje lo 'di skad ces smras so//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sgrub pa po rnams la sman pa'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bulo//na maHsar+b+ba ta
184a3(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA ka pi la dz+yo ti ni ra Na bi ga la lo tsa na swA hA/bdag gi snying po 'di ni re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyid pa lags te/'dis bdag kyang bkug
184a4(rgyud): te dbang du mchi'o//dpal bskyed par bgyi'o//nor stsal bar bgyi'o//rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na nor 'du bar 'gyur ro//snying po 'dis bza' ba'i sbyin sreg bgyis na bza' ba
184a5(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyuraro//mdor na rdzas gang sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i rdzas de 'byung bar 'gyuraro//ji ste sgrub par 'tshal na ri'i rtse mor mchis la slongs mo'i zas 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan
184a6(rgyud): 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//thi mar ci 'byor pas mchod de me thab bgyis la rgya shug gi yam sreg shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la skyugs la lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o//de nas grub
184a7(rgyud): par 'gyur te dge' mgur las rnams byed//de nas sprin gyi phreng ba can la sogs pa rlur lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' ga na rdo rje ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar bas
184b1(rgyud): bdud 'di skad ces smraso//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bu'o//sgrub pa po dngos grub grub par 'tshal ba rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongasu
184b2(rgyud): /rdzogs par bgyi'o//na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA b+ha ma ra b+ha ma re/tsa pa li tsaM pa li/ke he ram+bi ni swA hA/'di bdag cag gi snying po mchog lags te 'dis bdag
184b3(rgyud): cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin bgyi'o//byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lung dang mi 'gal bar bgyid//phan pa
184b4(rgyud): dang bde ba sgrub par bgyi'o//byang chub sems dpa'i spad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa des thog mar snying po 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis na/de nas bdag cag gis de'i bgyi ba
184b5(rgyud): thams cad gnang bar bgyi'o//ji ste gang la la zhig sgrub par 'tshal na/des zas mi bza' bar lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o//tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de ba lang gi lci ba sa la
184b6(rgyud): ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor lnga bgyi'o//kha dog sna tshogs kyi ba dan bdun bzhag/de nas ba dan 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas grub par 'gyur te/bskyed pa dang /dgag
184b7(rgyud): pa la sogs pa las rnams dga' mgur bgyidado//de nas skar ma'i rgyal po zla ba byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khar
185a1(rgyud): chen po 'dir rang gi snying po gdul ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dpal yang dag par 'jog par bgyid pa 'bu'o//na maHsar+b+ba tathA ga te b+h+yaHsan+d+hu

185a6(rgyud): khar nas kun nas 'khod par gyur te 'dug/de nas gru bo par 'gyur te gdung ba ma mchis pa dang /namakha' la mtsho bar 'gyur te/bdag gi gzhal med khang du m+b+hi

185b1(rgyud): gza' thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po gzi brjod dang stobs thams cad pa zhes bya ba mchis te/sgrub pa

185b5(rgyud): ma gang yang rung ba zhig mtsho bar 'gyur te/de la mchod yon la sogs pa stsal la gang 'dod pa de bslangs la/de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mchi bar 'gyur te gang 'dod pa

185b7(rgyud): bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor 'dir rang gi snying po 'bulo//na maHsar+b+ba ta thA gau te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM pa ma pa ti bi ra dza swA tA/gang la la zhig byang chub sems
186a1(rgyud): dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa des snying po 'di/bzlas brjod bgyis na/de rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag par 'gyur ro//spyod pa gtsang ma thams
186a2(rgyud): cad la blo mngon sum du 'gyuraro//ji ste sgrub par 'tshal no//rgya mtsho chen por mid pa nub tsam du zhugs la/snying po 'di lan 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
186a3(rgyud): de nas tha mar rin po che sna bzhi las klu bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod de/klu'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig gnas kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis la mchod yon skyel te/ji ltar
186a4(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o//de phan chad gang bsgo ba de babyed do//de nyid du zhugs nas lo mang por gnaso//de nas khyab 'jug gi byang chub sems

186a7(rgyud): par bgyi'o//phung bar bgyi'o//yams kyi nad dang /gnod pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o//gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de'i blo nyams par mi 'gyuraro///
186b1(rgyud): ste snying po 'di sgrub par 'tshal na rwa'i rtse mor mchis la lan lnga 'dum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//tha mar grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa drang ba'i rnam lnga du sres pas khyab 'jug gi gzugs lag pa bzhi pa

186b6(rgyud): ba dang mi rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gsum ma rungs par bgyid//dbang du bgyid//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'bu'o//na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga teb+h+yaH
186b7(rgyud): sar+b+ba mu kho b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA hUM phaT/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni thams cad pa'i nor lag so//byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo sprad pa gang la la dran par bgyid na
187a1(rgyud): bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o//yi dgas kyi tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig bka' bzhin bgyid do//'jig rten gsum yang dbang du
187a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro//ji ste sgrub par 'tshal na/des dur khrod du lus thal bas byugs la mi mgo 'am thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan thogs shing lag na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs te khri'i zur shing khyer
187a3(rgyud): la/stag lpags kyi sham thabs 'tshal cing slongs mo'i zas bab bab tu 'tshal la snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas du ba 'thul ba'i dur khrod du ba lang

190a6(rgyud): gsang sngags brjod ni/nam phyed dam nyi ma shar na/ma he s+thA 'byin pa 'am/betson 'gul te/mchod yon la sogs pa stsal la bri bar bgyi'o//de nas grub par 'gyur//

190b6(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyu ro//de nas mchi bi dag gis rang gi snying po smras pa/na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ti b+haHsar+b+ba mu khe b+haHsar+b+ba thA I pra ti ha ta ke te karma pra sha a bu ke de be bar de s+thA hA/bcom ldan
190b7(rgyud): 'dis bdag gi snying po 'di gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag de'i drung du mi mchi ste sngon gyi las nim gtog so//ji ste sgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du sgrub par bgyi ste/
191a1(rgyud): dril bu bzhago/de nas dpal byed kyis rang gi snying po smras pa/na maHsar+b+bad+ya thA ga teb+h+yaHs+yAd+ham+ba khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA thA kr-i d+d+himan+tat+ne d+ho b+ha ga ba tI/ma tI mu khri s+yAt+ma/
191a2(rgyud): gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par dpyid na bdag de'i drung du mchis te/'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba/bla me le smod pa ni ma gtog so//ji ste sgrub par
191a3(rgyud): 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du sgrub par bgyi'o//'bras kyi 'o thug lan rma can bzhag par bgyi ste/phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol to//de nas rna nag mos rang gi snying po smras pa/

191a5(rgyud): ji ste sgrub par 'tshal na des sde ma bzhin du sleb par 'gyi'o//bye blag tu ni phung ma'i me dang bces pa'i ma snod bzhag par 'gyu'o//su zhig de lta du bgyid na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin
191a6(rgyud): 'drang bar bgyi'o//de nas ma mo thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btu de 'di skad ces smras//bcom ldan 'das ma mo drag po bdag

191b3(rgyud): 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyis la ci 'byor pas mchod/mtshan ldog thug sngags babring nor bu dang ril ba spyi blugs lag na thogs la/oM zhes bgyi ba'i

191b7(rgyud): nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//tha mar ci 'byor pos mchod/rdang du ke ra ka'i me tog na dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la skyegs pa ba ni l+li du dgye mer sbyin sreg bgyi'o//nam phyed na khyu
192a1(rgyud): mchog gi sgra 'am oM zhes bgyi ba'i sgra graka par 'gyur te/de nas ma mo thams can 'grub par 'gyuraro//de nas khyab 'jug gi chung mas rang gi snying po smras

192a4(rgyud): ston zla tha chung che sa bcu gnyis la ci 'byor pas mchod/man da ra ba'i me tog mar la spyugs pa la lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/gang 'tshal ba de stsol to//

192b1(rgyud): mchod pa ladu r+m+ma thAg nam sa mtshan thogs du rgyu su hrAT+Ta'o//nam pyod dam nang bar gnon nu ma mchis nas mdun du 'grod b+h+yo/do mtshad yon stsol to//de phyin chad byu

193b1(rgyud): zhing lag na be con thogs la shing drung cig na mchis par snying po 'di lan sum khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o//tha mar de nyid du ci 'byor pas mchod pa la 'bras yos kyi srog drugs zho dang spang

196b3(rgyud): ldan 'das gang lnga la zhig slong po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyis na/de la 'byung po'i jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung //de nas rnam par 'byam pa la sogs pa grib gnon rnams kyis byang chub sems

197a1(rgyud): yi dgas kyi tshogs thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras//bcom ldan 'dab bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang

197a3(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid//de nas legaso rgyal la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso//bcom ldan
197a4(rgyud): 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir bdud kyi stobs thams cad pa zhes bgyi ba'i snying po 'bu'o//na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khaM b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA taM gi raM swA hA/bcom
197a5(rgyud): ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/bdag cag de'i gan du mi mchi bar srung ba bgyi'o//ji ste sgrub par 'tshal na des thog ma kho nar gtsang mar bgyis shing
197a6(rgyud): gos gtsang ma bgos la bskyed mos 'tshal lam/lha chen po'i gnasu glu len gar bgyid cing rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin pa dag gis yid dga' bar snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas
197a7(rgyud): brjod 'byi'o//de nas de nyid du yo byad thams cad kyis rgya cher mchod la spos thams cad las 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs bgyis te/mar gyi mer me brgyad bus la glu Sha Ta ba 'am/
197b1(rgyud): mad d+hA ra'i dbyangs kyi mtshan thog zag tu bzlas brjod pagyis nanam byed na dgang ma 'am/sdug ma dang lhan cig tu mchis shing /de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/mo snang bar 'gyur ba 'am/
197b2(rgyud): rjesu rgyu ba nyid kyang rung ste dam pa stsol to//ji ste me grub na grong dam pa brgyad stsol to//skal pa bzang po mchog dang ldan zhing 'dod pa'i lha gnyis pa dang 'dra bar sa li rgyu bar 'gyur//de
197b3(rgyud): nas rgyal ma sogs pa sring mo chen mo bzhi nas 'ongs te 'dug nas de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor
197b4(rgyud): chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bu'o//de nas rgyal mas rang gi snying po smras pa/na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA tsa yaM tsa yed b+ha be swA hA/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig
197b5(rgyud): bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o//srung bar bgyi'o//dpal bskyed par bgyi'o//bu mang por bgyi'o//bskal pa bzang po stsal bar
197b6(rgyud): bgyi'o//dza ste sgrub par 'tshal na des rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu'i klung du zhugs kyang rung /ri'i rtse mor mchis kyang rung /snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//tha mar gcig pus
197b7(rgyud): sa phyogs gtsang ma dben par ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor byugs la/ba ser mo'i mar gyi mar me bus te/nam gyi gung la yungs ker gyis sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas
198a1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//skye bo thangs cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang /'dod dashur 'gro ba dang /'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang /dpal dang ldan par 'gyur//de nas
198a2(rgyud): rnam par rgyal mas rang gi snying po smras pa/na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsad+d+ha mu khe b+h+yaHsad+d+ha r+thA dza yau ta ra dzA ya ba dze yi ni dan+da ni s+yAt+ma/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po
198a3(rgyud): 'di dran par bgyid na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o//tshe ring ba dong nad med pa phun sum tshogs par stsal bar bgyi'o//srung bar bgyi'o//ji ste sgrub par 'tshal na des yang
198a4(rgyud): snga ma bzhin lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod pa kye'o//tha mer snga ma bzhin du sgrub par bgyi'o//pa grub na yang skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur//nor chen po dang ldan pa lan swA bA /
198a5(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas mi 'pham mas rang gi snying po smras pa/na maHsar+b+ba ti thA gra te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba pu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+h+yo an+te a dzi te s+thahA/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di
198a6(rgyud): dran par bgyid na bdag de'i bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du rtag tu slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o//ji ste sgrub par 'tshal ni des snga ma bzhin du snying po 'di lan 'bum
198a7(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyi'o//tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de/mtshan thog thag tu gu gul gyi bdug pa sreg cing til nag pos rnam gyi gung la sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/
198b1(rgyud): gang 'tshal ba de bgyid//de nas gzhan gyi mi thub mas rang gi sbyang pa smras pa/na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA A na rdza bo a ku tI la a b+hu rA dzo ti swAhA/bcom ldan 'das
198b2(rgyud): gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag de srung ba'i slad du rtag tu smad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o//snying po 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na skye bo thams cad kyi steng du sdug pa dang /
198b3(rgyud): gzung ba'i tshig dang skal pa bzang por 'gyur ro//ji ste sgrub par 'tshal na nges snga ma bzhin du snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod/klu shing gi me tog
198b4(rgyud): mar dang bsres pas lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na de dag grub par 'gyur te/tshig tsam gyis las bgyi de gzhan du mi 'gyur ro//de nas tum bu ras byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la
198b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smraso//bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyi slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir
198b6(rgyud): ring gi snying po 'bul//na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA oM he dzaM b+he au he mo he swA hA/bcom ldan 'dis bdag gi snying po 'di ni gdong bzhi pa phyogs bzhi nas byung ba/skye
198b7(rgyud): dgu gnas pa/'byer pa/'byin pa/sdud par bgyid pa ste/'bru dang /bsangs dang pakra shis dang /dpal dang rnam par 'byor pa 'phel/ngo mtshar mang po rnams dang ldan/'di ni bcud
199a1(rgyud): kyis len gyi mchog/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dus thams cad du yid la bgyid na/bdag 'khor dang bcas te de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar
199a2(rgyud): bgyi'o//ji ste sgrub par 'tshal na ngos 'greng yang rung /'dug kyang rung /nyal yang rung /lam du 'gro yang rung /bdag la rnam par god pa bgyis pa bzhin du skyes bu bcing bar
199a3(rgyud): bgyi'o//gdong bzhi pa rnam par bkod la phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o//de nas tshes gcig nas brtsams te/zla ba nya'i bar du bgyi'o//ci 'byor pas mcho de 'braso sa lu btags pa

199a5(rgyud): su bzhag/ta zhes dgye ba lho phyogasu bzhag la/dngos grub 'tshal bas rtswa ku sha la sbams pa'i steng du mchis te/nub gcige lan tshwa'i sogs blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na/
199a6(rgyud): nang par dngos grub ci 'tshal ba'i bris bu stsol to//bzlas brjod bgyis na yi ge gau rims bzhin du rig par bgyi'o//de nas lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la
199a7(rgyud): bltas nas legs zhes bya ba byin te/grogs po dag 'di ltar khyed kyis dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po rnams smras shing phul ba dang /rje su yi rang ba ni grogs po dag
199b1(rgyud): legaso legaso//snying po 'di dag ni snying po mchog gis drangs pa ste/de bas na 'di dag ni snying po mchog gis zin pas dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur ro//gang la la zhig bstan pa 'di las 'das na snying
199b2(rgyud): po mchog gis rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu mched cing 'bar bas de'i mgo 'gems par 'gyur gyis/gzhan du ma yin te/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mag ni gcig tu smras pa/byang
199b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa de bzhin du gyur cig/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe rdo rje ye shes chen po'i 'od 'phro 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
199b4(rgyud): zhugs nas lag pas lag na rdo rje las rdo rje blangs te/ye shes las byung ba'i ud pa la dri ma med par byas nas ye shes chen po las byung ba'i ud pa la de la rdo rje bzhag/rdo rje chen po de bzhag
199b5(rgyud): ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du kye ma 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig
199b6(rgyud): nas gcig tu 'ur ces grag so//de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying ka nas mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po byung //nA maHsar+b+ba tA thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu kha b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA many+dzu badz+ra dza ya
199b7(rgyud): ra ti ta bi las hUM kri da na ku mA ra swA hA/rdo rje'i snying po'i hUM zhes bya ba mchog dang ldan pa byung ma thag tu de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
200a1(rgyud): 'as rnams de na bzhugs bzhin du phyug g.yas pa btung ste/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mgo la byug nas bka' stsal pa/rdo rje chen pa legs legs/

200a4(rgyud): de'i tshe dngos grub sgrub pa'i rim par phye ba smras pa/thog ma nyid du ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/sku gzugs sam/dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du snying po gang yang
200a5(rgyud): rung ba rgya cher brjod de//sleb dpon mgu bar byas la gsol ba gdab ste/slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag la gsang sngags stsal du gsol zhes
200a6(rgyud): brjod par bya'o//slab dben la de skad ces gsol ba btab nas/thal mo sbyar te dngus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs la lag pa stong pa ma yin pas sngags ga 'dod baM mnod par bya ste/
200a7(rgyud): byang chub kyi steng pa la gnas kyi bar du zhes tshig brjod par bya'o//gzhan du sngags bdag gis blangs ni ni grub par mi 'gyuraro//de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa snying po'ang
200b1(rgyud): dag gi spyi'i dngos grub sgrub nga yin te/re 'am/nabs tshal 'am/khang stong ngam/phug gam+b+ha/dur khrod dam/chu klang ngam/dben pa gang yang rung ba der gnas la slong mo'i
200b2(rgyud): zas zla yong rung /slongs pa ma yin pa'i zas za yang rung /gtsang mar byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos la//dus gsum du khrus byas zhing gosde ldan gsum brdzes te/snying po gang yang
200b3(rgyud): rung ba zhig lan+da sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas ldong ros sum/mi go bu mig gam/gi wang dam pa'i rnam lngas bkrus kyang rung /ba lang gi lci ba'i phung po'i sten du bzhag kyang rung
200b4(rgyud): te/zla ba yar gyi de ches nas bzung ste/nya'o bar du bzhago/bdag gis lha dang bdag gI gzugs tha mi dad par byas la mtshan ma byung gi bAr du bzlas brjod bya'o//de la mtshan ma 'di min
200b5(rgyud): sngon ma byang ba'i chos thos par 'gyur ba dang /snang ba mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /yi du 'ang ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phun sum tshogs ngo myong ba snyam du shes pa dang
200b6(rgyud): bdag nyid la yid ches par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'byor//de nas zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas mdzo de/rjes de lag pa'i snyam pad+ma bcug lo mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod
200b7(rgyud): byas na/nam phyed dmanyam 'charo kang rdzas de 'bar ba 'am/du bathu lo ba 'am dro bar 'gyur//'bar ba mi lus lo bskus na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/nyi ma shar ba lta bu mdog can dang /bsku
201a1(rgyud): bar gnas pa dang /thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad du rgyu ba dang /'dod na 'chi bar 'gyuraro//du ba 'thul na sum ris byas
201a2(rgyud): na mi snang bar 'gyuraro//dro bar 'gyur na 'gro ba thams cad la dbang byed par 'gyuraro//ma grub na la su rung ba dang /blon po chen po'i srid thob par 'gyur ro//zla ba gcig sangs rgyas rje su
201a3(rgyud): dran par byed cing snying po gang yang rung ba zhig/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas la/sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la lta zhing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas nas

201a5(rgyud): za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro//de la dbus kyi yul du ni 'khor lo sgyur ba bcom ldan 'das drag po chen po 'gru'o//lho phyogs kyi rgyud du ni lag na rdo rje drag po 'gru'o//'gro lding ba'i yul du ni
201a6(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'gre lding 'bru'o//byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad+mo 'gru'o//shar phyogs kyi yul du ni dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje 'gru'o//bskyed mo tshal chen
201a7(rgyud): por ni gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang /gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gru'o//khang stong du ni sha za dang /sha za mo rnams 'grug/dur khrod du ni ma mo rnams dang /mkha' 'gro mo dang /srin mo
201b1(rgyud): la sogs pa 'grub//re rnamasu ni rig sngags 'chang rnams dang mi 'am tsa rnams 'gru'o//dgon pa chen po rnamasu ni dri za rnams 'bru //'bab chu rnamasu ni klu rnams 'gru'o//khang pa chen po dang /shing
201b2(rgyud): pa ta'i drung dag tu ni 'byung po rnams 'gru'o//byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni gnod sbyin chen po dang na dku be ra 'gru'o//rgya mtsho chen por ni sring mo bzhi dag 'gru'o//rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang grong khyer
201b3(rgyud): chen po rnamasu ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sgrol mau dang khro gnyer can 'gru'o//chu 'dusu ni tshangs pa 'grub//dur khrod du wa dang bcas par ni drag po 'gru'o//skyes bu chen po'i gnasu ni khyab 'jug

201b6(rgyud): po che dag 'gru'o//'bab chu rnamasu 'bab pa 'bab chu chen po dang 'grubo//yul ka li kar ni 'byung po'i rgyal po dbang ldan 'gru'o//gtor khung rnamasu gnon po dag 'gru'o//khyim gyi bar
