253b6(rgyud): nyid lus gung myo gaN+DIs gzhibs te skyeng skye 'khyud pa'i tshul du bya zhing mthe bong gnyis yid tsam dgu par bya ba ni rdo rje blo con gyi phyag rgya'o//'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis nang du 'acu
253b7(rgyud): pa ni be con sngon po'i phyag rgya'o//'di nyid las gung mo gnyis mdzub mo'i ngos kyi drung du banag ste gzhar ba ni rdo rje lus dmyur gyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khru tshu
254a1(rgyud): bcangs la bskor bya'i tshul gyis gzir zhing mthe bong sbyong ba na rdo rje kI lo kI li'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong nang du bkug la srin la gnyis
254a2(rgyud): sbreng ste tshigs gsum pa dgug pa ni gzhon nu lag zangs kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs la tshigs gsum bkug pa ni gzhon nu rdo rje sde'i phyag
254a3(rgyud): rgya'o/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis gzhibs te sgreng la lhag ma snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni gzhon nu rdo rje spyi gtsug gi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo
254a4(rgyud): g.yon pa nang du bkug pa ni gzhon nu rdo rje dbu rgyan rtse bran gyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo bkan la srin lag gnyis dang mthe bong gnyis sgreng gung mo
254a5(rgyud): granyis dbus su rtse mo dgug pa ni na da ku be re'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bkug la srin lag gnyis thad kar brkyang ba ni khro bo zla ba'i
254a6(rgyud): thig le'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcings la smin mtshamasu bzhag ste mdzub mo dang /gung mo dang /gung mo mig gi tshul du dpral bar sbyar ba ni rdo rje
254a7(rgyud): 'jigs 'jigs lta'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim pa sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo gzhibs pa la 'khyud pa ni kun tu bzang po la sogs pa
254b1(rgyud): yod duzhin gyi nor bu'i byug rgyu'o//lhag pa gnyis gdu bu'i tshuladu khu tshur bcangs lha mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste yid tsam bkug pa ni stobs po rje ba con can gyi phyag rgya'o//byug/
254b2(rgyud): rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis rje mo sbed te zlum por byis pa ni rdo rje bri bo'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub ma de nyid las bsnol te sbyar ba ni rdo rje gdu bu'i phyag rgya'o//'di nyid las la
254b3(rgyud): pa g.yon pa yid tsam bkug pa ni rdo rje yu bo'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis log mthil du dgug la gung mo gnyis tshigs gsum
254b4(rgyud): pa bkug ste/thur du bstan pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la/srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bkug ste mju
254b5(rgyud): mo gnyis kyis mthe bode gnyis las 'khyud pa ni rdo rje gau drug tor gyi phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yas pa'i ser po thams cad bsdus la gung mo yid tsam brkyang ba ni rdo rje gau tru ga~M d+hArA
254b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo btung ba ni rdo rje mtshams kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las gling mo dang mdzub mo gni bas te snang ba na~M rdo dz+ha rom
254b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//phyog rgya 'di nyid los mtha bong de gnyis kyi drung du bcar la ldeg ma sngam bzhin bzhag pa ni rdo rje bo nya ma rnams kyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur
255a1(rgyud): bcangs la khu tshur g.yon pa brdeg par gzas pa ltar bya zhing khu tshur g.yas pa brang la bcar te mdzub mos bsdigs pa ni mngon du gyur pa'i phyag rgya'o//la pa
255a2(rgyud): gnyis bskor ba'i tshul du khu tshur bcangs la/rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang la khu chur bsnun pa'i thabasu ston pa ni thub dka'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la
255a3(rgyud): mthe'u chung gnyis dang mthe bong gnyis nang du bkug pa ni rnam thos kyi bu'i dbyug to'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid mdzub mo gnyis zhags mig gi tshul du byas pa ni zhogs pa
255a4(rgyud): ste nor rgyas kyi bu'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis kyis sor mo thams cad 'khyud pa ni saji snying po'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag
255a5(rgyud): rgyu'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis ral gri'i tshul du sbyar ba ni na mkha'i snying po'i ral gri'i phyag rgya'o//ral gri'i phyag rgya las srin lag gnyis nang du bkug pa ni
255a6(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya'o//ral gri'i phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis nang du bkug pa ni zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis
255a7(rgyud): thal mo bkan te srin lag sgreng ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis mthil du gzhar ba na spos kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong
255b1(rgyud): gnyis srung mo gnyis lnga bar byin bdug pa'i b+hagar+b+ha'o//d+hUb tu di da las mtho do gnyis mtho'u chung gnyis smras 'khyung ba ni mchod yon hU~M phyag rgya'o//mthe bong gnyis dbyung
255b2(rgyud): bA naumar po'i phyag rgya'o//san sa te mdung sa zlum pa ni ga tor ma sbyin pa b+ha ga d+ha'o//de bzhin du ga pa gnyis ka hrIc-ig tu sbyar la mthe da nga dang sa dzu mag ga tu sbya te/
255b3(rgyud): byin lag pas brkyang bran rdo rje dbyangs can gyi d+hag rgya'o//rdo rje dbyungs can hU~M byag+sa hU~M'i sumadzub mo gnyis nang du dkug lA/mima'u chung gnyis mthe bang la phyog por byangan
255b4(rgyud): deng+ge nga ba'i rgyu d+d+haH/do shA sgra do rlung ba na byug d+hA d+d+he shASh+NI m-i ma
255b5(rgyud): bkug ste/bung mo'i dris la gzha ba ni rdo rje mehA gau d+ha gau r+b+ha'o//rdo rje mig gi byAg d+h+ya las gung mo gnyis brgyad du ni rdo rje rnaM nga'i phya gud+hA//rdo rje zla ba'i phyag rgya las gungs
255b6(rgyud): gtsun pa bkug pa ni rdo rje lte dra'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje lte ba'i b+haglai rgyu las gung mAM g.yas pa bkug ste/g.yon pa brgyad de ni rdo rje mkhur ba'i byug rgyu'o//rdo rje ma thur
255b7(rgyud): nga'i phyag rgya las mdzu TI gnyis rtsom 'ak+ku la~M sbyar ba rdo rjerna babs kyi phyag rgyam//rdo rje rangs kyi phyag rgyal ma'i ring g.yin pa skyong lo gams pa kug na
256a1(rgyud): rdo rje rgod pa'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje rgod pa'i phyag rgya las srin lag gnyis phye ste phyir brkyang nga ni rdo rje mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje mtshan gyi phyag rgya las/
256a2(rgyud): phrin lag gnyis yid tsam bkug la thur du bstan pa ni rdo rje bad+ma'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje brla'i phyag rgya las srin lag giyon pa yid tsam brkyang ba ni rdo rje byin pa'i phyag rgya'o//
256a3(rgyud): rdo rje byin pa'i phyag rgya las srin lag g.yas pa brkyang ste g.yon pa nang du bkug pa ni rdo rje lgad pa'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis bsnol te rdo rje bcings pa'i tshul du bcings
256a4(rgyud): la mdzub mo gnyis bsdigs pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni rdo rje lag pa'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje lag pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo g.yon pa bkug pa ni bran pho thams cad kyi phyag
256a5(rgyud): rgya'o//phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni bran mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo g.yas pa phye ste brkyang ba ni pho nya thams
256a6(rgyud): cod kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo g.yon pa phye ste/brkyang ba ni pho nya ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//sde me bzhin du rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du byas la maH
256a7(rgyud): bong g.yos pa phreng ba ni phyag brnyan thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong g.yon pa brkyang ba ni phyag brnyan ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du
256b1(rgyud): lag pa gnyis kha byo la thug pa'i tshul du thal mo sbyar te/skye bor 'ag pa ni gzhon nu gtsug nas byung ba'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag bla gnyis snyim pa la sbyar la mtho nga
256b2(rgyud): g.yas pa btung ba ni rdo rje lha rnams kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong g.yas pa brkyang ba ni rdo rje klu'i phyag rgya'o//sdom bzhin du snyim par sbyar po mdzub mo g.yas
256b3(rgyud): pa bkug pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyug rgya las gung mo gnyis bkug la mdzub mi gnyis btung ba ni gnod sbyin mi thams cad kyi phyag rgyu'o//de nyid
256b4(rgyud): sa grong na gnyis sgying hU~M stag rje'o//daM d+hi nIri d+h+r-i rgyal po kun lag g.yas pa gung ni dza rnam sbyin s+t+wa~M d+hakAr+b+ha//de nyi las sbyin la
256b5(rgyud): pa brkyang ba ni rdo rje na mkha' lding gi b+hag rgyu'o//rdo rje na mkhe'i ldeng gi phyag rgya 'di nyid la sa myuH'u chung gnyis ka bkug pa ni rdo rje mi 'am ci'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyi
256b6(rgyud): lasna mdzub mi g.yon pa bkug pa ni rdo rje lho ts+tsha ts+tshin+da dA phyug rgya'o//de nyid btung ba ni rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid lus gung mo gnas gnyis bkug pan
256b7(rgyud): ji srin pa'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid bskyed be ni srin me'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis bkug pa ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las ba rkyang ba ni/
257a1(rgyud): rje gnon pa'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgyu 'di gnyis las mtho chung bkug pA ni rdo rje grib ga non gyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid brgyad pa ni rdo rje brjod khyod kyi phyag rgya'o//
257a2(rgyud): lag pa gnyis ka snyim pa'i tshul du sbyar te sor mo thams cad slar la mthe bong gnyis so so'i leg mthil du gzhar ba ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di
257a3(rgyud): nyid las mthe bong g.yas pa rang gi gron su bzhag pa ni skye ba 'gog pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du mthe bong g.yon pa rang bzhin gyi gnasu bzhag pa ni rga ba 'gog pa rdo rje'i
257a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//de bzhin mthe bong gnyis sgreng ba ni na ba 'grog pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub gnyis kyi drung du mthe bong gzhar ba ni dbul ba 'gog pa
257a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phye ste mthe bong gnyis dang sbyar ba ni rgud pa 'gog pa'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yon pa
257a6(rgyud): la mthe bo g.yas pas 'khyud cing //de bzhin du mdzub mo g.yas pa la mthe bo g.yon pas 'khyud pa ni 'chi ba 'gog pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis snyim par
257a7(rgyud): sbyar la gung mo gshibs te sgred la/srin lag dang mthe chung mdzub mos 'khyud de mthe bong gnyis de dag gi drung du bzhag pa ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tor
257b1(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim pa sbyar la srin lag gnyis dang mthe chung nang du bkug ste gung mo gshibs la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste ngos la gzhar zhing mthe bong
257b2(rgyud): gnyis de'i drung du bzhag pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyu'o//gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya de nyid mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni rig pa mchog gi phyag rgya'o//
257b3(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis sbreng ba ni rig pa'i rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug te gung mo la nas gang tsam gyis mi reg par
257b4(rgyud): bzhag pa ni legs par grub byed kyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyisu sbyar la dril bu'i tshul du sor mo thams cad 'gyed pa ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i phyag
257b5(rgyud): rgya'o//lag pa gnyis pad+ma kha bye la thug pa'i tshul du byas pa ni gos dkar mo'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid cung zad kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni mthu chen thob pa'i phyag rgya'o//snga
257b6(rgyud): ma bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung rnams nang du bkug ste mdzub mo rnams gzhibs la mthe bong gnyis de'i drung du gzhar bu ni 'phags
257b7(rgyud): ma sgrol mo'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis rgyab sprod du sbyar te phan tshun du 'khyud la sor mo rnams blas pa ltar byas te/lcags sgrog gi tshul du bstan pa ni rdo rje lcags
258a1(rgyud): /sgrog gi phyag rgya'o///'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/bam po dgu pa/de nas lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /!
258a2(rgyud): ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras//
258a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dngos grub sgrub pa la brtson pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
258a4(rgyud): 'dir rang rang gi phyag rgya rtag su gyur pa la stsal par bgyi ste/des rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag myur ba nyid du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro//de skad ces smras pa
258a5(rgyud): dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag nu rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu dag khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir
258a6(rgyud): zhugs pa khyed leg so legaso//rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir rang rang gi phyag rgya rab 'byam dag smros shig/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas rang gi phyags rgya smras pa/
258a7(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te sor mo gsum brkyang la mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis gcig tu sbyar bar bgyis te/bcom ldan 'dra 'di ni bdag cag gi tshangs pa'i de
258b1(rgyud): na gyi phyag rgya'o//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rang gi phyag rgyas smras pa/lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la srin lag dang mthe chung rnams nang du bcug ste/gung mo ga shibs la sgreng
258b2(rgyud): zhing mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis de'i drung du bzhag par bya'o//'di ni bdag/gi rdo rje'i phyag rgya lags te/las thams cad kyi don sgrub par bgyid pa'o//de nas rgyal po chen
258b3(rgyud): bzhes rang rang gi phyag rgya smras pa/log pa gnyis khro tshur bcangs la mthe bong gnyis sbyang bar bgyis te/rnam thos kyi bu bdag nyid chen po can dbyik+Sha to'i phyag rgya'o//phyag
258b4(rgyud): rgyurgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis mthe bong gnyis kyi steng du bzhag pa ni 'phags skyes por the con gyi phyag rgya'o//be tson gyi phyag rgya las mthe chung gnyis zhags pa'i tshul du
258b5(rgyud): bgyis pa na yul 'khor srung gzhugs pa'i phyag rgya'o//zhags pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis nang du bkug lan dzub mo gnyis gzhibs te sbyang ba ni mig ma bzang gi rdo rje
258b6(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//de nas lngas rtsen gyis 'di skad ces smraso//lag gnyis khro tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis gshibs la sgrung ba ni lngas can gyi mdung gi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgyu
258b7(rgyud): nga nyid las mthe bong gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis kyang mingang gi tshul du sgreng ba ni 'brog gnas kyi mdung rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya'o//snga ma bzhin du khri tshur bcings pa la/min 'ong
259a1(rgyud): kAnyis sbyang ba ni lag pa brgyad pa'i mtho bong gi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag bya gnyis d+him d+har b+hur la gung mo gnyis rgyub sbyar zhing mdzub mo gnyis
259a2(rgyud): bkug ste/de gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa sbyar la mthe bong gnyis de gnyis kyi ngos la gzhar zhing sor mo lhag ma gzhi bas te bzhag pa ni rmugs byed 'dzin chu dbang gi phyag rgya'o//
259a3(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis nang du bkug pa ni gnod sbyin thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//mthe bong gnyis sgreng ba ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya
259a4(rgyud): 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo'i steng du bzhag pa ni lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis phye ste nang logasu sbyar ba ni dI thams cad kyi
259a5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//de nyid nang du bkug pa ni rig sngags thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid sgreng zhing me lce'i tshul du phral la mthe chung gnyis nang du bkug pa ni lha ma yin thaMd
259a6(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis kyang phral lo lhag ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni srin po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yon pas gdong bkrab
259a7(rgyud): la lag mthil du ldes ldag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la ser mo thams cad bsnol te spang ba ni lha ma yin
259b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis thal mo bkan te sgyings dgu por bgyis pa ni klu thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis rgyab sbyar la mthe bong gnyis gcig
259b2(rgyud): gis gcig 'khyud pa ni khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis sgreng ba ni bde byed kyi mdung rtsi'i phyag rgya'o//mdung gi phyag rgya
259b3(rgyud): las srin lag gnyis dang mdzub me gnyis nang du bcug la lhag ma sgreng ba ni dka' thub bzlog gi rtse gsum gdengs pa'i phyag rgya'o//snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la gung mo
259b4(rgyud): gnyis gzhibs te tshigs gsum pa bkug pa ni smin drug bu'i mdung gi phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong tha mal po sgreng ba ni gshin rje bcon gyi phyag rgya'o//
259b5(rgyud): de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo brkyang ba ni drag po'i chung ma'i gdung gi phyag rgya'o//lag pa de nyid pad+ma bzung ba'i tshul du gyis la mthe bong gi rtse mor mdzub mo bzhag pa ni
259b6(rgyud): tshangs pa'i chung ma'i pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o//mthe bong dang mthe chung sprad pa lhag mo gsum pa don gyi tshul du byas pa ni dbang po'i chung ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa de nyid dril bu'i
259b7(rgyud): tshul du khas sbub pa ni mtshan mo nag mo'i dril bu'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis sgreng ba ni 'chi bdag gi phyag rgya'o//de nyid khu tshur bcangs la
260a1(rgyud): mthe bong yid tsam dgu por sgred ba ni phag gi chung ma'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa de nyid shugs kyi rdul du bgyis pa ni n+d+ha pu tI'i mdzod kyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du
260a2(rgyud): lhag pa sayas pa khu tshur brnangs la srin lag dang mthe bod gshibs pa ni grib gnon rnams kyi phyag rgya'o//phyug rgya de nyid las mthe bong gshings pa sgrib gnon ma rnams
260a3(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya de nyid las mthe chung yang sbyar ba ni brjed byed kyi gdon gyi phyag rgya'o//yang der mdzub mo yang sbyar ba ni gnon po'i gdon rnams kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag
260a4(rgyud): rgyu de nyid las mthe chung phyung ba ni khyad kyi phyag rgya'o//lago pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong tha mal par sgreng ba ni tum bu ro'i dbyug to'i phyag rgya'o//zhes rgyal ba rnams kyis
260a5(rgyud): gsungs/de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong nang du bkug ste mdzub mo brkyangs pa ni rgyal ba'i mdung gi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la gung mo sgreng ba ni rnam par
260a6(rgyud): rgyal ba'i ral gri'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la srin lag sgreng ba ni mi 'pham pa'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mthe chung sgreng ba ni gzhan gyis
260a7(rgyud): mi thub ma'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te sor mo thams cad 'dab ma'i tshul du brkyang la/mthe bong gnyis dbus su sgreng ste mi 'gul
260b1(rgyud): par bzhag pa ni rnamapar ldong gro rnam par 'dud kyi 'dab ma phyug d+hA'o//phyug rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa stong du ni kA'i rgyal ba nor rgyas kyi bu'i phyag rgyaro//de bzhin du rlung
260b2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya ci rigs par go rims bzhin du sbyar bar bgyis te/klu thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams//lag pa gnyis ka'i ngos tshur bstan la glog rnam par gtor tshul gyis sor
260b3(rgyud): mo rnams kyi rtse mo sprad de/phyogs bzhir rnam par gtor ba ni klog thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la phreng ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni dbyar gyi sprin
260b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim pa sbyar la gung mo gnyis rtse mo spyad pa ni chu lha'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las nang du bcug pa ni zla ba'i phyag rgya'o//
260b5(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis bskyed pa ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya'o//mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug pa ni dbyangs can gyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis nang du
260b6(rgyud): bcug la mthe'u chung gnyis sgreng ba ni tshwa klung chen po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du log pa gnyis stim+b+ha par sbyar la phral te log pa g.yon pa ril ba'i spyi blugs 'dzin pa'i
260b7(rgyud): tshul du bzhag cing g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni me'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yas pa oM zhes bya ba'i sngon du btang la bstan pa ni drang srong thams cad kyi phyag
261a1(rgyud): rgya'o//lag pa gnyis brjod de mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung yid tsam bkug pa ni ri thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la mthe bong
261a2(rgyud): gnyis bsnol te/mdzub mo gnyis kyang bsnol ba ni 'khor yug chen po'i phyag rgya'o//rnal 'byor gyi stan la 'dug la blo dang ldan pas lag pa gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin
261a3(rgyud): pa'i tshul du lte ba'i thad kar bzhag pa ni lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gAyas pa bstod de mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i
261a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa bkan te dam po sbyin pa'i tshul du bzhug pa ni dam pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o//log pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo ba rgyangs te
261a5(rgyud): dpral bar khro gnyer bcangs la bzhag pa ni phyag rgya 'di ni bdud skrag pa'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du log pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la gung mo dang srin lag sgreng ste mthe bo'i drung
261a6(rgyud): du bzhag pa ni spyan gyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar te phan tshun bsnol la sor mo rnams khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo gnyis sgreng la bkug ste dkyil 'khor gyi tshul
261a7(rgyud): du sbyar ba 'di ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa de mdzub mo sgreng la tshigA dang po bkug ste lhag ma rnams bsnol ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni
261b1(rgyud): ljalcags kyu'i drug rgya'o//lcags kyu'i phyag rgya las byung mo gnyis bkug ste de nyid la bcangs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag brkyang la
261b2(rgyud): lcug ma de bzhin bzhag pa ni de bzhin ga shogs pa ste ba'i byab rgya'o//d+yA ga~M d+hu 'di ny-id las mthe'u chung brgyad ba b+ha lhag ma de bzhin bzhag pa ni rked pa'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du 'ag pa
261b3(rgyud): gnyis snyim par sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste nang du bcug la srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung dang mthe bong gnyis yid tsam bkug ste gung mo gzhibs pa 'di ni sbubs kyi phyag rgya'o//
261b4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis gyen du snang ba 'di ni rdo rje mtshams chen po gcad pa'i phyag rgya'o//'di nyid las grung mo bdagi la mthe bong brkyang ba ni snang ba rgyan mo'i byug
261b5(rgyud): rgya'//de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis brkyang sti mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug pa ni rdo rje kun tu 'bar ba'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la sor mo thams cad
261b6(rgyud): brgyung ste/mdzub mo gnyis kyis dris nas 'khyud pa 'di ni rdo rje ga ni'i phyag d+ha'o//phyag d+hA 'di nyid las sbyin lag gnyis deng mthe bong gnyis sbyar ba 'di ni rdorje m+b+hi'i byug tu'o//
261b7(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis dang sprin lag gnyis bkug sto nang du sbyar la/mtha bang gnyis bskyed de yid tsam bkug la gung mo mgo su phyogs pa bzhigo ste/srin
262a1(rgyud): lag+sa gas rnam dan du zhan rgyun du nub b+hab+hAn r+m+mAn pa//rgyun nu rgya ma rganas nang du nAg+sa bkun ts+tsha bstod du bzhag
262a2(rgyud): nIrdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o//byu rgyu 'dri nyid las mdzub mi gnyis brtsod de tshogs dang po 'aklog pa na rdo rje so so yang dag par rig pa'i byug rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis
262a3(rgyud): tshul / nga ga nyis nga sa r+dz+nyAn rlung gnyis sunang du myur du dun mi ng+ga 'dzin de'i rdo ng+ge b+hag //denyid las ma'i dang ga sna
262a4(rgyud): bkug ste sbyar ba 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'o nyid las mthe bong gnyis kyi steng du srin lag gnyis bzhag pa ni rdo rje ye shes thams cad rtogs par
262a5(rgyud): byung pa'i phyag rgyu'o//phyug rgyu 'di nyid lngas mdzub mo gnyis kyi drung du bkug ste bzhag pa ni byams pa'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te gung mo gnyis
262a6(rgyud): srin lag gnyis 'khyud la mthe bong gnyis kyi spyong du mdzub mo gnyis bzhag ste/lhag ma mu bzhin du bzhag pa ni dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i byug rgya'o//logo pa g.yon pa
262a7(rgyud): tshur bcangs la mdzub mo bkug ste srin lag de'i drung du bcar ba ni phyag brnyan ma thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid los sor mo thams cad yid tsam
262b1(rgyud): bkug la gung mo slong ba ni ut+pa la'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//dro bzhin du lag pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis gung mo sgreng ste/yid tsam dgu bor byas pa ni rdo rje ral gri'i so gcig du
262b2(rgyud): yu ba can gyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du log po gnyis snyim par sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis tshig dang po bkug pa ni na mkha' ltar dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mtha
262b3(rgyud): bong gnyis bsnol ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid nang du bcug pa ni gos bkra gyon pa'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis nang du bcug
262b4(rgyud): pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing gnas pa'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis bsnol ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni spros pa med par gnas pa'i phyag rgya'o//de
262b5(rgyud): bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la mthe bong chung gnyis sbyar ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo dang srin lag bskyed pa ni sgra cher bsgrags
262b6(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar lo sor mo thams cad bsnol zhing zla ba'i tshul du byas la bsnams te mthe bong gnyis ngos la gzhar ba ni na mkha' lta bur dri ma med pa'i
262b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya de nyid las mthe chung gnyis phyung ste mthe bong gnyis dang rtse mo sprad pa ni stobs bcu las nges par 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis
263a1(rgyud): b+h+ya/phyud+d+ha s+t+waM mo chung snga ma bzhin bzhug pa ni na mkha' mtha' yas rnam par gno n+do pa'i phyag rgya'o//dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya lus mtho ngo gnyis lag
263a2(rgyud): mthil du bzhag pa ni ltad me can gyi phyag rgya'o//mthe bong phyung ste mdzub mo'i drung du bcar ba ni spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgyu 'di nyid las gung mo dang mthe bong sbyar ba ni blo
263a3(rgyud): brtan gyi rin po che'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong dang srin lag rtse spyod la gung
263a4(rgyud): mo brkyang ba ni lag na rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong dang mthe chung sbyar la mdzub mo bkug pa ni rtag tu brtson par gnas kyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du
263a5(rgyud): lag pa gnyis sbyar te srin lag gnyis nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo mnan te mthe bong ngos la bcar ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i
263a6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug pa ni cher bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni bcom
263a7(rgyud): ldan 'das 'di nyid kyi 'od zer 'bar ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo gnyis la go cha'i tshul du 'khyud pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi go che'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo
263b1(rgyud): grangs stsal dkug d+ha ni bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyi snyun gyi phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo g.yas pa kug la g.yon pa ni 'di nyid kyi smin ma'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni 'di lta
263b2(rgyud): kyi shungs kyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis phung mo gnyis dang srin lag la go che'i tshul du 'khrung ba yid tsam bkug ste/mthe bong gnyis de'i drung du gnar ba 'di na
263b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid khas phung ste smin mtshams bzhug pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin/
263b4(rgyud): du mdzub mo brkyang la mthe bong bstod rjede bkug pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi phyag rgya chen po'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la slar sgreng po ni mche ba'i phyag rgya'o//
263b5(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las smin lag gnyis nang du bcug ste phyir sgreng bu ni ljags kyi phyag rgya chen po'o//'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gdub 'khor gyi tshul du ngos la gnang ba ni mkhur ba'i
263b6(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis nang du btsug ste gung mo gnyis kyi drung du gzhar ba ni kos ko'i phyag rgya'o//gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya las mthe chung gnyis bskyed de snying khar
263b7(rgyud): bzhag pa ni dpal be'u'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar ba'i tshul du sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gdub 'khor gyi tshul du gung mo gnyis kyi ngos la bcar ba ni
264a1(rgyud): na phyog rgyu'o//rgyun rgyu ny-id pas du na nang du ston drahAn+ta shA d+ha/tshun lagaganyispyan du 'acug pa ni na ldan sa
264a2(rgyud): kyi gsung gi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las de bzhin du log pa gnyis sgom par sbyar te/mdza'u chung ni nyis kyi nad du mdzub mi bkug la rdo rje'i tshul du brdeg pa'i ma
264a3(rgyud): na nga hrIHk+She/ 'i tshubo ni nyis rje'i la du sa la ga na rdo rjeni yan na
264a4(rgyud): le byung ba'i rkye ge rgyu'o//rdo rje'i yan lag las byung ba nyid las mthi song gnyis chu sa gnyis kyi drung du ba bal lcagam snga ma bzhin du bzhig pa ni
264a5(rgyud): swAlkugs pa'i rkye /de bzhin du log pa d+ma nyi bsum 'i rdul du gyis la/nalen pa zhes la g.yos gan te mni bye da me rlung gnyis rje sgo spya la ma
264a6(rgyud): marnams ma rkyen de'i tshul du bzhag pa ni ga nyig rdo rje'i rgyag rgya'o//spyan tu di nyid las mthe rlung dang mthe thong tsas pa'i tshul du bcid du ni gdu bu'i myig
264b1(rgyud): bzhin babyung ba lag bya g.yas g.yon gnyis ka ri gung mo bkug pa ni rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya las bung mo brgyang la srin lag g.yas pa bkug pa ni lus kun tu ran/
264b2(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//lus kun tu 'dzin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya las srin lag brkyang skye mdzub mo'i tshigs dang po ni na mkha' rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du
264b3(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo yang lag mthil du phur bu'i tshul du bzhag pa ni phur bu'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//phur bu'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya las sor mo thams cad bskum pa ni rdo bkra shis kyi
264b4(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bkra shis kyi phyag rgya las sor mo thams cad sbyang ste bzhag pa ni rdo rje bla re'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid sor mo bar phrad de bzhag pa ni rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid
264b5(rgyud): gtun shing gi tshul du gcig tu bsdus pa ni/rdo rje gtun shing gi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje gdu bu'i phyag rgya las lag pa g.yas pa'i gung mo dang /srin lag gnyis bkug la mdzub mo
264b6(rgyud): be tson gyi tshul du sgreng ba ni rdo rje be con gyi phyag rgya'o//gung mo yang de nyid la sbyar te brkyang ba ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya las tshigs dang po bkug pa ni
264b7(rgyud): 'khor lo'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//'khor lo'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya las gung mo'i rgyob tu mdzub mo bkug ste sbyar ba ni rdo rje lcags mda'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje lcags mda'i phyag rgya las
265a1(rgyud): /sbyin lag kyang de nyid la sbyar ba ni ka Na ya'i phyag rgya'o//ka NA yA'i phyag rgya lngas gung mau sgreng ste brkyang la/de dag las gcig zhags pa'i tshul du bkug pa ni
265a2(rgyud): rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du lag po g.yon pa sor mo gsum bsdus pa ni rdo rje ru sbrul gyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje ru sbrul gyi phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni lha ma yin gyi
265a3(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las sor mo gnyis brgyad ste mdzub mo bkrug pa ni sbyangs thabs bkrug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//
265a4(rgyud): de bzhin du lag pa snyim pa sbyar te gung mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis la 'khyud la mthe bong gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis ngos la gzhar ba ni rdo rje gnas kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgyal/
265a5(rgyud): nyid las mthe chung gnyis ni brkyang nas su//mthe bo gnyis ni sgreng byas la//'di ni gtun shing rkyen yongs te//kun tu thogs pa med par 'dod//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub
265a6(rgyud): mo de nyid du bkug pa ni/rdo rje yan lag brgyad pa'i phyag rgya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa lag na rdo rje yang don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par grub
265a7(rgyud): bar bya ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rdo rje sa byin gyis brlabs pa rnams kyi dngos grub sgrub pari thangs sla ba/sangs rgyas thams cad spyod pa
265b1(rgyud): shes pa/mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa/rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyag rgya/gsang chen yan lag dang yan lag nas byung ba/rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa rnams dang /
265b2(rgyud): sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang /theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa rnams dang /rdo rje 'chang gi byin gyis brlabs pa rnams kyis mnyam pa 'am/gzung ba rnams kyi ma
265b3(rgyud): togs par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang shes par mi nus na gzhan 'jig rten pa mu stegs byed rnams kyis shes pa 'am rnam par shes pa lta ci smos pa bshad par brtsam
265b4(rgyud): so//de nas rdo rje 'chang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po'i mig gnyis rnam par bltas te rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor
265b5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas smras pa/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zur tsamu gyis go ba'i ye shes las byung ba'o//phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byams
265b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa sgrol bar byed pa yod do zhes smras nas/de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi bar nas 'gro ba thams cad yongasu skyob pa zhes bya ba'i 'od
265b7(rgyud): zer 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa 'byung //de byung nas namakha'i khams kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa 'dun par/
266a1(rgyud): byas nas dkon mchog gsum gyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can gyi khams byin gyis brlabs te/slar yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bskor
266a2(rgyud): ba byas nas mdzod spu nyid du zhugs so//de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu smras pa/sems can chen po 'di ni dus so//'di ni tshod do//de nas
266a3(rgyud): bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o//srung ba dang /gzi brjid dang /
266a4(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa stsal par bgyi'o//de nas rdo rje 'chang gis gsang chen dang bcas pa'i yan lag gi phyag rgya smras pa/mkhas pas dam tshig ces bya ba'i/phyag rgya thog mar
266a5(rgyud): bcings nas su//sangs rgyas snying po dran byas la//lag pa g.yas pa bskul bar bya//oM rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni mi shes pa'i grong khyer 'jig
266a6(rgyud): par byed pa ste/rdo rje'i ye shes rnam par dgod pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o//lag pa g.yas pa btag nas su//steng gi phyogasu yongs bskyod na//sdang ba rnams ni bskrad par gyur//
266a7(rgyud): bskyed byed rnams kyang g.yo bar 'gyur//btsums kyi tshul du byas nas su//lag pa g.yas pa bteg byas la//rnal 'byor pas ni mtshogs mar bzhag/kha zhes bya ba 'bar
266b1(rgyud): byung dran//dog la dang nubacas par dang //sbyara'i snang du gnas par \u0f7f//ma g+ha thod ldan kun tu 'bar//phyogs rnams kun tu lam mog/gtsug tor phyum ldan ma/rdza
266b2(rgyud): r+ya s+t+raing nas gnas pa yis//sngags la/ kha~M b+hU trA~M/lak+sha pA de ny-i ma hU~M skyed s+ho//brtag la sprin marnams gnyi gar yang //sngags pas hA zhes bya bar no//da
266b3(rgyud): dang ni ldan par bzhag//sngags la/badz+rA hU~M tu mai swAH/rdo rje sprin mo'i drug rte//gung sgreng ba'i tshul zas su//lug pa de nyid btug nas sa//han
266b4(rgyud): ba mig gnyis su//bskyed gnyis dang ni ldan par bzhin/sngags li/badz+ra ho hU~M swAhA/rdo rje mig gi phyag rgya'o//lhag pa de nyid bteg nas su//ta zhes bya bar stongs
266b5(rgyud): ldan par//mthe'u chung slong ba'i tshul gyis su//rdo rje stsol la bzhag par bya//sngags le/badz+ra ho ha swAt+ta/rdo rje sna'i phyag rgya'o//mthe'u chung sgreng ba'i tshul gyis su/
266b6(rgyud): ga pa nyid bad+hA na //sngags pas rlung gnyi kar la//gas bya nan par bya//snun sa l-I//rjen pa'i TI ts+tsha//ma
266b7(rgyud): lag de nyid//bteg nas 'brer chos gnyi ga yang //ha nas bya ba spyod gnyis can//ma thugs can gyis bzhi na \u0f7f//sngag pa la/ /rdo rjel
267a1(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//skyugs pas gung mo mthe ba sbyar te//lag pa de nyid bteg nas su//ha zhes bya ba skyed gnyis can//mchu gnyi su ni bzhag par bya//sngags la/
267a2(rgyud): badz+ra ho hUM swA hA/rdo rje mchu'i phyag rgya'o//sngags shes pas ni mtheb sgreng ste//lag pa de nyid bteganas su//haM zhes bya ba'i thig le can//lce yi gnas su bzhag par bya/sngags
267a3(rgyud): la/badz+ra ha~M haM swA hA/rdo rje lce'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yon pa bteg nasu//sngags pas nu mjid gnyis ka yang //ra zhes bya ba bzhag bya ste//skyed gnyis dang ni ldan pa'o//
267a4(rgyud): sngags la/badz+ra he ho ra swA hA/rdo rje nu mjing gi phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yon pa de nyid ni//mgul pa'i gnasu bzhag par bya//ra zhes bya ba skyed gnyis can//mdzub mo'i
267a5(rgyud): le bzhag par bya//sngags la/badz+re ho hri swA hA/dpal be'u rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa de nyid bteg na su//mkhas pas mtshan khung phyogasasu bzhag/ra zhes bya ba'i
267a6(rgyud): thig le can//der ni legs par bzhag par bya//badz+ra ho ra ma swAhA/rdo rje mchan khung gi phyag rgya'o//lag pa de nyid bteg nas su//sor mo srin lag tshul gyis nI//ra gnyis
267a7(rgyud): ga dang bcas par yang //lag pa gnyi gar bzhag par bya'i bdu tso rA ng+tha/rdo rje dge ba'i phyag rgya'o//mgro po de nyid byeganas//sdugs pas skyong gi nga /
267b1(rgyud): razhes bya ba rna ru can//ji lta bzhin du bzhug par bya//badz+ra ha ro swAhA/rdo rje snying gi phyag rgya'o//lag g.yas dam pa sbyin byas la//mkhas pas sor mo mdzub mo yis//snying kha nas na
267b2(rgyud): sgor gnyis su//skyed gnyis ldan pa'i bar bzhag go/badz+ra ha~M b+hai swA hA/rdo rje yan lag gi phyag rgya'o//lag pa de nyid smad nas su//gung mos pa zhes bya ba gnyis//skyed gnyis dang
267b3(rgyud): ni ldan par yang //rtsibs logs g.yon par bzhag par bya//ba~Mdz+rI ho b+hI ba~M swAhA/rdo rje rtsibs logs kyi phyag rgya'o//leg pa de nyid bteg nus su//mkhas pas tsongs logs
267b4(rgyud): g.yas par ni//ba zhes bya ba'i thig le can//mthe'u chung sor mo bzhag par bya//sngags la/badz+ra ho ba~M swA hA/rtsibs logs g.yas pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa de gnyis
267b5(rgyud): bteg nas su//mthe bong dang ni gung mo yis//ba zhes bya ba'i thig ler bcas//rna ru rtags can lte bar bzhag/sngags la/badz+ra ho baM swA hA/rdo rje lte ba'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa de nyid
267b6(rgyud): bteg nasu//lte ba'i 'og tu sor gnyis su//ba zhes bya ba'i thig le can//gnyis shig mdzub me'i rtse mor bzhag/sngags la/badz+re ho baM baM swA hA/rdo rje zla ba'i sdug gi phyag rgya'o//
267b7(rgyud): lag pa de nyid bteg na su//rked pa'i phyogs su blo ldan gyis//sor mo gung mo'i tshul gyis su//skyed gnyis ldan pa'i b+ha gzhag go/sngags la/badz+ra ho b+hai swA hA/rdo rje rked
268a1(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'o//lag byu g.yon pa khas phub pa la//lag pa gnyis bsnol bar sbyar la/mthe bong dang mthe chung phan tshun rdo rje bcings pa'i tshul du byas te/
268a2(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis byung la/g.yon rol nas sor mo thams cad gi bgo ba'i tshul du bskor ro//rdo rje 'go ba'i phyag rgya ste/sngags la/badz+ra hA he swA hUM/mthe bong gnyis ni byi naH/
268a3(rgyud): g.yas phyog su na yongasu 'byung //tshangs pa la sogs lha skrong na//sdang sems can rnams smras ci dgos//rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya zhes//rgyal bdum pa rnams kyis gsungs/
268a4(rgyud): 'di bzhag bya ba'i tshul gyis ni//rgyal ba dam par 'gyur ba yin//sdigs la/badz+ra hi ba~M bswAhA/mdzub mo nang du bkug nas su//lhag mA snga ma bzhin du bzhig/gung ma gyen du
268a5(rgyud): sbrid byas la//'og gis lnga bzhag par bya//sngags la/badz+rA ho hUM swA hUM/rdo rje yan lag gi phyag rgya'o//'di dag thams cad shes nas ni//rdo rje'i lus su sra bar 'gyur//
268a6(rgyud): sa pasu shegs nga DU na//pa ri la gan bstsu ni// pas na ng+ge dang // ba thams cad 'jigs par byed//b+hag+sa n+d+ha
268a7(rgyud): sngags brjod na//lha la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur//de nas slob mas brtag byas te//tshig mthong ba'i las kyis ni//yan lag thams cad mtshan ldan zhing //yan lag
268b1(rgyud): rdzogs la mthun pa bdag/mngon pa nyams dang zur blta ba//ma rungs pa dang mi thung spangs//bye brag tu ni ldan pa brtag/lta ba don kun sgrub par byed//drag dang 'jam dang bar ma dang //lta
268b2(rgyud): ba rnam pa gsum du gsungs//bskrad dang bsad dang de bzhin du//bskum dang phung bar bya ba dang //ma rungs pa dag dbang bya dang //tshor bcad par ni drag po bstan//'jam par lta ba
268b3(rgyud): 'jam por byed//sems can thams cad dbang du byed//sgrub pa rgya chen sems ldan zhing //'jam po lta ba snyan par spro//snying rje dang ni thabs ldan zhing //byang chub sems dang
268b4(rgyud): 'jigs med pa//bdud kyi dpung gi stobs po che//ma dul thams cad 'dul byed pa//bgegs dang log 'dren tha~Md dang //sdang ba kun lta smos ci dgos//de lta bas na rnam kun tu//
268b5(rgyud): 'jam por lta ba brtag par bya//mdza' dang dgra la sems snyoms zhing //los su bya ba rnam spangs la//sngags pa bar mas gnas pa ni//gal te thabs la mkhas zhig na//yod
268b6(rgyud): la bsam par gyur pa yis//dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur//de lta bas na rnam kun tu//lta ba 'di ni rnam par sbyang //gang zhig lta bas yongs dag cing //de bzhin yid
268b7(rgyud): kyang rnam dag pa//de la rdo rje ye shes phyir//brtul zhugs can gyi mchog tu bstan//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smra'o///
269a1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bshad pa'i don bdag gis shes pa lta na/bdag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' yid rnam par sbyang b.rare bya'o snyam byed do//de skad ces
269a2(rgyud): smras pa dang /lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal legs so leg so//yid rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir tshig 'di khyod kyis
269a3(rgyud): legs par smraso//'jam dpal de'i phyir nyon cig dang /gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gsang sngags
269a4(rgyud): rnams la sngags kyi dngos grub thob par gyur pa yid rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo kho bos khyod la bshad par bya'o//'jam dpal de la rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi
269a5(rgyud): bu mo dkyil 'khor mthong ba byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/yid snying rje dang ldan pa/thabs la mkhas pa/gsang sngags kyi tshul bstan pa la mkhas pas 'di snyam du ngag ma
269a6(rgyud): gtogs par yid med/yid ma gtogs par dog med/yid ma gtogs par lha'i gzugs med de/yid nyid ngag yin la ngag nyid yid yin no//lha'i gzugs nyid kyang
269a7(rgyud): yid yin la/ngag nyid kyang lha'i gzugs yin no snyam du bsam par bya'o//de ltar tha dad du bya ba med par mos na sngags pas yid rnam par dag pa thob bo//yid rnam
269b1(rgyud): pUr+ya drug pa dang ldan pa dgang kau rnam pa thams pad du rtag par bdag gi su dang lha'o gnags/bdag kA dang d+hA dag N+Da/bdu/ yang dang lha yid du mtshungs par mthong
269b2(rgyud): che mnyam par ga 'ag pa yin no//gdu na kun kyi thams cad de//sngags pa mnyam+b+ha bar gzhig rgyur ga/de na sum la migs pa ye//mnyam nyid gnas la zhugs pa
269b3(rgyud): gyur//mnyam nyid gnas la gnas pa yin//yan lag bskyod pa ji snyed dang //tshig tu brjod pa ji snyed pa//de skad sngags dang phyag rgya yin//sngags pa kun tu dgra med
269b4(rgyud): /rtag tu mi g.yo bde bar gnas//dbang phyug kun gyi go 'phang thob//'dod pa 'byor pa'i glenas la gnas//de bsi le yongasu gdung po med//bzod dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims
269b5(rgyud): sdom 'di nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras//rigs kyi bu ji tsam du yid rnam par dag pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam
269b6(rgyud): grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems la phan par gyur pa 'di ni ngo mtshar ro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/sa chen po ni rkang
269b7(rgyud): gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa rnams la phon par gyur pa yin no//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos kyi sgo 'ang yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
270a1(rgyud): rnams la phan par gyur pa yin no//rigs kyi bu gang dag chos kyi sgo 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/gsang sngags kyi dngos grub
270a2(rgyud): sgrub pa'i gnas la skal ba yod pa yin no//lag na rdo rjes smras pa/zhi ba'i blo gros de de bzhin te/ji skad smras pa de bzhin no//de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
270a3(rgyud): byang chub tu nges pa ste/de dag ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po la 'jug pa dang /mnyan pa dang yang dag pa'i skal ba yod pa dag go/de nas tham ca dang ldan pa'i 'khor des byang chub sems
270a4(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu gang dag yid rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par brtson pa de dag ni phyag bgyi ba lags te/
270a5(rgyud): bdag cag thams cad g.yog dang bcas/'khor dang bcas par 'dus nas gos dang zas rnams kyis de dag la bsti stang du bgyi/bla mar bgyi/ri mor bgyi/ma chad par bgyi'o//grong na
270a6(rgyud): gnas kyang rung /dgon pa na gnas kyang rung ste/gnod pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o//phan pa rnams nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me rtag tu rgyun
270a7(rgyud): mi chad par brtson pa de dag gi re ba thams cad ji tsam du yongasu rdzogs par ma bgyis pa de'i srid du bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
270b1(rgyud): 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o//de nas byang chub sems dang shA lag na rdo rjes tha~Md dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces smraso//leg so legs so//grogs po dag 'di lta ste grang gi lag na
270b2(rgyud): yid rnam par dag pa'i sgra gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub bo//'di lta ste/gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa 'dzin pa la bsta
270b3(rgyud): stang bya/ri mor bya ste 'di nyid bya ba'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams srung ba'i phyir rnam par
270b4(rgyud): dag pa mtha' yas pa'i gnas kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smras pa/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH/sar+b+ba b+ha ya b+hi kha te b+h+yaH/sarba thA hUM tsa pa li nI ka kaM ka k+Sha rak+Sha dA ke
270b5(rgyud): b+h+ya darma tAM gi tsaN+Da li shap+no l-i ti rat+na hA ma ba yi ni ma ni sa mA ma hA ya na si swA hA/chos smra ba gang la la zhig gosa? nyin lan gsum dran pa byas no de la 'jig pa dang gnod pa thams cad mi
270b6(rgyud): 'byung ngo //de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar te gung mo gnyis bkug la nang du bcug pa ni byang chub kyi snying po mnan pa'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis kyi tshigs dang
270b7(rgyud): po bkug pa ni bdud yang dag par bskulo ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis slar byung ste snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni bdud kyi dpung skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//phyag
271a1(rgyud): rgya 'dri nyid lngas srin lag gnyis bzhibs te mthe bong gnyis bkug la nang du bcug pa ni bdud kyi sde rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid la mthu
271a2(rgyud): bong gnyis phyung la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste nang du bcug pa ni bdud 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsar+b+ba te thA ga te b+h+yaH/sar+b+ba mu kha b+h+yaH/sar+b+ba thA he te/swAhA/phyag rgya 'di
271a3(rgyud): nyid la mthe brang g.yon pas maH bong g.yas pa mnan pa ni gdon thams cad gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsar+b+ba tithA ga tab+h+yaH/sa ma/sarba te swAd+ha/
271a4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pas mthe bong g.yon pa mnan pa ni srin po thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsar+b+ba ta b+ho ga te b+h+yaH/sar+b+ba mu khe
271a5(rgyud): b+h+r-iH/sar+b+ba thAM te he re TaM swA hA//phyag rgya 'di nyid las lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gis lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du drud pa ni mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying rnam par gzhom
271a6(rgyud): po'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA gA te b+h+yaH/sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH/sar+b+ba thA he raM gi ni he te swAhA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las snyim pa'i tshul du byas la/mdzub mo gnyis dang
271a7(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis gdung gi tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje dung gi phyag rgya ste/klu thams cad kyi snying rnam par gzhom pa'o//sngags la/nA maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/
271b1(rgyud): dzaM ki ri phut+tA re re swA hA/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la gung mo gnyis dasnol nga ni gla nod sbyin thams cad tshang gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarbata thA ga te b+h+yaHsa
271b2(rgyud): mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA dzi gi ra ni hUM dwe kaM swA hA/phyog rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis nong du bcug la gung mo gnyis sdo ma bzhin duzhig pa ni drin tshur garjod pa'i phyag rgya'o//
271b3(rgyud): sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA he ri ge b+h+yaHswA hA/phyag rgya'ang nyid las mdzub mo gnyis 'khyud pa'i tshul du byas pa ni lha ma yin nges par gzhom
271b4(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na moHsarba twA thA ga ti b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsid+d+hi b+hU d+hU hU~M phaT phaT/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis 'khyud la sbeng ste/sor mo lhag mA brgyang
271b5(rgyud): ba ni na mkha' lding thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags lo/nA meHsarba~M ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ta ri bing+ga li mU kha~M swAhA/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sgyur
271b6(rgyud): la lag pa g.yen pa bkan te g.yas pa khas phub la srin lag gis lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du rig par byas pa ni mo 'am tsi tshar bcad pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA
271b7(rgyud): ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA dza ya dza ya ni swAhA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mos lag pa de nyid kyi mthil du reg par byas pa ni lto 'phye chen po cher bcad ba'i phyag rgya'o//sngags
272a1(rgyud): la/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA ga ra li ni hU~M ka ri ni swA hA/de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la lag pa gnyis bsnol ba ni sdang ba thams
272a2(rgyud): cad dgag pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/no maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA he tsan di hUM ri bi ke swA hA/log pa de gnyis sor mo rnams gcig gis
272a3(rgyud): gcig 'khyud la lag pa gnyis snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni srin po thams cad snying tshim par bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//sngags lA/nA maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA
272a4(rgyud): kai ka ri Ni d+hau kA ri Ni ke swA hA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis yid tsam bkug po 'di ni srin mo thams cad kyi snying rmongs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/
272a5(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khaM b+h+yaHsarba thA kA ra na dzi te/bi kha la mu ke swA hA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phye ste mthe bo dA sdu mr-i bzhin bzhag pa ni sha za
272a6(rgyud): 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'o//rgyal ba mchog rnamasde kyis rtag tu gsungaso//sngags lA/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu kha~M b+h+yaHsarba thA mi tsi mi tsi swA hA/phyag rgya 'di
272a7(rgyud): nyid las gung mo gnyis phye la mdzub mo snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni sha za mo thams cad kyi snying rmongs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu
272b1(rgyud): kho b+h+yaHsarba thA bi shA tsi ni swA hA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis kyang phye ste gung mo snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni 'byung po thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/
272b2(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaHsarba mu khaM b+h+yaHsarba thA gung gung swA hA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis kyang bye ba la srin lag gnyis snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni 'byung po thams cad
272b3(rgyud): dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA gu mi gu me hi li ge swA hA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong g.yon pa brkyang la lhag ma snga ma bzhin
272b4(rgyud): bzhag pa ni grib gnon thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA ts+tsha ga li swA hA/de bzhin du mthe bong g.yon pa yang
272b5(rgyud): brkyang la lag pa g.yas pa snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni grib gnon thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA dzo la ni dza
272b6(rgyud): ti ke swA hA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bsnol ba'i tshul du bkug la mthe bong gnyis kyi steng du bzhag pa ni brjed byed thams cad gzhib pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/
272b7(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga to b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA lamr-i d+ha ra NI b+h+rU~M b+h+r-i shi ni s+t+rai hA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las sor mo thams cad phye ste/sgreng ba ni brjed byed ma thams cad skrag par byed pa'i
273a1(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA gra te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA be rat+na yu la ku mu gi tsi pu ri re swA hA/de bzhin du sor mo thams cad btsug ste/nang
273a2(rgyud): du bcug la mthe bong gnyis sgreng ste de ltar byas pa ni byad rnams kyi snying skom pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags lI/na maHsarba ta thA gra te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA khi khi ri hri da ya bi ya bi dA
273a3(rgyud): ra Ni swA hA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis bkug ste bcug la/mdzub mo gnyis sgreng ba 'di ni byad thams cad kyi snying kun tu sbyar ba'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba ta
273a4(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA bi sa ri Ni swA hA/de nas lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/
273a5(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes las mngon par byung ba rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying las byung ba'i phyag rgya gsang ba rab 'byams bstan pa'i sgo smras pa/thog mar sangs rgyas zing
273a6(rgyud): ya phyag byas te/byang chub kyi sems mngon du byas la byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po'i mig gis sems can gyi khams khyab par byas te/spos kyi lag pa bskus la/
273a7(rgyud): kha shar phyogs sam byang phyogasu bltas te phyag rgya legs par bcing bar bya'o//log pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la bstod de bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che tog gi phyag rgya'o//
273b1(rgyud): sngags la/na maHs+yAH ta thA bA ta b+h+yaH/marba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA tI rat+na ni dza tan+tu b+hU swAhA/phyag rgya 'di nyid 'as mthe bong gnyis bkug ste bcur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa me tog kun
273b2(rgyud): rta rgyas pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po byug rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarbo ti d+h+r-i ga t+ye b+h+yaH/sir+b+ba mu kho b+h+yaH/sarba thA dz+nyA na saM b+ha ba swAhA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i tshul du bdug
273b3(rgyud): ste gung mo'i ngos kyi thad kar bzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA a mi tod b+ha bi dz+nyA na pa ri Ni s+t+wa~M n+tu/
273b4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo bkug pa de nyid kyis rtse mo la gung mo reg par byas pa ni mi 'khrugs pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba pu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA
273b5(rgyud): bi gad d+hA d+hA na se b+ha ba swA hUM/lag pa gnyis ka khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mthe bong gnyis 'khyud pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi phyag rgya'o//sngags
273b6(rgyud): la/na maiHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA ka na bi nu ti ta dz+nyA nod ya swA hA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis gzhibs te sgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
273b7(rgyud): gshegs pa gtsug tor can gyi phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba te thA ga ti b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA dz+nyA na shi khi saM b+ha ba swAhA/de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la/
274a1(rgyud): srin lag gnyis gzhibs te sgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das thams/cad skyob kyi phyag rgya'o//skyugs la/na maHsarba ta thA gra te b+h+yaH/parba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/
274a2(rgyud): bi shud d+ha ga ta dz+nyA na bi de swA hA/snga ma bzhin du de ltar khu tshur bcangs la mthe chung gnyis go zhabs te sgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das log par dad sel gyi phyag rgya'o//sngags la/
274a3(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA dzi ma swA hA/de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni bcom ldan 'dis 'khor
274a4(rgyud): los sgyur ba chen po'i dbu'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na miHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA kha tra mi swA hA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis phyung ste/
274a5(rgyud): gra zhibs pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA dz+ra ma/phyag rgya 'di
274a6(rgyud): nyid las mdzub mo gnyis byung ste tshig dang po bkug pa de nyid la sbyar ba ni spyan gyi phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA dI/phyag rgya
274a7(rgyud): 'di nyid las mthe bong gnyis yid tsam bkug la mdzub mo gnyis la phyogs par byas te/lhag ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o//sngags
274b1(rgyud): la/na maHsarba ta thA gra te b+h+yaH/sarba mu kha b+h+yaH/sar+b+ba thA oM/snga ma bzhin lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis phyir bskyed de brkyang la tshigs dang po dgug cing mthe bong gnyis byar
274b2(rgyud): bskyed de/brkyang ba ni bcom ldan 'das dpal be'u'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba trA shrIH/phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis bskyod
274b3(rgyud): de brgyad la mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi lte bu'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/nr-i maHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba b+hU tra~MtraM/snga ma bzhin du de ltar log
274b4(rgyud): pa gnyisakhu tshur bcangs la mthe'u chung gnyis phyung ste bskyed pa 'di ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi phyag rgya'o//sngags la/ne maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/
274b5(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA hri/'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya ste dgos pa'i don thams cad sgrub pa'o//gang zhig nang gi dag pa yis//phyag rgya 'di dag
274b6(rgyud): 'dzin byed pa//sngags pa de ni sdig bral bar//'gyur te 'di la the tshom med//rdo rje 'chang rnams thams cad dang //byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni//rdzu 'phrul che ba'i
274b7(rgyud): lha kun dang //blo dang ldan pa de la srung //de lta bas ni rnam kun du//bdag nyid che la gus par bya//rig sngags rtag tu bzlas byas na//de la dngos grub mi dka'//rgyal ba
275a1(rgyud): rnams kyi ga nus pa'i snrugs//ma dang la ni 'grub par 'gyur//'jig N+Din+d+ra thugs rnams kyang yin pa//de dag de yi dbang gyur to//ban
275a2(rgyud): zhig dra gyi zhes ces//de yi g.yas g.yon 'khor bar 'gyur// m+bi ni lha yi spu ni rnams kyang //de yi dbyang du gyur cing 'khod//sngags pa sngags kyi tshul gnas nas//
275a3(rgyud): sa ni 'dor 'gyur ba//dbang bsgyur byin gnas mchog tu//de tshod ni skye ba 'gyur//gdun dang ldan bcom ldan 'das//rnam par snang mdzad ci bzhugs par//rgyam pa'i sras
275a4(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin//skye ba dag ni 'dzin par 'gyur//ji srid byang chub gyon gyi bar//de yi spyod pa nyams mi 'gyur//rdo rje 'chang rnams thams cad kyis//thams cadu
275a5(rgyud): ni byin gyis bsgres//de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la srin lag gnyis nang du brlag ste/mdzub mo gnyis tshigs dang po bkug la/gung mo gzhibs te nas gang gi sam
275a6(rgyud): rab tsam bzhag cing mthe bong gnyis de'i drung du bzhag pa 'di na rdo rje drag po chen po'i phyag rgya'o//sngags l-I/nA maHsarba trArmA ga~M te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba twA mA mahA
275a7(rgyud): ShaN hU~M/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub tshe gI mos pas phung mo snying po la 'byung ba 'di ni rdo rje dgu pa chen po'i mgo'i phyag rgyaro//rdzogs la/na moH sarba ta thA ga N+Di
276a1(rgyud): be'u'i phyag rgya'o//sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA bi s+phu la badz+rA tsaN+Da swA hA/phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdze'u rlung phyung ste snga ma
276a2(rgyud): bzhin bzhug pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i rkang pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags l-i/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA pi tsi tra go ti swA hA/de ltar phyag rgya rab 'byas/
276a3(rgyud): 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam pa sna tshogasu gnas pa/'jig rten gyi khams du mar sems can gyi khams du ma rnam par sbyong bar
276a4(rgyud): byed pa/dus gsum la ni stobs thogs pa med pa/chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa las byung ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/lha dang /klu dang /
276a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba gcod par byed pa/de bzhin gshegs
276a6(rgyud): pa'i rtogs pa thob par byed pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung thugs kyi bkod pa bstan pa'i rnam par gnas pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/rdo rje
276a7(rgyud): don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa sgrub par byed pa/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma
276b1(rgyud): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mig tu gyur pa sha stag go/lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa bstan pa dang /cho
276b2(rgyud): 'phrul rnam par sprul pa'i gnas las phyag rgya rab 'byams ji snyed cig rnyed pa'o////bam po bcu pa/de nas lag na rdo rjes bdud thams cad pham par byed pa bkod pa
276b3(rgyud): rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pararo zhugaso//byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
276b4(rgyud): cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste lag na rdo rje'i mgo bo la byugs nas legs so//zhes bya ba byin te/sems can la kun phan byed pa//dpa' bo chen po leg so legs//gsang
276b5(rgyud): sngags spyod pa las byung ba'o//rdo rje stang stabs ched kyi phyir//sdang ba'i sems can 'jigs byed pa//ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//rdo rje stang stabs cho ga'i rim//sems can
276b6(rgyud): chen po khyod kyis ston//rdo rje 'byung ba'i rkang thabs ni//sngags rgyal rnams kyi spyi yin te//'dug pa dang ni 'gro ba dang //ldang dang rnam par gtor ba dang //dgug pa dang ni brkyang
276b7(rgyud): ba dang //rkang pa sa bcing bskum pa dang //spo ba dang ni bzhag pa dang //khu tshur bcangs pas bzung ba dang //gzir dang rdo rje'i gzhum pa dang //rdo rje'i phyag rgyas phur gdab
277a1(rgyud): da//bdun na du//rgyun rnam pa rdzogs las 'ganas ma namanan dang //tshug ma ga/nga/
277a2(rgyud): sbyin ma bskyod par bya dang //de bzhin mig gnyisna dpyad pa dang //rkang thabs rnam par 'byed pa dud //lag gnyis sgyur bar bya ba dang //de bzhin lag pa bskyed pa
277a3(rgyud): ngo //rkang po gnyis kyis 'byong ba dang //lus ni snyoms dang bcas par yang //bye brag tu ni ston pa dang //bcad dang gtsub dang bgad pa dang //gza' da
277a4(rgyud): rnam par bgad pa dang //kun tu sgra dang rnam sgra dang //drag tu byed dang bcas pa dang //sdod pa thams cad cher bcad dang //rengs par bya dang rmongs bya dang //gyen du mched dang
277a5(rgyud): ngas bsnun dang //mdzes pa'i stabs dang gtsub bsnun dang //sgrub phyir dang po sngar spyad dang //de bzhin lha la bsnyen bya dang //sngags pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang //dngos grub ci 'dra
277a6(rgyud): yin pa ding //sems can khams la rnam kun tu//srung dang sba ba bya ba dang //dbang po 'di dag thams cad dang //gzhan yang yid la ci 'dod dang //sdang sems ldan pa de
277a7(rgyud): dag la//de bzhin phyir ni dgug pa dang /'di dag thams cad rgya cher ni//sems can 'phang bar 'dod par spros//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rkang stabs kyi stabs
277b1(rgyud): kyis rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di lta bu gsungaso//nA maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA hUM hUM hUM/phaT phaT phaT phaT/tsaN+Da badz+ra/pa dz+wa le ta mUrti swAhA/de nas
277b2(rgyud): lag ni rdo rjes gsang sngags 'di thos nas dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la rnam par bltas nas smras pa/kye grogs po dag nyon cig/sems can
277b3(rgyud): gang la la sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la skyabasu 'dong ba rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod cing gsang sngags kyi tshul la brtson pa de dag
277b4(rgyud): la ci nas kyang ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir deng phyin cad srung ba gyis shig/bsti stang du gyis shig/rim gror gyis shig/mchod pa gyis shig/de nas thang
277b5(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu smras pa/chos kyi rjes bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo zhes brjod nas cang mi smra bar 'khod do//de nas lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang
277b6(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la smras pa/rigs kyi bu gde la la zhig ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la srung ba sgrub par brtson pa/byed
277b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam tshig las 'gal bar byed na rig pa'i rgyal po drag pos 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba/kun tu
278a1(rgyud): mched cing rab tu 'bar bas ng+ge'i mgo tshul pa bdun du 'goms//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la/
278a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces smraso//zhi ba'i blo gros stang stangs kyi mtshan nyid sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsungs pa bshad kyis nyon cig/mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas//de bzhin pa
278a3(rgyud): la phyog 'tshalo//sngags pas shAr phyogs kha bltas te//'greng la thal mo mchogs mar bzhag/gsang sngags lta bur 'jom mchog gis//rdo rje stangs tshul gar
278a4(rgyud): byed cing //mtshogs nas thal mo phab nas su//snying khar bzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni//phyogs rnams kun tu bskor bar bya//rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su//lag pa ga l+la
278a5(rgyud): pa bteg byas la//g.yon pa rked pa'i rgyab tu bzhag/rkang pa g.yas pa ba taganas su//g.yas pa bskum par legs par sbyar//g.yon pa mchogs mar bstod nas su/
278a6(rgyud): sdang ba kun la bsdigs par bya//rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang bya zhing //gnyi ga rdo rje khu tshur bcangs//b+h+rUM bcas hUM zhes bya bso bgyid//rdo rje bsnun pas bsnun par bya//
278a7(rgyud): gar gyis bsgyur nas su//rkang pa g.yon pa bkug byas la//de ltar phyo ga bzhi rnam su yang //rdo rje'i mnan 'gros mnan par bya//rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su//rked pa'i gnas
278b1(rgyud): bzhag par bya//rti spyad gnas la gnas nas su//mig ni thur du blta bar bya//rdo rje'i phur bus btab pa na//sa 'og rnams bdun g.yo bar 'gyur//'brug sgra lta 'dra'i rgyu ldan zhing //
278b2(rgyud): 'bar bar rdo rje 'chang 'dre bar//rdo rje gyen du bdag par bya//rgyub tu thal mo sbyar bar bya//de nas rdo rje gar bya zhing //lte ba'i gnas bzhag par bya//'di 'dra'i gnas la gnas
278b3(rgyud): nas su//tsham ngam legs par bslab par bya//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //khro bo phyag brnyan bran mo yi//mtshon cha'i phyag brnyan ji snyed pa//rdo rje be con dbyig to dang //
278b4(rgyud): mdung thung mda' chan 'khor lo dang //ka nA yaM dang gtun shing thogs//pho nya pho smos gang yin dang //bgegs la sogs pa rnam par bzlog/phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan gong gsungs
278b5(rgyud): pa/bgegs rnams bzhig par bya ba'i phyir//dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan rnams kyis//spyi yi cho ga rgyas par ni//bslabs pa'i sngags pas lhar bcas dang //lha min gsang ba
278b6(rgyud): kun tu gzhom//dkyil 'khor la ni bgegs bya'i phyir//tshangs pa'i sdong bur thug pa nas//sa stongs gnas pa'i lha yi bar//gcig tu 'dus nas lhags gyur kyang //stang
278b7(rgyud): stabs chog shes pa yi//sngags pas hUM zhes byas pa yi//thams cad rnam par 'thor 'gyur te//shing bal 'dab ma rlung gtor bzhin//rdo rje 'bar ba mer gyur nas//bskul
279a1(rgyud): pa'i mo 'drar langs nus su//rdo rje rkang pa ldan par ni//rdo rje phyag rgyas kun tu bzhom//rdo rjes gnon dang ldan par na//rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcom nas su//
279a2(rgyud): sngags pas sa gsum phung byed na//bgegs dang log 'dren smos ci dgos//bdag nyid chen po'i rdo rje'i rgya//stang stangs 'di ni spyi yin te//bsgrubs min don yang grub byed
279a3(rgyud): ni/cho ga zhib las 'byung ci dgos//rdo rje 'byung ba'i dam pa ni//thog mar bcings pa byas nas su//de nas rdo rje mchog rigs los//'byung ba gzhan yang bcing bar bya/
279a4(rgyud): 'di las gsang sngags rnams dang ni//stang stabs rnam pa thams cad 'byung //de lta bas na rnam pa kun tu//sngags pas bsgrims te bslab par bya//dam tshig chen po rdo rje
279a5(rgyud): 'byung ba'i rtsa ba'i steng stad so//rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su//seng ge bzhin du pha rol mnan//rdo rje phyag rgyas kun tu gzhom//rdo rje chung pa brkyang bar bya//hUM zhes bya ba'i
279a6(rgyud): sgra sgrogs shing //rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcom nas su//sa rnams kun kyang g.yo 'gyur na//gseng dang klu rnams smos cing gos//seng ge'i tshul du mchongs nas ni//
279a7(rgyud): bgegs dang seng ge'i gzugs 'dra dang //glang chen shing rta spre'u dang //gzhan yang gang dag rkang bzhi pa//de nas rnam par 'bros pa 'am//'tsho bar gyur te the tshom
279b1(rgyud): med//tshangs pas byas pa'i bgogs rnams kyang //skad cig de la myur du 'joms//seng ge ltar pha rol gnon pa'i stang stabs//rdo rje 'byung bar yang 'dug ste//rkang pa dustsal/
279b2(rgyud): ba'i tshul gyis su//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ka ni//rkang pa'i gnasu bzhag par bya//hUM brjod mgul pa gsal ba'i sgras//rdo rje gar gyis gaur bya zhing //rkang pa g.yon pa bteg
279b3(rgyud): nas ni//de yi rtse mo ser btsugs la//rkang pa g.yon pa bteg nas ni//lag pa rdo rje gsor bcas par//lag g.yon snying khar bzhag nas ni//sngags pas 'khor lo
279b4(rgyud): bzhin du bskor//rdo rje 'bar ba'i mer sbyar nas//rdo rje nyi ma'i dmigs ldan par//rdo rje mgul pa gsal ba'i sgras//phyogs kun yongs rgyas par bya//bgegs kyi gnas su
279b5(rgyud): dmigs nas ni//myur du rdo rje'i goms stobs kyis//g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas nas te//rdo rje phyag rgyas kun tu gzhom//de bzhin phyogs dang mtshams rnams kyang //kun tu
279b6(rgyud): yang dag gzhom par bya//bdud sde mi bzad chen po dag/phyogs rnams kun nas 'byung ba kun//g.yas kyang gom pa'i stabs sbyar te//rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kun tu gzhom//sa
279b7(rgyud): gsum thams cad g.yo 'gyur na//bgegs dang log 'dren smos ci dgos//rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bltas nas ni//bgogs dang log 'dren thams cad dang //mi bzad gzugs
280a1(rgyud): sngun srin po rnams//phyogs rnams kun tu 'bros par 'gyur//rdo rje g.yas brgyad bya ba'o//rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su//mtshogs mar rdo rje thar sbyar
280a2(rgyud): te//rdo rjer bcas pa'i lag bskor zhing //sprin ltar yongs su khyab par bya//rdo rje gar gyis gar bya zhing //mchu ni so yis mnan par bya/khu tshur g.yon pa bdeg par bya//
280a3(rgyud): g.yas pa snying khar bzhag par bya//rkang pa g.yon pa bteg nas su//g.yas rol du ni bcug por bya//'brug sgra dal ltar hUM brjod pa//g.yon pa brkyang ba'i rkang gnas te//
280a4(rgyud): rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya//g.yas pas la gzugs par bya//rdo rje rkang pas sa 'og tu//bsnun na thams cad g.yo bar byed//sa yi 'ogran gnas pa'i klu//gsang nga
280a5(rgyud): lha min srin por bcas//thams cad g.yos pa 'di ci zhes//ya mtshan 'dzin pa'i sems gyur nas//ya mtshan 'dzin pa'i snying gis su//'di dag thams cad cir 'gyur kye//
280a6(rgyud): bskal pa zad par ma gyur grang //de skad phan tshun 'dri bar byed//gnas de nas ni yang bskyod nas//rdo rje 'bar ba'i mig ldan par//rdo rje phyag rgyas hUM brjod de//rdo rje'i rkang
280a7(rgyud): pas bsnun par bya//klu dang gsang ba thams cad dang //gzhan yang gang dag sar gnas pa//gang na sngags 'chang 'dug pa yis//gnas der thams cad lhag nas su//
280b1(rgyud): nga ni yang san byud stong //rdo rje byu byas rab nyan pas//dzan caganapa gcig pa//bka lung myur du nga gal//brgyad/lan dang rgya nu'am//non nam/
280b2(rgyud): smyan rjes som//kAni sbyin po mos 'ayang sa ga//'on te rgyal sring da//'an te la ni yad dam/na te yul ste gzhan rje nad na//rdorje'agyu
280b3(rgyud): bas gzor gyir byas//bzhed pa thams cad btang bya ru bgyi//sgrogs pas 'ga' zhig zungs nas su//de dag la ni bsam par bya//rdo d+hA gar ni legs zhing //phyag rgyu ni
280b4(rgyud): bsdu bar bya//cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis so//rdo rje gnas bzhag par bya//gzhan dun no gsang ba dang //srin po kun la gnod 'gyur te//glags lnga blun ka tshol byed do//gci
280b5(rgyud): bde dag gnod par byed//blug su 'gyur ba rtogs nas su//sngags pa la ni gnod pa byed //da lta bas na rnam kun tu//blo dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos//rdo rje'i gnas ni rig
280b6(rgyud): /stang stabs bya ba sbyar bar bya//g.yon brkyang rkang pa'i stang sdeb so//rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su//dpral bar thal mo skyer bar bya//rdo rje gar ni byis nas s+ho//thul
280b7(rgyud): par bzhag par bya//rangs pa'i dang sa kya zhi // lamargyas baH//teg 'a tshu nas su//rims babyin du n+te bar bya//gaben pa skye /
281a1(rgyud): bzhag nas su//hU~M dang bcas pas khro bsgyings shing /so ni mchu yang munan byas la//rdo rje nyi ma'i mig ldan zhing //bzhin ni khro gnyer mi 'chang bas/
281a2(rgyud): gar byed pa yi tshul gyis ni//rkang pa g.yas pas bsnun par bya//g.yon pas kyang ni de bzhin bsnun//rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya yis//lag pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya//gyen du
281a3(rgyud): bltas nas dag tu ni/rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun par bya//rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun nas yang //tshangs par bcas dang brgya byin bcas//gnas dang bcas pa thams cad 'gul/
281a4(rgyud): phan tshun gcig la gcig lta zhing //grogs ngag bskal pa 'khrugs gyur tam//'on te sems can che 'byung ngam//'on te sangs rgyas byung gyur tam//nI zhes thams cad
281a5(rgyud): phan tshun smras//myos ches gyur nas phan tshun dang //phyogs bcu dag tu lta bar byed//rdo rje 'bar bas gzir bas na//gnas de nas ni dong nas su//rdo rje ldan pa ci
281a6(rgyud): bzhed pa//gsungs zhes lung ni mnod par byed//bdag cag nongs pa ma mchis shing //bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid ma lags//rdo rje 'bar bar gzir gyur na//
281a7(rgyud): bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol//rdo rje can gyis rdo rje la//mig mi 'dzum par rtag tu lta//lha phal gzhan rnams de dag kyang //rdo rje 'bar bas brgyal gyur
281b1(rgyud): nas/rdo rje dam pa ldan pa la//thugs la ci dgongs bslad mdzod dang //gal te rgyal srid bzhed gyur tam//de bzhin meng dang lha bzhed dam//lha yi bu mo brnyes pa
281b2(rgyud): dang rje/lha yi bye ba yid mthun bzhed//thugs la gang bzhed de rnams kun//de dag 'bul bar dgyid par 'gyur//de nas lha ming rdzu 'phrul che//de dag yid ni rab
281b3(rgyud): dga' nas//rdo rje 'bar bas gzir ba dag/sgrub pa po la myur du 'bul//de nas byams pa'i sems kyis ni//sngags pas bltas nas btang bar bya//gzhan du na ni gzir
281b4(rgyud): de dag/glags rnying gnod pa byed par 'gyur//rdo rje 'byung bar yang 'dug ste//rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya//mtshogs mer thal mo sbyar nasu//phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par
281b5(rgyud): byarkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su//g.yas pa btig cing de bzhin g.yon//rdo rje'i khu tshur tshul gyis ni//g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya//g.yon pa snying khar bzhag nas
281b6(rgyud): suM/smin ma dgug cing bskul bskyed de//mig gis bgegs la bltas byas la//hUM dang bcas pas rab bskul na//gal te tshangs pa nyid gyur tam//gal te khyab 'jug nyid
281b7(rgyud): gyur ta ma//drag po brgya byin nyid gyur yang //bltas pas myur du 'jigs par 'gyur//ci ste khyab 'jug drag po rnams//bdag gi dbang du 'gyur 'dod pas//kun tu spyod pa'i
282a1(rgyud): tshul gyis su//rdo rje nyi ma'i mig can gyis//rkang stabs sbyar ba'i tshul gyis su//rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun par bya//rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na//sa
282a2(rgyud): rnams thams cad rab tu g.yo//de nas brgya byin lha rnams dang //lha min srin po gsang ba dang //stan las nyams par bdag nyid kyis//ma shes shig ni brgyal bar 'gyur//
282a3(rgyud): de nas khyab 'jug drag po rnams//yir ni blong zhes gyur nas su//rdo rje rnal 'byor che ldan pa//ga la pa der thal sbyar te//bdag cag nongs pa ma mchis par//sngags
282a4(rgyud): kyis bdag cag shin tu gzir//gzir ba'i lha rnams de dag kun//stan la so sems ni nyams par gyur//ji ltar ci bgyi bka' stsol ces//lus la gus par blta
282a5(rgyud): zhing 'khor//kun la byams pa byas nas su//snying la bsam pa gcig bslangs na//de yi mod la de dag rnams//dga' zhing mgu nas sbyin par byed//sngags pa mnyam
282a6(rgyud): par gzhag nas su//de nas phyag rgya'i rgyal po btang //rkang pa spro ba'i tshul gyis su//rdo rje gan su bzhag par bya//rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi//rdo rje'i gnas ni
282a7(rgyud): rked gnas brjod//rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nasu//dbang po chen po'i gnas su brtan//mtshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas la//phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya//
282b1(rgyud): klurlung ba sgo ba'i tshul gyis su//rdo rje khu tshur bcangs b+has la//gar byed pa yi lag pa yis//bgegs kyi gzugs rnams bsdigs par bya//de bzhin g.yas dang g.yon
282b2(rgyud): gyis kyang //gnas nas song de'i bar du bya//de lte bgegs chen rab sdung ba//bsdigs kyang 'gro bar mi byed na//rdo rje gom pa myur bor la//gyen du lag pa kun
282b3(rgyud): rtswa bskyod//lag gnyis sA la bsgrubs nas su//'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hU~M brjod lA//gesang sngags blo ldan rkang bskum ste//rnam pa kun tu lus bskur ro//de nas lda
282b4(rgyud): ba'i tshul gyis mu//rdo rje'i lag pa g.yas brkyang la//dzA rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya//g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul du ni//
282b5(rgyud): lag gnyis gcig tu sbyar byas la//'brug sgra dal 'da'i hUM rnams dang //phaT rnams kyis ni rab bskul te//rdo rje giT+Ti ra bI'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams
282b6(rgyud): cad gzir bar bya//bod gshegs go 'bang ma gtogs par//rdo rje can dang 'khor lo can//grangs rgyas skyes pa gleng zhig gis//de yis lus la mI sems na/
282b7(rgyud): sgradang dri za gsang ba dang //gzhan yang gang dag ku rnams kun//shing bal 'dab ma nad gtor bzhin//d+hu l+r-id 'jigs 'gyur smras ci dgas//lha min srin
283a1(rgyud): rungs dang //yi dwags grul dul mngag zhug dang //bdud dang bdud kyi pho nya rnams//'di ltar 'gyur ba cu zhig dus/byams pa'i sems la mnyam
283a2(rgyud): bzhag cing //snying rje la yang mnyam bzhag nas//byang chub sems dran sngags pa yi sa//phyag rgya bsdu ba brtsam par bya//nyes pa cung zad tsam gyis phyir//bgegs rnams
283a3(rgyud): la ni gnod mi bya//shin tu sdang bar rig nas ni//gal te bgegs la gnod bya na//shin tu sdang ba drag rnams la//'jam de nyid ni mi bya'o//gal te 'jam des nyid byas na//
283a4(rgyud): de yi mod la gnod par byed//thog mar 'jam por sbyar bar bya//lan gnyis tshe ni dbye bar brtson//gsum tshe mchod yon thogs nas su//me tog snyim par gnas byas la/
283a5(rgyud): de nas bgegs la mchod par bya//'byung po kun phon gtor byin nas//'di skad kyi ni tshig brjod ste//bdag gis de ring khyod mchod kyis//song shig bgegs tshon 'gro bar
283a6(rgyud): gyis//phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/khyod kyi stobs dang rtsal mthong ste//khyod ni gegs kyang byed par nus//khyod ni lha yi sprul pa ste//khyod ni gegs byed mi nus min//
283a7(rgyud): sngon chad mchod pa ma mthong la//de ring bdag gis mchod byas te//mchod kyis da ni mchod khyor la//bgegs kyi dbang po song zhes brjod//gal te 'dug kyang bgegs
283b1(rgyud): min na//de yi spyod pa bzang po yin//sngags pas mchod byas 'on kyang ni//ci ste bgegs ni yang byed na//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang gyur pas//mi mchog rnams la mkhyen pa
283b2(rgyud): gsol//bgegs la chad pas bcad slad du//sbyor ba bgyis kyis nongs ma mchis//sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni//bka' dang
283b3(rgyud): bdag 'gal mi bgyid brjod//lha dang lha min gsang rnams dang //phyogs bcu kun gyi dri za dang //gza' dang mi 'am ci gang dag/mgon po mgon po che rnams la//bgegs
283b4(rgyud): kyis gtses pa bsgrag par bya//gal te cung zhig bskyab ce na//myur du yongasu skyobs shig ces//bsgrags pa gang dag mnyan byas nas//gegs byed zhi bar gyur na ni//de
283b5(rgyud): nas phyogs rnams thams cad kyi//lha rnams la ni mchod pa bya//gal te de ltar mi 'dug na//me tog thal mo mchod yon gyis//sangs rgyas la sogs rab bskul la//de la
283b6(rgyud): chad pas bcad par bya//drag po shin tu sdang sems pa//bka' lung las ni 'gal byed cing //srog kyang shin tu 'phrog byed la//sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi g.yel bar//de la
283b7(rgyud): phan pa shes nas su//bskal pa bye ba du mar ni//sems dmyal rnams su skye ba yi//sdug bsngal mang por 'dis 'gyur te//ji ltar sman pas sems can gyi//nad rnams med
284a1(rgyud): par byed pa bzhin//gzir bas bdag la nyes pa med//mkhas pa rnam par sbyangs pa yi//de ltar sems ni mnyam bzhag cing //snying rje'i yid dang ldan pa
284a2(rgyud): yis//byang chub sems ni brtan byas la//de la chad pas bcad pa tsam//ji ltar sman pa mkhos pa yis//nyes de yal bar mi 'dor bzhin//thabs dang shes rab mkhwa
284a3(rgyud): pA yang //mi 'byed mkhas bos na'ang nyes dang bcas//ji ltar sman pa mi mkhas pa//thabs dang shes rab bral ba yis//nad pa yal 'dor byed cing //gso ba'i cho ga
284a4(rgyud): mi byed pa//de bzhin shes dang bral ba yis//gal te gso bar brtson na yang //thabs dang shes rab bral ba la//sangs rgyas rnams ni bsngags mi mdzad//nad pa
284a5(rgyud): nad pa rnams la ni//sman pas ji ltar sman byin pa//tshwa dang kha dang bska ba yang //'jig rten smod pa mi byed pa//de bzhin 'dul ba'i bye brag gis//ci rigs pa ni
284a6(rgyud): gso bar bya//sdang ba'i sems can rnams la ni//byas te sangs rgyas rnams mi smod//'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba//shin tu rmad 'byung rgyal ba 'byung //de bzhin gshegs
