284a7(rgyud): pa'i gapung rab la//'gro ba'i chos ni 'di lta ste//shin tu sdang sems drag po yi//sems can thams cad de tshe byung //shin tu drag po mthong nas ni//'jam po nyid du mi
284b1(rgyud): sbyor te//shes rab thabs kyi snying stobs can//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//rdo rje'i snying stobs khros gyur pa//sems can rnams la phan+da byed pa//de nas pha rol
284b2(rgyud): gnon pa yis//sems can khams ni du ma mnan//sdig med nan gyis stobs kyis su//thams cad dbang du dgod par bya//pha rol gnon pa'i rim tshul gyis//ji ltar
284b3(rgyud): byang chub 'dod byas nas//sems can khams ni du ma dag/thams cad dbang du dgod pa byas//rdo rje slob dpon chen po yis//log 'dren bgegs rnams de ltar dgod//byang
284b4(rgyud): chub sems dran pasgrim byas nas//skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyuraro//de phyir sngags pa tsho khros la//bskal pa'i me yi mthu lta bus//rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs
284b5(rgyud): rnams thams cad bcad par bya//rkang pa'i tshul ni de nyid kyis//rdo rje'i gar gyis gar byas la//rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang zhes 'dor//rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas brten
284b6(rgyud): te//rkyed pa'i gnas kyi ral gri de//shugs nas phyung nas gdab par bya//rno ba med pa'i tshul gyis su//shugs kyis lag pa sar bsdams la//rkang pa spo ba'i chu
284b7(rgyud): gyis su//ral gri 'phyar ba 'dra bar bzung //ral gri tshul du gzhug pa ni//mdzub mo gung mo gzhibs par bya//de nas lag pa g.yon pa yis//ral gri shub su bya ba ni//
285a1(rgyud): mthe'u chung dang ni srin lag dang //mthe bos ral gri shub su bya//de nas rkang pa g.yas pa yis//sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris te//so yis mchu
285a2(rgyud): mnan khros byas la//bdag ni rdo rje'i gnyis 'bar bas//rkang pas mgo ni mnan byas nas//lag pas ral gri phyung nas su//rdo rje 'gro ba'i gom stabs kyis//gar gyi
285a3(rgyud): tshul du kun bskyod de//rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad bcad par bya//rdo rje ldan des gang bcom pa//de ni srog la mi sems so//de nas de dag
285a4(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur//yang na 'chi 'gyur the tshom med//brgya byin mtshungs pa'i bgegs zhig na'ang //de yang med la brlag par 'gyur//de nas rdo rje slob dpon che//snying rje snying
285a5(rgyud): ban+de'i sems ldan pasna//ji ltar du yang hUM 'gyur ba//de ltar de la snying brje bya//rdo rje ral gro'i snang stab so//de nas rdo rje slob dpan ches//rdo rje gidzub par bya ba bas//rdo rje
285a6(rgyud): 'khor lo'i phyage rgyu yis//gnod pa r+ya saMms pa thams cad gtug//rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas//rdo rje mthu rtsal brtsam byas la//rkang pa bteg cing bzhag tshul
285a7(rgyud): gyis//rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya//'khor los bsgyur bar bya rim gyi//pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar byas la//rkang pa rnam par bzhag byas nas//sa la 'khor lo 'phang bar bya//
285b1(rgyud): /rtong sprad gan su 'dug byas la//'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hU~M brjod do//thal mo brdab pa'i tshul gyis su//sa la 'khor los bsnun par bya//bzlog ste lan bur byas nas su//lag
285b2(rgyud): pa sbyar ba'i tshul gyis ni//'khor lo lta bur byas nas su//gyen du 'phangs la bzhig par bya//bkug ste rkang pas mgo mnan nas//bgegs rnams la ni bsnun par bya//
285b3(rgyud): 'on te rab tu zhi bar 'gyur//yang na shi 'gyur the tshom med//de ltar rim pa'i tshul 'di yis//bgegs rnams la ni gnod pa bya//sdig pa'i gnod pa med par ni//
285b4(rgyud): bskul kyang bde bar mi 'dring ngo //gal te rdo rje sems dpa' che//snying rje'i sems dang ldan gyur pas//bgegs la zhi bar bya 'dod na//cho ga 'di yi tshul du bya//ba lang gi ni lci
285b5(rgyud): ba les//de 'dra ba yi gzugs byas la//sngags pas zhi ba'i sems kyis su//sngags pas 'o mas bkrus nas ni//mod la snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur//de ltar kun tu
285b6(rgyud): bgegs rnams ni//kun la cho ga 'di bzhin bya//rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis na//gsang sngags rnams la sbyar bya ste//bcad dang gnod pa byas pa dang //bkag pa dang ni bcing
285b7(rgyud): ba'ang rung //gal te sgrub par 'dod pa ni//de nas snga 'kho bzhin du 'gyur//'on kyang gsang sngags rnams la ni//bye brag tu ni spos kyis bya//de ni ser mo'i 'o ma dang /
286a1(rgyud): yang na mar gyi sbyin bsgeg \u0f7f//yang na brgya dang rtsa brgyad da/sbyin sro shugs ni kun ni 'gyur//zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste//dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa'o//ga
286a2(rgyud): rgyal spyod lam gang yin pa//de ni khros pas bzlum par bya//de ltar las ni ci rigs pas//gsung sngags rnams la sngags pas bya//rnam pa gzhan du mi b+ha ste//lus
286a3(rgyud): kyis 'bras bu med par 'gyur//rdo rje 'khor lo'i stang stabaso//rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang //rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas//mchogs mar thal mo sbyar byas te//rdo rje'i
286a4(rgyud): gAr ni rab tu byas//rting sprad rnams kyi tshul gyis su//smin bsgyur rked pas reg par bya//lag pa gnyis kas sa la reg/de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnamasu yang //yid
286a5(rgyud): kyis bskor ba'i tshul gyis su//rkang pa 'khor lo bzhin du bskor//lag gnyis rked pa'i gnas bzhag la//rdo rje'i bgad pa rab byed cing //lag pa g.yas pa
286a6(rgyud): bsgreng bar bya//rdo rje'i mdzub mos rab tu bsdigs//hUM brjid bsgyings dang bcas byas la//rdo rje nyi ma'i mig ldan pas//rdo rje'i mdzub mos bsdigs nas ni//bdud kyi dbang
286a7(rgyud): phyug bdag nyid kyang //bltas pa deni mod la 'bros//bya rog bong rdo 'ben mthong bzhin//rdo rje ga pa'i//de nas rdo rje sngags pa che//rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas so//
286b1(rgyud): mthun rkang stabs byas nas su//lag pa bsnol te khu tshur bcang //mthe bong gyen du bsgreng byas la//gung mo gshibs te bsgreng bar bya//mdzub mo de gnyis zla la sgreng //rdo rje kha
286b2(rgyud): zhes brjod pa yin//rkang pa g.yas pa brdeg par bya//g.yon pa gzugs shing de bzhin bya//rdo rje me lce me ltar 'bar//dgod pa'i kha ltar mngon sum bya//'brug sgra
286b3(rgyud): dal 'dra'i hUM brjod de//kha yi thad kar bzhag par bya//phyogs rnams dag ni thams cad kyi//rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu 'thungs na//mig sngar snang bar gyur pa yi//sdang ba kun
286b4(rgyud): lta smos ci dgas//de ltar byas na phyogs bzhi po//kun nas byung ba thams cad skems//tshub ma kun tu lce 'bab dang //sprin rnams kun nas 'du ba dang //rdo rje'i kha ni glal
286b5(rgyud): ba dang //gtor bas rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur//'jig rten du ni ltas 'byung ba//kun nas gnas grub gang yin pa//sngags pa rdo rje me lce yi//me ltar bsgyur na de kun
286b6(rgyud): zhi rdo rje kha yi phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad btsa' bar bya//rdo rje kha glal ba'i gar stabaso//de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor che//rdo rje ye shes ba sgyur nas/
286b7(rgyud): bgegs la gso ba byas na ni//nyes pa yod pa ma yin//rgyal ba'i ye shes las byung ste//rdo rje slob dpon gso byed pas//bdag 'drar sngags pa de 'dra ste//sngags
287a1(rgyud): bca 'drar rgyal de bzhin//sems can kun la snying rje dang //byang chub sems ni bsnun byas te//thabs kyis dam pa thob gyur nas//rnam par gso ba thams cad bya//
287a2(rgyud): gzhan du na ni phyogs rnams na//bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bsngags mi 'gyur//byang chub sems dang bral ba ni//lha yi mchod 'os ma yin no//thabs dang shes rab bral gyur pas//
287a3(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras po nyan thos dang //gang yang rang sangs rgyas dag ni//bka' 'grub gnas la gnas pa ste//bdag don phan pa'i sems ldan pas//de dag la ni bya ba med//thabs
287a4(rgyud): dang ye shes las byung ba//byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can//byang chub sems kyi shing rta dang //byams dang snying rje'i kha bsgyur dang //sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang //bsdu ba bzhi yi rdo
287a5(rgyud): rje dang //thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa dang //byang chub phyogs kyi rtsa lag la//brten nas sangs rgyas sras po rnams//sems can don dga'i rtsa bas brtse//de ltar slob dpon rdo rje
287a6(rgyud): 'chang //thabs dang ye shes mkhas pa yis//sdang ba rnams ni thams cad kyi//sems ni rab tu gso bar bya//rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang //rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas ni//
287a7(rgyud): rkang pa mthun pa'i gnas bzhag ste//rdo rje thal mo bzhum byas la//rdo rje'i gar ni byas nas su//lag pa g.yas pa gyen du sgreng //g.yon pa bgos skor brtan nas su//gung
287b1(rgyud): modang na mdzub mo gzhag//mthu chung mtho ba zud pad+maH//grwa ya s+yAd g+hA ye bAd+hAn kAsun//gA yA swA bang nang par gnas nas sku//rdo rje byu gla pa'i tshul sa na//rgyam
287b2(rgyud): bdag nyid rdo rje can//bdag nyid du ni bdag gnas//hUM brjod snyems dang khros pa yis//rdo rje yid kyis btang bar bya//phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rjes baN+Di g-is//rdo rje dag
287b3(rgyud): bas bsdigs pas na//lha dang lha min gsang bar bcas//dkyil 'khor che 'am sgrub pa'i tshe//gegs byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur//rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mar
287b4(rgyud): bcing //gtsug nas byung ba nyid kyang no//glegs byed phyir ni 'gro ma 'gyur//rdo rje 'dzin pa mi ngon sum zhes//bkrigs rnams phan tshun smra byed cing //srung ba'i phyir ni de dag kus//
287b5(rgyud): lhan cig dkyil 'khor drung du 'dod /rdo rje snus kyis bskul ba na// rje slo dpon sprul pa che//bsod nams chags ni bsags pa la//gzhan rnams thams cad phyug
287b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang //rdo rje gar ni rab byas la//pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar nas su//phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya//g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul byas te//bskal
287b7(rgyud): pa'i me yi 'od 'dra bas//thal mo brdabs pa'i tshul gyis su//khros te lag pa phur bar bya//lag gnyis rdo rje'i tshul gyis su//mthe'u chung mthe bong sprad byas lo//g.yon pas
288a1(rgyud): kos skor brten nas su//g.yas pa gyen du sbyong byas la//A hA hU~M hU~M brjod do bskal pa yos//sngags pos kun tu sgra yang brjod//rdo rje'i s+thA nI phyung bas
288a2(rgyud): na/sdang ba thams cad phung bar 'gyur//brgya byin tshangs dang zla ba sogs//rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gza' gzhan yang //zlos pa tsam gyis sa g.yos te//kun tu skye yis sems
288a3(rgyud): kyang nyams//de tshe thal mo sbyar te 'dud//rdo rje sgra chen gang na bar//thams cad lhan cig lhags nas su//rdo rje sgra yis gzir gyur te//stan las sems ni nyams pas
288a4(rgyud): naH/mnga' bdag sug las ci 'tshal ba//bdag cag myur du bka' stsol ces//sngags pa la ni lung yang ne//sngags pas bsams te gar byas ni//lha rnams myur du grol bar
288a5(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas byams pa'i sems bskyed la//rtul zhugs can gyis phyag rgya dgrol//rdo rje kun tu sgra'o//rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su//rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su//phyogs
288a6(rgyud): rnams kun tu rgyas byas te//mi mthun rkang stabs byas nas su//bsnol te khu tshur bcangs byas la//mthe bong gnyis ni gshibs te sgreng //gung mo gnyis ni gshibs
288a7(rgyud): byas la//mdzub mo dbu ma'i tshig bkug ste//gung mo gnyis la gzhag par bya//rdo rje kha ni byas pas na//snang ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur//kha yi thad kar bzhag nas ni/
288b1(rgyud): rdo rje kha yang 'byung bar 'gyur//bdag ni rdo rje chen po can//rdo rje'i ye shes stobs dang ldan//hri ha hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/rdo rje'i gom stabs tshul gyis ni//rdo rje gnon pa'i gom pa yis/
288b2(rgyud): bzhag dang bdag pas 'gro byed cing //phyogs rnams bzhi por brjod par bya//rdo rje sgra byed bskul bas ni//bgegs chen rnams dang bgegs rnams dang //rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha
288b3(rgyud): rnams dang //de yi mdun du 'gro bar byed//rdo rje sgra yis bdag cag tshig/rdo rje sgra yis bskul bas na//bdag cag rang gi gnas nas g.yos//rdo rje dbang pos bka' myur stsol//
288b4(rgyud): gal te dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam//rgyal srid dngul chu mig bsku dang //kun nas gter rnams gzigs bzhed dam//bka' stsol cig ces de skad smra//dga' bar byin nas sgrub pa
288b5(rgyud): la//phyag 'tshal mchod pa byas nas dong //rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang //rdo rje'i slob dpon mthu chen gyis//rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la//rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya bcing //rkang pa
288b6(rgyud): pus mo btsugs nas su//lag pa gnyis ni khu chur bcangs//gung mo gnyis ni sgreng nas su//mdzub mo gnyis ni ngos la gzhar//g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas nas su//
288b7(rgyud): myur du rdo rje gom stabs kyis//'khrul 'khor kun la bsnun byas la//sgo rnams thad dbye bar bya//lha min gnod sbyin rgyal po dang //srin po rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyang //thams
289a1(rgyud): cang rang gi gnas nas g.yos//bskal bzod dam ji snyam sems//rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun ngas na//sems ni tha~Mng zhes gyur nas su//ye shes rdo rje tshe ldan pa//
289a2(rgyud): ga la ba der nye bar 'dong //rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag tshig/sngags pas dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam//'on te dadril chu bcung len bzhed//rdo rje dbang pos bka' myur snrel//smras nas kun
289a3(rgyud): gyis de mod la//yid la 'dod pa sbyin par byed//gal te lha dang lha ma yin//gsang ba bkol bar 'dod na yang //'dod pas de dag lhags nas su//'dod pa bzhin du las byed///
289a4(rgyud): lung dang 'gal bar byed pa dag/tsi ste dam bcas mi 'ong na//slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba po//rdo rje'i phyag rgyas yongs ldan pa//seMs ni mchu mnan khros pa dang //me 'bar lta bur
289a5(rgyud): 'jigs rung bas//myur du rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis//sa rnams kun la bsnun par bya//g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas nasu//ci ste dam bcas mi 'ong na//rdo rje'i phyag rgyas
289a6(rgyud): bsnun par bya//rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na//ha ha zhes ni de dag smra//stan los lus kyang rab tu nyams//lus ni me yi rab tu 'bar//rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po pa/
289a7(rgyud): ga la ba der nye bar 'dong //bskal pa chen pos yongasu skyobs//bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol//lha dang gsang ba lha min rnams//'phral du bsgo ba'i lung bzhin byed//
289b1(rgyud): bsgo ba'i lung ni bsgrubs nas su//rang rang gi ni gnas su 'dod//de lta na nI lha dbang pong //de lta ma yin mi btang ngo //de nas bsgo lung bzhin byas nas//de dag myur du gan su 'dang /
289b2(rgyud): slob dpon rdo rje 'tshong ba pos//de nas phyag rgya btang bya ste//rdo rje'i gar gyi tshul gyis ni//rkeng pa'i gnasu bzhag par bya//rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang //rdo rje'i gar ni rab
289b3(rgyud): byes la//rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis//sdang ba thams cad bcing bar bya//dus bzhin rab tu bskul byas la//gal te bsgo lung 'gal byed na//rdo rje'i lcags kyus dgug
289b4(rgyud): bya zhing //rdo rje'i zhags pas bcing bar bya//rdo rje rnam pa'i sgra'o//rdo rje thul mo btsum nas su//mthun pa'i stabasu gnas bya ste//lag pa rgyab tu bsnun byas la//rdo rje
289b5(rgyud): gyon du 'phang bar bya//de nas rdo rje la bltas la//'brug sgra de la 'dra'i hU~M brjod de//rkang pa spro ba'i tshul gyis su//g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon paste//lag pa gA ye na par
289b6(rgyud): mdzub mo dang //mthe bo rtse sbed bzhag par bya//lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub ma yis//rtse bkug lcags kyus brtan por bya//rdo rje rgyu smra pa'i mig ldan pa//so ye mchu
289b7(rgyud): mnan khros pa yis//gang la bgegs ni yod pa der//rdo rje thabs kyis myur seng la//rkang pa g.yas brkyang stabs byas te//rdo rje'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/
290a1(rgyud): bgegs rnams tha~Md dgug bya zhing //rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya//gal to 'khor lo can dang ni//dbang bcas drag po tshangs bcas pa//gal te rdo rje
290a2(rgyud): 'chang srung yang //sngags pas gzhin nas drangs te dgug/bkug nas rdo rjes bcings pa yis//rdo rje'i gzeb tu bzhag par bya//ji srid 'dod pa rdzogs 'gyur ba//da sring
290a3(rgyud): bar du bzhag par bya//bsgo ba'i lung ni mi nyan te//gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs na//bdag gi 'byor pa 'dod pa yis//de la chad pas bcad par bya//de yi gzugs ni
290a4(rgyud): byas ni su//rdo rje'i rkang pas gzir byas nas//ha ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing //lha'i dbang po yang 'ong 'gyur//de la bsgo ba'i lung yang 'bog/rdo rje gor gyis de nas yang /
290a5(rgyud): thal mo shin tu sbyar byas la//dbang chen stabs kyis 'dug nas su//phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya//rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su//g.yas dang de bzhin
290a6(rgyud): g.yon pa spo//log pa gnyis ni sbyar nasu//phan tshun bsnol te khu tshur bcangs//gung mo gnyis ni bshibs nas su//mdzub mo de la gzugs par bya//nga yi
290a7(rgyud): phyag rgyang //bgegs rnams kun gyi dam tshig yin//sdo ma bzhin du stabs tshul gyi//phyag rgyas bgegs rnams bkug na su//khro bo yi ni rdo rje 'dis//de la ngam
290b1(rgyud): na pa \u0f7f//dU sgru sa m+b+hag+sa nga // sa pa'i sgra rgyus//bad /d+mod nas so//banags rnams thams cad ga ra //ladun /
290b2(rgyud): byung no//de ni shAng bar mi bya'o//grol te drang bad na//de la rgo pas pa ca n+ted+d+he/ drug dang ltar bya dang //lungs kAr de ga na theg pa smras//de mi gnags
290b3(rgyud): ni byas nas su//me yi nang du bor byas na//gal te tshangs pas bsrungs na yang //bregags dri de yi med la 'gro//sngags pas de ma bsgo par bya//de nas des rgyas bya
290b4(rgyud): byams pa'i sems ni bskyed nas su//ga rgyab bA brtsams byas nas//gzir dang bcing dang 'gug pa rnas//thar nas byed bar gnas par 'gyur// nas
290b5(rgyud): sprin rdo rje 'ang // la ra gan zhes hU~M//sems can don la sbyi rna/ du /nan pa'i rlung chul na /rdo ga
290b6(rgyud): rlu byas //rdo rnarnal mo lags /thig+sa rnams kun d+he p+na g+h+raM/ b+h+yadz+dzawaM// phywa na nas //TI ke klur
290b7(rgyud): byang tshul gyis na//de nas thal mo ya gyur//gos pa'i spyod po'i tshul gyi //mkhas pas kyigs pa ni rnams su zlar//rdo ra kyid kyi las//
291a1(rgyud): rnams thams cad rengs par bya//myur du rdo rje gom pa yis//phyogs rnams rdo rje rangs par bya//rtse mo brgyad pa'i lhun pa che//rdo rje mtshan can bsam
291a2(rgyud): par bya//'og tu lag pa rdo rje can//steng du g.yas pa'ang rdo rje can//rdo rje rengs byed rab byed cing //phyogs rnams kun tu bskor byas na//gang dag sdang ba'i sems
291a3(rgyud): ldan pa//bgegs rnams thams cad rengs par 'gyur//rdo rje rengs byed byas pas ni//bgegs byed phyir ni 'tshe mi byed//de yi spyi bor rdo rje ni//legs par bkug nas
291a4(rgyud): bsam byas na//tshangs pa'i gnas la thugs pa nas//sa 'og bdun la thug pa'i bar//rdo rje rengs pas rengs 'gyur te//rmongs shing sems kyang med par 'gyur//
291a5(rgyud): sngags pa mkhas pas 'dong bar du//de srid du ni rengs par byed//rdo rje tshul gyis de nas yang //rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la//mtshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas te/
291a6(rgyud): phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas byas na//kun nas 'byung ba'i chu rnams kyang //sngags pas skam par byed par nus//mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nasu//rdo rje'i thal mo bzhum
291a7(rgyud): byas la//lag pa g.yas pa gyen du ni//zhags pa bcas par brkyang bar bya//de bzhin rkang pa g.yon pa ni//g.yon dang lhan cig bdeg par bya//de bzhin phyogs bzhi
291b1(rgyud): rnams su yang //gom pa 'dor ba'i tshul gyis ni//mngon du bskal pa'i me lta bu//so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis//'og log su ni mig bltas te//rdo rje'i gom pas myur
291b2(rgyud): song la//rkang pa g.yon pa bskum byas te//lhun po'i rtse mor bzhag par bya//'og ma shugs nas 'byin pa'i lag/g.yas pa steng nas de bzhin te//mchod pa'i rkang stabs
291b3(rgyud): sbyar pa yis//kha yi tshul du 'dug par bya//rgod mA rta yi kha tshul gyis//rgya mtsho'i chu rnams btung bar bya//rdo rje ldan pa bshad pa yis//bsam gtan sngags pa ldan
291b4(rgyud): gyur nas//chu ni ha ha ha zhes su//sgra 'byin nas ni 'du 'gyur na//'bab chu dang ni chu klung dang //sprin las bya ba smos ci dgos//bskyod na gal te 'o ma yi//chu
291b5(rgyud): las byung ba'ang skam par 'gyur//rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang //rdo rje'i thal mo mtshogs mar sbyar//phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas byas te//sprin bzhin yongasu rgyas par
291b6(rgyud): bya//dbang chen gom stabs byas nas su//rkang pa spro ba'i tshul gyis ni//rkang pa g.yon po gyen bteg ste//de nas sa la bzhag par bya//rkang pa g.yas pa bteg
291b7(rgyud): nas su//g.yas phyogasu ni bskor bar bya//lag gnyis khur tshul gyis nas su//rdo rje ldan pa g.yas pa sgreng //g.yon pa mkhur bar brten na su//'khor lo
292a1(rgyud): bzhin du yongs su bskor//de bzhin g.yas pa gzhag na su//rkang pa g.yon pas yongasu bskor//g.yas pa mkhur bar brten nasu//rdo rje ldan pa g.yon pa
292a2(rgyud): sbreng //rdo rje gam pas myur song la//g.yas pa brkyang ba'i gom stabs kyis//ti se'i rtse mor rkang bzhag ste//rkang skyabs sbyar ba'i tshul gyis ni//lus ni 'dud pa byas nas su//
292a3(rgyud): rnyengs byed rtse bar sbyor ldan pas//so yis mchu mnan khros gyur cing //bdag nyid me dang 'dra 'gyur ba//stobs chen sgra yang che ldan pa//gtum po chen po pha rol gnon//
292a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i tshul gyis stong bskor la//nges pa mnan pa blangs par bya//sngags pa sngags la 'jigs med pa//des ni gang du khros par 'dor//rdo rje des mnan tshul gyis ni/
292a5(rgyud): rkang pa g.yon pa btsugs nas su//rdo rje mnan pas bsnun byas nas//dbang po chen po'ang phyi mar rlog/rdo rje mnan pas mnan pas na//sa rnams thams cad rab tu
292a6(rgyud): g.yos//lhun po man dar ti sa dang //khAr yug ri rnams g.yo 'gyur na//lha mi sgo lta smos ci dgos//rdo rje ldan pas bshad na'o//bsnun pas rnam pa bcur
292a7(rgyud): 'gyur te//phub ma par gang rlung gtor bzhin//slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos//sa sbyang brtsams par bya ba ni//rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su//snying khar bzhag ste
292b1(rgyud): rgyas par bya//rkang pa rting pa spyad nas su//lag pa gar byed sbyong ba dang //rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyi su//g.yasA dang g.yon pa bzhag par bya//rkang pa bskyod pa byas nas su//
292b2(rgyud): de nas rting pa yang sprad do//gar gyi tshul ni de nyid kyis//phyogs bzhir yongasu bskor bar bya//khros pas dbus kyi gnas su ni//rdo rje gom pos myur song la//rdo rje thal mo sbyar
292b3(rgyud): nas su//gung mos srin lag 'khyud byas la//gnyi ga khu tshur bcang byas te//rting pa sprad pa'i rkang stabs kyis//sa la bzhag dang bteg byas te//g.ya su yongasu brkyang byos
292b4(rgyud): la//bar bur thams cad gsal bar bya//me lce zhes ni brjod byas lo//nang na gang dag ci yod pa//sngags pas thams cad bsal bar bya//hUM dang bcas shing phaT bcas
292b5(rgyud): pa'i/|gsang sngags mkhas par brjod par bya//'og dang sa yo steng na ni//bar bur thams cad zhi 'gyur te//kun tu bgegs ni med gyur nas//sngags pas mnyam gzhag
292b6(rgyud): las rnams bya//de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //rdo rje zhags pasI legs bslabs pas//rdo rje gar ni rab byas la//tshangs pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su//pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar
292b7(rgyud): byas te//snying kha'i thad kar bskor bar bya//gar byed tshul gyis lag pa gnyis//rdo rje khu tshur btsang bar bya//g.yon pa g.yon du brkyang bar bya//gi yas ba g.ya
293a1(rgyud): brkyang bar bya//mthun dA'i rkang thabs byas nas su//hUM zhes bya de'i sla rjod la//sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor//rdo rje gom pas myur sang
293a2(rgyud): g.yas brgya gropa stabs tshul gyis ni//rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyi seM su//de nyid kyis ni yang bskor ro//hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra byung la//de zhin phyogs bani rnamasu bya//
293a3(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur bskyod pas ni//bgegs rnams thams cad da bar 'gyur//rdo rje blo dang ldan pa yis//sa bsdus 'dor bar 'dod ni ni//gom pa bzhag pa'i grogs kyis su//
293a4(rgyud): myur du byayas pa brgyud byas la//gcig ni ri rab rtse la bzhag/gcig shos ti se'i rtse mor bzhag/de ltar rkang stabs bzhag pa ni//kun tu 'dor bar rab byed cing //sa
293a5(rgyud): 'o ga nA ni lag pa g.yon//g.yas pa sa ye steng na ste//hA ha zhes ni sgra 'byin cing //'jig rten khamasu 'phen byed pa//bgegs rnams gzhan lta smos ci dgos//
293a6(rgyud): log 'dren sdang ba drag po rnams//mi yi 'jig rten 'di nas ni//gzhan du 'phen pa smos ci dgos//ci ste 'jig rten khams rnams kyang //kun nas tshig par byed 'dod
293a7(rgyud): na'ang //rkeng stabs tshul ni de nyid kyis//phyogs bzhi dag tu 'jug par bya//rdo rje'i gom pas myur song la//g.yas pa brkyang ba'i stabs tshul gyis//nyim bcu
293b1(rgyud): gnyis lta bur ni//lho yi phreng ldan bzod dka' ba//rkang pa g.yon pa brtan byas la//rdo rje 'dzin de lag pa spring //lus ni btud par byas nas su//rkang pa g.yas pa btag byas la/
293b2(rgyud): sngags pa 'khor lo bzhin du bskor//rlung rnams kun kyang sdud byed cing //na mkha' me 'drar bsgyur nas su//sreg pa'i bskal pa lta bur 'jug/lag na 'dzin pa'i rdo rje ni//kun tu ri
293b3(rgyud): 'drar bsams la//hUM zhes bya ba'i sgras gnon cing //rdo rje 'og tu 'phang byas na//r-i dang nag su bcas pa yi//sa rnams thams cad 'khrug par 'gyur//de nas thal ba nyid 'gyur te//
293b4(rgyud): mer ni shing bal bcug pa bzhin//slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos//de nas bsdu ba brtsam byas te//rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid de//bye brag tu ni lag pa sgreng //rdo rje gom pas myur song //
293b5(rgyud): la//chongs pas bskor ba byas nas su//phyag rgya yi ni stang stabs bya//rgyab nas rkang stabs tshul gyis ni//dbus kyi gan su phyin par bya//de bzhin phyogs bcu rnamasu yang //rdo rje bsnun/
293b6(rgyud): pas brdab par bya//rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid dang //sngags pa blo ldan lag tshul gyis//sa rnams thams cad blang byas la//de nyid du ni bzhag par bya//kun nas bsdu bar
293b7(rgyud): rab byed cing //mkhas pas gsang sngags brjod byas la//rdo rje can gyis bshad pa bzhin//sa rnams kun tu bzhag par bya//rim pa'i tshul ni 'di nyid kyis//mkhas pas
294a1(rgyud): thams cad kun tu bzhag/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //rdo rje bzhag pa legs bslabs pas//sdang ba lha dang lha min dang //mi rnams bzhag bya gdul bar
294a2(rgyud): bya/bsam dbang bzhin du 'byung ba yis//rdo rje'i ye shes legs bslabs pas//'dul ba'i tshogs ni tha dad pa//thams cad rnam par gdul bar bya//gdung bas 'dul
294a3(rgyud): ba'i 'jig rten na//gdung ba nyid kyis grub par 'gyur//g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis no//dpa' bo'i lnga po kun tu bya//mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su//g.yas
294a4(rgyud): brkyang stabs kyis mnan par bya//rkang stabs bzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni//'ben la lta zhing lag pa gtad//srin lag mthe'u chung sprad byas la//lag gnyis lu gu
294a5(rgyud): rgyud du bya//g.yon pa'i gung mo mtshungs par gzhar//g.yas pa yi ni mdzub mo de//brkyang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni//gzhu dang mda' zhes brjod pa yin//gung mi yi
294a6(rgyud): ni rgyab logasu//mdzub mo mda' yi tshul du bzhag/g.yas brkyang rkang stabs tshul gyis ni//hUM bcas brjod de phog par bsnun//gal te sa yi 'og gnas sam//
294a7(rgyud): tshangs pa rab tu gnas gyur tam//drag pos bsrungs par gyur kyang rung //rdo rje 'phang bar byas nas su//rdo rje mda' yis phog gyur na//de ni gson par mi bsam mo//
294b1(rgyud): 'phang ba'i sbyang stabaso//de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //thabs shes pa la mkhas gyur cing //'phang ba'i tshul du logs bslabs pa//sdang ba'i sems can gdul bar bya//de nas
294b2(rgyud): slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //rdo rje zhags pa legs bslabs pas//srid pa gsum la khyab lus kyis//bgegs rnams thams cad gdul bar bya//mthun pi'i rkang stabs byas nas
294b3(rgyud): su//rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni//lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa gnyis//thal mo khong stong sbyar bar bya//de yi phyag rgya bcings na su//phyogs rnams kun la bskor byas
294b4(rgyud): na//srid pa gsum yang 'gugs 'gyur na//log 'dren bgegs rnams smos ci dgos//dgug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //mthun pa'i rkang stabs
294b5(rgyud): byas nasu//pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar byas la//phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par byas//rkang stabs bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su//gnas ni myur du gzung byas la//rdo rje khu tshur snying khar
294b6(rgyud): bzhag/ltos pas hUM gi sgra brjod de//rgya mtsho ba'i po'i gnas rnams la//rdo rje'i lag pas bsnun par bya//klu skrag thal mo sbyar ba dag/rgya mtsho nas ni 'thon par 'gyur//gang
294b7(rgyud): dag sa yi 'og gnas pa//lha min gsang ba srin po rnams//bsgo ba'i lung la brtson yid kyis//ci tshol cig ces 'khor bar byed//rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag gzir//gnod
295a1(rgyud): sbyin mo 'am smin mo 'am//lha min mo 'am klu mo 'am//bcud kyis len nam dngul chu'am//rin chen rnams sam nor bu rgyan//dpal dang phun sum 'dod ldan nam//
295a2(rgyud): thugs la ci dang ci bzhed pa//bdag cag rnams la bka' stsol cig/sngags pas gang yang rung blangs te//gsang ba pa kun btang bar bya//bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal byed pa//ci
295a3(rgyud): skye bsgyu yang mi 'ong na//rkang stangs tshul ni de nyid kyis//g.yon brgyang snrubs kyis mnan par bya//spyan po la ni rkang bzhag ste//lago pas dbyug pa'i sbyor ba yis//smre skyugs
295a4(rgyud): cing ni thams cad nas//sa 'og thams cad mnan par bya//ha ha zhes ni sgra 'don cing //bsgo ba'i lung dir 'gal byed pa//thams cad kyis ni gzung nas su//shin tu
295a5(rgyud): myur bar 'bul bar byed//sngags pas de gcig char bcad do//lhag ma thams cad btang bar bya//bsgo ba'i lung la de bzhag la//mkhas pas legs par bslabs
295a6(rgyud): bar bya//gsang ba srin po thams cad la//byams pa'i sems ni yang bskyed de//de dag dam tshig byin nas ni//de rnams kun tu btang bar bya////'phags pa lag
295a7(rgyud): na rdo rje dngang bskur ba las////bam po bcu gcig pa//de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //snying brtse snying rje'i sems ldan pas//mi dang mi min la sogs
295b1(rgyud): pa/shin tu gnod byed lha rnams la//lha min gsang bar bcas pa rnams//gzhan yang sdang ba'i gdon la sogs//nad sbrul dug la sogs rnams kyis//sems can rnams
295b2(rgyud): la gnod byed cing //dam tshig la ni mi gnas te//rgyags pa'i yid dang ldan pa dag/nad dang mu ge la sogs pas//sems can rnams la gnod byed de//pha rol la gnod mngon
295b3(rgyud): dga' ba//de dag snying rje med pa dang //bstan pa las ni 'gal byed cing //shin tu rgyags pa'i shas che ba//mthong nas de dag tshar bcad phyir//sngags pa mkhas pas sbyar
295b4(rgyud): bar bya//bdag la sdig par 'gyur snyam du//bdag nyid las ni mi sems shing //bdag nyid la min zhugs gyur la//gzhan dang gzhan yang phung byed pa//gzhan la gnod
295b5(rgyud): byed de dag la//sngags pas bzod par mi bya ste//bsgrag par bya zhing bcing bar bya//btub par bya zhing bsad par bya//de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //rdo rje zhags pa legs
295b6(rgyud): bslabs pas//nam mkha' go skabs med byas te//rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgyur nas su//gus pas sgrim bcas 'jo tshul dang //bzhin 'dzum rgyags dang ldan pa yis//rdo
295b7(rgyud): rje'i gar ni rab byas la//lag pa bskyod pa'i sbyor ba yis//phyogs rnams kun tu gar bya zhing //dngos dang mthun par bzung byas la//bsgo ba la ni sems bzhag cing //
296a1(rgyud): rdo rang bzhin lus sazla//ma mthun snru sna tshul gyis no//rdo rje na pa lag smra //rdo zlog smos kun dak+tas la//sod ba k+tangs pad
296a2(rgyud): mnan//dpa' bo gan su gnas nas su//rkang pa gdag pa'i tshul gyis ni//hU~M brjod 'jigs pa 'jigs rung ba//mig gnyis nyi ma hU~M baM s+t+waM//kha nI nad me N+Da yi khaM//
296a3(rgyud): dga' bo nye dga' bo//lto ba rgya mtshor bsam par bya//lhun po de yi mgo ba bya//de bzhin lag pa khor yug ri//sa ni rkang pa gnyis yin te//nor rgyas bu sbrul gas
296a4(rgyud): bsrel yin//rlung ni de yi rna ba gnyis//de yis sgra rnams ma yin te//lce ni 'jigs pa chen po'i grog/hA ta ha zhes sgra chen ldan//'brug sgra hUM zhes sgra phyung la//phyogs
296a5(rgyud): rnams kun tu yong su bskor//rab tu bskul pas de nas ni//rdo rje'i sgra yis brgyal gyur nas//klu dang dri za srin po dang //lho dang lha mon sogs kun 'dong //hU~M brdad pa ni
296a6(rgyud): 'jigs 'gyur zhing //'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med//rdo rje sgra yis tshig gyur cing //blong bar gyur te dman par lta//rdo rje rnal 'byor che ldan pa//ga la ba der nye bar 'dong
296a7(rgyud): do rdo rje chen po bka' stsol la//sman chad de ltar ma mdzad cig/de nas dam tshig bzhag byas la//sgra rnams thams cad btang bar bya//rdo rje 'jigs pa gtum pa che//
296b1(rgyud): na ga rgyu / na /na da da rgyu// sa pan ga//na /ma na na lda
297a1(rgyud): dang //dri za rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur//lha min gnas su lha min dang //mkha' lding gan su mkha' lding dang //mi ci rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur//lha dang
297a2(rgyud): lha min mir bcas pa//bsgo ba'i lung bzhin gus sems kyis//rdo rje 'jigs sgra che ldan pa//de yi dbang du thams cad 'gyur//rdo rje 'jig su rung ba'i sgra chen po'i phyag
297a3(rgyud): rgya'o//kun la rdo rje rnam 'phrul pa//de yi 'og tu brjod par bya//dpel ldan mchod pe byed pa pos//phyogs bcu dag ni bzhugs rnams kyi//sangs rgyas rnam pa kun tu
297a4(rgyud): mdzad//srid par bdag nyid che rnams kyi//bsam yas mchod min gang yang med//'dzum dang bcas shing mig rgyas pas//g.yas pa dang ni g.yon tshul gyis//rdo rje'i
297a5(rgyud): thal mo bcu ma byas la//phyogs bcu rnam pa kun tu gdud//dpral bar thal mo sbyar byas la//phyogs rnams kun tu yongs bskor zhing //dus gsum rnam par bzhugs
297a6(rgyud): pa yi//sangs rgyas kun la phyag bya'o//bde gshegs kun la phyag bya mchod//sems can gdul ba'i mchod pa ni//bsam pa ji bzhin 'dug pa ste//bsam pa tha dad /
297a7(rgyud): sems can khams//bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phel//bosam pa sna tshogs rnam par rtogs//bsam pa chags byed de dang des//sngags pas rnam pa thams cad/
297b1(rgyud): sems can khams mang gdul bar bya//de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //kun la shes pa cher dbyung ba'i//stogs dang dpa' dang snying rje dang //bgog dang khros dang 'jigs byed dang /
297b2(rgyud): 'jigs rung rmad byung zhi ba rnams//bsam pa chags pa rnam dgur dgongs//de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //kun la ye shes 'byung byed pa//rkang pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni//gom
297b3(rgyud): pa mdzes dang ldan pa yis//lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni//gar byed pa yi tshul gyis su//mdzub mo mthe bong rtse sprad la//g.yon phyogasu ni blte bar bya//g.yas dang
297b4(rgyud): g.yon pa sbyar tshul gyi//'dzum byas rgyas pa gus sbyim zhing //lag na rdo rjes gsor ldan pas//rjes su chags pas gar bya'o//lha rnams kun dang gsang ba dang //lha ma yin
297b5(rgyud): dang mi rnams dang //'dod khams dbang phyug bdag pa dang //sa gsum gnas rnams chags byed cing //mig zur bgrang dang lta ba yis//de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur//sa
297b6(rgyud): gsum thams cad 'gugs byed na//sa stengs mi rnams smos ci dgos//lha yi rgyal po sogs bkug nas//sdom pa can gyis dbang 'jog ste//thams cad bsgo ba bzhin
297b7(rgyud): byed cing //mngag gzhug par ni rab tu dgod//rdo rje che ldan kun shes pas//rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya//rdo rje'i glu yis bskur bas na//rje su chags shing chags chen 'gyur//
298a1(rgyud): //rdza sa bang chu du mas// ga na ts+tshaSh+Ta// smras sgyu /smras ma na rmA rdzu na/
298a2(rgyud): 'byung ba ste//sa gsum dgu na 'bar ba'i sku mnga' rje suM chags mdzad 'dul ldan pas//nyi ma stong phrag bcu bas rna ba'i 'od zer stong dang ldan pa po//rnam mang cha byed
298a3(rgyud): gzugs kyis sems can 'gro ba rjes chags mdzad pa//rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa mdzes pa'i stobs ldan gar mdzad gis le//sha rdza ba la sogs klu yos rdo rje
298a4(rgyud): gar ne rab byas byas//sa gsum thams cad 'gug byed na//sa stengs mi rnams smos ci dgos//rdo rje gar gyi rdzag rgya'o//de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //rdo rje nyid du yang /
298a5(rgyud): bsgyur zhing //rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis//thams cad la ni glur mkhan bya//gom stabs thams cad mdzes ldan par//g.yas pas dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o//g.yon
298a6(rgyud): pa sa btang ba'i phyag rgya bya//mig zur bgrang dang lta ba yis//lag pa glayas dang g.yon pa yis//'khyud par byed pa'i sbyor ldan pas//tshangs pa la sogs lha
298a7(rgyud): rnams ni//rnam po kun tu dbang 'gyur te//mingag gzhug pa ni rab byed cing //rdo rje can gyi lung la brtson//rdo rje chags pas tshegs byas pas//shin tu chags pas
298b1(rgyud): dregs myos pa'i'o//lha dang mi dang gsang ba pas//sgrub dka' rnams kyang sngags pas sgrub//rdo rje lus la yongs chags pas//'dod chags thams cad yongasu dor//rdo rje'i glu
298b2(rgyud): snyan ldan pa yis//sems can khams rnams chags par bya//rje su chags pas tshogs pa'i phyir//lha rnams tha~Md dbang du 'gyur//rdo rje'i glu yis snyan pa'i sgra rnams thams cad
298b3(rgyud): dang /bzod nas rang bzhin dag pas rdo rje sems dpa' bskul//sgyu ma'i dngos po rnam mang dang //snyan pa'i sgra ni de nyid dang //sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad kyis//dbang
298b4(rgyud): bsgyur de nas sangs rgyas snang //'jig rten thams cad yongasu 'dro na//bdud rnams thams cad yongasu 'dul//shra pa thams cad yongasu sbyong //sems can thams cad yongs
298b5(rgyud): smi ni byed//glu 'di rab tu len byed cing //rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas na//lha dang gang dag gnod sbyin dang //lha min klur bcas thams cad 'grub//rdo rje'i glu ni 'dren pa'o//de nas
298b6(rgyud): slob dpon rdo rje 'ching //rdo rje sems dpar yang bsgyur te//dpa' chen bsam pas kun chags paso//dpa' bo'i lnga po brten par bya//mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su//g.yas
298b7(rgyud): pa brkyang ba pha rol mnan//g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis ni//seng ge bzhin du bsgying bar bya//tshangs pa'i gnas la yang gnas te//rdo rje se gol sbyor ba dag/rdo rje
299a1(rgyud): brdzun//khas rgyal sbyis na//tshas pa la sogs r+yAH// rdzun pan rgyud//gas su byur ba'i ldan pa/snyos b+h+yog 'ab bdu sdug/
299a2(rgyud): mkha' mtshungs shing mnyim myed po//chos dang rgyal mchog rnams myig/sangs rgyas su martog de lta 'dud//so yis mtshon rab mnan cing //kun nas migs
299a3(rgyud): gnyer bzhin//rked par rdo rje brten nus su//phyogs bar+b+ba kun tu blta bar bya//g.yos pa rdo rje'i tshul gyis ni//phyogs rnams kun tu rab bsgrags pa//lha bajig pa
299a4(rgyud): zer 'bar ldan zhing //sregs pa'i bsgral pa gzhan ltan//grub 'gyur rdo rje muM 'bar ba//'jigs pa che ltar bzod dka' bas//bgegs rnams la ni sbyor bar bya//
299a5(rgyud): 'jig rten ge sum po thal byar rlo//nyes pa chen po sa sbyin //phyag rgyu 'di ni myur niH//thun mod m+b+ha yin da sna da ni//bla m+bu'i chen sbyar bar b+ha//rdo rje'i chung ba
299a6(rgyud): bsnyungs gyur kyang //hUM brjod pas na thal bar rlog/'jig pa'i me ltar bzod dka' bas/rdo rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o//de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'tshang //rdo rje'i ye shes
299a7(rgyud): legs bslabs pas//snying khar rdo rje khu tshur gnyis//bzhag nas 'di snyam bsam byas te//sems dmyal yi dwags dud 'gro dang //gang gzhan sdug bsngal sdug
299b1(rgyud): bsngal rnams//lag pas drang ba'i sbyor ba yis//bde ba kun gyis bstabs par bya//bza' btung la sogs cher ba dang //gos dang rin chen rgyan gyi char//de dag rnams la kun tu
299b2(rgyud): dbeb//ci bder yang dgra bstabaso bas na//snying rjes spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhin//kun tu yongasu rgyas par bya//sems can kun gyis bla med bde//thob par shog cig
299b3(rgyud): bsam par b+hA//sgying rje'i byuglai d+hA'o//de nas sgrib dpo ni rdo rje 'chang //rdo rje ye shes legs bsrabs pas//rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bya zhing //mtshugs mar thal mo sbyar ba
299b4(rgyud): bya//btog dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis//de nas myur du spyad par bya//rdo rje ba gang chen phyag rgya 'di//rdo rje 'chang nyid bzhin du bkod//bgrang pa chen po'i phyag rgya'o//de nas lag
299b5(rgyud): ga yas btegs byas te//g.yon pa rked pa'i phyogasu bzhag/g.yon brkyang rkang stabs byas na su//de nas thal mo yang sbyar ste//'jigs rung sgra nI drag byed cing //thal mo
299b6(rgyud): sbyar ba btud par b+h+yo//'jigs rung ba chen po'i sgra'i phyag rgya'o//glayas brjod rkang pa'i stabs byas te//lag pa gnyis ni rgya ba rol du//khu tshur gnyis ni bcang bar bya/
299b7(rgyud): thogags kun dbab par bya ba'i phyir//mgul pa nges par spang bya zhing //sgra chen rab tu brjod byas na//phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba yis//bgegs rnams thams cad dbab por 'gyur/
300a1(rgyud): mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nasu//mtshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas lo//lag pa gnyis ka lto bar bzhag/g.yas brkyang rkang stabs sbyor ba yis//sngags
300a2(rgyud): pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor//hU~M ha zhes pas rab brgyan pa//phyag rgya 'ad ni rgyu che ste//ri rnams phyi mar rlog byed na//sdang ba'i sems can ci smos te//sngags pa'i
300a3(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur//mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su//log po gyen du sgreng byas la//gdu bu'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya//de bzhin so yis michu mnan cing //g.yon pa
300a4(rgyud): brkyang ba legs sbyar bas//bgegs rnams kun la bsnun par bya//phyag rgya 'a'od ni sgra chen te//bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa yin//phyag rgya 'di ni legs
300a5(rgyud): sbyar byas//thams cad bzlog par gyur pa yin//mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su//lag gnyis brang la gcar ba las//lag pA gu yas pa skyed byas te//rkang
300a6(rgyud): po g.yod brgyang+tha legs sbyar byas//tho bA yI ni phyag rgya yis//rdo rje 'tshang nyid yin na'ang bsnun//rdo rje tho bas bsnun pas na//de yi mod la phyi mar 'gyur/
300a7(rgyud): pa'i sbyang zab so//g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yang //lag pa mtshan khung gzug par bya//nyi ma 'ber 'dra'i lha 'bar bas//hU~M brjod pa snyems par thur du bsta/
300b1(rgyud): lag pa rdo rje nyid bsgyur to//'jig su rung ba'i sgra phyung la//rgya mtsho man dar bcas pa yis//sa rnams thams cad g.yo bar bya//so yis mchu ni mnan bya zhing //rdo rje rkang pas
300b2(rgyud): bsnun par bya//phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar byas//de dag thams cad da bar 'gyur//g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas na su//lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs tshul gyis//g.yon pa
300b3(rgyud): brang la bzhar bar bya//g.yas pa gyen du sgreng byas la//mdzub mo myur du sgreng byas shing //rdo rje'i sgra ni 'byung byas na//gal te sangs rgyas nyid gyur kyang //bgegs rnams
300b4(rgyud): thams cad bsgyel bar bya//rdo rje can gyis bshad na'o//sdang ba'i sems can smos ci dgos//phyag rgya 'dis ni bskyod pas na//de dag thod da bar 'gyur//mthun pa'i rkang stabs
300b5(rgyud): byas nas su//g.yas pa gyen du sgreng byas la//lag pa thal mo brkyang bar bya//g.yon pa brang du bzhar bar bya//lag pas myur du bsnun sbubs kyis//hUM dang bcas pas sa ya
300b6(rgyud): bsnun//na mkha' me 'bar 'dra ba yi//ral gri'i phyag rgya bcings byas la//bgegs rnams tha~Md btub par bya//rdo rje can gyis bya shad na'o//mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas na su//
300b7(rgyud): lag pa 'og tu btang nas ni//rkang pa'i bar nas gzung byas la//de ni gyen du bdeg par bya//rdo rje hU~M brjod sgra dang ni//khros shing khro gnyer bcas pa yis//rkang pa
301a1(rgyud): /de yis yang bsnun la//de nas bgogs ni bsam dAr bya//rdo rje'i rkang pasna bsnan byas nas//ro rabA rnams kyang phyi mar rlog/rdo rje rkang pa'i stang
301a2(rgyud): stabaso//g.yas brgyad rkang stabs sbyar ba yi//lag gnyis 'khor lo'i tshul du brkyang //so yis mi chu mnan khros pa yis//kun tu 'khor lo 'phang bar bya//phyogs
301a3(rgyud): rnams kun na gnas pa yi//sangs rgyasu zhing rnams gzhig par 'gyur//zhig par gyur pa'i zhing rnams nas//rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyang 'byon//byang chub sems
301a4(rgyud): dpa' rdzu 'phrul che//gang gzhan dbang ni thob gyur rnams//blong zhes gyur nas blo ldan pa//lag na rdo rje'i gan du 'ong //srog zad na ni mi rung gis//bu gcig nged kyis ci
301a5(rgyud): zhig bya//khyed ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin//nged kyis myur du sgrub po zhes//rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pas//lung ni yongs su nod par mdzad//bskal pa'i me ltar gyur pa
301a6(rgyud): yis//g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas na su//'bar ba'i phyag rgya legs sbyar bas//sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar bya//sa gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas//sngags
301a7(rgyud): pa rnams la rtag 'tshog//gegs byed ma rungs chen po pa//srin pa sdang ba rnams skrag go/phyag rgya 'di 'dra mthong gyur nas//de nas de dag ni bar 'gyur//mthun pa
301b1(rgyud): rkang stabs byas na su//de tshe nges par bsnun blangs la//sngags pas gyon du 'phang bar bya//de tshe so yis mchu mnan la//myur du gom pa gcig bor te//nges par bsnun pas bsnun
301b2(rgyud): ba'i tshe//srin po sdang ba gegs byed pa//de dag thams cad phye mar 'gyur//rdo rje nges bsnun phyag rgya yis//de dag thams cad bzlog par 'gyur//dbang chen gnas la gnas ni du//
301b3(rgyud): lag pa gnyis ni sgreng byas la//lhun po'i rgyal po blangs nas su//lag pa gnyis de bzhig nas//sngags pa la ni gegs byed pa//sdang nga'i sems can rnams la bsnun//
301b4(rgyud): bsnun pas rnam par phung 'gyur zhing //'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med//rnal 'byor gzhol ba'i sngags pa la//gang tshe bgegs shig gegs byed pa//de tshe sngags pa stobs
301b5(rgyud): chen gyi//phyag rgya 'di la sbyar bar bya//phyag rgya 'di la sbyar ba na//mthong nas de dag da bar 'gyur//de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //rdo rje'i ye shes legs bslabs pas//
301b6(rgyud): rgyal ba kun la phyag byas nas//cod pan stabs kyis thabs bshad//sngags pas shar phyogs kha bltas la//lag pa g.yas pa mchogs mar bzhag/g.yon pa rked pa'i
301b7(rgyud): phyogasu bzhag/hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la//'brug sgra dal 'dra'i phyag rgya yis//phyogs rnams kun tu bskor bar bya//g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis yang //ngang pa'i
302a1(rgyud): rtsal gyi sbyor ba yis//lag pa g.yas pa bteg byas na//rgya mtsho rnams kyang bteg par 'gyur//dang pa'i rdul gyi phyag rgya'o//rkang pa g.yas pa btag nas su//
302a2(rgyud): lag pa gnyis ni sar btsugs la//ha ha zhes pas rnam rgyan pas//sa gsum thams cad btag byas na//rgya mtshor bcas pa'i ri rab kyang //thams cad shin tu bteg par 'gyur//
302a3(rgyud): mAn da ra dang te sa dang //gzhan yang gang dag ri rnams kyang //ha la ha la'i phyag rgya yis//bdun pa de dag slar mi chags//g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba dang //lag pa gnyis
302a4(rgyud): ni mtshan khung bzhag/hUM brjod bsnyen pas mar bltas te//so yis mchu ni mnan byas la//rdo rje'i cod pan phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya//
302a5(rgyud): g.yon pa brkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis//de yi tshe na g.yon bteg ste//khros dang bcas pas rkang bzhag pas//sa gsum thams cad drang bar bya//drang ba'i cod pan phyag rgya'o//
302a6(rgyud): mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su//lag pa gnyis ni bteg byas la//bgegs rnams thams cad 'ching byed cing //'khor lo bzhin du phyogasu bskor//phyag rgya 'di la
302a7(rgyud): legs sbyar nas//de dag 'ching dang gzir bar 'gyur//bgegs rnams thad sel byed pa//rdo rje can ni nyid kyis bshad//bgegs rnams skrag pa'i phyag rgya'o//rnal
302b1(rgyud): 'byor stan la 'dug nas su//rkang pa g.yas pa bdag par bya//lag gnyis 'khor lho'i tshul du bya//rkang pa gcig gis yongasu bskor//'khor lo cad pan phyag rgya yis/
302b2(rgyud): bgrogs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya//mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nasu//me tog thal mo sbyar tshul gyis//de yis tshe na sa la bzhag/de nas myur du yang bdeg
302b3(rgyud): 'dis mchod pas na sngags pa lo//thams cad geg byed mi 'gyuraro//mchod pa'i cod pan gyi phyag rgya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/byang chub sems
302b4(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/gsang ba'i bdag po skrag pa zhes bya ba'i stang stab so//nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/bskal pa dpag tu med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na
302b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs las ngas thos kyi de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad//de yis skrag par byas las
302b6(rgyud): bgegs//log 'dren thams cad gdungs par 'gyur//phyogs rnams kun tu 'bros byed cing //'chi bar gyur te the tshom med//lag gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas su//g.yon pa
302b7(rgyud): brkyang bar rab sbyar te//phyogs rnams kun tu bskor bar bya'o//de nas rkang pas yang mnan to//skrag byed 'di ni skrag pa chen//bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa ste//skrag pas
303a1(rgyud): rnam par phung 'gyur zhing //'chi bar gyur te the tshom med//de nas rkang pa'i tshul gyis yang //mig ni thur du bltas byas la//lag pa g.yas pa sgreng nas
303a2(rgyud): ni/g.yon pa brang la bzhag byas te//lag pa sa la brdabs pas ni//rdo rje'i thal mos bsnun par bya//rdo rje thal mo'o stang sgrub so//rnal 'byor stan la yang 'dug
303a3(rgyud): ste/mtshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas la//rkang pa g.yas pa bteg na su//'khor lo bzhin du yongasu bskor//'di ni rlung 'ching chen po ste//sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams
303a4(rgyud): kyis gsungs//gal te rnam mthor rlung byung yang //de yang mi g.yo 'dug par 'gyur//rlung 'ching ba'i stang stabaso//gar gyi tshul la legs bslabs pas//rkang pa spo
303a5(rgyud): bar bya bas yang //lag pa thur du smad byas la//lag gnyis mthe bong srin lag sprad//g.yon pa brkyang la legs sbyar te//lag pa g.yas pas gar bya'o//gar
303a6(rgyud): gyi bgegs rnams thams cad ni//shin tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur//dga' bas sngags pa de la ni//de dag phyin chad gogs mi phyed//mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas//
303a7(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa sbrang byas te//g.yon pa ral gri'i tshul byas la//gnyi ga gcig tu sbyar bar bya//gal te rdo rje 'chang gyur kyang //bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar
303b1(rgyud): bya//kun nas shin tu drangs nas kyang //de nas phyag rgya btang bar bya//rdo rje'i zhags pas bcings byas la//gnod par gyur pas kun tu yang //ha ha zhes pa'i sgra 'byin cing //sems/
303b2(rgyud): ni snong zhes gyur pa yis//blo ldan lag na dza dz+wa la//lung ni yongasu nod par byed//phyin chad gegs ni ma byed/lag na rdo rje lung bsgo'o//rdo rjes gzir ba'i phyag rgya'o//
303b3(rgyud): sngags pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin//de nas snying rje yang bskyed de//sngags pas mnyam par gzhag pa la//me tog thal mo sbyar nas su//de yi tshe na de dag la//gang tshe sngags pas
303b4(rgyud): mnyam gzhag tshe//khyed cag glegs ni ma byed par//gnas su dngas shig brjod par bya//g.yas brkyang stang stabs byas nas su//lag pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya//g.yas dang
303b5(rgyud): g.yon pa'i tshul gyis yang //khu tshur mchan khung gnyi su bzhag/hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra ldan pa//sngags pa drag po'i las byed pas//phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas kyang //
303b6(rgyud): d+hU gzir bas gzir bar bya//gzhan yang gang dag log 'dren bgegs//srin po gde dag grags pa dang //rgod ma rta ye khar gnas pa//de dag thams cad gzir 'gyur cing //
303b7(rgyud): rdo rje gzir ba'i phyag rgya yis//gzir nas de dag lcags 'gyur te//shin tu mi bzad dbyed cing //srog zad gyur na mi rung gis//ci 'tshal bka' ni myur du stsol//bsgo ba'i lung
304a1(rgyud): ni nod par byed//sngags pa sa ni 'dod de bzhin du//glal to lung ne nod byed na//de lta na ni thar par 'gyur//gzhan du na ni nam yang min//shin tu mi bzla
304a2(rgyud): gzibs na//khyod ni ci bzhed de bzhin du//bgyid kyis bka' lung stsol cig ces//de tshe de dag de skad smra//mchogs mar rdo rje thal bzhag nas//de nas de dag dam tshig sbyin//
304a3(rgyud): sa la gshegs kyi gzugs bris te//g.yas pa brkyang bas gnas na su//rdo rje ral gri phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad btub par bya//btub par byas pas de dag kun//
304a4(rgyud): de la skyabasu 'gro bar byed//snying rje ldan pa'i sems kyis//de nas phyag rgya btang bar bya//snying rje'i sems kyis de dag la ma 'jigs shig ces smra bar bya//sngags pa de yi
304a5(rgyud): 'dod po bzhin//de nas de dag rang gnas 'dong //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag phyag
304a6(rgyud): rgya gsum yod de/gang ngas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po las phyag
304a7(rgyud): rgya gsum thob ste/bskal pa du mar de bstan pa tsam gyis bgegs rnams kyis nga la ma btsas kyis sems rtse gcig tu bsgrims la nyon cig/g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas
304b1(rgyud): nas su//lag pa g.yon pa snying khar bzhag/g.yas pa gar dang bcas pa yis//mtshogs mar legs par bzhag par bya//bgegs rnams rtag tu gzhig pa yis//dam tshig 'di ni/
304b2(rgyud): brjod pa yin//'di ni bstan pa tsam gyis kyang //'bros par 'gyur te the tshom med//phyir bzlog pa ni yang byas la//sa la lag pa brngub par bya//lag pa gnyis ni btag nas su//
304b3(rgyud): che 'khur ba bud par bya//rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya//de tshe bgegs rnams bcom par 'gyur//rdo rje can ni nyid gyur kyang //rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcom 'gyur na//mthong ba tsam gyis
304b4(rgyud): bgegs rnams kun//phung bar gyur pa smos ci dgos//sngags pas shar phyogs bltas 'dug la//lag pa g.yas pa bkur brten te//g.yon pa brkyang la legs byas la//
304b5(rgyud): g.yon pas thams cad dgug par bya//sa bcur gnas pa kun kyang dgug/thams cad nas ni bkug na su//rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na//de yi mod la phye mar 'gyur//de nas
304b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod kyis/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje de'i slob ma ma gtogs pa khyod kyis su la yang bsnyad par mi bya'o//
304b7(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can ma dad pa de dag ni tshul 'di la yid mi ches shing /de dag 'di skad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes smra bar gyur pas de dag gi rna 'am
305a1(rgyud): du yang bsgrags par mi bya na phyag rgya lta ci smos/gsang ba pa'i bdug pa de la slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams kyis mtshan nyid shes nas sbyin par bya'i gzhan du ni ma
305a2(rgyud): yin no//de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/bcom ldan 'das lha 'od skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang slob dpon la brnyas par
305a3(rgyud): bgyid pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skrag par 'gyur gyis de skad ma smra zhig
305a4(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'on kyang 'ga' zhig brjod par bya yis dpa' bo bsgrims te nyen cig/mtshams med la sogs mi bzad pa//dmyal ba gang dag ngas bshad pa//de dag
305a5(rgyud): rnams kyi gnas su brjod//der ni bskal pa mtha' yaso//de lta bas na rnam pa kun tu de la nam yang brnyas mi bya//gsang ba pa'i bdog po slob dpon la slob mas ji lta bar
305a6(rgyud): bya zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji lta ba bzhin du'o//de yi sems ni de lta na rtag tu dge ba skye bar 'gyur//de ni 'jig rten thams cad la//phan pa byed pa'i
305a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'gyur//lag ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las stang stabs kyi rim pa phye ba rdzogaso////de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
305b1(rgyud): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes shin tu rgyas pa chen pos bdag nyid rgyas pa de dag gi tshig gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba'i
305b2(rgyud): phyir/chos kyi dbyings yangs pa la dmigs nas 'jug cing /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du bdag byin gyis brlabs nas sangs rgyas 'byung ba mngon du byed cing
305b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma
305b4(rgyud): thag tu de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed dag gis ye shes shin tu rgyas pa dpag tu med pa'i don thugasu chung nas de dag
305b5(rgyud): nyid na bzhugs bzhin du phyag rgyang ste/lag na rdo rje'i spyi bor bzhag/bzhag nas lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sems can chen po le gso legs//ye
305b6(rgyud): shes rdo rje rdzogs byed pa//khyod ni sangs rgyas byas pa gzo//sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog/dam pa gsung ba khyod kyis
305b7(rgyud): shod//gzungs sngags tshul du dgongs byos la//gang du zhugs ma thag tu ni//sdig pa thams cad med 'gyur ba//dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bshad par gyis//de nas de
306a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed de dag thams cad phyag slar bskums//de nas lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de lus langs te/de
306a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa bskyed ma/sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed ma/nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed ma/bgegs thams cad 'jigs par byed ma/phun sum tshogs pa thams
306a3(rgyud): cad byed ma/gzungs sngags chen po'i mchog smraso//na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba b+hU he bud+d+ha ma ti ri/sarba pA pa ni Sha NI/gardza gar+Na/b+hi dza b+haM dzA/marda marda/
306a4(rgyud): ge b+hI ra gam+b+hI rA/hA sa he sa/da ma da ma/tha ma tha ma/bid+h+wa na sa ya bid+d+hA na sa ya/sarba sha tAn/ti ra ma ti/ba~M ma l-i/pU ra ya pU ra ya/pra ti dz+nyA na/sarba b+hU ta/rU pa si ti/b+ha ga ba ta/
306a5(rgyud): ga na ga na/dza ti dza hi/bi ma la sa ni/kra ma ni/ha dpa ni/ma ti gi ki swA hA/lag na rdo rjes gzungs mchog 'di smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la sa chen po 'di 'gul to//
306a6(rgyud): thur bur rab tu 'ur 'ur ro//ldeg rab tu ldeg go//shar phyogs mtho ni nub phyogs dma'o//nub phyogs mtho ni shar phyogs du ma'o//nyi ma dang zla ba yang sa la lgang /
306a7(rgyud): r-ig sngags 'ching rnams kyang lhung ngo //byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gzungs thams cad la dbang thob pa de dag kyang mgo mgo bor gyur to//thams cad dang ldan pa'i
306b1(rgyud): 'khor de blong blong por gyur to//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yid kyis phyag 'tshal zhing gnas par gyur te/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de blong drang por rgyur
306b2(rgyud): pa mthong nas de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//kye grogs pa dag khyed kyi ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzung sngags chen po dran par gyis shig/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
306b3(rgyud): gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras//lag na rdo rje'i gzungs 'di ni mthu chen po 'di yin na/sgrub pa po gang la la zhig 'dri 'dzin pa dang /yid la byed
306b4(rgyud): pa dang /mchod pa de'i mthu ji lta bur rig par bya//de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras//'jam
306b5(rgyud): dpal gzungs 'di'i mthu 'am/nus mthu 'am/mthu bsgyings ci 'dra ba ni/'jam dpal shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod do//
306b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas bcom ldan 'dres des thams
306b7(rgyud): cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lo 'di bzhin du gzhug pa'i phyir byin no//byang chub sems dpa' de la byin ma thag tu
307a1(rgyud): de'i mod la gzungs 'di'i mthus de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs rnams 'byung zhing zhugs te mtha' rtogs par mi nus//sangs rgyas kyi
307a2(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thams cad la dbang thob pa gang dag gis kyang 'di ci yin zhes bstan par mi nuso//de bzhin
307a3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis na mkha'i dkyil 'khor til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar gyur nas gnas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'
307a4(rgyud): chen po de la 'od zer gyis dbang bskur nas sku de nyid du bzhugaso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzungs sngags chen po 'di nyid kyi mthuso//de skad ces smras pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur
307a5(rgyud): gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso//byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi dbang por dbang bskar
307a6(rgyud): ba yin na/khyod kyis kyang gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor shod cig/de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems
307a7(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso//'jam dpal don yod grub pa bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes gang dag
307b1(rgyud): gzungs sngags kyi tshul du gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlangs pa dag nyon cig/de dag gang zhe na/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA/a ma/
307b2(rgyud): ri a mA ri/TAtA~M/b+hany+dza/d+haid+d+he/mi tsi mi tsi/s+phoT s+phoT/ma ta ma ta/dud+han+ya dra ma kA swAhA/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+ya/sarba thA/haM haM/kau Ni Ti ka ni ti/sirba ta thA ga ta
307b3(rgyud): na ke/bo da ni de dai/tre Ta tr-i TaM/hUM phaT hUM phaT/gardzi gardza/pa ra ma ti/bi hUM ri ki swA hA/na maHsarba ta thA ga to b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA ga ba te/pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA A/sarba pA
307b4(rgyud): pak+Sha yaM ka ri/d+hA na a pa s+pha ra Ni/b+hany+dza b+hIny+dza/ma tha ma tha/da ma dam/A na yai A nA yai/sa ra sa ra/mA ra ye mA~M ra ya/sarba b+hU ti dza na tI ye swAt+ma/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/sarba
307b5(rgyud): mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA/gardza gardza/me tha ma tha/hA ma hA ma/b+hany+dza b+hany+dza dun+na bi sa ra nir g+ho She ha na ha na/bi d+hAn sa ya bi d+hA na sang ya~M/mo Ta ya mi Ta ya/da ha da ha/bi bu lo nir+m+ma la
307b6(rgyud): nir dzA ta/A ha ra A ha rA/A gats+tsha Ats+tsha/sarba bud+d+ha sa rU pi pi taM mAM bi lam+ba swAhA/'jam dpal gzungs chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyingayi dbang
307b7(rgyud): phyug ma zhes bya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed mi/byang chub kyi snying po ston par byed ma/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ma nor ba'o//de nas 'jam
308a1(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mig mi 'dzum par/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bltas te 'di smraso//rigs kyi bu khyod kyang de bzhin gshogs pa
308a2(rgyud): rnamasu blta bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes chen po sngon ma thos pa dang /dmu tshig la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi
308a3(rgyud): mdzad pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs sngags 'di yid la byed pa'i phyir ro//de nas de'i
308a4(rgyud): mod la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dbang chen po bskur ba'i gzungs sngags la sogs pa ye shes bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu las nges par byung ba ye shes chen po'i rdo rje
308a5(rgyud): rtogs par gyur to//ye shes chen po'i rdo rje de rtogs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i sprin chen po dag byung bar gyur
308a6(rgyud): to//kye ma ye shes chen por dbang bskur bas//'jam dpal 'di dbang bskur to//zhes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgra 'ur zhes
308a7(rgyud): grag go/de'i mthus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag ut+pa la chen po'i nang du zhugs
308b1(rgyud): par mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnams zhugs ma thag tu do nas de'i mdo la'ang ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i hUM'i khung bu'i mtshams rnams dang /cod pan dang rgyun
308b2(rgyud): dang nyin lag thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnams byung zhing zhugs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu lnga gnas pa/sems kyi dbang zad po
308b3(rgyud): pa dag gis kyang spu'i khung bu gcig gi tshad kyang rtogs par ma nus na/nyan thos drang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /gzhan 'jig rten pa rnams kyis lta ci smos/de nas 'jam dpal
308b4(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas yid la byed pa de btang ste/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la mig mi 'dzums par ring du bltas nas/zhing rnams 'di dag yongasu sbyang bar bya//rgyal
308b5(rgyud): sras kun bye smon lam mthun rdzogs bya//sems can phan dang snying brtses nad med cing //zhi ba bdud rtsi rnyed dka' ye shes bstan//ye shes dam pa ces pa 'di thob nas//
308b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhing nas sems can khrag khrig phrag/grangs med khyod kyis brjod pa dgrol bar bya//khyod kyi ting 'dzin bstan pa mchog tu bya//zhes ched du brjod do//de nas byung
308b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras//'jam dpral legaso legaso//'jam dpa'i khyod kyis tshig smras pa ni shin tu gtsigasate/
309a1(rgyud): dz+dzaglaud yang legaso//'jam dpal khyod 'di lta bu'i gzungs sngags chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams yod la byed pa ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o//'jam
309a2(rgyud): dpal yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang dag ye shos chen po 'di lta bu dag yid la byed pa dang /'dzin pa dang /sgrub pa dang /glegaso bam du byas nas nyin cig bzhin phyag
309a3(rgyud): 'tshal ba de dag ni/shin tu dkar du byed pa ste/de ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyuraro//de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe nye bar gnas na yang de bzhin
309a4(rgyud): gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i phra rab kyi rdul snyed sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyur te/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//de nas 'jam
309a5(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa'i lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras//gang gi tshe 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi tshul 'di rtogs nas thams
309a6(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par byed pa dag go 'phang de thob par 'gyur ba ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil
309a7(rgyud): 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba sngon mo byung ba de sems can chen po shod cig de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
309b1(rgyud): la 'di skad ces smraso//'jam dpal gang du zhugs pa tsam gyis mya rnams med pa lnga po dag yongasu byang bar 'gyur ba dang /don thams cad kyang 'byor par 'gyur ba dang //dpa
309b2(rgyud): thams cad skye bar 'gyur ba dang /sdig pa thams cad las rab tu krol bar 'gyur ba dang /ye shos chen por de'ang bsgyur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi kyil 'khor gyi rnam par dgod
309b3(rgyud): pad nyon cig/'jam dpal dkyil 'khor brjod par bya'o//'jam dpal de la lus can thams cad la gsang chen dang bcas pa slob dpon rnams kyis slob dpon mchog/bas
309b4(rgyud): babs kyang ches gsang ba//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzungs sngags 'di dag gi ming du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor brjod par bya'o//'jam dpal de la dkyil 'khor gyi
309b5(rgyud): tshad la//tshad ni khru brgyad tha mA ste//slob dpon nyid kyi khru yi bya//ye shes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor der//cha ni rnam pa gsum du bya//blo dang ldan pas cha gsum du//der
309b6(rgyud): ri sgo khyud rnams bya ste//drir ni skra yang bzhi gtod //gru bzhi lham pa kha khyer bcas//sngon gyi bzhin du cha gsum la//cha ni rnam pa brgyad brgyud bye//mkhas pas tshe brgyad
309b7(rgyud): byas nas//dbus kyi char ni 'jug par bya//chos rnams thams cad ma skyes por//zang cig theng cig pas mi byas la//phun sum tshogs pa kun byed pa//dkyil 'khor rgyal
310a1(rgyud): po bri bar bya//sngags pas de yi dbus su ni//pad+ma mchog tu mdzes pa bris//kun kyang mar gad 'dra ba ste//'dab ma brgyad par brjod pa yin//do yi stong du
310a2(rgyud): bum pa ste//bum pa'i steng du ut+pal lo//ut+pal steng du dung bri ste//me lce phreng ba 'khrigs pas mdzes//shes rab pha rol phyin de ni//ye shes chen por dbang bskur ldan//
310a3(rgyud): cha brgyad gang dag brjod pa yang //dbus kyi cha las byung ba ste//gzungs kyi tshul du bri ba yang //cho ga'i rim bzhin mthun par bya//de la shar phyogasu ni bcom ldan 'das ma
310a4(rgyud): so sor 'brang po chen mo dbang po chen po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ut+pa la'i phyag rgyar bri bar bya ste/mtha' rnamasu ut+pal bkra zhing me lce 'bar bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
310a5(rgyud): gnas par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA rA oM b+ha ga ba ti/sarba ta thA ga ta
310a6(rgyud): dza ni ke/su rA ya prA ti dz+nyA ne/ta ta Ta Ta/mArda mdza/A ha ra a ha ra/hU~M hUM dza hi dzA hi/swAhA/dbang bdag gi phyogasu bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi pham pa me lce zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri/
310a7(rgyud): bar bya ste/chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//pad+ma shin tu mdzes pa bri//de yi steng du 'khor lo ste//me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa mdzes//de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te//
310b1(rgyud): nA maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khro b+h+ya//sarbA nA ng+ku hU~M sarba bud ma tar+tha/g+hAr+Na b+ha dza/ma tha mu ba/da ma mad dam mni/baN+Da rI gad+hA ri/dzi swAt+ta/me'i phyogasu brtan nas bcom ldan 'das ma
310b2(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bor bya ste/mchu dang dbang chen ldan pa yis//phyag rgya gzugs bzang bri bar bya//pad+me'i steng du rdo rje ste//me lce'i nang du shin tu mdzes//
310b3(rgyud): de lag zungs sngags ni 'di yon te/namaHsa t+r+ya ga te b+h+ya/san m+b+ha ba b+he/sar+b+ba thA/u dzAH/mr-id+d+hi swA trA sarba thA ba shod+ha ni swAtrA~M/ ga sbyi n+d+ra gdus dka' nis b+h+r-id
310b4(rgyud): gzungs bri bar bye ste/mi dang rgyung dang ldan pa yis// la ni der bri'o//de yi steng du rin po che//bsam pa thams cad yongasu skor ba//ma lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs zlog//
310b5(rgyud): rnams kyis myong bskor//de la gzung sa sngags ni 'di yin te/na maHsarbat+ta thA ga taM b+h+yaH/sarbam+b+ha swAn+taSh+Ta/d+hA kAr+b+ha//mo Ta mr-iTe/data da ta/sar+b+ba ta thA ga te/dz+nyA na nir
310b6(rgyud): bden bral phyogasu ni bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/de yi mo yi dkyil 'khor te//pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa yin//de yi snying du sngags
310b7(rgyud): yos//lcags kyu shin tu mdzes pa bris//phan tshun 'bral ba'i rdo rje dag/blo dang ldan pas der dgod do//de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/na maHsa rba ta thA ga to b+h+yaH/sarba su
311a1(rgyud): b+h+yaH/sarba thA ha ha/mI hu mi hu/da ma da ma/kha hi kha hI/d+hu na d+hu na/mi tsi mi tsaM/durban+ta da ma ni swA hA/byang gi phyogasu bcom ldan 'das ma sgo mtha' yas ma bsgrubs
311a2(rgyud): pab zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/de yi dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba yin//ngo yi steng du pad+ma ste//'od ni dus mtha'i me lta bu//de yi steng du ral gri ste//
311a3(rgyud): 'od zer rnams kyis yongasu bskor//me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs ldan pa'i//ut+pal rnams kyis kun khabs bya//de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
311a4(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA/mi tsi mi tsi/gardza gardza/s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ma tha ma tha/de ma da ma swA hA/rlung gi phyogasu dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya
311a5(rgyud): ste/de yi rlung gi dkyil 'khore te//cha gsum la ni gtsug tor gnas//lcags kyus thams cad dgeb par bya//me lce 'bar ba'i phreng bar ldan//nub phyogasu bcom ldan
311a6(rgyud): 'das ma bsgril byed ma bri bar bya ste/de la dbang chen dkyil 'khor te//de la rdo rje legs par gnas//de yi stong du pad+ma che//pad+ma'i ste du bgrang nor phreng //de dag me lce'i
311a7(rgyud): phreng ba 'khrigs//steng du pad+ma rnams kyis dgab//de nas cha gsum pa la ni//byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che//sngags pas ci rigs bri bar bya//brgyad rnams su
311b1(rgyud): yang snga ma bzhin//de la shAr du rnal 'byor pas//'jig rten dbang po 'od chen bri//pad+ma shin tu mdzes pa ni//de yi phyag rgyar brjod pa yin//me'i phyogasu ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po
311b2(rgyud): kun du bzang po'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu bri bar bya'o//dbang bdag gi phyogasu ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyag rgya ut+pa la bri bar bya'o//lho phyogasu ni lag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya
311b3(rgyud): rdo rje bri bar bya'o//byang phyogasu ni byams pa'i phyag rgya ril ba spyi blugasu bri bar bya'o//rlung gi phyogasu ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya pad+ma bri bar bya'o//bden bral phyogs
311b4(rgyud): su ni na mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya ral gri bri bar bya'o//nub phyogasu ni sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya pad+ma bri bar bya'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la
311b5(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras//lag na rdo rje legaso logaso//lag na rdo rje khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir ye shes chen po dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags
311b6(rgyud): chen po'i dkyil 'khor brjod pa khyod yang lceg sngo leg so//de skad ces smras pa dang /lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras//'jam dpal ye
311b7(rgyud): shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di su'i lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/'jigs pa dang /dgra dang bral bar 'gyur/gal te chom rkun gyi
312a1(rgyud): nang na 'drug gam/sgron po'i nadu na 'dug gam/dgra'i rlung na 'dug gam/'thab d+ha'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste/de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/
312a2(rgyud): chom rkun gyis bcom par mi 'gyur/srin po la sogs pas gtses par mi 'gyur/de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/
312a3(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyur/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de la nyin gcig bzhin mngon du 'gyur/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang
312a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas yongasu zin par 'gyur/shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na/gang 'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /yid la byed pa dang /ming de
312a5(rgyud): tsam yang 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/de'i sgrib pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro//des dran song gi sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyu ro//des ngan song dang ngan 'gro rnams rgyang sring
312a6(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//gang zhig nang bar langs nas su//lan gcig klog par byed pa'i mi//srid pa nyam ngar gang byas pa'i//sdig las grol bar de 'gyur ro//
312a7(rgyud): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/bam po bcu gnyis pa ste tha ma/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/byang chub sems
312b1(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso//gsung ba pa'i bdag po su dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di bris nas der zhugs par gyur na de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du 'gyur/lag na do
312b2(rgyud): rjes smras pa/'jam dpal kho bos ni de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshod bstan par mi nub mod kyis 'on kyang 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi
312b3(rgyud): phung po ni sa'i rdul ji snyed yod pa de skad du rig par bya'o//'jam dpal ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can gang tshul 'di la yid mi ches pa dag yod de/'jam dpal the tshom mang
312b4(rgyud): ba dang /rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin can dang /mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rab tu zin pa dang /pha la ma gus pa dang /ma la ma gus pa dang /slob dpon dang bla ma la
312b5(rgyud): smad pa dang /bla ma'i skyon 'bru ba'i sems can de dag la ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags dkyil 'khor 'di lag tu yang 'chang du mi gzhug go/rna lam du yang grag
312b6(rgyud): bar mi bya'o//'jam dpal de dag gi mdun du ni gtam yang mi bya'o//glegs bam du bris pa yang de dag gi mdun du dbye bar yang mi bya ste/sems can sdig pa can de dag gis spong ba
312b7(rgyud): cung zad byas pas kyang /ngan song sems can dmyal bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo //'di skad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no//zhes kyang zer te de dag ni bdag kyang phung la/
313a1(rgyud): gzhan dag kyang phung bar byed do//de ltar byed pa'i sems can de dag la ni gsang sngags kyi dngos grub med do zhes kho bos smra na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
313a2(rgyud): rnams kyang rtag tu rgyub kyis phyogs par 'gyur te/de dag rgya bo kyis phyogs par 'gyur na nges par 'byin pa dang /gsang sngags kyi dngos grub gtan med do//de skad ces smras pa dang //
313a3(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso//gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di la dad pa gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni shin
313a4(rgyud): tu dka' ba byed pa yin no//'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin te/de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges pa yin te/de dag la ni de bzhin
313a5(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras//byang chub sems
313a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po gang ye shes chen por dbang bskur gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /'dzin pa de'i bsod nams kyi
313a7(rgyud): phung po ji tsam yod par rig par bya/lag na rdo rjes smras pa/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nas kyi
313b1(rgyud): phuphyung po ji tsam pa de'i bskyod nams kyi phung po yang de tsam du rig par bya'o//de ti'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzungs sngags 'di'i rang bzhin du bzhugs te/tshul 'di mya
313b2(rgyud): rtogs pa blun po de dag gis ni mi shes//'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa dang /sems can thaMd la dbang thob pa ji snyed pa rnams rdzu 'phrul dang /
313b3(rgyud): 'phrul sna tshogs byed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa de dag thams cad kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag
313b4(rgyud): gi mthu yin no//byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang bdud pham par byed pa dang /byang chub mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag kyang gzungs 'di
313b5(rgyud): dag mthu yin//'jam dpal su gsang ba'i ye shes chen por dbang bsgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur ba de ni dam tshig thams cad la zhugs pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
313b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de lta bu'i rang bzhin nam/gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin nam/dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir te/de bas na gzungs sngags kyi dkyil
313b7(rgyud): 'khor 'di la ma gtogs pa de las gzhan med de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dkyil 'khor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro//su 'dir debang bskur ba de ni
314a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba yino//'jam dpal phyogs gang du ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa 'am/
314a2(rgyud): gang gi lag na 'chang ba 'am/gang gi phyir 'dri ba 'am/gang zhig nyin gcig tu nang pAr langs nas la na re klog pa de la 'jigs pa rnams mi 'byung ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md
314a3(rgyud): kyang de la nyin gcig bzhin du gzigs par 'gyur ro//'chi khar yang de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku ston par mdzad//'jam dpal ltos dang sa la gnas pa'i
314a4(rgyud): shing dang nags tshal thams cad na sa med na de dag kyang med do//'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems la dbang
314a5(rgyud): thob pa rnams kyang /gzungs sngags 'di dag la gnas te/'di dag gi byin gyis brlabs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang rnyed do//bdud las rnam par rgyal bar
314a6(rgyud): byed do//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro//byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de nas sems can gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byed do//'di ltar thams cad gzungs
314a7(rgyud): sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no//'jam dpal de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang chongs shog/lhags shig/yid la gyis shig/gzhan dag lo rgya cher yang dag par ston cig dang de
314b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyuraro//'jam dpal sa phyogs gang nA ye shas chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa'i phyogs de mchod
314b2(rgyud): rten lta bur 'gyur ro//gang gi lam na 'chang ba'i sngags pa de la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur ro//'jam dpal sdigs pa de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtag tu
314b3(rgyud): byin gyis rlob par 'gyuraro//sngags pa des kyang gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rin po che za ma rtog bzhin du rtag tu bsrung bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jam dpal sems
314b4(rgyud): can dang /sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ma gus pa'i rang bzhin can dang /slob dpon gyi skyon 'dru ba dag yod pa'i phyir te/'jam dpal de dag la ni chung ngun ni
314b5(rgyud): gtam du yang bzlas par mi bya/glegs bam yang bstan par mi bya na dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang /klog tu gzhug pa dang /ltar gzhug pa lta ci smos/'jam dpal de dag
314b6(rgyud): la ltar gzhug pa dang /tshig tu dbyung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'khrul pa yin te/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i bag med pa chen por rig par bya'o//de ni 'khrul pa chen
314b7(rgyud): po dang shin tu kha na ma tho ba chen po yin no//'jam dpal sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po la slu ba ni bla'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di dag spong ba de ni de lta ma yino//
315a1(rgyud): 'jam dpal sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon te/dper na u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin no//de bas kyang gzungs sngags 'dri 'dra ba dag ston pa ni dkon no//de bas kyang nan/
315a2(rgyud): tan gyis sgrub pa ni dkon no//de bas kyang 'di gang gis lag na 'chang ba dang /gang dag 'di nyan pa dang /gang dag 'di klog pa dang /'dzin pa dang /yang na dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i
315a3(rgyud): sems can dag ni shin tu dkon te/sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus na/gang dag nang par langs nas lan gcig klog pa lta smos kyang ci
315a4(rgyud): dgos te/de'i mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa rnams yongasasu byang bar 'gyur ro//de la 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad dang //
315a5(rgyud): phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//de'i lus la nad thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//gang la las dben pa'i phyogs su ba lang gi lci bas dkyil
315a6(rgyud): 'khor byugs la/me tog phul nas tshes grangs dang /zhag byed pa dang /yud tsam bzang po la gro ga la bris sam/yang na yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad dam/tshes bco lnga la spos dang /
315a7(rgyud): me tog dang /'dug pa dang /lha bshos phul la mar gyi mar me brgyad dang /gser gyi bum pa lnga bzhag nas gro ga la bris te mgul pa 'am/dpung pa 'am/leg ngar
315b1(rgyud): rAm/rked par btags la 'thob mo 'gyed pa'i rlung du 'gro ba 'am/lam du 'gro ba dang /rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro na/de la 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro//'jam dpal 'di/
315b2(rgyud): ni sems can rnams srung ba'i mchog yin te/khyim mim/gtsug lag khang ngam/gnas khang gang na gzungs sngags 'di dag 'dug pa'i gnas dor srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyu ro//'jam
315b3(rgyud): dpal gang gis gzungs sngags 'di dag las gang yang rung bas srung bar byas pa la 'gal bar byed pa ni lha dang bcas pa dang /bdud dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ste//
315b4(rgyud): de'i mgo bo lag na rdo rje kun tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pas 'gem so//'jam dpal char mi 'bab na yang gzungs sngags 'di bklag par bya'o//pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong
315b5(rgyud): na yang bklag par bya'o//mi nad kyi gnod pa 'byung ba la yang bklags na 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/de'i mod la zhi bar 'gyuraro//de nas 'jam dpal
315b6(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras//byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rgya che ba 'di dang /shin
315b7(rgyud): tu zab pa 'di dang gtong dpag dka' ba dang /gsang ba bas kyang chos gsang ba/sems can sdig can rnams la bstan du mi rung ba 'di la lag na rdo rje khyod kyis shin tu dkon
316a1(rgyud): nadu smras to//'don sngon maH/son 'das sa na dag la ba shad par bya/ldanan sa sgru ba/'angam dpal sna bya/byang chun kyi sems rnam pa la
316a2(rgyud): thugs pa dang /gang gi tshe de dag gi byu chub kyi sems grub par byur bad /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpal
