316a3(rgyud): de dag ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir gzhug par bya'o//gang dag gis byang chub kyi sems rtogs par mi gyur pa de dag ni gzhug par
316a4(rgyud): byaste/de dag giswA dkyil 'khor yang ltar me kA nug go//de dgu la ni phyug rgyad do//gsang sngags kyang bstan par mi bya'o//'jam dpal gzungs sngags rten
316a5(rgyud): de'i dkyil 'khor 'di byin gyis brlabs par bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya chen po gcings pacom gyis thams cad byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba bshad kyis nyon cig/lag pa gnyis
316a6(rgyud): sbya la g.yas pa'i gung mo bkug na ni gzungs sngags thams cad 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ste/gsang sngags la/nA mAHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaH/sar+b+ba mu khe b+h+yaH/sarba thA A gats+tsha du nit+taM/
316a7(rgyud): pau ri pU ra Ni/sa mi saM mi/ma~M ga li mo gau li/hU~M Ta/de nyid kyi gung mo sdom po nin bzhag ni/dkyil 'khor du gzungs sngags rnams kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/
316b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis bkug na thams cad drang bar 'gyuraro//de'i sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mya khe b+h+yaH/
316b2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+hi satwa/ma~M d+hA ri/A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/sa ni da d+h+waM/ku ru ku ru/hUM hUM ngaT phaT/de nas mchod par mchog 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/log pa gnyis sbyor nas
316b3(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis bkyed pa ni mchod pa 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ste/'dis mchod pa'i cho ga byin gyis brlab par bya'o//gsang sngags la/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/sarba mu khe d+h+yaH/sarba
316b4(rgyud): thA/ma hA pU dza/pra brta ni/hUM phaT/prA pa tA yau dA pr-i twA yA/sarba ta thA ga te/sa ma ye swAhA/'jam dpal de nas slob dpon gyis cho ga snga ma bzhin du slob mo yongasu bzung por bya ste/
316b5(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems sgom pa 'grub pa la dkyil 'khor 'di drang phyag rgya bstan par bya/dri mi yin pa gzhan pa la ni glegs bram yang bltar gzhug par mi bya'o//'jam dpal gal
316b6(rgyud): to byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'a'i dam tshig mi shes pa'i sems can la dkyil 'khor bstan tam/phyag rgya bstan na des sangs rgyas dang //
316b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams bslus par 'gyur ro//mtshams med pa lnga yang byas par 'gyuraro//'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' mtshams med pa lnga byas pa ni bla'i/dam tshig mi
317a1(rgyud): shes pa dang /lus slong su ma sbyangs pa dang /byang chub kyi sems sgom pa ma grub pa la sten pa ni de lta ma yin te/'jam dang la sems can de dag gi mdun du ni rnams
317a2(rgyud): kyang tshig tu brjod par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can sdig can de dag ni sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la drin du mi bzo ba dang /dad pa med pa yin pa'i phyir
317a3(rgyud): ro//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/sems can de la ye mtshan du 'dzin par 'gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo snyam nas cang mi zer bar gyur to//
317a4(rgyud): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs sngags 'di dag nyan pa dang /
317a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang /klog pa dang /dran par byed pa dang /chung ngu ni rna lam du grags pa tsam du gyur pa de yang shin tu dkon pa yin//lag ni rdo rjes smras pa/'jam
317a6(rgyud): dpal de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa bzhin te/'jam dpal gang dag gzungs sngags 'di dag la mchod pa dang /yi ger 'dri ba'i sems can de dag ni shin tu dkon par rig
317a7(rgyud): par bya'o//su gro ga'am/gzhan la bris nas yan lag dang nying lag gang yang rung ba la 'chang na de la 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung zhing /sdig pa thams cad las
317b1(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur te/de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nyin gcig bzhin du sangs rgyas stong las bosags par 'gyur//'jam dpal phyogs ga na gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan//
317b2(rgyud): pa 'di gnas pa 'am/gang gi lag na yod de'i phyogs dri ni mchod rten lta bur 'gyu ro//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'dri ska
317b3(rgyud): smraso//byang chub sems dang 'a chen po gzungs sngogs 'di dag 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /khe ton byed pa gang yin pa de la ni kho ngos mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya'o//de'i phyi
317b4(rgyud): bzhin du yang rtag tu 'brang bar bya'o//gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'i tshe na yang kho bos dge ba'i bshes gnyen byas te/rtag tu byang chub la nye bar ston par bya'o//'jam
317b5(rgyud): dbul legs leg so//tshig 'di ni legs par smraso//'jam dpal kho bos kyang de la mchod pa bya'o//rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin du yang 'brang bar bya'o//rtag tu bsrung bar yang bya'o//
317b6(rgyud): 'chi ba'i chen yang de la lung bstan par bya'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso//byang chub sems dpa' chen
317b7(rgyud): gang bsgrubs pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
318a1(rgyud): gzungs sngags gang bsgrubs na sngags pas tshe 'di nyid la yid la ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags 'di dag gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i
318a2(rgyud): rim par phye ba rgyas par shod cig/de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' lag ni rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso//'jam dpal gzung
318a3(rgyud): sngags 'di dag gi sgrub pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis ji skad gsungs pa bshad kyis nyon cig/tshes grangs dang rgyu skar yang sbyar mi dgos/smyung ba yang bya mi dgos/bgegs
318a4(rgyud): kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/gzungs sngags sgrub pa'i tshe yang rtag tu sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po tha~Md kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//'jam dpal thog mar re
318a5(rgyud): shig gzungs sngags 'di dag gi ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'byung ste/kha thabs bzhin nyos la skra la sogs pa med par bya'o//de nas pa las byung ba'i sna lngas
318a6(rgyud): bkrus la spos chus bkru'o//de nas che sa grangs dang /zhag phyed pa dang /yud tsam bzang po la ri mo bris te/ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pa 'drir gzhug/
318a7(rgyud): ri mo mkhan de yang 'kho los bsgyur bas bsrung bar bya'o//nyin gcig bzhin du lta ba shos dang /mchod pa yang dbul bar bya'o//de nas ri mo mkhan gyis dbus su bcom
318b1(rgyud): ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar bya ste/skyil mo krung du 'dug la thor tshugs can ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das ma'i g.yon rol du so bor
318b2(rgyud): 'brang ba chen mo bri bar bya ste/ut+pa la'i rgyal po chen po la 'dug cing /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la lcang lo 'phyang bar bya'o//g.yas logasu rdo rje mi 'pham pa'i me pad+ma dkar po
318b3(rgyud): la 'dug cing rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan la lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo thogs/g.yas pa bcom ldan 'das ma la phyag 'tshal bar bya/steng gi phyogs su yang rig sngags
318b4(rgyud): 'chang gnyis me tog gi char 'bebs pa bri'o//'og log su sgrub po lag na bog por thogs pa bcom ldan 'das ma la blta zhing /yal ka me tog can la bskyil ba la 'dud par
318b5(rgyud): bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa phyogs gtsang ma 'am/dben pa 'am/ri'am/nags tshal lam/gtsug lag khang ngam/
318b6(rgyud): gang yid dang 'thad pa der 'dug la slongs mo'i zas za zhing /nang gi gtsang sbra spyod pas ri mo'i gzugs de'i mdun du gzungs sngags gang yang rung ba cig bzung ste bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod byas
318b7(rgyud): la/tha mar zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas te mtshan rangs bzlas brjod byas na nang par ram nyi ma 'char kar mtshan ma 'byung ste/sngags pa'i lus la 'od snang bar 'byung zhing /sku
319a1(rgyud): gzugs la me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur/rog sngags 'chang rnams ca ci'i sgra 'don par 'gyur/'brub sgra grag par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das ma yang
319a2(rgyud): bung grub zin gyis longs zhes tshig brjod par 'gyur ro//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon phul nas bcom ldan 'das ma la 'di skad du bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par
319a3(rgyud): mdzod cig ces smros shig/'on tang bcom ldan 'das mas rig sngags 'chang gi lag nas bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jog ste/
319a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma'i mthus skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sgrub par byed cing /sems can gyi khams thams cad skad cig
319a5(rgyud): re re la dga' bar byed do//rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor du ma dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyuraro//'jam dpal bcom
319a6(rgyud): ldan 'das ma'i ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i mdo 'di ni don thams cad sgrub pa sdig pa thams cad rab tu sel ba/'jigs pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/dus ma
319a7(rgyud): yin par 'chi ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yino//'jam dpal gang ri mo'i sku gzugs 'di mthong ba dang /mchod pa byed pa dang /su'i lag na 'dug pa dang /su yi
319b1(rgyud): ger 'dri ba de la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi lam ston par 'gyur zhing ldog pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams las skyes par
319b2(rgyud): 'gyur/'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/bdud sdig can rnams kyis gtso bar mi 'gyur/'chi ba'i tshe sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyuraro//lag na rdo rje de de bzhino//ji skad
319b3(rgyud): smras pa bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang ri mo'i gzugs 'di mthong ba dang /ri mor 'dri ba dang /gang gi lag na 'dug pa de ni yon tan
319b4(rgyud): dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur zhing /ngan song ngan 'gror yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs
319b5(rgyud): pa'i rigasu yang rtag tu skye bar 'gyur te/smon lam thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la gsol ba
319b6(rgyud): btab pa/byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzungs sngags 'di dag gi spyi'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rim par dbye ba gang gis byang chub kyi spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams kyis tshogs
319b7(rgyud): chung ngus sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyes par bya bar 'gyur ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
320a1(rgyud): cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sems can thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par byed par 'gyur ba khyod kyis shod cig/de skad ces smras pa dang /byang
320a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras//'jam dpal sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/gzungs sngags 'di dag
320a3(rgyud): gi spyi'i sgrub pa'i rnam par phye ba bshad kyis nyon cig/'jam dpal de la byang chub kyi spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang du yang rung ste/ri mo'i sku
320a4(rgyud): gzugs bzhag la bcom ldan 'das ma gzugs sam kha dog gam/dbyibs sam/yi ger yid la bsems te/zla ba drug gi bar du bsgoms na las thams cad nus par 'gyur
320a5(rgyud): te/dug ni mthong ba tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyuraro//gdon gyis zin pa ni bsdigs pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur//gzhan ci yang rung bas zin pa yang mthong ba tsam gyis
320a6(rgyud): gtong bar 'gyuraro//dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol na gnas pa yang las thams cad byed do//'jigs pa thams cad la ni lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i skud pas srung ba
320a7(rgyud): byas par 'gyur ro//bgegs thams cad la ni chus srung ba byed//sgrub pa rnams sam/ro langs sgrub pa rnams la gzungs sngags 'di dag las gang yang rung ba gcig gis bdag
320b1(rgyud): byung ba dang /gzhan srung ba dang /phyogs ba cing bya dang dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams btsud par bya'o//de nas lcas mi snang bar byed 'dod na skar ma rgyal la ldong ros kha thabs bzhin nyos te/
320b2(rgyud): rang gi khrag gis bsgos la de nas phyung ste/ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzhag go/de nas zas su 'o ma dang /phye'u 'di gu za zhing zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa
320b3(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgya de la kha zab mi za bar lag pa g.yon par bzhag ste/bcom ldan 'das mi bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/thig le byas
320b4(rgyud): pas lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das ma mthong bar 'dod na zla ba gcig gi bar du slongs mo'i zas za
320b5(rgyud): zhing ri'i rtse mor song ste/bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas zhag gsum bskyang bar byas te/zla ba gnyis la byang chub kyi shing drung du ci 'byor pas lha bshos dbul zhing
320b6(rgyud): mchod pa byas te bcom ldan 'das ma la bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas nam byed na bcom ldan 'das ma nyid 'ong bar 'gyur te/de la me tog dkar po dag gis mchod yon dbul lo//de
320b7(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das mas sgrub pa'i spyi bor byugs nas leg so//khyod la mchog ci zhig sbyin par bya zhes de nyid zer ba dang /ci 'dod pa de bslang bar bya ste/'dod zhe'am/rigs
321a1(rgyud): sngags 'chang de nyid dam/lus mi snang ba'am/sa'i 'og tu 'gro ba 'am/gzhan yang yid la gang 'dod pa ci yang rung ba de thams cad bslang bar bya'o//ji ste dang //
321a2(rgyud): pa sgrub par 'dod na li khri las ngang pa'i gzugs byas te/ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzhag la kun da'i me tog gis mchod pa rgyas par byas nas/mtshon rangs bcom
321a3(rgyud): ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod byas na nang par ram/nyi ma 'char kar 'grub par 'gyur te de la zhon nas na mkha' la 'phags pa dang /tshangs pa gnyis par 'gyuraro//ji ste rma bya sgrub
321a4(rgyud): par 'dod na 'jim pa la rma bya'i gzugs byas te/ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzhag la/zla ba drug tu bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod byas pa'i mjug tu zla ba nya la ci 'byor
321a5(rgyud): pas mchod pa byas te/mtshan rangs bzlas brjod byas na nyi ma 'char kar rma bya'i skad 'byin par 'gyur te/skad phyung ma thag tu sngags pas bslang bar bya'o//de blangs pa tsam
321a6(rgyud): gyis sngags pa smin drug gi bu dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro//cho ga de bzhin du sa srung gi bu sgrub nu brgya byin dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//lus mi snang bar sgrub par 'dod na mi'i thod pa blangs la
321a7(rgyud): shing mngar dang lhan cig tu zhib mor btags te/tha mar yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la arga'i shing gis me bus la ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgyas par byas nas mtshan rangs
321b1(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas te nang par de'i thal bas sen mo'i sun ris byas na lus mi snang bar 'gyur te/lus mi snang ba tha~Md kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro//sbyor ba gzhan yang 'byung ste/li khri mar dang lhan cig tu/
321b2(rgyud): bsregs la/de nas zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgyas par byas nas shel bzhin 'bar bar 'gyur gyi bar du mtshan rangs brjod par bya'o//de nas 'grub par
321b3(rgyud): 'gyur te des thig ler byas na lus mi snang bar 'gyur te lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro//ji ste mig smra na sgrub par 'dod na sna ma'i me tog dang /lig bu mig blangs te zhib mor byas la de nas
321b4(rgyud): snga ma bzhin du zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste mchod pa byas nas zla ba gcig gi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas snga ma bzhin du gyur nas des mig bskus na phyogs gang du bltas pa de tha~Md
321b5(rgyud): dbang du 'gyuraro//ji ste des mig bskus na rgyal po dang /blon po dang /rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa dang /rgyal po bu mo dang /gzhan yang gang su la bltas pa de thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur
321b6(rgyud): ro//de nas mig sman gyi mchog sgrub par 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la mi ro rma med pa blangs te tsan dan dmar po dang ldan pa'i lha bshos phul la/de nas mi ro'i lag tu mig sman bzhag ste/
321b7(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya'o//bzlas brjod byas pa dang /mi ro'i lag na mig sman 'dug pa 'gul bar 'gyur ro//de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/des mig la bskus na gang la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur/
322a1(rgyud): sna ma'i me tog brgyad stong gi sbyin sreg byas na las thams cad bad blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro//rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi nang du zhugs te/mar gyi ngo zhag
322a2(rgyud): brgyad la brtsams nas bsod snyoms kyi zas za zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/yar gyi ngo ches brgyad la yang yul sbyin par 'gyuraro//yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la bsod
322a3(rgyud): snyoms kyi zas za zhing ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro//de nas zasu 'o ma 'thung zhing lan 'bum bzlas
322a4(rgyud): brjod byas na pha rol gyi dmag 'byer bar 'gyur/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag cig bsnyung bar byas te/ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgyas par byas la mtshan
322a5(rgyud): rangs bzlas brjod byas na de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/rAM dz+ya ma da dA ti/lo lnga brgya thub par 'gyuraro//rgya mtshor
322a6(rgyud): 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas te zas su chu 'thungs na de nas na mkha' la ral gri thogs par 'gyur te/des mchod yon phul la blang bar bya'o//
322a7(rgyud): des blangs pa tsam gyis skra lcang lor 'khyil zhing lo bcu drug lon pa'i sha tshugs dang 'dra bar 'gyur la/rig sngags 'chang du mas bskor zhing sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa mang
322b1(rgyud): pos rol mo byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//nyin gcig bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma yang mthong bar 'gyur ro//thams cad du yang mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dag grub par byed//
322b2(rgyud): gang gi tshe shi bar gyur pa de'i tshe yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa rnam su skye bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigasu skye bar 'gyuraro//ji ste ral gri sgrub par
322b3(rgyud): 'dod na dgon par song la chu 'thung zhing zla ba gcig bzlas brjod byas la de'i 'og tu zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgya cher byas te mtshan rengs
322b4(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na de nas rnal gri 'phar bar 'gyur te/de blangs pa tsam gyis rig stegs 'chang du 'gyur te/rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro//lo drug

322b6(rgyud): ji ste zas mi zad par 'dod na spo ba'i rtsa ba blangs la sle tri sa dang lhan cig sbyin sreg byas na kha zas mi zad par 'byung //mig na na rgya ma tsha btags pa la lan bdun bsngags te

323a1(rgyud): kis zin pa'i tshe ba dmar ser gyi mar zangs kyi snod du bcug ste/tse rA ri ri zer gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas la/de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//

324a2(rgyud): 'bum sbyin sreg byas na srog dang bral bar 'gyuraro//ci ston mkha' lding sgrub par 'dod na grog mkhar gyi sa las na mkha' lding gi gzugs byas te/pa las byung ba'i rnam lngas bkrus la/

327b7(rgyud): du 'gyur te/de dag sngags pas de'i yo byad thams cad sgrub bo//'jam dpal 'di dag la sogs pa gzungs 'di rnams kyis sgrub pa dag ni gang du sbyor ba de'i dngos grub sbyin par

328a4(rgyud): gyi lots+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa///rgya gar skad du/badz+ra d+b+ha mi tri rA dzA kAlpA nA ma/bod skad du/rdo rje sa gsum du rgyu ba zhes
328a5(rgyud): bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po/dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo//de nas gsang ba'i dbang phyug bo//shAka thub kyis ni rigs khro za//phyis kyi rtog pa las rgyal byed//
328a6(rgyud): rtog pa'i bla ma 'di mchog bshad//lha drung sngags dang sbyor ba yis//rtog pas rtog pa 'joms de'i lam//rtog pa med pa'i rig pa yis//khro bo'i dbang phyug zhi ba brnyes/
328a7(rgyud): drang po phyag 'tshal de 'og tu//bzhi pa yi ni lte ba la//dbyangs yig gsum pas mdzes par byas//drug pa'i gsum pa blangs byas la//'og tu dbyangs kyis gnyis pas
328b1(rgyud): brgyan//de la zla phyed dang thig le//lnga nga'i bzhi nyid dang ni//drug pa'i gnyis nga nyid dang yang //bzhi pa'i bzhi pa yang de bzhin//yang ni mo yi sa bon dang //lnga pa yi ni gdum pa
328b2(rgyud): dang /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa yi//'og tu me yi sa bon no//lnga pa'i dang po nyid dang yang //gsum pa'i sde pa lnga pa la//dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan pa dang //de nas
328b3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' dang //lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o//lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa la//gsum pa'i dang po mthar gzhag bya//'di rnams rig sngags dbang byed pa//gAd+tha klung bcu'i phyi
328b4(rgyud): skyed kyi//sangs rgyas khro bo byang chub sems//'byung por bcas pa 'gugs mdzad do//rig sngags rnams ni lha nyid de//stong dang snying rje 'dres pa yi//lha 'di snying kha'i sbyor ba ru//
328b5(rgyud): legs par bzhag pa bsam par bya//lugs su byung dang bzlog pa yi//sngags 'di bzlas dang bri bar bya//oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT/rig sngags 'bum phrag bzlos pa dang //
328b6(rgyud): yi ge re la 'bum phrag dang //de las lhag pa'i sbyor ba yis//sgrub pa po yi bsam pa ni//zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dgug dang //bskyed dang dbye rengs bsad pa dang //las ni gang ga
328b7(rgyud): 'dod pa nges//snying khar sbyor ba rim bzhin sgrub//lus rtsa snying rjeri ldan pa yis//rang lus lha dang bla ma la//phyag sogs bya ba sngon 'gro bas//rig pa'i khro bo bsgom par bya//dang
329a1(rgyud): stong nyid rnam bsams la//lus can rnams kyidri ma bkru//rang gi snying khar dbyangs yig ni//dang po las byung zla ba la//hUM yig sngon po rnam par skyem//rang /
329a2(rgyud): gi 'dus 'dra'i 'od 'phras nas//sems can dri ma rnam bsngal te//skur gyur snying po bsdu bar bya//hUM yang rdo rje sngon por gyur//sngon bzhin spro dang bsdu byas la//sku mdog sngon
329a3(rgyud): po cher 'bar ba//rab tu dregs pas khros pa'o//ri bong 'dzin pa'i steng du ni//bde bar g.yon brkyang gar gyir bzhugs//brgyad gnyis lon pa'i nyams tshul can//drag cing
329a4(rgyud): khros pa'i ro dang ldan//brang 'gro brgyad pos sku la brgyan//zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa//rang gi rdo rje bsnams pa ni//bsnun pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa dang //g.yon pa bsdigs
329a5(rgyud): pa'i mdzub mo can//na bza' sngon pa sham thabs 'dzin//spyan mig dmar zhing mche ba gtsigs//dbu skra nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba//steng du bcings dbus cod pan ldan//zhal nas he ha'i
329a6(rgyud): gadra rgyangs ldan//khro bo'i bdag po 'jigs par byed//log 'dren la sogs 'joms mdzad pa//de 'drar bdag nyid rab bsgoms la//de nas bdag nyid snyoms 'jug pa/
329a7(rgyud): de yi snying khar nyi ma la//rang gi chos kyi yi ge las//khros pas yang yang spros mdzad cing //de dang lhan cig bsgo bar bya//sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yis//de bzhin du yang
329b1(rgyud): dbang byu byung //rdo rje hU~M mdzad ting 'dzin gnas//gdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byung cing //'od zer 'byung ba sna tshogs kyis//rims dang gdon dang drug sogs bzla'//rdo rjes 'og tu rgyu ba las rtan
329b2(rgyud): pa dang po'o///de nas spyan sogs skye mchid la//hU~M byung khro bo bsgom par bya//sku sogs gsum la rdo rje gsum//sgom pa 'di ni dbang byed pa'o//dang po zhibs zhi bar bya//klu
329b3(rgyud): sogs pa'i gzugs byas la//rlung snying 'od kyis bkug la bstin//mchod sbyin bya ba rnying rjes sbyin//'jog pa dang ni rigs ldan dang //mtha' yas nor rgyas pad+ma dang //pad chen dung skyong ti rjes
329b4(rgyud): kyi rgyu//dug rnams snying rje'i sbyor bas sbyangs//nag po dkar po sngon po dngo //rang gi gan su sbyar bar bya//yang na zhi ba'i thab khung du//klu yi sdig pa zhi par bya//shin tu gnog pa'i
329b5(rgyud): rigs de la//mngar gsum chu yis go so bar bya//gang zhig sdig can zhi mi 'dul//gnyis kyi sbyor bas rgyun gcod bya//khrag deng dug sogs rdzas dag la//rig pa bzlog pas
329b6(rgyud): bsgrubs nas ni//shin tu khros pa'i khro bo yis//dgug dang gzhug dang myos bsad dang //cho gas gdug pa dbang byas la//sreg pa la sogs las bya'o//brgyad dang bcu bzhi'i
329b7(rgyud): dus kyi che//skya rengs shar dang dmar rengs cha//nyin mtshan zad pa'i dus kyi che//skra sgro bcud 'jog gcer bu ni//byol song gan su khrag smug go//lus dbus me 'bar
330a1(rgyud): bsgrub bya do//khro bo'i spu yi bu ga las//spros pa'i khra ba khros pa dang //mngag gzhug rnams kyis drangs byas nas//rtog pas rtog pa bza' bar bya//sngar ni rdo rje
330a2(rgyud): sa 'og las//gdug po 'dir ni bza' bar bya//mang du smras pas ci zhig dgos//ma bcos pa yi sems can la//snying rje'i yid can rdo rje sems//ti la sogs rdzas dang sngags
330a3(rgyud): sbyor gyis//sdig pa zhi byad sbyin bsreg bya//rig pa'i blo can kun bzang gis//zho la bsreg bya rgyas pa'o//mi rtag gyur pa'i gdul bya la//'dod chags yid can bde chen gyis//
330a4(rgyud): bodag nyid dgas pa brtan bya'i phyir//ut+pa la dmar sogs kyi sgrub pa'o//'dir ni ma rungs sdig pa byed//gtsor ni sbyangs phyir khro sems kyis//mngon spyod las ni rgyud kun
330a5(rgyud): las/bshad pa thams cad 'dir bya'o//rig sngags snying rje'i shugs kyis 'gro//las ngan rgyun gcod bcos ma yin//las ngan dag pa'i rang bzhin du//khros pas dmigs
330a6(rgyud): par mi 'gyur te//sbyor ba rnams ni bcos mar 'gyur//byang chub bcos med 'bad spangs pa'o//rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las rtog pa gnyis pa'o////de nas khams
330a7(rgyud): gsum rnam rgyal po//sngar ni sprul pa bcu drug pos//rtog pa bcu phrag dang bzhi yang //gnyis kyis rig ma 'joms byed 'dir//sprul pa brgyad du bsdus pa dang //bdag
330b1(rgyud): gcig su samad 'dra gsungs//nam 'aM khams 'byung ba zhi bsam//ri rab kun ba yig las//pad+ma 'ad bya glangs lta ba la//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o//d+hA las byung
330b2(rgyud): ba'i khro ba ni//zhal gcig phyag bzhin bzla' sngo//rdo rje dril bu mad 'gu'u 'gengs//sgra li dang mi sdug mgos rkyen cing //b+ha ga lpags smad dkris 'jigs sel ba//khre bo rnam rgyal
330b3(rgyud): bsgom par bya//thugs ka'i hUM gi sbyor ba yis//shar la sogs nga'i phyogs mtsham sri//'jig rten gsum snang rdo rje dang //'jig rten gsum 'dul rin chen dang //'jig rten
330b4(rgyud): klusnam 'chid pad+ma dang //'jig rten gsum 'jigs las nyid dag/garas rnams rang ming mtshan ma la//grwa yin rnams gdug pa bsdigs pa'o//bdud rtsi 'khyil dang dbyug ston dang //
330b5(rgyud): mig ts+tsha ba dang d+hI mgrin khro//rdo rje dang ni byug pa dang //ral gri badz+rag yas rnamaso//g.yon pa gdug pa bsdigs pa'o//brgyad kyi dpe spyan khro ba byu ga/'jig rten gsum gyi khrul
330b6(rgyud): paskyong //dbyug pa nag srogs pho nya bzhi//sku mdog mtshan mas rgyan pa khros//lcags kyu la sogs sgor gnas pa//khro bo'i 'khor lo 'jigs sel sgom//gtso bcas rig
330b7(rgyud): pa'i khro ba kun//sgyu ma'i phreng bas do shal byas//gos sngon can la sdug lpags dkris//gdug pasal ba'i lam du spros//de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gtso//khro bo'i mdzan/
331a1(rgyud): /nyid sngags bcas bshad//dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo//gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can/sangs rgyas gang+gA
331a2(rgyud): klung gi bye ma snyed kyis r+d+ha su gnang ba/mche ba gtsigs pa dang mtsham pa/mig mi mngag gi phung po byab/debugs me lce ltar 'bar ba/'jigs pa'i re ro can/lag pa
331a3(rgyud): dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus rgyan pa/klu nag po se ral khar thogs pa/klu dga' bo dang nya dga' bo 'bar bas rna cha byas pa/sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa/
331a4(rgyud): sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za ba/bzhin rgyas pa/smin ma dang dpral ba bsdus pa/ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/gshin rje'i cha byad ce na/lce glog ltar 'gyur ba/gsus
331a5(rgyud): po che sbrul za ba/lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska ragasu bcings pa/a la lA zhes sgrags par byed pa/rgya mtsho'i zabs
331a6(rgyud): su dpag tshad brgya khri bzhi stong yod pa rgud pa'i pus mor phyin pa/dbang po dang nyi ma phrag la khur pa/klu thams cad brlag par byed pa/gang rgyangos chen po dgod pas kun
331a7(rgyud): tu 'khrug pa byed pa/gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa/klu thams cad brlag par byed pa lo phyag 'tsha lo//de nas sangs rgyas
331b1(rgyud): ma ldan 'das pa byung gi skyem da m+b+hi gasdus pa ga rdzags pa dang rjod par byur//ta thA/d+han+ta panA ga ya ga pa/yonan mA bar d+ha dgan//da la
331b2(rgyud): s+yAm+b+ha ti kr-i ma b+hUm+bu kI li~M ta sA drA naM/bai biSh+Tha ti/tAd+ya thA/ dzad+ha/badz+ron pa~Mprad+d+ha/ hU~M b+h+rU~Mb+d+hA ta ra ha ra nA ga nAn/ts+tshin d+hin+ti/nI gahr-id yAn/b+hin+da b+hin+danA kad man/

331b5(rgyud): shAk+Sha rA ya d+d+he phaT/yaD+D+h+ya a bskor b+hinA she ka rA ya Sh+Te hrI h+ya sa twa sad+ha rad+hi ra/mA ra yam+b+her yaM/d+ha sha yAnA sha~M yA/sarba ba g+h+nAn dI nAM she kaR+Sha ya dz+nyA phaH/
331b6(rgyud): shad+d+hek+ki ban+d+ha bo nA sha kA R+Sha s+ya hU~M phaT/oM nI la ba ra d+ha ra/badz+ra pA ti radz+nyA pA ya ti s+t+wa~Mt+ta/de'i tshig la ga sbyin gyis zin pa la rdul sngags kyis btab te gtor na brtan
331b7(rgyud): bape gyur//klu zlog par 'don drug shang kyi drugs sa d+yaH//maugs dang po bye rnams la ni da brtson pas rgyag/rams de maud
332a1(rgyud): bar bya ba dang /yi ga 'chus pa la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o//nor 'dod na zhag gcig bsnyung bar gnas te pog gis bdug na rmyi lam du dag
332a2(rgyud): ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston par 'gyur la gser gyi dong tshe bdun stong ster bar 'gyuraro//rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o//sgo lcags dbye
332a3(rgyud): bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o//'jigs pa thams cad srung ba la ni mur rnying po 'am thal ba 'am yungs kar gyis bya'o//nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni srung bsngon
332a4(rgyud): po la srung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro//byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyuraro//
332a5(rgyud): chom rkun bzlog par 'dod na sas bya'o//dug la ni rtswa ku shas byab par bya'o//bdag srung ba la ni yid kyis sam chus bya'o//gzhan srung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o//
332a6(rgyud): las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsum mam bdun nam bcu bzhi 'am nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o//de ltar byas na 'grub par
332a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro//rdo rjes rig tu rgyu ba las rtog pa gsum pa'o////rtog pa 'di dag dang byed pa//lag na rdo rje khros pa las//bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i
332b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis//bran g.yog rnams ni bskul bar bya//oM a mr-i tA kuN+DA li tA na ha na d+hu phaT/'di ni bka' tsam nges bsgrags cing //de yig sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod//snying kha'i 'du
332b2(rgyud): kyis dbang bya zhing //gu gul dud pas brod byas la//ser sna chen po sait+ka la zhon pa dang /rmugs 'dzin dang /gang bzang dang /nor bu bzang dang /ku be ra dang /yang dag shes dang /'brog
332b3(rgyud): gnas dang /lngas rtsen dang /pi tsi kuN+Da li rnams la mkha ba sbyin par bya'o//'di rnams rta la chibs pa la//'od dang ldan zhing me long can//ras dkar gtsang mas gsal byas
332b4(rgyud): /gsal snang kun ni bri bar bya//yang na kun kyang sbrul nog chibs//'jigs pa'i mtshon cha phyag na bsnams//bskul ba dag par dbang byas na//mngon spyod las kun byed
332b5(rgyud): par 'gyur//drag po dgu dang nyi shu brgyad//sa gsum khyab pa spros nas ni//sngags grub stobs kyis bdag bran byed//dus tshod dus la mchod pa byed//de nas dngul
332b6(rgyud): khas 'jigs pa la//rmugs 'dzin sgrub pa yid 'ong bshad//kun kyang gter rnams mnan pa la//rin chen 'bar bas khyim 'gengs pa//sbyor grang rdo rje chus 'grub 'gyur//
332b7(rgyud): pad+ma zla dang gter chen la//dzaM las byung ba'i gnod sbyin dgu//bklag la rang rang gsang sngags kyis//chu dang bcas pa'i mchod sbyin 'bul//'di ni sngags kyi rkang pa rnam so//
333a1(rgyud): /s+yA byU shrA baNA ya s+thAH/a dam+b+ha lA ya s+yAt+ma/b+haR+tha m+b+har+m+mAH/oM.a/d+hA ya Sh+TAH/oM ku bau rA la na n+tu/oMs b+ha na yaswAt+ma/oM bu b+h+ya nA yak+ShAt+ma/
333a2(rgyud): pAny+tsi kA ya swA hA/oM pi tsi kuN+Da lI ya swA hA/de nas yang dag spyod pa'i mchog/lho yi brtul zhugs dag pa bshad//kun tu ras gtsang gos sngon byin gyis brlab bya zhing //bram ze'i
333a3(rgyud): rigs lhar dri can zas dang 'gro mgyogs sha las ring du 'dug/bsnyung bar gnas shing chus bkrus dkar gsum gtsang ma'i zas za zhing //ngag gi rlung bsdams dang dang snying rjes yid
333a4(rgyud): brlan brtson par 'jug/bsam gtan khang pa mdog ni sngo bsgyur ba yi lci ba dri zhim chu yos byugs//dkar dang sngo ba'i me tog bkram la sku gdung bla ma mdun bzhag la//cho rigs
333a5(rgyud): btsun pa'i sgrub pa pos ni gos dkar bgos la ku sha'i stan la 'dug/snying rjes khros pa'i rig sngags dam pa mdzad par bzlas pa bya//ru rek+Sha yi bgrang phreng brgya phyed byin gyis
333a6(rgyud): brlabs la log pa g.yas pas gzung //ril bu re dang lha re sngags re bcas nas snying khar bzung //rnal 'byor 'di rnams spyad cing 'gro la 'jungs pa'i sems ldan pas/
333a7(rgyud): bdag dang gzhan la phan phyir rtog pa bshad pa yin//rdo rjes 'areg tu rgyu ba las rtog pa bzhi pa'o///byar khri skyes pa'i rna dang nags tshal byung me mched ltarare//rlung gis
333b1(rgyud): grogs byas bsgrags nas thal ba'i lhag ma'ang ma lus bzhin//bskal pa dpag med skyes pa'i rtog pa'i dri mI'i rma rnams la//drung ba dad dang brtson 'grus sngags bzlas sems dam mo//
333b2(rgyud): yos srog/nyi ma'i snying po 'dzum gling dbus su rigs bzung ste//skyes dang bud med dpong po skyon med tshul khrims cen//skye ba snga ma'i lam shugs dag dang bla ma'i lung thob pa/
333b3(rgyud): dang dang snying rje'i sems can gtong ba'i can blo des//rig pa'i khro bo sgom dang de rjes de ni bzlas 'bad na//bstod dang mchod mnyes bran g.yog lha min gsang ba brnyas med cing /
333b4(rgyud): chu yi mchod sbyin 'khor lo gtor mu la brtson zhing //sbyin sreg rnams kyis lha dang bran g.yog mnyes byas na//ring por mi thogs sgrub po des rtag phyag rgya 'byin par 'gyur//'dir
333b5(rgyud): ni mang du smras mi dgos//sngar ni rdo rje sa thog tu//bshad pa'i mtshan ma ster bar 'gyur//zangs lcags bla ma'i gnang bya'o//lus sogs rig pa'i dbang gyur nas//me dang rlung
333b6(rgyud): sogs 'byung ba dang //nad deng gdon dang byad rnams dang //bdud kyis klags ni rnyed mi 'gyur//me lce phreng ba'i rtog pa las//bshad pa'i 'chi ba'i sbyor byung na//ser sna 'di ni pha
333b7(rgyud): rol 'phang //smon lam lam sna la brten nas//'di 'og byang chub sems dpa' ni//'gro ba smin pa'i bla mar 'gyur//yang na srid pa bar mdor//sngogs kyi rnam shes gzi bskyed
334a1(rgyud): nas/'gro ba na reg pa 'dzin gyur nas//de yi 'og tu sems pa'o//tha ma'ang lam la brtan nas ni//rang 'dod dam pa'i lus rnyed nas//sna mA la ma sol da
334a2(rgyud): 'og tu//dngos grub la ni rnam par gnas//lha dang sngags sogs rtogs pa des//rtog pa dman pa mnan pa yin//na mkha' lta bur rtog med la//'jig rten ngor ni rtog pas sprul//
334a3(rgyud): gdul bya sdang sogs sems 'khrugs la//da ni snying rje sdang bar mdzad//khro sogs gsal du med gyur na//khro bor da ni ci phyir 'gyur//dang po rnal 'byor 'tshe ba bcom//de
334a4(rgyud): phyi re rog sngags sbyor ba rnams//rgyud kun tu ni gsungs pa yin//'tshe ba bcom nas dag pa ni//sems dag pa ni bde ba yin//gdug pa'i sbyor ba phrogs pas na//bde bar byang
334a5(rgyud): chub lam brten lo//rdo rje sku nyid 'gyur med la//bdag gi rig pa'i ye shes de//lus can de yi 'bras bu'o//ji ltar shel ni 'dzam+b+ha ka'i//me tog gis ni gzhan du snang //de
334a6(rgyud): bzhin rtog med rig pa yang //khro bo'i dbang phyug 'dir snang nas//ji ltar 'dul gyur sprul pa yis//rkyergyun mi 'chad par khro bor snang //snying rje med na 'bras bu nyams//'gro la
334a7(rgyud): phan btags gnod bsal na//rang sems dag par 'bras bu 'grub//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgrib pa rnams//byang chub sems kyis ring du spang //'dir ni 'khor ba 'jig par nges/

334b2(rgyud): dang /rabyung lo d+ha bas sh+tsa ma n+na tI nam /dang da rje/dam tshig rnams dpa
334b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i rgyud/'dzu mdapa la gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tsha'o//sangs rgya so dang /bya chub sen sa dad 'dong /'phags pa'i dge 'dun khrims cad la paga' chalo//dbus dang

335a1(rgyud): sh+log rlon 'dun zhag ldan 'du nan tu gan chu rgyu rgyun / la
335a2(rgyud): 'chang chen po nye bar du /de bzhin gshegs pa skyug par dgyes par nem par ril pa/da myupa med pa pa ma mngon de dzin gyi'i tshum dzi nam pa sna rgyags
335a3(rgyud): myu/rin po rje'i rgyal ba'i po m+b+ha chen po ts+tshag kyang chub pa' sems pa'i chen gas bzhi'i ba'i bang na'i khril gas so//denas nga
335a4(rgyud): sade bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi yul chen po'i rdzu 'phrul byin gyis brlabs kyi sa rgya chen por byed pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnying po/thogs pa med pa den mau

342b7(rgyud): 'gyur zhing thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//gzo nu'am gzhonu ma legs par khrus byas te/rgyan gyis brgyan pa la sngon du basbyin pa byas la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa
343a1(rgyud): b+h+ya te/nyin mtshan srung bar mchod rten nam/lugs su'am/glegs pam mam/bris sku'am/gzhan dag gi mdun du ku sha'i gnal bkram pa la 'dug rgya//sang //

343a3(rgyud): bya'o//de dag med na skyil mo dkrung bIs 'dug ste/log pas de dag gzung la ji srid gzho nu dang gzhon nu ma 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pas rab tu 'bar zhing 'phur bar 'gyu ro//leg
343a4(rgyud): pas blangs pa de dag dang bcas par rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//bud med legs par khrus byas shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa la ji srid skyes par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o//dur khrod du bris
343a5(rgyud): pa 'am/shing ngam sa las byas pa'i seng ge la ji srid 'gro bar gyur pa de srid bzlas pas de la zhon zhing gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur//gal te nyin re rtag tu bzlas na gang du 'gro ba'i sa phyogs
343a6(rgyud): de srung ba byas par 'gyuraro//gal te nyin mchen du sgrub pa byed na ni srid du zhag lnga 'am/drug gam brgyad dam lhag mi zla ba phyed kyi nang du yar 'phags par 'gyur zhing lha rnams las kyang rgyal
343a7(rgyud): bar 'gyuro//de la zhon na gang du 'dod pa der 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur//de bzhin du rta'am/glang po che 'am/khyu mchog gam/ma he 'am/ra skyes sam/lug gam/ri dgas la bzlas
343b1(rgyud): nado dag thams cad nyid gang du ji srid 'dod pa de srid tu bzlas par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur//me tog gis rab tu gtor ba'i dkyil 'khor la dur khrod kyi shing la me sbar la mar dang lung //

343b3(rgyud): ba bya la sgrub pa'am/cho ga 'di nyid kyis shing khri'am/mchil lham la sogs pa la yang yid la 'dod pas cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o//shing mya ngan med kyi yal ki la 'jus nas ji srid nas

343b6(rgyud): snyos kyi 'tsho bas dur khrod du ji s+thi du mi snang bar gyur pa de srid bzlas par bya'o//drar khrong du zhag hUM 'dug ste/bzlas pa byas nas phyis de nyid du sa'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten byas nas/

344a1(rgyud): la'i rtsa ba skam po phye mar byas te/dur khrod du me tog gis mngon par gtor ba'i dkyil 'khor byas la lag pa kha sbyor ram/kham phor kha sbyar du bcug ste/ji srid/

344a7(rgyud): bde srid du bzlas par bya'o//de bzhin du ga wang dang /lig bu mig la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya'o//dge slong gis rtag tu chos gos dang /lhung bzed dang /khar bsil la sogs
344b1(rgyud): brlangs la bzlas pa byi zhing 'jog pa na srung ba byas te bzhag par bya'o//de lta bu la sogs pa'i lasu bya ba byed pa na yid la 'dod pa'i tshogs sgrub pa 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa thams

349a7(rgyud): pas byin gyis brlabs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsung gi 'khor lo dang /gzhan dag kyang sems can gyi khams rnams las 'byung shing rdos par gyur cig/ces sems can tham
349b1(rgyud): cad bskyab par dmigs nas sngags bzlas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyi shugs la dad par bya'o//de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas tha na gzung /
349b2(rgyud): ba tsam la yang sbyar bar bya'o//rtog pa 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis don yod pa thogs pa med pa smon lam gyi stobs dang /byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis dngos grub byin gyis
349b3(rgyud): brlabs pa yin//de nas 'dir rig pa 'dzin pa thob pa'i thabs phyogs tsam brjod par bya'o//'dir dad pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas ro shig sangs rgyas dang byang chub
349b4(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la snga ma bzhin du bdag gi lus dbul bar bya'o//de nas dus thams cad pa'i sdig pa bshags te/lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa
349b5(rgyud): dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa las byung ba rnams nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du gshegs par bya'o//de nas 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems
349b6(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang /ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad la rje su yi rang por bya ste/sems can thams cad skyob cing phan par mdzad pa la rje su yi rang ngo //dpag tu med pa'i
349b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa nyid la yang rje su yi rang ngo //de nas 'di ltar yang bsam par bya'o///
350a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gcig gi bsod nams dang /ye shes kyi tshogs kyang tshad med de zhes rje su yi rang nas sems can thams cad kyi phyir mongasu bstan mthar
350a2(rgyud): dang dbus med pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rgya chen po 'thung bar 'gyur na gang yang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa mtha' mi mthong ba tshad med pa khong du chud par byas
350a3(rgyud): nas rje su yi rang ba lta ci smos/yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa gang yin pa des rje su yi rang ngo zhes brjod do//de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
350a4(rgyud): yang dag par byung ba/bdag gi med pa rje su ma bzung ba/thang las skyes pa rin po che'i ri la sogs pa dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa'i don du bsngo bar
350a5(rgyud): bya'o//de nas bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos kyi dbyings las spros pa'i dam pa rgya chen po'i mchod pa'i sprin sna tshog
350a6(rgyud): pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs dang /bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig rjes nges par bsams la/'di skad lanA brgyad kyi bar du bad+hi /
350a7(rgyud): bya'o//na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM sorba thA uta ga te s+pha ra Ni hi maM ga ga ni khaM sa man+ta ta swA hA//de'i rjes la gzhan ma yin par de bzhin du mchod pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar
350b1(rgyud): mkhyen pa bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas pa rab 'byam rgya mtsho rnams bdag
350b2(rgyud): gi smon lam gyi stobs dang /bsod nams kyi stobs dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces bsams la sngags 'do lan brgyad kyi bar du
350b3(rgyud): /brjod par bya'o//na maHsarba bud+d+ha be d+hi sa twA naM/sarba tra saM gu su mi tA a b+hi dz+nyA na rA shi ni na mau stu te swA hA//de nas bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya mtsho rnams de bzhin gsheg pa rnams
350b4(rgyud): kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis thams cad du sdug bsngal bar gyur pa bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol
350b5(rgyud): bdag la dngos grub dang mchog stsal du gsol zhem tshig tu brjod par bya'o//de nas sems can thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs zag pa med pa rnal 'byor las yang dag par
350b6(rgyud): byung ba rab tu thob par gyur cig ces kyang brjod do//de bzhin du mtha'o dang dbus med pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba sbyin par yid la byas nas de lta bu'i sprul pa'i
350b7(rgyud): sprin mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor bas bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i sngags lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o//de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
351a1(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal zhing dmigs la bzlas pa goms par byas nas/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
351a2(rgyud): pa'i byang chub grub par gyur pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad grub par gyur pa de dag la rje su yi rung ba la dmyigs pa'i sems kyis goms par byas shing bzlas par bya ste/ji
351a3(rgyud): srid skyo bar mo gyur gyi bar du'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas bla na med pa'i seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /bla na med pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad cing
351a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po ye shes kyi sku yongasu rdzogs pa la mngon par mos pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas langs nas 'phags
351a5(rgyud): pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa yangs shing rgya che ba'i mdo sde klag pa 'am gzhan yang rung ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du dri dus kyi bar du gnas par bya'o//de nas glegs bam la sogs pa
351a6(rgyud): mchod pa 'am/tha na mchod rten la phyag 'tshal byas nas zas bza' bar bya'o//za bya'i tshe kha zas la sngags 'di so lan brgyad mngon par bsngags la dang po'i chung bu lha ba sho su phul
351a7(rgyud): la bza' bar bya'o//de la sngags 'di yin te/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa tA nAM/oM ba lin+d+ha te te dzo mA li ni swA hA//zas kyi dub pa nung zhing ngal bsol la phyi dro'i dusu yang cho ga
351b1(rgyud): 'di bzhin du bya'o//nyal ba'i tshe dang por sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal nas bdag nyid phul la phyin nas mal du ji ltar 'dod
351b2(rgyud): bapar gnyid log la nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal por bya'o//de la cho ga ni 'di yino//tshes gcig nas brtsams nos nyin re zhing zla ba gcig rdzogs kyi bar du 'di bzhin du bya ba yino///
351b3(rgyud): gal te cho ga 'ga' zhig ma byas sam/byi ba gzhan gyis brel pas nyi ma gcig gam gnyis sam/gsum la sogs par las nyams na yang des brtson 'grus dor bar mi bya ste zla ba de
351b4(rgyud): nyid kyi nya la nyin mtshan gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du'am/mchod rten dang /sku gzugs dang /dam pa'i chos glegs bam mam/gzhan gyi mdun du yang rung /mchod pa
351b5(rgyud): ci 'byor pa byas nas ku shwa bkram pa la 'dug ste srung ba'i tshig byas pa nas 'khor lo dang /rdo rje dang /rtse gsum dang /mdung dang /kha T+wAM ga yang rung lcags las byas pa 'am/sa las
351b6(rgyud): byas pa yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i le'u nas gsungs pa'i mtshon cha rnams las gang 'dod pa zhig lag tu blangs nas sgrub pa byas na des nam phyed dam/nyi ma 'char
351b7(rgyud): kor nges par 'bar bar 'gyur ro//de nyid rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/skad cig de la rig 'dzin gyi rigs kun nye bar 'dus nas de la dbang bskur bar 'gyur//de nas bzung nas 'jig
352a1(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad na mkha' la rgyu zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rje su 'jug cing mchod pa byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
352a2(rgyud): spyod pa la zhugs nas bde ba dang ldan bzhin du lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin thams cad kyis mchod cing rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad mngon par dga' bar byed pa'i rig sngags 'dzin
352a3(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyuraro//mtha' yas pa'i bud med kyi 'khor la sogs pa la yongasu longs spyod kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing lus de nyid mi mdor bar bde bar rje su 'jug par 'gyuraro///
352a4(rgyud): thabs 'di nyid kyis mthar gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku'i bar du yang thob par 'gyur ro//'khor lo la sogs pa mtshon cha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du
352a5(rgyud): ldong ros dang /mig sman dang /ba bla dang /gau wang dang /gos dang /ku sha dang /nor bu dang /rma bya'i sgro dang /snod dang /mchil lham dang /gdugs dang /rnga yab dang /
352a6(rgyud): rgyal mtshan drang /'phan dang /pad+ma dang /ut+pal dang /ta ma'i lo ma las ral gri dang /chu gri dang /gri dang /khi T+wAM ga la sogs pa'i rdza su byas pa 'am/lhag mas kyang bsgrub
352a7(rgyud): par bya'o//yid la gang 'dod pa 'am/rig sngags dang /gsang sngags dang /rtog pa'i cho ga gzhan la yang sbyar ba 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nas gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams
352b1(rgyud): sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nas gsungs pa'i cho ga 'am/yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho gas kyang sgrub pa byas na de nyid kyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa
352b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi zad nas dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga'o//ji skad bstan pa'i phyogs gcig du mchod rten dang /sku gzugs dang /dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam/gang yang rung ba'i mdun du me tog
352b3(rgyud): sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas la/ci 'byor pa'i dri dang //me tog dang /phreng ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung /ku sha'i chang bu la nye bar 'dug nas lag pa
352b4(rgyud): 'am gzhan du yang rung /ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas bzung nas/lo ma'i bar ram/gos kyi bar du 'am/lcags dang /dngul dang /gser gyi sno du bzhag la ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi
352b5(rgyud): bar du bzlas pa byas na//de bzhin du bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba ste/'di ni thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
352b6(rgyud): theg pa pa'i cho gau yin no//cho ga 'di nyid kyis dben zhing stong pa'i ri dang /chu klung dang /mtshe'u dang /tshal nyams dga' ba 'am/shing gcig gam/gtsug lag gi gnas sam/sku gdung
352b7(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi rtsal 'am/sku gzugs bzhugs pa 'am/gzhan yo baM gtsug khang gi brang khang la sogs pa dben par bsgrub par bya ste/'du 'dzi dang bral ba 'am/sangs rgyas
353a1(rgyud): rjesu dran pa la goms par byas pa/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/dad pa dang ldan pa/ser sna med pas
353a2(rgyud): som nyi dang bral ba'i sems kyis lus dang srog la yong ltos pa med par bya'o//gzhan yang thams cad kyi thun mong gi cho ga ni ri dang chu 'gram dang /'bab chu'i ngos la sogs pa'i gnas
353a3(rgyud): dben zhing stong pa rnamasu dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam+ba dang /gnyi su gnos la dus gsum du sdig pa bshags pa dang /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la rje su yi rang ba byas
353a4(rgyud): nas/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar gsol ba 'debs pas ci srid mtshan ma byung bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//yar ngo'i nya la cho ga snga ma bzhin du
353a5(rgyud): nyin zhag gcig smyung por gnas nas ji skad bstan pa'i rdzas rnams las gang yang rung ba blangs la ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas na de nyid kyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//reg pa
353a6(rgyud): mchog don yod pa 'di ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa/thogs pa med pa yid la re ba'i phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub par byed pa ste/ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyor ba de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyuraro///
353a7(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis grub pa bklags pas 'grub pa yin pas bzlas pa tsam gyis 'dod pa tha mas cad byed po yino//don yod pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga bzhon du sbyang ba 'am/ji ltar 'dod pa
353b1(rgyud): zhon bsgru par gyu//yang na rapya ris sgrub par 'dod na/bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdun lnga skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyog su 'phags pa
353b2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje kun nas 'bar bas bskor babacom ldan 'das cod pani las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba bri bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon log su rig pa'i
353b3(rgyud): mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal mo gser gyi mdog can ral pa dang bcas pa/gos tsang ma bgos pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba/'od kyi phreng bas rgyan
353b4(rgyud): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das ma'i 'og tu mtha' med ces bya ba'i 'khor ral gri dang /zhags pi lag na thogs pa/mdog sngo bsangs khros shing 'khrugs pa/gos dmar ser zung bgos
353b5(rgyud): khro gnyer bsdus pa/bgegs thams cad tshar gcod pa/mngag bzhug pa rin po che'i brag la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o//'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni bsgrub pa po thal mo sbyar ba rin po
353b6(rgyud): che'i brag gi pad+ma'i sdong po la bzhugs pa me tog gi khri shing gris kun nas bskor ba bri bar bya'o//de lta bu'i ras ris kyi mdun du chu ga 'dis ji ltar 'dod par ramo/rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga dang
353b7(rgyud): yang sbyar bar bya'o//rig pa mchog gi ras ris gzhan yang ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa pad+ma dmar po la rab tu bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o//de'i 'og tu mngag gzhug pa mtha' med lag pa na
354a1(rgyud): ram gri dang /zhabs pa thogs pa de dang 'dru bar bri bar bya'o//ras ris 'dir yang las de dag kun d+ha'o//cho ga gzhan yang ri la sogs pa sto zhing dben par phyogs cig tu
354a2(rgyud): skyil mo dkrung bcas nas byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs nas mtshan thog thag skyil mo dIkrung ma zhig par bzlas pa byas na sngon du bsnyen pa ma byas kyang tho rangs sngam
354a3(rgyud): nonam byed na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//mthu mtshungs pa med pa dang ldan pas phyir mi ldog pa'i rig pa 'dzin pas mchod par 'gyur/sems can thams cad kyis mchod por 'gyuraro//rig pa'i
354a4(rgyud): mchog 'di gang gi lag tu thob pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro//rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis yang dag par bsrungs par 'gyuraro//sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i
354a5(rgyud): sbyor bas lha dang klu la sogs pa dgug pa dang /gzhan yang yid la gang 'dod pa rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i tshig gang yin pa'i dam pa
354a6(rgyud): nyos 'gyur du sbyar bar bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba rig pa'i mchog rdzog so///de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo rdo rje zhes
354a7(rgyud): bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la rnam par lbu ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje shugs kyi yi ge zhes
354b1(rgyud): byabyu byung bar gyur to//de las ni rig pa'i mchog pa rdo rje'i cho ga 'di byung bar gyur to//na maHsar+b+ba ba~M d+hi sa twA nA~M/oM thor rdo bi ra stAg+h+ra bi ri dr-i s+yA ta swa tA/sA ra te stA rat+ta/trA li d+ha ma~M ba d+ham
354b2(rgyud): saM bsnun/tar+Na tI sid+d+ha a gre trAM swAhA/'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 'di la yang rig pa'i mchog dang po mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rtog pa'i cho gar dang pong de bzhin gshegs pa'i
354b3(rgyud): po'i rnyog pa'i cho ga nyib 'gyur du sbyong ba gang yin pa yang nyis 'gyur du 'ju'o/'di'i rnas ris kyi khyad par ni rin po che'i brag las skyes pa'i rin po che'i bud+ma chen po la skyil mo dbyu gis bzhugs bya/
354b4(rgyud): phyag gis mardzog stsol 'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon log su rig pa'i mchog phyag na 'khor gyi bsnams pa/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rin po che'i brag la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o//btsam
354b5(rgyud): ston 'das kyi galas log su 'khor la d+he rjezhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin byug na 'khyod khyo ba stems pa/rlung zad stobasangs rin po che'i brag la bzhugs pa/de bzhin ga shegs pa'i
354b6(rgyud): 'od zer gyis kun nas bskor bya'o//de'i 'og logasu sgrub pa po phyag 'tshal ba bri'o//lha mo'i 'og dri ni mtha' med ces bya ba 'khor de nyid bgegs tshar gcod pa ral gri dang zhags pa lag na
354b7(rgyud): thags pa bri ba bya'o//ras ris gnyis pa ni n+ya mo gcig pu gnas pa phyag na 'khong la paM rnams pa'o//de'i 'og du ni de pozhin du mtha' mi lag na rab gri dang nags pa thogs pa khro bo gnon du
355a1(rgyud): gzugs can khrog nyer g.yo ba dang bcas pa'o//'dir yang chog ni snga ma nyid kyis bya'o//ji ltar yid la 'dod pas sam/rtog pa gzhan gyi tshogs kyang bya'o//'ang
355a2(rgyud): khyad par ni 'di yin no//bklags pa/nam gyis dang tshig thams cad shes par 'gyur/dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro//'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rlig pa'i mchog rdzog so//
355a3(rgyud): donas bdud brtsi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang sangs rgyas dang byang chub semasu dpar thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis dam tshig gi rgyal po zhes bya ba'o ti 'dzin la rnams par
355a4(rgyud): zhug so//de las rol pa'i yul mthil gas pa zhes bya ba'i badzin pa'i tshig gi 'khor lo rdo rje'i sgo mngon par byung bar gyur to//de las bdud rtsi'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa mchog 'di thos
355a5(rgyud): per 'gyur ro//na maHsarba prad+d+ha bo d+his twA nA~M/a mr-i ti Am+bu tI/shI khi shi khi/bi mA le bi mA lA/bi rA d+hits+tshiSh+T+rI /ha hA ru/bI dIm+b+ha hA sa ma ya~M/badz+nyA a gre swAhA//'du
355a6(rgyud): ci rdo rje 'di'i cho ga yang sngar bstan pa'i rig pa'i mchog gsum gyi de nyid kyi yin no//'dir 'di'i ras ris kyi khyad par ni bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i r-i'i steng na rin po che'i pad ma chen po la nye bar
355a7(rgyud): bzhugs pa//phyag gis mchog stsol ba de bzhin du bri bar bye'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon log su mo bri yang ku lter sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/phyag na yid
355b1(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pra bri bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das TI gas nasung du kyi bya ba'i rdo rje 'cha ba ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/rin po che'i pad+ma la tu
355b2(rgyud): par bzhugs pa/phyogs gnyisu rin po che'i bdan gnyis 'phyar ba/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis kun nas bskor ba bri bar bya'o//de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po snga ma bzhin du bri'o//lha mo'i
355b3(rgyud): 'og tu mngag gzhug pa mtha' yas ral gri dang /zhags pa lag na thogs pa gzhan nu'i cha byad can log 'dren tshar gcod pa bri bar bya'o//ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu
355b4(rgyud): phyag na bsnams pa de bzhin du bris la 'khor mtha' yas kyang snga ma lta bu'o//de bzhin du the tshom dang bral bas rtog pa 'di la sbyar bar bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rtog pa'i cho ga
355b5(rgyud): yang 'dir nyis 'gyur du sbyar bar bya'o//bdud rtsi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rdzog so///de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba gsum mnyam pa'i stobs zhes
355b6(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//de nas de dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungs pa'i rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 'di gsung so//na maHsarba bud+d+haH
355b7(rgyud): d+hi satwA nAM/a ha ha ha bI bI/b+hU ma Ne/tri ba li ni swA hA/rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa mchog gi snying po 'dis ni gang de dag tu mngon par ma bsgrubs pa 'grub par 'gyur te/'di'i cho ga ni de dag
356a1(rgyud): nyid yin no//ras ris kyi khyad par ni rig pa'i mchog gi gnas gzhon nu ma dri bar bya ste/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lcang lo can/pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa/bcom
356a2(rgyud): ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar bar byas pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas log su rdo rje 'dzin gyi gan su de bzhin du dpa' bo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi mdog can skyib
356a3(rgyud): mo krung gis pad+ma'i steng du ti nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pas bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'od kyi phreng bas bskor nga bri bar bya'o//de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po'o//lha mo'i 'og tu ni de bzhin du mtha' mdo//
356a4(rgyud): ras ris gnyis pa ni de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa'i lha mo lcang lo can g.yog dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o//ras ris 'di la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rtog pa dang sbyar nas
356a5(rgyud): de bzhin du las thams cad nyi ma 'gyur du bya'o//rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rdzog so///de nas byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa rdo rje zhes
356a6(rgyud): bya ba stobs chen po'i spyod yul mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa mchog ces bya ba'i yi ge brgyad po don yong mi 'phrogs pa chos
356a7(rgyud): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs la ltos pa med pa 'di gsungaso//na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/a sa ha na mAM sa ma hUM/'di ni rig pa chen po'i mchog rgyal po'i rtse
356b1(rgyud): mo bla na med pa s+ho/'dus dngos grub gang tso yang rung dum grub pa med de/ na ma tho ba dang bcus pa ni ma yin no//sngar bstan pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/de bzhin
356b2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i snying po'i sum 'gyur du bya ba nyid do//r-is ris ni pad+ma la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis//yas log su byang chub sems dpa' mnyam
356b3(rgyud): pa nyid la gnas pa'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon log su gzhon nu ma lcang lo can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
356b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i steng na skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor ba mnyam par gzhag pa bri bar bya'o//rig pa mchog gi 'og tu mtha' med ces bya ba lag na rdo rje thogs pa sngo bsangs
356b5(rgyud): khros pa/'bor ba'i phreng bas bskor ba/khro gnyer bsdus pa mngag gzhug pa bgegs tshar gcong ba bri bar bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i 'og tu sgrub pa po'i/ras ris gnyis pa ni
356b6(rgyud): gzhon nu ma de lta bu nyid 'og tu mtha' med dang bcas pa'o//'dir yang yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho ga 'am/rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas snga ma bzhin du lis rnams sbyar bar bya'o//mi brjed pa
356b7(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rdzog so///de nas dam tshig rdo rje brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang gis sngags gsungs pa/na maHsan+do bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/hUM hUM/
357a1(rgyud): Asnam+b+ha s+thAm+b+haH'jug martar/ dz+ha / chog na nan+nato/sbyar basman pa'i rtog dang tshig rnams myur bar bya'o//dam tshigs /
357a2(rgyud): ces bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so//rdo rje ka mi ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin de bzhin du ting 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje rigs gnon nu ma mdzes ma zhes
357a3(rgyud): pa'i rig pa'i mchog 'di gsung so//nu maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/a tsa la sa ma ba ra/bi Sha ye hUM me hA badz+re gu te dz+ye/hrIM hU~M a sa ma ma hA/bi d+ho m+me d+ha me/ha hA sid+d+hi sit+te/ba ra aM ga d+he da
357a4(rgyud): rA ka/\u0f7fhe s+pha ra/dz+wA la nA ma swA hA/rdo rje rigs mdzes zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no//byang chung sems dpa'i kun nas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mAM snyoms par zhugs
357a5(rgyud): nas rig pa'i mchog 'di gsung so//nA maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi pa twA naM/oM badz+ra ma hA badz+ra/ma hA ba la sa ra bi nA dzI te/sa mas ma/khu ru khu ru/bi Sha mo d+ha rit+tA ri/sI ri sA ri d+ha
357a6(rgyud): swA hA/dpa' bo mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no//byang chub sems dpa' mi g.yong rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i mchog 'di gsus
357a7(rgyud): /rnamaHsa r+b+ba pra d+hA ma d+hisatwA nAM/a sa man+ta hA d+hi/oM tsal bar ma~M/bil ma ni/khe la bar/slet+te ma/hA sIn tan te/AHma/don te/migal ba mchog gi lus ni
357b1(rgyud): bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no//byang chub sems dpa' snying rje rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'dri gsung ma//nA maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha dzo d+his twA na/a mr-i ta amr-i ta/
357b2(rgyud): shi khi ne shi khi ne/sa ma te sa ma te/a sa me a sa me/gA ga ne gA ga ne/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/a sa he hUM dz+wa la dz+wa la swAhA/bdud rtsi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no//shin tu rol pardo
357b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gzhon nu ti 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mdzes pa mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 'di gsung so//na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/A ti A te/ba ra ba ra/di ri bi ri/

357b5(rgyud): de bzhini gshegs pa'i 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yi ge brgyad pa 'di gsungaso//na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/a nan+ta satwa maMg
357b6(rgyud): hUM/byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo'i stobs zhes bya ba stobs thams cad kyi rgyal po'i rtse mo'i stobs kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa
