358a1(rgyud): guN+DA/A kA ra tI ti tI ti/a pra bA lo a d+ha ye ti swA hA/byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo kun nas rdo rje zhes bya ba mchog gi yul la rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ti
358a2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i mchog 'di gsung po//na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/a tI a tI/sa ma sa ma/kI lI kau la/ba ra ba ra/sa ma ye ha sa ha sa/a sa te/tra yi tra yi/
358a3(rgyud): ga ga ne/ku ru ku ru/a dzI te swA hA/rab mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ye shes kyi sgo phyogs bcur
358a4(rgyud): spo bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho rnamasu ngo mtshar chen po dam pa rgya che ba du ma sna tshogs
358a5(rgyud): kyi ltas rab tu byung bar gyur te/de nas phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i yi ge bcu pa 'di byung zhing thos par gyur to//na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/
358a6(rgyud): ma hA badz+ra bi kran+ta a gra sa hUM/phyogs bcu'i 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa mchog yino//byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya bas rig pa'i mchog gsungs
358a7(rgyud): pa/na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi saM tA naM/Ar+ya grA te dzA la dzA la swA hA/spyan gsum zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog rtse mo bla na med pa'i yul can no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun nas
358b1(rgyud): blugs pazlas byu ba'i yi gro lta ba'i rig pa'i mchog byung ngo //nu maHsa rban+ta d+hA ba d+hAs twAn/mahA trA lar+b+bA/donas rdo rje 'chang khyod rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlas
358b2(rgyud): nas lag na rdo rjes yang rdo rje de nyid byin gyis brlabs pa/na maHsarbaM bid+d+he bo d+hi satwA naM/ma hA tsan+ta hUM/gsang ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog go/'phags pa rdo rje rjes rang
358b3(rgyud): rig pa'i mchog smras pa/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/a badz+ra hUM/yi ge bzhi pa rig pa'i mchog zhal bzhi pa zhes bya ba'o//khro bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang gzi brjid stobs zhes
358b4(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rig pa mchog gsungs pa/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/A gra te dzo drA la hUM/rak+Sha rak+Sha/dr-i ma da ma/dz+wA la nu ma hA/ha ra he ra~M/gi dA
358b5(rgyud): te ra ta ra/na r+ya na ra/ka ra ka re/haM haM/oM mo g+ne/ya pra ti d+yata/u mr-i tA ba la/dz+wA l-i dz+wA la swA/gzi brjod kyi stongs shes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog yin te/gtum po sbyang
358b6(rgyud): 'chang ba po gsod par byed pa/sgrub par byed pa/thogs pa med pa/don yod pa ste/las mtha' yas pa sngar bstan pa'i cho ga 'dis sgrub par byed do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying ngo'i chog
359a1(rgyud): gsum 'gyur du sbyar bar bya'o//rig pa mchog 'di dag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul las byung ba bsam byas mi khyad pa/mtha' yas pa/mtha' med pa/sems/
359a2(rgyud): can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/sngar bstan pa'i cho ga'i rim pa 'di la sbyar bar bya'o//skye ba 'di nyid la tshe dpag tu med pa thob par 'dod pa dang /dpag tu med pa'i bde ba longs
359a3(rgyud): spyod par 'dod pa dang /'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'jug par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par 'dod pa dang /mthong bar 'dod pas som
359a4(rgyud): nyo spangs nas dad cing rtog pa dang ldan pas 'phrogs pa med pa don yod pa 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro//'dis ni ras ris med kyang rung /ma bsgrubs kyang rung /mchod pa med pas kyang rung //
359a5(rgyud): khrus la sogs pa gtsang sbra kun spyod med kyang rung /sha dang nya sha ma spangs kyang rung /bsod nams dang ldan yang rung /bsod nams dang mi ldan yang rung /'dis 'grub par 'gyuraro//
359a6(rgyud): tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung /tshul khrims dang mi ldan yang rung /dman pa 'am dman pa ma yin pa yang rung /mkhas pa 'am mkhas pa ma yin pa yang rung /thabs dang ldan
359a7(rgyud): yang rung /thabs dang mi ldan yang nges par 'grub par 'gyuraro//dad pa med pa dang /byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa ni ma gtog so//de nas rig pa mchog 'di'i cho ga yang
359b1(rgyud): sngar bstan pa'i rtog pa rnams kyi cho ga dang thun mongs yin no//khyad par gyi chog phyogs cu ma zhig bsdus nas brjod par bya'o//rig pa'i mchog rig pa chen po'i rgyal po rna mo 'di ni rang
359b2(rgyud): bzhin gyis grub pa/bklags pas grub pa/bzlas pa tsam gyis 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa grub par byed pa 'di sems can gyi khams rnams rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dmigs pa sngon du
359b3(rgyud): 'gro bas bzlas pa byas na srung ba dang /dkyil 'khor dang /bcing ba dang /brdeg pa dang /dbab pa dang /rengs par bya ba dang /bskrad par bya ba dang /dgug pa dang /gdug pa char bcad pa dang /
359b4(rgyud): sreg pa dang /btso pa dang /mthu bstan pa dang /lha dang klu la sogs pa dgug pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /don bsgrub par bya ba dang /rgyal po dang rgyal po'i bu mo dgug cing sgrub pa dang /
359b5(rgyud): bsnyen pa 'phel bar bya ba dang /nad rnam par bsal bar bya ba dang /klu dang gi nod sbyin la sogs pa dbang du byung ba la sogs pa las rab 'brams sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis mngangon sum du sbyar
359b6(rgyud): bar bya'o//las gang dang gang /sbyin sreg gang dang gang gis de dang de 'grub pa'i thabs gang yin pa de thabs de de bzhin du las kyi cho gas bya'o//ji ltar nus pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed la
359b7(rgyud): mi'i lus na gdul dka' ba yin zhes smad nas ri'i gseb du zhugs te/sdig pa dus gsum du bshags pa dang /bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /yongasu bsngo ba byas nas nus
360a1(rgyud): pa dang mthun par ji srid mtshan mu drung gi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//de nas zla ba nyung ba la 'khor lo dang /ral gri dang /gser dang /dngul dang /zangs las byas pa
360a2(rgyud): 'am/lcags rin po che las byas pa 'am/ta la'i lo ma las byas pa yang rung /ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas pa'am/sngags gang yang rung bas srung ba byas te/ji srid 'bar bar
360a3(rgyud): gyur pa'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o//de nas gang la mtshon gyis brgyab pa de yang 'khor dang bcas par rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de ltar 'khor lo la sogs pa ji lta ba de
360a4(rgyud): bzhin du mtshon cha thams cad la yang ngo //thun mong gi tsho gas pa bla 'am/ldong ros sam/lig bu mig la sogs pa rdzas thams cad la bsgrub par bya'o//'dir sbyor ba
360a5(rgyud): ni rnam pa gnyis te/thabs dang bcas pa dang /thabs dang bral ba'o//de la cho ga gang yang rung bas nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du gang yang rung ba zhig sems can gyi khams rnams li phan
360a6(rgyud): pa dang /bde ba 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cig ces yid la byas nas bzlas pa byas na myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyuraro//de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyur gyur cig ces
360a7(rgyud): yang dag par bsams la bzlas pa bya'o//de bzhin du sems can gyi khams dge ba la 'jug par gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa sems can rnams la phan pa'i sbyor ba byas la mos
360b1(rgyud): par byas nas bsgrub par bya ste/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs shing phyag 'tshal nas bzlas pa bya'o//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rnams don
360b2(rgyud): du gnyer ba la 'bod pas dmigs shing bzlas pa bya zhing sdig pa rnams bshags pa dang /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i don du gnyer ba'i phyir bzla ba dang /
360b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa don du gnyer bar dmigs nas bzla ba dang /stobs bcu pa'i ye shes kyi sa non par bya ba don du gnyer bar
360b4(rgyud): dmigs nas bzla ba dang /de dag la rje su yi rang bar byas nas gang yang rung ba'i rig pa mchog gis bsgrubs na myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyuraro//ri bo'i gseb tu 'bum bzlas pa byas na 'phags
360b5(rgyud): ba phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyuraro//gnyis kyis ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamaso//gsum gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang
360b6(rgyud): smra bar 'gyuraro//bzhis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsung thos par 'gyur//lhas ni gzungs rnams thob par 'gyuraro//drug gis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro//bdun gyis mngon par shes
360b7(rgyud): pi lnga rab tu thob par 'gyuraro//brgyad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par mchod par 'gyuraro//dgus ni mya ngan las 'das pa mngon par sgrub par byed do//bcus ni 'jig rten gyi khams
361a1(rgyud): rnams rgyu bar 'gyuraro//'di dag na thabs la mkhas pa'i bzlas pa'i cho ga ste/mtha' yas pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o//thangs la mi mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang brtson 'grus
361a2(rgyud): rab dang 'bring dang tha mas ji ltar bsnyen pa de ltar rab tu sbyar na nung gcig gis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te snga ma bzhi no//ri 'am phog gam khang pa'i phug la sogs pa dben zhing stong par me tog dri
361a3(rgyud): zhim po sil ma bkram pa dri zhim pa'i spos kyis bdugs pa'i sa phyogs 'ga' zhig tu nyi ma nub pa'i dus na skyil mo krung bcas nas/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thod la dmigs pas
361a4(rgyud): skyil mo krung ma gshig par gang yang rung ba'i rig pa'i mchog nam phyed dam nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas pa byas ni lus 'bar bar gyur nas/gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur/na mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
361a5(rgyud): thams cad du 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//gal te ma grub na bar du nub gcig ngal bsos la nub gsum pa la yang de bzhin du bya'o//yang nub gcig gis bar du chod pa'i nub lnga pa la ni
361a6(rgyud): dram pa'i chos spong ba yang nges par 'grub par 'gyur//srung ba'i cho ga byas nas 'bum bzlas te rdzas gang la bsgrubs pa de 'grub par 'gyuraro//lcags las byas pa'i 'khor lo 'am rdo rje dang /ral
361a7(rgyud): gri la sogs pa lag tu thogs nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas te/de nyid kyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//gal te 'bar bar ma gyur na ba lang gi lci ba'i nang du de bcug la gang yang
361b1(rgyud): rung ba jig par chag gis srung ba byas te bzhag/dur khrod du 'dug nas ji sred gnod sbyin du gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas la mya ngan ma shing shin par 'dug ste ji srid gnad sbyin ma byung bar gyu
361b2(rgyud): bar du bzlas par bya'o//'ongs nas ci zhig bgyi zhes zer na/gang 'dod pa smras ni thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing 'khyud nas rang gi khyim du 'jug par 'gyuraro//blag shi'i shing gi rtsa bar me tog
361b3(rgyud): sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor la lha'i gzhon pa bris la/ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//ri'i gseb tu seng ge 'am/rta bris nas de nyid du 'dug ste/de
361b4(rgyud): srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//de bzhin du glang po che dang /ma he dang lug dang /rwa dang /ngang pa dang /rma bya la sogs pa bris nas me tog sil mas rgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor byas
361b5(rgyud): nas mtshan mo rangs pa bzlas par bya'o//gal te mtshan mo de la ma grub na yang bsgrub par bya ste/sangs rgyas rje su dran bzhin du lha chen po'i khang par zhugs nas ji srid lha chen po rang gi
361b6(rgyud): gzugs kyis 'ong bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o//de nas de nyid du nyal na 'ongs nas gang smras pa de byed par 'gyuraro//srid med kyi bu'i gzugs brnyan lag tu thags nas ji srid
361b7(rgyud): sred med kyi bu 'ong gi bar du bzlas pa byas na 'ongs nas gang smra ba de byed par 'gyur ro//lha gang gi khang par bzlas pa'i lha de zla ba phyed kyi nang du nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'am/yang na bskams
362a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//yar ngo'i brgyad dam bcu bani la ba byu drangs nas lha chen po'i byang phyogasu ku sha'i changs bu la nye bar 'dug nas/ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa
362a2(rgyud): bya na na de nas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba 'am/mi snang bar 'gyur ro//rnam thos kyi bu dris nas ji srid mdun du 'ongs nas mchog stsol bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//klu'i gnas mche'ur ji srid kyi
362a3(rgyud): rnams gyen du 'phags kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//gal te ldang bar ma gyur na phug ma'i me la lcags kyi snod dem zangs kyi snod til mar gyis bkang nas/ji srid khol bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa
362a4(rgyud): byas nas/der klu'i lcug mchi dang rang skyur gyis bskus nas bsregs na nges par ldang bar 'gyur ba 'am/dri ma can du 'gyuraro//'phags pa phyag na rdo'i sku gzugs la bltas nas ji srid smra ba
362a5(rgyud): dang /'gul ba dang /'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na de nas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro//ras ris kyi mdun du me tog gis mngon par rgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor byas nas ji srid
362a6(rgyud): du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje byon gyi bar du bzlas ni byin nas mgo la reg par 'gyur//reg pa tsam gyis lhung lo can du gnas nas gnod sbyin gyi gzugasu 'gyuraro//'phags pa phyag na rdo
362a7(rgyud): rje'i rdo rje blangs la ji srid mi snang bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//'bum bzlas pas las tha~Md byed par 'gyuraro//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi zhabs kyi
362b1(rgyud): mthob mo la bzung nas ji srid 'bar ba dang /'phro ba dang /khro ba ston gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/de nas bya ba thaMd byed par 'gyur zhing gzung bar yang 'gyuraro//'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta zhing ji srid
362b2(rgyud): 'bar bar 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ba 'am/rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//'phags pa kun tu bzang po la lta zhing ji srid dge ba la ngoms mi shes pa dang /'bebs pa dang /mngon par
362b3(rgyud): 'bar gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//rgyud 'dir sngags kyi spyod pa la zhugs pas/zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe zangs kyi snod du bar bzhag nas dri zhim po'i me tog gi dkyil 'khor byas te/bdug spos dri zhim pos
362b4(rgyud): bdugs la ji srid 'bar bar 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas po byas nas de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//zla ba dang nyi ma bzas bzung ba na lha chen po'i khang par zhugs nas ldong ros sam/mig sman nam/
362b5(rgyud): ba bla blangs nas a shwad tha'i 'dab ma'i bar du bcug nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas na des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba 'am/mi snang bar 'gyur ro//lha chen po'i steng du lag pa bzhag nas ji
362b6(rgyud): srid mi snang bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//dur khrod du gnas nas ji srid mi snang bar 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//dur khrod du dkyil 'khor byas nas lam phor ma bsregs pa kha sbyar thal bas
362b7(rgyud): bkang nas du ba byung gi bar du bzlas pa byas la de chu gsum byas nas mi sbyang bar 'gyu ro//byang chub sems dpa'i dgug pa dang /lha dang klu dbyug pa ni nub gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro//mdor bsdus na rig
363a1(rgyud): pa mchog 'di dag gis ni 'dod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa byed pa yino//yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho gas ji ltar bsgrubs pa de de ltar 'grub par 'gyu'o zhes mkhas pam btags la/
363a2(rgyud): 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas som nyi mi bya'o//de nas 'di'i thun mong gi ras ris bstan par bya ste/bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa'o//g.ya su ni 'phags pa phyag nardo
363a3(rgyud): rjerdo'o/lha mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ral pa dang bcas pa gser gyi mdog can thams cad rig pa'i mchog ces bya ba 'am/dri ma med par rnam par gnon pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba yong ru
363a4(rgyud): 'di lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'od kyi phreng ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste/brag la gnas pa'i d+ma'i sdong bu la bzhugs pa'o//lha mo'i 'og tu ni de bzhin du bgegs thams cad tshar gcod pa'i
363a5(rgyud): g.yog mo mtha' yas zhes bya ba bri ba'o//phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni sgrub pa po phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o//yang na ras ris ni ji ltar 'dod pa de lta bu bri bar bya ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
363a6(rgyud): rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku ni mtha' yas pa yin pa'i phyiraro//rtog pa dang ldan zhing thabs la mkhas pa rnams kyis ni ras ris kyi cho ga med pa'am/mchod pa
363a7(rgyud): med par yang 'grub bo//gsang sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rig pa mchog gi rgyal po bsdus pa'i le'u rab 'byams rdzog so//de nas gsang ba
363b1(rgyud): pa'i bdug po lag na rdo rje bstan pa de na yod pa'i dngos grub rab tu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul rgya mtsho na mkha'i spyan zhes
363b2(rgyud): bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo rtse mos gsol ba bta'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu rje su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/na mkha'i sku/
363b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo rtse mo mchog 'di sku thams cad las gsung so//na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/sar+b+ba tA thA ga tA nA~M/oM ga ga na lo tsa ne ga ga na sa ma/sar+b+ba thA a~M ga tA ti sa ra saM/
363b4(rgyud): badz+ra la na mo a mo g+ha nA~M swahA/lag na rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal me rtse mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par byung ba/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed
363b5(rgyud): pa'i yum mtha' yas pa thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa/sngags kyi spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la rab tu sbyor bar gnas pa'o//'di 'dzin par
363b6(rgyud): byed pa'i rigs kyi bu ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//bzlas pa nyid kyis yon tan mtha' yas pa mnyam pa med pa thob par
363b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro//sgrub pa byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyu ro//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sa la 'jug pa thob par 'gyuraro//rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i
364a1(rgyud): dngos grub rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin mi 'phrogs pa don yod pa 'dus tshogs chung ngus thob par 'gyuraro//de nas nga ni rig pa 'dzin pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur par rtog pa'i chag
364a2(rgyud): phyogs tsam zhig 'byung bar 'gyur//sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas tshes gcig nas brtsams nas/dang po re shig sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag
364a3(rgyud): nyid dbul bar bya'o//dbul ba'i tshig 'di brjod par bya ste/bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la bdag dbul bar bgyi'o//thugs //
364a4(rgyud): chen po dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyis dus thams cad du sdug bsngal ba bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/yongasu gzung du gsol/yongasu bskyab tu gsol zhes brjod do//de nas sdig pa
364a5(rgyud): bshags par bya ste/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyis thugs bskyed pa gang gis bshags pa'i sems bskyed pa des dus thams cad pa'i sdig pa thams cad bdag gis
364a6(rgyud): kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra nas kyi sa ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du bshags par bgyi'o zhes bya ba 'am/nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshags par bya'o//sems can thams cad la phan
364a7(rgyud): pa dang bde ba'i rgyur gyur pa sems can thaMd kyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
364b1(rgyud): tshogs rnams la rje su yi rang ste/ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mkhyen pa de bzhin du rje su yi rang zhes bya ba'am/nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du rje su yi rang bar bya'o//de nas/
364b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thad du gtogs pa na/bdag gi med pa yongasu 'dzin pa med pa thang dang chu las skyes pa'i rin po che'i ri dang rgya mtsho'i rin po che la sogs pas mchod pa'i thabs la
364b3(rgyud): goms par byas la/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la dbul zhing yongasu bsngo bar bya'o//de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor
364b4(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgya che zhing gya nom pa mchod pa'i sprin rab 'byams rnams bdag gi smon lam dang /bsod nams kyi stobs dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
364b5(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis so sor 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod la/de lta bu'i mchod pa chen po mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo
364b6(rgyud): 'di yang lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o//na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/sar+b+ba thA ung+ga te s+pha ra Na hi maM/ga ga na khaM sa man+ta ta swA hA/de nas gzhan ma yin par mchod pa rnams de bzhin du yang
364b7(rgyud): dag par 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yon tan bsngags pa rgya mtsho sgro gas pa'i dbyangs rab 'byams rnams kyis sems can gyi khams/
365a1(rgyud): thams cad dang /chos kyi dbyings su grags pa 'jug par gyur cig/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjesu 'jug par gyur cig/mdo sde'i
365a2(rgyud): tshul rab tu sgrogs par gyur cig ces bsams la/bstod pa dang bsngags pa bsgrub par byed pa/chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs par byed pa'i rig pa chen mo'i rgyal mo 'di yang
365a3(rgyud): /lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o//na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/sar+b+ba tA saM ku su mi tA/a b+hi dz+nyA na rA shi nA ni mo b+hU te dA hA/de nas de bzhin du gzhan ma yin bA ra bstong pa brjod pa dang /
365a4(rgyud): chos brjod pa'i dbyangs rnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du nges par gnas par 'gyuraro//'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad
365a5(rgyud): zhi bar byed pa/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba'i bsam gtan la ched du byed pa'i dmigs pa thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi mtshan mas brtags pa'i spyod
365a6(rgyud): lam ston cing /rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'byung ba chos kyi dbyingasu spros pas sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pas gnas pa dang /stobs bcu'i ye shes
365a7(rgyud): sa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa'i bar du gyur cig ces tshig tu brjod pa 'am/bsams la de lta bu'i sprul pa chen po mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen po 'di lan
365b1(rgyud): du rjod par bya'o//na maHsar+b+ba prad+hA dz+nyA satwAn/na mon+tat+te/sar+b+ba 'dras r+b+bas d+ha ts+tshar+b+bakAr/tiSh+Tha sar+b+batrAs (d+d+har+m+ma NA~M/at+toSh+Na ya swAH/de nas ltar mngon par bsgrubs
365b2(rgyud): dungag ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par 'gyur//rig pa 'di kun yang gong du rtsitsa ma 'dod pa'i gazlas pa byas ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa yang ngan par grub pa rnams la/sangs rgyas dang byang chu
365b3(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs par 'gyur ro//des de ltar sems can gyi don dang dgos pa bdag gi r-i byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub
365b4(rgyud): tu thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi sems can thams cad kyi don bsgrubs pa la rjes su yi rang zhing dmigs pa la goms par byas nas de bzhin
365b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba'am/dmigs pa la goms par byas te/'dir yang namakha'i spyan bzlas pa bya'o//yang na sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
365b6(rgyud): bya rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang /bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan rnams ji ltar rigs pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis
365b7(rgyud): rlob cing 'byung bar gyur cig ces dang po yid la byas la bzlas pa bya'o//yang na de bzhin gshegs pas bsdigs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi don 'byung ba'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig
366a1(rgyud): //ngan smom mas dang gshegs pa'i ya ga dang ldan par gyuras gyur//yang na dag pas 'byung ba dzu par
366a2(rgyud): gcepagyur//yA ni de zhin gshegs pa'i yo nas kyi bye bar gyur cig ces bya'o//ya na rnye se'an sa rmugs sa pa nams de ye shes kyi rgyags yings
366a3(rgyud): rdzogs pa 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa'i sku yong su rdzogs pa 'am/chos kyi 'khor lo chen po
366a4(rgyud): bskor ba'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa sems can thams cad kyis so sor thob par gyur cig ces bya ba'am/yang na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang yang dag par 'phrog
366a5(rgyud): shing /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub pa'am/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
366a6(rgyud): dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rnams rim gyis gnon pa'i phyir ram/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
366a7(rgyud): du 'jug pa 'am/gzungs dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par thar pa thams cad so sor thob pa'am/mchod pa chen pa'i sprin mngon par sgrub pa sprul pa'am/
366b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprin las chos kyi char gyi rgyun 'bab pa rab tu gnas par bya ba 'am/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyud mi bcad pa'am/rig 'dzin
366b2(rgyud): pa'i dpal thob par bya ba 'am/rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid rab tu thob pa yang sems can thams cad la 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod do//yang na bsam pa ji lta ba dang mos pa rje
366b3(rgyud): lta bzhin du 'am/sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba 'byung ba'i bsam pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pas bzlas pa bya'o//yang na bla na
366b4(rgyud): med pa'i dngos phrab thams cad bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can thams cad la 'thung bar gyur
366b5(rgyud): cig ces sam/ji ltar rigs par sems kyis bsams la bzlas pa bya'o//de ltar goms par bzlas pa byas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro//
366b6(rgyud): snron+da lam drang rjes su mthun pa dang /brtson 'grus dang rjes su mthun par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par phyogs shing 'jug na nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro//
366b7(rgyud): 'di dag ni rtag tu bye ba'i chog yin no//yang de so me nyi med po'i dod pas kyi lta nus pa'i tshogs kyi'o//de nas 'phags pa sdong po cigad pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi gleg bamam
367a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya che ba'i lug pa rgyub par byed pa'i mdo sde gadron par bya/mchod par bya bu 'am/thA nA phyag byas nas//kun na so ngal bar gyur na
367a2(rgyud): zas za na sngags 'das zas la lan brgya do mngon par bzlas par bya'o//na maHsar+b+bA bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/aM ba li ma~M de te dza~M mA li ni swA hA/de nas zas kyis dub pa bsal la phyi
367a3(rgyud): dro'i du su yang snga dro'i cho ga 'di nyid kyis bya'o//skyo bar gyur na snga gas bzlas par bya ste/ji sri ma skye ba'i bar du'o//de nas smon lam btabi nas ldang bar bya'o//langs nas zab cing
367a4(rgyud): rgya che ba'i mdo sde klog pa la sogs pa gzhan bya'o//nyal ba'i tshe yang lus thams cad btud pos sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bsam pa thag pas phyag
367a5(rgyud): byas la phye nas ji ltar 'dod par gnyid log par bya zhing /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol//'dras la dngos grub dang
367a6(rgyud): mchog sprul du gsol/gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzod du gsol zhes mkhas pas rtag tu bya'o//nyin re nyin ro 'di lta bu'i las zla ba gcig gi bar du bya'o//de nas
367a7(rgyud): zla ba nya la nyin zhag gcig sbyang bar 'dug nas ci 'byor pa'i mchad pa byas te/mchod rten nam/sku gzugs samA/ras ris la dben zhing stong pa'i sa phyogasu me tog sil ma
367b1(rgyud): bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pa la dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mdun du bzhag ste/spos dri zhim pos bdugs nas skyil mo krung bcas te/lcags kyi 'khor lo 'am/rdo rje 'am/ral gri blangs la
367b2(rgyud): ku sha dkram pa la 'dug nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya ste/nam phyed dam nyi ma shar ba'i du su 'bar bar 'gyuraro//'bar ba nA lhas chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/sa g.yas pa dang /
367b3(rgyud): gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ba'i ltas chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro//skad cig de la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'ching ba zhes bya ba'i 'od
367b4(rgyud): zer rab tu 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de nas rig pa 'dzin pa tha~Md 'khor dang bcas pa dang /rig pa 'dzin po'i bu mo grogs dang bcas pa dang /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen po 'khor dang
367b5(rgyud): bcas pas de dbang bskur bas thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang /lha thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /bsod nams ji ltar nye bar bsags pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu 'gro zhing
367b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa dang /sems can yong su smin par byed pa'i nus pa yang rab tu 'tho bo//lus de nyid ma dor bar byang chub sems dpa'i spod pa la
367b7(rgyud): rjesu 'jug pa rab tu 'thobo//stobs ji lta ba dang /snod ji lte ba bzhin du go rims kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams non par 'gyur/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du
368a1(rgyud): s+yA de kyis rngub par 'gyur//'ad dkun thabs la pa bas pa'i byang chub snyom sru ba sog pa pa'i gsang sngags kyi skor smang ba la zhugs pa ga
368a2(rgyud): pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i tshig yon//ri 'am/'bib chu'i 'grem mam+b+ha/mtsha'i glang mo//shing gcig gi drung ngam/kun dga' ba'am/dri gan pa'am/gtsug sa rlo
368a3(rgyud): gnas sam+b+ha/sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/sku gzugs kyi mdun du 'am/than gtsug lag khang ngami/khang po'am/nye bar spyad pa'i sku'ang rung stong zhing dpon
368a4(rgyud): par ras ris kyi mdun du bsgrub par bya'o//gal t+ne nus pa yid na ri lasogs pa stong zhing dben pa'i gnasu 'du 'dzirnam par spangs nas/than khyim mam/brang khang ngam
368a5(rgyud): nye bar spyad sa 'am/mdzod phrogs yong drud+ha/ji srid mi byung gi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//de nas snga ma bzhin du 'khor lo'am/rdo rje la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bas+thA
368a6(rgyud): par bya'o//'bum bzlas pa byas nas lcong ras sam/mig sman la sogs pa'i rig 'dzin thob par byed rdzas thams cad bsgrub par bya'o//dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las
368a7(rgyud): so cad bklags pas 'grub pa 'dir rigs ba tu zhugs pa'i bum phrag gsum bzlas ni de bzhin ga shegs pa mthang bar 'gyur//mthong nas ga zungs la sogs par
368b1(rgyud): tu thob par 'gyuraro//dben zhing stong pa'i ri la sogs par skyil mo krung gis 'dug la/skyil mo krung ma bshig par mtshan thog thag de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs nas bzlas na nas/
368b2(rgyud): phyed dam nyi ma 'char ba'i dus lus rab tu 'bar bar 'gyuraro//'bar bar gyur nas lus rjes nas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//lha'i gzhon pa bris nas de'i steng du 'dug ste mtshan rangs pa bzla
368b3(rgyud): na lha'i gzhon pa rin po ches las grub par gyur nas na mkha' la gang 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyuraro//rigs pa 'di ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa yin pas/mngon du bsnyen pa ma byas pas
368b4(rgyud): kyang cho ga bzhin du bya'o//ji skad gsungs pa'i rig pa mchog gi tshogs kyang bya ba 'am thabs dang mi ldan pas ni ji ltar 'dod pa 'am/mos pa ji lta ba bzhin las kyis bsgrub par
368b5(rgyud): bya'o//rtog pa 'di tshogs yid la gang 'dod pa ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o//yang na ras ris sgrub par 'dod na ras ris de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad ma'i gdan la bzhug
368b6(rgyud): po bri bar bya'o//ga ya su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa thal mo sbyar ba 'od kyis bskor bar bri bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yon du na mkha'i skyen
368b7(rgyud): gser gyi mngag can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ral pa dang bcas pa/thal mo sbyar ba byas pa/pad ma'i gdan la gzhugs pa 'od kyi phreng ba can bri bar bya'o//de'i 'og tu/
369a1(rgyud): b+h+ya/khrus pa gnag ning ltung ba/ral pa gcig yod pa/'jigs pa chen mo zhes bya ba gzhon nu ma la//bag+sa yas kyis dzo 'dzin cing 'byung ba/na pa
369a2(rgyud): phreng ba can brag la bzhugs pa 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/rdur smrig bgros pa/mig cung dad dmar ba/dgegs tshar gcod pa bri bar bya'o//'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni
369a3(rgyud): sgrub pa po phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o//ras ris 'di la rtog pa 'di'i cho ga rnams bya ba 'am/ji ltar 'dod pas bya'o//ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo 'jigs par byed pa'i grogs
369a4(rgyud): deng bcas pa/ral ba thur la 'phyang ba/lus 'od kyi phreng ba cano//de lta bu la yang 'dir sngar g+hi tshig rnams sbyar bar bya'o//thabs dang ldan nam thabs dang mi ldan yang
369a5(rgyud): rung /na mkha'i spyan 'di ni don yod pa yin te/bsod nams dang ldan nam/bsod nams dang mi ldan yang rung zhes rgya cher sbyar zhing gang gis kyang nges par 'grub par 'gyur

372b1(rgyud): sI agrA yo ka nA ma/a tsa lA ma hA ba la a pro nA ma/dzA la dzA la/d+hu na d+hA na ShA NA dza ga ta/g+ha tAp+tA ta/bi sha yan na mo D+haM A pra ti ha to b+h+yaHswA hA//btsug tor dri ma med pa'i gtsug/

372'b7(rgyud): gzhan ma yin par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis yang dag par gnas par 'gyur zhing de dag la phan pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhes dad par yang

373a4(rgyud): mo krung ma gshig par de bzhin gshegs pa rjesu dran pas me tog dri zhim po bkram pa'i dkyi la 'khor la bzhugs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du mtshan thog

373b1(rgyud): pa dbang du bya ba la ni mar gyi dkyil 'khor gyis//bud med dbang du bya ba lnga ni pri yang ku'i me tog sbrang rjes byugos pas bsreg par bya'o//the tsom dang bral bas ji ltar 'dod pas nges par/
373b2(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ste/thun mong gi sbyor ba yino//'di'i ras ris kyi cho ga ni bcom ldan 'das gsor gyi mdog can skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/spyi gtsug nas byung ba'i 'od zer rgyu
373b3(rgyud): stestong du 'od zer gyis phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor can bri bar bya'o//g.ya su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba pade ma la bzhugs pa 'od kyi phreng ba can//bac+doMs
373b4(rgyud): kyi g.yon du ni ku mu da'i mdog can sgros dmar ba/log pa dang rkang pa dmar ba/rol pa dang bcas pa/rgyun dang bral ba/thal mo sbyar ba byas pa/pad ma dmar po'i gdan
