374a1(rgyud): par phye ba'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i skye gtsug nas kun nas ro pA yangs shing rgya che ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sngags 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to//
374a2(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba byAd+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA~M/oM shI khA An+d+ha/a gra a gr-i swA hU~M/na mAH/sir+b+ba dud+d+ha bo d+hi sA twA nAM/oM ma la a gra ma yi nA mostA a grA tsen un+d+ri shrI khI nI swAhA/na maH
374a3(rgyud): sar+b+ba byAd+d+ha ba d+hi si twA nAM/a mri te A d+ha ra bi shr-i ya/a gra d+har+m+ma te/na mas+t+ri d+d+hi/s+t+r-i d+hi ma hA bi ri swA hAM/na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/tri sA mA yA bi sha yaM/tri shA khyA A
374a4(rgyud): gra tA po gi ni/e nut+ta ra a gra ud+d+ha ri ma hA shi khi swAhA/na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/a gra ut+ta ra a gri bi sha ye nA maM swA hA/spri gtsug 'di dag thams cad ni de bzhin
374a5(rgyud): gshegs pa dang kun tu mnyam pa/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi zhing du gyur pa/sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyang bar byed pa bsgrub par bya'o//sngags
374a6(rgyud): chen po'i bla na med pa'i yon tan la yang dad par byas nas bsgrubs na las thams cad de bzhin du byed par 'gyuraro//ras ris kyi khyad par ni lha mo gser gyi mdog can rgyun dang
374a7(rgyud): bral ba'i ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o//'og tu spyi gtsug gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i gzhonu ma lag pa g.yon pa na zhags pa/g.yas kyis rdo rje 'phyar ba/khros pa//
374b1(rgyud): ral pa gcig yod pa/gnag cing ldang ba/mig dmar ba/de bzhin du rin po che'i brag la gnas pa bgags char gcod pa bri bar bya'o//spyi gtsug rab 'bum gyi rim par
374b2(rgyud): phye ba'o///de nas yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gyi sprul pa zhes bya ba kun nas ma lus pa'i 'od zer gyi mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab 'byam
374b3(rgyud): lo lta zhing sngags 'di smras//namAHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bod+d+hi saud+d+hA nA~M/a te dze sa ma sA ma?/dze ni/dz+wA la ye dz+wA la ya dz+wA lam hA beg+na a su k+She te/d+hA mo d+hu mA/bi d+ha mA br-i d+d+hama?/
374b4(rgyud): muts+tsha ti sar+b+ba thA prA baM s+yA nA~M//rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i spyod yul can zhes bya ba yin no//nI maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nA~M/tI hI tI hI/shi ri shi ri/
374b5(rgyud): d+ha ma d+ha ma/bi ma le/d+hu na d+hu na/sa ma ta da tu ta/nA mAstaM tsan+na nAM s+pha ra s+phA ra dzI la na a ma le swA hA/rig pa mchog dri ma med pa 'bar ba zhes bye ba ya ni no//na maHsar+b+ba/
374b6(rgyud): bud+d+he bo d+hi sa twA nAM/a taM sha ya/shri te dza mA la a gra sa ma yaM/a gri NI le/u la a/be shI nI be shI nI/ti ra ti rA/a sa hwe a sa he/sa ma sa ma/bAr/
374b7(rgyud): toswA hU~M//rig pa mchog gzi brjid rtse mo rmed du byung ba zhes bya ba yin//na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+ha satwA nI/hrItI trI/sha ni sha ni/to dze te dze/ta ra ta ra/a gr-i
375a1(rgyud): la yan pa sa/d+ha/Am la~M thAsta/'dzinadon gas m+WA bA d+h+ye /sa b+h+ya//nAmaHsa rbAd+ha ts+tsha na/sa /
375a2(rgyud): /kA a m+b+haSh+Ta/dz+ha la sa mAn+ta//d+hArad+na/nA ma swAhA/snrem rnaMs mi lcib pa 'byor 'akun tu mtshugs pa zhes bya ba'o//da ni bsam gyi
375a3(rgyud): byub ba'i rgyal pa'i tsa mo'i sgrub pa'i zlabs k+Sha lAs 'byung ba 'gyur te/dI srid du nyi mu'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'ang bar 'angs nas spyi bor ba bsta nas yid la gang 'ad
375a4(rgyud): bso sam sa nan ca gyi bad b+hair gyi khyi la bar gyis rgyan pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//thams cad ngadu rtags pa med pa 'gyu ba 'dis las rnam
375a5(rgyud): cad la snga ma bzhi nang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying de'i le'u cho ga 'am/yid la gang 'dod pas sam/rig pa mchog gi tshogs sam/rtog pa gzhan gyi tshogs
375a6(rgyud): kyang bsgrub par bya ba'o//don yod pa mi bzang po rma du byung ba 'dod par bya ba'i drangs grub brgyad yangs shing myi zad pa 'khrul pa med pa'o//gzi brjid rab 'byam
375a7(rgyud): rim par phye ba'o///de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i thig le zhes bya ba kun tu namakha'i spyod yul gyi stabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa
375b1(rgyud): zhugs nas sngags so smras//rnam sto pong+kAb sbyi nu/gan nub ma/nam m+b+ha ya AnarbaswAhA//nam/sar+b+ba bad+h+ra ba dz+dza s+'ut+kanA/oM mo la an+tan+ta/ma
375b2(rgyud): said+d+hisarbAHtAn+d+ra ma?/At+manAM/ min d+ha/anasagrunasaser+the bra ba d+d+his ti skyed do//a ba d+hAr+thad+hA/
375b3(rgyud): s+yA de as sa ye yaHd+hI N+yai ma~M sid+d+hi ma grib mad ma ni man+ta par rdzo sa~M kr-ib+ha ban+d+ha sams ma/oM sahUM/oMs ha/d+hA ya dz+nyA ya~M/d+hun d+hAn/A sa man+ta/
375b4(rgyud): ba sha ya/a ha ne a hA na/trAM shin trAM/saM ma ye mo ta gan+d+han+d+ra swA hA//spyod pa dkyil 'khor gsum dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo'i rtse mo yin//namaH
375b5(rgyud): sar+b+ba prad+d+ha byAdz+nyA satwAnA~M/a sam a sam+b+ha/as haM a rnaM tri sho d+ha ya/ar+tha hU~M oM kaM/se man ta/na mar+d+ha/ad+hiSh+ThA na a gra d+hArmA taM sAn+d+ha/rnam
375b6(rgyud): satwe bud+d+he ba d+hi swa dz+dzanI/a d+hi d+har a krad+harmAte/ha haHma hA gun tar/in+d+ran+ta sa man+ti yA tsa ra tsa ra/mehA ba laM swAhA//sngags kyi spyod pas bsgos pa yi//tsa mongs
375b7(rgyud): pa mtshig 'di na//gsungs pa gca bo thams cad kyis//me lus par na byin gyis rlob//sngar gyi cho ga rnams kyis 'di la sbyar bar byer//yid la gang 'dad pa'i
376a1(rgyud): sam/rtog pa gzhan gyi tshogs kyang sbyar bar bya'o//'dir khyad par ni ri la sogs pa dben zhing stong par slongs ma'i kha zas dang /dus gsum du//
376a2(rgyud): khrus dang gtsang sbra byed cing dben par lus yang bas bzlas pa la goms par bya ste/ji srid du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur gyi bde
376a3(rgyud): du'o//rgya mtsho'i nang du zhugs nas ji srid mngon par shes pa lnga thob kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//kun tu rab 'bum b+hi rim par phye ba'o//de nas lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
376a4(rgyud): popa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis dkyil 'khor chen po'i bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting 'dzin rab 'byam gyi spyod yul la rnam par lta zhing dkyil
376a5(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i bkod pa dang ldan pa 'di smra so//de la dam tshigs gsum zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'di ltar 'byung ste/mo nges pa'i sems can gyi khams
376a6(rgyud): yongasu skyob pa'i phyag rgya bcingase la shin tu rgya che zhing rmad du byung ba 'dra ba med pa/bla na med pa/'phags pa'i spyod yul de'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni 'di yino//de
376a7(rgyud): kha ni re shig dang por gzhan dag mos pa bskyed par bya zhing byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi phyir gsol ba gdab pa 'am/bdag nyid nges par sbyor bar 'dod pas
376b1(rgyud): byer b+hU khyer bar sngags 'dusan bar+b+ha bAH sa ts+tsha nga /song srong nga byas na sa la nganam la ba ga tsadang ma ba rnams pasag par bya'o//
376b2(rgyud): sar+b+ba d+d+ha ba~M d+d+hi swAdz+nyAn/s+yA man+ta bAng+ge/sa \u0f7fme/ mdzu t+t+ya hU~M k+sha bA/sid+hatrA shAn d+ha prA thA mA T+Ta mA nu rba/de nas ches bcwo lnga'am/btsugasam 'aM
376b3(rgyud): dben pa'i sa phyogs dkyil 'khor bri ba d+ya ste/tshon ni rtswa'i bye mas sam/dri yis bskyes rdo rjebair gyi sa myong rung /tshan gzhan yang rung /tha na thal bas kyang thi
376b4(rgyud): bar bya'o//gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang ldan po'i lha rdzas ts+tshed kyil 'khor khru lnga pa nas dzin ma 'dod pa'i bar sngags 'di 'bros shing bri bar bya'o//namaH sar+b+ba prad+d+ha ba d+hi sa twA nA~M
376b5(rgyud): a mo la a ma la~M/hA rak+ta a nan+ta/sa sa ta sar+b+ba d+hen+ta a shaM nA d+hISh+Ti bair dam mngon+da/ataying rid re a g+ha samasad+d+hata.a nan te/ta rje me badz+ra bAdAM A rar/as
376b6(rgyud): s+yAs m+b+ha/sa mAm+b+ha n+d+ha/d+hArmAr+b+huSh+ma/(/ya T+Te dz+haM/ sam sa/as ma 9/k+Sha ka/ma a da~M ka taNaH/brje ma ka m+bed+d+ha d+hu /
376b7(rgyud): rgyus ngas/ rje/ sa sa/ ru rnasasu sa /tshu sa/ na
377a1(rgyud): mo nA mo 'dri rtsa ba'i rig pa yin//'dri bzung ba tsam mam/bzlas pa tsam gyis rtog pa thams cad kyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur//rig sngags
377a2(rgyud): dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po 'di/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du stong bzlas na gsang sngags thams cad bzlas pa 'bum byas par 'gyur ro//las gzhan thams
377a3(rgyud): cad kyang don yod pa thogs pa med pa 'dis byed par 'gyur ro//sngags 'di brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi nub kyi sgor bri bar bya'o//de nas dkyil 'khor las khru do tsam gyi phyi rol
377a4(rgyud): byang gi sgo gnyis pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o//de'i nang gi dkyil 'khor la phyag rgya 'byung bar 'gyur te/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gong shar phyogasu gru gsum gyi
377a5(rgyud): gzugs dang /gru bzhi pa'i phyag rgya pad+ma'i steng na gnas pa bri bar bya'o//zla ba dang nyi ma ni dkyil du'o//de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngags ni 'di yin te/na maH
377a6(rgyud): sar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twanAM/sar+b+ba thA sar+b+ba tra nA ke swA hA/zla ba dang nyi ma'i sngagaso//na maHsamAn+ta badz+dza d+h+waM/sa mA sa ma/ma hUM/ne maHsa man+ta badz+radz+dza/a
377a7(rgyud): sa ha hAM maM/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.ya su byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya bri bar bya ste/yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chu ngu la gnas
377b1(rgyud): pa'o//de nas byung chub sems dpa'i sngags ni 'di yin to/na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/mad+hu ka ru Na/a t+yo ma Na le swA hA/yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang /
377b2(rgyud): 'khor chu ngu la gnas pa'o//de'i rig pa ni 'di yin//nA myaHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/badz+ra ran+da a ma la swA hA/ral gri'i phyag rgya dang sngag sngo//na maHsaur+b+ba bud+d+ha /
377b3(rgyud): d+hi satwA nAM/ma hA badz+ro dA re dA ra ya tA nA/de nas de'i rjes thogs la de ma tshig rdo rje'i mdung dkyil 'khor chu nga gnas pa'o//de'i rig pa ni 'a di yino//na maHsir+b+bA
377b4(rgyud): bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/man+ti bI rA a tsa l-i/skyur dz+wa la na hU~M/mdung gi phyag rgya dang sngags//nA mAHsar+b+ba bud+d+he bo d+hi sa twA nAM/d+hA ma d+hA ma badz+rod b+hA ba~MH/byang shar mtsham+ba
377b5(rgyud): su rdo rje'i phreng ba dang /rdo rje'i phreng ba dkyil 'khor chu la gnas pa'o//de'i rig pa ni 'di yino//nA maHsAr+b+ba bud+d+ha tsad+hi saM twA nAM/badz+ra mI lA m+bA lA/Ar+tha laM
377b6(rgyud): ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/man dzA s+t+rai s+phA Ta/na maHsa man+ta badz+ra tI/tri gu Ne ba ra ba ra swA hA//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i g.yon phyogasu dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag
378a1(rgyud): rgyu dkyil 'thor chu ngul gnas pa'o//de'i sngags ni 'di yin no//na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/sa man ma d+hA a mAM lAM gu na a tsa la ban//
378a2(rgyud): d+ha ka nu mastu ste/twAR+shat+tA rA/ku ru ku ru/d+h+ya ma d+ham/d+hu nad+hA nA/ga ge ga/ha ha he/tra ya tra ya/dzA la dz+wA la/swAh+na/ni maHsu man+ta ba dzASh+TaM/madz+nyA ba le dz+wa la swA hA/
378a3(rgyud): de'i rjes thogs laM rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chung la gnas pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o//de la sngags ni 'di yin//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ma
378a4(rgyud): badz+ra A nan+ta ta//ba lA sa ma ye/dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang sngagaso//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/mahA badz+ra a nan+ta te dzA sA d+ha ya hUM/de'i rjes thogs rdo
378a5(rgyud): rje'i rigs thams cad ces bya ba'i lce gas rgyu'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor chu ngul gnas pa'o//de la bsdigs ni 'di yin//na maHsaM man+te badz+rat+taM/ma hA dad+d+ha a
378a6(rgyud): nan+ta te dzA sA d+ha ya hUM/ka la ka la/sa man+ta/a nAn+ta/bi shwA ya ad+b+ha d+hA/d+harma te dzA lA na mA swas+t+r-i d+ha ni d+hA ni/ha na tA na/ma hA bi ka mAM swAny+tsau/lcags kyu'i
378a7(rgyud): phyag rgya dang sngags//na maHsaM man+ta badz+dziSh+Ti/ma hA de hwA a rat+na me/oM na yaM/a tAM gr-ih+Na s+'un+d+he/g+ho shar mchim su rdo rje'i rdo rje lta bu'o//de'i sngags ni/
378b1(rgyud): //nam na // tshul /smra na/rmA/ gyu kA mun du//do / smrags//nAm
378b2(rgyud): // hU~Ms maldan ngas hU~M thub pa'i rgyu N+DI na pa bye ma lagan skyed 'ang da /cha
378b3(rgyud): bris na gnas par//de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags//ni maHsar+b+ba prad+d+ha be d+d+hi sitwAnA~M/a mA lo oM ma laM/bim la A na n+ya ga n+d+ha ra~M ya na ma stu t+te/man+ta
378b4(rgyud): na no/ta rat+yA ra/d+ha ra d+ha ra/anan+tata//A sa~M mA ni A~M sA mA naM/a ra ri mi tA ba~M krAn+te/ma hA bin+da N+Da nuN+Da ru swAt+su/chos gos hU~M phyag rgyu dang sngagaso//na maH
378b5(rgyud): man+ta bad+hUNAM/ can mA lA~MswA hA//lhung bad kyi phyag rgya'o//ni maHsa man+ta badz+rA trA~M/br-iSh+Ti bi thA/d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/pi d+h+waM mahA ba laM swAhU~M/no maHsa mAn+ta b+hadz+radz+dza/d+hA ra
378b6(rgyud): yad+d+hi mr-i/bad+had+yat+tam+me hU~M/tsam ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyog su longs spyod rdo de'i dring 'gro'i phyug r+b+he ky-i yul dri chung la gnas pa'o//de'i sngags ni 'di yino//nA maH
378b7(rgyud): ma thas pani ts+tsha tsu d+hI/ ldan ///des man rje ma pa gyu/
379a1(rgyud): ts+tshag phyag rgyu kyil la bar tshudul gnas pa'o//de la sngags na 'din to/na maHsa man+ta badza/mthun ya d+har+N+Na/d+ha yA \u0f7f/s+'urbA
379a2(rgyud): blu m+b+hi b+hU bAts+tsha d+ha b+hAb//nA ma~M/sa man+ta dz+nyAMtrAM/ /DUSh+T+r-i/ts+tshan+da/s+t+wa~M/ud+g+hatIHtatame yai tra kaka Ta/de'i rjes rdzogs
379a3(rgyud): rdorje dga' ba bo shing dkyil la khor rgyung la gnas pa //dwe l-I sngags nI 'di yin na//ni sam+b+han+te d+he d+h+ye/trA Ni/mahA Sh+Thal+yA/at+t+ra u sa?/d+hA ra su ta bu
379a4(rgyud): d+han+t+ra ma sId+d+har/astu swAhA/nA maHs+yA mun+ta badz+rA NA~M/tIt+ti yai oM kon+da n+d+he/bcom ldan 'das kyi ga yon du tA ri dang /mchod sbyin rdo rje ut+pa la'i steng rdo rdo rje'i phyag rgya gang
379a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chung la gnas pa'o//de'i rig pa ni 'di yin no//namaHsa man+ta badz+rA NI/bedz+ra a Ta ta sa hU~M na ma swA hA/phyege n+d+he'o//na r+m+maHsaM man+ta badz+rAt+taM/
379a6(rgyud): ba ra te ha hI d+h+ya ma bi kaM swAny+dza/de'i rjes la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma sil ma'i phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chu dul gnas pa'o//de'i sngags ni 'di yinA~M//
379a7(rgyud): namaHsaM man+ta badz+dziNI/bo ro tsa na mahA rotsa/tA rat+sA rA/ma hA tA rA/ho/di ma da ma/hUM dz+wA laM na phaT/na maHsa mar+d+ha badz+nyA NAM/A re Ar/ting ta raM/
379b1(rgyud): ro sa ma ya~M swA hA/de'i rjes thogs la gtum po rdo rje'i 'dir dpyangs gnyis dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor chung la gnas pa'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra dz+dza/na ma sh+tsaN+Tha A
379b2(rgyud): ka hUM badz+ra na la hUM phaT/phyag rgya'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA trU~M/g+hu TA na hAM Te ka phaT/lho nub kyi mtsham su rol pa rdo rje'i rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o/
379b3(rgyud): de'i rig pa ni 'od yin te/na maHsa man+ta badz+nyA tAM/khe li khaM la/le lI t+taM/kA rA prA po sha ya prA de sha ya/dan+d+ha ya ban+ta ya/hUM hUM t+sA TA tA nra/phyag rgya'i'o//na mamAHsa man+taH
379b4(rgyud): NAM/tri grA Na mahA badz+ra sa ma haM ban+d+ha hUM phaT/nub phyogs kyi sgo'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas par rdo rje 'khyil pa'i mtshan ma'o//sgo'i g.ya su rdo rje rgya chen gyi 'khor lo dang
379b5(rgyud): bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chu ngu'o//de'i sngags ni 'di yin//na mAHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ma ho dAr badz+rA NAM/ha~M badz+ra dz+wa la ya ma la hUM hUM hUM/su ru su ru/tI ba la daM ku ru ku ru/na maH
379b6(rgyud): sa s+ya sU swA hA//'khor lo'i'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA dz+dza/traM traM ga ga tre ka ra hU~M/de'i rjes thog su rdo rje dpa' bo rdo rje dang dbyings dang bcas pa'i gdan dkyil 'khor chung /
379b7(rgyud): /du'o//de'i sngags ni 'di yin no//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nAM/ma hA kru da dA an+ta kaM dzA la hUM phaT tri/ba lA a She sha se mi swA hA//rdo rje ngar sbyangs kyi'o//na maHsa man+ta
380a1(rgyud): da t+t+ra/tra pa ta ko tr-i pA ta kot+kA shat+tha sha/badz+ra ba lA a gre maN+Da la ya/ta rat+na rA/d+ha ra d+ha rA/
380a2(rgyud): gaN+Da g+h+nadz+dza/be ra bar/d+hUdz+wa la nA ma s+yAH/phyag rgya'i sngog so//na maHswaman+ta bad+d+hAd+ha/bor ba la ni ba yin/ni tsa nI hrI swAhA/de'i rjes la sgo'i g.yen du rdo rje
380a3(rgyud): lag gi rtse mo gsum gyi phyag rgyu dkyil 'khor chu ngal gnas pa'o//de'i sngags ni 'di yin//na maHsA man+ta prad+d+he trAM/a tshwa n+dan/many+dzu shu la ai gra ba ni/
380a4(rgyud): hUM d+ha ma d+ha ma/d+hA ra d+hA ra/mahA badz+ra oM gA d+hA na hU~M phaT/rtse gsum gyi'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra d+h+waM/e hi ma hA tri shu le phaT/bin+ni ma hA lA phaT tsan+d+ra a swa dAka
380a5(rgyud): tiTa~M te TaM/hUM tra~M phaT/rdo rje yan lag gi phyug rgyu dang sngags//de'i rjes la sta re'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i gang ni dkyil 'khor chunga'o//de'i sngags ni 'di yin no//
380a6(rgyud): na maHsa man+te badz+ra dz+dza/ma hA baM bA/oM mA mA la o ga/da yad ya/hU~M sa dzI ya dzA ye na ma swAhA/phyag rgya'i sngag so//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra r+t+ti/anan+ta/
380b1(rgyud): rna lA bi kra me/tA rI tri ra/g+ho ra~M s+phu Ta ya hU~M phaT/de'i rjes la rdo rje zhal gyi rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor chu ngu dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o//de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/nam/
380b2(rgyud): sa man+ta badz+ra tAM/me hI tsiSh+Ta.a tsi le aH la hUM/nging+ge ut+ta ma?/bing+ga ut+tam/au daM ra u de ra/dzA la dzA lau/b+h+re dza b+haM dza/mdza badz+ra/a g+niSha a gISh+ra/khar+Ya
380b3(rgyud): khad hU~M phaT/nA maHsaM man+ta badz+rA d+h+waM/hUM bad+d+he Ats+tsha ta na~M/tri shi khi ni/tA nr-i tA n+tu/phI Ta phe~M Ta phaT/phyeg r+b+he'i sdug so//byang phyogs kyi char bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/
380b4(rgyud): gshegs pa don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya 'od zer 'gyed pa'i rnam pa pad+ma la gnas pa dbu su bri bar bya'o//de la bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags ni/na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi
380b5(rgyud): satwA NAM/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/taM pra ti ha to stu sid+d+hi dz+wA la dzA la/tri shi khi sa ma si ma/A sa me ta ma ta ma/e sa haM d+ha ma d+ha ma/na mo sA e mA laM b+h+yaHstA ra sA tA/'od kyi/
380b6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i sngags so//na maHs+ya man+ta badz+ri/tra ya trA ya/a mA la a h+ya hi/sar+b+bASh+Tasar+b+bathA/sar+b+ba mahi taM dzi mA le/tAM shi dzI nI/dzA la dz+wA la/a A a
380b7(rgyud): A/sa me d+hun swA hA//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yesu rdo rje shugs kyi dbang phyug gi ta re gdan kyil 'khor chu ngal gnas pa'o//de'i sngags ni 'dir no//na maH/
381a1(rgyud): /samAr+thAn du//rlod pa nad dan/ sh+loka g+sa ma/ sar+b+ba ste/rnos su /nAmyAn+ma s+yA mAn+tha s+yA/
381a2(rgyud): sems m+b+ha/bkAd+hA d+ha sa Sh+Ta/gas can /mje 'a gang maud kyil 'i bu gi //de sngags ni 'di yin du//
381a3(rgyud): wA /na sa de zung deng ldan pag+had+hA ni smye//de na gyur//nu dke na/m+me b+h+re Sh+TakA
381a4(rgyud): nI/oM l-ik+Sh+mahU~M phaT/nub byang mtsham srid rdo rol pa'i dge byed dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gang de dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'o//de'i sngags ni 'di yin na/
381a5(rgyud): t+yag bdu Sh+T+rI/sa ma ya hUM/bcom ni dzes kyig yon du rjeg byung rgyal gnas pa bzhig par gyu//de sngags ni 'du yi
381b1(rgyud): saman+ta dzAt+tha/as hwA da ya/sa /b+hUSh+Tar ta ra//min ma skun/dzanA'aM phyug rgya//dA maHsa mAn+ta dz+nyA/mAts+tsha d+hA/ r+sha/A pa?H
381b2(rgyud): /muM t+ta mai d+ha/a mo g+hA tad+b+ha kad+hA ke/mU m+me d+hA/dus mtha'i 'bar ba 'dra ba'i gdan dkyi la 'khor chu la gnas pa'i gtan shing gi phyog/rgyu dbang par bya//
381b3(rgyud): ni 'di yin//na maHsa man+ta badz+dzar+t+ti/ad+d+hi a tI swAh+ma/saM ba ra tA/an+ta ka hUM hUM U sa hU dzA la tAn+tha/mA rA mU rA/phaT phaT/gaN+Don shr-ing gi phyag rgyo'o//nam
381b4(rgyud): sa man+te badz+ra NAM/tA Ta tA Ta/g+hu TA g+huT+Ta/mi hA ba ri ba~M/grA ma a sa dri shatri nA tIn+da/de nas de'i rjes la dri me med pa'i rdo rje'i rdo rje myu gu'i phyag rgya gdan
381b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chu dang bcis pa'i//de'i sngags ni 'di yin//na maHsa man+ta bad+d+he NAM/ga ga nA gra ga nA/ku ru ku ru/ti ri ti ri/sa ma sa mAM/ba rA d+ha na ma/
381b6(rgyud): rdo rje dbyug gu'i phyag rgya'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/tA Ta trA Ta/hUM ka na ka nA/r-i re bI dzA yA/ti sa ti sa/bA laM ba la/khat+su kha t+tA/hUM mAM/dkyil 'a
381b7(rgyud): kyi bu su ni 'bar bas kun nas bskor ba'i dkyil du bri bar bya'o//de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/gang yang steng nas rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu gsungaso//
382a1(rgyud): na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/na maHsar+b+ba badz+ra gu la NAM/a sa mA sa mA/a d+hISh+Ta na a nan+ta/sa man+ta sa man+ta/ba lI ma hA badz+ra rA dza/sar+b+ba
382a2(rgyud): tra sa mA ba trA/be gi na dzA la dzA la/dzA lA pa ya aM nan+ta bI kra ma tra ga tra ga maM/a sa ha ma hA sa ma yo hUM ta ra ta ra/d+ha ra d+ha ra/hUM ma hA ma hA/su tsaN+DA su tsaN+DA/mA
382a3(rgyud): rA ya mA ra ya/sU ta ya swe ta ya/hU~M hUM hUM badz+ra d+ha ra aM glu hUM hUM/bi d+ha ra ya bi d+ha ra ya/hU~M tsan+d+ha ra an+ta ka pa tA ya swA hA//dam tshig rnaM mo'i rdo rje'i gzi brjid kyi dam/
382a4(rgyud): tshig ces bya ba'i rdo rje'o//ang ga'i sngags ni 'di yin//na maHsa man+ta badz+dzaN+DaM/tr-I lo tsa ni/e hI ba ra b+hA lA a gra/i hi sar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/a
382a5(rgyud): d+hiSh+ThA nA/a to she s+phA sha sA kA/ma hA ba re badz+ra hri ma hA sa hA/sa mA sam+ba/twa ra sU re/na mo stu te swAhA//rdo rje'i mtshan ma ni phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs kyi/
382a6(rgyud): sgor bri'o//rdo rje klu'i sbrul gyi phyag rgya dang /'dul byed kyi sog me lta bu'i phyag rgya ni 'gram gnyi su dgod par bya'o//de dag gi sngags ni 'di dag go/nA maHsa man+ta/
382a7(rgyud): kr-idz+dza trUM/na mo stu tA~M ga~M ga sa mo oM dza ba ra ti d+hA ri d+ho ra ba la da/Ad+d+hi ASh+TaM/bai gra pe ti ga~M/baM baM me tA na gau hU~M sU ra a gra phaT/rdo rje'i klu brang 'gro'i phyag rgya'o//
382b1(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta badz+rA d+hA/a ti biSh+ka a ti bo d+ha/tI la tI laM/ba la ba la/ba ra ba ra/ta Ti ta Ti/tA nA tA nA/da hAd ha/bin+ta bin+d+ha/tsAt+ya tsat+ta/ban+d+ha ban+d+ha phaT/'dul ba
382b2(rgyud): po'i'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/tsar+N+Na a hr-i sanan+ta ka hUM da ma ya phaT/sog le lta bu'o//na maHsaM men+ta badz+ra NAM/tA gi ni mat+ti ni a sa hA ba mAM/e gr-i trUM tAM/byang
382b3(rgyud): shar mtsham su rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor chu ngul gnas pa'i pi wang gi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o//de'i sngags ni 'di yin no//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ma hA yaMn+d+re ba ru Ni/
382b4(rgyud): sa ma sa ma/dz+wA la dzA la swAhA/pi baM gi phyag rgya'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra dz+dzi/tiM ni tI nI/ta nu ta nu/su g+ho Sha be ga/ha ri ha raM/a taM ha na haM na swAny+dza/lho sha raM mtshams
382b5(rgyud): su rdo rje mdangs kyi lcug ma gaM dan dkyil 'khor chu ngu la gnas pa dgod par bya'o//de'i rig pa ni 'di yin//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/mahA tsaN+DA ta ra le na mo sho b+hi ni te dzi/
382b6(rgyud): nr-i dzA la dzA la/si d+hI ha ra ha ra/bi raM swAhA/rdo rje lcug ma'i'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA tAM/tI li ti li/bi li bi li/be ke ng+ku ri ni/badz+ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/tr-I tAM bo d+ha
382b7(rgyud): de ni oM/lho nub mtshams rdo rje rgyal chen gyi dril bu'i phyag rgya dkyil 'khor chu ngul gnas pa dgod par bya'i//de'i sdug pa ni 'di yin//na maHsa man+ta badz+rAt+ta/
383a1(rgyud): tI d+hAn+tha/sa ma ya ba li ba ra ba rA/b+hI bI ra/rA Na ra//rUb ma/tsa ni swA hA/dril bu'i phyag rgya'o//namAHsam+ban+tha b+hUr+d+hatAM/rASh+Ta
383a2(rgyud): ra na dza/ti ra Na ti ra Na/raM r-I d+hAn+te swA hA/nub byang mtshamasu skyobs mchog gi shugs kyi phreng ba'i phyag rgya gdan dkyil 'khor chu ngu dang bcas pa'o//de'i rig pa ni 'di yin
383a3(rgyud): nA maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/tI shi ye ti shi yai/badz+re tI shri he ti shi he/tsi ri tsa raM/bi ri bi ri/tri pa tAM kre swA hA/phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/tri bA laM/
383a4(rgyud): nI/ba ra mA nA~M/mA li ni b+han+d+ha yaM/ba rI nI smA rA b+hI dzI bA ra A gr-i sa ma sa ma/ban+d+ha ban+d+he/ya d+ho ni swA hA/lhag ma bstun pa'i snam bu gcig lA ni sems dpa' chen/
383a5(rgyud): pa thams cad dgod par bya'o//phyogs bzhi'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhirani bum pa gang ba ste/nang dri zhim pa'i chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag par bya'o//
383a6(rgyud): 'dir yang sngar gsungs pa'i rdo rje rgyal mo las rab 'byams mtha' yas pa sgrub par byed pa la lan nyi shu rtsi gcig gi bar du yongasu bzlas par bya'o//na mauHsar+b+ba
383a7(rgyud): bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe nAM/ma hA sa man+ta badz+ra NAM/a sa mau sa ma sa man+ta/a nan+taM bi kra mA/ma hA badz+ra rA dz+nyA/a pra a gra e l+lo haM sa ma he sa ma ya/ma hA ba lA be
383b1(rgyud): gaN+Da/mahA dz+wa lan+d+ha la dz+wA la/mA mA mU/sar+b+ba thAb+hA rUbyUR+YA/sa mA sa mA/tra tratrat+tA/bA ra pa rA br-id+d+ha ut+ta ma a pra a p+pa/tsUts+tsha/dzA lA ya sad+d+ha mahA maH/sid+d+hi sid+d+hi a
383b2(rgyud): pra e gra d+ha nA hUM hUM/mAM phaT phaT/sar+b+ba thA ud+d+hi mi skr-i hUM/de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lan ba dun gyi bar du brjod la thal mo br-i rnga bAM pAr
383b3(rgyud): bya'o//phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po lan dun gyi bar du brjod la snga ma bzhin du thal mo yang brdab par bya'o//de la snying po ni 'di
383b4(rgyud): yin no//na maHtre yad+d+hi ka NAM/ta thA gau ta nAM/sar+b+ba tA a pra ti hatA/pAp+ti/d+har+m+ma tA ba lI nAM/aM a/sa ma sa ma/sa man+ta to//a nan+ta to//prA p+ti/shA sa/
383b5(rgyud): nihA ra ha ra/sma ra sma ra Na/bi gra ta rA ga/bud+d+he d+har+m+ma taM/sa ra sa ra sa ma ba laM/ha siM ha sa/ ya tra ya/ga ga na ma hA ba ra lak+Sha NAM/dz+wa la dz+wa la na sA ga re swAh+na/
383b6(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gau sh+laugs pa'i skying po'i//na mr-its+tshi sar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/ba ra ba ra/sarbaM sarbaM/sa ma sa ma/ka ru t+naM ka rU N+DaM/tA rI tA rAM/sA rI sA rA/aH
383b7(rgyud): atAM/a mA tAM/a mI tAM/a tAM/a tAM/b+hi r-i b+hai raM/a tI a tI/shu raM shu raM/ha ha ha ha/ma hA sa ma y+r-i/na mos+t+ri ai mi la/sid+d+hi da ya ke b+h+yAH
384a1(rgyud): sar+b+ba bad+h+ya ba~Md+hos twA n+to/sar+b+ba.An+ta/mad+h+ya b+hU mad+ha kA rASh+Ta/mA on+ta/rnaMs ma yo dz+wA lA swAhA/byang chub sems dpa'i snying po ste/'di dang 'dra ba gzhan med//
384a2(rgyud): nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi dbu suM dbus mo g.yas pa'i lteng sa l-i gtsugs nas lag par me tog blangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu len nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du brjod par
384a3(rgyud): de brjod pa tsam gyis rdo rje'i rigs thams cad nye bar lhags nas dga' ba la sogs pa'i ltas sam/gsal ba dam/sgra thos pa tsam/dri zhim po 'am/'od dam/ser bu'i//
384a4(rgyud): bsil ba'am/gzhon pa 'am/gzhan yang rung lhas cung zad zhig 'byung bar 'gyur//de la kun tu thogs pa med par grub pa rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa
384a5(rgyud): rnams kyi lcags kyu zhes bya ba ni 'di yin te/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs pa stobs kyi snying po'o//na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA na//
384a6(rgyud): sa~M man+ta u mr-i g+hA oM pra ti hi ta badz+rA Sh+TAM/a gra a gra/A koR+Sha Ni hUM/bi grI bi g+h+ri/mahA bi gI nI/sar+b+ba badz+ra ku lA nAM/A kaR+ShA ya hUM/sarba mu drA gaN+DinA
384a7(rgyud): taM/\u0f7fau/ai an+da br-istAM/a pra ti/e mo g+h+ra kr-i maM/sams maM/a ma ma mi/mnyam ti/s+yaig+h+ra pa khyau/sem ya meng/
384b1(rgyud): kA ru shra tri na ya ta tra ang+gi ni/A na ya shrI g+hi ta thA ga tAM ku shi swA hA//de nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas sngags 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o//na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tA
384b2(rgyud): nAM/sar+b+ba yud kA te s+pha ra Na hi mAM ge ga na kha~M a min+ta tAM swAhA/de nas sngags 'di sa gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu sbyin par bya'o//na maHsar+b+ba tid+ha
384b3(rgyud): tA nAM/ba la bya ti ba lI da swA hA//de nas snga ma ba'i zhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyog byas la gtsang sbra byas nas g.yas
384b4(rgyud): su me tog thogs te/gdo g.yogs pa gzhugs par bya'o//me tog dang bcos pa'i thal mo sbyar nas gcig gnyis gsum bzhi'am l-I yang gzhugs par bya zhing sdom pa
384b5(rgyud): 'di ltar gzung bar bya'o//de la dam tshig dang sdom pa blangs pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub semaso dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol/bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba
384b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag 'bul gyis thams cad du rab tu gzung du gsol/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bdag byin
384b7(rgyud): gyis brlabs tu gsol/thugs rnga chen po dang ldan pa sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu skyob par mdzad pa rnams kyis bdag yongasu bskyab tu gsol/las thaMd
385a1(rgyud): grub par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po bdag la stsal du gsol zhes de ltar lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o//de nas lan re re rna bar 'di brjod//
385a2(rgyud): par bya'o//nA mkha' mtha' yas dang mnyam rgyal dbang po//sras bcas ma lus kun gyi dam tshig gsol//'chi ba med cing bsad med sems can sgrub pa med//shin tu
385a3(rgyud): bstan pas 'di ltar bya ba nyid//de nas me tog 'phangs par bya'o//me tog gang la bab pa de ni de'i rigs kyi lha yi no//de nas gdong g.yogs dkrol la de bzhi gshegs
385a4(rgyud): pa la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan par bya'o//spyi bor mthe bong bzhag la gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya bya zhing sngags 'di brjod do//na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/tri shi khA a
385a5(rgyud): gri na na mo stus te/sa man+ti/a da sa man+ti a gri/ku Na atsa lA a gri d+ha ra mau/bI du nA hi kle shu duHkha dz+wa la na dza ga ta/sar+b+ba su khams dau d+ha hrI tsa shu tA tre d+haM/
385a6(rgyud): se ma ya ku ru swA hA//laM phyag rgya 'di 'chang bar byedapa de la gtsug gtor gyi mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bar du nyams par yang mi 'gyur la/yon tan mtha' yas//
385a7(rgyud): pa'i sgor 'jug pa yang rab tu thob par 'gyuraro//nges par rgal nas so sor spyod pa'i dam tshig 'di rnam par bstan par bya'o//yang yang 'ching mi 'gyur zhing /ngan 'gror
385b1(rgyud): mi 'gro 'tsho 'pho med//khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' yi//theg pa 'di la dam tshig bsrungs//dam pa'i chos kyang spang ma bya//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la/
385b2(rgyud): mi gus mi bya spang mi bya//srog chags bsad par mi bya zhing //bla ma la yang brnyas mi bya//sngags dang phyag rgya spang mi bya//nyams par mi bya bdag gi min//rdo rje 'dra ba bsgo
385b3(rgyud): mi bya//bza' bar mi bya ser sna min//'di spyod pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags kyi sgra'i spyod pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas tshul khrims dang ldan pa la mngon spyod mi bya'o//
385b4(rgyud): gnod pa byed pa la yang mi bya'o//sdig pa'i las kyang mi bya zhing //byis pa'i chos kyang mi bya'o//bla ma la ni lha bzhin bya//mdor na bdag dang gzhan dag la//gnod par
385b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba de mi bya//srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las//'dis ni nges par bda' bar byed//ston pa'i bstan pa bdud rtsi nyid//thugs rje chen po'i bstan pa las/slar
385b6(rgyud): yang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing //sdug bsngal mi 'gyur ngan 'gror min//myur du zhing por 'gyur ba min//'di ltar gsang sngags spyod pa yi//dam tshig 'di ni sang+yas rnam
385b7(rgyud): sras dang bcas pas khyod la gsungs//gang zhig rnam pa 'di lta bus//lus dang 'thun pa'i yon tan 'byung //dad med ngani 'gro po mi bya//sangs rgyas sras bcas yang//
386a1(rgyud): rnams kyi//smon lam la yang spyod par bya//kun rdzob tu ni mi ldog par//rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes pas mthong //ring du mi byed ches drag pas//
386a2(rgyud): sems can don du smon par byed //ces brjod la/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal ba de ni dam tshig gi thal mo zhes bya ba ste/
386a3(rgyud): rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin//na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM//stu sid+d+hi sA d+ha ni a gra ka ru Na/bA re d+ha/tA yi trA yi/A tI ba le na mo stu/ba rA d+ha yi/g+hi b+h+yo mahA kra pre b+h+ya sAM hA/
386a4(rgyud): 'di ni rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i sngags yino//phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bcings la bya ba 'am/de bzhin du gang yang rung ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o//ser sna dang /
386a5(rgyud): bral bas 'dir gang las dngos grub 'byung ba'i dam tshig la goms par byas nas/mdangs dang ldan pa 'dir dngos grub kyi dam tshig la zhugs nas myur du de bzhin ga
386a6(rgyud): pas bsngags pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyuraro//sems can thams cad la 'byung bar gyur cig ces bsams nas phyag rgya bcings nas sngags bzlas na/dngos
386a7(rgyud): grub brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs nas phyag byas la bzlas pa bya'i//'dir gnyis la bslab par mi/
386b1(rgyud): bya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag mi bya ba dang /sems can gcig gi don bsgrub par mi bya ba'o//gzhan du na ma lus pa la smos pa'i sems bskyed pa'i che ba la goms
386b2(rgyud): par bya'o//thams cad du gnyis po 'di dag spangs par bya ste/'gyod pa dang /zhum pa'i semaso//gzhan yang gnyis po 'di dag ni bya ba ste/sdig pa thams cad bshags pa
386b3(rgyud): dang /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs la rjesu yi rang ba rgyun mi bcad pa'o//'dir gnyis po 'di spang bar bya ste/bslab pa la mi 'byor pa dang /sgrub pa mi byed pa'o//'grub
386b4(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ba ni gnyis te/dad pa med pa dang /byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'o//srung bar bya ba'i dmi tshig ni gnyis te/dus ma yin par bya ba byed pa dang /brtag
386b5(rgyud): pa med pa'o//sngags kyi spyod pa la rjesu zhugs pa'i chos ni gnyis te/sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa bskyed pa dang //thams cad du dngos grub phun sum tshogs pa la gzhol
386b6(rgyud): ba'o//de nas 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi snying po rnams dang /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang /sngags rnams kyis rtog pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mar
386b7(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i gu gul gyi bdug spos kyis ni rims dang /gdon dang /'byung po dang /sha za rnams lo mi na ba dang na bas kyang rung ras ris dang /ri mo dang /sku gzugs/
387a1(rgyud): dang /shing dang /lo ma dang /ral gri dang /me long la sogs pa la 'bebs par byed//gang yang rung ba'i srung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis ni bcing ba dang /
387a2(rgyud): btsir ba dang /brdab pa dang /bstun pa dang /bsad pa dang /bcad pa dang /dbab pa dang /rnam par sbyong ba dang /sgrub pa dang /dgug pa dang /dbang du bya ba la sogs
387a3(rgyud): pa'i las thams cad bsgrub par bya ba ni bklags pas 'grub pa 'di nyid kyis byed par 'gyuraro//mchog sgrub pa la sogs pa las thams cad ni de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
387a4(rgyud): pa'i snying po'i rim par phye ba rab 'byam gyi cho ga 'am/rig ma mchog la sogs pa'i cho gas sbyar bar bya ba de dag kyang thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa 'dis kyang
387a5(rgyud): bya'o//'di dag gi thun mong gi ras ris 'byung bar 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni brog gi phug na pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa gser gyi mdag can 'od kyi
387a6(rgyud): phreng bas bskor bar bri bar bya'o//g.ya suM rdo rje 'dzin gang yang rung ba zhig rang gi mtshan mas phyag brel ba 'od kyis bskor ba'i pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o//
387a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o//bgegs rnams gsod pa'i g.yog pa mtha' yas gang ya
387b1(rgyud): rung ba gran gcing ldang ba/gzhon nu ral can/mig cung zhig dmar ba/khros pa/rin po che'i brag la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o//'og tu ni sgrub pa po//'dir yang rdo rje 'dzin gang yang rung
387b2(rgyud): ba'i snying po dang bsgrub par bya'o//de bzhin du sngar bstan pa'i cho ga 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i cho ga bzhin du rdo rje pa la
387b3(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsgrub par bya'o//grub par gyur na rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po'i sngags b+hA na med pa'i nor bu'i
387b4(rgyud): rgya mtsho thogs pa med pa don yod par grub par byed pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//rtog pa tha mas cad kyi tsho gas sam/yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho gas sbyar//de bzhin
387b5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i lcags kyung pe med pa dri bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi mdzod las yang dag par byung ba/snying po'i mthus kyang de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o//'dir ni bar/
387b6(rgyud): chang mi 'byung zhing //rmongs par mi 'gyur chags mi 'gyur//'dir ni sangs rgyas kun gyi nor//rtag tu byin gyis brlabasnga nas gnas/thun mong gi phyag rgya sgrub pa
387b7(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur//'di la phyag rgya gang yang rung ba rtsig ngos sam/ras sam/spang leb bam/le ma 'am/gtsang ma'i sa phyogasu tshon rtsi 'am/dris po gas pa'i
388a1(rgyud): /pir rAm+b+ha/tha na thal byas kyang rung //zlos la dro dang mA tog gos mchod pa byas te/bdag gis don 'di mdzad du gsol/bdag la mchog 'ang
388a2(rgyud): sbrul du gsol/bdag gi 'di sgrub du gsol//bdag gi dgos pa 'di dag gzhan du ma gyur cig ces yang dag par bsams na si phyag rgya'i sngags bzlas pa byas na/
388a3(rgyud): dgos pa 'grub par 'gyur ba 'am/hUM la sogs pa'am mi lus gas pa ngas dang ba byas zhes bya ba la sogs pa de dang de smra bar 'gyur//de lta byu'i dgas pa yang
388a4(rgyud): smra bar byed sbyin cigaH'om/rgyab cig ni 'am/tshad cig/sod cig/rgyas thob cig/tshor cog/phrug tsig+sa/skye /ces sam/sdig pa can/ga
388a5(rgyud): pa can/gnod pa byed pa'i lha dang /klu lnga sogs pa gzhom pa 'am/gang yang rung ba bsams la rang gi khrag gis bros te khros pas 'dug la bzlas pa byas na gang
388a6(rgyud): gdon du byas pa'o lta 'am/glu 'am/rig pa 'dzin pa'ang rung ste/nges par 'chi bar 'gyur//gang gi rgyu mchog sgrub par 'dod na des lcags las phyog ma
388a7(rgyud): rgyas zlas pa byas nas lag par bzung ste/gang yang rung bas dben par ji srid 'bar bar gyur bya bar rlosbungs na dri zla bo gcig gi nang du ma/
388b1(rgyud): gsum gyi nang du rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//gang gi tshe zas za ba na yang de lag pa nas ma bor bar bza'o//slong du 'gro na yang de bzhin du lag du thog la slong du 'gro bar bya'o//nyal/
388b2(rgyud): pa'i tshe yang srung ba byas nas snga su bzhag par bya'o//mi snang ba la sogs pa las thams cad kyang phyag rgya 'dis bsgrub par bya'o//byang chub sems dpas phyag rgya 'dis snyigs
388b3(rgyud): ma dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par sbyang ba'i bar du yang bya'o//thugs kyi bdag nyid sdig pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya 'di//kun/
388b4(rgyud): tu mchog rnams sras bcas pas//dpag myed ces bya'i sems can khams//rnam par sbyang phyir byin gyis brlabs//phyag rgya spyod pa'i rgyal sa ru//gtso bo gang zhe
388b5(rgyud): zhugs gyur pa//'bad pa chungs sems can don//dri yis ma bsams par yang byed//dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya chen mo'i rgyal mo 'di dag gis yang grangs med
388b6(rgyud): pa bcu'i nang na rtse mor gyur pa don sna tshogs sgrub pa yino//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra r+t+ti/hU tAM snga ma yaM/ku ru ku ru/taM taM/sa mya sa ma/A ma lI/tA rat+na rA/
388b7(rgyud): a gr-i Na swA hA//rtse mo zhes bya'i phyag rgya'i rgyal mo yin no//na maHsi man+te badz+ra rtA/tri ba laM a me li oM sa man+ta sa ti ni badz+re badz+nyA/ti mi ti mi/sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/
389a1(rgyud): kun+takrAr+tha/sams ma/sabat+to lAb+hUt+ta/a yAts+tsha/dz+wa lan m+b+ha sad+d+ha At+ma mAn+tas+saH//stobs mim+b+haSh+Tam+b+ha pa d+mopa byung b+ha ba n+d+ha'i N+Da na
389a2(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta badz+ra d+h+waM/hU~M smA tA ya sA ma yaM badz+nyA sa ma yo/ti Ti ti Ti/sar+b+bo tr-i shi khI/r-ik+Sha rak+She mAM pa re b+h+yAM/sA kaM lA tI swa ti ki/dz+wa la dz+wA la/ta tA pa ti yi/bi
389a3(rgyud): swA hA//kha dog med pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//na maHsa man+te badz+rASh+TaM/twe gi ni trAM gi ni/a tAM sa yi ni a tAM sa yi ni/tI ba rI NI tI ba rI Sh+Ti/tri ba ra tri ba ra/a/
389a4(rgyud): ma la hUM sid+d+han+ta sar+b+ba ut+ta ra tA tro d+h+r-i d+hU bi kr-i swA hA//gsum ldan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra ShAM/a ti ba ra badz+ra sa man+ti ni ts+tsha twAM bri te/ku ru ku ru/ta ra
389a5(rgyud): tar/NI tAr/A sa ma mo hA ba li si ma ye/d+hu na d+hA na/ha ra hA ra/a mr-i ti/swAhA/yan lag gi stobs zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgya la mo yin//na maHsa man+ta
389a6(rgyud): d+h+we/nr-ir+g+haMm+b+hamAny+dzu e t+tAShAnisan+na hrIT+Thi/kAnak+Sharbo/oMs hA ba la /na/yan lag ma
389a7(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba la gri'i phyag rgya'o//ni maHsa man+ta badz+rASh+TAM/a ma laM a ma laM/sa ma ye sa ma ye/a gr-i a gre/mo tsa nam tsa ni/a sa he a sa he/ti dzi ni badz+ri
389b1(rgyud): /A a ti/a grA mAdz+dza/mu ya myA ya/trI sa ma ya tAM sa mA ya/hUM dz+ha la A nAM s+yAhA/na maHsa man+ta badz+rA dz+nyo/ta ra ma ti ta rA ma tau/sA re sa ro/d+ho na d+ha ni/d+hi ni d+hi nI/tau ri mr-i/
389b2(rgyud): tri ri me/hUM baM shod+d+ha yaM bi she d+ha ya/sho b+ha ye sho b+ha ya/traM ba li ni ta ra oM gi ni a no ba me swAh+ma/kha deg gi stobs zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin//na maHsaM man+ta badz+rI NAM/a he a/
389b3(rgyud): he/oM tI a taM/tA ra mA/tA ra mA/tA ya tA ya/sa ma ye tA ta rI/sa ma le/na mo stu te a sA tri she b+hU swA hA//shin tung mtshar du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//nA maH
389b4(rgyud): sa man+ta badz+rA d+h+waM/hUM ba ra ba ra/hUM ba raM ba raM/bi ra daM bA ra de/tri ta yi/trita yi/sar+b+ba sar+b+bo/ta bi na yaM kir ti/ma hA ba la b+h+ya swA hAM//log 'dren gyi mchog ces bya bI byAH/
389b5(rgyud): rgyu'i rgyal mo'i rtse mi'o//bcu po 'di dag ni phyag rgya'i rgyal mo mnyam pa med pa/thams cad du thogs pa med pa ste/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
389b6(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskyed par mdzad pa zhes bya'o//phyag rgya'i sngags kyi bsgrub pa pos 'di la dad bas spyad par bya'o//phyag rgya'i rgyal gyi
389b7(rgyud): brtson 'grus chen mo mnyam pa med pa/thams cad dri mo med byin gyis 'arlangs pa med pa/'dod pa thams cad la der gtad pa/dngos por bsgrub par bya ste/don yod
390a1(rgyud): par rab tu grub par 'gyuraro//dam tshig gsum las dra bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po thogs pa med pa don yod pa grub pa/
390a2(rgyud): las gsang sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyal po'i rtog pa'i rim par phye ba'i rab 'byams rdzog so///na maHsa man+ta badz+rAr+N+Na/a sa ma ye/
390a3(rgyud): tri sa ma ye/sa ma ya swA hA/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad stobs kyi shugs gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la sangs rgyas thams cad dang lhan cig snyoms
390a4(rgyud): par zhug so//snyoms par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ting 'dzin dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par thar pa rmad du byung
390a5(rgyud): ba/rgyas pa/sngon med pa/gzhan gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi spyod yul byin gyis brlabs
390a6(rgyud): pa byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i snying po 'di gsung s+ho//na maSh+Tasar+b+ba~M byAd+d+ha bo d+hi swA twA NAM/a d+hi/
390a7(rgyud): ra hU~M kham/sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//mtha' dang dbus med chos rnams las//mtshungs pa med pa'i gter kun gyi//ste nga po 'di ni stobs
390b1(rgyud): yis rgyal ba'o smras rnams kyis//srungs rgyas sadzad pa pyod par gsungs//mA bsams par yang sems can don//mkhas pas 'di yis sbyor bar 'gyur//'gro ba dug/
390b2(rgyud): 'grel bdog nyid yi ga lnga//thugs rnga'i bdag nyid kun gyi yob gcig pu//'jig rten gsum pa skyob pa'i sgo zhugs nas//zhing rnams rgya mtsho spyod zhing rnam par gan sa
390b3(rgyud): gang yang thugs rnga'i bungadag nyid dad pas zin pa'i yul//sems can don mchog nye bar sgrub par byed//gcig N+DI sdug bsngal mthar thug 'gro ba rnams//byang chub sems
390b4(rgyud): dpa' gtsom chog de spyod byed//de phyir gtso mchog dri med 'di sgrub pa//rmad byung che mchog chos can snying po 'di'o//mtha' yas pade bar gshegs la mngon dod pas/
390b5(rgyud): btsan 'grus rdo rje mad bsgrub par bya//'di'i sgrub pa ni de bo zhin gshegs pa'i snying po ji lta ba dang /rig pa mchog ba 'byas la sogs pa'i chog ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o//
390b6(rgyud): denas 'dir me rnyis kyi khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur//ras ris ni bcom ldan 'das rin pani thrig phrug na pad ma la ting 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs pas bzhugs pa'o
390b7(rgyud): bskor babri bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yasu byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba pri yang ku ltar ljang ku bcom ldan 'das la thal ma sbyar bas /
391a1(rgyud): la gnas pa bri bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog can nam/gser gyi mdog can 'od
391a2(rgyud): kyi phreng bas bskor ba/lag na rdo rje thogs pa rin po che'i pad ma la bzhugs pa'o//de'i 'og tu mi g.yo ba mig gcig pa zhes bya ba bgegs tshar gcod pa/rin po che'i brag la
391a3(rgyud): bzhugs pa mig dmar po gcig yod pa/kun nas 'bar bas bskor ba/ga nag cing ldang ba/khros shing 'khrugs pa/gzhon nu ral pa gcig yod pa/lag
391a4(rgyud): pa na ral gri dang /zhags pa thogs pa bri bar bya'o//sgrub pa po ni thal mo sbyar ba'o//ras ris gnyis pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
391a5(rgyud): pa dang /mi g.yo ba mig gcig pa bro bar bya'o//de bzhin du cha ga thams cad kyis sbyar bar bya zhing /ri la sogs pa dben par 'du 'ji spangs nas ra si ras med par yang
391a6(rgyud): sgrub pa 'am/tha na gtsug lag khang gi brang khang la sogs pa dang /kun dga' ra bo la sogs pa'i gan su sems can gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos grub nye bar
391a7(rgyud): dmigs pa nyid kyis 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa byon nas mgo la reg ste/leg so zhes bya ba byin zhing kun nas reg par gyur pas mngon par shes
391b1(rgyud): pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur zhing gzungs rnams kyang so sor thob par 'gyuraro//'bum phrag gsum bzlas nA rdzas gang dang gang bsgrubs pa de dang des rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyuraro//
391b2(rgyud): 'phags pa byams pa'i spyan sngar 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'phags pa byams pa mthong bar 'gyur//'phags pa phye ga nA rdo rje la rnam par lta zhing gnas pas 'bum phrag
391b3(rgyud): gsum bzlas na lag pa nas bzung nas lcang lo can du 'jug par 'gyuraro//de bzhin du 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi mdun du bzlas
391b4(rgyud): pa byas pa de nges par mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro//khyad par du 'gro ba la yang 'jog par 'gyuraro//skyil mo krung gis 'dug nas mtshan rangs par de bzhin gshegs pa la dam
391b5(rgyud): nas bzlas na mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro//ri la ljongs mo spod cing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'thob cing ji srid 'dod par gnas par 'gyuraro//snying
391b6(rgyud): po 'di ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa/chags pa med pa ngan yod par grub pa'o//myur du 'grub pa sgrib pa med par 'grub pa zhes bya'o//gedu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul
391b7(rgyud): gyi tshi ga gang yin par rtog pa 'di'i yin no//mdor na gang 'dod pa de sgrub par byed pa ni dus ga sum pa nyid kyi dam tshig ces bya ba yi ge lnga pa yin//zhes bya'o//de nas byang chub
392a1(rgyud): sems dpa'adang 'das rgyag nas bya ba gangam chu kya chungs pa du nas rloyang sa myur ba/dpa' brjem chad pa thams cad sa /
392a2(rgyud): duganas sangs rgyas dang byung chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par spyod pa zhes bye ni 'dzin la snyams pa thugs nas sbyangs rgyas dang byung chub sems
392a3(rgyud): sa kyi rjenas par bskol ba di gsungs/m+b+ha/sar+b+ba r+b+ba d+hA Sh+T+r-Is //a ra ya/ya pa//god+d+hapa/its+tshaH/sgyum
392a4(rgyud): hU~M/d+g+hak+Sharu NA~M/sam+b+ha yA/dkar thAka/tA ya~MhU~M yA s+t+wa~M/yang bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dang byung chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byu ba la ste
392a5(rgyud): zod pa/sngon gyi chos kyi dbyis kyi mthar thug par byas pa//de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyis ldan cig tu ga sungs//namaHsar+b+ba b+hUd+b+ha ba d+hi satwA nA~M/bar bar
392a6(rgyud): sar+d+he sar+thaM/sems pa/kurbar+N+Na kur+ra dz+yaM/tU rUHdrA/sAr+YAm+b+hanra/A tI A trI/AnIt+ta/aut+ti itaM/ ri r+YA/utrI Ad+haM/kr-i raM shwe r+Ya/tAtata
392a7(rgyud): ma hA sa ma ya/nam s+t+wa a ma li sit+pA da ya ke b+h+yaHsarba bud+d+he ba~M d+hi sa traM b+h+yaHsar+b+ba a nan+ta me b+h+yaHma hA ka ru dz+nyA/a ma li d+h+waM/a sa he dzA s+'uhA/'di gsum pa
392b1(rgyud): kyis me khyad ste//sangs rgyas rnams kyis grol ba dang //mchog tu rnam dag sems can rnams//byed pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa//dpa' bo kun gyis 'dir thams cad//'dra/
392b2(rgyud): sgrub so seMs dran thams cad //byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis bai rdebs//gsang ba bdag nyid na da//dpag med ces bya'i thugs rje'i bdag/kun gyi spyad yul 'di
392b3(rgyud): yin te//de phyir 'di dang 'dra ba med//ze ldan dad pas snying po 'di//'gro kun 'dul bar 'dod pa yis//yang dag nyid du bsgrub par bya//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
392b4(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi sgor spyad pa spyod pa bsdus pa'i rgyal po'i phyogs gcig gi bla na med pa'i snying po rim par phye ba rab 'byam hU~M gas gcig yin//'phag pa kun tu bzang tha
392b5(rgyud): rang gi sbyid pa smras so// me/sa~Mr+b+ba bud+d+ha bad+hi swAtwAnA~M/s+yA ma k+ki/sum /sa pa yaM/sems po//a hU~M Atra~M/na tshan/sid+b+ha ba li ba ke d+h+r-i d+hI ma hA sA mAH
392b6(rgyud): t+ta lta ba //nA m+b+ha skye sa sa hU~M/na ga shegs pa'i snad pa'i tshugs kyis 'brur du sbyar bar gyur//dgas pa pachog tu 'byams la sogs pan
392b7(rgyud): kyis kyang sbyar bar gyur//ras ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu babang po dang /'bigs pa slabs pa chezhes bya phyag na dzi rnams snga ma bzhin du
393a1(rgyud): par bri bar bya'o//phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni 'phags pa rdo rje'i stobs zhes bya ba gzhon nu rin+da po che'i za ba la 'dug pa/gnag cing ldang ba/mig dam
393a2(rgyud): ba/ngur smrig gyon pa/lag na ral gri thogs pa/khros pa/thur du blta ba/bgags rnams 'joms pa bri bar bya'o//'og tu ni sgrub pa po'o//ras ris gnyis pa na
393a3(rgyud): 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang /g.yog po de bzhin du gnas pa bri bar bya'o//'dir yang las thams cad snga mo bzhin du bsgrub par bya ste/ji ltar mos pa bzhin du
393a4(rgyud): 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis 'gyur//'phags pa blo gros chen pos rang gi snying po smras pa/na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+hi bo d+hi sa twA nAM/a tA a tA/sar+b+ba sa
393a5(rgyud): sa ma sA ma/pa paM a tsa lI nI/A tsa lI nI/a ma la ni/a ma la ni/ma hA a gra he swA hA//mchog la lta ba zhes bya bas snying po smras pA/nA maHsar+b+ba
393a6(rgyud): bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/a na tA hwA ba nA sti e gr-i sa tra na mo stu te/sar+b+ba tra a pra ti hA ta grA to na mA sar+b+be dza aM be tad e d+h+waM/a tra a tra/ba ra bi ra bi ri ya bi ri ya sA hA/
393a7(rgyud): dri mi med pa'i shugs kyi 'od kyis rang gi snying po smras pa/na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM ti ra ta ra/ba ra ba ra/bi ri bi ri/d+ha ma d+ha ma/a sa ma dzA la swA hA/
393b1(rgyud): dpa' thos rangagi sbyong ba skyes na m+b+haHsar+b+ba grA ban+d+ha satwAnA~M//a g+hAtats+tshi ra na ma na d+ha ma ti t+sun+tu/oMHt+ti/a t+ta at+ti/a ma wA/bar bar/
393b2(rgyud): dId+hi ny+dzed+d+ho/bal yo na tiri/b+hUdz+nyA wA nA ma swAH/rdo rje dpa' bos smras pa/namaHsa~Mr+b+ba bud+d+ha bad+d+ha satwAnAM/gaganag ga nA/gaklan d+ha na dag ted+had+d+ha /
393b3(rgyud): ha sa ha sa/badz+ra ba la ud d+hA ma~M swe n+d+he//ni mkha' sha bAs rang gi snying po smras pa/nA maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bi d+hi satwA nAM/a ta a ti/gar+b+ha gar+b+ha/tsau rA /
393b4(rgyud): badz+rA bad+hA/ku ku rA nA~M swA hUM//de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi snying pa'o//nAM muHsa~Md+g+ha bud+d+ha bad+hi satwAn+tu/U d+hA na~M/d+hun+na d+hAnA/ta rat+na ra/many+dzu 'dzagatu
393b5(rgyud): tA ni NAM/n+ten+te badzi/bu/!/san+sid+h+r-idz+hal nu ma sti swA hA/r+N+Ne sting ba 'o//namaHsad+d+hibud+d+ha ba d+d+hi si d+d+hin/k+SharbatraM/sa ma yaM/
393b6(rgyud): ai nan+te ma hA ba lA badz+dza ha he/shib+h+r-i shr-In+tau/A biSh+Ti AM giSha/taglai tr-Id+b+ha rbi ti thaM/badz+ra ma la swA tAM//rdo rje mtha' ya saM ts+tshat+ta//nA maHsar+b+bA bud+d+ha bi d+hI saM twAnAM/
393b7(rgyud): a ma lA shI/swa man+te sa ma ya/ hi raM/hUM d+h+waM/badz+nye bar+d+ha/tISh+TaM tiSh+Tha/dza ra dza ra/badz+ri yas ni nI ma s+thAt+ma//rdo rje dpal gyi snying po'i'o//'phag so//
394a1(rgyud): pargyur nas dadags rgya sa smras ra gyu na sa nga smo ga smras na smra /na smra shA
394b1(rgyud): saur+b+bA bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twAR+YA/ar+tha ka sh+ma d+hA man+t+ri man+ta/ka ra ka ra/bI rA b+hi ra/ta rat+na ra/tI yA tI yA/many+dzu shrI ya/ka ri ka ri/kA ra ka ra/tA ra ta ra/hA ra ha ra/badz+rA mA la/
394b2(rgyud): hUM n+taM/dza la ku mA ra ka swA hA//'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying po'o//'phags pa pad+ma ma rdo rje snying po smras pa/na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha ba d+ha sa twA nA~M/ar+ya garten ma
394b3(rgyud): sti s+yai/kA ru Na maN+Da laM dz+wa la maM d+ho ma ni sa he he/tsa gu na rA dza aM gra b+hu Sha Na tA tra/e di ti dA ya tAM/suM ma ti su ma ti/tai ra tI te rIt+ti De/gu Na r+b+r-iNi/dz+wa la ya a mo
394b4(rgyud): g+haM a pra ti ha te swA hA//'phags pa rdo rje rang bzhin gyis snyed po smras pa/na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/badz+ra ma yA tri/shrI khA ba ra hU~M/bor bo ga gu NAM ma la
394b5(rgyud): ban+d+ha be ko ni swA hA//'phags pa rdo rje rtse mos snying po smras pa/na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nA/aM ha ha he ha/sa ma sa ma/tri shI kha tr-i shI khi ra tA ma ba d+hu ma ba/
394b6(rgyud): a saM dri sha sA hAM//rdo rje yan lag byin gyis rang gi snying po smras pa/na maHsar+b+baM bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/tA ga tAM ga/hAM hUM/tsi raM tuta su kha yi hA sA hA/
394b7(rgyud): ro rje ma gi yo bas rang gi snying po smra ba/ni maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha ba d+hIs nAM/sar+b+ba rbag+hut+tha/kr-i nIk+ShaR+R-i/sa /tA d+hU d+h+waM/badz+ra a tsa le snehA
395a1(rgyud): su du na na/na// na/s+yAR+tha bshA k+Shan+Dam+b+hanu sa /kAsu na su las ya/sa

395a4(rgyud): na dngas kyi gi srung po skyes pa/rnamasaid+d+hi rbi bAd+hasIng+gan+tu/m+b+ha au/sa y+ya/s+yAd+d+hi tAM/ hU~M/rnam
395a5(rgyud): /tit+te / tISh+Thar trA~M/mate/sa la ya~M/badz+ranA nA Sh+TA sa ma m+bats+tsha//dam tshig pa ba \u0f7fs+ye b+hA na//nam
395b1(rgyud): na sa na smra r+m+ma k+ku rkun rgyu tu rgyun du rgyu
395b2(rgyud): so ma la/tAs / nir+m+ma ni/maHkA ru t+ne mai tra yI gr-i swAt+ma/rdo dza ma'i'o//na maHsir+b+ba bud+b+ha ba~M d+hi satwA naM/tits+tsha/tot+sA tat+ta/
396a1(rgyud): don byed pa'o//mthong ba'i chos la bdud rtsi'i spyod yul du 'gyur zhing yon tan gyi 'byung gnas rab tu thob par 'dod pas 'bad pa thams cad kyis bsgru/
396a2(rgyud): par bya'o//'dis mi 'grub pa gang yang med//sgrub pa 'dis bsgrubs pa la rnams pa mdo//bar chad mi 'byung //log 'dren mi 'byung //gnod pa mi 'byung /
396a3(rgyud): nad mi'i 'byung //ji ltar 'ad pas ji ltar mos pa po zhin du dad par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rjesu dran bzhin du las rnams bsgrub par bya'o//rtag pa 'dir the tshom
396a4(rgyud): myed par bya ste/dam tshig 'dis 'grub par 'gyuraro//snying po rab 'byam gyi rim par phye ba'o//de nas 'dir gtum po mthar byed kyi segs po pho nyar byed pa sa ye bsam
396a5(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i gtso bo bcu'i snying po bcu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra trA~M/a ti ga ya/gr-ih+Na ya~M tsat+ta uta ta Tu ka ma hA go rA ka rA/hUM hU~M d+ha/
396a6(rgyud): 'adz+rak+SharA l-i/dz+wA la dz+wA la/hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA/na mA/saM man+ta badz+ra d+h+waM/d+h+waM ma hA baM la e gra a tsa la/gr-ih+Na br-it+taM/ban+taM ban+d+ha/pA ta ya pA ta ya/
396a7(rgyud): l+r-ing /e ma skyem mAn+dan+da aHla sa/rnam da dkun ra /kA8
396b1(rgyud): /nA/man//ga N+Da//sas+thAr+thaH///man+tad+hA nA man+ta ma sa kAnad+ha//shin sa nas 'o//nama?/sa man+t+ra badz+raH/ba la aH ma ma
396b2(rgyud): wAM/se pa' sa ma t+ta//Nibit+te g+ne/ait+ne badz+re pa/s+thA Ta ya/saing+ku y+YA dz+nyA kAr swA hA//mchu
396b3(rgyud): chen mchog gi'o//namaHsam+ban+ta dzA/Sh+Thi tiSh+Tha/maHduta/a mo b+hU A pra/An srA k+sha ts+tshak+Sha ya/ma ting a gr-i ban+d+ha to asr-i b+hU She m+me tam+b+ha/tAn da/
396b4(rgyud): tatata/ma ta ma tA/a ti a tI/badz+dza sa dA yi si di ya/sar+b+bA ba ra ba ra na mi swAt+ma/shin tu rdo rje'o//namaHsa man+ta badz+dzaSh+TAM/i tr-I ad+d+hi A tAM/tAMdzaM at+tA/
396b5(rgyud): badz+ra ka rak+Sha ra/badz+raM mA ta ma ta/t+taM bA ra ti bA ra tI/ma hA mA lA/a gra a tsa la ti sa la li ta gA ti si/ku ru ku ru sad+d+haM/sa maM ya sa ma ya/be la a gr-i/to Ta taT/ra
396b6(rgyud): raN/bau ra dza na ma ste du s+yA h+ma/na maMH/sa man+te badz+riSh+Ti/i hi mrahA tsaN+DA a tsa la bAdz+dza/a tI bi Sha ma badz+ra/oM t+yai b+he ra badz+ra/a ti su ra badz+dza/a tsa li bi ta badz+ra/mA
396b7(rgyud): lA a sa ha a sa ha/mau hA kro d+ha na ma hU~M hUM/hi ha ho ho//a mo b+ha a pra ti ha ta/ma~M hA phaT/badz+ra oM gi hUM hUM dz+wA la swA hA//gtum po chen po mi g.yo ba khro
397a1(rgyud): dang ga//namaHsa nu rdAN+Da/as / /kar/rabar/AHpa/lwa brdas ma yab dusum mA/d+harath+yAd+d+ha/

397a3(rgyud): kAnak+ShAR+sha trI/y+YASh+Ti/sa ya sa /tr-I ye ma/ ya Sh+Ti/dz+nyAsa? sad+d+ham ta/tiSh+Tha sa ma mas mal/Asa? disahA/
397a4(rgyud): chen po meme ba zhes bya ba'i ny+dza'o//smon lam dri med rgyal srid kyis//dpa' badzin pa byin brdebs nas//sems can khams rnams rnam sbyong ba'i//dpa' ba
397a5(rgyud): dgadung 'dra rnyed//ngom pa'i chos dang sras bcus pa'o//sa sa rgyas kun gyin bgyi lags//bka' bzhin byed pas gnas pa'i hUM/'di dag rtag tu dpa
397a6(rgyud): mchog/'jig rten gsum po ga na yeng //'di dag dang ba yang ma yin//dus gsum bdag pa'i stobs rnams kyis//mthar byed 'di dag stobs can pos//spur
397a7(rgyud): bstan pa'i chog thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa 'am/yid la gang 'dod pas sa ma~M/rtag pa gzhan gyi tshogs kyang bsgrub par byed ste/de ni gang gi ched du byas nas pa/
397b1(rgyud): sa pa de yang dag par sgrub par byed//rog 'dzin sgrub par byed pa'adzas rnams la de bzhin ba sgrubs na/ma bsams par yang 'di dag thams cad 'bad pa chung ngus 'bru /
397b2(rgyud): 'gyur//lha rnams kyang bcings nas 'gugs par byed//klu la sogs pa yang 'gugs par byed//mdor na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'gugs pa
397b3(rgyud): byed/ston par byed pa'i sa'i khams kyang g.yo bar byed//sems can gyi khams rnams mtha' yas shing rgya chen po'i di mtshar rnams kyang dag par ston par bye'o//skyed par
397b4(rgyud): byed do//khro bo'i 'khor lo thaMd kyi gdug pa 'dul du/m+b+ha 'dul bar byed/gsod par yang byed//kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams rnam par sbyong bar yang
397b5(rgyud): byed do//de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir khros pa mchog la sogs pa khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab pa phrag bcu'i pho nya mo rnams 'byung bar 'gyur//he hi ma ro ShI da ran
397b6(rgyud): TAd+ha rI nAM/tI rI nA tA ri nI/sa ti sa ti/su mai tra/a nAn+ti na maM maM/sa da yA/sa da yA a dzi te to Sha ya/to ya/su/tA yItA rmA
397b7(rgyud): re'i ShI rbe/ bai ri baM tA kaM/e hi sa ma aM ge sA ma sa ni hU~M hUM hUM/dz+wa la nA mA yA/a gra tre bi nI swA hA/khro bo chen po'i'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra tAM/tra tI ri maM tA
398b1(rgyud): s+yAsan+ta na sam//gan nga sa na za na d+ha r+m+mar+N+Nam+b+ha/pa spyan gyu/ pa/ na ra ra /man tan tu/tar Na t+na/
398b2(rgyud): mrahA bi Sha te dz+wa la na ma swA hA//nA maHsa man+ta badz+ra dz+dza/sar+b+ba tA ba rA dzi tI e ti ma hA ma d+hi/aun+d+ra/e ma la ma le/e hi tri gu te hi sa hA taM/A ha te hA rA taM/ta ra te d+hIs+t+ra/

398b5(rgyud): ny+tsamo//nu mr-iHsa man+ta dz+dza tAM/s+yAsh+mi/srad s+yeng ste/kuM sh+mi ai nA ma/e nA ya/oM sa ma pad+h+r-i ki ta dIt+ta/b+h+yo/u mit+ta me d+hU ba la poH/d+hA ya~Mtayo/
398b6(rgyud): yid+b+ha yaM/trI sid+d+hi s+t+ri/sam+b+hi yi/sa mi yaM/ d+h+r-i/bai rabA tAM kaM a kaR+ShA yAM swAhA//mnyam pa ma pa'i gdun gyi yin no//nu meHsa man+ta badz+rANAM/n+ta
398b7(rgyud): adz+dzi//makr-iSha r+b+hA ya//sa~Md+d+ha ya/said+d+ha ma/li ti le/ti ya tri ba l-I oM kaM dz+wa la dz+wa la ya/e tsal //
399a1(rgyud): sa myo sa dan na// na rgyus rtswa/nan tu su rgyug

399a4(rgyud): // bas mas hrISh+Tas m+b+ha mi//sgrub pa mau pa ni sbyin las rnams//bam+bu'i par byu ba drin du shAn+d+he/na rten rnams ni sbyin pa 'di//bdag
399a5(rgyud): 'dus tha~Mng ste//bar mtshams med pa'i sbyin pa shing //'di yis rgyas par byas pa yis//bdag shegs rnams kyis sangs rgyas gzugs//mau kham
399b1(rgyud): na//sems ldan nas ma pan nga// byung tshus spyong //rgyu da ts+tsha ste//sams na na tu gyur//sas rgyas mangs na

400a1(rgyud): khe la nA khe la nA/a tsa le swA hA//kha dog can no//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra tAM/a ti a ti/tri D+hA ha ra tI b+hA ha ra/a ti a ti/shU ra ba shU ra ba/a ti a ti/
400a2(rgyud): bi ra ku ru ku ku ru/shan+na ti ti shan+ta ti/bi sha ma a tsa la bA ra tsa Ta ma hA te dza ka ra haM me a thA ra hUM hA//gdug pa mi g.yo ba'i//nai maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/oM dza nai di ri swa ma/eH/

400a4(rgyud): man+ta badz+rA NAM/su b+hA Ta b+hA Ta/ta ra ta ra/ba ra ba ra/dza ya dzA ya/A dzi ta ka ra ka ra/mA ti ta sa mA sa mA/gu Ne te/du na du na/du ra du ra/a tsa la/ta Ta ta Ta/ti Ta ti/

400a6(rgyud): matwAM ma tI/pra tsat+ti shu ra ma he ta dza ma hA ba la ad mo tra ya tra ya/a mI taM/sa ma so ma/mi hI ta ku ru ku ru/sar+b+baM ti dza ti dza/sa ma ti sa mi ti/hwe haM ka raM ka re/hoH/
