400b1(rgyud): mnyam pa med pas mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bka' nyan//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra d+h+waM/trA sar+b+ba tra ga su tse ta ma hA ba la/bi sho na/a ti a ti/u gra a ti a ti/a gra sa ma sa mas mad d+ha ra d+ha \u0f7f/
400b2(rgyud): kar kA ra/bar d+ha/ku ru ku ru/pheM ga la nA ya/nA ya/taM b+hI aM/d+h+r-i na d+h+ya nI/tAr ang gi ya hUM/mad+hi mad+d+haM/grA mi na swA hA//ma teng ga myos 'gro zhes bya ba'o//na maHsa rma
400b3(rgyud): badz+rA NAM/ta ta ta ta/sata sa ta/su ra b+hi na su ra bin/na Ta na Ta/gI ya taM gi ya/mahA bai lA/dza dza a gre/mA hI dzi ta na la hUM/bi na dza pa ya/sa ra sa ra/d+ha ra d+ha raH/
400b4(rgyud): u te u/sar d+hA ya na ma a nAn+ta badz+ra A tsa la swAng+ga//mtha' yas rdo rje mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/a tri sha~M ya a gra ma hA gun+d+haM/paN+Da ta praM ba
400b5(rgyud): tAta sa d+ha sa ma hA a tsa lA/a ti e sAk+Sha tri yad twA dza ka dzi na te swa ma b+ha ban+te/su d+ha ra tse tA kA ya na ma swA hA//mthar byed ces bya ba'i bka' nyamo/na maHsa mai n+ta badz+ra d+h+waM//a tig
400b6(rgyud): nAMs+sad+hA mAM a ti mo li/kaM sa ma ya/tsitI bar Ad+de ti/mAl+lI Ta a tsa li/tA mA lau hi ba ra ba ro tra~M ba~M la? kan tI/sa ma nA ya Na dz+wa laM/mtha' yas pa'i/na muH
400b7(rgyud): man+ta badz+ra d+h+waM/a nan+ta tri sa ma ya/a kro tar te oM tsa la tse tI/a ma lA/tai dze te dzi/ha sa ha se/ti shi ti shi/te taM/a na yA badz+ra ma hA ba la be ga/hU~M bi ni te ru tsi na/
401a1(rgyud): dz+ha rag+ha rA/g+hA t+tA la g+hA ta ya/trA kaHki/dz+ha dzA/gA Ag/ka ra kar/at+ma gu te/sa ma ya sa ma ya/tra yi na tral nra/sa mausum
401a2(rgyud): me m+med+d+ha/yaMs n+tu/sar+b+ba shU yin hrI sa/ma/dzA a b+h+ya t+yai shwAs nib+h+ya/many+dzu k+te/s+yAhA//rdo rje yun lag
401a3(rgyud): ba'i bkA nywan myo'i'o//nu maHsa min+ti ba~Mdz+nyAdz+dza/ pat+taM ga~M hUM badz+ra mar+d+ha a mr-i tItiSh+T+r-i hUM/a tsa la ni d+d+hi/ti nI me oMd me/tra~M badz+ra bau/traM ge rbeg/a tse tre sa mar tI/
401a4(rgyud): shwAs ni mo d+hi mor+d+ha/ba ra dI bar de/aM ma li nI/kA rI Ni sar+b+ba ma hA ba dA tI pra sri d+h+ye sri Nu/d+ha ra d+ha ri/d+ha ni gu ni gun+d+he/nA maHsar+b+ba tra a pra ti ha ta sha s+yA ne b+h+yo ma hA /
401a5(rgyud): b+h+yo sAM hA//dar dpyangs pa zhes bya ba'i bka' nyan mo'i'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA tAM/a br-i d+hi bi shA ya/sar+b+ba a mau g+ha sI dA ni sid+d+hi ni dzA la ya/a bA mA la bI raM/a tsi le/
401a6(rgyud): smr-id+h+we yAM gA/tit+ta ke han+ta ri ka~M/san+ta ni a sa ma prA NaM tad ti ke/s+yAd+d+he s+yA d+h+waM/mahA ba li be/u tI a t+ti/sa maM sa maM/tidzi ne mA sar+b+ba d+ha sid+d+hi b+h+yAM/sAng+ge//grub pa
401a7(rgyud): mi zhes bya ba'i bga'arten ma'o//na maHsa maH/hU~M a na ya te/yadz+dzaHd+harmiti/d+ha bad+haH/as la mi N+Di Sh+T+r-in+tu/sar+b+ba oM
401b1(rgyud): tatata shA san drA mahA ti br-i s+yAhA//na maHsa man+ta bad+d+hA t+taM/a nan+ta ka a tsa la ka nA ro Sha Na hUM hUM ban+d+ha a na ya/shA sa ya/shA sa ya/myat+ta A gr-i tsa Ta/kra nAM ka Ta/mAt+ta mat+sa/
401b2(rgyud): b+hAny+dza b+hany+dzi/a me le kiM sai na ya s+yAhU//shugs shin tu mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i bka' ny-i ni ma'o//na maHswe nan+ta badz+ra NAM//su lo ka tAM shi/sa tra hi tasmai bI tA si saM sA d+ha
401b3(rgyud): tsa le a me lA/sha gu NAM/a gra bI r-i badz+ra ma hA ma hA ma yi san+ni ye/san+ti yau san+d+hi ye/tan+ti ye tAr+t+ti ye/du d+hi ye dut+ti ye/yo d+hi yi ye d+hi ye dza ti a sa man+ti yai swA hA//daM
401b4(rgyud): /dpon ma zhes bya ba'i bka' nyan mo'o//na ma se man+te badz+ra NAM/sar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/aR+ya aM gi naM/ma hA badz+ra a pr-I a ma lI ni/kA ru Na sa ma ye ga ga NaM/a se mai/ba ra d+haM
401b5(rgyud): pi ra dze sa bu ne/a dz+nyA ga ri/mA hA ma d+ha mAd+d+hi kI dz+wa la dz+wA li ya//tr-i d+hi ti d+hI/tsi ti tse ti kaM/ku ru ku rU/sar+b+baM ma hA mA hA ma da yan+ti kaM swA hA//myos 'gro ma zhes pa'i bka' nyan
401b6(rgyud): mo'o//nam sa man+ta badz+rat+taM/a rA mi ti a r-i mi ti/shro bI ti sho b+hU ti/k+Sha b+hU ti k+Sha b+ha ti/tse ti mai hA shr-i/a tsa~M ti/a tsi ti nr-id ya tinr-i daM ya dz+haiM/kha la~M ti khe lA tI/gu y+ya gu y+ya/
401b7(rgyud): brita ta rI/ma ti ri ba ri pa ta ri si ta ri/maN+Da ri mat+ta ri/sa ma ti a tsa la ni/badz+ra a ma li ni/shan+ta ti a sa ha ma hA DA rA sa ma yA/a ma hA ba tsat+ti ni ya bai rA da dwe na ma
402a1(rgyud): /sar+b+ba bud+d+ha ba d+hi satwe b+h+yaHswA hA//'phags pa bas mu kyis mi khyab pa'i dpa' bo zhes bya ba'i bka' nyan ma'o//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA d+hA/a ti ba la/a
402a2(rgyud): nale sad ya twot+tA re sA mA yaM swAH//dr-i/rA mo chos can zhes bya ste/'di ni bka' nyon rnams kyi mchog go/na maHsa man+ta badz+rANA~M/dzId+hA ni tri d+h+r-i ni/Tohr-idz+nyA To//tAm+ba
402a3(rgyud): ye ta mA ya/taM su ni taM su ni/mA tI mA tI/sa ma yai tri hU~M dzA la nA swA hA//ral pa gsum pa zhes bya ba'i bka' nyan mo'o//na meHsa man+ta badz+ra tAM/a tsi le kA Na na ta na tra/
402a4(rgyud): /mo tA mo tA/sha TA sha Ta/tA Ta tA nu tiSh+ThA tiSh+Ta/A bi shaM AM bi shA/a mra hA man+ta ba ka du NA du NA/ti Ni ti Ni/khA da khA da/b+ha gi a nan/mA ra mA ra/ne s+pha na rak+Sha
402a5(rgyud): rak+Shaser+tha ni kun su/sing+ge ma badz+ri s+tho TA yai/hrInAM/trib le trU~M rA kI ni riSh+T+rI/A tsal tsi te phaT ya hU~M/a sa mAn d+d+hika/traT ma te la/
402a6(rgyud): ta ye sa ma na ya taM/maM hA tu dzi na mo stu a pra ti ha tA ba le b+hu dzA ya tra TaM/A sa hA na ma swA hA//mi g.yo ba long ba zhes bya ba'i bka'anyan ma gdug pa thams cad gsod pa ste/
402a7(rgyud): sgrub pa pos nges par dran par bya ba ni be gegs thams cad gzhom par bya ba'i rnying po don yod pa 'di yin no//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ta Ta e mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA roSha tA sweT n+ya
402b1(rgyud): gad+ha ma ya tra ma ya hU~M d+ha ma ya dza ma ya/hU~M phaHhaM ma/sar+b+ba big+h+nAn sa byan du log skur ti ud tsiSh+Tha di d+ha nan du sha ta/lhag ma'i chang bu lnga lan cig bzlas nas byin na dngas grub brgyad rab tu 'a/
402b2(rgyud): rtag tu rje sgyu 'brang bas phan pas nye bar bsdus pa sgrub par byed do//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bu byin gyis rlob par yang 'gyur ro//bka' nyin mo rnams
402b3(rgyud): rdzogs so////de nas pho nya mo dang /bka' nyan po mo dro dag gi thun mong gi sgrub pa'i phyogs tsam mdor bstan pa'i rtog pa 'byung bar 'gyur//'di dag
402b4(rgyud): ni bklags pas 'grub pa'o//las thams cad don yod par byed pa/ngo bo nyid kyis srung ba la sogs pa grub pa'o//gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i rig sngags kyi spyod pa la
402b5(rgyud): lhag par mos pa rnams la yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar thogs pa med par don yod par grub pa yin te/'khor gyi nang du nye bar 'ongs nas 'dug par yang byed//mthong ba
402b6(rgyud): yid ston par byed//de la dgug pa la sogs pa rnams la dam tshig gsum zhes bya ba'i lcags kyu yino//na maHsa~M man+ta a mo g+ha A pA ti he ta badz+rA d+h+waM/a pra ti ha ta yai/
402b7(rgyud): ku shi A na ya hAM/a mo g+ha ma hA ba la a ku shi A na ya hUM//mahA tr-i sa ma yaM/aM kuM shi AM na ya hUM/yang sa hUM/sa mA ki ni hUM d+b+h+yAM/ta Ta tai Te/badz+re badz+ro ta//
403a1(rgyud): ka TA kAT/ba ta nr-ita Ti/taM kur+tha ku ru/sa mA yaM badz+ra mahA ba rA/bi kra ma A nA ya/shAg+h+ra~M/sta pa yA sa t+ya na bAd d+hA ya sA raM/tri ba nam/
403a2(rgyud): tsan mo tsa ya/ban+d+ha nad A nan+ta ma ti ni a sa mA oM gai tri sa mU ya~M/many+dzu pA laM/oM ku shr-i a se ha sa mo in+d+ra hUM/hA ra haM ra/sa me tA hitA hi/ma hA bi la a~M ku shats+tsha
403a3(rgyud): A kaR+Sha ya sa sa/sam+b+ha ti ni swAhA//dam tshig bsam gyi lcags kyu zhes bya'o//'dis sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rab tu 'gugs par
403a4(rgyud): byed do//pho nya pho mo'i rigs dang /bka' nyan pho mo'i rigs rnams 'gugs pa lnga smos kyang ci dgos te/mi 'gugs pa gang yang med do//stobs chen po'i lcags
403a5(rgyud): kyi 'dis sngar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po de dag thams cad kyi snying por gyur pA 'di yin no//na maHsa man+ta badz+rA tAM/sid+d+hi da sid+d+hi da/sar+b+ba thA e du maM/a ma lA nai sho d+haH
403a6(rgyud): sr-id+d+hi ke/sar+b+ba thA sar+b+ba ti/aM g+ha tAM a ma lI na//khI lI ka/e nAn ti ka tA twe d+ha a nan+ta be be/sha ra Ne sha ra Ni/sa hA NAM sa hA Ni/tra sa tra se/tr-i su hA Ne tri sahA NAM/mat+te
403a7(rgyud): ni mat+ta ne/haM saM ha saM/a saM maM ba la ad ma dri sa ma ya ti dze/shod+hA ya sho d+ha ya/rA dza ya hUM/tra sa ma ya a ga ni swAhUM/'di bzlas pas po nyi dang /pi nyi ma //
403b1(rgyud): //nyan ma thams cad legs par bzlas par 'gyur//sgrub pa byas na legs par sgrub par 'gyur//rtog pa'i cho ga 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi snying pa rang /
403b2(rgyud): 'byam gyi dngos grub sgrub par 'gyur//dngos grub man+ta ga lnga sogs pa'i dngos kyi grub brgya de rab tu rdib par 'dod pa dang /mi lus thob pa don yod par bya bar 'dud pa
403b3(rgyud): dI ba'i mthu byin pa 'gro bar 'didi pa smad dpas byed rgyam sems kyis yang su zir pa'i sems can gyi drin la mngon par myos pas brtan 'grus dang ldan pa'i skyes byu ma pas don yong/
403b4(rgyud): pa grub pa 'dis 'bang par bsgrub par bya'o//de nas 'di dag gi thun mongasu gau ras ris 'byung bar 'gyur//ngur smrig gi gas la blonya rin por+g+haM'i breg le gnas pa sto bsangs rgyan thaMng
403b5(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal ba'i lus cung zhig 'dud pa bri bar bya'o//pho nya'i ming gi khyad par gyis ras ris kyang de dang 'dra ste/de bzhin
403b6(rgyud): du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'od kyi phreng pa can//lag pa g.yas pa ni rdo rje thogs pa/g.yon pun rin po thogs btsud zhig lus 'dud pa/sangs rgyas dang byed chu
403b7(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyi dka' sgrub par byed pa mdog sngo bsangs bri bar bya'o//de bzhin du ngur smrig gi gos la bka' nyan khros pa nag ldang gzhon nu'i gzugs can log na de
404a1(rgyud): rje'am/ral gri'am/zhags pa 'am/mdung dang /gri gug thogs pa bri bar bya zhing /mig dmar ba khros pa 'bar bas bskor ba/brag gi steng na
404a2(rgyud): gnas pa/gos ser po 'am/dmar po 'am/sngon po gyon pa bri bar bya'o//bka' nyan mo rnams kyang de bzhin du khros pa gzhon nu'i lus can rgyan dang bral ba/nag ldang
404a3(rgyud): shing gyon pa/me tag gi phreng ba lag na thogs pa 'am/ska rags sam/dar dbyangs sam/sdong bu 'am/ku shA 'am/ral gri 'am/zhi bo ma 'am/phyag shing ngam
404a4(rgyud): 'jug sgo lag na thogs par bya'o//mngag gzhug pa rnams gang 'dod pa gcig bris la/rang 'dod pa'i sngags gcig bzung nas ras ris de la bsgrub par bya ste/rdo rje dang /
404a5(rgyud): 'khor lo dang /kha T+wAM gA dang /lcags kyu dang /mdung la sogs pa dang /ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas thams cad la sngar bstan pa'i cho ga 'am yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho ga
404a6(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ste/mi snang ba'i dngos grub la sogs pa 'am/nor sgrub pa'am/dbang du bya ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bsgrub par bya'o//rab tu stong zhing dben par
404a7(rgyud): ras ris med pa yang thams cad bsgrub par bya ste/tha na gtsug lag khang ngam/brang khang gi phugs la sogs pa'i gnas rna masu bosgrub par bya'o//gang dag rim
404b1(rgyud): gyis phan pa de la dbab par 'dod na ma yang dang ral grol sogs pa dang /ri mo dang /lcags ma la sogs pa rnams la gzhon nu 'am/gzhon nu me tog bkram pa'i dkyil 'bar rgya
404b2(rgyud): dbus gzhug na nub mo 'bebs par yang byed/smra bar yang byed//lha dang klu la sogs pa 'gugs par byed//'ching bar byed/ltung bar byed/gsod par byed/gtum pos
404b3(rgyud): 'tshe bar byed//de nas bgyi bci mchis pa bdag gis bgyi zhes sgrub par byed do//de'i phyir bka' nyan po med dag bsgrubs par bya ste/chos gcig nas brtsams nas snga dro'i thun
404b4(rgyud): lA rAs ris kyi mdun du me tog gis mngon par rgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor byas nas lan brgya'i bar bu rje su rjod par bya'o//zas zos pa'i rjes la yang lan brgya mngon par brjod par bya'o//
404b5(rgyud): byabyid+mo'i dus yang lan brgya brjod la de nyid sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas nas gnyid ldog par byed//de ltar nyin re zhing zla ba nya'i bar du zla ba gcig tu chog
404b6(rgyud): bzhin du bya'o//zla ba nya la ci ltar 'byir pa bzhin du mchod pa byas la/rnam pa'i shrIng las me sbar la/arge'i ya ma~M shing dang bcas pa'i yung kar ra re bsregs na srong bzung nas
404b7(rgyud): nam phyeng ngam nyi ma shar kar nges par 'ong bar 'gyur//gal te 'ong bar ma gyur na 'chi bar 'gyur//'ongs nas bdag la bka' stsol cig ces zer na de dang de brjod par bya'o//
405a1(rgyud): bdag ni ci yang bgyid zhes zer na de nas bzung ste rngasu 'brel bar 'gyur//ci ka' stsal pa byed par 'gyuraro//lha'i 'jig rten rnams kyang 'dri zhing smra bar bye'o//
405a2(rgyud): steng gi mtsham su yang khrid par byed//bya ba thams cad kyang byed//ji smad smra bar 'dod pa de srid du 'dri bar byed//'dis grang smras pa de de bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du mi 'gyuraro//ri
405a3(rgyud): gseb du 'bum bzlas nas ral bri blangs te mtshan rangs pa sbyin sreg byed cing 'di nyid kyis gang 'dod pa'i cho bo des bsgrubs na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//dur khrod du 'dug nas me tog
405a4(rgyud): gis mngon par rgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'khor lo bzhag nas ji srid nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas na thogs na yang mi tshan bdun gyi nang du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//dkyil 'khor de nyid
405a5(rgyud): la ba blangs la ji srid du ba byung gi bar du bzlas na zhag bdun gyi nang du nges par 'grub par 'gyuraro//thal bas tshud gsum byas na ma snang bar 'gyuraro//dam tshig gsum bkod
405a6(rgyud): pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las po nya dang /pho nya mo dang /bka' nyan pho mo'i rim par phye ba'i phyogs gcig bstan pa'o///de nas de bzhin
405a7(rgyud): gshegs pa de na yod par grub pa yul mtha' yas pa mnyam nyid du don yod par grub pas ma lus pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i sgo/bde ba na mkha' thams
405b1(rgyud): rgyal ba sa mnyam pa dang mnyam pa slad du byung ba 'jig rten gyi sgo gcig pu/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gshegs pa/lhag/ma med pa'i mthu 'grub pa la
405b2(rgyud): sogs pa/dngos grub thams cad yang dge par legs par thob pa/byin gyis brlangs kyi rgyal po la sogs pa zhes bya ba thams cad du mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sgo tIng 'dzin gyi rgyal
405b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rigs pa thams cad kyi snying po mchog bla na med pa/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa
405b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang stabs gcig tu gsungs pa/na man+t+ra sar+b+ba bud+d+hAts+tshad+hisatwA nAM/A sa mr-i a b+h+yA ta a nAn+ta sid+d+hi/tra a sheSh+Na d+hirmat+ta/a sa man+ta
405b5(rgyud): gak+Sha nA dz+nyA mra kham swa mu be d+hI yuM Sh+Ta satwa/taM sa maMn+ta trA s+ye kha~M sid+d+hi d+hAn gun dza sa ma a g+hi ni/saM gr-ing pyA to gu r+dz+dzas mA brAd+d+hi/shrI swA/tidr-i da~M/b+hUt+ma/sid+d+hi ni ser yA/su sAm+b+ha
405b6(rgyud): pa ti/taM a ma lA ni sA d+ha yaM/kA ru Na ma ye sar+b+ba ta shAM se ni sA d+ha au/traM ya sa man+tu/swa d+hA ya sa d+ha ya/tritwA ye tri tA ya/saM mA yai sa ma yaM/sar+b+ba thA suM ma bA te/sid+d+ha ya sim+b+ha/
405b7(rgyud): a ma lo/sha yi ye/sA si ki swA hA///gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs pa na//rnam par dag pa'i zhing kun du//skad cig de la sangs rgyas kun//
406a1(rgyud): rmad byung dang mo chen mo mdzad//rig pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di ni rig pa'i rgyal po mchog po rtog pa mtha' yas shing chags pa med pa sgrub pa'i mchog dra/
406a2(rgyud): ma med pa dngos grub ma thA yA pa mtshungs pa med pa'o//'di bzlas pa byas pas dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di legs par bzlas pa byas par 'gyuraro//bsgru
406a3(rgyud): na 'grub 'gyuraro//chags pa med pas rig sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyal po'i dngos grub thob par 'dod pas 'di bzlas par bya'o//tha na gzung bar yang bya
406a4(rgyud): ste/'di la thams cad rab tu gnas pa yin no//de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin bstan pa don yod pa'i mthu dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de bzhin
406a5(rgyud): gshegs pa la rjesu dran bzhin du sngags gsol ba btab po//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad gcig tu rjesu 'gro bar mdzad nas rig pa'i rgyal po mchog 'di gsungs
406a6(rgyud): so//nA mas+t+rai yang d+h+r-i ka naM/sar+b+be tA thA ga tA nAM/oM ga ga na lo tsa nr-i/ga gra na sa ma sar+b+ba thA ud ga tA tI/sa ra saM/b+ha be dz+wa la nA ma aM gi ni swAhA//lag na rdo rje rang
406a7(rgyud): gi rig pa'i rgyal po mchog 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o//'di brtsams pa tsam gyis 'di'i yon tan mtha' med pa mnyam pa med
406b1(rgyud): para'agyur//bdun dade tsun gshegs pa thams cad yongs brdung ba zab par 'gyur//bzlas pa smras na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyung nga skye bar 'gyur//sgrub pa
406b2(rgyud): byas na 'dis sgrub pa pa dad pa'i nor can du 'gyuraro//de nas re shig dang por sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad dbul bar bya ste/bdag
406b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar bgyi yis thugs rnga chen po dang ldan pa thams cad dus thams cad du sdug bsngal bar gyur pa bdag la byin gyis
406b4(rgyud): brlab du gsol/zhes brjod par bya'o//de nas thugs bskyed pa gang gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sdig pa rnams bshags par mdzad pa'i sems
406b5(rgyud): bskyed pa des bdag gi sdig pa thams cad dus thams cad du bshags par bgyi ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du 'am/nus pa ji lta
406b6(rgyud): ba bzhin du bshags par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /nyan thos la sogs pa thams cad kyis bsod na mos dang ye shes kyi tshigs la rjesu
406b7(rgyud): yi rang ngo //'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gautogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rnams bsgoms la bsngo bar bya ste/na ma s+t+rai yang /d+h+ri kA nAM/ta thA ga tA nA~M/sar+b+ba tha ung
407a1(rgyud): pa te s+pha ra Na hi ma ga ga na khyA swA hA//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po sna tshogs pa'i sprin
407a2(rgyud): rab 'byam rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces bsams la sngags 'di bzla bar bya'o//
407a3(rgyud): de nas gzhan ma yin par yang dag par gnas par 'gyur zhing //sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gzigs par 'gyuraro//na ma s+t+waM yang d+hi kA nAM/ta thA ga
407a4(rgyud): tA nAM/sar+b+ba tra sa ma ku su mi tI ra shi ni na mo stu ste swA hA/'dis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
407a5(rgyud): bsngags pa rgya mtsho rab 'byam rnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces
407a6(rgyud): bsams la/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dmigs nas bzlas par bya'o//de nas gzhan ma yin par bstod pa'i dbyings rnams rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro//de nas
407a7(rgyud): smon lam btab pa byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub grub pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams
407b1(rgyud): cad lo rdosu yi rang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mngon du phyogs pas phyag 'tshal te/ji srid skyo bar ma gyur b+hi bar du sngags bzlas par bya'o//de nas rgya che ba'i tshul la
407b2(rgyud): 'jug pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi rje su 'jug pa sems la byas ba sangs rgyas kyi snying po brjod cing /lha la sogs po kun nyon cig ces bya ba'i dam tshig brjod cing bsams la bsgom par bya'o//
407b3(rgyud): sA d+ha'i thun la de ltar byas nas zas za ban stobs chen po dang /sman gyis rgyal po chen por byin gyis rlobs pa'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya ste/na ma ste yad d+hi kAnA~M/ta thA gA tA nAM/oM
407b4(rgyud): b+hu l+li te swA hA//de nas de la so sa la byin nas glegs bam klag pa la sogs pa byas te/snga ma bzhin du phyi dro'i thun la yang las rnams byas nas bzlas pa bya'o//srod kyi dusu
407b5(rgyud): smon lam btab la yan lag thams cad btud pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyog byas nas rtsa bting ba la drang por nyal la gnyid ldog par bya'o//tshes
407b6(rgyud): gcig nas brtsams nas nyin re zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du las 'di lhor bya zhing nya'i nub mo dri'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bzhag pa'am/sku gdung dang
407b7(rgyud): bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/bzhugs gnas mchod rten nam/sku gzugs kyi mdun du'am/gzhan yang dben par skyil mo krung bcas la skyil mo krung ma pa shig
408a1(rgyud): /dar de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs nas badrus pa bya ste/ji srid 'od zer byung nas lus la phog gi bar du byas nas de nas lus 'bar bar 'gyuraro//de'i rjes la/
408a2(rgyud): lus 'di yongasu gyur nas rig 'dzin gyi rigs rnams nye bar lags te/de la dbang bskur bas bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rig 'dzin gyi rigasu gyur nas skal
408a3(rgyud): pa ji lta ba bzhin du/rang gi gnas thob par 'gyuraro//der yang shes rab dang thab sa dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par sbyor ba yang thob par 'gyuraro//rnam par rol pa sna
408a4(rgyud): tshogs pas rje su 'jug par yang 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod par yang 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyuraro//thags
408a5(rgyud): la mkhas pas 'dod pa la yongasu spyad kyang nyams par mi 'gyuraro//lus de nyid kyis sa non par 'gyur zhing bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin ga bye ba'i dkyil 'khor gyid dkyil 'khor//
408a6(rgyud): du nye bar 'gro ba dang /rjesu spyod pa yang mthar gyis sogs shing so sor thob par 'gyuraro//gal te rig pa 'dzin pa thob par ma gyur na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba 'am/
408a7(rgyud): 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'am/gsung thos par 'gyur zhing de'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa yang skye bar 'gyuraro//gzungs kyang rab tu thob par 'gyuraro//gzhan dag gis kyang
408b1(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ste/ri dang /chu klung dang /mtsho'u dang /chu gling dang /khang phrags dang /gtsug lag khang gi gnas 'di lta bu dben pa rnam su sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/sku
408b2(rgyud): gzugs sam/ras ris la tha na/btsug lag khang dben par 'du 'dzi spangs la dam pa'i chos la bla mar byed pas 'khor lo dang /rdo rje dang /ral gri la sogs pa'i
408b3(rgyud): khyad par rang gis blangs la mtshan rang ba gcig skyil krung ma bshig pa 'am/tsog tsog por rtswa bcing ba la nye bar 'dug la ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o//de bzhin
408b4(rgyud): du ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dri'i dkyil 'khor ram/lo ma'i snod du bzhag nas bsgrub par bya'o//'di ni sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thabs la
408b5(rgyud): mkhas pa rnams kyi rab tu mi dmigs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabaso//dben par mchod rten la sogs pa'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa rje su dran pa la goms par byas nas ji
408b6(rgyud): sing mtshan ma byung gi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//zla ba nya ba la mtshan rangs skyil mo krung bcas nas bzlas pa bya'o//gnyid spangs nas nyin zhag gcig tu de bzhin du 'khor lo la slobs
408b7(rgyud): pa'i rdzas rnams yongasu bzung nas bsgrubs na phyir ldog pa med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//'di gzi brjid gang dang yang mnyam pa med par 'gyur//bsod nams dang mi ljin
409a1(rgyud): sangs par gyu ra gyur// ma na/ma dang mang byung /ngos par dzu // su
409a2(rgyud): 'did na ras ris la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs ni pade ma la bzhugs pa'o//g.yas ni 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'o//g.yon du ni na mkha'i spyan te/'od zer
409a3(rgyud): nye bar 'phro ba thal mo sbyar nas 'dug pa'o//de dag la rdo rje 'dzin ni ut+pa la sngon po'i mdog cano//na mkha'i spyan ni sngo bsangaso//sgrub pa po ni 'og tu lha mo la mngon du phyo
409a4(rgyud): par bya ste/ras ris 'od la yang tsho ga snga ma nyid kyis zla ba nya'i bar du zla ba gcig gis bsgrub par bya'o//oM pa ra tsi ta sngon po'i sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dgug par bya s+t+wa~M/
409a5(rgyud): rtog po thams cad kyi tshogs sbyar na thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro//ras ris gnyis pa ni lha mo gcig pu gnas pa gser gyi mdog can zar ma'i me tig lta bu'i
409a6(rgyud): 'bar ba pad+ma la rab tu gnas po dang /ral pa dang bcas pa'i bsgrub pa po bri bar bya'o//de dag la yang cho ga snga ma nyid kyis bya'o//ji ltar 'dod pa'i ral gri dang /
409a7(rgyud): ldong ros la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya'o//thams cad yid mi bde ba dang bral bas dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklags par bya zhing dmigs pa dang bcas skyil mo
409b1(rgyud): g+ho pa sh+ma ts+tshal bzlas pa san mya can ga ga gos byung 'grub pa 'gyur//da na pa la mngan par ga'angs ngam pal sa ky-i rdzogs pas klod pa da dang /'du lda ma byung /
409b2(rgyud): nyid dan yod par las rnams nges por 'gyur//'phags pa kun tu zang pos de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran zhing gsang sngags smras pa/na ma hA yad d+hI/nA~M/ta thAg sta na/
409b3(rgyud): am+b+ha Sh+Tha b+he m+b+ha//'dre bsngags pas 'dugs bkun tu bang po'i spyod pa las sbyir ma ldag par sbyin gyi sbyib+hA pa'i yan tan la drug parabatu 'ab//de badzin gshegs pa'i byin gyis
409b4(rgyud): brlabs par gtags pa 'di yang tshig ni rnam pa'i spyan gyi tshig nyid kyis nges par 'grub par 'gyur//ras ris kyi khyad par ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yasu 'phags pa kun tu bzang ba
409b5(rgyud): g.yon du mchog g-i shugs can mA zhes bya ba zi y-ing ku ltar ldang ba thal po sbyar ba byis pa dang /'phags pa rdo rje 'dzi ni thal mo sbyar ba'o//'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i lag tu ni skye
409b6(rgyud): /m+b+ha hU~M sgru //ras sa sa sa N+DI shA m+b+ha la gas/'ang snru sa sa/
409b7(rgyud): /mthal ni ga na po /nga /sbyi ba'o//'i ba kyig pa nga ny-id te/shi yin pa la mnyim pa mangs
410a1(rgyud): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /rig pa'i rgyal po'i stobs mnyam pa med pas lus de nyid kyis mthar dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pa nyid kyis 'phags pa
410a2(rgyud): kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur zhing /yang nyams par yang mi 'gyur//sngags gzhan yang /na mastaM yang d+hI kA nAM/tA thA ga tA nAM/sa man+ta ga me nan/u dzA la ya
410a3(rgyud): swA hA//'dis ni 'phags pa kun tu bzang po mngon du phyogs par 'gyur//sgyu me lta bu'i ting 'dzin mthong ba yang 'grub par byed//rnam par sbya nga bar byed//nges par rdzogs
410a4(rgyud): par byed//rim gyis 'di nyid kyis rig pa 'dzin par yang 'gyuraro//'di'i cho ga yang snga ma rnams nyid yino//gzhan yang mchod pa sprul pa'i rig pa ni/ni maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tAnAM///
410a5(rgyud): sar+b+ba thA ung+ga te/s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM sU tA//zhes bya ste/mchod pa rnam par bsems la/dI ma thag tu skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du brjod na nges par tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par
410a6(rgyud): 'gyur//rig pa'i rgyal po'i rtse mo don yod pa 'di rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad dang sbyar bar bya'o//de bzhin du 'di bsgrubs na dge ba'i rgyun las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur//byang chub
410a7(rgyud): sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la snang ba rgya chen po thob par 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /smon lam tshon po'i rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pas/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
410b1(rgyud): dang 'di bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs nas skyil me krung ma bshog par mtshan gaN+DIg gis don yod par 'grub par 'gyur//'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs//
410b2(rgyud): pa la gsol ba btab nas sngags smras pa/na mo s+t+rai yad+h+r-ik+ShanAM/tathA gtsi re/myu ga hU~M sug tA/badz+ra shi kha rA/na ma s+yA ti kum+bA ra/skAr skA ra swAhA/
410b3(rgyud): 'di'i tshi ga yang de dag nyid yin//ris ris med kyang rung /lha mi kyang rung 'grub par 'gyur//ras ris kyi byed par ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal cung zad gzhan lus 'das
410b4(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis 'bar ba'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis g.ya su rdo rje 'dzin pa ma la dbus mo'i lhang sa la btsugs pa bri bar bya'o//sgrub pa po thal mo sbyar ba'o//ras ris
410b5(rgyud): gnyis pa ni gcig pa pad ma lha gnas pa sgrib pa po mdun du gnas pa la gzigs pa lta bur bris ni gang 'dod pa de sgrub par byed//'phags pa spyan raso gzigs dbang phyug
410b6(rgyud): gis sngags smras pa/nA ma dz+dza yad d+hI/nA~M tA thA ga d+hA nA~M/oM so m+b+ha ra/badz+dza dz+wA la sa~M b+hA rA dzA yA/na maHswAn+ta//ras ris ni 'phags pa kun tu bzang po lnga'i gzhal yas
410b7(rgyud): khang na bzhugs pa'o//rdo rje gzhon nu nig cing ldang ba pade ma la bzhugs pa bri bar bye ste/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyis bskur ba'o//'pha gI pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyu
411a1(rgyud): dang /kun tu bzang ba'i gan su rdo rje 'dzin dang /gzhon nu'i steng du bri bar bya ste/'di ni ras ris kyi khyad par//'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin gyis rdo rje'i
411a2(rgyud): rags thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas sngags smras pa/na mastaM yad d+hi ka nAM/twa thA ga tA nAM/sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha rA NAM/oM tsaN+Da lA tsaN+Da lA/tsa la tsa la/badz+ra badz+ra/shan+ta
411a3(rgyud): nA shan+ta nA/pha la na pha la na/tA ra ta ra/mA ra mA ra/badz+ra da la/s+pho Ta lA spre Te lA le shi kha se man+ta/badz+ra NI dzI le ne dzA la nAM/se mas+tha a gre/a gra sha sa kA nAM/ra NA raM/
411a4(rgyud): hUM phaT badz+ra ut+ta me swA hA//'di mi bklags pa tsamra gyis lha dang //lha ma yin dang /gnod sbyin la sogs pa sa'i tshe b.ri mi 'gyur zhing /log 'dren la sogs paM yang nye bar/
411a5(rgyud): 'ong bar mi 'gyuraro//'di'i cho ga yang de dag nyid yin//rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi chags kyi nga don yod pa'i las rnams kyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//rdo rje'i rigs kyi gan
411a6(rgyud): dader yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pas 'dug nas gnyid spangs te mtshan rangs pa bzlas pa byas na de'i rjes la 'grub pa'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
411a7(rgyud): de nas ldeng ras la sogs pa 'am/rdo rje dang ral gril sogs pa gang 'dod pa bzung la bsgrub par bya'o//zla ba nya'i thun dang po la nges par 'grub par 'gyur//rig pa
411b1(rgyud): ba las kyang nyams par myi 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang 'jug par 'gyur zhing nyams par yang mi 'gyuraro//'di yid la gang 'dod pa'o tsho gas sgru bar byas na nges par

411b5(rgyud): brlabs pa'o//rdo 'dzin gyis yang dag par bsrungs pa'o//na mkha'i spyan gyi tsho gas 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o//gal te nus pa yod na brtson 'grus dang ldan pas
411b6(rgyud): mtshan rangs par skyil mo krung bcas pas yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho ga dang /'dis bsgrub par bya'o//sngo gso 'dis bsrung bar bya'o//gang yang mang du ni gtsug tor
411b7(rgyud): dang rma rgya chen mo dang /rdo rje mchog la sogs pa rnams kyis//na mas+t+rai yad d+h+r-ikanAM/trASh+Ta gau tAn/sa d+hU pra tita taSh+Tha s+thid+d+har+m+ma d+hAHlA nA~M/e ai sems mong
412a1(rgyud): man+da to//an+te t+ta bAp+ti shA sa ni ha ra ha ra/sma ra s+pha rA Na/bi ga ta rA gA bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te/sa ra sa ra/sa ma ba la/ha sa ha sa/tra ya tra ya/ga ga na ma/
412a2(rgyud): hA ba ra lak+ShA Na dz+wa la dz+wa la na sA gaM re swA hA//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'o//rig paM 'dzin pa'i rim par phye ba'o//de nas rim par phye ba rab 'byams thad kyi
412a3(rgyud): thun mong gi rtog pa'i tshig zhib mo thams cad bstan par bya'o//'dir byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i cho ga ni rnam pa gnyis te/thabs
412a4(rgyud): dang bcas pa dang /thabs dang bcas pa ma yin pa'o//sngon du bya ba'i bstan pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/sngon gyi dus goms pa dang /rgyun ma chad par zla ba la sogs par

412a6(rgyud): gyis dben pa'i ri la sogs pa dang /rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i 'du 'dzi dang bral ba'i gtsug lag khang gi brang khang la sogs pa'o//sngon du 'gro ba rnam pa gnyis te/dus
412a7(rgyud): gsum du sdig pa bshags pa dang /bsod nams dang ye shes la rje su yi rang ba'o//goms par bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/legs pa la sbyor ba dang /sangs rgyas//
412b1(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' rjesasu dran pa la sogs pa'i sgom pa goms pa'o//gtsang sbra ni gnyis te/lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas sems can dad pa can la phan pa yang
412b2(rgyud): dag par ston pa dang /'khor ba'i chos rnams la mngon par mi dga' bas sdig pa kun tu mi spyod pa'i gtsang sbra'o//myur du 'grub par byed pa'i chos ni gnyis te/sems can
412b3(rgyud): gyi khams ma lus pa 'khor ba las rnam par grol bar sgrub pa dang /byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la sogs pa ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes yang dag par bsams nas bzlas
412b4(rgyud): ba bya ba 'am/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs pas bzlas pa bya ba'o//gnyis la ni dngos grub ring bar 'gyur te/ma dad pa dang /byang chub
412b5(rgyud): tu sems ma bskyed pa la'o//stobs rnam pa gnyis kyis sems can gyi khams dman pa dang /bA ra mA dang /mchog rnams kyi don 'byung bar 'gyur te/rang gi smon lam

413a1(rgyud): med pa'i sems bskyed pa'i sbyor ba dang /sgyid lug pa med pa'i sbyor ba'o//bya ba ni danyis te/thabs dang shes rab kyi sgor 'jug pa'o//mi bya
413a2(rgyud): ba ni gnyis te/som nyi dang /sems can la nye bar 'tshe ba'i las//lus 'di'i yon tan ni gnyis te/don yod par myur du 'grub pa dang /bgegs med pa'o//'di
413a3(rgyud): spang bar bya ba ni gnyis te/gsang sngags la sogs pa spong ba dang /mi gus pa'o//goms par bya ba ni gnyis te/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
413a4(rgyud): rjesu dran pa'i sbyor ba dang /sems can gyi don bya ba'o//'dir rmad du byung ba ni gnyis te/ji lta ji ltar sngags rnams sgrub par byas pa de lta de ltar rje su 'thun par 'gyur pa
413a5(rgyud): dang /cho ga gang dang gang gis gang la sbyar ba de bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ba'o//mi mthong ba'i chos kyi yon tan ni gnyis te/gang du skyes par byang chub sems dpa'

413b1(rgyud): nyid//'dir spyod par mi bya ba'i dmachog ni gnyis te/myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba dang /khri la nyal ba'o//'dir mi bya ba na gnyis te/gsung sngags la ser sna mi bya ba dang /dor/
413b2(rgyud): chung ngu'i las mi bya ba'o//'dir 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba ni gnyis te/skyon du 'gyur ba'i las thams cad dang /den med pa la 'dod pa'o//'dir nges pa ni gnyis te/rma du byung
413b3(rgyud): ba'i chos 'byung ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu 'jug pa'o//'dir byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba ni gnyis te/thams cad du lhag ma lus par mi byed pa dang /sangs rgyas/
413b4(rgyud): dang byang chub sems thams cad dang 'grogs par 'dod pa'o//de dag la sogs pa sngags kyi spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams la thabs mang du 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de nas sgrub pa po rnams
413b5(rgyud): kyi thun mong gi sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o//dang po re shig sngags gang yang rung ba blangs nas bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gang la lhag par mo sa pa nye bar
413b6(rgyud): bzung la snga dro'i thun la sku gzugs kyi mdun du 'am/ras ris kyi mdun du 'am/dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du mtshan ma bzhag la/sangs rgyas dang byang chub
413b7(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
414a1(rgyud): thams cad la bdag nyid 'bul gyis/thams cad du bdag rab tu gzung du gsol/thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub
414a2(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o//de nas sdig pa byas pa bshags par bya ste/'dir 'od//
414a3(rgyud): chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug las skyes pa'i ma lus pa thams cad bshags par dgyi ste/thugs bskyed pa gang gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
414a4(rgyud): kyis bshags pa des bdag gis kyang bshags par bgyi ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du'o//zhes bya ba 'am/yang na nus
414a5(rgyud): pa ji lta ba'i bshags pas bshags par bya'o//de nas 'di skad kyang brjod par bya'o//dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpo' thams cad la yang dag
414a6(rgyud): par byung ba'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tsho gas tshad med pa mnyam pa nyid la rje su yau rang te/chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rdza su yi rang bas rdza su yi rang ste/
414a7(rgyud): thams cad du thams cad yongasu skyob pa nyid dang /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyod pa dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rje su yi rab
414b1(rgyud): ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de ban du rje su yi rang ba mchog gi rje su yi rang ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar mkhyen pas rdzas
414b2(rgyud): ring bar mdzad pa de bzhin du rje y-i rang nas brjod pa ni /nus pa ji lta ba bo nin du su yi rang byer byera'o//de nas mchad pa'i nye bar ma/de ba'i dngos po ji snyed yod pa 'di lta ste/

414b4(rgyud): ga dang /sems can gyi khams na yod pa de dag dus thams cad du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yong su bsngo bar bya'o//yongasu bsngos nas bdag gi nasang+ge
414b5(rgyud): nams kyi stobs dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brla swad+d+hi me/mchod pa'i smin dab 'byam mchog tu rgya che ba/chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa rnams de bzhin
414b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dkyil khor gyi kyil la khong durab tu 'byung bar grur cig ces brjod la/de bu'i mchod pa'i smon 'byung bar byed pa'i dgo pa tshul mo'adi yang brjod par bya/
414b7(rgyud): nam/sar+b+ba ba sa ng+ge/sa r+b+bat+ya ba nyi ya cigan byas sa mnad sma /sa lan rgyad kyi bar rje rje phyi//stegs mang ma 'a brjo pa phyir/
415a1(rgyud): de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par gnas par 'gyur zhing byin gyis rlob la mkhyed par 'gyuraro//de nas
415a2(rgyud): bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan bsngags pa'i rgya mtsho glu dbyangs mchog rgya che ba rab 'byam rnams dri bzhin gshegs pa thaMd
415a3(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod la/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon te no bsdabs pa dang /chos sgrogs pa'i dbyangs 'byung bar byed
415a4(rgyud): po'i rig pa'i rgyal mo lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o//na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/sar+b+ba tra ku su ma ti a b+hi dz+nyA rA shi ni/na mo stu ste swA hA//de ltar don yod pa 'di la mngon par
415a5(rgyud): dad par byas nas bsgrubs na de bzhin du 'dir 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de nas bla na med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi cho gas de dag thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar
415a6(rgyud): bya'o//de nas tshad med pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yang rung ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed la sngags bzlas shing /de ltar re shig bdag gi sems bskyed pa dang pos
415a7(rgyud): bdag gi smon lam dang /bsod nams dang /ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'dir sems can gyi khamos thams cad sems bskyed pa grub par gyur cig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
415b1(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyang 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya'o//yang na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa grub par gyur cig/'byung bar gyur cig ce pa brjod do//yang na bla na med pa'i ye shes/
415b2(rgyud): kyi tshogs rgya mtsho sems can thams cad la dbyung bar gyur cig ces bya ba 'am/yangon dngos grub gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mkhyen pa de bdag gi bsod nams dang /
415b3(rgyud): ye shes kyi stobs dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can thams cad kyi dngos grub 'byung bar gyur cig ces bsams la/sngags kyi rgyal po la
415b4(rgyud): brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o//na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/na mo stu ste ma hA pradz+raHs+thA hI tAM ka ra tI s+tha sar+b+ba tra sar+b+ba ShaT d+har+m+ma trUM ma saM s+tha ya swA hA//de'i rjes la 'dir sems can gyi
415b5(rgyud): khams rnams la ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du sems can rnams la phan pa'i rnam pa tha ma sa cang 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmi
415b6(rgyud): shing phyag byas la/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad la rje su yi rang bar dmigs nas ji
415b7(rgyud): srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bzla bar bya'o//de nas bregs bam bklags la zas la spyad cing zas kyis dub na bstis nas snga dro'i cho ga de nyid kyis phyi dri yang bya'o//nyal ba na dang pa
416a1(rgyud): yan lag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas khyi ma yin pa la nyal bar bya'o//cho ga 'di nyid kyis
416a2(rgyud): nus pa ji lta ba dang /stobs ji lta ba bzhin nyin re zhing yar ngo'o nya'i zla bo gcig gi bar du bya'o//de nas thabs dang mi ldan pa'i cho ga yang ji skad gsungs pa bzhin nus pa ji lta ba
416a3(rgyud): bzhin bsgrub par bya'i/bdag gis nus pa ma yino//zhes sgyid lug par mi bya ste/las ji lta ba 'bras bu yang de lta bu'o zhes bya bas dngos grub kyi 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur/
416a4(rgyud): zhes pasams l-i ri la sogs pa'i gnas rab tu dben pa 'am/gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i khang pa stong pa 'am/bla gab med par 'du 'dzi rnam par spangs la sems
416a5(rgyud): can la gnod pa med pas cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o//khrus la sogs pa med kyang rung /ras ris med kyang rung /tshul khrims 'chal pa yin yang rung /dman pa yin yang
416a6(rgyud): rung /bsod nams dang mi ldan yang rung ste/gang yang mang du sgrub pa la goms par bya'o//mun pa chen po nas snang bar 'jug par 'dod pa dang /'khor bar ltung ba rnams
416a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la bskyon par 'dod pa dang /gang yang mang du 'bad pas log par ltung ba rnams rab tu bzung zhing snang bar byed pa rab tu thob par 'dod pas tshig
416b1(rgyud): bzhin nyin ro zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du byas lnga/mthar yar da bco lnga la ji ltar mngon par 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mchod rten dang /sku gzugs dang /ras ris dang /dam pa'i
416b2(rgyud): chos glags bam mam/gang yang rung ba'i mdun du me tog sil mas bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas la/lo ma bting ba la 'dug ste/srung ba'i cho ga la sogs pa snga ma bzhin bas/
416b3(rgyud): la lan gsum gyi bar du sngags brjod par bya'o//de nas lcags kyi 'khor lo 'am/rdo rje 'am/ral gri 'am/mdung 'am/lcags kyu 'am/chu gri zla phyed kyi bar du ba lang gi
416b4(rgyud): ba'i nang du bcug nas ston la/lag tu bzung nas srod dang po nas brtsams nas mtshan rangs par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas bsgrub par bya/
416b5(rgyud): yang na rdo rje las byas pa ra'i'o ma'i nang du bcug paso//yang na dngul dang /zangs dang /gser las byas pa zla ba phyed du chu'i nang du bcug pa 'am/mi dman pa'i 'o ma'i bum
416b6(rgyud): par gtsug pa 'am/bsregs pa'am/ldong ros dang /bza dang /ga~M wang ngam/rang bzhin gyis gnas pa lo ma 'am/gos kyi bar du lag tu bzung la bsgrub par bya'o//yang
416b7(rgyud): na nor bu 'am/yang na phreng ba 'am/yang na lhung bzed bkrus pa 'am/gos sam/gnas sam/gdugs sam/ri mo lag tu bzung bas sam/ti la'i lo ma las byas/
417a1(rgyud): pa'i ral gri la sogs pa rig pa 'dzin pa 'grub pa rngo sra rnams dang mtshan rangs par bsgrubs nu nam phyeng dum nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 'byar bar gyur nas
417a2(rgyud): gal te grub na ngo mtshar chen po glo bur du 'byung bar 'gyur te/na mkha' la me tog gi char 'bab pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu g.yo ba dang /snang ba chen po blo bur du 'byung ba/
417a3(rgyud): dang /gzhan yang ngo mtshar chen po rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs thams cad nye bar 'dus nas de la bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du sngags kyi/
417a4(rgyud): mthu khyad par can gyis dbang bskur bar byed/yongasu 'dzin par byed//de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig 'dzin gyi sde dpon tshogs na spyod par 'gyur//'di rang gi skal pa/
417a5(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur zhing byang chub sems dpa'i rig 'dzin gyi sde pa'i rgyal po nyid sdug bsngal med par 'thob par 'gyur zhing /de nyid du sa la bzhugs nas rdo rje
417a6(rgyud): 'dzin gyi gtso bo chen po zhes bya ba'i 'khor los sgyur pa rab 'byam mtha' yas pa'i 'phags pa'i chos kyi spyod yul 'phrogs pa med par spong ba/rnam par rol pa mtha' yas/
417a7(rgyud): pas mdzes pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig po 'dzin par byung nas nyams par mi 'gyur ba thob pas sreg pa'i bskal pa'i dusu yang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'gro bar
417b1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing blan mod pa'i bad pa du rmyi las kyad mo nyams la/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'dus spyod pa las myi nyams shing bud myed mang po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor bar yang 'gyur/
417b2(rgyud): shes rab dang thabs so so 'thob cing stobs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing sems can la gnod par yang mi byed//'jig rten gyi rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang de'i bde ba'i bdud cing/
417b3(rgyud): longs spyod mang po la ltos na zad pa dang /dman pa lta bu yin pas 'jig rten pa'i rig 'dzin de dag gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing snying rje bar sems dper 'gyur//'di'i shugs kyis
417b4(rgyud): 'gro ba la ltos na/lha'i 'jig rten pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyang rkang gis 'gro ba lta bur sems//gang 'jig rten pa'i rigs 'dzin grub pa de du 'di khyad par yang nr-i dang ri rab
417b5(rgyud): kye khyad par lta bur 'gyuraro//'di lta bu'i thabs dang ldan pa'i cho ga'o//thabs dang mi ldan pas ni ji ltar mos pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po chog zhib mo rim par phye
417b6(rgyud): bA rab 'byam gyi cho ga'o//sngar gyi rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad kyis bsgrub par bya zhing sngar gyi rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad kyis sbyar bar bya'o//mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub pa'i thabs
417b7(rgyud): ni rnam pa gnyis te/rab tu dben par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sem sa dpa' la sogs pa dmigs pa rtag tu zlos pa dang /lho mnyes par byed pas mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub
418a1(rgyud): paste/cho ga'i thabs de dag gis rtag tu goms par byas nas mngon par shes pa lnga nye bar 'byung bar 'gyuraro//las rnam pa gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
418a2(rgyud): rnams thob par 'gyur te/lus yang ba dang sems yang ba nyid la goms par byed cing zlos pa dang /dben par 'dug nas bzlas pa la goms par byed pa'o//mi snang ba'i cho ga

418a4(rgyud): bkram pa la 'dug nas ba bla 'am/gi wang ngam/a shwad tha'i lo mo 'am/byang chub kyi shing gzhon yang rung /mya ngan med pa la sogs bkris kyi shing gi lo ma bzhag nas

418a6(rgyud): papor bya'o//de lta na yang ma grub na nyi ma bzhi pa la nyi ma rangs bar dur khrod du 'chag cing sgrub pa byas ni nges par 'grub par 'gyur te/mi snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dong pa'i gzugs

418b1(rgyud): ste/bzla 'am/ga wang la ma'i bar du bzha nas nyi ma nub pa'i dus nas brtsams te/mtshan rangs pa bzlas nas du ba byung bas chud gsum byas nu me snang bar 'gyur//yang na dur khrod do
418b2(rgyud): nyid du khrag gis thig ler byas lag tu ral gri thogs nas 'dug po la mtshan rangs pa bzlas pa byas na nyi ma shar ba'i dus mi snang bar 'gyur//ro la rkang pas mnan nas lag pa r-I ral hri

418b7(rgyud): khyim bya yang rung bris pa'i mdun du mtshan rangs pa mar dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mi'i rus pa phye ma'i sbyin sreg bya se na nam phyed dam/nyi ma 'char kar 'phar bar 'gyur ro//de nas/
419a1(rgyud): gang du 'dod par 'gro zhing mi snang bar yang 'gyur//'dod na yang slar 'ong bar 'gyur zhing yang 'gro bar yang 'gyur//de la sbyor ba 'dis ril bu bsgrub par bya ste//

419b1(rgyud): sar dang /spang ma dang /dza tA'i me tog rnams cha mnyam pa'i phye ma zhib mor byas la rang gi khrag dang /til mar bsres pa dang /ril bu gsum byas la zangs kyis gtum par bya/

419b4(rgyud): srong nas brtsams nas ji srid du byung ba dang /rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur gyi bar du sgrub pa byas nA de nas ril bu gcig khar gtsug na nyi ma'i 'od lta bur 'gyur ro//khru gang tsam gyi sa la ma reg
419b5(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//gal te de'i nub mo ma grub na slar yang dur khrod du srong nas brtsams nas ji srid nyi ma shar gyi bar du 'chag cing bzlas pa bya'o//yang na dbang phyug chen po grub pa'i khang
419b6(rgyud): par mtshan ma'i steng du gzhag nas kha byang du bltas te 'dug pas lag tu ral gri thogs te/srod dus nas btsams nas nyi ma shar gyi bar de bzhin du khar bcug nas bsgrubs na nyi ma'i
419b7(rgyud): mdog tu 'gyuraro//yang na dgon pa'i mchod rten nam/yang na byang chub kyi shing bdun po gang yang rung ba'i rtsar nye bar 'dug la ril bu gang yang rung ba gsum lag tu bzung nas snga

420a2(rgyud): dang /nyi ma gzas zin pa'i tshe bsgrub par bya ste snga ma bzhin no//de nas mig sman 'byung bar 'gyur te/spang ma dang /'thing shun dang /zangs phye ma rnams cha mnyam par byas la rang gi

420a5(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba dang /dbang phyug chen po'i gan su 'phags da rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag tu bzhag nas tshes bcu gsum gyi nyin zhig spyang dar 'dug nas sgrub pa 'am/zla ba nyi ma bzas zin pa'i tshe/

420b5(rgyud): glegs bam lag pa la bcings nas sam/rdzas de dag las gang yang rung ba nyid dam/med par yang gzhon nu dkyil 'khor du bcug cing shing dngar po la me spar la/shing dang tsha
420b6(rgyud): phyed dang bcas pa'i rang gi khrag gis bsgos pa nyi ma nub nas brtsams nas 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du de lag pa nas bzung nas bsgrubs na/de dang bcas par thogs pa med pa'i rig
420b7(rgyud): pi 'dzin par 'gyuraro//dur khrod du lcags kyi rdo rje lag tu bzung nas slongs mo la spyod cing ji srid bdag nyid gnod sbyin du 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas na bdag nyid lcang lo can du zhugs par
421a1(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur//der 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i rigasu du gi gnas thob par 'gyur//byon nas sdig pa chen po byab pa yang lag pa nas bzung nas
421a2(rgyud): nges par lcang lo can du khrid par byed//sprul ba'i tshe rdo rje de srung ba byas la rnga suM bzhag par gyur//zas za nga'i tshe yang de lag tu bzung nas bzang bar bya'o//tsan dan dmar po las byas
421a3(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje lag tu thogs nas rtag tu gsod snyoms la spyodapas ri la 'dzegs nas bzlas pa byas na zla ba lnga'i nang du rgyal tshan bzhi'i ros kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skal pa ji lta

421a6(rgyud): bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas la dkyil 'khor gyi dbu su dur khrod kyi shing las me sbar la lag pa g.yas par lcags kyu thogs nas ske che'i spyan bsreg bya ste/dur khrod na gnyug

421b1(rgyud): gyis bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur//de bzhin du shing chen po'i rtsa bar de bzung nas slongs mo spyod bzhin du bzlas pa byas na gnod sbyin 'ongs nas ci zhig bgyi zhes smra zhing gang don du gnyer ba'ing

422a1(rgyud): mongs pa sbyin zlog yin//'di sbyin sreg/chog 'di yin te/rdzas kyi chang du ni shing rdzun dang /mdun dang /am+bu la sregs pas//de zhan
422a2(rgyud): du 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i tsher ma can b+h+rUM shing gi yam shing gis kyang sbyin bsreg bya'o//zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /she la'i zan gyi chang bu 'am/sbrad rtsi dang /mar dang /'bras so//

422a6(rgyud): bya'o//ma du ri ka dang til bsres pa'i sbyin sreg gis ni dga' ba chen por byed pa'o//so ba dang mar bsres pa dang /tsha ba'i mar dang sbags pa'i pha//
422a7(rgyud): so che'i tsher mas ni sha za la sogs pa gdug pa rnams la'o//klu'i ma dang ske tshes ni gnod sbyin dgug pa la'o//'bras bu bsregs pas kyang rung //skyed mos tshal
422b1(rgyud): sa pa nas da nas sa / ma ga gas da rgyun pa sa pa //da 'a na dang san nu na du tshul mun+d+ha pa dang /sa dang

422b4(rgyud): dang /ma la~Mk+Sha dang / yang kul sogs pa r+g+ha'i rlung du la rdzun paN+Da yan cad ts+tsha pa lnga yin tshud bya zhing dbul bur byar//do zhin du mchod na dang /sku gzugs dang /
422b5(rgyud): ud /stegs pam yang rgyal nan lnga ba lis smras pa nges par dbang 'byor//nang kyi na du rgyu ba'i sbyin stsog 'a /snyun shi dang /
423a1(rgyud): de bzhin du mchod rten la sogs pa la nyi bdun yan chad ji tsam nus pa byas na/nges par nad med pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang bcas pa byed par 'gyur//brdan/
423a2(rgyud): la ni til mar dang /rang skyur la stegs pa'i rgyal po'i yungs kar sbyin sreg giso//'byung po dang /sha za dang /srin po la sogs pa la thal ba la sogs pas bris pas 'bros par
423a3(rgyud): 'gyur zhing /brdeg pa de /bcad pa dang /bcing ba yang mdo//bdag srung ba la ni lan gsum brjod paso//gzhan srung ba la ni lan lnga byas pas 'dug par 'gyur//gang dag
423a4(rgyud): la mdud pa bcings pa dang /chu dang /yungs kar dang /sa dang /chen dang /phyag rgyas sam/yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kyang 'chi bar byed//thal mo brdabs pa 'am/mdud pa

423a6(rgyud): na thams cad don yod par byed do//rang bzhin du gnas pa la 'bebs par byed na//tsan dan+te dang /a ga ru'i bdug spos la sogs pas dkyil 'khor me tog sil ma bkram pa byas
423a7(rgyud): pa la'o//gdon gyis zin pa la 'bebs par byed na/u shi dang /mor gyi bdug spos kyiso//bdug spos thams cad kyang mar dang bcas par bya'o//dpal pi s+tha ka la sogs
423b1(rgyud): pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o//mar dang bcas pa nyin bzhi pa lnga sogs pa'i rims zhi bar byed do//til mar dang bsres bya'i kun tu ru ka la sngags pa'i dadrug spos thams cad kyiso//lcags la/
423b2(rgyud): byas pa'i phur bur gdug pa can srin po dang /lha ma yin la sogs pa phur bus 'dab so//gnod sbyin la ni 'o ma can gyi phur buso//kA lA ni nem pa'i shing las byas pas//rig
423b3(rgyud): pa 'dzin pa la ni shrI khaSh+NI las byas paso//lha laM tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i phur bus sam/ji ltar 'dod pas lan nyi shu d+ha gcig gi bar du bzlas la gzugs brnyan rgyu
423b4(rgyud): gnas gang yin pa der gdab par bya'o//btab nas khros pas gnas de nyi mtshan ma cung zhig byung bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya zhing /skud pa med pa'i drug tu khros pas pharal
423b5(rgyud): phur bus gdab//bstan pa la sdang ba'i sems can dra /sems can rnams la sdang ba yang phur bus gdabo//dpral phur bus rgyal po gdug pa can gyi dpung phur byas gdab por
423b6(rgyud): 'gyur//rgyal po phur bus gdab pa la ni tsam pa'i shing las byas pas rgyal po phur bus gdab par 'gyur//mi'i rus pa'i phur bus ni ba gegs phur bus gda'o//rus

424a2(rgyud): yang 'ching bar byed do//bcad pas grol por 'gyur ro//gal te rab tu sbyad na tshangs pa la sogs pa rang nyid kyang lag na rdo rje stobs po ches bcings par bsams na bcings par 'gyur/
424a3(rgyud): grol bar gyur cig ces bsams na grol bar 'gyuraro//de lta na yang 'dir sems la dbang ba yang 'grub par 'gyur zhing dam tshig la dbang bar yang 'gyur ro//de la 'dir thogs pa
424a4(rgyud): med pa don yod pa'i 'ching ba'i sbyor ba ni yungs kar dang 'bras btags pa la tig ta dang tshwa bsres la/lcags sgrog gam/rdo rje 'am/mdung dram/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ram
424a5(rgyud): rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas na so dur khrod du sbyin sreg byas na 'ching ba chen pos bcing bar 'gyur ro//yang na ni ma pa'i lo ma dang /ni pi na lhan cig btags nas sbyin sreg byas
424a6(rgyud): na de bzhin du 'ching //mon sran gre'u dang /ske tshe dang k+Shu ru ra dang lhan cig btags nas phyag rgya byas lta dur khrod du sbyin sreg byas na lding bar 'gyuraro//mngon spyod ni 'di ltar
424a7(rgyud): 'byung ste/du khrod kyi shing tog ta dang bcas pa dang /tshwa dang bcas pa'i yam shing gis dur khrod dmo/khong pa steng pa dang /bskyed mos tshol snying pa dang /sa sprin gyi
424b1(rgyud): phyog su khros pas nim pa las rdo rje'i rnam pa lta bur byas la/de nas rus pa'i phye ma rang gi khrag dang bsgres pas sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma dgus nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro//yang nA sha chen po mar dang bcas//

424b3(rgyud): na khri'i sgro la sogs pa til mar la bstegs po'i sgro thams cad kyiso//yang na rang gi khrag dang bsres pa'i thal bso//yang na arga'i 'bras bu mar la bstegs paso//yang na dug dang khrag

424b5(rgyud): par 'chi bar 'gyuraro//yang na dur khrod du zangs las byas pa 'am/lcags las byas pa'i snod til mar gyis bkang nas bsgos pa la sngar gyi rdzas de dag nyid dang /reng skyur la bstegs
424b6(rgyud): ba 'am/mar dang /til mar dang /'gyur byed las bstegs pa btso bar bya zhing gong sngar gyi tshes pa rnams bsal la gzhan btso bar bya ste/brgya yan chad ji tsam 'dod po sbyin bsreg

425a1(rgyud): sam/skud pa bcings pas kyang ngo //bdug pa tshar bcad pa'i las 'di dag gis nges par gdug pa can 'ching bar 'gyuraro//gang yang klu gdug pa can zhi bar bya/

425a3(rgyud): rig 'dzin gdug pa can rdzas 'phrog par byed pa 'am/gang yang gnod sbyin gdug pa can dang /gang yang srin po gdug pa can nam/rgyal ba 'am/rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am/

425b3(rgyud): kyang skyon yod par mi 'gyuraro//sha za ba yang dgag pa mdo//la phug dang /la tu la sogs pa la spyod kyang skyon med do//lhag ma yang skyon mod do//'on kyang gang zhig dad po
425b4(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang //byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams lo jo bo bzhin du gus pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ched cher byed pa/

425b6(rgyud): don yod par 'grub pa'o//'don las thogs pa med pa'o//rtog pa 'di ni chags pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon par sgrub pas bsgrubs pa'i thabs kyis 'dir rjesu 'jug

426a1(rgyud): grub 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di la som nyi mdo pas sgrub pa'i zangs la sbyar bar bya'o//lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
426a2(rgyud): du skye bar byed pa 'di'i sbyor ba la goms par bya'o//'dir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thoms cad kyi rten la gsol ba gdab pa dang /mkhyen par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas//

426a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thang nas leg so zhes bya ba dang /byin gyis brlab pa so sor thob par bya ba'i phyir sngags bsgrub par bya'o//myur du rten ga ni sa gyur nas
426a5(rgyud): ba'i bdud rtsi rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir gang yang chags pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i sngags kyis bsgrub par bya'o//'dir brtson 'grus chen po dang
426a6(rgyud): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsang sngags bzlas sam/sems can gyi khams rnams kyi don du sngags bzlas na/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
426a7(rgyud): dpe' rnams sems rgya chen pos mchod pa chen po'i smon sems can gyi khams rnams la bde ba yang dag par skyed pas mngon par mchad pas mchod par 'gyur//skad cig
426b1(rgyud): skad cig la khyad par du 'gro ba dang /grong nas brang du 'gro ba sa sor thob par 'gyur//mdor bsdus na sngags bzlas pa byas pas sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par
426b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar yang 'gyuraro//'dri la gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs nas spyod pa dad pa can bag yod pas som nyi med par bya'o//brtson 'grus dang bcas
426b3(rgyud): de'i snying rjes smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrungs pas 'di la gus par byas nas gtsang sbras gsang sngags kyi spyod pa 'di nyid dang /bslab pa 'di nyid la dmigs pa yongasu ma btang ba/
426b4(rgyud): dang na pa'i gan su 'du 'dzi dang bral bar byas la sems bskyed pa thams cad du tshad med pa la goms par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu dang pra/
426b5(rgyud): dmigs par rjesu 'gro ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi don gyi las dang rab tu ldan pa'i lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi las thams cad yang dag par brtsom pa ste/sngags kyi sgo
426b6(rgyud): spyod pa la zhugs pas chas de dag la spyad par bya'o//de la 'di dag ni rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dir bar du gcod par 'gyur ba yin te/le lo dang /'dod pa med pa dang /mngon
426b7(rgyud): par mi sbyor ba dang /'du 'jal dga'o ba dang /phan pa ma yin pa la zhugs pa dang /yid gnyis dang /bdag gi bsod nams dang mi ldan pa dang /tshul khrims 'chal/

427a5(rgyud): ser sna yang mi bya'o//gzhan dag sngags kyi spyod pa la gzhug par bya'o//brlab par bya/yang dag par gzung bar bya ste/de ltar na bstan pa'i don byas pa yang

427b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa/'gying pa/'gying bag gis ri mo rnams cung zhig la zhing 'dra ba bri bar bya'o//'phag pa rdo rje lcags kyus sngags smras pa/na ma s+t+waM yang d+hi kA nAM/te thA ga tA nA/

428a3(rgyud): bri bar bya'o//de nas yang 'phags pa rdo rje sdes sngags smras pa/na mastA ya d+hi kA nI/ta thA ga tA nAM/oM s+yo n+ya ba ra badz+ra ya na ma swA hA//de bzhin du 'phags pa lag bzang //

429b2(rgyud): atA nAM/d+hu ras rbaM d+hI.aHga la/aud+har+m+ma dwe d+d+ha ma/dz+wal dA 'i na ma saMs+t+rI//rdo rje 'jigs pa'o//oM d+hu dz+wA le a kr-i yau swAhA//rdo rje ga ci dzi kyi//

429b7(rgyud): nam sde yod d+hi kA nA~M/ta thA ga tA nAn/tsa ci dang pas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ni yo bar byed//gnyis pas ni gzugs rnams//gsum pas ni 'ching bar byed//
430a1(rgyud): nabazhi pas ni thar pa dang gzo brjid sgrub par byed//lnga pas bcod par byed do//drug pasani rengs par byedad//'di dag ni phyag 'tshal bar re'o//nang
430a2(rgyud): yad d+hI kA nAM/ta thAgat+ta nAM/sa ma bed a lA a d+hiShA naM/ut+ta ra/ga gan sa ma ni sus+t+re tA/shAM ka ro shrI ban to khaM la nA to shA nA rA ga ni shi shan tu/a nan+nad+h+waM/sA ra sA ra/ke mAH
430a3(rgyud): kapA li kha ro sha ri NaM/nA mo stu/sadz+dza t+tetwe sha ra NA/b+h+yA ma b+hU ma swA hA//na maHsaR+Wa ta thA ga tA nAM/a nAn+ta yAM swA hAM//rdo rje gdun gyi'o//na me s+t+r-i yang d+h+r-i ka nAM/ta thA ga
430a4(rgyud): tAnAn/sar+b+ba badz+ra bad+hA r-inA~M/badz+re ni l-i ni lag+h+ri hU~M s+the T+Tad+d+hi/rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o//de nas rdo rje gzi brjid ces bya bar tI 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

478b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//gang dag sdig pa can gyi rmi lam rmis sam//gang du bya khA dang /lhas ngan pa mthong dam+ba/gnas gang du bkra ma shis pa brgya dag gnas par gyur pa la gang dag bcom
478b4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkur sti byed na/rmi lam ngan pa dang /ltas ngan pa dang /bkra ma shis pa'i dngos po

479a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang /rkun pos 'jigs pa dang /tshom pos 'jigs pa de dag gi yang dri shAn gshegs pa de la mchod pa bya'o//'jam dpal gzhan yang /

479a3(rgyud): lnga po dag 'dzin pa drang /gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi bcu po dag 'dzin pa dang /gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa bslab pa'i gzhi bzhi brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang /khyim

479a5(rgyud): dag ji ltar yongasu bzung ba'i bslab pa'i sdom pa de dag gi nang nas bslab pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig las nyams par gyur te/ngan 'bru ngan song gis 'jigs skrag pa gang

479b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos rnams la yid gnyis sam/som nyi 'am/the tsom 'tshal ba ma mchi so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de bzhin gash+ye

484b5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni bskor/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /

485a7(rgyud): pa mya ngan med mchog dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya
485b1(rgyud): mtsho mchog gi zlos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyas po la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshad/
485b2(rgyud): ba dang la shAm thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal
485b3(rgyud): gnon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ros gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
485b4(rgyud): pa lag ni rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
485b5(rgyud): zla ba ltar rab tu bsil byed la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' sems
485b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems drapa'i sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen
485b7(rgyud): po spongs pa po rtsegs la phyog 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa don yod la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa'
486a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lta na mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mun pa mun nag thams cad nge
486a2(rgyud): par 'joms pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa legs par rnam par sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo//byang
486a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo//byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangaso la phyag 'tshal lo//
486a4(rgyud): bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po rtse 'dzin rgyal pa la phyag 'tshal lo//'phags pa dgra bcom pa shA ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la phyag
486a5(rgyud): 'o tshal lo//dge bsnyen chen po dpal tshungs pa dang brgya byin la phyag 'tshal lo//rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo//klu'i dge bsnyen chen po sangs rgyas bcom
486a6(rgyud): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo//gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gsung dbyangs gcig gis
486a7(rgyud): gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag bka' su ma ho//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo ba ga wo taM/a pra ti ha ta b+hai Sha dz+yo rA dzA ya/tad+ya thA/oM sarbe ta bA gau ta hUM AHg+hu me g+hu
486b1(rgyud): oM mi ni m+b+ha hrI/ma saH/sam+b+hat+ta thAgat+ta/sasmAd+b+har+m+mAr+thAn+tu/ut+ta pata/pU po pA ba shad+hA naM/s+yA ba pan shas/mas bun d+yo t+ta9/A ma kum/prang+gak+Sho d+hA /
486b2(rgyud): re sho d+ha nA d+ha ma ni d+ha me/sne ru mo/mdzu shi Sha raM/sar+b+ba au hU~M l-i mr-i d+h+yA ni wA ra NAM/bad+d+hi su prad+d+he/br-id+d+ha a d+hiSh+NI te ne gAM d+hu me/sarba de da?s+yA/a sa ma~M/sa~M mAn+ma hAn+tu
486b3(rgyud): sarba bud+d+ha bo d+h+waM sathA/shaM me sha me/pra shaman+t+ra me/sarbi ai d+hu pe dr-i ba byaM d+hA ya pU rA NaM suM pU pU ri ya me/sarba A shaM mai bai n+yAr+yA pra ti b+hA se/sarba pA paM k+ShaM yaM kaM
486b4(rgyud): swAhA/oM b+ha Sha dz+ha b+hai Sha dz+ya/mahA b+hai She dz+ye b+haM Sha~M d+ha s+ya pung+ga te s+yAde bzhin gshigs pa'i mtshan dang /gzungs 'di bka'i stsal pa'i tshe snang ba chen po byung s+t+ri sa chen po
486b5(rgyud): yang g.yos nas rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul po dag snang ngo //'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang spos dang bdug pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod nas legs
486b6(rgyud): sngo zhes bya ba gsol ti lan bdun bskor ba byas so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po de dgra mi snang bar gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das dpal rgyal ba shAkya thub pas
486b7(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /
487a1(rgyud): mchod pa nges gtsang mar byas la phyogs gtsad mar 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan par byas la sems can thams cad mchog tu
487a2(rgyud): snying rdzabs sasu gral bab pa'i nya nas brtsams te/de bzhin gau shegs pa de dag ge skye gzugs byas la chas brgyad deng /bcu bzhi dang bco lnga la spyang bar gnas
487a3(rgyud): pas gzungs 'di dag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu 'am/stong rtsa brgyad dam/stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur 'dren cing /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /mar mAM dang /
487a4(rgyud): phreng ba dang /rol me'i sgra dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du mtshad pa byed na/de la de bzhin
487a5(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sems par 'gyur/tshangs pa dang /brgya byin dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi
487a6(rgyud): dang /klu'i dge bsnyen chen po drug gis kyang yongs su sbyang bar 'gyur/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyis yang dag par srung bar 'gyur/mtshams
487a7(rgyud): med pa ldi la sogs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/nod thams cad kyis mi gtab par 'gyur/ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/dus ma yin par
487b1(rgyud): 'tsho bo thams cad lngas yongs su thar par 'gyur/'chi ba drang /dgra dang /dgon pa'i gnad pa dang /'thab pa dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/
487b2(rgyud): dgra bo thams cad kyi dbang du mi 'gro bar 'gyur/ci bsams pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan
487b3(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
487b4(rgyud): stsal pa/'jam dpal de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi gzungs zhes bya bar zung shig/las kyi
487b5(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thag cing sbyong ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/
487b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'o stsal pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/bcom
487b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stongs bskyed pa'i bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho/
488a1(rgyud): klusmis na d+hAn pa dang /d+hA b+hUng / sasmos smra du
488a2(rgyud): shAn sa/b+hU ma kyi mni na rgya shrI gas pa sma / seMn
488a3(rgyud): /mi me /sprin tong po'i mi sman la ldan sa sa pa
